column2: Kuli ulemekwa Teyofilasi, nikuba ati bantu banji banji bakasoleka kulemba makani ashintu shesho shakacitika akati kesu,
bakalemba kwiingainya umbutwakashimwinwa ubakamboni bakabona shintu shesho kuhwa ku makancilo, ulimwi kabakambauka Mulumbe wezo.
Inzho uulemekwa Teyofilasi, shintu shoonse sheshi ndakashibuzhabuzha kabotu kabotu mbuli mbushicilizhenye kuhwa ciindi nishakakanka kucitika, ubobo ndazanda ati nshilembe.
Ndacita bobo kwaamba uzhibe lushinizho mu twaambo toonse ntuwakayiishiwa.
Boonse bobile kabali bantu balulami, kabeenda mu malailile u kucilila Milawo ya Leza yoonse ca kubula kampenda.
Pele kabaina mwana, nkaambo Lizabeti katazhali ulimwi boonse bobile kabali bacembele.
Bumwi buzuba, Zakaliya kali muŋanda ya Leza kucita mulimo wakwe wabupaizhi, kaambo kabuli bulizhi bwankamu yakwe.
Inzho kwiingainya uciyanza ca bapaizhi, bakasala Zakaliya kwaamba ati nguuya muŋanda ya Leza kutenta tununcilizho mu busena busalala.
Inkamu ya bantu keesheele ansengwe ilakomba ciindi Zakaliya naakaakutenta tununcilizho.
Ngoonaawo Zakaliya wakabona anjelo wa Mwami, ulizhimine kuluya lwa cilyo lwa cipaililo aakaakutentelwa tununcilizho.
Ceci cakamuzhinga Zakaliya, ulimwi wakatiya cini cini.
Pele anjelo wakamwaambila ati, “Utatiyi Zakaliya! Leza wateelela kukomba kwako, mwinako Lizabeti ulakakuzhalila mwana mweembezhi wezo nguukaaulika ati Johani.
Kulakaba kubotelwa ukutangala cini cini, u bantu banji banji balakabotelwa ukaambo kakuzhalwa kwakwe!
Wezu mwana ulakaba mulemu ku bushu bwa Leza, ulimwi takanwi waini pe, nishiba shimwi shikola, ulakakwata insana sha Moza Usalala kacili mwifwu lyakabaina.
Wezu muntu ulakacita kwaamba ba Izilaili banji banji bazhoke ku Mwami Leza wabo.

Inzho Johani nguukaasololela Mwami Jeso, ulimwi ulakaakukwete insana sha Moza shili ukoya shaakaakukwete mushinshimi Elaija. Ulakaleta kuteelezhanya akati kabana ubamaushabo, ulakalulamika bantu bataluleme kwaamba babe u mizeezo mibotu, ulakacita bantu ba Mwami kwaamba balibambile.”
Zakaliya wakamubuzha anjelo ati, “No ndazhiba buti ati ceci nciwaamba cilakacitika? Nkaambo ndakomena, aze mwinangu mucembele.”
Inzho ulaba shicintaamba, ubobo tuukwaamba kushicila sheshi shintu shikacitike nkaambo wiina kwaashoma mazwi angu aza aakaacitika ku ciindi ceelele.”
Ku ciindi ceco bantu kabamulindila Zakaliya, bakakanka kubuzhanya ati, “No nkaamboonzhi wamuka kuhwa muŋanda ya Leza?”
Naakamuhwa, wakakacilwa kwaamba, wakakanka kutambaika matashi cakutaamba linji, ubobo bantu bakashimpikila kuzhiba ati wabona cilengaano muŋanda ya Leza.
Bulizhi bwakwe bwakusebeza muŋanda ya Leza nibwakamana, Zakaliya wakaya kwakwe.
Inzho nikwakaita mazuba, Lizabeti wakemita, amane wakaliseseka ku bantu kwa myezhi yosanwe,
ulaamba ati, “Inzho Mwami wamfwila luse nkaambo wantaba, wankusha insoni ku bantu!”
Ciindi Lizabeti naakakwanya mwezhi iili cisambomwi yakumita, Leza wakatuma anjelo Gabuliyele kuya ku Nazanleta mucishi ca Galilaya.
Wakamutuma kunakalindu wakaakuseselwe ku mulombwana uutewa ati Jozefu wa luhubo lwa Devidi, izhina lya nakalindu wezo kali Maliya.
Anjelo wakeza kwakwe wamwaambila ati, “Uwe umulonjezhe, Mwami Leza abe aze.”
Maliya naakaateelela aza mazwi wakazhingwa cini cini, wakalibuzha mu monzo wakwe ati, “Anu nkwaanzha kuli buti koku?”
Inzho anjelo wakamwaambila ati, “Utatiyi Maliya, Mwami Leza wakufwila luse.
Bona, ulakamita u kuzhala mwana mweembezhi, ulakamuulika izhina lya Jeso.
Ulakaba mulemu, ulakaakutewa ati Mwanakwe Namakungwe Mutalabala. Mwami Leza ulakamupa bwami buli ukoya mbwaakaakubele Devidi ushi,
ulakaba muleli wamushobo wa Izilaili shikwense uushikwense, bulelo bwakwe tabukamana!”
Inzho Maliya wakamubuzha anjelo ati, “No ceci cilakonzha kuba buti kwangu ume iintezhi mulombwana?”
Anjelo wakamwiingula ati, “Moza Usalala ulakeza alyuuwe, iinsana sha Leza wamwizeulu shilakakuhumba. Wezo nguukaazhala Usalala ulakaakutewa ati Mwanakwe Leza.
Sa ulamuzhibaluka Lizabeti musazhinoko welya ngubakaakwaamba ati tazhali? Inzho ulimishi mwana mweembezhi mu bucembele bwakwe. Mwezhi weno ngwacisambomwi.
Nkaambo kwiina cikaka kwa Leza.”
Maliya wakaamba ati, “Ume ndimuzhike wa Mwami, acibe kwangu mbubona mbuwaamba.” Ngoonaawo anjelo wakamushiya.
Kwiite mazuba mashoonto, Maliya wakabweza lweendo cakubindaana kuya ku munzhi uuli mu mapili mucishi ca Judiya.
Wakaya kunjila muŋanda yaka Zakaliya, wakamwaanzha Lizabeti.
Inzho Lizabeti nakateelela kwaanzha kwaa Maliya, mwana wakaakuli mwifwu lyakwe, wakasamba ca kubotelwa. Ngoonaawo Lizabeti wakeendelezhewa u Moza Usalala,
wakapozomoka ati, “Ulikwete coolwe uwe akati kabakaintu boonse, u mwana ngukaazhala ulikwete coolwe!
Anu ndime ni iinkonzha kuswayiwa kwa baina Mwami wangu?
Mbuwaŋanzhizha bulyo, aze mwana uuli mwifwu wasamba ca kubotelwa.
Ulikwete coolwe nkaambo wakashoma ati, makani a Leza nguwakaambilwa alishinizhe alakacitika.”
Maliya wakaamba ati,
“Ndakulumba Mwami mu monzo wangu.
Moza wabotelwa cini cini kaambo ka Leza mufwutuli wangu,
Inzho mazhalane oonse alakenta ati, uli ucoolwe,
nkaambo Leza shinsana shoonse wancitila shintu shikando,
nkaambo kezhina lyakwe lilasalala.
Wakatondezha luse ku bantu boonse bamulemeka, kukancila kwizhalane limwi kushicila kuli limwi.
Wakacita shintu shizoosha iitashi lyakwe, ukwaandaanya bantu bakwete mizeezo yamatunta mu myonzo yabo.
Bafwile inzala bekuta shintu shibotu,
bahubi wabatanda cinkambaminwe.
Wacibamba cishomezho ncaakashomezha kuli ba shaakale besu,
ulimwi wamuyohwa Izilaili musebezhi wakwe.
ukuluhubo lwakwe luzhiza shikwense u shikwense.”
Maliya wakakala u Lizabeti kwa myezhi iitiikabe yotatwe, amane wakapiluka kwakwe.
Ciindi nicakashika caka Lizabeti cakutumbuka, wakazhala mwana mweembezhi.
Bashimukobonina ubasazhiina nibakateelela Mwami mbwaakatondezha luse kwa Lizabeti, boonse bakasekelela antoomwi.
Pele baina wakaamba ati, “Pe pe! Izhina lyakwe ngu Johani.”
Bantu bakaamba ati, “Kwiina musazhinoko naaba womwi uukwete izhina leli.”
Ngoonaawo bakatambaika matashi kwa ushi, kumubuzha izhina ndyazanda kuulika mwanakwe.
Ngoonaawo Zakaliya wakalomba shakulembela kwiita mukutambaika matashi amane walemba ati, izhina lyakwe ngu Johani. Inzho bantu boonse bakazhingwa.
Mbwaakamanina bulyo kulemba, Zakaliya wakakanka kwaamba ulimwi ukutembaula Leza.
Beenzhiina boonse bakatiya cini cini, u makani aza akayeempuwo mucishi coonse ca mapili a Judiya.
Boonse babo bakateelela sheshi shintu bakashibika mu myonzo yabo, bakaabuzhanya ati, “Anu wezu mwana ulakaba muntu uuli buti?” Nkaambo cakalibonya kwaamba ati, insana sha Leza kashilyaaze.
Zakaliya ushi Johani, wakeendelezhewa u Moza Usalala, wakashinshima ati,
“Atembaulwe Mwami Leza wa Izilaili,
nkaambo weza kuyohwa ukunununa bantu bakwe.
Wakatupa mufwutuli shinsana kwiza kutufwutula, wakahwa muluhubo lwaka Devidi.
Umbona mbwaakaamba kwiita mu bashinshimi bakwe ku mazuba a kale kale basalala.
Wakaamba ati, ulakatufwutula kuhwa mu matashi a bashinkondonokwesu, u babo batuswile.
Wakaamba ati ulakabacitila luse baushesu bakale kale, ulimwi takaluba cihuminano cakwe cisalala.
Ncakapinga kwa ushesu Abulahamu, ukutushomezha ati,
ulakatuhuna kumatashi a bashinkondonokwesu kwaamba ati tukamusebezele cakubula bukandu,
ukweenda cabusalazhi ubululami, kwaamba tube basalazhi ubalulami ku mazuba oonse a bumi bwesu.
Ulakazhibya bantu bakwe kwaamba balakafwutulwa u kulecelelwa shibi shabo.
Lufwutuko lwa Mwami lulakeza kulyuuswe kuhwa kwizeulu, ukoya mumuni wezuba kumahwilo,
Inzho Johani wakakomena ku mubili uku Moza. Wakaakukala mulukula kushikila kubuzuba naakakanka milimo yakwe ya buleya mu Izilaili.
Mu mazuba azo Agasitasi Kaisala muleli mukando wa Loma wakabika mulawo wakuti bantu boonse bali mubulelo bwa Loma babalwe.
Ciindi kubalwa koku kwa kutaanguna nikwakacitwa, Koneliyasi nguwakaakuli mweendelezhi mukando wa cishi ca Siliya.
Inzho bantu boonse bakaya kulembwa kuminzhi yabo.
Aze Jozefu wakahwa ku munzhi wa Nazanleta mucishi ca Galilaya. Wakaya ku munzhi wa Devidi uutewa ati Betelehemu, mucishi ca Judiya kaambo kali wa luhubo lwa mwami Devidi.
Wakaya kwaamba akalembwe antoomwi u Maliya, mukaintu ngwaakaakusesele. Ciindi ceco Maliya kemishi.
Nibakaakucili koko, mazuba aakutumbuka aka Maliya akashika.
Wakazhala mwana wakwiiya mweembezhi. Wakamuzambaila masani wamooneka mukato kalila iŋombe muluba, kaambo bakabula busena muŋanda ya beenzu.
Kubuzuba bobo ciindi ca mashiku kakuli beembezhi bakaakuwilile, kabeembela imbelele kulutanga.
Ngoonaawo anjelo wa Mwami wakalibonya nkubabele, bulemu bwa Mwami bwakamunika kuzhinguluka ngubaakubele bwakatuba buu! Nibakabona ceci bakatiya cini cini.
Pele anjelo wakabaambila ati, “Mutatiyi, amubone ndamuletela Makani Mabotu a kaabotela bantu boonse.
Ubwasunu mu Betelehemu, mu munzhi wa Devidi, mufwutuli ngumwakashomezhewa wazhalwa, ngu Kilisito
Inzho nciceci citondezho, mulakayana mwana mutece muzambaile umasani ulilele mukato kalila iŋombe.”
Aciindi ngoonaawo kwakabonwa ikamu lya baanjelo kwizeulu antoomwi u anjelo mukando balatembaula Leza ati,
“Natembaulwe Leza wezeulu lyamazeulu.
Awo anshi naabe luumuno akati ka bantu babo Leza mbaabotelwa.”
Baanjelo nibakabweela kwizeulu, beembezhi bakashimwizhanya ati, “Atufwambaane katuya ku Betelehemu tukabone cintu ceci cacitika ncaatushimwina Mwami.”
Bakaya ca kufwambaana, bakayana Maliya u Jozefu u mwana Jeso ulilele mukato kalila iŋombe.
Inzho beembezhi nibakamubona, bakakanana makani oonse ngaakabashimwina anjelo kukaambo ka mwana wezo.
Bantu boonse nibakateelela shakaamba beembezhi, bakazoowa cini cini.
Maliya wiina naakashiluba shintu shoonse sheshi, ulimwi kashitweluka cini cini.
Beembezhi bakapiluka, kabaya butembaula Leza u kumupa bulemu, ukaambo ka shintu shoonse nshibakateelela u kubona. Kashili umbona mbwakabashimwina anjelo.
Ciindi cakusalazha ba Jozefu u Maliya nicakashika, kwiingainya u malailile azo Leza ngaakapa Mozesi, bakatola mwana ku Jelusalemu kwaamba bakamushishe ku bushu bwa Mwami,
nkaambo mbukulembelwe mu mulawo wa Leza ati, “Mwana woonse mweembezhi mutaanzhi ulyeelele kutolwa kwa Leza”
Bakatola cipaizho kwiingaina u mulawo wa Mwami mbuwamba ati balyeelele kutola inzhiba shobile naa bana bankwilimba bobile.
Inzho mu Jelusalemu kamuli mulombwana wakaakutewa ati Simiyoni. Kali muntu uuzwile Moza Usalala ulimwi wakaakucita shizanda Leza. Wakaakulanjila lufwutuko lwa ba Izilaili.
Ulimwi Moza Usalala wakamushomezha ati, takafwi katana kumubona Kilisito Munanike wa Leza.
Simiyoni wakasololelwa u Moza Usalala, wakenjila muŋanda ya Leza, ciindi ushi u baina Jeso nibakamunjizha kwaamba bacite caamba mulawo.
Simiyoni wakamubweza mwana wamufwumbatila mu matashi akwe wakakanka kutembaula Leza ati,
“Mwami cini cini wabamba cishomezho cako,
inzho ndimuzhice wako ndakonzha kufwa muluumuno,
nkaambo menso angu amubona mufwutuli.
Wezo nguwatuma ku bantu boonse.
Ushi u baina Jeso bakazoowa cini cini nibakateelela nshakaamba Simiyoni ku makani aka Jeso.

Ngoonaawo Simiyoni wakabalonjezha u kwaambila Maliya ati, “Wezu mwana wakasalwa kwiza kucina u kubusha bantu banji banji mu Izilaili. Ulakaba cizhibisho ncaakatuma Leza ceco bantu banji banji ncibakaasampaula.
Ubobo matelaishi ali mu myonzo yabo alakazubululwa. Inzho uwe Maliya, mause alakakuyasa ku monzo ukoya iceba lilampa.”

Kakuli mukaintu mushinshimi wakaakuli mukamufwu. Izhina lyakwe kali Ana mwanakwe Faniwelo, wamushobo wa Asha. Wakatwalwa kacili nakalindu. Wakakala bulyo myaka iili ciloba umulumyaakwe, inzho kali mucembele.
Ku ciindi ceco kakwete myaka iili makumi ali lusele iitwesha yone. Katamuhwi muŋanda ya Leza muunza u mashiku kakomba Leza ukuliimya kulya.
Ku ciindi ncicona ceco Jeso naakaletwa muŋanda ya Leza, aze Ana wakashika, wakalumba Leza wakaamba makani a mwana kuli babo bakaakulindila kunununwa kwa Jelusalemu.
Inzho mwana wakakomena wazuma waba iinsana, kazwile busongo ulimwi kakwete shileleko sha Leza.
Ciindi Jeso naakaakukwete myaka iili ikumi iitwesha yobile, bakaya kwipobwe umbona mbubakaakucita lyoonse.
Nilyakamana ipobwe, bakapiluka ku Nanzaleta, pele Jeso wakashaala mu Jelusalemu. Ushi u baina Jeso kabatezhi bobo.
Kabatelaika ati uli akati ka bantu u beenzhiina. Bakeenda mushinzo wa buzuba bomwi. Inzho bakakanka kumukapula akati kabasazhinokwabo ubeezhinokwabo.
Nibatakamuyana, bakabweela ku Jelusalemu kuya kumukapula.
Nibakamukapula kwa mazuba ali otatwe bakaya kumuyana muŋanda ya Leza, ulishite akati kaba maayi ba mulawo, ulateelela mbubakaakukanana ukubabuzha mibuzho.
Bantu boonse bakateelela kwiingula kwakwe kwa busongo bakazoowa cini cini.
Inzho nibakamuyana bakazoowa. Baina wakamwaambila ati, “Mwanangu, no ncinzhi nciwatucitila bolya? Bona ume uuso twafwa kukapula, ulimwi twaakupengele cini cini.”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “No mwaakunkapulilanzhi? Sa kamutezhi ati ume ndyeelele kuba muŋanda yaka Taata?”
Pele kwiina nibakateelela ncakaakwaamba.
Inzho Jeso wakayaabo ku munzhi wa Nanzaleta, ulimwi kabalemeka u kucita nshibamwaambila. Pele baina wakashizobola shintu shoonse sheshi mu monzo wakwe.
Inzho Jeso kaya bukomena mu maanu umucimo, ulimwi wakaba mwana uufwinwi kwa Leza uku bantu.

Mu mwaka we kumi iitwesha yosanwe ya bulelo bwa Tibeliyasi muleli mukando waku cishi ca Loma, Pontiyasi Pilato nguwakaakweendelezha cishi coonse ca Judiya. Helodi kali ngu mweendelezhi wa cishi ca Galilaya, Filipo munina Helodi nguwakaakweendelezha cipanzha ca cishi citewa ati Ituliya u Tilakonitisi. Lisaniyasi kalela cishi ca Abilene.
Ulimwi ku ciindi ceco ncicona Anasi u Kayafa mbubaakuli bapaizhi bakando. Johani mwanakwe Zakaliya wakatambula izwi lya Leza naakaakuli mulukula.
Inzho Johani wakaya mucishi coonse cakaakuzhingulukile lweenje lwa Joodani kaya bukambauka ati, “Amusanduke kunzhila shenu imbiyabi, mupapatizwe kwaamba Leza amulekelele shibi shenu.”
Sheshi inshisho nshaakaamba Aizaya ati,
“Kuli woolobwezha mulukula ati,
‘Amubambe mukwakwa wa Mwami,
Amululamike inzhila shakwe
Mikonka yoonse izuzhiwe, milundu umapili shibambasale
Inzhila shipiteene shisuumikwe, utuzhila twabuumbu tushingululwe.
Mishobo yoonse mibili ya bantu ilakalubona lufwutuko ndwapa Leza!’”
Amucite shintu shitondezha kwaamba mwabeba ku shibi shenu. Ulimwi mutaamba linji ati tuli banakwe Abulahamu, kaambo Leza ulakonzha kusandula mabwe aza kuba bana ba Abulahamu.
Keembe kalizunzilwe kale kumizanda yesamu kwaamba litemwe, ubobo kufwumbwa isamu liteezha micelo mibotu, lilakatemwa u kusowelwa mu mulilo.”
Bantu bakamubuzha Johani ati, “No tucite buti?”
Wakabaingula ati, “Wezo ukwete shikobelo shobile, ape mweenzhiina uina, aze wezo ukwete cakulya aabanye beenzhiina.”
Johani wakabaingula ati, “Mutaakutezha bantu mali ayitilila ali azo ngumwakahuminyiwa ku mulawo.”

Abo bashikalumamba bamwi bakamubuzha ati, “No uswe ncinzhi ncitweelele kucita?” Johani wakabaingula ati, “Mutaakunanga bantu imbono shabo kusebezha insana, nikuba kubalenjelela twaambo. Mutaakutenga mali ngumuhola.”
Bulanjizhi bwa bantu bwakakomena, bakakanka kutelaika ati ambweni Johani ngu Munanike wa Leza.

Ubobo Johani wakabaambila ati, “Ume ndamupapatiza u meenzhi, pele wezo uuzhiza mukando ulambaala. Ume nsheelele ukwaangulula twaanzho twa mpato shakwe. Wezo walo ulakamupapatiza u Moza Usalala u mulilo.
Ulikwete lubango mu matashi aakwe, ulaululula ukulonjela maila mubutala bwakwe, pele bungu ulakabubunga ukubuwaala mu mulilo uutazhimi.”
Johani wakasebezha shiyanza shinji shinji kukambauka Makani Mabotu ku bantu, wakabalailila kwaamba basanduke.
Inzho Johani wakamulemanina mwami Helodi mweendelezhi wacipanzha cane ca cishi, kaambo wakatwala Helodiyasi muka Filipo munina, ulimwi ukaambo ka shibi shinji shinji nshaakacita.
Ulimwi Helodi wakabaala kubisha naakabika Johani muntolongo.
Bantu boonse nibakamana kupapatizwa, aze Jeso wakapapatizwa. Naakaakucikomba Jeso, izeulu lyakayaluka,
u Moza Usalala wakamuselucila uuli ukoya inzhiba. Izwi lyakateelelwa mwizeulu lyaamba ati, “Ndiwe Mwanangu nakufwunwa ulimwi ulanjinina.”
Ciindi Jeso nakakanka milimo yakwe, kakwete myaka yakaakutandila ku makumi otatwe. Bantu kabatelaika ati mwanakwe Jozefu waakuli mwanakwe Heli,
Heli mwanakwe Matati, Matati mwanakwe Levi, Levi mwanakwe Meleci, Meleci mwanakwe Janai, Janai mwanakwe Jozefu,
Jozefu mwanakwe Matatiya, Matatiya mwanakwe Amosi, Amosi mwanakwe Nahumu, Nahumu mwanakwe Esili, Esili mwanakwe Nagai,
Nagai mwanakwe Maati, Maati mwanakwe Matatiyasi, Matatiyasi mwanakwe Semaini, Semaini mwanakwe Joseci, Joseci mwanakwe Joda,
Joda mwanakwe Joanani, Joanani mwanakwe Lesa, Lesa mwanakwe Zelubabeli, Zelubabeli mwanakwe Salutieli, Salutieli mwanakwe Neli,
Neli mwanakwe Meleci, Meleci mwanakwe Adi, Adi mwanakwe Kosamu, Kosamu mwanakwe Elimadamu, Elimadamu mwanakwe Aa,
Aa mwanakwe Joshuwa, Joshuwa mwanakwe Eliyeza, Eliyeza mwanakwe Jolimu, Jolimu mwanakwe Matati, Matati mwanakwe Levi, Levi mwanakwe Simiyoni,
Simiyoni mwanakwe Juda, Juda mwanakwe Jozefu, Jozefu mwanakwe Jonamu, Jonamu mwanakwe Eliyakimu, Eliyakimu mwanakwe Meleya,
Meleya mwanakwe Mena, Mena mwanakwe Matata, Matata mwanakwe Natani, Natani mwanakwe Devidi,
Devidi mwanakwe Jesi, Jesi mwanakwe Obedi, Obedi mwanakwe Bowazi, Bowazi mwanakwe Salimoni, Salimoni mwanakwe Nashoni,
Nashoni mwanakwe Aminadabu, Aminadabu mwanakwe Adimini, Adimini mwanakwe Ami, Ami mwanakwe Heziloni, Heziloni mwanakwe Pelezi, Pelezi mwanakwe Juda,
Juda mwanakwe Jakobo, Jakobo mwanakwe Aizeki, Aizeki mwanakwe Abulahamu, Abulahamu mwanakwe Tela mwanakwe Naho Selugi,
Selugi mwanakwe Leu, Leu mwanakwe Pelegi, Pelegi mwanakwe Eba, Eba mwanakwe Shela,
Shela mwanakwe Kainani, Kainani mwanakwe Afakisadi, Afakisadi mwanakwe Shemu mwanakwe Nowa, Nowa mwanakwe Lameki,
Lameki mwanakwe Matusela, Matusela mwanakwe Inoki, mwanakwe Jaledi mwanakwe Mahalaleyele mwanakwe Kainani,
Kainani mwanakwe Enosi, Enosi mwanakwe Seti, Seti mwanakwe Adamu, Adamu mwanakwe Leza.
Inzho Jeso wakahwa ku lweenje lwa Joodani, ulizwile Moza Usalala, ulimwi wakasololelwa u Moza Usalala kuya mulukula.
Momo mwaakatepaulwa u Shaatani kwa mazuba ali makumi one. Coonse ciindi ceco kwiina ncaakaakulya, ubobo wakafwa inzala.
Inzho Shaatani wakaambila Jeso ati, “Waakuli Mwana Leza, ambila ibwe leli libe cinkwa.”
Ulimwi Shaatani wakamutola abusena buli ezeulu wamutondezha shishi shaanshi ku ciindi cishoonto bulyo u kumwaambila ati,
“Bwami bwashishi shoonse sheshi ndakupa antoomwi u bulelo u bulemu bwasho, kaambo ndakapewa, ndikwete insana shakubupa ku muntu oonse ngundazanda.
Kuti uwe wanfwukamina u kunkomba, bulelo bobu boonse ndakupa.”
Inzho Shaatani wakamutola ku Jelusalemu wamulizika a cisunswa ca ŋanda ya Leza, amane wamulailila ati, “Waakuli Mwana Leza liwaale anshi.
Nkaambo kulilembelwe mu maŋwalu ati, ‘Leza ulakalailila baanjelo bakwe kwaamba bakakukape.’
Ulimwi kulilembelwe mu maŋwalu ati, ‘Balakakuzemuna mu matashi abo kwaamba utakalifwumpuli kwibwe.’”
Inzho Shaatani naakamana kumutepaula mu shiyanza shoonse wakamushiya kwa ciindi cishoonto bulyo.
Inzho Jeso wakabweela ku Galilaya, kakwete insana sha Moza Usalala. Impuwo yakwe yakazuwa mucishi coonse.
Kayiisha mu shikombelo shaba Juda, ulimwi bantu boonse bakamulemeka.
Jeso wakashika ku Nanzaleta koko nkwaakakomenena, inzho mu buzuba bwa kulyoocezha bwa Sabata, wakaya ku cikombelo caba Juda umbona mbwakaakucita lyoonse, wakazhima kwaamba abale maŋwalu.
Inzho bakamutambika ibuka lya mushinshimi Aizaya. Wakalihungulula wayana a cibalo aalembelwe ati,
nkaambo wananika kwaamba, nkambaukile bapushi makani mabotu.
Wakantuma kwaamba baanjilwe baangululwe,
Boofwu babone, bapenzhewa bahunwe.
Wakantuma kwaambilizha ati ciindi cibotu ca Mwami cashika.”
Amane Jeso wakalihunga ibuka wakamutambika mubanzhi wa cikombelo caba Juda amane wakala. Bantu boonse bakaakuli mucikombelo bakamulanjilila.
Inzho wakabaamba ati, “Ubwasunu cibalo ceci cazuzucizhiwa umbona mbumwateelela nicaakubalwa.”
Bakamulumbaizha bantu boonse, ulimwi bakazoowa mbwakaakubandika ca busongo. Bakaamba ati, “Sa wezu muntu ingwe mwanakwe Jozefu?”
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Cini cini kamweelela kashimi kakuti, ‘Mushilishi lishilice umwini.’ Shoonse nshitwakateelela shakacitwa mu Kapenaumi, shicite umono umbanamuzeenu.”
Ulimwi wakabaambila ati, “Cini cini ndamushimwina ati, kwiina mushinshimi uutambulwa mucishi ca kwabo.”
Pele Elaija takatuminwe kuli naaba womwi wabo, pele wakatumwa kumukamufwu waku Zelefati mucishi ca Sidoni.
Ulimwi kamuli bashicinsenda banji banji mucishi ca Izilaili mu mazuba a mushinshimi Elisha, pele kwiina naaba womwi wabo ngwaakaponya, cita bulyo Namaani waku cishi ca Siliya.”
Inzho nibakateelela bobo bantu boonse mucikombelo caba Juda bakalemana cini cini.
Bakazhimuka bakamukusha mu munzhi Jeso bamukulaanya kutola alupili awo nguwaakuzacilwe munzhi wabo, kwaamba bakamuwaale ankomwenena.
Pele walo wakaita akati kabo waya wabashiya.
Inzho Jeso wakaya ku Kapenaumi, munzhi uuli mucishi ca Galilaya, koko wakayiisha bantu mu Sabata.
Bantu boonse bakazoowa kuyiisha kwakwe kaambo mazwi aakwe kakwete insana sha bwami.
Mucikombelo caba Juda kamuli muntu wakaakunjililwe moza mubiyabi. Wezo muntu wakoompolola iizwi ikando ati,
“No twakucitaanzhi u Jeso u Munanzaleta? Sa weza kutuzonauna? Ndikwizhi, ndiwe Usalala mutumwa wa Leza.”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakoolemanina moza mubiyabi ati, “Liinze! Hwa mu muntu wezu!” Inzho muntu wezo wakasuntuka wawila anshi, moza mubiyabi wakamuhwa wiina niwakamucisa pe.
Bantu boonse bakazoowa ukubuzhanya ati, “Anu makaninzhi aza? Ulalailila myoza mibiyabi ca nsana u bwami, ayo ilamuteelela ulimwi ilahwa.”
Inzho impuwo yaka Jeso yakazuwa moonse mucishi ceco.
Inzho Jeso wakahwa mucikombelo caba Juda waya kunjila muŋanda yaka Saimoni. Bainazhala Saimoni kali mulwazhi mubili, inzho bakamulomba Jeso kwaamba amuponye.
Ngoonaawo wakaya kuzhima afwaafwi ubulo wakaambila mubili ati upone. Ndilyona ndilyona mulwazhi wakapona, wazhimuka wakanka kubafwutaukila.
Kumabililo ezuba, bantu boonse bakaakukwete balongwaabo basata malwazhi andeene andeene, bakabaleta kwa Jeso, aze wakababika matashi aakwe wakabaponya.
Ulimwi wakakusha myoza mibiyabi mubantu banji banji. Kabaya bupozomoka ati, “Ndiwe Mwana Leza!” Pele wakabakasha ulimwi katabahuminya kwaamba, kaambo kabamwizhi ati ngu Kilisito.
Nibwakaca Jeso wakamuhwa mu Kapenaumi wakaya kubusena buliibile. Bantu bakakanka kumukapula. Nibakamuyana bakasoleka kumushinicizha ati atayi kunji.
Pele walo wakabaambila ati, “Ndyeelele kukambauka Makani Mabotu aabwami bwa Leza u minzhi iinji, kaambo ceco ncaakantuma Leza kwiza kucita.”
Ubobo wakakambauka mu shikombelo shaba Juda mucishi coonse.
Jeso wakabona mato obile alishokele. Bazezhi kabatemo mu mato, kabasanzha tunyandi twabo.
Inzho Jeso wakenjila mu bwato bumwi bwakaakuli bwaka Saimoni. Wakamulomba ati abushikule bukuhwe ashoonto kumuuma. Jeso wakakala mu bwato wakakanka kuyiisha bantu.
Nakamana kuyiisha wakamwaambila Saimoni ati, “Katuya akati kezhiba kwaamba mukawaale tunyandi twenu mukwashe inswi.”
Nibakacita mbubakashimwinwa, bakayaya inswi shinji shinji, tunyandi twabo atitukazapuke.
Ngoonaawo bakoobola bazezhi nokwabo bakaakuli mu bwato bumwi kwaamba bezhize kubayohwa. Bakazuzha mato oonse obile iinswi cakuti, mato kazanda kuloba kaambo kanswi.
Saimoni Pita abone bobo, wakamufwukamina Jeso waamba ati, “Swena kulaale ame Mwami, kaambo ume ndi muntu shishibi.”
Saimoni ubeezhiina bakazoowa cini cini ukaambo kakuhula kwanswi shesho nshibakakwasha.
Abo bazezhinina Saimoni, ba Jemusi u Johani banakwe Zebedi bakazoowa. Jeso wakamwaambila Saimoni ati, “Utatiyi, kaambo kuhwa bwasunu ulaba muzezhi wa bantu.”
Bakashosha mato abo a mulando. Bakashiya shintu shoonse, bacilila Jeso.

Ciindi cimwi Jeso kalyuumunzhi umwi mwakaakuli mulombwana wakaakuli mulwazhi cinsenda mubili oonse. Inzho muntu wezo naakamubona Jeso wakamufwukamina u kumukumbila ati, “Mwami, ndizhi ati ulikwete insana shakumponya, mponya na ulazanda!”
Jeso wakahungulula itashi lyakwe wamwaampa, waamba ati, “Ee ndazanda. Pona!” Ngoonaawo shicinsenda wakapona.

Inzho Jeso wakamulaililisha cini cini ati, “Utashimwini muntu naaba womwi, pele koya ukalitondezhe ku mupaizhi, wamana ukape cipaizho cabusalazhi bwako, umbona mbwaakalailila Mozesi kwaamba cikabe citondezho ku bantu boonse ati wapona.”
Nikuba bobo impuwo yaka Jeso yakazuwa mucishi coonse. Ulimwi bantu banji banji bakeza kwakwe kuteelela ukushilikwa malwazhi abo.
Pele Jeso wakabashiya waya kubusena buliibile kuya kukomba.

Bumwi buzuba Jeso naakaakuyiisha, ba Falisi bamwi u ba maayi ba mulawo, bakahwa kuminzhi yoonse ya mucishi ca Galilaya uya Judiya, ulimwi ukumunzhi wa Jelusalemu. Insana sha Mwami shakaakuliwo shakwaamba Jeso aponye balwazhi.
Inzho kwakeza bantu bamwi bakaakuzemwine muntu mulema amacila, bakasoleka kumunjizha muŋanda kwaamba bamooneke kumbele kwa Jeso.
Ukaambo kakuhula kwa bantu, bakakacilwa. Ubobo bakaliza alululi lwa ŋanda, baluhumbula bamane bamuselusha ca kumulenjezha amacila akati ka bantu ku bushu bwa Jeso.
Jeso naakabona kushoma kwabo, wakaamba ati, “Shibi shako shalecelelwa mulongwaangu.”
Balembi u ba Falisi bakakanka kubuzhanya mulwabo ati, “Anu nguni wezu usampula Leza? Kwiina muntu ukonzha kulecelela shibi shabantu, cita Leza mwini ice.”
Inzho Jeso wakaazhiba matelaishi abo, wakabaambila ati, “No mulalibuzhabuzhaanzhi mu myonzo yenu?
Nciciliye cuuba uba, u kwaamba ati, ‘Shibi shako shalekelelwa,’ na ati, ‘Zhimuka uyende?’
Inzho ndamutondezha kwaamba ati Mwanaa Muntu ulikwete insana shakulecelela shibi shabantu ano anshi.” Amane Jeso wakamwaambila mulema ati, “Zhimuka ubweze macila ako, koya kwako.”
Ngoonaawo wakazhimuka boonse balimulanjilile, wabweza macila akwe waya kwakwe ulaya butembaula Leza.
Boonse bantu bakazoowa cini cini, ulimwi bakatiya, bakatembaula Leza ati, “Ubwasunu twabona shintu nshitutanabwene!”
Munshi lyaaza, wakahwa ansengwe, inzho wakabona shimutelo uutewa ati Levi, kali amulimo wakwe. Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Ncilila.”
Ngoonaawo Levi wakazhimuka, wakashiya shisebezho shakwe shoonse wakamucilila Jeso.
Inzho Levi wakacitila Jeso ipobwe ikando kuŋanda yakwe. Kakuli bashimitelo banji banji u bantu bamwi mbakaakukala abo.
Ba Falisi u balembi bamwi, bakatongaucila ba shiciiya ba Jeso ati, “Nkaamboonzhi ncimulya u kunwa antoomwi ubashimutelo u bashishibi?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Bantu bazumu tabazanda mushilishi, cita balwazhi.
Ndiina kuzhila balulami, pele ndakezhila ba shishibi kwaamba basanduke.”
Bamwi bantu bakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Ba shiciiya baka Johani balaliimya kulya shiindi shinji shinji, ulimwi balakomba. U ba shiciiya baba Falisi balacita umbona bobo, pele bako balalya u kunwa.”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Sa mulakonzha kushinicizha beenzhiina shikutwala kutalya ciindi mukamwini bwinga aakulyaabo? Pe pe tamukonzha!
Pele cilakashika ciindi shibwinga nibakaamubweza, indilyo lelyo nibakaaliimya kulya.”

Inzho Jeso wakabaambila cikozhanyo ulimwi ati, “Kwiina muntu uuzapula namaapi kucisani cipiya ukumusasa acisani cikulukulu. Acita bobo ati wazonauna cisani cipiya, unamaapi takeendelana kabotu u cisani cikulukulu.
Ulimwi kwiina muntu uutuntila waini mupiya munkomo yesalu inkulukulu. Kuti wacita bobo, wezo waini mupiya ulaandula inkomo
Pele waini mupiya ulabikwa munkomo yesalu impiya
Ulimwi kwiina muntu uzanda kunwa waini mupiya amana kunwa mulala, kaambo ulaamba ati wakale kale ulabaala kubota.”
Bamwi ba Falisi bakabuzha ati, “No kaamboonzhi mulacita citahuminyiwa u mulawo wesu mu buzuba bwa Sabata?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Sa mwiina nimwakabala mbwaakacita Devidi ciindi walo, u babo mbucaakulya abo naakafwa inzala?
Wakanjila muŋanda ya Leza, wakabweza cinkwa cakapewa kwa Leza walya, ulimwi wakabaabanya u babo mbucakaakuli abo. Pele aakuli cilatonda kulya cinkwa ceci, cita mupaizhi nguyelele kucilya.”
Inzho Jeso wakabashimwina ati, “Ume ndi Mwanaa Muntu ndime Mwami wa buzuba bwa Sabata.”
Mu buzuba ubumwi bwa kulyoocezha bwa Sabata, Jeso wakanjila mucikombelo caba Juda kuya kuyiisha. Mucikombelo momo kamuli mulombwana wakaakuzuminine itashi lya cilyo.
Ulimwi balembi u ba Falisi, bakamulanjilila kubona naa Jeso ulamuponya muntu wezo mu buzuba bwa Sabata, kwaamba bamupe mulandu.
Pele Jeso keezhi kale matelaishi abo, ubobo wakamwaambila muntu wezo wakakuzuminine itashi ati, “Zhimuka kweza kono kumbele.” Welya muntu wakazhimuka waya kuzhima awo ngakaambilwa.

Amane Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Inzho ndazanda kumubuzha bolya, anu Mulawo wesu ulatuhuminya kucita buti mu buzuba bwa Sabata? Kucita cibotu na kucita cibiyabi? Kufwutula bumi bwa muntu na kubuzonauna?”
Amane wakabacebauka boonse, wamwaambila muntu wakaakuzuminine itashi ati, “Hungulula itashi lyako.” Wakacita bobo, ngoonaawo itashi lyakapona.
Pele balo bakalitutwila bukali, bakakanka kulihwiyahwiya mulwabo kwaamba bazhibe mbubakamucita Jeso.
Ku ciindi ceco Jeso wakaya ku lupili kwaamba akakombe. Wakakomba kwa Leza mashiku oonse.
Nibwakaca waketa ba shiciiya bakwe, wakasala bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile akati kabo, babo mbaakaulika lya butumwa.
Saimoni ngwaakaulika izhina lya Pita u Andulu munina, Jemusi u Johani, Filipo u Basolomeyo.
Matayo u Tomasi, Jemusi mwanakwe Alufeyasi. Saimoni wakaakuli uumwi wankamu ya cishi itewa ati Basengushi.
Judasi mwanakwe Jemusi u Judasi Shikaliyoti shikumwaaba.

Jeso naakakunkuluka alupili u batumwa bakwe, wakazhima abusena bubambasele, kali iinkamu inkando yaba shiciiya bakwe ulimwi umakamu abantu banji banji bakaakucilila Jeso bakahwa mucishi coonse ca Judiya umu Jelusalemu, bamwi bakahwa mu minzhi ya Taya u Sidoni yaakuzacilwe kumbali Kwizhiba.
Bakeza kupupulala kukambauka kwa Jeso ukushilikwa malwazhi abo. U babo bakaakupenzhewa u myoza mibiyabi bakapona.
Bantu boonse kabazanda kumukutuzha nkaambo insana shakaakuhwa kwa Jeso, kashibaponya boonse.
Inzho Jeso wakalanga kwaakuli ba shiciiya bakwe waamba ati,
Mulilonjelwe nubapushi nkaambo Bwami bwa Leza mbwenu.
“Mulilonjelwe umwe numufwa inzala ninzho. Ukuti mulakekuta.
“Mulilonjelwe umwe numulila ceno ciindi nkaambo mulakasoozhewa.
Amutangale kwaamba ceci camuciticila, musotauce cakusapwa, kaambo bulumbu bwenu kwizeulu mbukando. Nkaambo umbona bobo bamaushabo mbubakacitila bashinshimi.
“Mulakapenga umwe nubahubi, nkaambo mwatambula kale shibotu shenu.
“Mulakapenga umwe numukushi iinzho, nkaambo mulakafwa inzala. Mulakapenga umwe numuseka, nkaambo mulakaungumana u kulila.
“Mulakapenga umwe numutembaulwa ku bantu boonse, nkaambo imbubo bobo baushabo mbubakaakubacita bashinshimi babeshi.
“Pele ndaamwambila umwe noonse numuteelele ati, amubafwune ba shinkondonokwenu, amubacitile kabotu bamuswile,
amubalonjezhe babo bamutuka, amubakombele bamupenzha.
Kuti muntu wakuuma kwitama, cinduluka akuume ukwitama limwi. Ulimwi na umwi wakunanga icanshi, umuleke abweze ucikobelo.
Ubape boonse bakumbila kwako, wezo ubweza lubono lwako, umulecele ataluzhola pe.
Mbubona mbumuzanda kwaamba bantu bamucitile, amwe noombacitile mbubona.
“Kuti mwaakufwini bulyo babo bamufwini, sa mulyeelele kulumbwa? Kayi abo ba shishibi balacita umbona bobo.
Ulimwi kuti mwaakucitila kabotu babo bamucitila kabotu, sa mulyeelele kulumbwa? Kayi u bataluleme balacita shibotu.

Kuti mwaakukweletesha bulyo bantu mbumutelaicila kwaamba balakamuzholela, no mulalumbwa buti? Kayi abo ba shishibi mbubacita bobo, balakweletesha ba shishibi nokwabo ulimwi balalanjila kutambula bweelele.

Pele nombafwune ba shinkondonokwenu, ulimwi mubacitile kabotu. Amukweleteshe cakutalanjila kuzholelwa niciba comwi, ubulumbu bwenu bulakakomena, ulimwi mulakaba banakwe Leza Keemba Mutalabala. Nkaambo walo ngushimanga ukuli babo batalumba ubalifwini.
Amube bashiluse umbona Ushenu mbwaali shiluse.
“Mutabeteki, kwaamba amwe Leza atakamubeteki. Mutabici butongo muntu, kwaamba amwe Leza atakamubiki butongo. Amulekelele, amwe Leza ulakamulecelela.
Amupe amwe mulakapewa, mulakeelekelwa camweelwe mubotu, cishindaile, citikumune cizwile mwaa. Nkaambo ceelesho ncimweelekela bamwi, aze Leza ncaakaasebezha kumweelekela.”
Shiciiya tamubaali mwiiyi wakwe. Pele kuti muntu wamaninzha lwiiyo, ulaba ukoya mbwaabele muntu wakamuyiisha.
“Ulimwi, no ulabona buti kantu kali mulinso lya munyoko, waleka ishishi lili mulinso lyako?

Ulakonzha buti kwaambila munyoko ati, kweza nkufwule kantu kali mulinso lyako, wamana tuliboni ishishi lili mulinso lyako? Uwe uushikuupaupa amenso, taanguna kukusha ishishi lili mulinso lyako, kwaamba ubone kabotu, wamana nuukakonzha kufwula kantu kali mulinso lya munyoko.”
“Ulimwi kwiina isamu ibotu lizhala micelo mibiyabi, niliba isamu ibiyabi lizhala micelo mibotu.
Nkaambo kufwumbwa isamu lilezhibwa kumicelo yalyo. Inkuzu tashicelwa ku mutubetube, musaansa
Muntu mubotu ulaamba shibotu nshazobwele mu monzo wakwe, aze mubiyabi ulaamba shibiyabi shizwile mu monzo wakwe. Nkaambo mulomo ulaamba shizwile u monzo.”
“No mulentilaanzhi ati, ‘Mwami, Mwami,’ pele tamushiciti nshimwaambila?
Muntu woonse wiza kwangu, uuteelela mazwi angu ukwaacita, ndamutondezha mbwaabele.

Ulikozhene umuntu wakazaka iŋanda, pele katana kukanka kuzaka, wakasha mwiimbi mulamfwu waya kweenzha ibwe. Amane wakakanka kuzaka intalisho ebwe. Inzho lweenje lwakapaya, meenzhi akauma kuŋanda yezho, pele ina niyakatapaala kaambo yakazakwa kabotu.
Pele wezo uteelela mazwi angu amana taaciti ulikozhene umuntu wakazaka iŋanda ina mwiimbi. Lweenje nilwakezula meenzhi akeza kuuma aŋanda, inzho yakawa cakumaninina!”
Jeso naakamana kwaamba aza makani oonse ku bantu, wakanjila mu Kapenaumi.
Inzho mukando wa bashikalumamba bali mwaanda, kakwete muzhice ngwaakaakufwini cini cini wakaakuli mulwazhi ca lufwu.
Mukando wa bashikalumamba bali mwaanda, naakateelela aka Jeso, wakatuma bamwi bakando baba Juda kwaamba bakamulombe ezhize kumuponya musebezhi wakwe.
Nibakashika kwa Jeso bakamupumpa cini cini ati, “Ulyeelele kumuyohwa muntu wezu,
kaambo ulyuufwini mushobo wesu ulimwi nguwakatuzakila cikombelo caba Juda.”

Jeso wakayaabo. Naakashika afwaafwi iiŋanda, mukando wa bashikalumamba bali mwaanda wakatuma beenzhiina kwa Jeso kuya kumwaambila ati, “Mwami, utalipenzha bulyo kwiza kaambo ndiina ceelelo cakukunjizha muŋanda yangu.
Nciceco ncindatezhila ndimwini kukwita. Amba bulyo mazwi musebezhi wangu ulapona.

Nkaambo ame ndatambula malailile kuhwa kubakando bali kumbele kwangu, ulimwi ndikwete bashikalumamba bali munshi lyangu. Kuti ndamwaambila umwi ati, Koya! Ulaya, ulimwi kuli umwi ati, Kweza! Uleza, ukumuzhice wangu ati, Cita ceci! Ulacicita.”
Jeso wakazoowa nakateelela mazwi aza, amane wakacindulucila kunkamu ya bantu bakaakumucilile wabaambila ati, “Nshinalubwene lushomo luli bolya, nimuba mu Izilaili.”
Inzho babo bakaakutuminwe nibakazhoka kuŋanda, bakayana muzhice waba kabotu, wapona.
Nikwakaita ciindi Jeso wakaya ku munzhi uutewa ati Naini antoomwi u ba shiciiya bakwe, inkamu inkando ya bantu yakamucilila.

Inzho naakashika kumanjililo aamunzhi, wakaswaanganya bantu bakaakuzemwine mutunta. Mutunta wezu kooli wa mulombwana wakaakuli ngu mwana ice nana kwa baina. Bantu banji banji ba mu munzhi bakeza kumulizha mukamufwu.
Inzho Mwami Jeso, naakabona mukamufwu wezo ulalila, wakamufwila intenda, wakamwaambila ati, “Soola! Utalila linji.”
Jeso wakaswena afwaafwi wakalyaampa ikwati, ngoonaawo bakaakulizemwine bakazhima. Amane waamba ati, “Mulombwana ndakwaambila, buka!”
Ngoonaawo mufwu wakabuka wakala wakanka kwaamba. Amane Jeso wakamupa baina.
Bantu boonse bakazoowa cini cini, bakakanka kutembaula Leza ati, “Mushinshimi mukando washika akati kesu! Leza weza kufwutula bantu bakwe.”
Impuwo yaka Jeso yakazuwa mucishi coonse ca Judiya ushishi shoonse shizhingulukile.
Inzho Johani bakamwaambila ba shiciiya bakwe shoonse sheshi shakacitika.
Ngoonaawo wakoompolola ba shiciiya bakwe bobile, wabatuma kwa Jeso kwaamba bakamubuzhe ati, “Sa ndiwe wezo uzhiza, naa tulanjile unji?”
Inzho babo bakatumwa bakeza kwa Jeso bamwaambila ati, “Johani Mupapatizhi watutuma kwako ati, ‘Sa ndiwe wezo uuzhiza na tuukucilangila unji?’”
Ku ciindi ceco ncicona, Jeso wakaponya bantu banji banji bakaakusata malwazhi u shicisa, kubicilizha u babo bakaakunjililwe myoza mibiyabi. Ulimwi wakaponya boofwu banji banji.

Ngoonaawo wakabaingula ba shiciiya baka Johani ati, “Kamuya mukamukananine Johani shoonse nshimwabona u kuteelela. Mukamwaambile ati boofwu balabona, balema baleenda, bashicinsenda balasalazhiwa, bacimpama balateelela, bafwu balabushiwa, bapushi balakambaucilwa Makani Mabotu.
Ulikwete coolwe muntu uutalifwumpulili kukaambo kangu.”

Inzho bakatumwa kwa Johani nibakaya, Jeso wakakanka kubuzha bantu banji banji bakaakubungene makani aka Johani ati, “Sa nimwakaya mulukula mwakaya kubonaanzhi? Sa mwaakuzunga ati Johani uli ukoya lubu lupeka u muuwo?

Inzho mwakaakutelaika ati Johani ulalibonya buti? Sa mwakaakutelaika ati Johani muntu wakaakusama shakusama shibonhwu bonhwu? Pe pe, babo basama shisani sheebeshi balakala cakuliiba mu maanda aabwami.
Sa mwakaakutelaika ati Johani mushinshimi? Ee, ndamushimwina ati, ulabaala a mushinshimi.
Nkaambo Johani inguwe wakalembwa mu maŋwalu ati,
“Ndakatuma mutumwa wangu kumbele,
kwaamba akubambile inzhila yako.”
“Ndamushimwina ati kuhwa liliye, kwiina nikwakaba muntu mukando kubaala Johani. Pele nikuba bobo, wezo mushoonto mu bwami bwaka Leza mukando kubaala Johani.”
Pele ba Falisi ubashimilawo bakakaka kupapatizwa kwa Johani, bakalunyansha luzando lwa Leza.
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Anu bantu baano mazuba ndabakozhanyaanzhi? No bali ukoyaanzhi?”
Balakozhana u bana boompolozhanya mucisambalilo ati, “Twalizha ingoma pele umwe tamuzhana! Twamwiimbila inyimbo shelilwe, pele umwe tamulila!
Nkaambo Johani Mupapatizhi wakeza ulaliimya kulya, ulimwi katanwi waini. Pele umwe mwakamwaamba ati, ‘Ulikwete myoza mibiyabi.’
Inzho Mwanaa a Muntu wakeza ulalya u kunwa, pele umwe mwakaamba ati, ‘Noomubone mulyato, cakolwa, mulongwaabo bashimutelo u bashishibi.’
Nikuba bobo busongo bwa Leza buliluleme kuli babo babutambula.”
Umwi mu Falisi wakamutamba Jeso kuya kulyaaze. Jeso wakaya kunjila muŋanda ya muntu wezo, wakakala kulya antoomwi.
Inzho kakuli mukaintu umwi wa mu munzhi wezo, wakaakuli shishibi. Naakateelela ati Jeso uli muŋanda yamu Falisi. Wakaleta kapawo kamafwuta aanunka kalonze.

Wakeza ulalila ashike wazhima kumbali kumatende aka Jeso, misozhi yakashilopya shifwumba sha Jeso, wakeekunkumuna misozhi iisusu lyoomutwi wakwe. Amane wakashishonta shifwumba uku shinanika mafwuta azo.

Inzho mu Falisi wezo, shimeenzu aakwe Jeso abone bobo, wakatelaika u monzo ati, “Kuti wezu muntu naakuli mushinshimi mwini mwini, naazhiba kwaamba mukaintu umukwatakwata uli buti, nkaambo ngushishibi.”
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Saimoni, kuli cintu ncinzanda kukwaambila.”
Saimoni wakaingula ati, “Caambe Mwiiyi.”
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Kakuli bantu bobile bakakweleta mali ku muntu umwi. Umwi wakakweleta myaanda yosanwe yamali a muwaya waya, wezu umwi makumi osanwe.
Nibakakacilwa kumuzholela mali wezo muntu wakabalekelela boonse bobile. Inzho nguuliye akati kabo uukaamufwunisha muntu wezo wakabalecelela?”
Saimoni wakaingula ati, “Ndatelaika ati nguwezo ngwaakalekelela mali manji manji.”
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Waingula kabotu.”

Amane wakacindulukila kwaakuli mukaintu, wamwaambila Saimoni ati, “Sa wamubona mukaintu wezu? Ndenjila muŋanda yako, wiina kumpa meenzhi aakusamba kumatende. Pele mukaintu wezu waalopya matende angu umisozhi yakwe ulimwi weeshuula umasusu aakwe.
Uwe wiina kunshonta ciindi indenjila muŋanda yako, pele walo wiina kukacilwa kushonta matende angu.
Uwe wiina kunanika mafwuta ku mutwi wangu, pele walo waananika mafwuta matende angu.
Inzho ndakwaambila ati shibi shakwe nishiba shinji shinji shalekelelwa, nkaambo watondezha lufwuno lukando, pele wezo ulekelelwa shibi shishoonto u lufwuno lwakwe ndushoonto.”
Ngoonaawo wakamwaambila mukaintu ati, “Shibi shako shalekelelwa.”
Babo bakaakulya antoomwi u Jeso etebulu bakakanka kwaamba akati kabo ati, “No nguni wezu uulekelela shibi shabantu?”
Inzho Jeso wakamwaambila mukaintu ati, “Lushomo lwako lwakufwutula, koya muluumuno.”
Nikwakaita ciindi, Jeso wakabweza lweendo lwa kuya mu minzhi mikando umishoonto kuya bukambauka Makani Mabotu a bwami bwaka Leza. Abo bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile bakaya aze,
kubicilizha u bakaintu bamwi mbakakusha myoza mibiyabi umbaakaponya malwazhi, mazhinaabo ngaaza, Maliya uwakutewa ati Magadalena, uwakakushiwa myoza mibiyabi iili ciloba,
u Jowana muka Cuuza, wakaakuli mukando wabasebezhi ba mwami Helodi. U Suzana ubamwi banji banji bakaakumuyohwa Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe kwiita mu mbono shabo.
Inzho bantu banji banji bakahwa mu minzhi yaandeene andeene bakabungana. Jeso wakabaambila mucikozhanyo ati,
“Shikuminza wakaya ukuminza imbuto, inzho naakaminza, imbuto shimwi shakawila munzhila, shakalyataukwa ulimwi bazuni bakashilya.
Shimwi imbuto shakawila ebwe aakaakuli ihu ishoonto. Mbushakahwila bulyo shakakanka kukusa shakabula mushiwe.
Shimwi imbuto shakawila mu meya, meya akakulila antoomwi ushishango shesho, akashiyasa ukushishaanicizha.
Shimwi imbuto shakawila mwihu ibotu, shakakomena ukweela micelo, shakahula shaba mwaanda.”
Inzho Jeso wakamanizha ukoompolola ati, “Ukwete matwi naateelele!”
Ba shiciiya bakwe bakamubuzha ncicaamba cikozhanyo ceci.

Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Umwe mwakapewa luzhibo lwamaseseke a bwami bwaka Leza. Pele bantu bamwi, balaambilwa shintu shoonse mushikozhanyo shaloolona. ‘Kwaamba nibabona batabonesha, nibateelela batateelelesha.’”
“Inzho mbubolya mbucaamba cikozhanyo. Imbuto ndizwi lyaka Leza.
Imbuto shakawila munzhila, mbantu balya bacita ati, baateelela bulyo mazwi, Shaatani weza kubananga kwaamba atenjili mu myonzo, yabo batahumina ukufwutulwa.

Shesho shakawila mwihu lili ebwe shilaamba bantu bafwumbi baateelela mazwi a Leza balaatambula ca kubotelwa, pele mazwi tanjili mu myonzo yabo, balahumina ku ciindi cishoonto bulyo, pele masukusho ashika balawa.

Shesho shakawila mu meya shilaamba bantu babo bateelela izwi lya Leza, pele balazandisha shintu shaano anshi, mizeezo, buhubi, ukulibotezha mu bumi, sheshi shintu shilabashaanicizha cakuti micelo yabo teebizwa.
Imbuto shakawila mwihu ibotu shilaamba bantu bateelela mazwi ukwaazobola mu myonzo mibotu iteelela. Ubobo balaakwatisha cini cini mpaka baya kuzhala micelo ca buuza.”
Inzho baina u banina Jeso bakeza nkwaakaakubele, pele kabatalozha kushika afwaafwi nkaambo kakuhula kwa bantu.
Inzho umwi muntu wakamushimwina Jeso ati, “Banoko u banyoko mbubalya balizhimine ansengwe balazanda kukubona.”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Baama u bakwesu mbubabo bateelela izwi lya Leza u kulicita.”
Bumwi buzuba Jeso wakanjila mu bwato antoomwi u ba shiciiya bakwe. Wakabaambila ati, “Atulanduke kumutala wezhiba.” Ngoonaawo bakashikula bwato bakakanka kuya.
Bwato nibwakaakuya bweenda ameenzhi Jeso wakoona. Inzho kwakaunga iwuwo, u mankutisha akabuuma bwato awo meenzhi akakanka kunjila mu bwato, ba shiciiya bakapenga cini cini.
Ngoonaawo ba shiciiya bakaya kumubusha Jeso ati, “Mwami, Mwami tukalafwa!”
Jeso naakabuka wakalilemanina iwuwo u mankutisha, ndilyona kwakaliinza wii!
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakababuzha ba shiciiya ati, “No ndulikwi lushomo lwenu?”
Pele balo kabatiile ukuzoowa cini cini, bakaamba ati, “No wezu muntu uli buti? Muuwo u mankutisha shilamuteelela!”
Inzho Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe bakaya kushoka ku cishi ca Gelasini cilangene u cishi ca Galilaya.

Jeso mbwaakamuhwila bulyo mu bwato, wakaswaanganya muntu wakahwa mu munzhi. Wezu muntu kenjililwe myoza mibiyabi. Shiindi shinji shinji katasama, ulimwi katakala mu munzhi pele kayanika bulyo kunamaumbwe ciindi coonse.
Inzho nakamubona Jeso wakoompolola iizwi ikando ati, “Uwe Jeso, Mwanakwe Leza Namakungwe Mutalabala ulazanda kuncita buti? Akaka ndakukomba utampenzha pe!”

Wakaamba bobo kaambo Jeso wakaambila myoza mibiyabi kwaamba ihwe mu muntu wezo. Shiindi shinji shinji keemupenzha myoza mibiyabi yezhi, kalindililwa kumwi ulyaanjilwe inceetani iinshimbi kumatashi ukumaulu pele kashikosaula, ulimwi myoza mibiyabi keemutola mulukula.
Inzho Jeso wakamubuzha ati, “No ndiweni izhina lyako?”
Walo wakamwiingula ati, “Ndime makamu.” Wakaamba bobo kaambo kenjililwe myoza mibiyabi minji minji.
Myoza mibiyabi yakamupumpa Jeso kwaamba ateetandili kubusena bwa bafwu.
Inzho afwaafwi u busena bobo kakuli butanga bwa ngulube bwa kaakucela kumbali ku lupili. Ubobo myoza mibiyabi yakamupumpa Jeso ati eehuminye kuya kunjila mu ngulube. Jeso wakebaleka yaya.
Myoza mibiyabi yakahwa mu muntu wezo yaya kunjila mu ngulube. Butanga boonse bwa ngulube bwakakunkulucila umukonka wezhiba ikando, ukufwila mu meenzhi.
Beembezhi nibakabona cakacitika, bakalukanka baya kukanana mu minzhi uumatungu.
Bantu bakaya kubona ceco cakacitika. Nibakashika kwa Jeso bakayana muntu wezo wakakushiwa myoza mibiyabi uli kabotu ulishite afwaafwi u Jeso ulisamine kabotu, ubobo bakatiya.
Babo bakaakuliwo, bakapandulula mbucaacitika.
Inzho inkamu ya bantu boonse ba mucishi ca Gelasini yakamupumpa Jeso kwaamba amuhwe mucishi cabo. Bukandu bunji bunji bwakabakwata, ubobo Jeso wakenjila mu bwato kwaamba apiluke.
Inzho muntu wezo wakakushiwa myoza mibiyabi wakamupumpa Jeso ati, “Ndalomba tuye aze.”
Pele Jeso wakamwaambila ati,
“Pe pe, koya ku munzhi ukabaambile bantu shoonse shintu nshaakucitila Leza.”
Ngoonaawo wezo muntu wakaya mu munzhi woonse kuya bukanana shintu nshaakamucitila Jeso.
Inzho Jeso nakapiluka kuhwa kumutala wezhiba, bantu bakamutambula ca kubotelwa kaambo boonse ngubakaakulindila.
Kwakeza mulombwana uutewa ati Jailosi, kali mweendelezhi wa cikombelo caba Juda. Wakamufwukamina Jeso ukumupumpa kwaamba baye aze kwakwe.
Jailosi kakwete mwana mushimbi wamyaka iili ikumi iitwesha yobile. Wezu mwana kali mulwazhi ca lufwu. Inzho Jeso nakaakuya bweenda, inkamu ya bantu keemuzhingulukile.
Kakuli mukaintu umwi wakaakusata kalobola kwa myaka iili ikumi itwesha yobile. Wakasowa lubono lunji lunji kubashilishi, pele kakwiina muntu naaba womwi wakaakukonzha kumuponya.
Ubobo wezo mukaintu wakeza kumanuma kwa Jeso akati ka bantu bakaakumuzhingulukile wakwata kumubundo wacisani ca Jeso. Ndilyona ndilyona bulowa bwakaleka kuhwa.
Inzho Jeso wakabuzha ati, “No nguni wankwata?”
Bantu boonse bakakazha, Pita wakaamba ati, “Mwiiyi, ulabuzha wakukwata, sa tubwene bantu mbubakushaanikizhizhe!”
Pele Jeso wakaamba ati, “Nkwaali wankwata, kaambo ndashiteelela insana shamuhwa.”

Inzho mukaintu wezo naakabona kwaamba takonzha kuzuba, wakaya ulazhangama kwa Jeso cabukandu, wafwukama kumatende akwe wapandulula ku bantu boonse ncakamukwatila, ulimwi umbwaakapona ku ciindi ncicona.
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Mwanangu, kushoma kwako kwakuponya. Koya muluumuno.”
Jeso naakaakucaamba, kwakeza muntu umwi wakahwa kuŋanda ya Jailosi waamba ati, “Utamupenzha bulyo Mwiiyi, mwanako wafwa kale.”
Pele Jeso nakateelela bobo, wakamwaambila Jailosi ati, “Utatiyi shoma bulyo mushimbi ulaba kabotu.”
Inzho Jeso nakashika kuŋanda ya Jailosi, wiina kubahuminya bantu boonse kwaamba benjile, cita bulyo Pita u Johani u Jemusi u ushi u baina mwana.
Boonse bantu bakaakuliwo, bakaakulila ukutengula ukaambo kalufwu lwa mushimbi. Pele Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Mutamulila kaambo wiina kufwa uloona.”
Bantu bakamuseka Jeso kaambo kabezhi ati mushimbi wafwa.
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakamukwata kumatashi woompolola ati, “Buka mwanangu!”
Inzho moza wakwe wakapiluka, ngoonaawo mwana wakazhimuka. Jeso wakabaambila ati nomupe cakulya alye.
Bakwabo bakazoowa cini cini, pele Jeso wakabalailila ati kutabi muntu ngumwaambila cintu ceci cacitika.
Jeso wakabeta ba shiciiya bakwe bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile. Wakabapa bwami iinsana shakukusha ba myoza miyabi u kuponya malwazhi.
Amane wakabatuma kwaamba bakakambauke sha bwami bwa Leza u kuya buponya balwazhi
Wakabashimwina ati, “Mutabwezi cintu niciba comwi mu mushinzo wenu. Mutabwezi musako niciba cikwama, niciba cakulya, naaba mali. Ulimwi mutabwezi shakusama shobile pe.
Kufwumbwa muŋanda mubakaamutambula amukakale mo kushicila nimukaamuhwa mu munzhi wezo.
Ulimwi kufwumbwa koko koonse nkubatakaamutambuli, mwakahwa mu munzhi wezo, mukapampumune lufwuko kumatende enu kwaamba cikabe cicenjezho nkubabele.”
Ba shiciiya bakaya mu minzhi yoonse kuya bukambauka Makani Mabotu, u kuya buponya balwazhi mu masena oonse.
Bamwi kabaamba ati, Elaija walibonya ulimwi. Pele bamwi kabaamba ati, umwi wa bashinshimi bakale kale wabuka ku bafwu.”
Helodi wakaamba ati, “Ume Johani ndakamukosola mutwi, no wezu nguni ucita shintu sheshi nshinteelele?” Ubobo kazandisha kwaamba amubone Jeso.
Nibakapiluka batumwa, bakamwaambila Jeso shoonse nshibakacita. Inzho Jeso wakaya kwaamba akaliibe u ba shiciiya bakwe kubusena buli afwaafwi u munzhi wa Betisaida.
Bantu banji banji nibakezhiba nkwakakubele, bakamucilila. Inzho wakabatambula wakanka kubaambila makani a bwami bwa Leza. Ulimwi wakaponya babo boonse bakaakuzanda kwaamba abaponye.

Izuba nilyaakuzanda kwibila, ba shiciiya bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile, bakeza kwa Jeso baamba ati, “Baambile bantu baye mu minzhi umumatungu ali afwaafwi, kwaamba baliyanine shakulya ukwakoona kaambo kono nkutubele nkukwisokwe.”

Pele Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Noombape cakulya ndimwena umwe.” Balo bakaingula ati, “Uswe tulikwete bulyo shinkwa shosanwe utuswi tobile. Sa ulazanda tuye tukaule shinkwa shinji shinji nshibakezulila bantu boonse baba?”
Nkaambo awo kaali balombwana bakaakutandila ku shuulu shili shosanwe.
Inzho Jeso wakabaambila ba shiciiya bakwe ati, “Amubakalice mutukamu twamakumi osanwe.”
Bakacita bobo, bakabakalika bantu boonse.
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakabweza shinkwa shesho shosanwe utuswi tobile, wakalyaalala kwizeulu washilonjezha, amane washikomauna. Wakabapa ba shiciiya bakwe kwaamba babaabanye bantu mutukamu.
Boonse bantu bakalya bakekuta. Ba shiciiya bakabwezelela bufwefwelenga bakezuzha shinzuma shili ikumi ushitwesha shobile.
Ciindi cimwi Jeso kali mwini ice ulakomba, ba shiciiya bakeza kwakwe. Wakababuzha ati, “No bantu balaamba ati ume ndime ni?”
Jeso wakabalailila ba shiciiya bakwe ati batashimwini muntu naaba womwi aza makani pe.
Ulimwi wakaamba ati, “Mwanaa Muntu ulyeelele kupenga mu shintu shinji shinji ukukakwa ubakando, u bapaizhi bakando u balembi. Ulakayayiwa, pele buzuba bwatatu ulakabushiwa.”
Nkaambo kufwumbwa muntu uzanda kuzobola bumi bwakwe, ulakabusowa. Pele muntu usowa bumi bwakwe ukaambo kangu ulakabuyana.
No muntu ulayana impinduunzhi, kuti wahuba inshi yoonse, amana wazhimininwa bumi bwakwe nikuba kubuzonauna? Kwiina pe!
Ubobo, kufwumbwa muntu uusa insoni kukaambo kangu u makani angu, aze Mwana muntu ulakamuusila insoni akeza mu bulemu bwakwe, umubulemu bwa ushi u baanjelo basalala.
Cini cini ndamushimwina ati nkubali bamwi ano batakaafwi kabatana kubona Bwami bwa Leza.”
Kwiite mazuba ali lusele kuhwa nakaamba aza makani, Jeso wakabweza Pita u Johani u Jemusi munina. Wakaya alupili kuya kukomba.
Inzho naakaakucikomba, ciwa cakwe cakasanduka, ushakusama shakwe shakatuba buu!
Ndilyona ndilyona kwakabulika balombwana bobile ba Mozesi u Elaija bakaakubandika u Jeso.
Bakabonwa mu bulemu bwa kwizeulu balabandika u Jeso makani a lufwu lwakwe ndwaakaafwa ku Jelusalemu.
Pita u beenzhiina kabali mutulo, pele nibakashinshimuka, bakabubona bulemu bwaka Jeso u balombwana babo bobile mbakaakuzhimine abo.

Ciindi balombwana baba nibakaakuzanda kuya, Pita wakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Mwiiyi, cabota kwaamba tuli ano abusena! Tulazaka shifwutu shotatwe, cimwi cilaba cako, cimwi cibe caka Mozesi, cimwi cibe caka Elaija.” Pele Pita katacizhi ncakaakwaamba.
Naakaakucaamba, ikumbi lyakeza kubahumba. Ba shiciiya bakatiya cini cini ikumbi nilyakabahumba.
Kwakwahwa izwi mwikumbi lyaamba ati, “Wezu ngu mwanangu nakufwunwa ngundakasala noomuteelele.”
Limane kwaamba izwi, Jeso wakashaala mwini ice. Ba shiciiya bakaliinza wii! Kwiina muntu naaba womwi ngubakaambila aza makani aceco cakacitika ncibakabona.
Mu buzuba bwakacilila, bakaseluka alupili. Inkamu inkando yakamuswaanganya Jeso.
Ngoonaawo umwi mulombwana wakaakuli mukati munkamu wakoompolola ati, “Mwiiyi mufwile luse mwanangu ndakulomba nkaambo ngu mwanangu ice nana.
Ulanjilwa moza mubiyabi mukali. Ulamulizha ulamucina anshi ukumuwizula ukumukusha injohwu ku mulomo. Ulamupenzha ukumucisa tamuleka pe.
Ndakabalomba ba shiciiya bako kwaamba bookushe moza mubiyabi wezu pele bakakacilwa.”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakaamba ati, “Akaka umwe nubantu bazumu mitwi, umutashomi. Ndakala amwe ciindi cilamfwu buti?” No ndamupengela ciindi cili buti? Mulete kono mwanako.
Mweembezhi wezo nakaakwiza kwa Jeso, moza mubiyabi wakamunjila, wamucinina anshi wakanka kusansa. Inzho Jeso wakoolemanina moza mubiyabi, wamuponya mweembezhi ukumupilusha kwa ushi.
Bantu boonse shakabazoosha sheshi insana inkando sha Leza shakuponya.
Bantu nibakaakucizhinjilwe ku shintu sheshi shakacitika, Jeso wakabaambila ba shiciiya bakwe ati,
“Amwaateeleleshe mazwi azo ngunzanda kumwaambila! Mwanaa Muntu ulakaabwa kumatashi a bantu.”
Pele bantu bayina nibakezhiba ncakaakwaamba. Nkaambo kaasesekelwe kwaamba batateelelesha. Ubobo bakatiya kumubuzha.
Pele Jeso wakeezhiba mizeezo yaakuli mu myonzo yabo. Wakaleta kana wakazhimika afwaafwi,

amane wakabaambila ati, “Kufwumbwa muntu utambula kana kaka mwizhina lyangu, ati ndime ngwaatambula. Ulimwi aze untambula, ati wamutambula Taata wakantuma. Wezo ngumutelaicila ati wiina mbwaabele akati kenu, ngu mukando.”
Inzho Johani wakaamba ati, “Mwami, twakabona muntu umwi ulakusha myoza mibiyabi mwizhina lyako, pele twakamukasha kaambo takucilila ukoya mbutukucilila uswe.”
Pele Jeso wakamwaambila Johani ati, “Mutamukasha, kaambo wezo ngumutalwi aze ati mulyaaze.”
Inzho nicakashika afwaafwi ciindi ca kwaamba Jeso atolwe kwizeulu, wakakanka kukanza kuya ku Jelusalemu.
Wakatuma banshinkombe bamwi kwaamba baye kumbele lyakwe, bakaya kunjila mu munzhi wa Samaliya kwaamba bamululamikile shintu shoonse.
Pele bantu ba mu munzhi wezo bayina nibakamutambula Jeso, kaambo bakazhiba ati ulaya ku Jelusalemu.
Inzho ba shiciiya bakwe ba Jemusi u Johani nibakabona bobo, bakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Mwami, sa ulazanda toompolole mulilo kuhwa kwizeulu kuzonaula bantu baba?”
Jeso wakacebuka wabalemanina ba shiciiya.
Ngoonaawo bakaitilila baya mu munzhi unji.
Nibakaakuya bweenda munzhila, muntu umwi wakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Ndakucilila kufwumbwa nkuukaya.”
Pele Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Ba mwaaba balikwete mena, bazuni balikwete shitaanto, pele Mwanaa Muntu wiina aakoona pe.”
Jeso wakamwaambila muntu umwi ati, “Ncilila.”
Pele muntu wezo wakaamba ati, “Mwami, ndaakuzanda ati ntaangune nje ku munzhi nkazhike taata.”
Pele Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Baleke bafwu bazhike bafwu nokwabo. Uwe koya ukakambauke makani a bwami bwa Leza.”
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Kwiina muntu ucita ati, akanka kulima iiyamba ulalanga munshi uyelele bwami bwa Leza.”
Munshi lyaaza, Mwami wakasala bantu bali makumi ciloba ubatwesha bobile, wakabatuma bobile bobile kwaamba bamusololele kuya mu minzhi, umumasena oonse momo mwakaakuzanda kuya.
Wakabaambila ati, “Butebuzhi bwakomena, pele bashikutebula baceya. Ubobo amumukombe Mwami wabutebuzhi kwaamba atume basebezhi kwiza kutebula.
Kamuya! Pele amubone ndamutuma ukoya bana ba mbelele akati ka baumpe.
Mutabwezi shikwama sha mali, nishiba inkomo, nishiba impato. Ulimwi mutaakuya buzhimazhima munzhila kuya bwaanzhanya u bantu.
Kufwumbwa muŋanda mumukeenjila, mukataangune kwaamba ati, ‘Luumuno lwa Leza alube muŋanda yezhi.’
“Kwaakuli muntu uzanda luumuno muŋanda yezho, luumuno lwenu lulakakala kwakwe, kwaakwiina, lulakamuzhokela.
Muŋanda mumukeenjila, mukalye u kunwa kufwumbwa ceco ncibakaamupa, kaambo musebezhi ulyeelelwe boonzo bwakwe. Mutakaakuya mu maanda andeene andeene.
Kufwumbwa mu munzhi mumukeenjila, kuti bakamutambule, mukalye kufwumbwa ceco ncibakaamusengelela.
Mukaponye balwazhi bali mu munzhi wezo, ulimwi mukabaambile bantu ba mu munzhi wezo ati, ‘Bwami bwa Leza bwaswena afwaafwi kulyuumwe.’
Pele kufwumbwa mu munzhi mubatakaamutambuli, mukamuhwe, mukaye mu mikwakwa mukaambe ati,
‘Ulufwuko lwamumunzhi wezu loonse lukakatile kumatende esu. Twalukunkumuna, kwaamba cibe cicenjezho nkumubele.’ Nikuba bobo amuzhibaluke ati, Bwami bwa Leza buli afwaafwi.
Ndamushimwina ati, kubuzuba bwa lubeta, mulandu wa Sodoma ulakaceya kubaala wa munzhi wezo.”
Inzho ndamushimwina ati, mu buzuba bwa lubeta, Leza ulakatondezha luse kuminzhi ya Taya u Sidoni kubaala kulyuumwe.
Aze u Kapenaumi! Sa ulatelaika ati balakakutembaula kwizeulu? Pe pe, ulakasowelwa mukalambwe kamulilo utamana.”
Ulimwi Jeso wakabaambila ba shiciiya bakwe ati, “Muntu uumuteelela, ati wanteelela, aze wezo uumukaka ati wankaka, ulimwi ati wamukaka Leza wakantuma.”
Inzho balombwana bali makumi ciloba ubatwesha bobile mbaakaakutumine Jeso bakapiluka balibotelelwe. Bakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Mwami myoza mibiyabi keetuteelela nitwaakakwiikusha mwizhina lyako.”
Inzho Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Ndakamubona Shaatani wakawila anshi ukoya lulabo.
Amuteelele! Ndakamupa insana shakuzunda shinkondonokwenu, mulakalyata bazoka utupilili, tamukalicisa pe.
Nikuba bobo mutatangala nkaambo bamuteelela. Pele amutangale ukuti mazhina enu alilembelwe kwizeulu.”

Inzho ngoona aciindi awo, Jeso wakatangala mu Moza Usalala waamba ati, “Ndakulumba Taata, U Mwami wezeulu iinshi, nkaambo wazubulwila bana bashoonto shintu nshiwakaseseka kubasongo uba shimaanu. Imbubo Taata ukuti waakuzanda ati cibe bolya.
Inzho Jeso wakacindulucila ba shiciiya bakwe wahwiya ati, “Mulilonjelwe umwe numubona shintu sheshi nshimubona.

Nkaambo cini cini ndamushimwina ati bashinshimi banji banji ubami, kabazandisha kubona sheshi nshimubona, pele bayina nibakashibona, ulimwi kabazandisha kuteelela aza ngumuteelela, pele bayina nibakaateelela.”
Jeso wakamubuzha ati, “No kulilembelwe buti mu maŋwalu? Ulapandulula buti?”
Pele walo shimulawo mbwaakaakuzanda kuliboshezha, wakamubuzha Jeso ati, “No nguni shimukoboma?”
Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Kakuli muntu wakahwa ku Jelusalemu kaya ku Jeliko. Munzhila bakamukwata bafwumpi, bamuuma ukumusamununa shakusama. Bamane baya bamushiya uliwizukile.
Inzho umwi mupaizhi kaya bweenda munzhila njiyona yezho, naakashika abusena awo, wakabona muntu ulilele, pele wakazeeluka kumabali waya wamushiya.
Umbona bobo, aze mu Levi nakashika awo abusena wakoombona muntu wezo ulilele, amane wazeeluka kuluya lumwi wamushiya.
Pele Musamaliya wakaakuya bweenda munzhila yezho, wakashika awo abusena, naakamubona wezo muntu, wakamufwila intenda.
Wakaya ngakaakulele, wamutila mafwuta u waini ashilonda ukumuzambaila shisani ashilonda shakwe, amane wamukatula wamubika ambongolo yakwe wamutola kuŋanda ya beenzu kuya kumubamba.
Mu buzuba bwakacilila, Musamaliya wakapa mweendelezhi waŋanda ya beenzu mali obile a muwaya waya, wamwaambila ati, Umubambe muntu wezu, ndakapiluka ndakakuzholela kufwumbwa mali nguukasebezha.”
Inzho Jeso wakamaninzha u kubuzha shimulawo ati, “No nguni abantu baba botatwe nguutelaika ati wakalitondezha kwaamba ngushimukobonina uwelya muntu ngubakauma bafwumpi?”
Shimulawo wakaingula ati, “Nguwelya wakamutondezha luse.” Aze Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Koya ukacite mbubona bobo.”
Malita kakwete munina mukaintu, izhina lyakwe kali Maliya, wezu mukaintu, wakakala kumbali kwa Jeso kapupulala kuyiisha kwakwe.
Ku ciindi ceco Malita wakapakasha ku milimo njakaakucita. Inzho wakaya kwa Jeso wamwaambila ati, “Mwami, sa tubwene ati mukwesu wandekelezha milimo? Mwaambile azhize anjohwe.”
Mwami wakamwiingula ati, “Malita, Malita! Upengelaanzhi ukulipakashizha shintu shinji shinji?”
“Pele kuli cintu comwi bulyo cizandika. Maliya wasala cintu cibotu, ciina ukaamunanga.”
Ciindi cimwi Jeso wakaakukomba kubusena bumwi. Naakamana kukomba, umwi wa bashiciiya bakwe wakamwaambila ati, “Mwami, tuyiishe kukomba, ukoya Johani mbwakayiisha ba shiciiya bakwe.”
Jeso wakabaambila ati, Ciindi nimukomba, kamwaamba ati,
“Taata,
alilemekwe izhina lyako,
abuzhize bwami bwako.
Utupe bwasunu shilyo shesu shabuzuba u buzuba.
Utulekelele milandu yesu,
nkaambo aswe mbutubalekelelalela bali milandu kulyuuswe.
Utatweenzha mukutepaulwa.”
Ulimwi Jeso wakabaambila ati, “No mulatelaika buti, kuti umwi wenu waya kuŋanda yamulongwaakwe akati kamashiku, waya kwaamba ati, ‘mulongwaangu njohwa shinkwa shotatwe,
ndaswaiwa mweenzu ndabula cilyo cakumupa.’
Inzho atwaambe ati, mulongwaako wezo uuli muŋanda wakutaba ati, ‘Utampenzha, sa tukubwene ku mulyango ati nkuyale? Ulimwi ume ubanangu toona kale. Nshikonzha kubuka kwaamba nkupe cinkwa.’

Inzho ume ndazanda kumwaambila bolya, nikuba kuti tazanda kubuka kwaamba akupe cinkwa nkaambo kakuti mulongwaako, ulabuka u kukupa shoonse nshuuzanda, ukaambo kakuti wiina kulisenda, ulimwi watatanana kulomba.
Ubobo ndamwaambila ati, Amupumpe mulakatambula, amukapule mulakayana, amukonkomone mulakayalulilwa mulyango.
Nkaambo kufwumbwa uupumpa ulatambula, aze ukapula ulayana, umulyango ulayalulwa kuli oonse wezo ukonkomona.
No kuti mwana kapumpa inswi kwa ushi, sa ushi ulamupa muzoka?
Na wapumpa iyi, sa ulamupa kapilili?
Inzho naa kuti umwe nubashishibi mulicizhi kupa banenu shintu shibotu, sa Ushenu uuli kwizeulu, takaabaali kupa Moza Usalala kuli babo bamupumpa?”
Jeso wakookusha moza mubiyabi wabushicintaamba mu muntu. Inzho moza mubiyabi niwakamuhwa, muntu wezo wakacilozha kwaamba. Ubobo, bantu banji banji bakaakuliwo bakazoowa cini cini.
Pele bamwi akati kabo bakaamba ati, “Ngu Belizebule, mwami wa myoza mibiyabi nguumupa insana shakukusha myoza mibiyabi.”

Pele Jeso wakazhiba ncibaakutelaika, wakabaambila ati, “Bantu ba mucishi cili comwi, kuti baandaana mu mipampo mipampo, ceco cishi tacikatazha kuzunda. Ulimwi kuti bantu bamukowa balwishanya beni ubeni, mukowa wezo ulazundika.
Abo bwami bwaka Shaatani kuti bwalilwisha bwini no bulazhima buti? Ndabuzha bobo kaambo mulaamba ati Belizebule nguumpa insana shakukusha myoza mibiyabi.

Ume ndakusha myoza mibiyabi munzhila njiyona bamucilila njibasebezha. No nkaamboonzhi mulaamba ati ndakusha myoza mibiyabi munsana sha Belizebule? Mbubona bamucilila mbubakaamuzuzha ukumutondezha ati tamululeme.
Tali Belizebule pe, Moza wa Leza nguumpa insana shakukusha myoza mibiyabi, calo citondezha ati Bwami bwa Leza bwashika kulyuumwe.
“Kuti Shaatani kalibambile u shilwisho shakwe shoonse, kalinda iŋanda yakwe, lubono lwakwe lulalikalila muluumuno.
Pele kuti kwashika uumwi umubaala insana, wamulwisha ukumuzunda, ulamunanga shilwisho shakwe nshaashoma ukwaabanya lubono ndwaakananga bantu.
“Kuti moza mubiyabi wamuhwa mu muntu, uleendeenda mulukula kuya bukapula kwakulyoocezhezha. Watayana ulaamba ati, ‘Ndabweela bulyo kuŋanda yangu nkundakahwa.’
Inzho apiluka, ulayana iŋanda ilibambilwe ilasalala.
Amana ulapiluka kuya kuleta myoza mibiyabi iimwi iili ciloba iimubaala kubiya kwiza kunjila u kukala mu muntu wezo. Inzho ku mamanino bumi bwa muntu wezo bulabiya kubaala mbubwaakubele lutaanzhi.”
Inzho Jeso nakamana kwaamba bobo, umwi mukaintu akati kankamu wakapozomoka wamwaambila Jeso ati, “Ulikwete coolwe mutumbu wakakunonsha!”
Inzho Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Kwaambisha, balikwete coolwe babo bateelela izwi lya Leza ukulicita.”
Nkaambo mbubona Jona mbwaakaba citondezho ku bantu baku Ninive, aze Mwanaa Muntu mbwaati akabe citondezho ku bantu baano mazuba.
Mu buzuba bwa lubeta, mwami mukaintu waku Shiba,
Ubobo, bantu baku Ninive balakamuzuzha mu buzuba bwa lubeta kaambo balo bakabeba ku shibi shabo naakabakambaucila Jona, pele ano ngaali ubaala ali Jona.
Menso enu ngu mumuni wamibili wenu. Kuti menso kaali kabotu, mubili woonse ulaakuli mu mumuni. Pele kuti menso kaatali kabotu, awo mubili woonse ulaba mu mushinze uushiya mbi.
Ubobo ulyeelele kucenjela kwaamba mumuni uuli mwako utabi mushinze pe.
Nkaambo kuti mubili wako koozwile mumuni, kakwiina mushinze nuuceya, ulaakuli mu mumuni, umbona ilambe mbulikumunicila mumuni walyo.”
Jeso nakamana kwaamba, umwi mu Falisi wakamukumbila kwaamba aye bakalye aze. Ubobo Jeso wakahumina bakaya kuŋanda yakwe kuya kulya.
Inzho mu Falisi wakazoowa naakabona kwaamba Jeso wakakanka kulya katana kusamba kumatashi kwiingaina uciyanza cabo.
Ubobo Mwami wakamwaambila ati, “Cini cini umwe nuba Falisi mulasanzha inkapu umitiba ngushili ansengwe, pele mukati kenu mulizwile bushaacihule mwangu ubusofwaazhi.
Umwe nubalimbushi! Sa wakashilenga mukati aansengwe tali womwi?
Inzho umwe nubashaacihule mwangu, amubape bapushi, shesho shili mukati munkapu uumitiba, kwaamba shoonse shikamusalalile.

Mulakapenga umwe nuba Falisi, kaambo mulalipenzha kupa Leza cekumi catuntu twiina mukumo tulungwa mucilisho, pele mulaluba kucita shiluleme ku bantu u lufwuno lwa Leza. Nkaambo sheshi nshishintu nshimweelele kucita cakutaluba shimwi.
“Mapenzhi alamulindila umwe nuba Falisi! Nkaambo mulasala shuuna shabulemu mu shikombelo shaba Juda, u kufwuna kwaanzhiwa ca bulemu.
Mulakapenga umwe! Nkaambo muli ukoya shuumbwe shiina shizhibyo, awo bantu ngubalyatauka, pele tabazhibi ati ngaashuumbwe.”
Inzho umwi waba shimulawo wakaamba ati, “Mwiiyi, bobo mbuwaamba, aswe watutuka!”
Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Mulakapenga umwe nuba Shimulawo! Nkaambo mulatwika bantu mikuli milemu ikatazha kubweza, nikuba bobo umwe lwenu tamuzanda kubayohwa bantu mikuli yezho naashoonto.
Mulakapenga umwe! Nkaambo Mulazacila bashinshimi bakayayiwa umaushenu shuumbwe shibotu.
Nkukwaamba ati, mwakahumina ceco ncibakacita baushenu, kaambo balo bakabayaya bashinshimi, umwe mulazaka shuumbwe shabo.
Nciceco Leza mu busongo bwakwe ulaamba ati, ‘Ndakabatumina bashinshimi u batumwa, bamwi balakayayiwa, ulimwi bamwi balakapenzhewa.’
Inzho bantu bacikubucilo ceno balakasubulwa ukaambo kabashinshimi mbubakayaya kuhwa ku malenjelo anshi.

Kukancila ku lufwu lwaka Abelo kushicila ku lufwu lwaka Zakaliya, wezo ngubakayaila akati ka cipaililo abusena busalalisha, muŋanda yaka Leza. Ee ndamwaambila ati bantu bankubucilo yezhi balakapewa mulandu ukaambo ka shintu shoonse sheshi.
“Mapenzhi ngeenu umwe nuba Shimulawo! Mwakaseseka ciyaluzho ca luzhibo kaambo kakuti umwe tamukanjili, ubobo mulashincila babo bazanda kunjila.”
Inzho Jeso nakahwa koko, balembi antoomwi u ba Falisi bakakanka kumutongauka cini cini ukumubuzha mibuzho ikwatilizha shintu shinji shinji.
Kabasoleka kumuteya kwaamba bamuyanine kaambo mukwiingula kwakwe.
Kwiina cihumbe citakaahumbululwa, ulimwi kwiina ciseseke niciba buti citakaazubululwa pe.
Ubobo kufwumbwa cintu ncimwaamba mu mushinze cilakateelelwa lumwi lubala, ulimwi kufwumbwa ncimwahwiya muŋanda milyango keyalilwe, cilakapozomokwa anduli shamaanda.”
“Bakwesu ndamwaambila ati, mutaakutiya babo bayaya bulyo mubili, pele bamana kwiina cinji ncibakonzha kucita.
Ndamutondezha ngumweelele kutiya. Amumutiye Leza, nkaambo amana kuyaya mubili, ulikwete insana shakuuwaala mukalambwe kamulilo uutamana. Cini cini ndamushimwina ati, wezo ngumweelele kutiya.
“Sa bashikamiimbya bosanwe tabaulwa tuli twalubulo tobile bulyo? Nikuba bobo kwiina kanga shikamiimbya nikaba komwi nkatabicili maanu Leza
Utatiyi pe, kaambo u mweelwe wamasusu ali mumutwi wako Leza ulyuuzhi, ulimwi uwe kwakwe ulikwete muulo mukando kubaala bashikamiimbya banji banji.”
Cini cini ndamushimwina ati, kufwumbwa muntu utantama ku bushu bwa bantu, ame ndi Mwanaa Muntu shikamutama ku bushu bwa banjelo baka Leza.
Pele wezo untama ku bushu bwa bantu ame ndi Mwanaa Muntu ndakamutama ku bushu bwa baanjelo baka Leza.
Nkaambo Moza Usalala ulakamuyiisha ncimweelele kwaamba aciindi awo ngoona.”
Muntu umwi wakaakuli munkamu wakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Mwiiyi, ndakulomba mwaambile mukwesu kwaamba ankonye lubono ndwakashiya taata.”
Pele Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Uwe umuntu, no nguni wakampa insana shakwaabanya lukono akati kenu nobile?”
Jeso wakaya kumbele u kwaamba ati, “Amucenjele, ulimwi amulikashe nubeni kwaamba mutabi bantu bazandisha lubono, kaambo bumi bwa muntu tabupimwa u shintu muntu nshaahubile.”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakabaanina kaano kakuti, “Kakuli muntu umwi muhubi wakalima muunda mukando, wakatebula cakulya cinji cinji mu muunda wakwe.
Naakabona bobo wakakanka kutelaika mu monzo wakwe ati, ‘Ndiina matala makando akubika cilyo cangu ceci coonse. No ndacita buti?’
Amane, wakatelaika ati, ‘Mbubolya mbunkacita, ndazakulula matala aangu oonse mashoonto, kwaamba nzace aanji makando abaala awa, mwinkabika cilyo cangu u lubono lwangu lubotu loonse.
Ndamana ŋambile moza wangu ati, u moza wangu! Ulikwete lubono lunji lunji lutakonzha kumana kwa myaka minji minji, ubobo liibe, lya, nwa, botelwa.’
Pele Leza wakamwaambila muntu wezo ati, ‘Uwe umuntu mulimbushi! Ubwasunu lyeno, mashiku aza ngoona ulafwa. No shintu sheshi shoonse nshiwazobola shilaaba shaani?’”
Jeso wakamaninzha u kwaamba ati, “Mbubolya mbucibele kuli babo balilundicila lubono. Tabali bahubi beni beni kwa Leza.”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakabaambila ba shiciiya bakwe ati, “Ubobo ndamwaambila ati, mutalibilici makani a bumi bwenu, kwaamba mulakalyaanzhi, na mulakasamaanzhi.
Nkaambo bumi mbubotu kubaala cilyo, awo mubili mukando kubaala shakusama.
Amubone ba cikwaangala tabashanji, tabatebuli, bayina matala, pele nikuba bobo Leza ulabasanina! Sa tamwizhi ati Leza ulimufwini kubaala ba cikwaangala?
Ulimwi nguni akati kenu ukonzha kuzunjila bumi bwakwe ukaambo kakulibilika?
Na kuti tamukonzha kucita bobo, no mulalipenzhenzhaanzhi ku shintu shoonse sheshi?

Amubone malubaluba a mwisokwe mbwakomena, taasebezi, taasasa shisani. Pele cini cini ndamwaambila ati, naaba mwami Solomoni mu bulemu bwakwe, wiina naakasama shisamwa shili ukoya lyomwi lya malubaluba aza.

Leza uusamika bwizu bucita ati bwasunu mbubotu uzona bwazuma bwaba bulyo bwakutenta mu mulilo, sa mulatelaika ati ulakonzha kumulekelezha umwe nubantu kutamulanjila shakusama? Umwe nubashilushomo lushoonto!
“Ubobo, mutaakulibilika ukutelaika lyoonse ati nciinzhi ncimukalya uncimukanwa.
Nkaambo nshishizwile mu matelaishi abantu baanshi. Ushenu uuli kwizeulu ulizhi ati mulashizanda shintu sheshi.
Pele umwe amutaangune mukapule Bwami bwa Leza, walo ulakamupa shoonse shimwi sheshi.”
“Mutatiyi umwe nubutanga bushoonto, kaambo ushenu wakabotelwa kumupa bwami.

Amuluuzhe lubono ndumukwete, mali ngumukayana mwaape bapushi. Amuliyanine shikwama shitakulumpali ulimwi amuzobole lubono lwenu kwizeulu, koko nkulutaceyi kaambo kwiina mutewu ushika ko, iimpezu tashikonzha kuluzonauna.
Nkaambo kufwumbwa kuli lubono lwako, u monzo wako nkuubele.
Amube ukoya basebezhi balindila shimatwangaabo kuzhoka kuŋanda kuhwa kubwinga. Kwaamba mbwaakashicila bulyo, akonkomona bamuyalulile ca kufwambaana.
Balikwete coolwe basebezhi babo mbaakayana balalindila, balilibambile kumucinga shimatwangaabo ashika. Cini cini ndamushimwina ati, ulakasamununa shakusama shakwe shabulemu, ulakabafwutaucila.
Nikuba kwaamba washika akati kamashiku, nikuba kumancela, naaba amaselucilo ankuku balakayanika balalindila mbubona bobo!
Pele amuzhibe ceci, kuti mukamwini iŋanda kacizhi ciindi nceeza mutewu, toona pe ulaakulindila, tamulecela mutewu kunjila muŋanda yakwe kwaamba ebe.
Amwe mbubona amukale mulilibambile coonse ciindi. Nkaambo ume ndi Mwanaa Muntu ndakashika ciindi ncimutezhi ncimutananjila.”
Inzho Pita wakabuzha ati, “Mwami, sa cikozhanyo ceci ncesu tubeni na ncabantu boonse?”
Mwami wakamwiingula ati, “No nguni mubanzhi musongo ushomeka? Nguwezo ukaabikwa uushimalelo akwe kulanga basebezhinina kwaamba aakubapa shaabilo shacakulya muciindi ceelele.
Ulakatambula bulumbu musebezhi wezo ukaayanwa ulacita bobo ciindi shimalelo akwe naakaapiluka.
Cini cini ndamushimwina ati, shimatwangaakwe ulakamusumpula kuba muntu uulanga lubono lwakwe loonse.
Inzho kuti musebezhi waamba ati, shimatwangaangu wemuka kushika, amana wakanka kuuma basebezhi balombwana u bakaintu, wakanka kulya u kunwa ukukolwa,
shimatwangaakwe ulakashika mu buzuba mbwatamulanjila, aciindi ncatezhi. Ushimalelwaakwe, ulakamupa cibebyo akabikwe antoomwi u babo batashomeki.
“Inzho musebezhi ucizhi ncaazanda shimalelwaakwe kwaamba acite, pele amana taciciti, ulakaumwa cini cini.

Pele musebezhi utezhi ncaazanda shimalelwaakwe, wacita cintu amana wacilubizha mukutezhiba, ulakaumwa bulyo ashoonto. Nkaambo muntu upewa shinji shinji, kulakazandwa shinji shinji kuhwa kwakwe. Ulimwi muntu uwapewa shintu shinji shinji shibaala, kulakalanjilwa shinji shinji kuhwa kwakwe.”
“Ndakeza kuwaala mulilo anshi. Ndakaakuzanda kwaamba ati njane mulilo mukunce kale.
Ndikwete lupapatizho ndwinjelele kutambula, ubobo monzo wangu uli mu mapenzhi kushikila limwi lupapatizo lolu lukamane!
Sa mulatelaika ati ume ndakeza kuleta luumuno anshi? Pe pe, ndamushimwina ati, ndakeza kuleta lwaandaano.
Nkaambo kuhwa bwasunu kulaakuli lwaandaano mu mikwashi. Mukwashi wa bantu bosanwe balakaandaana, botatwe balakalwa u bantu bobile, abo bobile balakalwa u bantu botatwe.

Bana balombwana balakalwa umaushabo, umbona bobo awo maushabo balakalwa ubanabo beembezhi. Bana bashimbi balakalwa umanokwabo, abo manokwabo balakalwa ubanabo bashimbi. Bainazhala balakalwa ubamukabanabo, umbona bobo abo bamukabanabo balakalwa ubainazhala.”
Ulimwi Jeso wakaambila makamu abantu ati, “Ciindi nimubona ikumbi lilahwa kumbo, mulaamba ati, ‘Inhula ilyaafwaafwi,’ yamana yawa.
Ulimwi muuwo kuti waunga kuhwa kucibizhi, mulaamba ati, ‘Bwasunu kulaakupiya cini cini’ kwamana kwaba bobo.
Umwe nubashikuupaupa amenso, mulicizhi kupandulula ncishaamba shiyanza shanshi iizeulu mbulisandauka, no kaamboonzhi ncimutakonzha kuzhiba ncicaamba kusandauka kwa mazuba ano?”
No kaamboonzhi ncimutalibeteci ku shintu shiluleme?

Kuti kamuya kunkuta ushikaambo noko, ulyeelele kulyeenzelela kwakwe nimucili munzhila kuya ku babeteshi. Nkaambo ulakakwaaba kumubeteshi, aze mubeteshi akakwaabe kumushilikani wantolongo kwaamba akwaanje.
Cini cini ndakushimwina ati, tukahwi muntolongo mpaka ukamaninzhe kuliya kali kamamanino.
Kakuli bantu bamwi ku ciindi ceco bakamwaambila Jeso makani abantu baku Galilaya babo mbakayaya Pilato. Wakabayaya ciindi nibakaakupa cipaizho Muŋanda ya Leza.
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Sa umwe mulatelaika ati bantu babo nibakayayiwa bobo kabali ba shishibi kubaala bantu boonse baku Galilaya?
Ndamushimwina ati, Mwatabeba ukuleka inzhila shenu imbiyabi mulakafwa noonse.
No bantu balya baku Siloamu ubali ikumi ubatwesha bali lusele babo bakafwa ciindi busanza nibwakabawila, sa mulatelaika ati bakabisha kubaala bantu boonse bakakukala mu Jelusalemu?
Pe pe! Ndamushimwina ati, mwatabeba ukuleka inzhila shenu imbiyabi amwe mulakafwa mbubona mbubakafwa.”
Ulimwi Jeso wakabaambila cikozhanyo caamba ati, “Kakuli muntu umwi wakaakukwete isamu ulya mukuzu mu muunda wakwe wa masaansa. Bumwi buzuba wakaya kwaamba akacele inkuzu, pele wiina njakayana.
Inzho wakamwaambila shikulima muunda ati, ‘Bona, inzho yaba myaka yotatwe ndeza kulanga inkuzu mwikuzu leli, pele kwiina ncinjana. Liteme! No ndyaanzhi? Sa lyuukuzonauna bulyo bulongo?’
Pele mulimi wakamwiingula ati, ‘Mwami lileke kwamwaka weno nsoleke kulizailila. Nzepe mu mabali ndamana mbike imbolezhi.
Kuti likeele inkuzu kumwaka uzhiza cilakaba kabotu, pele kuti litakeeli, ati ulakalitema.’”
Inzho Jeso kayiisha mucikombelo caba Juda mu buzuba bwa kulyoocezha bwa Sabata.
Momo mu cikombelo caba Juda kamuli mukaintu wakaakupenzhewa u moza mubiyabi kwa myaka iili ikumi iitwesha ili lusele. Mukaintu wezu kakonkomene moongo katoongoloka.
Jeso nakamubona wakamwaambila ati, “Baama, waangululwa kubulwazhi bwako!”
Wakamwaampa matashi, ngoonaawo moongo wa mukaintu wezo wakoololoka, ubobo wakakanka kutembaula Leza.
Ngoonaawo Mwami wakamwaambila ati, “Umwe nubashikuupaupa amenso! Anu nguni akati kenu utayalulila basune na imbongolo, kushikusha mucimpati kuya kucela ukushinwisha meenzhi mu buzuba bwa Sabata?
Sa wezu mukaintu wa luhubo lwaka Abulahamu wakaakwaanjilwe u Shatani kwa myaka iili ikumi u myaka lusele teelele kwaamba aangululwe kubuzuba bobu?”
Koku kwiingula kwakabausha insoni ba shinkondonina Jeso, pele bantu bakabotelwa cini cini ku shintu shoonse shizoosha nshaakacita.
Inzho Jeso wakabuzha ati, “No Bwami bwaka Leza buli buti? Ndabukozhanya ukoyaanzhi?
Bulakozhana iimbuto ya masitadi
Ulimwi Jeso wakabuzha ati, “No nciinzhi ncinkabukozhanya aco Bwami bwa Leza?
Buli ukoya bumena mukaintu mbwakahwela muntundu shotatwe shabufwu bwa maila, mpaka limwina bufwu boonse bwafwufwumuka.”
Jeso kali amushinzo wakuya ku Jelusalemu, kaya bwiita mu minzhi mikando umishoonto.
Umwi muntu wakamubuzha ati, “Mwami, sa bantu bakaafwutulwa mbashoonto bulyo?” Jeso wakaingula ati,
“Amuzume kunjila mu mulyango ushaankene, nkaambo ndamwaambila ati, mbanji banji bantu bazanda kuya kunjila pele tabakalozha.
Mukamwini iŋanda ulakazhimuka ukuyala mulyango, nimukaakanka kuzhima ukukonkomona ku mulyango ati, ‘Tuyalulile Mwami!’ Pele walo ulakaingula ati, ‘Nshikwizhi nkumwahwa.’
Inzho mulakaingula ati, ‘Twakaakulya u kunwa antoomwi, niwakaakuyiisha mu minzhi yesu.’
Pele walo ulakaamba ati, ‘Nshikwizhi nkumwahwa. Amwaahwe awa noonse, umwe numucita shitaluleme!’
Inzho mulakalila ukucecenana, mwakamubona Abulahamu, u Aizeki u Jakobo u bashinshimi boonse bali mu Bwami bwaka Leza, pele umwe muli batande muli ansengwe!
Balakeza bantu kuhwa kwiwe u kumbo, kuhwa kumbala ukucibizhi, balakakala ukulya ipobwe mu Bwami bwaka Leza.
Nkubali babo bashaalizhi, uninzho balakaba bataanzhi, abo bataanzhi uninzho balakaba bashaalizhi.”
Ku ciindi ceco ncicona, ba Falisi bamwi bakeza kwa Jeso bamwaambila ati, “Kuhwe kono uye kumasena anji, nkaambo mwami Helodi ulazanda kwaamba akuyaye.”
Pele Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Kamuya mukamwaambile wezo mwaaba ati ndakusha myoza mibiyabi ukushilika malwazhi ubwasunu ulya zona, ubwelimwi ndakamaninzha mulimo wangu.
Pele nikuba bobo ndyeelele kuya kumbele mu mushinzo wangu bwasunu naaba zona na bwelimwi, kaambo taciluleme kwaamba mushinshimi afwile kunji kutali ku Jelusalemu.

“Akaka Jelusalemu, Jelusalemu! Uwe nuyaya bashinshimi, ulauma mabwe babo Leza mbakutumina! Shiindi shinji shinji ndaakuzanda kubabunganya bantu bako antoomwi mu matashi angu, ukoya inkuku ifwukatila banayo, pele uwe wakakaka!
Ubobo iŋanda yako lilakaba itongo. Ulimwi ndakwaambila ati, tukamboni linji mpaka cikashike ciindi ceco nuukakaamba ati, ‘Uli u coolwe uzhiza mwizhina lya Mwami.’”
Mu buzuba bumwi bwa Sabata Jeso wakaya kulya kuŋanda ya mukando waba Falisi, bantu boonse bakamulanjisha.
Inzho muntu umwi wakeza kwa Jeso, kazhimbile mubili.
Inzho Jeso wakababuzha bashi Mulawo ati, “Sa Milawo yesu ilatuhuminya kushilika mu buzuba bwa Sabata na pe?”
Pele kwiina wakaingula. Ngoonaawo Jeso wakamukwata muntu wezo wamuponya, amane wamuleka waya.
Inzho wakabaambila ati, “Sa kuti umwi wenu kakwete mwana mulombwana, naa iŋombe yawila mumukalo mu buzuba bwa Sabata, sa teekusha umukalo mu buzuba bobo mbubona?”
Pele bakakacilwa kumwiingula kukaambo kaka.
Inzho Jeso naakabona ati bamwi bantu bakaakutambilwe kwipobwe bakakanka kulisalila masena aakukala a bulemu, wakabaambila kaano kaka,
“Kuti na muntu wakutamba kwipobwe lya bwinga, utakakala acuuna cibotu ca bulemu. Kulaba nikwiza muntu uumwi ukubaala bulemu,
amana shimeenzu ako wakakutamba akeze kukwaambila ati, ‘Mupe cuuna wezu muntu.’ Ukalakafwa insoni kuzhimuka u kuya kukala acuuna citali ca bulemu.

Ubobo, kuti watambwa, ulyeelele kusala cuuna citali ca bulemu, kwaamba shimeenzu ako ashika akwaambile ati, ‘Mulongwaangu zhimuka, koya kumbele kushuuna shabulemu.’ Ubobo ulakakwata bulemu kumenso a beenzu noko.
Nkaambo kufwumbwa muntu ulisumpula ulakafwiinshiwa, pele muntu ulifwiinsha ulakasumpulwa.”

Inzho Jeso wakamwaambila shimeenzu akwe ati, “Ciindi niwabamba cakulya cakususula niciba cakulalila, utatambi balongwaako na banyoko, nibaba bahubi mbumubambene abo, nkaambo abo balakakutamba kwaamba bakuliye.
Na wacita ipobwe, tamba bapushi, u balema, utambe basunkuta u boofwu.
Wacita bobo, ulaakwata coolwe nkaambo balo bayina cakuya kuzhola. Leza nguukaakuliya mu buzuba bobo baluleme nibakaabuka ku bafwu.”
Inzho umwi wabalombwana bakaakushite kwitebulu naakaateelela aza makani, wakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Bali u coolwe babo bakaalya ipobwe mu Bwami bwa Leza.”
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Kakuli muntu wakacita ipobwe ikando ukutamba bantu banji banji.
Inzho nicakashika ciindi cakulya ipobwe, wakatuma musebezhi wakwe kwaamba akabete boonse mbakaakutambile ati, ‘Kamwiza shoonse shabambwa.’
Pele batambe bakakanka kutama. Mutaanzhi wakaamba ati, ‘Ndalomba kulekelelwa kaambo ndakaula muunda ndazanda nkoobone.’
Umwi wakaamba ati, ‘Ndakaula shipani shosanwe shabasune ndazanda kubasoleka mbone mbubakwela.’
Aze umwi ati, ‘Indacitwala, nshikonzha kumushiya nabwinga ice.’

Inzho musebezhi wakazhoka kwiza kwaambila shimatwangaakwe. Shimatwangaakwe wakalemana u kwaambila musebezhi ati, ‘Fwambaana koya mu mikwakwa umutuzhila twamuminzhi yoonse, ukatambe bapushi u balema u boofwu ubakonaushi.’
Naakapiluka musebezhi wakaamba ati, ‘Mwami ndacita mbubona mbuwandailila, pele kucili busena muŋanda.’
