Shimatwangaakwe wakamwaambila ati, ‘Koya mu tuzhila twamumatungu utuzhila twamumabali ubaambile bantu bezhize kwaamba iŋanda izule.’
Ndamushimwina ati, kwiina naaba womwi wa babo bakaakutambilwe ukaalisola ipobwe lyangu!”
Inzho inkamu inkando ya bantu bakaakuya bumucilila Jeso, ngoonaawo wakacebuka wabaambila ati,
“Kuti muntu kazanda kuba shiciiya wangu, ulyeelele kumfwuna kubaala mbwaafwini ushi u baina u mwinakwe ubanakwe, u banina balombwana u bakaintu, ulimwi u bumi bwakwe mwini.
Muntu woonse utabwezi ciciinkano cakwe ukuncilila takonzha kuba shiciiya wangu.
No nguni akati kenu, aakuzanda kuzaka iŋanda inamfwu, utataanguni kukala anshi u kubona ati sa mali ngaakwete alakonzha kuumana mulimo?
Nkaambo watacita bobo, cilakukakila kumaninzha. Ulakonzha bulyo kusha mwiimbi wamakancilo amulimo, pele bantu boonse bacibona cacitika balakamuseka.
Balakaamba ati, ‘Amubone wezu muntu, wakakanka kuzaka pele wakakilwa kumaninzha!’

“Kuti mwami kakwete bashikalumamba bali shuulu shili ikumi, ulazanda kulwa uumwi mwami uukwete bashikalumamba bali shuulu shili makumi obile, ulataanguna wakala anshi walibuzha kwaamba sa ulalozha kulwa, ukumuzunda mwaminina ukwete bashikalumamba banji banji.
Pele kuti wayana kwaamba talozha kumuzunda, ulatuma bazhiminizhi bakwe ku mwaminina ca kufwambaana kumulomba ati batalwi kube luumuno akati kabo.”
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Amwe mbubona bobo, kwiina ukonzha kuba shiciiya wangu cita wezo ufwutamina shoonse nshaakwete.”
“Mwino mubotu, pele kuti wabula mucanka kwiina mbuucitwa kwaamba ubote ulimwi.
Wiina mulimo kubulongo nikuba kumbolezhi, ulaba wakusowa bulyo. Muntu ukwete matwi ateelele!”
ba Falisi u ba maayi ba Mulawo bakakanka kutongauka ati, “Wezu muntu ulatambula ba shishibi ukulya abo.”
Ubobo Jeso wakabaambila cikozhanyo ceci:
“Kuti umwi wenu kakwete imbelele shili mwaanda, imwi yazhimina, sa takonzha kushishiya mwisokwe shili makumi ali ifwuka ushitwesha shili ifwuka kwaamba akapule yezho yomwi yazhimina mpaka eeyane?
Amana kwiiyana ulabotelwa cini cini, uleebweza imbelele ukwiibika amafwunzhi,
ukwiitola kuŋanda yakwe. Inzho ashika uloompolola balongwaakwe ubashimukobonina u kubaambila ati, ‘Atusekelele antoomwi kaambo ndeebona imbelele yangu yaakuzhiminine.’
Ndamushimwina ati, umbona bobo ako kwizeulu kulakaba kusekelela cini cini ukaambo kashishibi womwi usanduka, kubaala bali makumi ifwuka ubatwesha bali ifwuka babo batazeezhiwa kusanduka.
“Natwaambe ati, umwi mukaintu kakwete mali a siliva ali ikumi, no ulacita buti kuti wazhimininwa ili lyomwi amali azo? Sa tasonsa ilambe, ukupeela muŋanda, u kukapula koonse bulyo mpaka aliyane?
Inzho aliyana uloompolola balongwaakwe boonse mbucibambene abo, ulabaambila ati, ‘Atusekelele antoomwi, kaambo ndalibona ili lyangu lyaakuzhiminine.’
Ndamushimwina ati, umbona bobo kulakaakuli kusekelela cini cini ku baanjelo baka Leza ukaambo kashishibi womwi wasanduka!”
Ulimwi Jeso wakaamba ati, “Kakuli muntu umwi wakaakukwete bana balombwana bobile.
Mucece wakamwaambila ushi ati, ‘Taata mpa lubono lweelele kuba lwangu.’ Ngoonaawo ushi wakalwaabanya lubono lwakwe ku banakwe bobile.
Nikwakaita mazuba mashoonto bulyo, mucece wakabika antoomwi lubono lwakwe, amane wabweza mushinzo wakuya ku cishi ca kulaale, koko nkwakaya kulusangaula lubono lwakwe loonse mu shintu shabulimbushi.
Inzho naakamana kulusangaula lubono lwakwe, kwakaba inzala inkando mucishi coonse ceco, ubobo wakakanka kupenga.
Wakaya kunjila mulimo ku muntu umwi wamucishi ceco kwaamba asebezele cakulya. Inzho muntu wezo wakamupa mulimo wakweembela ingulube.
Wezu mwana yakamuyaya inzala cakuti wakakanka kulikumbuzha masakalala amuunga akaakulya ingulube, kaambo kwiina muntu wakaakumupa cakulya.
Ku mamanino wakalitwelusha ati, basebezhi baka taata boonse balalya balakuta balalilecela, pele ume kono ndafwa inzala!
Inzho ndazhimuka ndukuya kwa taata, nkamwaambile ati, taata, ndabishizha Leza aze ndaakubishizha,
ubobo nsheelele kutewa ati ndimwanako, undele ukoya uumwi wabasebezhi bako.
Ngoonaawo wakazhimuka wabweela kwa ushi.
“Inzho naakaakwiza kacili alaale, ushi wakamubona, wakeetezhewa, wakamulukancila waya kumukumbata wamushonta ca kubotelwa.
Ngoonaawo mwanakwe wakamwaambila ushi ati, ‘Taata ndakabishizha Leza, ulimwi ndakakubishizha aze, nsheelele kutewa ati ndimwanako.’
Pele ushi waketa basebezhi bakwe wabaambila ati, ‘Amufwambaane! Kamuya mulete icanshi ibotu mumusamike, iinweenwe mumusamike, ulimwi mumusamike iimpato.
Inzho kamuya mukalete moombe mwiinu wamafwuta mumuyaye kwaamba tulye tusekelele.
Nkaambo wezu mwanangu kafwile pele wabuka, kazhiminine pele wabonwa.’ Ngoonaawo bakakanka kulya ipobwe u kusecelela.
“Ku ciindi ceco mwanakwe mukando kali ku muunda. Naakazhoka, ashike afwaafwi iiŋanda wakateelela bantu balaimba ukuzhana ukuulubwizha.
Ubobo wakoompolola musebezhi umwi wakamubuzha cakaakucitika.
Musebezhi wakamwiingula ati, ‘Munyoko wazhoka, uso wamuyayila moombe mwiinu wamafwuta, wabotelwa kaambo mwanakwe wazhoka mumi.’
Pele mukando wakabiilwa wakaka kunjila muŋanda. Ngoonaawo ushi wakahwa ansengwe kuya kumupembelezha kwaamba anjile.

Walo wakamwaambila ushi ati, ‘Taata bona! Myaka yezhi yoonse minji minji njindakusebezela ukoya muzhice. Ndiina indaakaka malailile ako nibuba buzuba bomwi. No ncinzhi ncuumpele? Kwiina niwakampa nikaba kapongo bulyo kakwaamba tulye ubalongwaangu!
Pele mbwaashicila bulyo wezu mwanako wakaya kuzonauna lubono lwako loonse ku bakaintu, wamuyayila moombe mwiinu wamafwuta.’
Ushi wakamwiingula ati, ‘Mwanangu tuli aze mazuba oonse, shoonse nshinkwete nshako.
Pele ncibotu kwaamba tusekelele u kubotelwa bwasunu kaambo wezu munyoko kafwile inzho wabuka, kazhiminine inzho wabonwa.’”
Jeso wakabaambila ba shiciiya bakwe ati, “Kakuli muntu muhubi wakaakukwete mubanzhi walubono lwakwe. Muntu umwi wakamwaambila ati, wezo mubanzhi ulasangaula mali akwe,
ubobo wakamwita mubanzhi ukumubuzha ati, ‘No makaniinzhi aza ngundateelela? Pandulula kabotu kabotu lubono mbuwakalusebezha, kaambo ndazanda ukutanda amulimo.’
Inzho mubanzhi wakazeeza mu monzo wakwe ati, no ndacita buti? Shimatwangaangu ukalantanda mulimo. Ndiina insana shakulima, ulimwi ndikwete insoni kuya bulomba.
Ehe! Mbubolya mbwinkacita kwaamba ndatandwa amulimo bantu bakankwate kabotu mu maanda abo.
Ubobo wakakanka kwita bantu boonse bakaakukwete shikwelete kwa shimatwangaakwe. Kumutaanzhi wakamubuzha ati, ‘No uwe wakakweletaanzhi kwa shimatwangaangu?’
Wakaingula ati, ‘Ndakakweleta myaanda ili lusele yatungomo twamafwuta a oliva.’ Ngoonaawo wamwaambila ati, ‘Kwata ndileli ipepa lya shikwelete, lemba myaanda yone bulyo.’

Inzho wakabuzha uwabili ati, ‘No uwe wakakweletaanzhi?’ Aze wakamwiingula ati, ‘Ndakakweleta masaka ali mwaanda amaila.’ Wakamwaambila ati, ‘Ndileli ipepa lya shikwelete, kala anshi ulembe bulyo masaka ali makumi lusele amaila.’
Shimatwangaakwe abone bobo wakamweensheensha mubanzhi wezo utashomeki, kaambo wakacita ca busongo. Bantu baanshi ano balikwete busongo kucita shintu shitaluleme kubaala bantu ba mumuni.
“Ndamushimwina ati, amulicitile milongo yalubono lwaano anshi kwiita mukucita shitaluleme, kwaamba lubono lwakamana mukatambulwe mu muŋanda iteeli.
Kufwumbwa muntu uushomeka ku shintu shishoonto, ulashomeka u kushintu shikando, wezo uutashomeki mu shintu shishoonto, tashomeki u kushintu shikando.
Ubobo kuti tamushomeki kulubono lwaano anshi, no nguni ukaamushoma u kumupa lubono lwini lwini?
Ulimwi kuti kamutashomeki mukweendelezha lubono lwabeni, no nguni ukaamupa lwenu?
Ba Falisi nibaakateelela aza makani, bakakanka kumuwelela Jeso kaambo kabaafwini mali.
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Umwe mulazanda kulilulamika kumenso abantu, pele Leza uliizhi myonzo yenu. Nkaambo shesho nshimweensheensha shikwete impuwo akati ka bantu, ukwa Leza nshisesemyo.
Pele ncuubauba kwaamba izeulu iinshi shimane kubaala kwaamba kabala komwi ka mulawo kakushiwe.”
“Kakuli muntu muhubi wakaakusama shisani shibotu shidula, ulimwi kalya kabotu mazuba oonse kakwiina cimupenzha.
Ulimwi kakuli mulombwana mupushi, izhina lyakwe kali Lazalo, kakwete shilonda mubili oonse, wakaakuletwa lyoonse ku mulyango wa muntu muhubi,
wakaakulanjila kulya bufwefwelenga bwakaakuwila etebulu lya muhubi wezo, abo babwa kabeza kumaansha shilonda shakwe.
“Inzho wezu mulombwana mupushi wakafwa, baanjelo bakamubweza bamubika u matashi aka Abulahamu. Munshi aze muhubi wakafwa, wakazhikwa.
Inzho wakaliyana ati uli mu mulilo uteeli, wakaba mu mapenzhi makando. Nakasansula menso, wakabona Abulahamu alaale, u Lazalo bali aze afwaafwi.
Ngoonaawo wakoompolola ati, ‘Taata Abulahamu, mfwila luse, tuma Lazalo kwaamba acompe munwe wakwe mu meenzhi kwaamba antontozhe amulaka, kaambo ndapiya mono mwibangabanga lya mulilo.’

Pele Abulahamu wakamwiingula ati, ‘Mwanangu zhibaluka kwaamba niwakaakucili mumi, wakatambula shibotu shako shoonse, aze Lazalo wakatambula shibiyabi, pele ninzho walikalila kwiina cimupenzha, uwe wenjila mwipenzhi ikando.
Ulimwi akati kesu, kulibicilwe ilambwe ilamfwu kwaamba kutabi muntu uulanduka kuhwa kono kwiza koko, naaba muntu uhwa koko kwiza kono nkutubele.’
Muntu muhubi wakaamba ati, ‘Taata ndakulomba kwaamba umutume Lazalo kuŋanda ya taata,
kaambo ndikwete bakwesu bosanwe akabacenjezhe kwaamba balo batakezi kono kubusena bwa mapenzhi.’
Abulahamu wakamwiingula ati, ‘banyoko balikwete Malembe aka Mozesi, umalembe a bashinshimi, nabaateelele nshaamba.’
Muntu muhubi wakaamba ati, ‘Pe pe taata Abulahamu! Kuti kwatumwa umwi kuhwa ku bafwu balakabeba.’
Pele Abulahamu wakamwiingula ati, ‘Na kuti tabateeleli nshaamba maŋwalu aka Mozesi u bashinshimi, tabakahumina nikuba kuti umwi wabuka ku bafwu.’”
Jeso wakabaambila ba shiciiya bakwe ati, “Kulakaba imfwumpu shipa kwaamba muntu abishe, pele mapenzhi kuli wezo uushileta!
Cilabota kwaamba wezo waangwa iikangabwe munshingo ukuwaalwa mu lwaatele, kubaala kuti amfumpuzhe umwi akati kabana bashoonto.
Amucenjele!
“Kuti munyoko wakubishizha, umutapatile, na kuti wabeba mulekelele.
Na kuti wakubishizha shiindi shili ciloba mu buzuba bomwi, amana uleza kwako shiindi shili ciloba kwaamba ndabisha, ulyeelele kumulekelela.”
Batumwa bakamwaambila Mwami Jeso ati, “Luhuzhe lushomo lwesu!”
Mwami wakabaingula ati, “Kuti lushomo lwenu nilwaakwiingaine ukasece kamasitadi nimwaakulozha kwaambila ibuzu leli ati, ‘Zhuka awa ushimpikilwe mu lwaatele,’ lilakonzha kumuteelela.”
“Kuti muntu umwi akati kenu kakwete musebezhi ulima mu muunda na uyembela imbelele. Ciindi naakotoka kuhwa ku muunda, sa ulamwaambila ati, fwambaana bweza cakulya ulye?
Pe pe! Pele ulamwaambila ati, ‘Sama kabotu umfwutaucile cakulalila, unsenjelele ndye u kunwa, ndamana kulyaaze nuukalya u kunwa.’
Sa musebezhi ulalumbwa kuti wacita ceco ncaambilwa kucita?
Mbubona bobo amwe kuti mwacita nshimwaambilwa kucita shoonse, kamwaamba ati, ‘Tatweelele kulumbwa tuli basebezhi bulyo, twacita ceco ncitwaakweelele kucita.’”
Inzho Jeso naakaakuya ku Jelusalemu wakaita munyinza ya Samaliya u Galilaya.
Ucinjila bulyo mu munzhi umwi, wakaswaanganya bashicinsenda bali ikumi. Bakazhima ansansa,
boompolola ati, “Mwami Jeso! Tufwile luse!”
Nibakaakuya bweenda bakapona.
Umwi akati kabo naakabona ati wapona, wakapiluka kwa Jeso ulaya butembaula Leza ca kupozomoka.
Naakashika kwa Jeso, wakafwukama wamulumba. Wezu shicinsenda kali mu Samaliya.
Jeso wakamubuzha ati, “Inta ndaponya bali ikumi, no bali ifwuka balikwi?
No kaamboonzhi nikweza bulyo wezu muhwamashi kulumba Leza?”
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Zhimuka koya kaambo washoma, lushomo lwako lwakuponya.”
Bamwi ba Falisi bakamubuzha Jeso ati, “No Bwami bwa Leza bulakashika liliye?” Aze wakabaingula ati, “Bwami bwa Leza tabulibonya nibushika, tabuli bwakuyowaila pe.
Kwiina ukakaamba ati, ‘Amulange mbubobu bwashika,’ na ati, ‘Mbubolya kolya,’ kaambo Bwami bwa Leza buli akati kenu.”
Inzho wakabaambila ba shiciiya bakwe ati, “Cilakashika ciindi ncimukaabilaana kubona nibuba bulyo bomwi buzuba bwamazuba a Mwanaa Muntu, pele tamukabuboni.
Kulakaba bantu bakakamwaambila ati, ‘Amulange nguwelya kolya,’ na ati, ‘Kamwiza nguweno kono!’ Mutakayi kukapula pe.
Nkaambo mbubona mbulucita lulabo, lwalaba kuluya lumwi, lulamweka kuya kushika kuluya lumwi, mbubona bobo mbubukaaba buzuba bwa kwiza kwangu ume ndi Mwanaa Muntu.
Pele Mwanaa Muntu ulyeelele kutaanguna kupenga mapenzhi manji manji, ukukakwa ku bantu baano mazuba.
Mbubona mbucakaakubele ku mazuba aka Nowa, mbukukaaba ukumazuba a Mwanaa Muntu.
Ku mazuba azo, bantu kabalya u kunwa, kabatwala ukutwazhiwa kushicila buzuba Nowa nakenjila mu bwato, u meenzhi nakashika ukubazonauna.
Ulimwi mbubona mbucakaakubele ku mazuba aka Loti, bantu kabalya u kunwa, kabaula ukuuzha, kushanga ukuzaka maanda.
Mu buzuba Loti nakahwa mu Sodoma, kwizeulu kwakawa mulilo wa mushili wakabazonauna boonse.
Mbubona bobo mbukukaaba mu buzuba bwangu ume ndi Mwanaa Muntu.
Amuzhibaluke muka Loti!
Kufwumbwa muntu uzanda kufwutula bumi bwakwe ulabusowa, pele wezo uusowa bumi bwakwe ukaambo kangu ulakabunununa.
Ndamushimwina ati, mashiku azo ngoona, kulakaba bantu bobile bakaayanwa balilele abulo bomwi, umwi ulakatolwa, umwi ulakashaala.
Bakaintu bobile balakayanwa balazhiya antoomwi, umwi ulakatolwa, umwi ulakashaala.
Balombwana bobile balakayanwa bali mu muunda, umwi ulakatolwa, umwi ulakashaala.”
Ba shiciiya bakamubuzha ati, “No nkukwi Mwami?” Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Koko kuli mutunta uba shikube nkubakaabungana.”
Inzho Jeso wakabaambila cikozhanyo cakubayiisha kwaamba ati balyeelele kukomba lyoonse bataakulengaana.
Wakabaambila ati, “Mu munzhi umwi kamuli mubeteshi wezo watakaakutiya Leza, ulimwi katalemeka bantu.
Mu munzhi wezo nguwena kamuli mukamufwu wakaakwiza kumubeteshi wezo kulyeenzelela ati, ‘Nkoswela kaambo kashimulanduma!’
Kwakaita ciindi cilamfwu mubeteshi wezu ulakaka, pele limwina, wakatweluka mu monzo waakwe ati, ‘Nikuba kwaamba ati nshimutiyi Leza, ulimwi nshilemeka muntu,
pele kaambo kakuti mukaintu wezu wansubula, ndamukoswela mulandu wakwe ndikalile, atampenzha linji.’”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Amuteelele mbwaamba wezu mubeteshi uutaluleme.
Sa Leza takonzha kubacitila shiluleme basale bakwe bamukwiilila muunza u mashiku kwaamba abayohwe? Ulimwi sa tafwambaani kubayohwa?
Ndamushimwina ati, ulakabakoswela twaambo twabo ca kufwambaana. Sa Mwanaa Muntu akashika ano anshi ulakayana lushomo?”
Ulimwi Jeso wakaamba cikozhanyo ceci ku bantu balishoma bululami kubaala bamwi.
Wakaamba ati, “Kakuli balombwana bobile bakaya muŋanda ya Leza kukomba. Umwi kali mu Falisi, umwi kali shimutelo.
Mu Falisi wakazhima wakomba ati, ‘Ndakulumba Leza nkaambo ume nshili ukoya bantu boonse bamwi, batashomeki, bashibutongo, bashimamambe, na ukoya wezu shimutelo.
Ndaliimya kulya shiindi shobile munsunda yomwi, ulimwi ndapa cekumi kuli shesho shoonse nshinjana.’
Pele shimutelo wakazhima ansansa, katalozha ukusansula menso kwizeulu, wakalikwata acamba waamba ati, ‘Leza mfwila luse ume, ndishishibi.’”

Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Ndamushimwina ati shimutelo wakabweela kwakwe ulilulamicilwe, pele mu Falisi wiina nakalulamikwa. Nkaambo kufwumbwa muntu uulisumpula ulakafwiinshiwa, pele wezo muntu uulifwiinsha ulakasumpulwa.”
Bantu bamwi bakaleta twana kwa Jeso kwaamba atukwate. Inzho ba shiciiya bakabalemanina babo bakaleta twana.
Pele Jeso wakabeta bana babo, waamba ati, “Amubaleke bana beze kwangu mutabakasha, nkaambo Bwami bwaka Leza mbubwabo bantu bali ukoya bana.
Cini cini ndamushimwina kwaamba oonse muntu utatambuli Bwami bwa Leza ukoya mwana takabunjili pe.”
Mweendelezhi waba Juda umwi wakamubuzha Jeso ati, “Mwiiyi mubotu, no nciteenzhi kwaamba njane bumi buteeli?”
Jeso wakamubuzha ati, “No wentilaanzhi ati mubotu? Kwiina mubotu cita Leza ice bulyo.
Uliizhi milawo yaamba ati, ‘Utabi shimamambe, utabi nuuyaya, utebi, utalenjelela umwi kaambo, lemeka uso u banoko.’”
Muntu wezo waingula ati, “Milawo yezhi yoonse ndeecilila kuhwa kubwana bwangu.”
Jeso nakateelela bobo, wakamwaambila ati, “Kuli comwi bulyo cisheele ncuuyelele kucita. Ukauzhe lubono lwako loonse, wamana mali ukaape bapushi, ulakayana lubono kwizeulu, wamana uzhize uncilile.”
Wezo muntu naakateelela bobo wakalyeetezha, kaambo kahubile cini cini.
Jeso wakamulanjilila waamba ati, “Ncizumu cini cini ku bantu bahubi kunjila mu Bwami bwaka Leza!
Ncuubauba kwaamba inkamela injile mukapulo kansonde kubaala muntu muhubi kunjila mu Bwami bwaka Leza.”
Bantu bakateelela ceci, bakamubuzha Jeso ati, “No nguni ukonzha kufwutulwa?”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Sheshi shintu shibakakila bantu, Leza tashimukakili.”
Pita wakaamba ati, “Langa! Uswe twakashiya maanda esu tulikucilile.”
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Cini cini ndamushimwina ati kufwumbwa muntu ukaashiya iŋanda yakwe, na mwinakwe u banina, nibaba bamuzhala, na banakwe ukaambo ka Bwami bwaka Leza,
ulakatambula shinji shinji muciindi ceno, muciindi ciza ulakatambula bumi buteeli.”
Inzho Jeso wakaambula ba shiciiya bakwe bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile wabaambila ati, “Amubone! Tulaya ku Jelusalemu, koko shoonse nshibakalemba bashinshimi sha Mwanaa Muntu nkushikaazuzucizhiwa.
Mwanaa Muntu ulakaabwa mu matashi abamashi, balakamusaalizha, bakamutuke ukumufwila mate.
Balakamukwipaula u kumuyaya, pele kubuzuba bwatatu ulakabuka.”
Inzho ba shiciiya kwiina niciba comwi ncibakateelela ku shintu sheshi. Bayina kucizhiba ncakaakwaamba Jeso.
Inzho Jeso nakashika afwaafwi u Jeliko, wakayana umwi muntu moofwu ulishite kumbali kunzhila ulakumbila.
Moofwu nakateelela bantu banji banji balaita, wakabuzha ati, “Ncinzhi cacitika?”
Bantu bakamwaambila ati, “Jeso waku Nanzaleta nguuyita.”
Ngoonaawo moofwu wakapozomoka ati, “Jeso! Mwanakwe Devidi! Mfwila luse!”
Bantu bakaakusolwele bakamulemanina ati, “Liinze uwe!” Walo wakabaazha ukupozomoka ati, “Akaka Mwanakwe Devidi mfwila luse!”
Inzho Jeso wakazhima, wabaambila bantu kwaamba bamulete moofwu kwakwe. Naakashika afwaafwi, Jeso wakamubuzha ati,
“No ulazanda ati nkucitileenzhi?” Moofwu wakaingula ati, “Mwami, ndazanda kubona ulimwi.”
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Bona! Lushomo lwako lwakuponya.”
Ngoonaawo wakacikonzha kubona, wacilila Jeso, ukutembaula Leza. Abo bantu nibakabona ceci bakamutembaula Leza.
Inzho Jeso wakanjila mu munzhi wa Jeliko, kali shikwiitilila.
Mu munzhi momu kamuli muntu wakaakuli mukando wabashimutelo, izhina lyakwe kali Zekiyasi. Ulimwi kali muntu muhubi.
Inzho wezu muntu kazanda kubona Jeso pele kaambo kakuhula kwa bantu, ulimwi ukaambo kakufwiimpa kwakwe, katakonzha kumubona
Ubobo wakalukancila kumbele, waliza mucisamu ca mukuzu cakaakuli kumbali kunzhila koko Jeso nkwakaakweelele kwiita.
Inzho Jeso naakashika abusena awo, wakalyaalala mwizeulu wamwaambila ati, “Zekiyasi seluka fwambaana, bwasunu ndyeelele kuya kukala muŋanda mwako.”
Zekiyasi wakaseluka ca kufwambaana, wamutambula ukumusansaucila Jeso.
Inzho bantu babone bobo, bakakanka kutongauka u kwaamba ati, “Amubone wezu muntu, wabaalila kuŋanda ya muntu shishibi.”

Zekiyasi wakazhimuka wamwaambila Mwami ati, “Teelela Mwami! Ndalwiita akati lubono lwangu, cimwi cipanzha ndacipa bapushi, ulimwi na kuli muntu ngundakananzha lubono calucengo, ndamuzholela lubono lwake shiindi shone.”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Ubwasunu lufwutuko lwashika muŋanda yezhi, kaambo aze wezu muntu ngwa luhubo lwaka Abulahamu.
Mwanaa Muntu wakeza kukapula ukufwutula bazhimini.”
Inzho bantu nibakaakucipupulala aza makani, Jeso wakaya kumbele kubaambila ucimwi cikozhano. Inzho kali afwaafwi kushika ku Jelusalemu, ulimwi bantu kabatelaika ati Bwami bwaka Leza bukalashika.
Wakabaambila ati, “Kakuli mulombwana wakaakulemekwa cini cini, wakabweza mushinzo wakuya ku cishi ca kulaale kuya kupewa bwami, amana akapiluce.
Katana kuzhimuka, waketa basebezhi bakwe bali ikumi wabapa ikumi lya mpondo shalubulo wabaambila ati, ‘Mwaapindauke mali aza kwaamba ndakazhoka nkayane impindu.’
Pele bashicishinina kabamuswile, ubobo mbwakaila bulyo bakatuma inkombe munshi lyakwe ati, ‘Uswe tatuzanda muntu wezo kwaamba abe mwami wesu.’”
“Inzho Kwiite ciindi cilamfwu shimatwangaabo wakapiluka, amane wakaboompolola basebezhi bakwe kwaamba bamupandululile mbubakaasebezha mali azo.
Mutaanzhi wakeza waamba ati, Mwami, ili lyako lyayana mali aamwi ali ikumi.”
Ngoonaawo wakamwaambila ati, “Wacita kabotu uli musebezhi mubotu! Inzho kaambo washomeka mucintu cishoonto, ndakubika kuba mweendelezhi waminzhi iili ikumi.”
Aze musebezhi wabili wakeza waamba ati, “Mwami mali ako ayana aanji ali osanwe.”
Mwami wakamwaambila ati, “Uwe ulaba mweendelezhi waminzhi yosanwe.”
Musebezhi wamamanino wakeza waamba ati, “Ndileli ili lyako, ndakalyaanga muntaulu ndaakulizobwele.
Ndakatiya kaambo uli muzumuzumu, ulabweza nciwatakabika, ulatebula nciwatakashanga.”
Mwami wakwe wakamwaambila ati, “Uwe umusebezhi mubiyabi! Ndakuzuzha u mazwi ako umukamwini. Mbuuzhi ati ndimuzumuzumu, ndabweza ncindatakabika, ukutebula ncindatakashanga,
no kaamboonzhi nciwatakaabicila mali aangu mwi banci? Kwaamba ciindi ninkaapiluka, ndakaya kwabweza nkayane apanga impindu.”
Ngoonaawo mwami wakabaambila bakaakuzhimine ambali ati, “Amumunanje ili mupe wezo uukwete ali ikumi.”
Balo bakaamba ati, “Mwami ulikwete kale mali ali ikumi.”
Mwami wakabaingula ati Ndamushimwina ati, “Muntu ukwete ulakazunjililwa, pele muntu ukwete kashoonto, ulakanangwa ukashoonto kako nkaakwete.
Inzho baba bashinkondoma batakaakuzanda kwaamba mbe mwami wabo, nombalete kono bayayiwe nduukubabwene.”
Jeso nakamana kwaamba bobo, wakasolola kuya ku Jelusalemu.
Naakashika afwaafwi u minzhi ya Betefage u Betani, ku lupili lwa masamu a Oliva, wakatuma ba shiciiya bakwe bobile.
Wabaambila ati, “Kamuya mu munzhi welya. Kumanjililo mulakayana mwana wa mbongolo uutanalizilwe umuntu, ulyaanjilwe ku cisamu, mukamwaangulule mumulete kono.
Na kuti kukabe muntu uukaamubuzha ati, no ncinzhi ncimumwaangulwila? Mukamwaambile ati, Mwami ulazanda kumusebezha.”
Inzho bakaya, kuyana mbubona mbwakabaambila Jeso.
Nibakaakwaangulula, bamukamwini bakababuzha ati, “Njaanzhi imbongolo njimwaangulula?”
Balo bakaingula ati, “Mwami ulazanda kwiisebezha.”
Ngoonaawo bakeetola kwa Jeso, bazala makoti abo ambongolo bamulizika Jeso.
Naakaakulizile ambongolo, ulaya bweenda kuya ku Jelusalemu, bantu bakazala makoti abo mumukwakwa.

Nakashika afwaafwi u Jelusalemu, awo mukwakwa nguwakukunkuluka alupili lwa masamu a oliva, yoonse inkamu yaba shiciiya bakwe yakakanka kusapwa, ukupozomoka balatembaula Leza kaambo ka milimo mikando njibakabona.
Bakaamba ati, “Ulikwete coolwe uzhiza mwizhina lya Mwami! Akube luumuno kwizeulu, u bulemu bube kwa Leza!”
Inzho bamwi ba Falisi bakaakuli munkamu ya bantu bakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Mwiiyi, baambile ba shiciiya bako baliinze.”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Ndamushimwina ati, kuti bantu baliinza, aza mabwe alakanka kupozomoka.”
Inzho Jeso naakashika afwaafwi mu munzhi wa Jelusalemu, naakoobona wakoolilila
wakaamba ati, “Akaka! Kuti niwaakwizhi bwasunu cikonzha kukuletela luumuno! Pele ninzho shilisesecelwe kulyuuwe.
Nikuba bobo alakashika mazuba ngukaabula coolwe, lelyo ba shinkondonoko nibakaakushila kalambwe kakakuzhinguluce, bakakubice akati ukushincilizha kumbahu shoonse ukabule mbuulikwabilila.
Ulimwi balakakuumbululila anshi uwe mu munzhi. Boonse bahwa mulyuuwe balakazonaunwa. Kwiina ibwe likashaala lilizhilicilwe ebwe nina, kaambo wiina kucizhiba ciindi Leza naakuzhile ukufwutula.”
Inzho Jeso wakanjila Muŋanda ya Leza wakanka kutanda babo bakakuuzhizha mo.
Wakabaambila ati, “Kulilembelwe mu maŋwalu ati, Iŋanda yangu ilaaba iŋanda yakukombela. Pele umwe mweecita cizubilo ca batewu.”
Pele bakeebula kaambo bantu boonse kabazanda kupupulala u kuteelela nshakaakwaamba Jeso.
Bumwi buzuba Jeso naakaakuyiisha bantu muŋanda ya Leza u kukambauka Makani Mabotu, bapaizhi bakando u balembi kubicilizha ubakando ba cishi, bakeza kwakwe
boombuzha ati, “Tushimwine, no ninsanaanzhi nshucisha shintu sheshi? No nguni wakakupa insana shesho?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Ame ndamubuzha mubuzho. Amuŋambile,
nguni wakamutuma Johani kupapatiza, ngu Leza na mbantu?”
Inzho bakakanka kubuzhanya beni ubeni ati, “Anu twaambe acani? Kuti twaambe ati ngu Leza wakamutuma, ulatubuzha ati, no kaamboonzhi mwiina nimwakamushoma?
Pele kuti twaambe ati, lwakahwa ku bantu, bantu boonse baba balatuuma mabwe, kaambo balizhi ati Johani kali mushinshimi.”
Ubobo bakamwiingula ati, “Tatumwizhi wakamutuma.”
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Ame nshimushimwini wakampa insana shincisha sheshi.”
Nicakashika ciindi ca kutebula misaansa, wezo muntu wakatuma musebezhi ku balimi babo kwaamba bamupe aze mwaabilo wakwe. Pele balimi bakamuuma musebezhi wezo ukumutanda cinkambaminwe.
Kuhwaawo wakatuma uumwi musebezhi ku balimi kwaamba bamupe micelo, aze bakamuuma bamutubulusha bamutanda cinkambaminwe.
Ulimwi wakatuma musebezhi watatu, wezu walo bakamuyasa bamusowela kunze ku muunda.
Inzho mukamwini muunda wa masaansa wakaamba ati, no ndacita buti? Ndatuma mwanangu nakufwunwa ambweni balakamulemeka!
Pele balimi nibakamubona bakalihwiya ati, nguwezu shimulyazhina, atumuyaye kwaamba muunda ube wesu!
Ubobo bakamuyaya bamusowela kunze ku muunda wa masaansa.”
Jeso wakababuzha ati, “No mukamwini muunda ulabacita buti bantu babo?
Ulakeza kubayaya balimi u kupa bantu banji muunda wakwe wa masaansa.”
Bantu nibakateelela bobo bakaamba ati, “Pe pe kutabi bobo!”
“Ibwe ndibakasowa bazashi,
lyaba ndiibwe lizandika lya mucooko ca ŋanda, cilapandululaanzhi?
“Kufwumbwa muntu uukaawila ebwe leli ulaacokauka, ulimwi muntu ngulikaawila ibwe leli lilakamupondaula.”
Inzho balembi u bapaizhi bakando bakasoleka kwaamba bamukwate Jeso awo ngoona, kaambo bakezhiba ati mbaakaakukumbilizha mucikozhano ceci, pele bakatiya bantu.
Ubobo bakakanka kumoongelezha kwaamba bayane ciindi cakumukwata. Bakatuma bantu bashikoopoopa amenso kumulingalinga mu twaambo kwaamba bamukwashe ukumubetesha kunkuta ya mweendelezhi.
Baba bantu bakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Mwiiyi, tulizhi ati uwe ulaamba u kuyiisha shiluleme. Ulimwi tulanga cimo uciwa ca muntu, pele ulayiisha inzhila ya lushinizho.
Twaambile, sa tulyeelele kutela mutelo ku muleli mukando waku Loma na pe?”
Jeso wakaazhiba maanu abo, ngoonaawo wakabaambila ati,
“Amuntondezhe ili. No cikozhano ceci izhina leli nshakani?” Bakamwiingula ati, “Nshaka Kaizala waku Loma.”
Inzho wakabaingula ati, “Cabota! Amupe muleli mukando waku Loma shintu shakwe, ulimwi amupe Leza shinakwakwe.”
Inzho bakakacilwa kumuyanina kaambo kakumubetesha, ubobo bakaliinza bulyo, kwiingula kwakwe kwakabazoosha.
“Mwiiyi, Mozesi wakatulembela mulawo waamba ati, kuti munyoko wafwa katwele mukaintu pele wiina kuzhala bana, munina ulyeelele kumukona mukamufwu kwaamba amuzhalile bana mufwu.
Inzho kakuli babunina mu lushomo bali ciloba, mukando wabo wakatwala mukaintu pele wakafwa katana kuzhala mwana.
Uumucilila wakamukona mukamufwu,
ulimwi uwatatu mbubona, pele aze wakafwa. Kabaya bufwa boonse mpaka kushicila kuli wa ciloba, kabatashiyi bana.
Ku mamanino aze mukaintu wakafwa.
Inzho bwakashika buzuba bafwu mbubakaabushiwa, wezu mukaintu ulakaba mukani?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Balombwana u bakaintu baano mazuba balatwalana,
pele babo boonse bakaatambulwa muciindi cizhiza, ukubushiwa ku bafwu, tabakatwali ulimwi tabakatwazhiwa.
Balakaba ukoya baanjelo, ulimwi tabakafwi linji pe. Balakaba bana baka Leza kaambo babuka kuhwa ku bafwu.
Aze Mozesi wakaamba kaanzambwene ati bafwu balakabushiwa. Nkaambo naakalemba makani a cisoko cizaka mulilo, wakamwaambila Mwami ati, Leza waka Abulahamu, Leza waka Aizeki, ulimwi u Leza waka Jakobo.
Ngu Leza wa bantu balanga tali Leza wa bantu bafwu, kaambo kumenso akwe boonse balalanga.”
Inzho balembi bamwi Bakaamba ati, “Koko nkwiingula kubotu mwiiyi!”
Ubobo bakatiya kumubuzha mibuzho iinji.
Jeso wakababuzha mubuzho ati. “No Bantu balaambilaanzhi ati, Munanike wa Leza ndunungu lwa Devidi?”
Nkaambo Devidi lwakwe mwini wakaamba mwibuka lya Ntembauzho ati,
“Mwami Leza wakaambila Mwami wangu ati,
‘Kala kululyo lwangu,
mpaka nkabice ba shinkondonoko kwaamba cibe cilyatilo ca matende ako.’
Bolya Devidi mbwakamwaamba ati, ‘Mwami.’” No ulakonzha buti kuba mwanakwe?
Inzho boonse bantu nibakaakupupulele Jeso wakabaambila ba shiciiya bakwe ati,

“Amubacenjelele balembi, babo bazanda kweendeenda balisamine masani malamfwu. Ulimwi balifwini kwaanzhiwa ca bulemu mu shisambalilo, u kusala shuuna shibotu mushikombelo shaba Juda, u masena a bulemu mu mapobwe.
Balacenga bamuka bafwu ukubananga maanda abo. Ulimwi balazanda kucita mambonwa ku bantu kwiita mu kukomba shikombyo shilamfwu. Leza ulakabapa cibebyo cibaala kubiya!”
Inzho Jeso wakabona bantu bahubi balabika mali mucizobwelo.
Ulimwi wakabona mukamufwu umwi wakaakuli mupushi cini cini, wabika tuli tobile twamukuba.
Ngoonaawo wakaamba ati, “Ndamushimwina cini cini ati wezu mukamufwu mupushi wapa kubaala baba boonse babika.
Nkaambo bamwi babika tushoonto bulyo kuhwa ku shintu shinji shinji nshibahubile. Pele walo wezu mukamufwu mupushi wapa mali oonse ngaakukwete, ngaakushoma mu bumi bwakwe.”
Bamwi bantu bakaakwaamba makani aŋanda ya Leza, mbuyakaakuzacilwe u mabwe mabotu meebeshi, u shipo shibotu shizoosha shakaakupewa kwa Leza. Jeso wakaamba ati,
Cilakashika ciindi nikukaabula ibwe niliba lyomwi lizhilicilwe ebwe nina litakaaolomonwa, kuli sheshi shoonse nshimubwene.
Inzho bakamubuzha Jeso ati, “Mwiiyi, no ndililiye nishikaacitika? Ulimwi ncinzhi cikaaba citondezho ca ciindi nishikaacitika sheshi shoonse?”
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Amucenjele mutacengwa, kaambo balakeza bantu banji banji mwizhina lyangu baamba ati, ‘Ndime wezo.’ Ulimwi ati, ‘Ciindi cashika.’ Mutakabacilila.
Inzho mulakateelela inkondo umazwanga anshi yoonse, mutakatiyi. Sheshi shintu shilyeelele kwaamba shikataangune kucitika, pele tashaamba ati mamanino ashika pe pe.”
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Cishi cilakalwa u cishi nina, bwami bulakalwa u bwami nina.
Kulakaba kuzungaana kwanshi mu masena andeene andeene, ulimwi kulakaba inzala u malwazhi inshi yoonse, kulakaba shintu shizoosha ushitondezho shikando shitizha kuhwa mwizeulu.
Pele kashitana kucitika shoonse sheshi, mulakaangwa u kupenzhewa, mulakatolwa kuya kubetekwa mu shikombelo shaba Juda, u kumubika muntolongo, mulakatolwa kubami ukubeendelezhi ukaambo kangu.
Inzho ceci cilakaba nciciindi cenu cakushimwina bantu Makani Mabotu.
Mutakapengi mu mizeezo kwaamba ati no tulalikwabilila buti?
Nkaambo ndakamupa mazwi u busongo kwaamba kutakabi naaba womwi wabashinkondonokwenu ukaamukazha ncimukakaamba.
Mulakaabwa ubazhali benu, u banyokwenu, ubanyokokwenu boonse, u balongweenu, ulimwi bamwi benu balakayayiwa.
Bantu boonse balakamusula ukaambo kangu.
Pele nikuba bobo kwiina nikaba kasusu komwi kati kakazhimine kuhwa kumitwi yenu.
Amukwatishe muzume, kaambo bobo mbumukonzha kulihuna.”
Pele mwakabona ati munzhi wa Jelusalemu wazhingulukwa u bashikalumamba, inzho amuzhibe ati uli afwaafwi kuzonaunwa.
Ubobo, babo bali mucishi ca Judiya balyeelele kulukancila mu mapili, abo bali mu Jelusalemu balyeelele kumuhwa, bali mu myuunda batakabweela mu Jelusalemu.
Nkaambo aza alakaba “Mazuba a cisubulo,” Kwaamba cilembelwe mu maŋwalu cizuzucizhiwe.
Mulakapenga umwe nubakaintu bamishi ubanonsha ku mazuba azo! Kulakaba mapenzhi atanabwenwe anshi yezhi. Leza ulakabapa cibebyo bantu.
Bamwi balakayayiwa u maceba bamwi balakatolwa buzhice ku bantu bakunze, Jelusalemu ulakalyataukwa kushicila ciindi cabo bakunze cikazuzucizhiwe.
Bantu balakawizuka ku bukandu nibalindila kubona ceco cizanda kushika anshi yeno yoonse. Insana sha kwizeulu shilakazungaana.
Inzho balakoombona Mwanaa Muntu uleza mu makumbi insana u bulemu.
Sheshi shintu mwakashibona shakanka kucitika, mukalanje mwizeulu, nkukuti kufwutuka kwenu kwaba afwaafwi.
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakabaambila cikozhano ceci ati, “Amutelaike bukuzu u masamu amwi oonse.
Mwabona ati matuhu akanka kusonsa mulazhiba kwaamba ati mainza ali afwaafwi.
Mbubona bobo mwakabona kwaamba shintu sheshi shacitika, amuzhibe ati Bwami bwa Leza buli afwaafwi.
“Cini cini ndamushimwina ati, shintu sheshi shoonse shilakacitika izhalane leli kalitana kumana kufwa.
Izeulu iinshi shilakamana, pele mazwi angu taakamana.”
“Amukale mulilibambile, myonzo yenu itaakutuntaanina bulyo kulya u kunwa, u shintu shoonse shaano anshi, kaambo buzuba bobu bukalakamuyana tamulibambile.
Kwiza kwa buzuba bobu kulakaba ukoya kooze kateye, kalakafwisuka ukukwasha bantu boonse ano anshi.
Amukale mulilibambile u kukomba ciindi coonse kwaamba mukayane insana shakumwiisha mu shintu shoonse sheshi shikaacitika, ukuzhima ku bushu bwa Mwanaa Muntu.”
Inzho bantu boonse kabafwuma kuŋanda ya Leza kuya kumuteelela.
Bapaizhi bakando u balembi bakakapula inzhila yakumuyaya Jeso cakuseseka nkaambo kabatiya bantu ati balaleta lupyopyongano.
Inzho Shaatani wakamunjila Judasi wakaakutewa ati Shikaliyoti, walo wakaakuli umwi wa babo bakakuli ikumi ubatwesha bobile.
Ubobo Judasi wakaya kwaamba bakateelezhanye mbwaakaamwaaba Jeso ku bapaizhi bakando, ubalindizhi ba ŋanda ya Leza.
Abo bakabotelwa, ukuteelezhanya kwaamba bamulipile mali.
Judasi wakahumina u kukanka kukapula ciindi cibotu cakumwaaba Jeso ukwiina ubwene.
Buzuba bwakashika bwakulya ipobwe lya cinkwa ciina bumena, lelyo twana twa mbelele twepobwe lya Kwiitilila nitwakaakuyayiwa.
Ubobo Jeso wakabatuma ba Pita u Johani, ukubalailila ati, “Kamuya mukabambe mulalilo wesu we pobwe lya kwiitilila
Bakamubuzha ati, “No nkukwi nkuuzanda ati tukalibambile nkuko?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Mwakenjila mu Jelusalemu, mulakaswaanganya mulombwana uzemwine intesho ya meenzhi. Amukamucilile mukanjile muŋanda mwaakeenjila,
mwamana mukamwaambile ati, Mwiiyi waamba ati, ‘No njilikwi iŋanda momo munkaalila ipobwe lya kwiitilila u ba shiciiya bangu?’
Ulakamutondezha iŋanda inkando ya mwizeulu umuli shintu shizandika, mumomo mumukaabambila.”
Inzho bakaya bakayana shintu shoonse nshibambe umbona mbwaakabaambila Jeso, ngoonaawo bakakanka kulibambila ipobwe lya kwiitilila.
Ciindi nicakashika cakulya ipobwe lya Kwiitilila Jeso wakakala abusena bwakwe etebulu, antoomwi u batumwa bakwe bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile.
Amane wakabaambila ati, “Ndaakuzandisha cini cini kulya amwe cakulya ceci ce pobwe lya Kwiitilila ncitana kunjila u mapenzhi.
Ulimwi ndamwaambila ati camana ceci, nshikalyi linji Ipobwe ano anshi mpaka likazuzucizhiwe mu bwami bwa Leza.”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakabweza inkapu, wamulumba Leza amane wabaambila ati, “Amubweze yezhi inkapu mwaabane akati kenu.
Nkaambo kuhwa ninzho nshikanwi linji mucelo uwamusaansa cita bwami bwa Leza bukashice.”
Amane wakabweza cinkwa, wapa kulumba kwa Leza, wacikomauna amane waamba ati, “Wezu ngu mubili wangu ngumwapewa, kamucita bolya lyoonse kuzhibaluka ume.”
Muciyanza ncicona ceci wakabapa inkapu nibakamana kulalila waamba ati, “Yezhi inkapu ncicihuminano cipiya ca bulowa bwangu, bwakatika ukaambo kenu.
Mwanaa Muntu ulakafwa umbona mbuli mbwaakacizanda Leza. Pele ulakapenga wezo ukaamwaaba!”
Ubobo ba shiciiya bakakanka kubuzhanya mulwabo ati, nguni akati kesu ukonzha kucicita ceci?
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Bami ba bantu bakunze balalela bantu babo kakomokomo, abo baleli balazanda kulumbaizhiwa ukutewa ati ‘Mbeenzhiina u bantu.’
Pele taceelele kuba bobo kuli umwe pe, mukando akati kenu alizhole anshi kubaala bantu boonse, ulimwi abe mutwanga wenu.
Nguuliye mukando, usengela, na ukala etebulu ukusengelelwa? Nguwezo uusengelelwa u kulya. Pele ume ndili ukoya mutwanga wenu usenjela.
“Mwakala ame mu masukusho aangu oonse.
Ubobo mbubona Taata mbwaakampa bwami, ame ndamupa insana shabulelo.
Mulakalya u kunwa etebulu lyangu mu bwami bwangu, ulimwi mulakakala a shuuna sha bwami u kubeteka mishobo iili ikumi uyobile ya Izilaili.”
“Saimoni, Saimoni, Shaatani wahumizhiwa kwaamba amuululule, ukoya mulimi mbwaawululula bungu kuhwa ku maila.
Pele ndakukombela kwaamba lushomo lwako lutamana. Wakasanduka mu monzo wako, ukabazumye zumye banyoko.”
Pita wakaingula ati, “Mwami ndilibambile kuya aze kuntolongo, nikuba ku lufwu.”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Ndakwaambila Pita, mukombwe katana kulila shiindi shotatwe aza mashiku, ulaakuntamine kale shiindi shotatwe ati twinzhi.”
Bakaingula ati, “Kwiina niciba comwi ncitwakabula.”
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Pele inzho ndamwaambila ati, wezo ukwete cikwama naa inkomo ebweze etolelezhe, u wezo wiina iceba auzhe cisani cakwe kwaamba aule iceba.
Nkaambo ndamwaambila ati, Malembe alaamba ati, ‘Wakabalilwa antoomwi u bashishibi.’ Azo alyeelele kwaamba ngazuzucizhe. Nkaambo coonse cakalembwa ukaambo kangu cilazuzucizhiwa.”
Ba shiciiya bakamwita ati, “Inta Mwami ngaaza maceba obile tulikwete!”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Imbubo kwazulila.”
Jeso wakamuhwa mu munzhi waya ku lupili lwa masamu a Oliva umbona mbwaakaakucita lyoonse, wakaya antoomwi u ba shiciiya bakwe.
Naakashika kubusena bobo, wakabaambila ati, “Amukombe kwaamba atamuzundi masukusho.”
Amane wakabashiya weenda bukulo bufwaafwi aashika ibwe walifwusa, wakotama wakomba,
waamba ati, “Taata, naa cilakonzheka ikushe inkapu yezhi yamapenzhi. Pele nikuba bobo kutabi kuzanda kwangu, akube kuzanda kwako.”
Awo ngoona anjelo wakeza kwakwe kuhwa kwizeulu kwiza kumuzumya zumya.
Inzho kaambo kepenzhi lyakaakumukwete ku monzo, wakakomba cini cini, wakanka kuhwa ibe lyakasweka ukoya malondo abulowa.
Naakazhimuka awo ngaakaakukombela wakaya ku bashiciiya bakwe, wakayana baloona, myonzo yabo keekatele kaambo bakashimpilwa.
Wakababuzha ati, “No kaamboonzhi muloona? Amubuke mukombe kwaamba mutanjili mu masunko.”
Inzho Jeso naakaakucikanana, inkamu yakashika uliisolwezhe Judasi, wakaakuli umwi wa babo bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile. Judasi wakaswena afwaafwi kwa Jeso, wamushonta.
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Judasi, saa wamwaaba Mwanaa Muntu kwiita mukumushonta?”
Inzho ba shiciiya nibakacibona cakaakuzanda kucitika bakamubuzha Jeso ati, “Sa Mwami ulazanda kwaamba tulwe u maceba?”
Ubobo umwi wabo wakakukosola kutwi kwa cilyo kwa musebezhi wa mupaizhi mukando.
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Mbubo amucileke ceci!” Amane wakakubweza koko kutwi kwa muntu wezo wamuponya.
Ngoona Jeso wakabaambila bapaizhi bakando, ubakando babalindizhi ba ŋanda ya Leza ubakando ba cishi babo bakeza kwiza kumukwata ati, “Nkamboonzhi mweza kunkwata u maceba iinkoli ukoya ndimutewu?
Ndakaakuli amwe muŋanda ya Leza mazuba oonse, pele mwiina nimwakasola kunkwata. Pele iinzho nciindi cenu cashika cakuti alele mwami wa mu mushinze.”
Bakamukwata Jeso bamutola kuŋanda ya mupaizhi mukando, aze Pita wakaakuya bucilila alaale.
Kakukuncilwe mulilo akati kalubanza, ubobo Pita wakakala kuzota u babo mbaakayana awo.
Umwi wabashimbi basebezhi naakamubona Pita ulazota mulilo wakamulangisha u kwaamba ati, “Wezu muntu aze kabali u Jeso!”
Pele Pita wakatama waamba ati, “Uwe mukaintu! Ume wezu muntu nshimwizhi pe!”
Cibe ciindi, umwi mulombwana naakamubona Pita wakaamba ati, “Uwe uli umwi wabo!”
Pita wakamwiingula ati, “Pe pe ume nshili wa babo pe!”
Ulimwi nikwakaita iwoola lyomwi, umwi muntu wakaamba cakushinizha ati, “Kwiina umubuzho, wezu muntu kabali antoomwi u Jeso, kaambo ngwakucishi ca Galilaya.”
Pele ulimwi Pita wakaamba ati, “Uwe ume azo makani nguuamba nsheezhi pe!”
Naakaakucaamba bobo Pita mukombwe wakalila.
Ngoonaawo Mwami Jeso wakacinduluka wamucebuka Pita ukumulangisha. Inzho Pita wakaazhibaluka mazwi ngaakaamba Mwami aakuti, ubwasunu mukombwe katana kulila ulaakuntamine shiindi shotatwe.
Pita wakahwa ansengwe walila cabulowe.
Inzho bantu bakaakumulindila Jeso bakamuseka ukumuuma.
Bakamuhumba kumenso, bamuuma ukumubuzha ati, “Shinshima! Nguni wakuuma?”
Ulimwi bakaamba shintu shinji shinji shakumutukana ukumusampula.
Nilyakapasula izuba, Bakando baba Juda u bapaizhi bakando u balembi bakakala antoomwi, bamane bakamuleta Jeso nkubabele.
Bakamubuzha ati, “Twaambile, saa uwe ndiwe Munanike waka Leza?”
Walo wakaamba ati, “Niinkamwaambila tamuhumina.
Ulimwi ndamubuzha mubuzho tamunyinguli.
Pele kuhwa bwasunu, ume ndi Mwanaa Muntu ndakakala kucilyo kwa Leza shinsana shoonse.”
Inzho bantu boonse bakaamba ati, “Nkukuti uli Mwanakwe Leza?” Walo wakaingula ati, “mwaamba ati ndime.”
Balo bakaamba ati, “Mbaanzhi bakamboni banji mbutucizanda! Uswe tubeni twaliteelelela nshaamba ku mulomo wakwe mwini.”
Boonse bantu banji banji bakazhimuka batola Jeso kwa Pilato.

Bakakanka kumutamicizha twaambo twakuti, “Twakamuyana ulalengaulila bantu wabasowa, kabaambila ati tabeelele kutela ku muleli mukando Kaizala waku Loma. Ulimwi kaamba ati walo mwini lwakwe ngu mwami munanike.”
Pilato wakamubuzha Jeso ati, “Sa ndiwe mwami waba Juda?”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Waamba.”
Ngoonaawo Pilato wakaambila bapaizhi bakando u bantu banji banji bakaakubungene ati, “Ndiina mulandu ngundamuyanina wezu muntu.”
Pele balo bakatatanana cini cini ati, “Wezu muntu ulapilinganya bantu, mucishi coonse ca Judiya injiisho yakwe. Wakakancila ku cishi ca Galilaya, inzho nguwezu washika ukono.”
Pilato nakateelela bobo wakabuzha ati, “Sa wezu muntu ngwakucishi ca Galilaya?”
Inzho naakazhiba ati Jeso kahwa kubusena bwa cishi bwakaakweendelezhiwa u Helodi, wakamutuma kwa Helodi kaambo kali mu Jelusalemu ku ciindi ceco.
Helodi wakabotelwa cini cini naakabona Jeso, kaambo wiina naakaakumubwene kateelele bulyo impuwo, pele nikuba bobo ku ciindi cilamfwu kazandisha kubona Jeso mbwaacita maleele.
Ubobo Helodi wakamubuzha Jeso mibuzho minjii minji, pele Jeso wiina nakaingula.
Inzho bapaizhi bakando u balembi bakeza afwaafwi bakakanka kumutamicizha twaambo tuzumuzumu.
Ngoonaawo Helodi u bashikalumamba bakamuseka Jeso ukumulimbusha. Bakamusamika cisani ucikobelo cilamfwu cibotu, bamane bakamubweezha kwa Pilato.
Bobu mbubuzuba ba Pilato u Helodi nibakakanka kuteelezhanya, lyoonse kabatazandana.
Pilato wakabunganya bapaizhi bakando, u beendelezhi ubashicishi boonse.

Inzho wakabaambila ati, “Mwakandetela muntu wezu u kwaamba ati ulapilinganya bantu ukubalengaulila ulimwi wabasowa. Pele ume indamoombolozha ku bushu bwenu, ndiina kumuyanina mulandu nuuba womwi kutwaambo ntumwamutamicizha.
U Helodi wiina kumuyanina mulandu ncamupilushizha kulyuuswe. Kwiina ncaakacita wezu muntu ceelele lufwu.
Ubobo ndamuumya bulyo tulusu, ndamana mwaangulule.”
Inzho kacili ciyanza ca Pilato kwaamba lyoonse cashika ciindi ce Pobwe lya Kwiitilila, kabakushizha mwaanje womwi.
Inkamu yoonse ya bantu yakapozomoka ati, “Wezu naafwe! Utwaangulwile Balabasi!”
Wezu Balabasi kali muntolongo kaambo kabupapyu umanyongwe akacitika mu munzhi, ulimwi u buyazhi.
Inzho Pilato mbwakaakuzanda kwangulula Jeso, wakabalomba bantu ulimwi.
Pele balo bakapozomoka ati, “Naakankaminwe aciciinkano! Naakankaminwe aciciinkano!”
Pilato wakabaambila bantu lwatatu ati, “No mulanduunzhi ngwaacita? Kwiina mulandu ngundamuyanina uyelele lufwu. Ubobo ulakwipaulwa bulyo amana alekwe.”
Pele bakapozomoka cini cini ati, “Naakankaminwe aciciinkano!” Inzho ku mamanino iyowe lyabo lyakazunda.
Pilato wakahumina cibakakupumpa.
Wakaangulula muntu ngubakaakuzanda, wezo wakabikwa muntolongo kabupapyu u buyazhi, wakabapa Jeso kwaamba bamucite mbubakaakuzanda.

Inzho bakamutola Jeso, pele nibakaakuya bweenda bakaswaanganya muntu wakaakuhwa kumatungu, izhina lyakwe kali Saimoni waku Kuleni, bakamukwata bamutwika ciciinkano kwaamba acizemune, Jeso kaya bweenda kumbele lyakwe.
Kakuli bantu banji banji bakaakuya bucilila munshi. Akati kabo kakuli bakaintu bakaakuya bulila ukumukwiilila.
Jeso wakabacebuka wabaambila ati, “Nubakaintu ba Jelusalemu! Mutandilila, amulilile nubeni u banenu.
Nkaambo alakashika mazuba bantu nibakakaamba ati, ‘Balikwete coolwe bakaintu babo batakazhala ukunonsha!
Inzho ceco cilakaba nciciindi ncibakakaambila mapili ati, amutuwile! Umalundu ati, amutusesece!’
Nkaambo kuti shintu sheshi shacitika kwangu ndicisamu citece, no cilakaba buti kwenu nushisamu shizumu?”
Inzho kakuli balombwana bamwi bobile bakaakuli bafwumpi, ubakatolwa kuyaiwa antoomwi u Jeso.
Nibakashika abusena butewa ati, “Kaanza” bakamukankamina Jeso aciciinkano, antoomwi ubafwumpi babo bobile, umwi kucilyo umwi kucimonsho.
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Taata balecelele kaambo tabacizhi ncibacita.”
Inzho bakaabana shakusama shakwe kwiita mukuuwala makakata.

Bantu banji banji kabazhimine ansansa baleebela, ciindi beendelezhi nibakaakuseka ukumusaalizha Jeso ati, “Wakabafwutula bantu banji, aze naalifwutule mwini tubone, na ngumunanice ngwaakashomezha Leza.”
bamwaambila ati, “Waakuli mwami waba Juda, lifwutule.”
Ulimwi ezeulu aciciinkano cakwe, kaalembelwe ati, “Nguwezu mwami waba Juda.”
Inzho umwi mufwumpi wakaakukankamininwe aciciinkano wakamutuka Jeso ati, “Sa uwe tuli munanike wa Leza? Lifwutule aswe utufwutule!”
Pele mufwumpinina wakamulemanina ati, “Sa uwe tumutiyi Leza? Toonse twapewa cibebyo cikozhene.
Uswe twapewa ceelele milimo yesu mibiyabi, pele wezu wiina ncaakabisha.”
Amane wakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Ukanzhibaluce Jeso wakezhiza mu Bwami bwako!”
Aze Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Cini cini ndakushimwina ati, ubwasunu tulaba aze mu paladaiso.”
Ngoonaawo cishitilizho ca muŋanda ya Leza cakaanduka akati.
Inzho Jeso wakapozomoka iizwi ikando ati, “Taata! Moza wangu ndoobika mu matashi ako!” Amane kwaamba bobo wakafwa.
Inzho shikalumamba naakabona cakacitika wakatembaula Leza waamba ati, “Cini cini wezu mulombwana kaluleme!”
Inzho bantu babo bakeza kweebela ceco cakaakucitika, bakabweela kuminzhi yabo kabaya bulyuuma ashamba shabo cakweetezhewa.
Boonse babo bakaakumwizhi kabotu Jeso, kubicilizha u bakaintu bakaakumucilile kuhwa ku Galilaya, kabazhimine ansansa baleebela shakaakucitika.
Inzho kakuli mulombwana utewa ati Jozefu wakaakuhwa ku munzhi wa Alimatiya mucishi ca Judiya. Kali muntu mubotu ulemekwa,
ulimwi wakakulanjila kushika kwa Bwami bwa Leza. Nikuba kuti kali uumwi wakabunga kabeendelezhi wiina naakahumizhanya abo mu mizeezo, umushintu nshibaakucita.
Wakaya kwa Pilato wakumbila mutunta waka Jeso.
Wakoowangula mubili aciciinkano woopopela mucisani cibotu, wootola waya kuuwoneka mu cuumbwe cakakololwa mwibwe, uciina nicakazhikwa muntu.
Bobu kabuli buzuba bwakulibambila kaambo buzuba bwa Sabata kabuli afwaafwi kushika.
Balya bakaintu ba Galilaya bakamushindikila Jeso, bakacilila Jozefu munuma kuya kubona mutunta wa Jeso nguwakazhikwa.
Inzho bakabweela ku munzhi kuya kubamba mafwuta aanunka kalonze akunanika mubili wa Jeso. Mu Sabata bakalyoocezha, kwiingaina u Mulawo.
Mu buzuba butaanzhi bwa nsunda cifwumo fwumo, bakaintu bakaya ku cuumbwe, bakabweza umafwuta aanunka kalonze ngubakaakubambile.
Bakayana ati ibwe lyakakushincilwe acuumbwe ndikunkulushe.
Ubobo bakanjila mu cuumbwe, pele bakayana ati mutunta wa Jeso kootemo.
Bacizhinjilwe ku makani aza, balombwana bobile basamine shikobelo shibeka beka bakeza kuzhima afwaafwi.
Bakaintu bakatiya cini cini, bakafwulama balanga anshi, balombwana babo bakababuzha ati, “No kaamboonzhi mulakapula mumi akati kabafwu?”
Temo mono wabuka! Amuzhibaluke mbwaakamushimwina naakucili mu Galilaya ati,
“Mwanaa Muntu ulyeelele kwaabwa mu matashi a bantu ba shishibi, ukuyayiwa aciciinkano, ulimwi mu buzuba bwatatu ulakabuka ku bafwu.”
Ngoonaawo bakaintu bakaazhibaluka mazwi akwe.
Inzho bakakuhwa ku cuumbwe kuya kushimwina ba shiciiya bakwe bali ikumi uutwesha womwi aza makani, u babo bamwi bakaakumucilila Jeso.
Bakaintu baba kabali ba Maliya Magadalena, u Joana u Maliya baina Jemusi. Inzho baba, u bakaintu bamwi mbucaakuli abo bakaya kukananina batumwa aza makani.
Batumwa bayina nibakaashoma makani aza, bakatelaika ati ntwaambo twa musalo wabakaintu.
Pele Pita wakazhimuka waalukancila ku cuumbwe. Naakashika wakasondela, wakabona bulyo shisani shakaakuputilwe mufwu. Wakabweela ku munzhi ulizhinjile kaambo ka ceco cakacitika.
Inzho mu buzuba bobo mbubona, balombwana bobile bakaakucilila Jeso, kabaya ku munzhi wa Emausi kuhwa ku Jelusalemu. Mushinzo wezu koolampa bamaile bali baliciloba uutwesha womwi.
Nibakaakuya bweenda munzhila kabaya bubandika makani akacitika mu Jelusalemu.
Nibakaakuya bweenda ukulya musalo, Jeso wakaposhoka, wabeenzha wakanka kuya bweenda abo.
Bakamubona pele bayina kumwizhiba.
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakababuzha ati, “Anu makaninzhi aza ngumuya bwaamba?”
Inzho bakazhima bamulanjilila balyeetezha.
Umwi wabo uutewa ati Kiliyopasi wakamubuzha ati, “Sa uwe ndiwe mweenzu ice nana mu Jelusalemu, utashizhi shintu shakacitika ano ngoona mazuba?”
Walo wakabuzha ati, “Anu nshintuunzhi?”
Bakamwiingula ati, “Shintu shakacitika kwa Jeso waku Nanzaleta. Wezu muntu kali mushinshimi mukando, ulimwi kayiisha u kucita milimo izoosha ku bushu bwa Leza uku bantu boonse.
Pele bapaizhi bakando u beendelezhi ba cishi, bakamwaaba kwaamba apewe mulandu wa lufwu, inzho wakakankaminwa aciciinkano.
Pele uswe twakaakushoma ati nguukaanununa ba Izilaili. Inzho bwasunu mbuzuba bwatatu kuhwa nicaacitika ceci.
Bamwi bakaintu ba munkamu yesu batunzhinga. Bafwuma kuya ku cuumbwe kaacishiyashiya anshi,
pele mutunta wakwe bayina kuuyana mu cuumbwe, nibapiluka baamba ati babona bulyo baanjelo babashimwina ati mumi.
Ulimwi bamwi bamunkamu yesu, kabayile ku cuumbwe bayana mbubona mbubaamba bakaintu, pele walo bayina kumubona.”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Umwe nubalimbushi! Umutafwambaani kuhumina shintu shoonse nshibakaamba bashinshimi.
Sa sheshi shintu kashiteelele kucitika ku Munanike wa Leza, kwaamba anjile mu bulemu bwakwe?”
Kuhwaawo Jeso wakabapandulwila shoonse shilembelwe mu maŋwalu shizeeme kwakwe. Kutalicila kumabuka ngaakalemba Mozesi kuya kushika kuli shesho nshibakalemba bashinshimi.
Nibakashika afwaafwi amunzhi ngubakaakuya, Jeso wakacita ukoya shikwiitilila,
pele balo bakamukasha baamba ati, “Utayi, bona kwashiya kale izuba lyebila katuya aŋanda.” Ngoonaawo wakayaabo amunzhi.
Nibakasengela cakulya, wakabweza cinkwa walumba kwa Leza amane wacikomona wabapa.
Inzho menso abo akayaluka, bakamuzhiba. Ngoonaawo wakazeluka bulyo waya cakutabonwa linji.
Inzho bakaamba beni ubeni ati, “Bwe! Sa mazwi akwe kaatatuyasi naakukanana munzhila, ciindi naakupandulula Malembe?”
Ngoonaawo bakazhimuka babweela ku Jelusalemu, nkubakaya kuyana batumwa bali ikumi uutwesha womwi balibungene antoomwi u bantu bamwi mbucaakuliaabo,
balabandika ati, “Cini cini Mwami wabuka! Saimoni Pita wamubona.”
Inzho u babo ba shiciiya bobile bakakanka kubapandulwila cakacitika munzhila, umbubakamuzhiba Jeso nakabakomwena cinkwa.
Nibakaakucipandulula aza makani, mwini Jeso wakazhima akati kabo ca shibulicila, wabaambila ati, “Luumuno alube amwe.”
Pele bakazoowa ukutiya cini cini, kaambo bakatelaika ati babona moza mubiyabi.
Inzho wakabaambila ati, “No mwapengaanzhi? Nkaamboonzhi ncimuzuluzha?
Amwaabone matashi umatende angu, ndime cacini cini. Amuŋampaampe muteelele ati ndime, kaambo moza mubiyabi wiina mubili ushifwuwa ukoya mbwiinkwete ume.”
Naakaakwaamba bobo wakabatondezha matashi umatende akwe.
Nikuba bobo bayina nibakahumina kaambo kalutangalo ukuzoowa, inzho wakababuzha ati, “Sa kwiina cakulya ano?”
Bakamupa citinka canswi inzoce.
Wakacibweza walya boonse balimulanjilile.

Ngoonaawo wakabaambila ati, “Sheshi inshisho shintu nshindakaakumwaambila lelya nindakakuli amwe, nkaambo shoonse shilembelwe mu Mulawo wa Mozesi, umalembe a bashinshimi, umu Ntembauzho, ushaamba ume shilyeelele kuzuzucizhiwa.”
Naakaamba bobo wakeeyalula mizeezo yabo kwaamba bateeleleshe Malembe ncaamba.
Wakabaambila ati, “Ceci ncicilembelwe ati, Munanike wa Leza ulyeelele kupenga u kubuka ku bafwu mu buzuba bwatatu,
ulimwi ati mwizhina lyakwe makani akusanduka u kulecelelwa kwa shibi akambaukwe ku bantu bamishobo yoonse kukancila mu Jelusalemu.
Umwe muli bakamboni ba shintu sheshi.
Ulimwi ume ndakamutumina ceco Taata ncakashomezha, pele mulyeelele kulindila mu munzhi mono mpaka insana shihwa kwizeulu shikashice ali umwe.”
Naakaakucibalonjezha wakaandaana abo, wakatolwa mwizeulu.
Inzho bakamukomba, bamane babweela ku Jelusalemu balibotelelwe cini cini mu myonzo.
Ciindi coonse kabanjila muŋanda ya Leza balatembaula Leza.
Ngaaza Malembe a mazhalane aka Jeso Kilisito wa luhubo lwaka Devidi lwakahwa kwa shaakale Abulahamu:
Abulahamu nguwakazhala Aizeki, aze Aizeki nguwakazhala Jakobo, Jakobo nguwakazhala Juda u banina,
Juda nguwakazhala ba Pelezi u Zela nokwabo katewa ati Tama, Pelezi nguwakazhala Heziloni, Heziloni, wakazhala Alamu,
Alamu wakazhala Aminadabu, Aminadabu wakazhala Nashoni, Nashoni wakazhala Salumoni,
Salumoni wakazhala Bowazi kwa Lahabu, aze Bowazi wakazhala Obedi kwa Lute, Obedi nguwakazhala Jesi,
aze Jesi wakazhala mwami Devidi. Devidi wakazhala Solomoni ku mukaintu waakuli muka Uliya,
Solomoni wakazhala Lehoboamu, Lehoboamu wakazhala Abija, Abija wakazhala Asa,
Asa wakazhala Jehoshafati, Jehoshafati wakazhala Jolamu, Jolamu wakazhala Uziya,
Uziya wakazhala Josamu, Josamu wakazhala Ahazi, Ahazi wakazhala Hezekiya,
Hezekiya wakazhala Manase, Manase wakazhala Amosi, Amosi wakazhala Josiya.
Josiya wakazhala Jekoniya u banina ku ciindi cabuzhice mu Babiloni.
Nibwakamana buzhice mu Babiloni Jekoniya wakazhala Shilutiyeli, Shilutiyeli wakazhala Zelubabeli,
Zelubabeli wakazhala Abiyudi, Abiyudi wakazhala Eliyakimu, Eliyakimu wakazhala Azo,
Azo wakazhala Zadoki, Zadoki wakazhala Akimu, Akimu wakazhala Eliudi,
Eliudi wakazhala Eliyeza, Eliyeza wakazhala Matani, Matani wakazhala Jakobo,
Jakobo wakazhala Jozefu mulumi Maliya wezo wakazhala Jeso uutewa ati Kilisito.

Nkukwaamba ati kaali mazhalane ali ikumi u mazhalane one antoomwi kuhwa kwa Abulahamu kushika kwa Devidi, Ulimwi kuhwa kwa Devidi kushika ku buzhice bwamu Babiloni kaali ikumi umazhalane one, ulimwi kakuli mazhalane ali ikumi umazhalane one kuhwa ku buzhice mu Babiloni kushika kukuzhalwa kwa Kilisito.
Ukaambo kakuti Jozefu mulumi kali muntu ululeme, wiina kuzanda kumusampula kaanzambwene, wakayana muzeezo wakumuleka kumabali buumwine.

Inzho naakaakucitelaika muzeezo wezu, ngoonaawo anjelo wa Leza wakeza kwakwe muciloto u kumwaambila ati, “Jozefu u mwanakwe Devidi, utatiyi kumutwala Maliya mwinako nkaambo ceco ncaamishi nca Moza Usalala.
Ulakazhala mwana mweembezhi ngukaaulika izhina lya Jeso,
Sheshi shoonse shakacitika kuzuzucizha ngaakaamba Mwami kwiita mu mushinshimi Aizaya aakuti,
“Nakalindu ulakemita, ulakazhala mwana mweembezhi ngubakaaulika ati ‘Imanuwelo’ calo caamba ati, ‘Leza uli aswe’”.
Naakabuka Jozefu wakacita ceco anjelo wa Leza ncaakalailila u kumukokola Maliya.
Pele bayina nibakaswaangana kushikila naakamuzhala mweembezhi amane wamuulika izhina ati ngu Jeso.
Jeso Kilisto wakazhalilwa mu munzhi wa Betelehemu mucishi ca Judiya, lyakaakulela mwami Helodi. Inzho ku Jelusalemu kwakashika balombwana basongo bakahwa kwiwe.
Nibakashika bakabuzha ati, “Ulikwi wezo wakazhalwa Mwami waba Juda? Nkaambo tweebona intongwezhi yakwe kwiwe, ubobo tweza kumukomba.”
Ateelele bobo mwami Helodi, wakapenga mu monzo cini cini ubamu Jelusalemu boonse.
Ngoonaawo wakababunganya bapaizhi bakando u balembi ba bantu, wakababuzha buzha koko nkwaakaakweelele kuzhalilwa Munanike wa Leza.
Bakamwaambila ati, “Mu Betelehemu mucishi ca Judiya nkaambo imbubo mbwaakalemba mushinshimi ati,
nikuba ati uli mushoonto akati kabeendelezhi bamu Juda,
nkaambo mulyuuwe mulakazhalwa mweendelezhi
uukaayembela bantu bangu ba Izilaili.’ ”
Ngoonaawo mwami Helodi wakabeta babo balombwana basongo kumabali ukubabuzha buzha intongwezhi nibakeebona.
Amane wakabatuma ku Betelehemu u malailile akuti, “Kamuya mukamukapule kabotu mwana, mwakamuyana mwize muŋambile kwaamba ame nkamukombe.”
Inzho nibakateelela bobo bakaya, ngoonaawo intongwezhi njibakaakubwene kwiwe yakeendela kumbele mpaka mwini niyakaya kuzhima awo akaakuli mwana.
Intongwezhi niyakazhima awo bakabotelwa cini cini.
Nibakanjila muŋanda bakamuyana Mwana u Maliya baina, ngoonaawo bakafwukama ukumukomba. Bamane bakashiyalula shizobwelo shabo bapa shipo sha goludi u fulankinsensi u mila.
Leza wakabacenjezha muciloto kwaamba batabweela kwa Helodi ubobo nibakapiluka kubanamuzhaabo bakaita inzhila iinji.

Inzho balombwana basongo nibakapiluka, anjelo wa Leza wakalibonya kwa Jozefu muciloto ulamulailila ati, “Zhimuka umuloboshe mwana u baina kuya ku Ijipiti, kushikila nkakwaambile, nkaambo Helodi ulazanda kumuyaya mwana.”
Ngoonaawo wakazhimuka wamutola mwana u baina ciindi ca mashiku, waya ku Ijipiti.
Wakakala koko kushikila naakafwa Helodi. Ceci cakacitwa kuzuzucizha bwakaamba Leza kwiita mu mushinshimi ati, “Ndakamoompolola mwanangu kuhwa mu Ijipiti.”

Helodi naakabona ati babo balombwana basongo bamucenga, wakalemana cini cini. Ngoonaawo wakalailila ati kuyaiwe bana beembezhi bakwete myaka yobile kuzhoka anshi bamu Betelehemu u masena aazhingulucile. Yezhi myaka yakeendelana u ciindi ceco nakateelela makani akamwaambila bolombwana basongo kukwatilizha intongwezhi yakabonwa.
Munzhila yezhi, akaba meni meni akaamba mushinshimi Jelemiya aakuti,
Ngu Lacelo ulalila banakwe, wakaka kusoozhewa nkaambo banakwe tabaciko.”
Inzho Helodi naakafwa anjelo wa Leza, wakalibonya muciloto kwa Jozefu mu Ijipiti,
ulaamba ati, “Buka umutole mwana u baina ku cishi ca Izilaili, nkaambo babo bakaakuzanda kumuyaya mwana bakafwa.”
Ubobo Jozefu wakamutola mwana u baina, bakapiluka ku Izilaili.
Pele Jozefu naakateelela ati Akelausi nguwakalya izhina lya Helodi ushi, mwami wamu Judiya, wakafwa bukandu kuya koko. Leza wakamupa malailile aanji muciloto, ubobo wakaya mucishi ca Galilaya.
Ashike wakakala mu munzhi wa Nanzaleta. Ubobo makani aakaamba mushinshimi akazuzucizhiwa, aakuti, “Ulakaakutewa ati muna Nanzaleta.”
Mu mazuba azo Johani Mupapatizhi wakabulika kuhwa mulukula lwa Judiya ulakambauka ati,
“Amusanduke nkaambo bwami bwa kwizeulu bulyaafwaafwi kushika!”
Johani ngumulombwana ngwaakaakwaamba Aizaya mushinshimi nakaamba ati,
“Izwi lyakwe uwompolola mulukula lyateelelwa lyaamba ati,
‘Amubambe inzhila sha Mwami,
amusuumike inzhila shakwe!’”
Bantu bakaya nkwaakaakubele kuhwa mu Jelusalemu umu Judiya moonse, u babo boonse ba mucishi ca Joodani.
Ubobo nibakalyaamba shibi shabo wakabapapatiza mu Lweenje lwa Joodani.
Pele naakabona ba Falisi uba Saduki banji banji baleza kupapatizwa wakabaambila ati, “Umwe nubana ba cipile, nguni wamucenjezha kutiya cisubulo ca bukali bwa Leza bwiza nkumubele?
Amucite milimo itondezha ati mwasanduka,
ulimwi mutalicengi ati mulikwete ushenu Abulahamu, nkaambo Leza ulakonzha kusandula naaba mabwe aza kwaamba babe banakwe Abulahamu.
Keembe kalizunzilwe kale mucishiko cesamu, ubobo kufwumbwa isamu liteeli micelo mibotu lilakatemwa u ukusowelwa mu mulilo.

“Ume ndamupapatiza u meenzhi ukaambo kakusanduka. Pele nkwaali uzhiza munshi lyangu ukwete insana shibaala ali ume, walo wezo ngunteelele nikuba kusamununa impato shakwe. Ulakamupapatiza u Moza Usalala u mulilo.
Alo lubango lwa kuululuzha maila ulilukwete mu matashi. Ulakaululula u kulongela maila mubutala amana bungu akabutente mu mulilo utamana.”
Kuhwaawo Jeso wakabulika kuhwa ku Galilaya wakeza ku lweenje lwa Joodani kwaamba apapatizwe kwa Johani.
Pele Johani kazanda kumukasha, wamwaambila ati, “Ndime injelele kupapatizwa kwako, no ulimwi weza buti kwangu?”
Jeso wakamulailila ati, “Acibe bobo kwaninzho kwaamba tucite ciluleme cizanda Leza.” Ateelele bobo wakamupapatiza.
Mbwaakamanina kupapatizwa Jeso, wakamuhwa mu meenzhi. Ngoonaawo izeulu lyakayaluka, amana wakabona Moza wa Leza uleza buseluka ukoya inzhiba ali nguwe.
Ngoonaawo kwakahwa izwi kwizeulu lyakaamba ati, “Wezu ngu mwanangu nakufwunwa, muli nguwe ndibotelelwe.”
Kuhwaawo Jeso wakasololelwa u Moza Usalala kuya mulukula ukutepaulwa kwa Shaatani.
Naakamana kuliimya kulya kwa mazuba ali makumi one, wakafwa inzala.
Mutepauzhi wakeza kwakwe wamwaambila ati, “Naa uli mwanakwe Leza cini cini aambile mabwe aza cibe cinkwa.”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Kulilembelwe ati muntu taponeni kulya cinkwa caloolona pele ulapona kwizwi lyoonse lihwa ku mulomo wa Leza.”
Ubobo Shaatani wakamutola Jeso ku munzhi usalala ku Jelusalemu wamulizika alululi lwa ŋanda ya Leza.
Wamwita ati, “Naa uli mwanakwe Leza lifwuse anshi, nkaambo kulilembelwe ati,
“‘Leza ulakalailila baanjelo bakwe kwaamba bakakukobelele
ati utakabi nuulifwumpula kucituta cako.’”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Ulimwi kulilembelwe ati, ‘Utasunki Mwami Leza wako.’”
Ulimwi Shaatani wakamutola ku lupili lulamfwu kumutondezha mami anshi u bulemu bwawo.
Amane wamwita ati, “shoonse sheshi ndakupa kufwumbwa kuti wamfwukamina u kunkomba.”
Jeso wakamwita ati, “Ahwe awa Shaatani! Inta kulilembelwe ati, ‘Komba Mwami Leza wako ulimwi umusebezele ice nana.’ ”
Kuhwaawo Shaatani wakamushiya ngoonaawo baanjelo bakeza kumufwutaucila.
Jeso naakateelela ati Johani waangwa, wakapiluka ku Galilaya.
Wakakuhwa ku Nanzaleta waya kukala mu munzhi wa Kapenaumi, wakaakuli kumbali ku lwaatele lwa Galilaya mumashi a Zebuluni u Nafutali,
kwaamba makani akaamba mushinshimi Aizaya azuzucizhiwe aakuti,
kolya kunzhila iiya ku lwaatele kuluya lumwi lwa Joodani,
Galilaya wa bantu bakunze,
bantu bakaakuli u mushinze
boobona mumuni mukando.
Kuli babo bali mucinhule ca lufwu
mumuni ulakabamunicila.”
Ku ciindi ceco Jeso wakakanka kukambauka ati, “Amusanduke, nkaambo bwami bwa kwizeulu buli afwaafwi.”
Jeso naakaakuya bweenda kumbali ku lwaatele lwa Galilaya, wakabona Saimoni uutewa ati Pita u Andulu munina balawaala kanyandi mu meenzhi nkaambo kabali bazezhi.
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Amuncilile kwaamba nkamucite bazezhi babantu.”
Ngoonaawo bakatushiya tunyandi twabo bamucilila.
Eende bulyo kuhwaawo wakabona ubamwi ba bunina banakwe Zebedi ba Jemusi u Johani bali mu bwato balasasa tunyandi twabo uushabo. Abo babo wakabeta,
ngoonaawo bakabushiya bwato uushabo bamucilila.
Jeso wakeenda mu Galilaya moonse ulaya buyiisha mu shikombelo shaba Juda, u kukambauka Makani Mabotu aabwami, u kuponya malwazhi aandeene andeene akati ka bantu.

Impuwo yakwe yakazuwa moonse mu Siliya, ubobo bantu bakamuletela boonse bakaakusata malwazhi u shicisa shamishobo yoonse. Bakabaleta boonse bakaakunjililwe myoza mibiyabi, bashikasuntu, u babo bali mibili yakaakuzuminine, boonse baba wakabashilika bakapona.
Makamu makamu a bantu akahwa ku Galilaya ku Dekapolisi, ku Jelusalemu, ku Judiya uba ku cishi cili kumutala wa Joodani akamucilila.
Inzho Jeso naakaabona makamu makamu abantu wakaliza alupili amane wakala. Ba shiciiya bakeza nkwaakaakubele,
ulimwi wakakanka kubayiisha.
“Mulilonjelwe umwe numwizhi ati muli bapushi ku moza,
nkaambo bwami bwa kwizeulu mbwenu.
nkaambo Leza ulakamusoozha.
Mulilonjelwe nubabonhu myonzo nkaambo mulakeekona inshi.
Mulilonjelwe umwe numufwa inzala iinyota ya bululami
nkaambo mulakekuta u kulamatwa.
Mulilonjelwe numufwila bantu luse,
nkaambo mulakatambula luse.
Mulilonjelwe numusalala mu myonzo,
nkaambo mulakamubona Leza.
Mulilonjelwe umwe numuleta luumuno ku bantu,
nkaambo mulakatewa ati mbana ba Leza.
Mulilonjelwe umwe numupezhewa ukaambo kabululami,
nkaambo bwami bwa kwizeulu mbwenu.
Amutangale u kusekelela nkaambo bulumbu bwenu kwizeulu mbukando. Imbubo mbubona bantu mbubakabapenzha bashinshimi bakale kale.
“Umwe muli ukoya mwino wanshi, pele kuti mwino wasampuka no ulalunzhiwa buti? Ati wabula mulimo ulasweewa bulyo u kulyataukwa ku bantu.
Muli ukoya mumuni wanshi. Munzhi muzake a lupili tookonzha kusesekwa.
Kwiina uusonsa ilambe amana walihunikila intesho, pele lilabikwa awo ngulikonzha kumunicila bantu bali muŋanda boonse.
Umbona bulyo amwe mumuni wenu noomunicile bantu, kwaamba beebone milimo mibotu njimucita, kwaamba ushenu uli kwizeulu atembaulwe.
“Mutatelaici ati ndakeza kuyaya mulawo na bashinshimi. Ndiina kwiza kuuyaya pele ndezhila kuuzuzucizha.
Cini cini ndamwaambila ati, izeulu iinshi shilakaloba, pele kwiina nikaba kabala komwi kashoonto ka mulawo kakaayayiwa cita shoonse shikazuzucizhiwe.

Ubobo ndamwaambila ati kufwumbwa wezo usotoka kabala nikaba komwi ka milawo yezhi u kuyiisha bantu kwaamba bacite bobo, wezo ulakaba mushaalizhi mu bwami bwa kwizeulu. Pele wezo uyicilila u kuyiisha bamwi ulakaba mukando mu bwami bwa kwizeulu.
Amwi ngakuti, kuti bululami bwenu kabutabaali ali bwa balembi uba Falisi, tamukanjili mu bwami bwa kwizeulu.
“Mwakateelela mbubakaambilwa ba shaakale ati, ‘Utayaya

Imbubo, pele ume ndamwaambila ati kufwumbwa ulemanina mweenzhiina ulyeelele kubetekwa. Uwezo usampula munina ulyeelele kubetekwa munkuta inkando. Pele wezo waambila munina ati, ‘Uwe umulimbushi!’ Ulyeelele mulilo utazhimi.
Ubobo kuti watola cipo cako kucipaililo wamana wazhibaluka ati ulikwete makani u munyoko,
cishiye cipo cako ku cipaililo uye kwakwe. Utaangune muteelezhanye u munyoko wamana uzhize upe cipo cako.
“Mulyeelele kuteelezhanya u shinkondonoko munzhila nimuciya kunkuta. Nkaambo kuti wakutola kumubeteshi, aze mubeteshi wakutola kumulindilizhi, ulakasowelwa muntolongo.
Cini cini wiina nukaamuhwa muntolongo cita ukoomane mulandu kuuliya.
“Inta mwakateelela kwakaambwa ati, ‘Utaciti bumambe.’
Pele ume ndamwaambila ati, kufwumbwa ulanga mukaintu cakumulyeelezha, wezo ati wacita kale bumambe mu monzo wakwe.
Inzho kuti linso lyako lya kucilyo ndilikupa kucita shibi, lilobole ulisowe, nkaambo ncibotu kusweekelwa comwi cashipanzha ca mubili wako kubaala ati woonse mubili wako wasowelwa u mulilo utazhimi.
Kuti itashi lyako lya cilyo ndilikupa kucita shibi, likosole nkaambo ncibotu kusweekelwa cizo comwi ca mubili wako kubaala ati woonse mubili wako wawaalwa mu mulilo utazhimi.
“Ulimwi kwakaambwa ati, ‘kufwumbwa waleka mwinakwe ulyeelele kumupa luŋwalu lwa kumuleka!’

Pele ume ndamwaambila ati, mulombwana teelele kuleka mwinakwe cita kuti wabukilwa, kufwumbwa wezo uuleka mwinakwe kukaambo kamwi koonse ulapa kwaamba mukaintu abukilwe, u wezo utwala mukaintu wakalekwa ati aze wabukilwa.
“Ulimwi mwakateelela kuli ba shaakale benu aakuti, ‘Utalumbila cakubeya. Ucite ku mwami Leza mbubona mbuwashomezha kwakwe.’
Pele ume ndamwaambila ati, ‘utalumbila naashoonto pe, nikuba kwizeulu nkaambo ncicuuna ca Leza,
naaba anshi nkaambo ncicilyatilo ca Leza, nikuba ku Jelusalemu nkaambo ngu munzhi wa Mwami mukando.’
Ulimwi mutalumbila ati, ngu mutwi wangu mwini, nkaambo tamukonzha kusandula isusu kwaamba litube naa lishiye.
Kwaamba kwenu akube bulyo kwakuti, ‘Ee,’ naa, ‘Pe pe,’ kwiitilizha kwaamba bobo kulahwa ku mubiyabi.
“Ulimwi mwakateelela kwakaambwa ati, ‘linso ku linso, u lino ku lino’
Pele ume ndamwaambila ati, ‘Utazhola cibi ku cibi.’ Pele kuti muntu wakuuma kwitama lya kucilyo aakuume ukwitama lya kucimonsho.
Ulimwi kuti umwi muntu wakutola kunkuta kwaamba akunanzhe cikobelo iichanshi lyako, naalitole iikoti lyako.
Ulimwi kuti shikalumamba wakushinicizha kweenda mushinzo uulampa maile womwi, amweende aze umaile wabili.
Mupe wezo ukumbila, ulimwi aze wezo uzanda ukweleta utamukasha pe.
“Inta mwakateelela kwakaambwa ati, ‘Ufwune mweenzhinoko, usule shinkondonoko?’
Pele ume ndamwaambila ati, amubafwune ba shinkondonokwenu ulimwi mubakombele babo bamupenzha,
kwaamba mukabe banakwe ushenu uli kwizeulu. Kayi walo ulapozha izuba ku babiyabi uku babotu. Ulimwi ulaunsha inhula ku ba shishibi u baluleme,
nkaambo kuti kamufwini bulyo babo bamufwini no mulakayana bulumbuunzhi? Sa bashimutelo tabaciciti ceco?
Ulimwi kuti kamwaanzha bulyo banyokwenu, no ncintuunzhi cibotu ncimwacita kubaala bamwi? Sa abo bakunze tabaciti bobo?
Umwe mulyeelele kuba bantu baluleme ukoya ushenu uli kwizeulu.”
“Amucenjele kwaamba mutalibonya bululami ku bantu camambonwa, nkaambo kuti mwacita bobo ati mwabula bulumbu kuli uswenu uli kwizeulu.

“Ubobo ciindi nimupa shipo shaluse kubapenzhi mutafwibi impeta ukoya bashikuupaupa amenso mbubacita mu shikombelo shaba Juda u mikwakwa kwaamba batembaulwe ku bantu. Cini cini ndamwaambila ati babo bakabuyana kale bulumbu bwabo,
pele umwe nimupa shipo shaluse itashi lyenu lya cimonsho litazhibi ncilicita lya cilyo,
kwaamba shipo shenu shaluse shitabonwa ku bantu. Ubobo uswenu uubona shicitwa umasesece, ulakamupa bulumbu.

“Ulimwi nimukomba tamweelele kuba ukoya bashikuupaupa amenso pe, nkaambo balazandisha kukomba buzhimine mu shikombelo shaba Juda u mushooko shamikwakwa kwaamba babonwe ku bantu. Cini cini ndamushimwina ati babo batambula kale bulumbu.
Pele umwe mwakanka kukomba amunjile muŋanda muliyalile mukombe kwa uswenu uulimo, ubobo uswenu ubona shicitwa umasesece, ulakamupa bulumbu.
“Ulimwi nimukomba mutaakuhuzha shakwaamba ukoya mbubacita bakunze mubazunga ati balateelelwa ukaambo kamazwi manji manji.
Umwe mutabi ukoya mbubabele nkaambo Uswenu ulishizhi kale nshimuzanda kamutana u kumukumbila.
Inzho mbubolya mbumweelele kukomba,
“‘Ushesu uuli kwizeulu,
Nalilemekwe izhina lyako,
Nabuzhize bwami bwako, nalucitwe luzando lwako,
Anshi ano umbona mbuli kwizeulu.
Utupe bwasunu shakulya shesu.
Utulekele milandu yesu,
umbona aswe mbutubalekelela bali milandu kulyuuswe.
Utatweenzha mukutepaulwa,
Pele utuhune ku mubiyabi.’
Pele kuti naa tamubalekelela bantu, aze uswenu takamulekelela shibi nshimwakacita.

“Ulimwi mwaakuliimya kulya, mutaakuungumana ukoya bashimantumbwambwa mbubacita. Nkaambo balahunga mashu abo kwaamba woonse muntu ababone ati balaliimya kulya. Cini cini ndamwaambila ati babo bakabutambula kale bulumbu bwabo.
Mwaliimya kulya amusambe kumenso, munane mafwuta umutwi,
kwaamba bantu batazhibi ati mwaliimya kulya cita bulyo uswenu uzhi shoonse nguukazhiba. Ulimwi wezo uswenu ubona shicitwa mu masesece ulakamulumbula bweelele.
Pele umwe amulizobolele lubono lwenu kwizeulu koko nkulutaliwa impezu u sence u batewu nkubatenjili u kwiba.
Nkaambo koko kuli lubono lwako, ati u monzo wako nkuubele.
“Menso ali ukoya mumuni wa mubili. Naa menso alabona kabotu, ati mubili wako woonse ulizwile mumuni,
pele kuti asata, ati mubili wako woonse ulaba mu mushinze. Inzho kuti mumuni wako kooli mushinze, ati wezo mushinze ulazoosha!
“Kwiina muntu ukonzha kusebezela bami bobile, nkaambo umwi ulamusula u kufwuna uumwi, naa ulashomeka kuli umwi ukusampaula uumwi. Tamukonzha kusebezela Leza u buhubi.
“Ubobo mutalibilici ku makani a bumi bwenu kwaamba ati, no tulakalyaanzhi naa kunwa nikuba kusama. Sa bumi tabubaali ali shakusama? Naa mubili sa toobaali ashisani?
Amubalange bazuni tabashangi nikuba kutebula kwaamba bazobole umatala, pele uswenu uuli kwizeulu ula beembela! Sa umwe tamubaali abazuni?
Nguni akati kenu ukonzha kuzungila bumi bwakwe kwiita mukulibilika?
“Nciinzhi ncimulibilika ku makani ashisani? Amwaalange malubaluba a mwisokwe mbwaakomena. Taasebezi nikuba kulipangila shakusama.
Pele ndamwaambila kwiina naaba mwami Solomoni umbulemu bwakwe naakakwata cikobelo cibotu ukoya aza malubaluba.
Pele kuti naa Leza kakonzha kusamika bwizu bufwumbi bwasunu ngubuli uzona bwatentwa, sa takaamusamika cibaala? Anu nkaambonzhi umwe ncimwiina lushomo?
“Ubobo mutalibilici ati no tulakalyaanzhi na ati tulakanwaanzhi nikuba kusamaanzhi.
Nkaambo sheshi abo bakunze nshibakapula, amana Ushenu ulizhi ati sheshi shintu mulashizanda.
Pele amutaangune kukapula bwami bwakwe ubululami bwakwe, kwamana shoonse shintu mulakapewa.
Ubobo mutalibilici linji shazona nkaambo bwazona bulakalipakashizha bwini. Kufwumbwa buzuba bulikwete mapakasho ambubo bwini.”
“Mutabeteki kwaamba amwe mutakabetekwa.
Nkaambo mbubona mbumubabeteka bantu aze Leza mbwaakaamubeteka, ulimwi uncona ceelesho ncimweelezha bamwi aze Leza ncakaamweelezha.
Nkamboonzhi ulabona kapapu kali mulinso lya munyoko waleka ikuni lili mulinso lyako?
Ulakanka buti kumwaambila munyoko ati, ‘kweza nkufwule kapapu kali mulinso lyako,’ aakuli muli ikuni mulinso lyako umwini?
Uwe uushikuupaupa amenso, taanguna ulikushe ikuni lili mulinso lyako, ndilelyo nuukabonesha kwaamba ukafwule kapapu kali mulinso lya munyoko.
“Mutapi babwa shintu shisalala, ulimwi mutafwusila ingulube impande shenu nkaambo balashilyatauka ulimwi balamusanducila ukumuluma.”
“Amupumpe mulapewa, amukapule mulayana, amukonkomone mulayalulilwa.
Nkaambo kufwumbwa wezo upumpa ulatambula, aze ukapula ulayana, aze wezo ukonkomona ulayalulilwa.
Nguni akati kenu ukonzha kupa ibwe mwanakwe kuti wamulomba cinkwa?
Na upa inzoka alombwa inswi?
Kuti umwe nubashishibi mulicizhi kupa shintu shibotu kubanenu, inzho Ushenu uli kwizeulu takacilwa kupa shintu shibotu kuli babo bamupumpa.
“Amunjilile kumulyango ushaankene, nkaambo mulyango uukwazeme iinzhila ingubauba yezho itola kuluzonauko, u babo baita mo mbanji banji.
Nkaambo mulyango ulishaankene iinzhila inzumu yezho iitola ku bumi, u babo beeyana mbashoonto.”
“Amucenjele ku bashinshimi babeshi. Baleza kwenu ukoya imbelele sha Leza anu mbu baumpe babutambo.
Mulakabazhiba kwiita umicelo yamilimo yabo. Sa masaansa
Isamu ibotu lilazhala micelo mibotu alyo ibiyabi lilazhala micelo mibiya.
Isamu ibotu talikonzha kuzhala micelo mibiyabi alyo ibiyabi talikonzha kuzhala micelo mibotu.
Kufwumbwa isamu litazhali micelo lilatemwa ukuwaalwa mumulilo.
Ubobo mulakabazhiba kwiita kumicelo yabo.”
“Tali woonse uwamba ati, ‘Mwami, Mwami’ ulakanjila mu bwami bwa kwizeulu pe, cita bulyo wezo ucita shizanda Taata uli kwizeulu.
Mu buzuba bobo banji banji balakeza u kwaamba ati, ‘Mwami, Mwami’ sa uswe katutashinshima mwizhina lyako, u kukusha myoza mibiyabi, u kucita milimo yansana minji minji?
Ndamana ume ndakabaambila ati, ‘Nshimwizhi pe! Amwaahwe awa numutacilila mulawo.’”
“Ubobo kufwumbwa muntu uteelelela aza mazwi angu u kucita ncaamba, uli ukoya muntu wakazaka iŋanda amwala.
Inhula yakawa, milonga yakapaya u muuwo wakaungisha aŋanda. Pele ina niyakawa nkaambo yakazacilwa amwala.
“Pele kufwumbwa uteelelela aza mazwi angu, amana taacilila uli ukoya muntu mulimbushi wakazaka iŋanda yakwe a musenga.
Ubobo inhula niyakawa milonga yakazula u kupaya, awo muuwo wakaunga aŋanda yezho, yakawa, abo buwe bwayo bwakazoosha.”
nkaambo katali ukoya balembi, walo kayiisha iinsana.
Mbwaakaselukila bulyo alupili, makamu makamu abantu akamucilila.
Ngoonaawo muntu umwi wakaakuli mulwazhi cinsenda wakoona anshi wamwaambila ati, “Mwami! Waakuzanda ulakonzha kumponya.”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakaswena wamwaampa itashi waamba ati, “Ndazanda, pona!” Ndilyona cinsenda cakamana wakapona.
Amane Jeso wakamulailila ati utashimwini muntu naaba womwi, pele koya ku mupaizhi kwaamba ukamutondezhe ati wapona, ulimwi ukape cipaizho ncakalailila Mozesi kwaamba bukabe bumboni.
Inzho Jeso naakanjila mu Kapenaumi, mukando wa bashikalumamba wakeza kukumbila kwa Jeso ulaamba ati,
“Mwami mutwanga wangu wasata ulilele abulo kwangu, talozha u kubuka mulwazhi ca lufwu.”
“Jeso wakaingula ati ndeza nkamuponye.”
Shikalumamba wakaingula ati, “Pe pe Mwami, ume nsheelele kukunjizha muŋanda yangu, amba bulyo izwi mutwanga wangu ulapona.

Nkaambo ame ndishimulawo ukwete bakando bali kumbele kwangu, ulimwi ndikwete bashikalumamba bancilila. Ndamwaambila umwi ati, ‘Koya!’ Ulaya. Ulimwi ndaambila umwi ati, ‘Kweza!’ Uleza. Ndamwaambila muzhice wangu ati, ‘Cita ceci!’ Ulacita.”
Jeso ateelele bobo wakazhingwa u kubaambila babo boonse bakaakuya bumucilila ati, “Cini cini ndamwaambila ati nshinabwene muntu uuli lushomo luli bolya moonse mu Izilaili.
Ndamushimwina ati bantu banji banji balakahwa kwiwe u kumbo kwaamba beze balye u Abulahamu u Aizeki ulimwi u Jakobo kwipobwe lya bwami bwa kwizeulu.
Pele bana ba mu bwami balakasowelwa ansengwe mu mushinze, koko nkubakaalila ukuluma inkwino.”
Amane wakamulailila shikalumamba ati, “Bweela kwako, ceco nciwashoma ulacitilwa.” Aciindi ceco ncicona wakapona mutwanga wakwe.
Jeso naakashika kuŋanda yaka Pita, wakayana bainazhala Pita ulilele mulwazhi mubili koopiya lungulu.
Wakamukwata etashi ngoonaawo mubili wakaakumukwete wakamuleka wakabuka wakakanka kubafwutaucila.
Nikwakaba kumangolezha bakamuletela bantu banji banji bakaakunjililwe myoza mibiyabi. Jeso wakeetanda myoza mibiyabi u kubaponya boonse bakaakuli balwazhi kwizwi lyaloolona.
Ceci wakacicita kwaamba azuzucizhiwe akaamba mushinshimi Aizaya aakuti, “Walo lwakwe mwini wakakusha malwazhi esu ukubweza shicisa shesu.”
Jeso naakabona ati bantu bahulisha bamuzhingulucile, wakabalailila kwaamba balandukile kumutala umwi wezhiba.
Umwi mwiiyi wa mulawo wakashika kwakwe waamba ati, “Mwiiyi ume ndilibambile kuya aze kufwumbwa nkuuya.”
Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Ba mwaaba balikwete mena, u bazuni balikwete shitaanto, pele Mwanaa Muntu wiina busena bwakoona ubwa kulyookezhezha.”
Uumwi mulombwana waakuli shiciiya wakeza kwakwe waamba ati, “Mwami ntaangune mbweele nkamuzhike taata.”
Jeso wakamwita ati, “Ncilila bulyo, baleke bafwu bazhikane beni.”
Jeso nakanjila mu bwato ba shiciiya bakwe bakamucilila.
Ngoonaawo muuwo mukando wakaunga mwizhiba cakuti bwato buti bukalobe. Ku ciindi ceco Jeso wakaakoona.
Ba shiciiya bakaya ngaakaakulele bamubusha baamba ati, “Tuhune Mwami tukalafwa!”
Abuke Jeso wakabeta ati, “Nciinzhi ncimutiya umwe nubantu nubashilushomo lushoonto?” Amane wakazhimuka wakoolemanina muuwo u mankutisha kwaamba shileke, ngoonaawo shakaumuna zii!
Boonse ba shiciiya bakazhingwa u kwaamba ati, “Anu muntu uli buti wezu uteelelwa u mankutisha u muuwo?”

Inzho Jeso naakalanuka wakashika ku cishi caba Gadala, koko wakaswaanganya balombwana bobile bakahwa munamaumbwe bakaakunjililwe myoza mibiyabi. Babo balombwana kabali bakali kwiina muntu wakaakukonzha kwiita inzhila yezho.
Ndilyona bakapozomoka baamba ati, “Nciinzhi ncuuzanda kulyuuswe uwe u Mwanaa Leza? Sa weza kutupenzha kacitana kushika ciindi?”
Afwaafwi awo kakuli butanga bwa ngulube bwa kaakucela.
Ubobo myoza mibiyabi yezho yakamulomba Jeso ati, “Watutanda twalomba ututandile mu ngulube shelya.”
Jeso wakeetanda ati, “Kamuya!” Myoza mibiyabi yakamuhwa mu bantu babo u kuya kunjila mu ngulube. Boonse butanga bwakakunkulikila mumukonka wezhiba bwakaloba.
Balombwana bakaakwembela butanga bwa ngulube bakalukanka u kuya kunjila mu munzhi momo mubakaya kukanana ncibakabona, ucakacitika kubalombwana bobile bakaakunjililwe myoza mibiyabi.
Ubobo bantu boonse bamumunzhi wezo bakeza kwa Jeso, nibakamubona bakamulomba kwaamba amuhwe mucishi cabo.
Jeso wakanjila mu bwato walanduka waya ku munzhi wakwabo,
koko bamwi bantu nkubakamuletela muntu wakaakuli mulema a macila. Jeso naakalubona lushomo lwabo, wakamwaambila mulema ati, “Kwata camba mwanangu shibi shako shalekelelwa.”
Ngoonaawo balembi bakalyaambauzha beni ati, “Wezu muntu ulasampaula Leza!”
Pele Jeso wakacizhiba ncibakaakutelaika ngoonaawo wakababuzha ati, “No nciinzhi ncimutelaikila shintu shibiyabi mu myonzo yenu?”
“Nciciliye cuuba-uba u kwaamba ati, ‘Shibi shako shalekelelwa,’ na kwaamba ati, ‘Buka uyende?’
Inzho ndamutondezha kwaamba Mwanaa Muntu ulikwete insana shakulecelela shibi ano anshi.” Ubobo wakamwaambila mulema ati, “Buka, bweza macila ako uukuya kwako!”
Wezo muntu wakabuka wakaya kwakwe.
Inkamu ya bantu niyakaabona aza yakatiya cini cini, ngoonaawo bakalumbaizha Leza wakapa insana shili bolya ku bantu.
Inzho Jeso naakakuhwa koko wakabona mulombwana uutewa ati Matayo ulishite amulimo wakwe wakutezha. Wakamwaambila ati, “Ncilila.” Ngoonaawo Matayo wakazhimuka wakamucilila.
Nibakacibona ceci ba Falisi bakababuzha ba shiciiya bakwe ati, “Nkaamboonzhi mwiiyi wenu ulalya uba shimitelo uba shishibi?”
Jeso wakabateelela amane wakabaingula ati, “Bantu batali balwazhi tabazanda mushilishi, cita bulyo balwazhi.
Kamuya mukaiye ncaamba mazwi a Leza aamba ati, ‘Ndazanda inkumbu kutali shipaizho shabanyama.’ Nkaambo ume ndiina kwiza kwita baluleme ndakezhila ba shishibi.”
Kuhwaawo ba shiciiya baka Johani Mupapatizhi bakeza kwa Jeso kubuzha ati, “Nkaamboonzhi uswe uba Falisi tulaliimya kulya lyoonse, pele uwe u ba shiciiya bako tamuliimya kulya?”

Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Sa umwe mulazunga ati beenzhiina shibwinga bali kwipobwe lya bwinga balakonzha kulila ciindi naacili abo? Pe pe! Pele cilakashika ciindi shibwiinga nibakaamutola ba shinkondonina lelyo balakaliimya kulya.
Kwiina usasa cikamba cipiya acisani cikulukulu nkaambo ceco cikamba cakahungana cilakamonkola ipulo ikando kubaala citaanzhi.

Nikuba kubika waini mupiya mucikomo cakasebeza kale nkaambo cilazapuka amana waini ulatika asho inkomo ati shabula mulimo linji. Waini mupiya ulabikwa munkomo impiya kwaamba shoonse shizobolwe kabotu.”
Jeso kacaamba bobo, kwakabulika mweendelezhi waba Juda umwi amane wamukotamina waamba ati, “Mwanangu wafwa pele ndalomba atweende ukamwaampe matashi kwaamba abuke.”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakazhimuka wakaya antoomwi u ba shiciiya bakwe.
Ngoonaawo aze mukaintu wakaakusata kalobola kwa myaka ili ikumi u myaka yobile wakeza munshi wookumya moombe wacisani cakwe.
Wakacita bobo nkaambo wakaamba u monzo wakwe ati, “Kufwumbwa kuti ndacikumya cisani cakwe ndapona.”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakacebuka, amane wamubona wamwita ati, “Lya monzo mwanangu, lushomo lwako lwakuponya.” Ngoonaawo aciindi mukaintu wakapona.
Jeso nakashika kuŋanda ya mweendelezhi wezo wakayana bashimitoolilo iinkamu ya bantu baloomoka.
Wakabaambila ati, “Amwaahwe awa noonse, mwana tafwile uloona bulyo!” Bantu boonse bakamuseka.
Mbubakamuhwila bulyo muŋanda, Jeso wakenjila muŋanda mwakaakulele mushimbi amane wakamukwata etashi ngoonaawo wakabuka.
Aza makani akaya impuwo busena boonse bwa cishi ceco.
