Naakakuhwa koko balombwana boofwu bobile bakaakwiza bumucilila baloompolola ati, “Jeso Mwana Devidi tufwile luse!”
Jeso naakanjila muŋanda imwi babo balombwana bakashika amane wakababuzha ati, “Sa mulashoma ati ndakonzha kumuponya?” Bakaingula ati, “Ee!”
Amane Jeso wakabaampa amenso waamba ati, “Acibe nkumubele umbona mbumwashoma!”
Ngoonaawo bakabona. Amane Jeso wakabalailila ati, “Kutabi muntu ngumushimwina aza makani!”
Balo bahwe awo bakaya balaya bumwaazha mulumbe waka Jeso mucishi coonse ceco.
Mbubakakuhwila bulyo koko, Jeso bakamuletela muntu utaamba wakaakunjililwe moza mubiyabi.
Pele mbwakookushizha moza mubiyabi Jeso, wezo mulombwana wakakanka kwaamba, bantu boonse bakazhingwa u kwaamba ati, “Tatunacibwene ceci cili bolya mu Izilaili!”
Balo ba Falisi bakaamba bulyo ati, “Ulakusha myoza mibiyabi kwiita mu mwami wa myoza mibiyabi.”
Naakabona makamu makamu a bantu wakeetezhewa nkaambo bakaakukatele ukupenga ukoya imbelele shabula mweembezhi.
Ubobo wakabaambila ba shiciiya ati, “Butebuzhi bwahula, pele basebezhi baceya.
Amukombe ku mukamwini butebuzhi kwaamba atume basebezhi kwiza kutebula.”
Jeso wakabeta ba shiciiya bakwe bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile kwaamba babungane, amane wabapa insana sha kutanda myoza mibiyabi usha kuponya malwazhi u shicisa shoonse.
Mazhinaabo ngaaza, kutaanguna ngu Saimoni uutewa ati Pita, u Andulu munina, Jemusi u Johani munina banakwe Zebedi.
Filipo u Basolomeyo, Tomasi u Matayo shimutelo, Jemusi mwanakwe Alufayasi u Tadayasi.
Saimoni waku Kenani u Judasi Shikaliyoti, wakamwaaba Jeso.
Baba ba shiciiya bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile Jeso wakabatuma u malailile akuti, “Mutayi kubantu bakunze ulimwi mutakanjili mu munzhi waba Samaliya.
Muye bulyo kumbelele shizhiminine shaŋanda ya Izilaili.
Kamuya mukakambauce ati, ‘Bwami bwa kwizeulu buli afwaafwi!’
Amukabaponye balwazhi u bafwu mukababushe, amukabaponye ubashicinsenda ulimwi mukeekushe u myoza mibiyabi. Mwapewa bulyo, amwe amukape bulyo.
Mutabwezi mali mushikwama shenu naaba a goludi naa a siliva naaba a mukuba.
Mutabwezi inkomo kumushinzo wenu niciba cikobelo cabili naa impato nuuba musako nkaambo shimilimo ulalya amulimo wakwe.
“Kufwumbwa mu munzhi mumukaanjila amukalange muntu ngumukaabona ati ulyeelele kukalaamwe. Mukakale awo ngoona kushikila mukakuhwe koko.
Mwakanjila muŋanda yezho, ‘Mukeeanzhe!’
Kuti balimo bakamutambule, luumuno lwenu lukabe abo. Na kuti batakamutambuli mukamuhwe u luumuno lwenu.
Ulimwi kuti naa bantu bali u munzhi umwi bayina kumutambula naa kumuteelela, amukamuhwe mwamana mukalikunkumune lufwuko luli kumatende enu.
Cini cini ndamwaambila ati mu buzuba bwa lubeta, mulandu wa Sodomu u Gomola ulakaubauba kubaala wa munzhi wezo.”
Amukabacenjelele bantu, nkaambo balakamutola mumbeta u kuya kumuuma mu shikombelo shaba Juda.
Mulakatolwa ku beendelezhi u bami ukaambo kangu kwaamba mukambele bakamboni ku bantu bakunze.
Bakamukwata mutakalibilici ati, anu tukaambe acani nkaambo ulakamupa ca kwaamba muciindi ncicona ceco.
Nkaambo mazwi ngumukakaamba taali enu alakahwa ku Moza Usalala waka Ushenu, ulakaakwaamba muli umwe.
Ku ciindi ceco munina ulakaaba munina kwaamba ayayiwe, abo bamaushabo balakacita umbona kubanabo abo bana balakabukila babazhele ukubayaya.
Boonse balakamusula ukaambo kangu. Pele wezo ukakatila mpaka ku mamanino ulakafwutulwa.
Kuti bakamupenzhe mumunzhi umwi amukalukancile kuli umwi. Cini cini ndamwaambila ati tamukaakuna ukuumaninzha mulimo wenu mu minzhi yoonse ya Izilaili Mwanaa Muntu ulaakushikile kale.
Ubobo mwana cikolo ulyeelele kuba ukoya mwiiyi wakwe muluzhibo aze muzhice abe ukoya shimatwanga wakwe. Kuti mukamwini iŋanda balamwita ati Belizebule, inzho ba ŋanda yakwe balakababisha bisha buti?
Ncindamwaambila mu mushinze amucibweelele lumwi lubala, uceco ncindamuhwiila amucaambile anduli shamaanda.
Mutaakutiya babo bayaya mubili pele tabakonzha kuyaya moza. Amutiye wezo ukonzha kuyaya moza antoomwi umubili u mulilo utazhimi.
Inta kayi bashikamimbya bobile balaulwa ili lyomwi, pele kwiina nikaba komwi katumimbya toto kakonzha kuwa anshi u kufwa Ushenu katezhi.
Umwe lwenu ulyaabalile umasusu ali mumitwi yenu.
Ubobo mutatiyi nkaambo umwe mulifwinwi kubaala bashikamimbya banji banji!
“Kufwumbwa babo banhumina kaanzambwene ku bantu, ame ndakabahumina kaanzambwene kwa Taata uuli kwizeulu.
Pele babo bankaka kaanzambwene ku bantu, ame ndakabakaka kaanzambwene kwa Taata uuli kwizeulu.
“Mutatelaici ati ndaleta luumuno ano anshi. Pe pe ndiina kuleta luumuno ndaleta inkondo.
Ndeza kwaandaanya mwana mweembezhi u ushi u mwana mushimbi u baina, umukamwana ubainazhala,
ubobo ba shinkondonina muntu balakaba ba mukwashi wakwe.
Babo bazandisha maushabo na manokwabo kubaala ume tabakonzha kuba ba shiciiya bangu, abo bafwinishi banabo balombwana na bakaintu kubaala ume tabakonzha kuba ba shiciiya bangu.
Kufwumbwa wezo uutakonzha kubweza ciciinkano cakwe ukuncilila teelele kuba shiciiya wangu.
U babo bazandisha bumi bwabo balakabusowekelwa. Pele babo basowekelwa bumi bwabo ukaambo kangu balakabuyana.

Kufwumbwa utambula mushinshimi ukaambo kakuti mushinshimi, ulakatambula aze bulumbu bwa mushinshimi. Ulimwi kufwumbwa utambula bulumbu bwamululami ukaambo kakuti mululami, aze ulakatambula bulumbu bwa bululami.
Ulimwi kufwumbwa wezo uupa inkapu ya meenzhi kuli umwi wa bashoonto baba nkaambo kakuti ngu shiciiya wangu, cini cini wezo takabuli bulumbu.”
Jeso naakamaninzha kupa malailile aza ku bashiciiya bakwe bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile, wakakuhwa koko waya u kuyiisha u kukambauka u minzhi yabo.
Inzho Johani naakaakuli muntolongo, wakashiteelela nshaakaakucita Jeso, ubobo wakatuma ba shiciiya bakwe kwa Jeso.
Bashike bakamubuzha ati, “Sa ndiwe uuzhiza naa tucilangila unji?”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Amubweele mukamushimwine Johani ncimuteelela uncimubona,
boofwu balabona, balema baleenda, bashicinsenda balapona, bacimpama bateelela, bafwu balabushiwa ubapushi balakambaucilwa Makani Mabotu.
Ulilongelwe wezo utazuluzha makani angu!”
Babweele bulyo ba shiciiya balya Jeso wakoobuzha mufwundi wa bantu ku makani aka Johani ati, “Anu nciinzhi ncimwakaya kubona mulukula? Sa ndubu lwa kaakuzungaana u muuwo?
Naa pe, sa mwakaya kubona muntu usamine shisani shibonhwu bonhwu? Inta kayi babo basama shibonhwu bonhwu balakala mu maanda a bwami!
Amwaambe, mwakaya ukubonaanzhi? Sa mwakaya kubona mushinshimi? Azo meni meni, pele mwakabona ubaala a mushinshimi.
Nkaambo Johani nguwezo uambwa u maŋwalu aamba ati, ‘Leza wakaamba ati ndakatuma mutumwa ukaasolola kwaamba akubambile inzhila yako.’
Cini cini ndamwaambila ati, kwiina nikwakaakuli muntu uli ukoya Johani Mupapatizhi niliba liliye. Pele nikuba bobo wezo mushoonto mu bwami bwa kwizeulu mukando kubaala Johani.
Kuhwa ciindi ca Johani Mupapatizhi kushika bwasunu bwami bwa kwizeulu bwenjila u mapenzhi, abo bashikuleta mapenzhi babubweza ca nsana.
Nkaambo boonse bashinshimi u mulawo bakakambauka kushikila Johani naakazhiza.
Ubobo naa mulazanda kwaashoma mazwi abo, Johani ngu Elaija uyelele kwiza.
Inzho uli matwi ateelele!
“Anu wezu musela wa bantu babwasunu mbakozhanye ukoyaanzhi? Bali ukoya bana bashite mucisambalilo boompolozhanya u beenzhiina ati,
‘Twakamufwibila mitolilo pele mwiina nimwakazhana! Twakoomoka pele umwe mwiina nimwakalila!’
Johani naakashika katali nikuba kunwa bamane boonse bakaamba ati, ‘Ulinjililwe moza mubiyabi!’

Ashike Mwanaa Muntu, wakalya u kunwa, mumane kale noonse mwaamba ati, ‘Amubone wezu muntu! Mulyato ulimwi ngucakolwa, mweenzhiina bashimitelo u ba shishibi!’ Pele busongo bwa Leza bulalitondezha mu milimo yambubo.”
Bantu ba mu minzhi mwaakacita maleele manji manji Jeso bayina nibakasanduka ubobo Jeso wakabalemanina waamba ati,

“Mulakapenga umwe nubana Kolazini! Mulakapenga amwe nubana Betisaida! Nkaambo kuti maleele akacitwa u minzhi yenu naakacitwa mu minzhi ya Taya u Sidoni, nibaakusamine kale masaka ukulibuwa itwe kutondezha ati basanduka kuhwa ku shibi shabo!
Pele ndamwaambila ati mu buzuba bwa lubeta mulandu wenu ulakabiya kubaala wa Taya u Sidoni!
Aze u Kapenaumi sa ulazunga ati balakakutembaula kwizeulu? Pe pe ulakasowelwa kucikalilo cabafwu! Kuti maleele akacitilwa mwako naakacitwa mu Sodomu, ubwasunu wezu munzhi niwaakuciliko!
Pele ndamwaambila ati mu buzuba bwa lubeta mulandu wa Sodomu ulakaubauba kubaala wenu!”
Ncicona ceco ciindi Jeso wakakomba ati, “Ndakulumba Taata, u Mwami wa kwizeulu anshi, nkaambo wazubululila bantu bulyo shintu nshiwakasesekela basongo u bayiile.
Imbubo bobo mbucakakwiinina Taata.
“Kamwiza kwangu noonse numukatele u mwalemenwa nkaambo ndime inkamulemununa.
Amulifwunge ijoko lyangu mwiiye kwangu nkaambo ndyumbonhwu monzo, mulakayana kulyoocezha.
Nkaambo ijoko lyangu ndyubauba u mukuli wangu muubauba.”
Ba Falisi nibakacibona ceco, bakamwambila Jeso ati, “Bona ba shiciiya bako bacita citahuminyiwa mu Sabata.”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Sa mwiina nimwakabala mbwaakacita Devidi u babo mbucakaakuli abo?
Inta wakanjila muŋanda ya Leza ukulya cinkwa cakapewa kwa Leza, calo citahuminyiwa kulya bantu bulyo ubatali bapaizhi?
Sa mwiina nimwakabala bapaizhi ba muŋanda ya Leza mbubakaakusotoka mulawo mu buzuba bwa Sabata nikuba bobo bayina nibakapewa mulandu?
Pele ngaali ano uubala aŋanda ya Leza.
Kuti nimwaakwizhi kaambo kaka ncikaamba kakuti, ‘Ndazanda inkumbu kutali cipaizho,’ nimwataakutamikizha bayina milandu.
Nkaambo Mwanaa Muntu ngu Mwami wa Sabata.”
Jeso naakakuhwa koko wakaya wanjila mu cikombelo caba Juda.
Koko kakuli mulombwana umwi wakaakuzuminine itashi. Bantu bakamubuzha Jeso ati, “Sa nceelelo kuponya muntu mu buzuba bwa Sabata?” Bakamubuzha bobo kwaamba bamuyanine kaambo.
Wakabaingula ati, “Nguni akati kenu uufwuwile imbelele yomwi uutakonzha kwikusha yawila umukalo mu Sabata?
Inta muntu ulazandika kubaala imbelele. Cilahuminyiwa kucita ciluleme mu Sabata.”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakamwaambila wezo mulombwana ati, “Hungulula itashi.” Ngoonaawo wakalihungulula, lyapona, lyaba ukoya iyenzhiina.
Pele ba Falisi bakaya kulihwiya mbubakozha kumuyaya Jeso.
Ubobo Jeso naakeezhiba mizeezo yabo wakakuhwa koko. Bantu banji banji bakamucilila, wakabaponya boonse balwazhi,
u kubapa malailile aakuti batamuzubululi.
Ceci cakacitwa kwaamba makani akaamba Aizaya mushinshimi azuzucizhiwe aakuti;
wezo ngu mfwini ulimwi shaacita shilanjinina.
Ndakabika Moza wangu ali nguwe,
ulimwi ulakakanana lufwuno lwangu ku bantu bakunze.
Takazumanani nikuba kupozomoka pe.
Izwi lyakwe talikateelelwa mu mazhila.
Takakononi ibu ipapushi,
nikuba kuzhimya kalilo kamwininjizha.
Ulakabafwila luse bantu kushikila bululami bwakwe bukazunde,
ulimwi mwizhina lyakwe mumukaaba bulanjizhi bwabo bantu bakunze.
Ngoonaawo bamwi bantu bakamuletela muntu wakaakuli moofwu ulimwi kataamba nkaambo kanjililwe moza mubiyabi. Wakamuponya wakakanka kwaamba u kubona.
Bantu boonse bakazhingwa u kubuzha ati, “Sa wezu ngu mwanakwe Devidi?”
Ba Falisi nibakateelela bobo bakaamba ati, “Ngu Belizebule Mwami wa myoza mibiyabi nguumupa insana shakutanda myoza mibiyabi.”

Jeso wakacizhiba ncibakaakwaamba wakaingula ati, “Kuti bantu ba cishi comwi babucilana, cishi ceco cilaandaana. Ulimwi kuti bantu ba munzhi womwi naa mukwashi womwi babucilana, munzhi naa mukwashi wezo ulaandaana.
Kuti Shaatani wakusha Shaatani, nkukuti walyaandula wini. No ati bwami bwakwe bulaba buti?
Kuti naa ndakusha myoza mibiyabi iinsana shaka Belizebule, no banenu balasebezha insana shakani? Balakamuzula ukumutondezha ati mulilubizhizhe.
Pele na kuti ndakusha myoza mibiyabi iinsana sha Moza wa Leza, ubobo ceci citondezha ati bwami bwaka Leza bwashika kale nkumubele.
“No mbuti muntu mbwaakonzha kunjila muŋanda ya muntu ukwete insana u kwiba, atataanguna kumukwata u kumwaanga? Amana ulakonzha kwiba kabotu.
Ubobo ndamwaambila ati, coonse cibi u kusampaula kulalekelelwa. Pele kuti muntu woosampaula Moza Usalala, takalekelelwa pe.
Mbubona bulyo kufwumbwa muntu uwaamba cakusampaula Mwanaa Muntu ulakonzha kulekelelwa, pele wezo ukanana cakubisha bisha Moza Usalala takalekelelwa pe nikuba ku ciindi ceno niciba cizhiza.”
Umwe nubana ba cipile! Mulankonzha buti kwaamba shintu shibotu aakuli lwenu nubeni muli babiyabi? Muntu ulaamba shizwile u monzo wakwe.
Muntu mubotu ulaamba shintu shibotu nshaazobwele mu monzo wakwe, aze muntu mubiyabi ulaamba shibiyabi shili mu monzo wakwe.
“Ncobeni ndamwaambila ati mu buzuba bwa lubeta bantu balakapewa mulandu, ukaambo kamazwi oonse ataluleme ngubaamba.
Muntu ulakalulamikwa u mazwi aakwe mwini, ulimwi ulakapewa mulandu ukaambo kamazwi akwe.”
Nkaambo umbona Jona mbwaakakala mwifwu lya nswi inkando kwa mazuba otatwe umbona bobo u Mwanaa Muntu ulakakala mubulongo kwa mazuba otatwe.
Ubobo baku Ninive mu buzuba bwa lubeta balakamuzula, nkaambo balo Jona naakabakambaucila bakasanduka. Inzho ano ngaali ubaala ali Jona.
Ulimwi mu buzuba bwa lubeta, mwami mukaintu waku cibizhi ulakamuzula, nkaambo wakeenda kuhwa kumeelaizha anshi kwiza kuteelela busongo bwa mwami Solomoni. Inzho ano ngaali ubaala ali Solomoni.
“Kuti moza usofweele wahwa umuntu, uleendeenda mucimpayuma kuya bulanga a kulyoocezhezha, pele tooyani.
Wabula ulaamba ati, ‘Imbweele bulyo kuŋanda yangu nkundakahwa!’ Ubobo ulabweela wamana ulayana mwiina cilimo, ili bulyo kabotu.

Ngoonaawo ulabweela waya ukuleta iinji myoza iili ciloba mibiyabi ibaala, yamana ilanjila u kukala mu muntu wezo. Ubobo ku mamanino bumi bwa muntu wezo bulabiya kubaala mbwaakaakubele kutaanguna. Mbubobo mbukukaaba ku bantu babiyabi ba mazuba ano.”
Jeso naakaakucaamba, kwakashika baina u banina, bakazhima ansengwe, balomba kwaamba baambe aze.
Ngoonaawo umwi muntu wakamwaambila ati, “Banoko u banyoko bali ansengwe awa balazanda ati mubandike abo.”
Jeso wakamwiingula wezo muntu ati, “Anu nguni baama ulimwi mbubani bakwesu?”
Amane wakatondeka koko kwakaakushite ba shiciiya bakwe waamba ati, “Ume baama u bakwesu mbubaba awa!
Nkaambo kufwumbwa wezo ucita shizanda Taata uuli kwizeulu ngu mukwesu u baama.”
Mbubona bobo buzuba Jeso wakamuhwa muŋanda waya kukala kumbali kwizhiba.
Inkamu inkando ya bantu yakamubunganina cakuti limwi wakanjila mu bwato, bantu bakashaala a muuma.
Wakabaambila shintu shinji shinji mushikozhano ati, “Umwi muntu wakaya ukuminza imbuto.
Inzho naakaakuminza, imbuto shimwi shakawila munzhila, ngoonaawo bazuni bakeza bashilya.
Imbuto shimwi shakawila amabwe akaakwiina ihwu linji linji, ca kufwambaana shakamena nkaambo kakuceya ihwu.
Pele izuba nilyakabala shanyana shakazuma nkaambo mizanda keetakonzha kusakana anshi.
Shimwi imbuto shakawila mu meya, naakakomena akashiyasa u kushifwundilizha.
Shimwi imbuto shakawila mwihwu ibotu u kuzhala micelo. Shimwi shakaba mwaanda shimwi makumi ali cisambomwi, shimwi shakaba makumi otatwe.”
Kumaninzha Jeso wakaamba ati, “Wezo uuli matwi naateelele!”
Kuhwaawo ba shiciiya bakeza kwakwe u kumubuzha ati, “Nkamboonzhi ulabaambila mushikozhano?”
Ngoonaawo wakabaingula ati, “Umwe mulipelwe luzhibo lwamaseseke a bwami bwa kwizeulu ndubatapelwe balo.
Nkaambo wezo ukwete ulakazunjililwa ubobo shilakaba shinji shinji, pele wezo ukwete shishoonto ulakanangwa uceco ncaakwete.
Nciceco ncimbaambilila mushikozhano nkaambo nikuba ati balabona tababonesha, nikuba ati balateelela, tabateelelesha ulimwi tabapupulalisha.”
Umbona mbwaakabashinshima Aizaya naakaamba ati,
“‘Baba bantu balapupulala pele tabateelelesha.
Balabona pele tababonesha,
nkaambo maanu abo mafwaafwi,
u matwi abo alikatele tabakonzha kuteelelela,
u menso abo alihululete,
cakuti tabakonzha kubona u menso abo,
u kuteelela u matwi abo, u kuzhingashila mu myonzo yabo, u kucindulucila kwangu ndi Leza,
kwaamba mbaponye.’

Cini cini ndamwaambila ati, bashinshimi banji banji u bantu balulami bakaakuzandisha kubona sheshi nshimubona pele bayina kushibona pe. Ulimwi bakaakuzandisha kuteelela aza ngumuteelela pele bayina kwaateelela.”
“Inzho amuteelele bupanduluzhi bwacikozhano ca shikuminza.
Ciindi bantu nibateelela mazwi aamba sha bwami bwa Leza, bamana tabashiteeleli, mubiyabi ulashika ukukusha ceco cashangwa mu myonzo yabo. Shesho nshiimbuto shakawila munzhila.
Inzho shesho shakawila mwihwu lya mu mabwe, mbubabo bacita ati, baateelela mazwi a Leza baatambula ca kufwambaana u kubotelwa.
Pele ukaambo kakuti bayina mizanda mulimbabo, makatazho u mapenzhi abashicila ukaambo kakucita shaamba aza mazwi balalebwa ndilyona.
Inzho imbuto shakawila mu meya, mbubabo bateelela izwi, pele ukaambo kukuzandisha shintu shaanshi u buhubi, shilaashanicizha mazwi ubobo taazhali micelo.
Pele shesho shakawila mwihwu ibotu mbubabo bacita ati, baateelela mazwi a Leza baabamba. Ubobo balazhala micelo cakuhuzhanya ukuba mwaanda, bamwi makumi ali cisambomwi bamwi makumi otatwe.”
Ulimwi Jeso wakabaambila ucimwi cikozhano waamba ati, “Bwami bwa kwizeulu buli ukoya muntu wakashanga maila mu muunda.
Pele ciindi bantu nibakakoona, ushinkondonina wakashika ukushanga insaku mu maila amane waya.
Ubobo shishango nishakakula u kuzhala insece, ayo insaku yakalibonya.
Inzho basebezhi bakwe mukamwini muunda bakeza kumushimwina ati, ‘Mwami Inta kayi twakashanga maila mu muunda mwako, no inzho insaku yahwa kwi?’
Wakabaambila ati, ‘Shinkondoma nguwacita ceci!’ Ngoonaawo basebezhi bakamwaambila ati, ‘Sa ulazanda ati tuye tukeezhule?’
Walo wakaingula ati, ‘Pe pe mulaba nimukakaazhulilizha u maila.

Amushileke shikulile antoomwi mpaka kushicila ku ciindi ca kutebula. Ndilelyo ninkaabaambila bashikutebula ati, amutaangune kubunjika insaku mwiiange mile kwaamba itentwe mwamana maila mwaabike mubutala bwangu.’ ”
Ulimwi Jeso wakaamba ucimwi cikozhano cakuti, “Bwami bwa kwizeulu buli ukoya kasece ka masitadi
Nkasece kashoonto kafwumbi kakomena lilaba isamu. Ubobo bazuni baleza kuzaka shitaanto kumitabi yalyo.”
Amane wakabaambila ucimwi cikozhano cakuti, “Bwami bwa kwizeulu buli ukoya bumena, mukaintu mbwaahwela muntundu shotatwe shabufwu bwa maila ukubuseseka mpaka mulwi woonse wafwuta.”
Sheshi shoonse wakabaambila mushikozhano. Kwiina nakaabayisha bulyo cita mushikozhano.
Sheshi wakashicita kwiingainya ubwakaamba mushinshimi ati,
“Ndakayiisha mushikozhano.
Ndakapandulula shakasesekwa kuhwa kumalengelo anshi.”
Inzho Jeso wakaashiya makamu makamu abantu u kunjila muŋanda. Ba shiciiya bakwe bakeza kwakwe bamwaambila ati, “Tupandululile cikozhano ca nsaku yamumuunda.”
Wakabaingula ati, “Uushanga ngu Mwanaa Muntu.
Muunda nduundu, maila alaamba bantu ba mu bwami bwa Leza. Insaku mbantu ba mubiyabi.
Wakeeshanga ngushinkondoma Shaatani. Kutebula nciindi cakumana kwanshi. Batebuzhi mbaanjelo.
Umbona insaku mbwiibunganyiwa ukutentwa, mbukukaaba ku mamanino anshi.
Mwanaa Muntu ulakatuma banjelo bakwe, kwaamba bakakushe bantu balebya bamwi uba shishibi boonse mu bwami bwakwe,
u kuya kubasowela mwizhiba lya mulilo. Mwalo momo mubakaalila ukuluma inkwino.
Balo baluleme balakamweka mweka ukoya izuba mu bwami bwa Ushabo. Wezo ukwete matwi ateelele.”

“Ulimwi bwami bwa kwizeulu buli ukoya muntu umwi ukwete lubono lwakaakusosekelwe mu muunda, mucoolwe muntu wakalubulicila amane waaluseseka aanji, ngoonaawo waya kuuzha shoonse nshaakaakukwete amane wakawula muunda wezo.”
“Ulimwi bwami bwa kwizeulu buli ukoya musambazhi uulanga impande imbotu.
Ubobo naakeeyana wakashuuzha shoonse nshaakakukwete waya kuula impande yezho.”
“Ulimwi bwami bwa kwizeulu buli ukoya kanyandi kakawaalwa mu lwaatele kamane kakwasha inswi shamishobo mishobo.
Inzho kanyandi nikakezula, bakakakwelela kumuuma bamane bakala anshi u kusala inswi. Imbotu bakashibika mu shinzuma shabo, imbiyabi bakashisowa.
Umbona bobo mbukukaaba ku mamanino anshi. Baanjelo balakaandaanya ba shishibi kuhwa ku bantu baluleme,
ba shishibi balakabasowela mwizhiba lya mulilo. Momo bantu mubakaalila ukuluma inkwino.”
Amane Jeso wakababuzha ba shiciiya ati, “Sa alo mulashiteelela sheshi nshiŋamba?” Bakamwiingula ati, “Ee!”
Amane walo wakabaambila ati, “Ubobo woonse mulembi, wakayiishiwa makani a bwami bwa kwizeulu uli ukoya mukamwini iŋanda ukusha shintu mucizobwelo cakwe shipiya u shikulukulu.”
Jeso naakamana kukanana mushikozhano sheshi wakakuhwa koko kubusena
wakaya ku cishi ca kwabo, koko nkwaakabaisha mu cikombelo caba Juda cakuti bakazhingwa u kwaamba ati, “Anu wezu muntu wakabuyana kwi busongo u maleele aza ngaacita?
Sa wezu ingwe mwanaa mubezhi? Ulimwi sa baina tali Maliya? Inta banina mbuba Jemusi, Jozefu, Simoni u Judasi?
Inta u banina bakaintu tulakala abo kono? Wakashiyana kwi insana sheshi?”
Ubobo bakamukaka.
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Mushinshimi ulalemekwa inshi yoonse cita bulyo kwabo uku mukowa wakwe.”
Ukaambo kakubula lushomo kwabo, wiina naakacita maleele manji manji koko.
Ku ciindi ceco Helodi mweendelezhi wacipanzha cimwi ca Galilaya, wakaateelela makani aka Jeso.
Wakaambila batwanga bakwe ati, “Ambweni Johani Mupapatizhi wabuka ku bafwu, nciceco ncaakwete insana shakucita maleele aza.”
Nkaambo Helodi wakamukwata Johani wamwaanga u kumubika muntolongo. Wakacita bobo ukaambo ka mulamwaakwe munina Helodiyasi waakuli muka Filipo.
Nkaambo Johani wakamwaambila ati, “Tacihuminyiwa kwaamba utwale Helodiyasi muka munyoko pe.”
Ulimwi nikuba ati Helodi kakwete muzeezo wakuti amuyaye Johani, wakatiya bantu nkaambo bakaakwizhi ati Johani mushinshimi.
Inzho buzuba bwa kusekelela kuzhalwa kwa Helodi nikwakashika, mwanakwe Helodiyasi mushimbi wakabazhanina bantu cakuti Helodi wakabotelwa,
wakamushomezha cakupinga ati, “Ndakupa kufwumbwa ceco ncuukakumbila!”
Baina naakamwaambila ncaayelele kukumbila wakamushimwina ati koya ukamwaambile ati, “Mpa mutwi waka Johani momu mu mutiba.”
Mwami Helodi wakausa cini cini, pele ukaambo kakuti wakapinga bantu boonse kabateelele, wakalailila ati wezu mushimbi apewe ncaakakumbila.
Ulimwi wakalailila ati Johani akosolwe mutwi muntolongo.
Ubobo mutwi wakaletwa mu mutiba kumushimbi wezo, amane wootola kwa baina.
Ngoonaawo ba shiciiya baka Johani bakeza boobweza mutunta baya kuuzhika bamane bapiluka beza kumushimwina Jeso.
Jeso ateelele bobo, wakakuhwa koko wanjila mu bwato kwaamba aye kubusena buliibile. Pele bantu nibakateelela ati Jeso wakuhwa, bakeenda anshi bamucilila koko nkwaakaya.
Alanduke bulyo, wakaabona makamu makamu abantu, wakabafwila inkumbu u kubaponya balwazhi mbubakaleta.
Kalitana kwibila izuba ba shiciiya bakwe bakamwaambila ati, “Kukalashiya ulimwi mono mu mwisokwe, baambile bantu baye mu minzhi bakalyuulile shakulya.”
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Tabeelele kuya, umwe lwenu amubape cakulya!”
Balo bakaingula ati, “Uswe tulikwete bulyo shinkwa shosanwe iinswi shobile.”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Amushilete kono.”

Amane wabalailila boonse bantu kwaamba bakale anshi abwizu. Inzho wakabweza shinkwa shosanwe iinswi shobile walyaalala walumba kwa Leza. Amane washikomauna wabapa ba shiciiya kwaamba babaabanye bantu.
Boonse bakalya cakukuta. Ba shiciiya bakabwezelela bufwefwelenga, bakazuzha iintundu shili ikumi u shitwesha shobile.
Mweelwe wabalombwana bakalya kooshika ku shuulu shosanwe kutabala bakaintu u bana.
Amane Jeso wakabalailila ati banjile mu bwato basolole baye kumutala umwi wezhiba, walo washaala ulaambila u bantu kwaamba bapiluke.
Bantu nibakamana kuya, wakaliza alupili ice waya kukomba ciindi ca mangolezha.
Ku ciindi ceco bwato kabusakene kuhwa kunkomwe, bulaya butonkwa u mauya nkaambo muuwo wakaakuunga.
Inzho alya aaselukila inkuku, wakeza nkubakaakubele uleza bweenda ameenzhi.
Nibakamubona bakatiya cabulowe ukukwiila bakaamba ati, “Ngu sikazwa!”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Amukalike shamba, ndime. Mutatiyi.”
Inzho Pita wakaamba ati, “U mwami kuti naa ndiwe cini cini, ŋambila ame nyende ameenzhi.”
Wakaingula ati, “Kweza.” Ubobo Pita wakahwa mu bwato weenda ameenzhi weza kwa Jeso.
Pele naakaabona muuwo waunjisha, wakatiya ngoonaawo wakanka kwibila mu meenzhi walila ati, “Mwami nhuna!”
Ndilyona Jeso wakamukwata wamwita ati, “Umuntu wa lushomo lushoonto, nkaambonzhi nciwazuluzha?”
Ngoonaawo boonse bakanjila mu bwato u muuwo wakaliinza.
Ubobo ba shiciiya bakaakuli mu bwato bakamukomba u kwaamba ati, “Ncini cini uli Mwanaa Leza!”
Inzho nibakalanduka izhiba bakashika ku cishi ca Genesaleti.
Bantu bakoko nibakazhiba ati Jeso washika bakatuma myoompoompo kumasena oonse akaakubazhingulucile. Ubobo balwazhi boonse bakaletwa.
Bakamukumbila ati abahuminye balwazhi kwaamba bakumye kumoombe wacisani cakwe kwaamba bapone, inzho boonse bakacita bobo bakapona.
Ngoonaawo ba Falisi u balembi bakeza kwa Jeso kuhwa ku Jelusalemu bamubuzha ati,
“Nkaamboonzhi ba shiciiya bako ncibatacitili shakayiisha ba shaakale? Nkaambo tabasamba kumatashi kabatana kulya.”
Wakabaingula ati, “No umwe ncinzhi ncimusotokela milawo ya Leza, ukaambo kakuzanda kucilila bulyo injiisho shenu?
Inta kayi Leza wakalailila ati, ‘Lemeka uso u banoko,’ ulimwi ‘Kufwumbwa wezo usampaula ushi u baina ulyeelele kafwa.’
Pele umwe mulaamba ati, naa muntu wamwaambila ushi naa baina ati, ‘Shesho nshindaakuzanda kumuyohwa ndashipa Leza, teelele kulemeka ushi pe.’
Ubobo ukaambo kanjiisho shenu mwaliubausha izwi lya Leza.
Umwe nubashikuupaupa amenso!” Aizaya wakashinshima meni meni nakaamba ati,
pele myonzo yabo ili kulaale ame.
Tacibayohwa kunkomba,
kaambo balayiisha milawo ya bantu ukoya milawo ya Leza!’ ”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakaboompolola bantu u kubaambila ati, “Amupupulale muteeleleshe!
Tacili ciya mwifwu cisofwaazha muntu pe, pele cihwa mukanwa ncicisofwaazha muntu.”
Ba shiciiya bakeza kwakwe bamwaambila ati, “Sa alo ulizhi ati alya makani abacima ba Falisi?”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Kufwumbwa cishango ncaatakashanga Taata uli kwizeulu cilakazhulwa.
Amubaleke bulyo! Mboofwu balasololela boofwu, pele kuti moofwu wasololela moofwu nina balawila mwilindi boonse.”
Pita wakamwaambila ati, “Tupandululile kaka kaambyo ncikaamba.”
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Eena amwe muciina luzhibo?
Sa tamwizhi ati ceco cinjila mukanwa cilaita mwifwu mpaka caya kuhwa ansengwe.
Pele ceco cihwa mukanwa ncicisofwaazha muntu, nkaambo cilahwa mu monzo.
Nkaambo mu monzo mumuhwa mizeezo mibiyabi, buyazhi, bumambe, butewu, bukamboni bwakubeya u buhwizhi.
Sheshi nshishi musofwaazha muntu, pele kulya butasambile kumatashi tacimusofwaazha muntu pe.”
Inzho Jeso akuhwe bulyo koko wakaya kushishi sha Taya u Sidoni.
Inzho kwakamuzhila mukaintu waku Kenani. Wakapozomoka ati, “Mfwila luse u mwana Devidi, mwanangu mushimbi wanjilwa moza mubiyabi.”
Pele Jeso wiina naakamutaba niliba izwi lyomwi. Ngoonaawo ba shiciiya bakeza kwakwe bamwaambila ati, “Mutande wezu mukaintu watusabila.”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Ndakatumwa bulyo kumbelele inzhimini sha ŋanda ya Izilaili.”
Pele mukaintu wakaswena kufwukamina waamba ati, “Mwami njohwa.”
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Tacili cibotu kunanga bana cakulya u kucisowela babwa.”
Walo mukaintu wakaingula ati, “Ee mbwaabele, pele abo babwa balabwezelela bufwefwelenga buloka kwitebulu lyabashimalelo babo.”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Uwe uli mukaintu wa lushomo lukando, acibe umbona mbuuzanda.” Ubobo mwanakwe wakapona aciindi ncicona ceco.
Jeso wakakuhwa koko wakaya waita ku lwaatele lwa Galilaya. Wakaliza alupili wakakala.
Makamu makamu a bantu akashika kwakwe, akaletelela u balema u bapuutile u boofwu u bashicintaamba ubamwi banji banji. Bakabakalika kumbali kwa Jeso ubobo wakabaponya.
Bantu bakazhingwa cini cini nibakabona ati bashicintaamba bakaamba u balema bakeenda u boofwu bakabona u bapuutile bakapona. Ngoonaawo bakamutembaula Leza wa Izilaili.

Ngoonaawo Jeso wakabeta ba shiciiya bakwe waamba ati, “Banjetezha baba bantu, kaambo twaakuli abo kwa mazuba otatwe cakubula uncibalya pe. Pele nshizanda kubaambila ati baye bwiina ncibalile, balawizuka munzhila.”
Ba shiciiya bakamubuzha ati, “No tushiyane kwi shakulya shinji shinji mono mulukula shakuti bantu bakute?”
Jeso wakababuzha ati, “No mulikwete shinkwa shongaye?” Bakaingula ati, “Tulikwete bulyo shili ciloba utuswi tushoonto.”
Wakaambila makamu makamu abantu ati akale anshi.
Wakabweza shinkwa shili ciloba utuswi, amane kulumba wakashikomauna wabapa ba shiciiya kwaamba babaabanye bantu. Bakacita mbubona mbubakalaililwa.
Boonse bantu bakalya ukukuta, ba shiciiya bakabwezelela intundu shili ciloba shabufwefwelenga bwakashaala.
Balombwana bakalya kabali shuulu shili shone kutabala bakaintu u bana.
Bantu nibakamana kuya, Jeso wakanjila mu bwato wakaya ku cishi caku Magadani.
Wakabaingula ati, “Aba mangolezha mulaamba ati, ‘Bulakaca kabotu nkaambo kwizeulu kulasubila.’

Ubobo cifwumo fwumo mulaamba ati, ‘Bwasunu bwaca bubi nkaambo izeulu lilasubila ulimwi lilatizha.’ Mulicizhi kupandulula izeulu mbulilibonya pele tamukonzha kupandulula shitondezho shikanana makani ashiindi.
Izhalane ibiyabi lya bumambe, lilazanda citondezho, pele talikatondezhewa cita ambweni citondezho ca Jona mushinshimi.” Amane wakabashiya waya.
Ba shiciiya nibakalandukila kuluya lumwi bakaluba kubweza shinkwa.
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Amucenjele ku bumena bwa ba Falisi uba Saduki.”
Ubobo bakalyaambauzha ati, “Ambweni nkaambo kakuti twiina kubweza cinkwa ncaambila bobo.”
Jeso naakaazhiba aza wakaamba ati, “Umwe nubalushomo lushoonto! Nkamboonzhi mulaamba ati ambweni ncinkwa ncitwatabweza?
Sa usunu tamuna kuteelelesha? Sa tamuzhibaluka ati mushinkwa shosanwe ndakasanina bantu bali shuulu shosanwe ulimwi ukuti, kwakezula intundu shinji shinji shabufwefwelenga?
Inta kushinkwa shili ciloba ndakasanina bantu bali shuulu shili shone? Inzho mwakazuzha intundu shongaye shabufwefwelenga?
Nciinzhi camukasha kuzhiba ati nshaamba shinkwa? Inzho amucenjele ku bumena bwaba Falisi uba Saduki!”
Ubobo ba shiciiya bakazhiba ati tabuli bumena mbwaakaakubacenjezha pele kabacenjele kunjiisho shaba Falisi uba Saduki.
Inzho Jeso naakashika kubusena butewa ati Sizaliya Filipo, wakababuzha ba shiciiya ati, “Anu bantu balaamba ati ume ndi Mwanaa Muntu ndime ni?”
Bakaingula ati, “Bamwi balaamba ndiwe Johani Mupapatizhi, bamwi balaamba ati ndiwe Elaija. Bamwi balaamba ati ndiwe Jelemiya naa umwi wa bashinshimi.”
Wakababuzha ati, “No umwe mulaamba ati ndime ni?”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Ulilonjelwe Saimoni Bajona,
Inzho bwasunu ndakwaambila ati ndiwe Pita, ubobo amwala wezu ngunkaazakila imbungano yangu, ubobo insana sha lufwu tashikaizundi.
Ndakakupa maci a bwami bwa kwizeulu, kufwumbwa ncuukakaanga anshi ano u kwizeulu cilakaangwa. Ulimwi kufwumbwa ceco ncuukakaangulula anshi ano u kwizeulu cilakaangululwa.”
Amane Jeso wakabalaililisha kwaamba batashimwini muntu naaba womwi ati ngu Munanike wa Leza.

Kuhwa ceco ciindi, Jeso wakakanka kubaambila ba shiciiya bakwe ati ulyeelele kuya ku Jelusalemu kwaamba akapenzhewe cini cini ku bakando bakando u ku bapaizhi bakando u balembi. Ulimwi wakabaambila ati ulyeelele kuyayiwa pele mu buzuba bwatatu ulakabushiwa.
Ateelele bobo Pita wakamutola ambali ukukanka kumulemanina ati, “Pe pe Mwami ceco taceelele kukucitikila!”
Jeso wakacinduluka wamulanjilila Pita u kumwaambila ati, “Ahwe awa Shaatani! Uli cilebyo kwangu nkaambo tuli kuluya lwa Leza, pele uli ku buntu.”
Nkaambo kufwumbwa uzandisha kufwutula bumi bwakwe ulakabusowekelwa. Aze wezo usowekelwa bumi bwakwe ukaambo kangu ulakabuyana ulimwi.
Anu impindu nzhi njaayana muntu kuti weehuba inshi yoonse amana wasowekelwa bumi bwakwe?
Nkaambo Mwanaa Muntu ulakashika u baanjelo bakwe umbulemu bwa Ushi, ubobo ulakeza kupa bulumbu muntu woonse, kwiingaina u milimo yakwe njaakacita.
Cini cini ndamushimwina ati ngubali bamwi ano batakaaluboni lufwu kabatana kumubona Mwanaa Muntu uleza mu bwami bwakwe.”
Kwiite mazuba ali cisambomwi Jeso wakabweza Pita uba bunina ba Jemusi u Johani, baya baliza alupili lulamfwu.
Ngoonaawo ciwa caka Jeso cakasanduka. Bushu bwakwe bwakabala ukoya izuba, asho shakusama shakwe shakatuba bu.
Inzho Mozesi u Elaija wakalibonya ku bashiciiya ulakanana u Jeso.
Ulimwi Pita, wakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Cabota kwaamba ati tuli ano, naa cilakubotela nzake shifwutu shotatwe ano comwi ncako, cimwi ncaka Mozesi, cimwi cibe caka Elaija.”
Kacaamba bobo ikumbi limweka lyakabahumba, ngoonaawo kwakateelelwa izwi lyaamba ati, “Nguwezu mwanangu nakufwunwa uunjinina. Amumuteelele!”
Batteelele bobo ba shiciiya bakazoowa cakuti bakoona anshi buhunteme, ulimwi bakafwa bukandu.
Jeso wakashika wabaampa itashi amane wabaambila ati, “Amubuke mutatiyi.”
Inzho nibakalyaalala kwiina unji ngubakabona cita bulyo Jeso.
Nibakaakwiza buseluka a lupili, Jeso wakabalailila ati, “Kutabi muntu ngumushimwina aza makani kushikila Mwanaa Muntu akabushiwe ku bafwu.”
Ba shiciiya bakamubuzha Jeso ati, “No nkaamboonzhi balembi balaamba ati Elaija nguuyelele kutaanguna kushika?”
Wakabaingula ati, “Elaija ulazhiza, ulimwi ulakabukulusha shintu shoonse.
Pele ndamwaambila ati, Elaija wakashika kale pele bayina nibakamuzhiba, pele bakamucita umbona mbubakaakuzanda. Umbona bobo u Mwanaa Muntu mbubakaamupenzha.”
Ubobo ba shiciiya bakazhiba ati wakaakubaambila makani aka Johani Mupapatizhi.
Nibakashika kwi bunga lya bantu, kwakeza umwi mulombwana kwa Jeso wakamufwukamina,
waamba ati, “Mwami mufwile luse mwanangu kaambo ngushikasuntu, ulimwi ulapenga cabulowe, mu shiindi shinji shinji ulawila mu mulilo nimuba mu meenzhi.
Ndakaakumuletele ku bashiciiya bako kwaamba bamuponye, pele cakabakacila kumuponya.”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakaamba ati, “Akaka umwe nubantu batashomi, nu bashicinguni. No ndakala amwe ciindi cilamfwu buti? Anu mupengele ciindi cilamfwu buti? Amumulete kono mwana.”
Amane Jeso wakoolemanina wezo moza mubiyabi, u moza wakamuhwa mu mwana. Ngoonaawo mwana wakapona.
Ba shiciiya bakamubuzha kumabali ati, “Nkamboonzhi twakakacilwa kuukusha moza mubiyabi?”

Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Nkaambo kakuceya kwa lushomo. Cini cini kuti kamukwete lushomo luli ukoya insece ya masitadi mulakonzha kulwaambila lupili lolu ati, ‘Zhuka awa uukuya kolya!’ Kwiina cikonzha kumukacila pe.
[“Pele moza mubiyabi uuli ukoya wezu kwiina bunji mbuukushiwa cita bulyo kwiita mu kukomba u kuliimya kulya.”]
Inzho ba shiciiya nibakabungana mu Galilaya Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Mwanaa Muntu ulakaabwa mu matashi a bantu.
Balakamuyaya, pele ulakabushiwa ku bafwu mu buzuba bwatatu.” Bateelele bobo ba shiciiya bakausa cini cini.
Pita wakaingula ati, “Ee ulatela.” Pita naakanjila muŋanda Jeso wakataanguna kumubuzha ati, “Ulatelaika buti Saimoni? Nkukuli bani Bami baanshi nkubeelele kubweza mutelo, ku beenzu naa ku beninzhi?”
Pita wakaingula ati, “Mbeenzu!” Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Nkukuti ceci cilaamba ati beninzhi tabeelele kutela.”
Pele kwaamba ati tutabanyansha bashikutezha baba koya ukalobe ku lweenje. Inswi ikaataanguna kukwashiwa ku kalobo u keelakumune ulakayana ishekele, ukalitole ukantelele aze ukatele.
Jeso waketa kana kashoonto amane wakazhimika akati kabo
waamba ati, “Cini cini ndamwaambila ati mwataba ukoya twana, tamukanjili mu bwami bwa kwizeulu.
Kufwumbwa uulibombya ukoya kana kaka, wezo ngu mukando mu bwami bwa kwizeulu.
Ulimwi kufwumbwa utambula kana ukoya kaka mwizhina lyangu, ndime atambula.
“Pele kufwumbwa muntu ulebya bashoonto ba shoma kwaamba babishe, wezo ncibotu kwaamba waangililwa ibwe ikando munshingo, amana wasowelwa mu kankuni ka lwaatele.
Mapenzhi ku bantu baanshi ano ukaambo ka shilebyo shitola ku shibi! Shilebyo shilyeelele kuba ko, pele mapenzhi kuli wezo uushileta!
Ulimwi naa linso lyako lyakupa kwaamba ubishe, cili kabotu kwaamba ulilobole ulisowe! Ncibotu kwaamba wanjila mu bumi butamana ulinso lyomwi kubaala kusowelwa u mulilo utazhimi u menso obile.
[Nkaambo Mwanaa Muntu wakezhila kufwutula babo bazhiminine.]

“Inzho mulatelaika buti? Kuti muntu kakwete imbelele shili mwaanda, yamana imwi yazhimina, saa takonzha kushishiya shesho shili makumi ifwuka iimbelele ifwuka mushilundu u kuya kukapula yezho yakazhimina?
Kuti weeyana, cini cini ndamushimwina ati, ulabotelwa kubaala shesho shili makumi ali ifwuka iimbelele ifwuka sha taakuzhiminine.
Ubobo taluli luzando lwaka Taata uli kwizeulu kwaamba ati umwi wa bana bashoonto baba azhimine pe.
Pele kuti wakaka kuteelezhanya, bweza womwi muntu naa bobile muye mukaabandike makani akati ka bakamboni bobile naa botatwe.
Kuti naa abo babo wakaka kubateelela shimwina imbungano. Kuti naa ayo wakaka kwiiteelela, mulange bulyo ukoya muhwamashi naa shimutelo.
“Ulimwi ndamushimwina ati, kuti naa bantu bobile bahumizhanya anshi ano kuli ceco ncibakumbila, Taata uuli kwizeulu ulabacitila.
Nkaambo kufwumbwa koko bantu bobile naa botatwe nkubabungana mwizhina lyangu ati ame ndiliwo akati kabo.”
Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Kutali bulyo shiindi shili ciloba pe, shilyeelele kuba makumi ciloba ali ciloba.
Nkaambo bwami bwa kwizeulu buli ukoya mwami waketa basebezhi bakwe, kwaamba bamuzholele shikwelete shabo.
Akanke kubalanda umwi wakaakukwete matalenta ali shuulu shili ikumi wakaletwa kwakwe.
Pele ukaambo kakuti kaina cakuliya, mwami wakalailila ati auzhiwe antoomwi u mwinakwe ubanakwe u shintu shoonse nshaakaakukwete kwaamba mulandu umane.
Ateelele bobo wezu musebezhi wakamufwukamina mwami wakwe, wamulomba ati, ‘Mwami mfwila luse ndakakuzholela shoonse.’
Nkaambo kakuti wakafwa intenda, mwami wamusebezhi wezu wakamufwila luse wakamulekelela cikwelete coonse.
“Pele wezo musebezhi nguwena naakaya kwakwe wakashika kumusebezhinina wakaakukweletele ma dinali
Ateelele bobo musebezhinina wakamufwukamina wakamukumbila ati, ‘Ndekelela, ndakakuzholela!’
Pele walo wakakaka wakamutola kuya kumwaanzha muntolongo mpaka kushikila akaliye mulandu.
Inzho basebezhinina nibakabona ncaakacita, bakausa cini cini u kuya kumushimwina mwami wabo.
Ngoonaawo mwami wakwe wakamoompolola. Wamwaambila ati, ‘Uwe umusebezhi umbiyabi, ndakakulekelela welya mulandu woonse nkaambo wakankumbila.
Sa uwe tweelele kufwila luse musebezhi noko, umbuna mundakakufwila luse?’
Ubobo mubukali mwami wakamutumya kuli bashintolongo kwaamba akaangwe mpaka akoomane kuuliya mulandu woonse.
Mbubobo Taata uuli kwizeulu mbwaakaabacita boonse batalekelela banina ca monzo woonse.”
Inzho Jeso amane kubaambila mazwi aza wakakuhwa ku Galilaya, waya mucishi ca Judiya kumutala wa Joodani.
Makamu makamu a bantu akamucilila, ubobo wakabaponya nkukona koko.
Ba Falisi bakeza kumusunka bakamubuzha ati, “Sa muntu ulyeelele kumuleka mwinakwe kufwumbwa kaambo?”
Walo wakaingula ati, “Sa mwiina nimwakabala ati kumalengelo mulengi wakalenga mulombwana u mukaintu?
Ubobo mulombwana ulakashiya ushi u baina ukukakatila kumwinakwe. Ulimwi babo bobile ulaba mubili womwi.
Tabacili bobile baba mubili womwi. Ubobo ncaaswaanganya Leza, kutabi muntu ucaandaanya.”
Bamane bamubuzha ulimwi ati, “No nkaamboonzhi Mozesi wakalailila ati mulombwana ape mwinakwe luŋwalu lwa kumuleka amana amuleke?”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Nkaambo kakuti muli bazumu myonzo ncaakamuhumizhizha Mozesi kuleka benenu, pele kumalengelo kacitali bobo pe.”
Inzho ndamwaambila ati, “Kufwumbwa uuleka mwinakwe kukaambo kamwi bulyo katali kakubucilwa, amana watwala uunji, wezo ati wacita bumambe.”
Bamane ba shiciiya bakamwaambila ati, “Naa kuti mbukabele kaambo bobo ku makani a mulombwana u mwinakwe, nkukwaamba ncibotu kutatwala.”
Jeso wakabeta ati, “Lolu lwiiyo tabali bantu boonse bakonzha kulutambula, cita bulyo kuli babo Leza mbaalupele.

Nkaambo nkubali bamwi batakonzha kutwala ukaambo kabuzhalwe bwabo. Bamwi tabatwali kaambo bantu bakabacita bobo. Ulimwi nkubali ubamwi batatwali ukaambo ka bwami bwa kwizeulu. Kufwumbwa wezo uukonzha kutambula lolu lwiiyo naacite bobo.”
Bamwi bantu bakaleta bana bashoonto kwa Jeso kwaamba abaampe matashi ukubakombela, pele ba shiciiya bakabalemanina babo bantu.
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Amubaleke bana beze kwangu mutabakasha pe, nkaambo bwami bwa kwizeulu mbwabo bali bolya.”
Ubobo wakabaampa matashi amane wakabashiya.
Umwi mulombwana wakeza kwa Jeso waamba ati, “Mwiiyi anu ncite nzhi cibotu kwaamba nkabuyane bumi butamana?”
Wakamwaambila ati, “No kaamboonzhi ncuumbuzha ati nciciliye cibotu. Mubotu uli womwi bulyo. Kuti naa ulazanda kuya kunjila mu bumi butamana cilila milawo.”
Lemeka uso u banoko, ulimwi fwuna mweenzhinoko umbona mbuulifwini umwini?”
Wezo mulombwana wakaamba ati, “Yezhi yoonse ndeebamba. No kwashaala nzhi?”
Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Kuti naa ulazanda kulondoka, koya ukauzhe shoonse nshuukwete. Mali nguukayana ukape bapushi. Buhubi ulakabuyana kwizeulu. Wamana uzhize uncilile.”
Wezu mulombwana naakaateelela aza makani wakaya ulyuusile nkaambo kakwete lubono lunji lunji.
Jeso wakabaambila ba shiciiya ati, “Cini cini ndamushimwina ati ncizumu ku muntu muhubi kwaamba akenjile mu bwami bwa kwizeulu.
Ulimwi ndamwaambila ati ncuubauba inkamela kunjila mukapulo kansonde kubaala muntu muhubi kwaamba anjile mu bwami bwa Leza.”
Ba shiciiya nibakaateelela aza bakazhingwa cini cini u kwaamba ati, “Alo kulakaba ukaafwutuka?”
Pele Jeso wakabalanjilila wabaambila ati, “Ku bantu ceci ncizumu, pele kwa Leza shoonse shintu shilakonzha kucitika.”
Pita wakaingula ati, “Kayi bona uswe twakashishiya shoonse twakakucilila, no tulakapewaanzhi?”

Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Cini cini ndamwaambila ati mubulenge bupiya, lelyo Mwanaa Muntu naakaakala acuuna cakwe ca bulemu, amwe numuncilila mulakakala a shuuna shili ikumi ushuuna shobile sha bwami u kubeteka mishobo iili ikumi iitwesha yobile ya Izilaili.

Ubobo kufwumbwa wezo wakashiya munzhi nibaba banina balombwana u bakaintu, naa ushi naaba baina naa bana, niiba myuunda yakwe ukaambo kezhina lyangu ulakatambula shishika ku mwaanda kubaala nshaakashiya ulimwi ulakakona bumi butamana.
Pele banji banji bataanzhi balakaba bashaalizhi, abo bashaalizhi balakaba bataanzhi.”
Nkaambo bwami bwa kwizeulu bulikozhene umuntu wakafwuma cifwumo fwumo kwaamba anjizhe bashimilimo ku muunda wakwe wa masaansa.
Inzho nibakamana kuteelezhanya kuhola idinali lyomwi a buzuba wakabatuma ku muunda wakwe wa masaansa.
Wakeendeenda ulimwi ku cisambalilo ikasaalizhi amane wakayana bamwi bantu balizhimine bulyo bayina ncibacita.
Wakabaambila ati, “Kamuya amwe ku muunda wangu wa masaansa ndamuhozha bululeme.”
Ubobo bakaya. Wezo muntu wakacita mbubona bobo kuli mbaakayana cifwumo umbaakayana ilyakumbo.
Nikwakaba kumangolezha wakaya ulimwi wayana ubamwi balizhimine, amane wababuzha ati, “Nkamboonzhi mulizhimine bulyo buzuba boonse?”
Balo bakaingula ati, “Nkaambo kwiina muntu watunjizha mulimo.” Ngoonaawo wakabaambila ati, “Amwe kamuya mukasebeze mu muunda wangu wa masaansa.”
Ubobo babo bakashika ilyakumbo bakahola idinali lyomwi.
Inzho Bataanzhi nibakashika, bakaakutelaika ati balahola cibaala pele bakahola idinali lyomwi ndilyona,
ubobo bakamutongaucila mukamwini muunda,
baamba ati, “Baba bashaalizhi basebeza bulyo iwoola lyomwi, nikuba bobo wabapa umbona mbuwatupa aswe nitwasebeza buzuba boonse mulumwi.”
Walo wakamwiingula umwi wabo ati, “Mweenzuma ndiina indakubishizha pe, nkaambo twateelezhanya idinali lyomwi.
Bweza bulyo shako uukuya. Ndasala kumupa wezu mushaalizhi mbubona mundakupa aze,
Sa nshihuminyiwa kucita mwiinzanda ku shintu shangu? Naa wafwa munyono ukaambo ka bubotu bwangu?”
Inzho Jeso naakaakuya ku Jelusalemu, wakabatola ba shiciiya bakwe bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile ambali wakabaambila ati,
“Amubone tulaya ku Jelusalemu, ubobo Mwanaa Muntu ulakaabwa mu matashi a bapaizhi bakando u balembi. Ulimwi balakamupa mulandu wa lufwu,
bamana bakamwaabe kuli bantu bakunze kwaamba bakamusampaule, bakamukwipaule u kumukankamina aciciinkano. Pele nikuba bobo mu buzuba bwatatu ulakabushiwa.”
Inzho muka Zebedi wakeza u banakwe balombwana bobile kwa Jeso u kulomba. Wakakotama kwaamba akumbile cimwi cintu.
Jeso wakamubuzha ati, “Nciinzhi ncimuzanda?” Wakaingula ati, “nshomezha ati, banangu baba balombwana umwi ulakakala kucilyo umwi ulakakala kucimonsho mu bwami bwako.”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Tamucizhi ncimukumbila pe. Sa mulakonzha kunwina munkapu yamapenzhi njinkaanwina?” Bakaingula ati, “Tulakonzha.”
Ubobo wakabaambila ati, “Ncibotu mulakanwina munkapu yezho, pele kukala kuluya lwakucimonsho naa kucilyo kwangu indime iimpa pe. Pele masena azo ngababo mbaakaabambila Taata.”
Ba shiciiya bali ikumi nibakateelela bobo bakabalemanina ba bunina babo bobile.
Pele Jeso wakabeta wakabaambila ati, “Mulizhi ati beendelezhi ba bantu bakunze balalila a mitwi ya bantu, abo bami balabalela iinsana bantu babo.
Pele akati kenu takweelele kuba bobo pe. Kufwumbwa wezo uuzanda kuba mukando akati kenu, ulyeelele kuba mutwanga wenu.
Ulimwi kufwumbwa wezo uuzanda kuba mutaanzhi ulyeelele kuba muzhice wenu.
Amube ukoya Mwanaa Muntu, walo watakezhila kusebezelwa pele kusebezela, ukwaaba bumi bwakwe kwaamba bube cinunuzho ca bantu banji banji.”
Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe nibakamuhwa mu Jeliko, ikamu lya bantu lyakabacilila.
Ubobo balombwana bobile boofwu kabashite kumbali kunzhila, nibakateelela ati Jeso uleza bwiza bakapozomoka ati, “Tufwile inkumbu Mwanakwe Devidi!”
Bantu bakabalemanina u kubaambila ati, baliinze. Pele balo bakapozomokesha ati, “Akaka Mwami tufwile inkumbu, Mwanakwe Devidi!”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakazhima wabeta, wakababuzha ati, “Mulazanda ati mucitile inzhi?”
Balo bakaingula ati, “Mwami, ayalule menso esu.”
Ubobo Jeso wakabafwila intenda, ngoonaawo wakaakwata menso abo, ndilyona bakabona u kumucilila.
Inzho nibakaswena afwaafwi ku Jelusalemu bakashika ku Betefage ku lupili lwa masamu ama Oliva. Jeso wakatuma ba shiciiya bobile,
wabaambila ati, “Kamuya ku munzhi welya mulakayana imbongolo ilyaanjilwe u mwanayo. Mukashaangulule mushilete kwangu.
Kuti naa umwi muntu akamubuzhe ati mutola kwi, mukaambe ati Mwami ulashizanda. Ngoonaawo ulakashituma.
Aza akacitwa kwaamba azuzucizhiwe akaamba mushinshimi aakuti,
‘Kamulanga Mwami wenu uleza kwenu,
uleza cakulibonzha, ulilizile ambongolo,
cini cini ulilizile a mwana wa mbongolo.’ ”
Ngoonaawo ba shiciiya bakaya u kucita umbona mbwaakabalailila Jeso.
Bakeeleta imbongolo u mwanayo, bakabika shikobelo shabo ambongolo, amane Jeso wakaliza wakala ali nshisho.
Bantu banji banji bakazala shikobelo shabo mu mukwakwa, ulimwi bamwi bakakombaula tutabi twashisamu batuzala mu mukwakwa.
Inzho makamu akaakweendela kumbele aazo akaakuli munshi akapozomoka ati, “Hosana ku Mwanaa Devidi! Walongelwa wezo uzhiza mwizhina lya Mwami! Hosana nubakwizeulu lyamazeulu!”
Jeso naakanjila mu Jelusalemu boonse bantu bakazhingwa u kwaamba ati, “Anu nguni wezu?”
Inzho makamu a bantu akaamba ati, “Wezu ngu Jeso mushinshimi uuhwa ku Nanzaleta waku Galilaya.”
Inzho Jeso wakanjila muŋanda ya Leza u kutanda bantu boonse bakaakuuzha u kuula muŋanda ya Leza. Wakapinuna matebulu a bashikucinca mali, ushuuna shabo babo bakaakuuzha inkwilimba.
Wakabaambila ati, “Kulilembelwe ati, ‘Iŋanda yangu ilakaakutewa ati iŋanda yakukombela,’ pele umwe mweecita ati cibe cizubilo ca batewu.”
Boofwu u balema bakeza kwa Jeso, wakabaponya.
Pele bapaizhi bakando ubalembi nibakabona shintu shizhinga nshaakacita u kuteelelela bana bakaakupozomoka ati, “Hosana ku Mwana Devidi!” Bakalemana.
Bakamubuzha ati, “Sa uliciteelele ncibaamba?” Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Ee, sa tamunabalile ati, ‘Wakatambula mantembu kuhwa mukanwa kabalubembe u bana banonka.’”
Amane kubashiya Jeso wakaya ku munzhi wa Betani nkwaakoona.
Inzho cifwumo fwumo Jeso naakaakupiluka ku Jelusalemu wakafwa inzala.

Ubobo naakabona ikuzu kumbali kunzhila, wakaya kwaamba alye inkuzu. Pele kalitazhele kakushuukile bulyo matuhwu. Ngoonaawo wakalyaambila ikuzu lelyo ati, “Utakazhali linji micelo.” Awo ngoonaawo ikuzu lyakazuma.
Ba shiciiya nibakacibona ceco, bakazhingwa u kwaamba ati, “Anu leli ikuzu lyafwamba buti kuzuma?”

Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Cini cini ndamushimwina ati, kuti kamushoma cakutazuluzha tamukaciti bulyo ceci cacitika kwikuzu leli, pele nikuba kuti mwalwaambila lupili lolu ati, ‘Zhuka uliwaale mu lwaatele,’ cilakacitika.
Kufwumbwa ncimukaakumbila kwiita mu kukomba mulakapewa mwaakukwete lushomo.”

Inzho Jeso naakanjila muŋanda ya Leza, bapaizhi bakando ubakando ba cishi bakashika kwa Jeso bamuyana ulayiisha bamubuzha ati, “Anu insana nshuucisha sheshi shintu shoonse wakashiyana kwi? Twaambile naa nguni wakakupa?”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Ame ndamubuzha mubuzho. Kuti munyingule ame ndamwiingula nkushihwa insana nshincisha sheshi shintu.
Lupapatizo lwa Johani lwakahwa kwi. Sa lwakahwa kwa Leza, naa ku bantu?” Ubobo bakakazhanya mulwabo beni ati, “Kuti twaambe ati, ‘Lwakahwa kwizeulu,’ ulaamba ati, ‘Nkamboonzhi mwiina kumushoma?’
Ulimwi awo kuti twaambe ati, ‘Lwakahwa ku bantu,’ tulatiya nkaambo bantu boonse balizhi ati Johani kali mushinshimi.”
Ubobo bakaingula ati, “Tatwizhi pe.” Amane aze wakabaambila ati, “Ame nshimwaambila nkunshiyana insana shakucisha sheshi shintu.”
Jeso wakababuzha ati, “Mutelaika buti? Muntu wakaakukwete bana bobile, wakaya kumutaanzhi wamwaambila ati, ‘Mwanangu koya ukasebeze mu muunda wamasaansa bwasunu.’
Mwana wakaingula ati, ‘Nshiyi koko ume.’ Pele kwiite ciindi wakalitelaisha wakaya ukusebeza.
Ulimwi ushi wakaya kuli umwi wamwaambila umbona ati koya ukasebeze. Wezo wakaingula ati, ‘Ndaya taata,’ pele wiina naakaya.
Inzho nguuliye wakacita luzando lwa ushi? Bakaingula ati, ‘Wakutaanguna.’ Jeso wakabaambila ati, cini cini ndamwaambila ati ba shimitelo u bahuule balakamutaangunina kunjila mu bwami bwaka Leza.
Nkaambo Johani wakeza kwenu munzhila ya bululami, ulimwi mwiina kumushoma. Pele bashimitelo ubahuule bakamushoma. Pele u ciindi nimwakabona bobo mwiina nimwakaleka kucita shibi u kumushoma.”
Inzho ciindi ca kutebula nicakaswena, wakatuma basebezhi bakwe ku balimi kwaamba bakalete micelo.
Pele balimi bakabakwata basebezhi bakwe. Umwi bakamuuma, umwi bakamuyaya, wezu umwi bakamuuma mabwe.
Ulimwi wakatuma banji basebezhi banji banji kubaala bataanzhi, abo babo bakabacita umbona bobo.
Ku mamanino wakabatumina mwanakwe, kashoma ati, ‘Ambweni walo mwanangu balakamulemeka.’
Pele balimi nibakamubona wezo mwana bakalihwiya baamba ati, ‘Nguwezu shimulyazhina. Amweende tumuyaye tulubweze lukono lwakwe.’
Ubobo bakamukwata bamusowela ansengwe lya muunda wa masaansa bamane bamuyaya.
“No ninzho mukamwini muunda wa masaansa akazhiza ulakabacita buti babo balimi?”
Bakaingula ati, “Ulakabayaya babo babiyabi u lufwu luusha insoni, amana akoope wezo muunda wa masaansa ku balimi banji. Babo bakaamupa micelo muciindi ceelele.”
Jeso wakababuzha ati, “Sa mwiina nimwakabala mu Malembe aamba ati,
“Ibwe ndibakakaka bazashi ndilyaba ibwe lizandwa mucooko.”
Mwami nguwakacita sheshi
Ubobo shilazhinga cini cini kumenso esu.
“Inzho ndamwaambila ati mulakanangwa bwami bwa Leza bulakapewa ku mishobo iinji ikaazhala micelo iiyelele.
Ubobo kufwumbwa uuwila ebwe lelyo, ulakacoka, aze wezo ngulikaalokela lilakamushanauna.”
Bapaizhi bakando uba Falisi nibakashiteelela sheshi shikozhano shakaakwaambwa, bakazhiba ati mbaakumbilizha.
Bakaakuzanda ati bamukwate, pele kabatiya bantu kaambo balo kabahumina ati mushinshimi.
Jeso wakabaambila ulimwi cikozhano cakuti,
“Bwami bwa kwizeulu buli ukoya mwami umwi wakacita ipobwe lya bwinga bwa mwanakwe.
Wakatuma basebezhi bakwe kuya kwita babo bakaakutambilwe kwipobwe pele bayina nibakeza.
Ulimwi wakatuma basebezhi banji wakabaambila ati, ‘Amukabashimwine batambe ati, shakulya ndabamba kale. Basune bangu uboombe bainu bayaiwa kale, shoonse nshibambe kale, kamwiza kwipobwe.’
Pele ceco bayina ukucibika matwi. Umwi wakaya ku muunda yakwe umwi wakaya kumpindu.
Bamwi baba bakakwata basebezhi bakwe babapenzha ukubayaya.
Mwami wakalemana cini cini, ubobo wakatuma bashikalumamba bakwe kuya kubazonauna babo bayazhi ukuutenta munzhi wabo.
Inzho wakabaambila batwanga bakwe ati, ‘Ipobwe lyabambwa kale, pele batambe talibeelele.
Ubobo kamuya kumansaanga a nzhila, mukatambe kufwumbwa mbumukaayana!’
Babo basebezhi bakaya umikwakwa kuya kukobolola kufwumbwa mbubakayana, Babotu u batali babotu. Ubobo iŋanda yabwinga yakezula beenzu.
“Mwami naakanjila kwaamba abone beenzu, wakabona umwi mulombwana watakaakusamine cikobelo ca bwinga.
Ngoonaawo wakamwaambila ati, ‘Anu uwe mweenzuma wanjila buti mono ubutasamine cikobelo ca bwinga?’ Walo wakabula ca kwaamba.
Ubobo mwami wakabaambila basebezhi bakwe ati, ‘Amumwaange kumatashi ukumaulu, mwamana mumusowele ansengwe mu mushinze, koko ukukaaba kulila, ukuluma inkwino.’
“Nkaambo batambilwe mbanji banji pele basale mbashoonto.”
Inzho ba Falisi bakaya kulihwiya kwaamba bamukwashe mu kwaamba kwakwe.
Bakamutumina ba shiciiya babo uba Helodiyani,
Inzho twaambile mbuutelaika. Sa cililuleme kutela mutelo ku muleli mukando waku Loma naa pe?
Jeso wakoozhiba muzeezo wabo mubiyabi, wakaamba ati, Anu nciinzhi ncimunsunkila umwe nubashikuupaupa amenso?
Amuntondezhe ili lelyo ndimusebezha kutela mutelo.” Ubobo bakamuletela ili lyomwi.
Jeso wakababuzha ati, “No nguni uli mutwi wezu uuli eli leli, iizhina lilembelwe awa ndyakani?”
Bakaamba ati, “Nsha muleli mukando Kaisala waku Loma.” Ngoonaawo wakabaambila ati, “Amumupe Kaisala shakwe Kaisala, ulimwi shaka Leza mumupe Leza.”
Bateelele bobo, bakazhingwa cini cini, bakaya bamushiya.
Inzho bakamwaambila ati, “Mwiiyi, Mozesi wakatwaambila ati, ‘Kuti muntu wafwa kaina bana, munina ulyeelele kumutwala mukamufwu kwaamba amuzhalile bana mufwu.’
Inzho kakuli bantu babunina bali ciloba akati kesu. Mukando wakatwala amane wafwa wiina kuzhala bana, wakashiya mukaintu ku munina.
Uwabili wakamukona mukamufwu aze wiina kuzhala bana, uwatatu boonse bakacita bobo kushilila kuli wa ciloba.
Nibakamaninina boonse aze mukaintu wakafwa.
No ninzho bakabuka bafwu, wezo mukaintu ulakaba mukani ali babo boonse bali ciloba? Nkaambo boonse kabamutwele.”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Mulizhiminine, tamweezhi Malembe nishiba insana sha Leza.
Nkaambo kububuke bwa bafwu tabakatwali nikuba kutwalwa, nkaambo balakaba ukoya baanjelo ba kwizeulu.
Ku makani a bubuke bwa bafwu, sa mwiina nimwakabala shesho Leza nshaakamwaambila naakaamba ati,
‘Ndime Leza wa Abulahamu, Leza wa Aizeki, Leza wa Jakobo.’ Ngu Leza wabo bapona, tali Leza wa bafwu.”
Ibunga lya bantu bakaakuliko nilyakakateelela bobo, lyakazhingwa cini cini ukaambo kakuyiisha kwakwe.
Inzho ba Falisi nibakateelela ati Jeso wa baumuzha ba Saduki bakabungana antoomwi.
Ubobo umwi shimulawo wakamubuzha mubuzho wakumusunka ati,
“Mwiiyi, no nguuliye mulawo mukando mu Milawo?”
Wakamwiingula ati, “Fwuna Mwami Leza wako u monzo wako woonse, u moza wako woonse, u mizeezo yako yoonse.
Wezu ngu Mulawo mukando ulimwi ngumutaanzhi.
Uwabili uli umbona mbuli wezu. Fwuna mweenzhinoko umbona mbuulifwini umwini.
A milawo yezhi yobile ngaahwa milawo yoonse iinjiisho shabashinshimi.”
Kabacibungene ba Falisi
Jeso wakababuzha mubuzho ati, “Mutelaika buti sha Munanike waka Leza? Ngwa luhubo lwakani?” Bakamwiingula ati, “Mwanakwe Devidi.”
Amane wakababuzha ati, “No kaamboonzhi Devidi naakanjilwa Moza usalala ncaakamwitila ati, ‘Mwami.’ Ciindi naakaamba ati,
‘Kala kuluya lwangu lwa cilyo,
kushikila nkababike ba shinkondonoko kunshi kumatende ako.’
“Kuti naa Devidi kamwita ati, ‘Mwami,’ no ulaba buti mwanakwe?”
“Kwiina muntu wakakonzha kumwiingula niliba izwi lyomwi. Inzho kuhwa kubuzuba bobo kwiina naaba womwi wakamubuzha linji mibuzho.”
Kuhwaawo Jeso wakaamba kumakamu makamu a bantu uku ba shiciiya bakwe ati,
“Balembi uba Falisi balakala acuuna caka Mozesi.
Ubobo amucite shesho nshibamwaambila. Kutali kucita nshibacita, kaambo balakambauka bulyo amana tabashiciti pe.
Balaanga mikuli milemu iiminya kubweza, ukwiibika amafwunzhi a bantu, pele balo beni tabazanda kubweza nikaceya.
Balacita milimo yabo kwaamba babonwe ku bantu. Balalyaanga inkomo inkando shakubika milawo ya Leza u kusama masani abo malamfwu lamfwu.
Balazandisha kukala a shuuna shabulemu mu shikombelo shaba Juda u kuzanda masena a bulemu mu mapobwe.
Balazanda kwaanzhiwa u kulemekwa mu shisambalilo, ukutewa ati mwiiyi ku bantu.
Pele umwe mutaakutewa ati mwiiyi nkaambo mulikwete Mwiiyi womwi, umwe noonse muli ba bunina.
Ulimwi muteti muntu naaba womwi ano anshi ati Taata, kaambo mulikwete Ushenu womwi wezo uuli kwizeulu.
Ulimwi mutatewa ati basololi, nkaambo mulikwete musolozhi womwi, wezo uli ngu Munanike waka Leza.
Wezo mukando akati kenu, abe musebezhi wenu,
Nkaambo kufwumbwa uulisumpula ulakafwiinshiwa, aze uulifwiinsha ulakasumpulwa.”
“Pele mulakapenga umwe nubalembi uba Falisi bashikuupaupa amenso! Mulashincila bwami bwa kwizeulu ku bantu. Ukaambo kakuti umwe mwakacilwa, mwakanka kukasha babo bazanda kunjila.
Mulakapenga umwe nubalembi u ba Falisi bashikuupaupa amenso! Mulalya lubono lwabamukabafwu, mwamana mulaamba shikombyo shilamfwu sha kucenga. Ceco cilakamuyanya mulandu mukando.

“Mulakapenga umwe nubalembi uba Falisi bashikuupaupa amenso nkaambo muleenda inyendo shamu lwaatele anshi kwaamba musandule muntu womwi, mwamana mulacita muntu wezo kwaamba akwate mulandu wakufwuswa mu mulilo uutamana kubaazha umwe.

“Mulakapenga umwe nubasololi boofwu, numuyiisha ati, ‘Kuti naa umwi wapinga iŋanda ya Leza ulakonzha kutacibamba ceco ncaapinga, pele kuti wapinga ku goludi ya muŋanda ya Leza ulyeelele kucibamba ceco ncaapinga.’
Umwe nubasololi boofwu balimbushi! Anu nciciliye cikando, goludi naa iŋanda ya Leza iisalazha goludi?
Ulimwi mulaamba ati, ‘Kuti naa umwi wapinga acipaililo, ulakonzha kutacicita ceco ncaapinga, pele kuti wapinga a cipo cili acipaililo ulyeelele kucicita ceco ncaapinga.’
Umwe nubantu boofwu! Anu nciciliye cikando, cipo naa cipaililo cisalazha cipo ceco.
Wezo uupinga acipaililo ulapinga u shesho shoonse shiliwo.
Aze wezo uupinga iŋanda ya Leza ulapinga iiŋanda ulimwi u wezo uukalamo.
Aze wezo uupinga iizeulu ulapinga ucuuna ca Leza u wezo uukalawo.
Umwe nubasololi boofwu, mulasonzola inzhi pele mulamina inkamela.
“Mulakapenga umwe nubalembi uba Falisi nubashikuupaupa amenso! Nkaambo mulasanzha inkapu umutiba ansengwe aakuli mukati mulizwile bulyato, u kutalikasha kunanzha bantu shabo.
Umwe nuba Falisi boofwu amutaangune musanzhe inkapu umutiba mukati ndilelyo ansengwe naakasalala.
Umbona bobo mbumulibonya ukoya bantu baluleme ku bantu, pele mukati kenu mulizwile kuupaupa amenso u shibi.
“Mulakapenga umwe nubalembi uba Falisi nubashikuupaupa amenso! Mulazaka shuumbwe sha bashinshimi u kubosha bosha shibumbwa sha baluleme,
mulaamba ati, ‘Kuti nitwakaakuliko ku mazuba a bamatata nitwatakabayohwa kutila bulowa bwa bashinshimi.’
Mbubobo mbumulipa mulandu, kaambo mulaamba ati muli banabo babo bakayaya bashinshimi.
Imbubo amuzulizhe mweelwe wa shibi sha maushenu.

Inzho ndamwaambila ati ndamutumina bashinshimi u bantu basongo u balembi, bamwi mulakabayaya u kubakankamina aciciinkano. Bamwi mulakabapenzha mu shikombelo shaba Juda u kubatanda kuhwa mu munzhi u munzhi.

Ubobo cisubulo ca bulowa bwa bantu baluleme bwakatika anshi cileza alyuumwe, kutalikila ku bulowa bwaka Abelo mululami, kushikila ku bulowa bwaka Zakaliya mwanakwe Balakiya, wezo ngumwakayaya mucikombelo akati kabusena busalalisha u cipaililo.
Cini cini ndamushimwina ati, shoonse sheshi shilakeza ku bantu bezhalane leli.”

“Akaka Jelusalemu, Jelusalemu, uuyaya bashinshimi ukubauma mabwe babo mbaatuma Leza kwenu. Mu shiindi shinji shinji ndakaakuzanda kubabunganya bantu bako antoomwi umbona mbwiicita inkuku niibafwukatila banayo umababa ayo pele uwe wakaka!
Cini cini iŋanda njimukombela lyaba itongo.
Inzho ndamwaambila ati, tamukamboni linji, cita mukaambe ati, ‘Ulilongelwe wezo uuzhiza mwizhina lya Mwami.’ ”
Inzho naakuya bweenda kuhwa muŋanda ya Leza, ba shiciiya bakwe bakamutondezha buzake bwa ŋanda ya Leza.
Walo wakabaingula ati, “Sa mwashibona sheshi shoonse? Cini cini ndawaambila ati kwiina ibwe likashaala ezeulu alyeenzhiina. Oonse alakoolomonwa.”

Inzho Jeso naakakala alupili lwa masamu ama oliva, ba shiciiya bakwe bakashika kwakwe cakuliseseka bamubuzha ati, “Tushimwine, ndililiye sheshi shintu nishikaacitika? Ulimwi nciinzhi cikaaba citondezho cakwiza kwako u mamanino aciindi?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Amucenjele kwaamba muntu atakamucengi.
Nkaambo banji banji balakeza mwizhina lyangu ukwaamba ati, ‘Ndime wezo Munanike,’ ulimwi balakasowa bantu banji banji.
Mulakaakuteelela inkondo iimpuwo shankondo, shili kulaale pele mutakatiyi. Nkaambo sheshi shilyeelele kutaanguna kucitika mamanino kaatana kushika,
cishi cilakalwa u cishi nina, aabo bwami u bwami nina. Kulakaba inzala u kuzungaana kwanshi umasena aandeene andeene.
Shoonse shehi makancilo bulyo a mapenzhi ali ukoya mishika yamukaintu uuzanda kutumbuka.
Muciindi ceco bantu banji banji balakaluleka lushomo lwabo. Muntu umwi uumwi ulakaaba u kusula mweenzhiina.
Kulakashika bashinshimi babeshi banji banji, ulimwi balakasowa bantu banji banji.
Inzho ukaambo kakuhula kwabubi, lufwuno lwa bantu banji banji lulakamana.
Pele wezo ukaakakatila kushikila ku mamanino ulakafwutulwa.
Ulimwi aza Makani Mabotu a bwami bwa Leza, alakakambaukwa inshi yoonse kwaamba bukabe bumboni ku mishobo yoonse. Ndilelyo mamanino aciindi naakaashika.
Babo bali mu Judiya balukancile ku mapili.
Aze wezo uuli alululi ataseluka kwaamba akakushe shesho shili muŋanda yakwe.
Uukayanwa ku muunda atakasowa ciindi cakupiluka kuŋanda kuya kubweza cibaci cakwe.
Pele kulakaba mapenzhi ku bakaintu bamishi u babo bati bakaakunonsha ku mazuba azo!
Amukombe kwaamba mutakalukanka muciindi camweto naa mu Sabata.
Nkaambo ku ciindi ceco kulakaba mapenzhi aatanabwenwe kuhwa kumalengelo anshi kushikila bwasunu, ulimwi takukabi aanji a kozhene aazo pe.
Inzho azo mazuba kuti naatakafwiinshiwa, nikwatakaba naaba womwi muntu uuti naakafwutuka. Pele Leza ulakaafwiinsha mazuba azo ukaambo ka bantu mbaakasala.
“Ku ciindi ceco, naa umwi akaambe ati, ‘Bona nguwezu Kilisito!’ Naa ati, ‘Nguwelya!’ Mutamushomi.
Nkaambo kulakaba babeshi balyaamba ati, ‘Ndime Kilisito’ ulimwi kulakaba u bashinshimi babeshi! Balakacita shitondezho u shintu shizoosha, kwaamba cakaakukonzheka bakabasowe u babo mbaakasala.
Amuteelele, ndamushimwinina limwi shintu sheshi kashitana kucitika.
Ulimwi kuti bantu bakamwaambile ati, ‘Amuteelele Kilisito uli mulukula,’ mutakayi. Kuti naa bakaambe ati, ‘Amubone nguwelya ulizubile kolya,’ mutakashomi.
Bobo mbwakeeza Mwanaa Muntu, ulakeza ukoya lulabo mbululaba kuhwa kwiwe ukumweka kuya kushika kumbo.
Koko kuli mutunta nkubakaabungana ba shikube.
Inzho kulakalibonya citondezho ca Mwanaa Muntu mwizeulu, ubobo mishobo yoonse yaanshi ilakalila ulimwi balakoombona Mwanaa Muntu uleza ezeulu amakumbi iinsana u bulemu bukando.
Ulimwi ulakatuma baanjelo bakwe u kulila kukando kwapeta, kwaamba beze kubunganya bantu mbaakalisalila kuhwa kuluya lumwi lwanshi kuya kushika kuluya lumwi.
“Amwiiye ciiyo kuhwa kwisamu lya mukuzu. Mwalibona lyashuuka mwazhiba ati mainza ali afwaafwi.
Umbona bobo amwe mwakashibona sheshi shintu mukezhibe ati Mwanaa Muntu uli afwaafwi ulimwi uli amulyango.
Cini cini ndamwaambila ati, izhalani leli tabakamaninina kufwa mpaka shintu sheshi shoonse shikacitike.
Izeulu iinshi shilakaloba pele mazwi angu taakamana.
“Pele kwiina uubwizhi buzuba niciba ciindi naaba womwi. Nibaba baanjelo ba kwizeulu, naaba Mwana, cita bulyo Taata ice nguuzhi.
Umbona mbucakaakubele ku mazuba a Nowa, ukwiza kwa Mwanaa Muntu mbukukaaba.
Nkaambo ku mazuba a Nowa meenzhi kaatana kupaya, bantu bakaakulya u kunwa u kutwala u kutwazhiwa, mpaka mu buzuba Nowa naakanjila mu bwato.
Kwiina ncibakaakwizhi kushikila meenzhi naakabalobya boonse. Umbona bobo mbukukaaba ukwiza kwa Mwanaa Muntu.
Ku ciindi ceco bantu bobile balakayanwa mu muunda balalima, umwi ulakatolwa umwi ulakashaala.
Bakaintu bobile balakaakuzhiya antoomwi pele umwi ulakatolwa umwi ulakashaala.
“Ubobo amucenjele, nkaambo tamubwizhi buzuba Mwami wenu naakaazhiza.
Inzho amuzhibe aza, kuti mukamwini iŋanda naakaakwizhi buzuba mutewu mbwaazhiza, naakakala ukulindila kwaamba mutewu atanjili.
Ubobo amwe mulyeelele kulibambila, nkaambo Mwanaa Muntu ulakeza muciindi ncimutamuzeezela.
“Nguuliye musebezhi musongo uushomeka? Nguwezo wakabikwa kwa shimatwangaakwe kwaamba alange basebezhinina, kwaamba aakubapa shakulya muciindi ceelele.
Walongelwa wezo musebezhi uufwumbi ati azhoka shimatwanga wakwe wamuyana ulasebeza.
Cini cini ndamwaambila ati, shimatwangaakwe ulakamubika kwaamba abe nguulanga lubono lwakwe loonse.
Pele musebezhi mubiyabi ulaamba ati, ‘Shimalelo wangu wamuka,’
amana wakanka kuuma basebezhinina, ukulya u kunwa u bacakolwa.
Shimatwanga wamusebezhi wezo ulakeza mu buzuba mbwaatamuzeezela aciindi ncaatezhi.
Ulakamupa cisubulo, ukumusowela koko kuyanwa bashikuupaupa amenso. Kwalo koko bantu nkubakaalila u kuluma inkwino.”
Bosanwe kabali balimbushi, bamwi bali bosanwe kabali basongo.
Ciindi balimbushi nibakabweza malambe abo, bayina kubwezelezha mungwimba wakuzunjila mu malambe abo.
Pele basongo balo bakabweza tu botela twa mungwimba wakuzungila.
Ukaambo kakuti shibwinga wakamuka kushika, bakafwukula boonse bakoona.
“Inzho akati kabushiku kwakateelelwa iyowe lyakuti, ‘Amubone nguwezu shibwinga washika! Amuhwe mukamucinge!’
Inzho banakalindu boonse bakabuka, bazasha malambe abo.
Banakalindu balimbushi bakaambila babo basongo ati, ‘amutupe mungwimba wenu kaambo malambe esu azhima!’
Pele babo basongo bakaingula ati, ‘Twamupa tulabulizha. Kamuya kubasambazhi mukalyuulile wenu.’
Inzho ciindi nibakaya kwaamba bakaule, shibwinga wakashika, ubobo babo bakaakulibambile bakenjila antoomwi uushibwinga, umulyango wakayalwa.
Walo wakabaingula ati, ‘Ndamushimwina cini cini ati, shimwizhi pe.’”
Jeso wakamaninzha u kwaamba ati, “Amulindile nkaambo tamucizhi ciindi Mwanaa Muntu ncaakaazhiza.”
Umwi wakamupa matalanta osanwe, wabili wakamupa matalanta obile, watatu wakamupa italanta lyomwi. Wakabapa kwiingaina uumwi mbwaakonzha. Amane wakazhimuka waya.
Wezo wakabweza matalanta osanwe wakaapindauka wayana impindu yamatalanta aanji ali osanwe.
Umbona bulyo u wezo wakapewa obile aze wakaapindauka u kuyana aamwi obile.
Pele wezo wakatambula italanta lyomwi wakaya kusha cilindi walizhika waseseka mali ashimatwanga akwe.
“Inzho kwiite ciindi cilamfwu, shimatwangaabo wakapiluka, amane wakaboompolola basebezhi bakwe kwaamba bamupandululile mbubakaasebezha mali azo.
Wezo wakapewa osanwe, wakeza wakaleta matalenta aamwi ali osanwe, wakaamba ati, ‘Mwami, wakampa matalenta ali osanwe. Bona inzho ndaleta aanji ali osanwe ngundakapindauka.’
Shimatwangaakwe wakamwaambila ati, Wakacita kabotu umusebezhi mubotu uushomeka, washomeka kutushoonto, inzho ndakubika kwaamba uukulanga shinji shinji. Njila usekelele u mwami wako.
Wezo wakatambula matalenta obile wakeza waamba ati, ‘Mwami, wakampa matalenta obile. Bona ndikwete aanji obile ngundakapindauka.’
Shimatwangaakwe wakamwaambila ati, ‘Wacita kabotu umusebezhi mubotu uushomeka, wakashomeka kutushoonto, inzho ndakubika kwaamba uukulanga shinji shinji. Njila usekelele umwami wako.’
“Inzho aze wezo wakatambula lyomwi wakeza waamba ati, ‘Mwami ndizhi ati uli muntu muzumu monzo. Ulatebula nkuwatakashanga.
Ubobo ndakafwa bukandu, ndakaya ndakasha cilindi mundakaaseseka mali. Inzho ngaaza mali ako!’
“Shimatwangaakwe wakamwaambila ati, ‘Uwe umusebezhi mubiyabi, ulimwi mukata! Sa wiina kuzhiba ati ndatebula aawo ngundatakashanga ukubunga awo ngundatakaminza?
Wakaakweelele kwaabika mali aangu mu matashi aba shimpindu kwaamba ndazhoka njane impindu.
Inzho noomunange lelya italanta ndyaakwete mulipe wezo uukwete matalanta ali ikumi.
Nkaambo wezo uukwete ulakazunjilwa, ubobo shilakaba shinji shinji pele wezo wiina ncaakwete, utushoonto ntwaatelaika ati ulikwete ulakanangwa.
Noomusowele ansengwe mu mushinze wezu musebezhi uuyina mulimo, koko kukaaba kulila ukuluma inkwino.’
Inzho mishobo yoonse ilakabungana ku bushu bwakwe, ulakaandaanya bantu umbona mweembezhi mbwaandaanya imbelele iimpongo.
Ulakabika imbelele kucilyo kwakwe, pele impongo ulakashibika kucimonsho.
Ngoonaawo Mwami ulakabaambila bali kucilyo ati, ‘Kamwiza umwe nubalonjezhe kwa Taata, munjile mu bwami mbumwakabambilwa kuhwa kumalengelo anshi.
Nkaambo indakafwa inzala mwakampa cakulya, indakafwa inyota mwakampa cakunwa, indakaakuli mweenzu mwakantambula,
indakaakuli cintanda mwakansamika, indakaakuli mulwazhi mwakanswaya, iindakaakuli muntolongo mwakeza kumbona.’
“Inzho baluleme balakamubuzha ati, ‘Mwami ndililiye nitwakakubona kufwile inzala, tumane twakusanina, naa kufwile inyota tumane twakupa cakunwa?
Ndililiye nitwakakubona uli mweenzu tumane twakutambula kabotu, naa niwakaakuli cin tanda tumane twakupa cakusama?’
Ulimwi ndililiye nitwakakubona uli mulwazhi naa muntolongo tumane tweza u kubona?
Ulimwi Mwami ulakabaingula ati, ‘Cini cini ndamushimwina ati, kufwumbwa ncimwakacitila umwi wa bakwesu baba bashoonto baba bayina mbubabele, ndime mwakacitila.’
“Inzho kuli babo bali kucimonsho ulakabaambila ati, ‘Amwaahwe awa umwe nubashinganye, kamuya mu mulilo uutazhimi wakakuncilwa Shaatani u baanjelo bakwe.
Nkaambo indakafwa inzala mwiina nimwakampa cakulya, iindakafwa inyota mwiina kumpa cakunwa,
indakaakuli mweenzu mwiina nimwakantambula, indakaakuli cintanda mwiina kumpa cakusama, iindakaakuli mulwazhi iindakaakuli muntolongo mwiina nimwakeza kunswaya.’
“Inzho abo balakaingula ati, ‘Mwami no ndililiye nitwakukubona ulifwile inzala naa inyota naa uli mweenzu naa uli cintanda naa uli mulwazhi naa uli muntolongo twamana twiina ukuyohwa?’
Ulakabaingula ati, ‘Cini cini ndamushimwina ati, kufwumbwa nimwatakacitila umwi wababa bashoonto bancilila, mwiina nimwakanjohwa pe.’
Inzho baba balakaya mucisubulo citamana, pele baluleme balakanjila mu bumi butamana.”
Inzho naakamana kwaamba mazwi aza oonse wakabaambila ba shiciiya bakwe ati,
“Mulizhi ati kwaita mazuba obile kulakaba ipobwe lya Kwiitilila, ubobo Mwanaa Muntu ulakaabwa kwaamba akankaminwe aciciinkano.”
Inzho bapaizhi bakando ubakando baba Juda bakabungana kulubanza lwa mupaizhi mukando Kayafa.
Bakateelezhanya kwaamba bayane inzhila yakumukwata Jeso cakuseseka kwaamba ayayiwe.
Pele bakaamba ati, “Kutaamba ciindi ce pobwe, nkaambo kulaba nikuba lupyopyongano akati ka bantu.”
Inzho Jeso naakaakuli ku munzhi wa Betani muŋanda yaka Simoni uutewa ati Shicinsenda,
kwakashika mukaintu umwi wakaakukwete impawo ya mafwuta aanunka kalonze a muulo mukando cini cini. Wakaatila a mutwi waka Jeso ciindi naakaakulya.
Pele ba shiciiya nibakabona bobo, bakatongauka baamba ati, “Anu azonaukilanzhi mafwuta aza?
Nkaambo kaayelele kusambalwa mali manji manji, amana apewa ku bapushi.”
Jeso wakacizhiba ncibakaakwaamba amane wababuzha ati, “Anu ngwaanzhi ngumupenzha wezu mukaintu? Wancitila cintu cibotu.
Bapushi mulaakuli abo lyoonse, pele tamuukuli ame lyoonse pe.
Naantila aza mafwuta wabamba mubili wangu kuya kukuzhikwa.
Cini cini ndamwaambila ati kufwumbwa koko kuya kukambaukwa Makani Mabotu ano anshi yoonse, mpaka uceci ncaacita wezu mukaintu cilakaambwa, kwaamba bakaakumutelaicila ngawo.”
Ubobo umwi wabo bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile uutewa ati, Judasi Shikaliyoti wakaya ku bapaizhi bakando,
wakababuzha ati, “No mulampaanzhi kuti ndamwaaba Jeso nkumubele?” Bakamupa mali a muwaya waya ali makumi otatwe.
Inzho kuhwaawo wakakanka kukapula ciindi cibotu cakumwaaba.
Inzho mu buzuba butaanzhi bwepobwe lya cinkwa ciina bumena ba shiciiya bakeza kwa Jeso boombuzha ati, “No nkukwi nkuuzanda ati tukakubambile ipobwe lya Kwiitilila kwaamba ulye?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Kamuya mu munzhi kwandaba mukamwaambile ati, Mwiiyi waamba ati, ciindi cangu cili afwaafwi. Ndazanda kulya ipobwe lya Kwiitilila kuŋanda yako antoomwi u ba shiciiya bangu.”
Ubobo, ba shiciiya bakacita umbona mbubakalaililwa. Bakoobamba Mulalilo uwe Pobwe lya Kwiitilila.
Nikwakaba kumangolezha, Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile bakakala kulya.
Inzho nibakaakucilya wakaamba ati, “Cini cini ndamwaambila ati, umwi wenu ulangaba.”
Bateelele bobo ba shiciiya bakausa cini cini, ubobo bakakanka kumubuzha womwi womwi ati, “Sa ndime Mwami?.”
Walo wakaingula ati, “Nguwena ngutubwenga aze nguukangaba.
Mwanaa Muntu ulakafwa umbona mbukulembelwe shamakani akwe. Pele ulikwete mapenzhi wezo muntu uukamwaaba Mwanaa Muntu! Kacili cibotu kwaamba naatakazhalwa.”
Ngoonaawo Judasi, wezo wakamwaaba Jeso wakamubuzha ati, “Sa ndime Mwiiyi?” Jeso wakaingula ati, “Waamba.”
Inzho nibakaakucilya wakabweza cinkwa wakalumba kwa Leza, wacikomauna, wacipa ba shiciiya bakwe waamba ati, “Amubweze mulye wezu ngu mubili wangu.”
Amane wakabweza inkapu, naakamana kumulumba Leza wakabapa waamba ati, “Amunwe noonse,
bobu mbubulowa bwangu bwa cihuminano cipiya, bwatililwa banji banji kwaamba shibi shabo shilekelelwe.
Ndamwaambila ati, kuhwa bwasunu nshikanwi linji mushinza wamasaansa mpaka kushika mu buzuba mbutukaanwa amwe mu bwami bwaka Taata.”
Inzho nibakamana kwiimba lwiimbo, bakaya ku lupili lwa masamu ama Oliva.
Pele ndakabushiwa ndakamutaangunina kuya ku Galilaya.”
Ngoonaawo Pita wakamwaambila ati, “Nikuba ati boonse bakakushiye, ume nshikakushiyi pe.”
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Cini cini ndakwaambila ati, bwasunu mashiku aza ngoona katana u kulila mukombwe ulantama shiindi shotatwe.”
Pita wakaamba ati, “Nikuba ku lufwu, nshikakutama.” Umbona bobo mbubakaamba ba shiciiya boonse.
Inzho Jeso u ba shiciiya bakaya kubusena butewa ati Getisemani, amane wakabaambila ati. “Amukale ano ndayaalya nkakombe.”
Jeso wakaya u Pita, ubanakwe Zebedi bobile. Amane wakakanka kuusa ukupenga mu monzo.
Wakabaambila ati, “Monzo wangu ulyuusile cini cini ubuusu bwa lufwu. Amushaale awa mulindile mutoona.”
Jeso wakaya ambele ashoonto amane wahuntama, wakomba waamba ati, “Taata, kuti naa cilakonzheka, yezhi inkapu yamapenzhi neenjitilile. Nikuba bobo kutabi kuzanda kwangu pele luzando lwako lucitwe.”
Amane wakaya ngaakashiya ba shiciiya bakwe, weza kuyana baloona. Wakamwaambila Pita ati, “Sa umwe tamukonzha kwaamba mulindile antoomwi ame iwoola lyomwi bulyo?
Amulindile mutoona mukombe kwaamba mutanjili mu masunko. Cini cini moza ulazandisha pele mubili wabula insana.”
Jeso wakaya lwabili, wakomba ati, “Taata, kuti naa inkapu yezhi teekonzha kunjitilila cita bulyo kwiinwa, luzando lwako alucitwe.”
Amane wakashika ulimwi ku bashiciiya, wayana bakoona menso alema.
Ulimwi Jeso wakabashiya waya kukomba ulwatatu, u kwaamba mazwi ngoonaazo bulyo.
Amane wakeza ku bashiciiya bakwe wabaambila ati, “Mutoona ukulyoocezha nizho, mulalyocezha katotu. Amubone ciindi cashika, Mwanaa Muntu waabwa u matashi a ba shishibi.
Amuzhimuke tuukuya. Nguwezu shikungaba washika.”
Jeso naakaakucaamba bobo, Judasi umwi wabo bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile wakashika, kali iinkamu inkando ya bantu bakwete maceba iinkoli. Yezhi inkamu yakatumwa ku bapaizhi bakando ubakando baba Juda.
Inzho shikumwaaba kabapele citondezho cakuti, “Wezo ngunkaashonta inguwe mukamwaange.”
Ubobo wakashika kwa Jeso waamba ati, “Wabonwa Mwiiyi!” Amane wakamushonta.
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Mweenzuma cita nciwazhila.” Ngoonaawo bakahuumuka bamukwata.
Umwi wa babo mbucakaakuli u Jeso wakasomona iceba lyakwe wakukosola kutwi kwa muzhice wa mupaizhi mukando.
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Libweezhe iceba lyako munkomo yalyo, nkaambo boonse basebezha maceba balakayayiwa u maceba.
Sa ulatelaika ati, nshikonzha kumukumbila Taata kwaamba antumine ndilyona ninzho inkamu ya baanjelo babaala kwikumi ubatwesha bobile kwiza kunhuna?
No kuti ndacita bobo, ushilembelwe u maŋwalu shilacitika buti?”

Amane Jeso wakayambila inkamu ya bantu babo ati, “Nkamboonzhi mweza kunkwata u maceba iinkoli ukoya numweza kukwata mutewu? Abuzuba abuzuba ndakaakukala ndayiisha muŋanda ya Leza, pele mwiina nimwakankwata.
Pele sheshi shoonse shakacitika kuzuzucizha nshibakalemba bashinshimi.” Ngoonaawo ba shiciiya boonse bakamushiya balukanka.
Babo bantu bamane kumukwata Jeso bakamutola kwa Kayafa Mupaizhi mukando, koko kwakaakubungene balembi ubakando baba Juda.
Pita wakacilila keza bubalya intende intende mpaka wakashika kulubanza lwa mupaizhi mukando. Wakenjila mukati, wakala antoomwi ubalindizhi kwaamba abone cikacitika.
Bapaizhi bakando antoomwi u babeteshi bakando boonse bakasoleka kukapula bumboni bwakumutamikizha Jeso kwaamba bamuyaye.
Bayina nibakayana bumboni nikuba ati bakamboni babeshi banji banji bakeza kumubeesha twaambo. Ku mamanino kwakashika bantu bobile
bakaamba ati, “Wezu kaamba ati, ‘Ume ndakonzha kwiiyaya iŋanda ya Leza ukwiizaka mu mazuba otatwe.’ ”
Mupaizhi mukando wakazhimuka wamubuzha Jeso ati, “Sa wiina cakwiingula? No ncinzhi ncibakutamicizha?”
Jeso wakaliinza bulyo. Mupaizhi mukando wakamwaambila ati, “Ndakwaambila mwizhina lya Leza uupona ati tushimwine naa ndiwe Munanike wa Leza, Mwanaa Leza.”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakaingula ati, “Waamba. Pele ndamwaambila ati kuhwa ninzho mulakoombona Mwanaa Muntu ulishite kwitashi lya cilyo lya Bwami. Mulakoombona ulimwi uleza mu makumbi a kwizeulu.”
Ngoonaawo mupaizhi mukando wakazapaula cakusama cakwe u kwaamba ati, “Wezu muntu ulasampaula Leza. Anu mbwaanzhi bumboni bunji mbutulanga? Mwaliteelelela nubeni mbwaamba?
No mulamupa mulandunzhi?”
Ngoonaawo bakaingula ati, “Ulyeelele kufwa.”
baamba ati, “Shinshima uwe umunanice wa Leza. Sonda, nguni wakuuma?”
Inzho Pita kashite ansengwe mulubanza. Ndilelyo umwi mukaintu musebezhi wa mupaizhi mukando wakeza kwakwe wamwita ati, “Uwe aze mwakaakuli u Jeso muna Galilaya.”
Pita wakatama kabateelele boonse ati, “Nshicizhi ncuuamba pe.”
Inzho naakaakuzanda ati ahwe ansengwe, uumwi mukaintu wakamubona, wakaambila babo mbaakaakuzhimine abo ati, “Wezu mulombwana aze kabali u Jeso waku Nanzaleta.”
Ulimwi Pita wakatama cakupinga ati, “Ngu Leza mwini, nshimwizhi muntu wezu.”
Kwiite bulyo kaindi kashoonto babo mbucaakuzhimine abo bakeza kwa Pita baamba ati, “Cini cini aze uwe uli umwi wabo baba nkaambo kwaamba kwako kulakuzubulula.”
Ngoonaawo wakakanka kuzumanana ukupinga miya ati, “Wezu nshimwizhi cini cini.” Ngoonaawo mukombwe wakalila.
Inzho Pita wakalizhibaluka izwi ndyaakaamba Jeso lyakuti, “Mukombwe katana kulila ulakaakuntamine shiindi shotatwe.” Wakahwa ansengwe waya kulila cabulowe.
Inzho nibwakaca, bapaizhi bakando boonse ubakando baba Juda bakapangana kwaamba bamuyaye Jeso.
Ubobo bakamwaanga Jeso, bamutola baya kumubika mu matashi mwa Pilato mweendelezhi waba Loma.
“Ndabisha kwaaba muntu uuyina mulandu.” Balo bakamwiingula ati, “No uswe tukucite buti? Makani ako azo.”
Judasi wakaasowa mali anshi muŋanda ya Leza, wakahwa waya kulishina.
Bapaizhi bakando nibakaabweza azo mali bakaamba ati, “Tatweelele kwabika mucizobwelo kaambo mali abulowa.”
Bamane kubuzhanya cakucita bakateelezhenya ati baule muunda wamubumbi kwaamba baakuzhika nkuko beenzu.
Ubobo wezo muunda ucitewa ubwasunu ati muunda wabulowa.
Ubobo akazuzucizhiwa akaamba mushinshimi Jelemiya ati, “Bakaabweza mali a muwaya waya ali makumi otatwe, uuli ngumuulo wakwe wezo wakabikwa uba Izilaili,
Bamane bakaula muunda wamubumbi umbona Mwami Leza Mbwaakandailila.”
Inzho Jeso wakazhima ku bushu bwa mweendelezhi Pilato, amane mweendelezhi wakamubuzha mubuzho wakuti, “Sa ndiwe Mwami waba Juda?” Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Waamba.”
Pele ciindi bapaizhi bakando ubakando baba Juda nibakaakumutamicizha twaambo wiina naakaingula niciba comwi.
Pilato wakamubuzha ati, “Sa tututeelele toonse twaambo tunji tunji ntubakutamicizha?”
Pele wiina nakaamwiingula niliba izwi lyomwi, ucakuti mweendelezhi wakazhingwa.
Muciindi ce pobwe lya Kwiitilila mweendelezhi waakaakuzhibile kubaangululila bantu kufwumbwa mwaange wezo ngubazanda.
Inzho aciindi ceco kakuli umwi mwaange wakaakukwete impuwo imbiyabi, uutewa ati Balabasi.
Nibakaakubungene, Pilato wakabaambila ati, “Nguni ngumuzanda ati mwaangululile, Balabasi naa Jeso uutewa ati Munanike wa Leza?”
Nkaambo wakaakwizhi ati bakamuleta kwakwe ukaambo kamunyono.
Pilato naakaakucishite acuuna calubeta, mwinakwe wakatuma izwi kwakwe lyakuti, “Utabi ncuucita ku muntu wezo mululami, nkaambo ndapenga cini cini ukaambo kakwe muciloto.”
Bapaizhi bakando ubakando baba Juda bakabakombelezha bantu kwaamba bakumbile Balabasi, Jeso ayayiwe.
Ulimwi mweendelezhi wakaamba ati, “Nguuliye akati kabo ngumuzanda kwaamba mwaangululile?” Bakaamba ati, “Balabasi!”
Pilato wakababuzha ati, “No Jeso uutewa ati Munanike wa Leza mucite buti?” Boonse bakaamba ati, “Nakankaminwe aciciinkano!”
Pilato wakababuzha ati, “Anu wacita mulandunzhi?” Bakapozomokesha ati, “Naakankaminwe aciciinkano!”

Ubobo Pilato naakabona ati kwiina ncaakaakukonzha kucita, ukuti kakuzanda kuba lupyopyongano, wakabweza meenzhi wasamba kumatashi boonse balilangilile waamba ati, “Ndiina mulandu kubulowa bwa muntu wezo uululeme. Namucite ncimuzanda nubeni.”
Inzho bantu boonse bakataba ati, “Bulowa bwakwe nabube aalyuuswe ubanesu!”
Ubobo wakabaangululila Balabasi, amane kumuumya tulusu Jeso wakabapa kwaamba bamukankamine aciciinkano.
Ngoonaawo bashikalumba baka Pilato bakamunjizha muŋanda ya mweendelezhi bamane bamuzhinguluka boonse bashikalumba.
Bakamusamununa shikobelo shakwe bamane bamusamika ijanshi lisubila pyu.
Bakaluka mushini wa meya bamane bamusamika ku mutwi, u kumufwumbatika lubu mwitashi lyakwe lya cilyo. Bamane bamukotamina bamwita ati, “Wabonwa U Mwami waba Juda.”
Bakamufwila mate bamane bakalubweza lubu bamuumya a mutwi.
Nibakamana kumuseka, bakamusamununa ijansi lelyo, bamusamika shisani shakwe mwini, bamane bamutola kuya kukankamina aciciinkano.
