Inzho nibakapola bakayana mulombwana uutewa ati, Saimoni waku Saileni. Wezu mulombwana bakamushinicizha kucibweza ciciinkano caka Jeso.
Nibakashika kubusena butewa ati Gologota, calo caamba ati, kukaanza,
bakamupa waini muhwele mululwe kwaamba anwe, pele naakasola wakakaka kunwa.
Inzho nibakamana kumukankamina a ciciinkano, bakashaabana shisani shakwe kwiita mukuuma insolo.
Bamane bakakala bamulindilila nkukona koko.
Ezeulu lya mutwi wakwe bakalemba mazwi aatondezha ncibakamuyayila aamba ati, “Wezu ngu Jeso Mwami waba Juda.”
Batewu bobile bakakankaminwa antoomwi u Jeso, umwi kucilyo umwi kucimonsho.
Bantu bakaakwiita awo bakaakukuna kuna kumitwi yabo
balaamba ati, “Wakaamba ati ulakonzha kwiimwaya iŋanda ya Leza ukwiizakulula mu mazuba otatwe. Inzho na uli Mwanakwe Leza lifwutule umwini, seluka aciciinkano.”
Umbona bobo abo bapaizhi bakando u balembi ulimwi ubakando baba Juda bakamuseka ati,
“Wakaakufwutula bantu, pele walo takonzha kulifwutula. Inta ngu Mwami wa Izilaili, naaseluke aciciinkano kwaamba tumushome.
‘Ulashoma mwa Leza, ubobo Leza naamununune na kuti ulazanda.’ Nkaambo kaamba ati ndi Mwanaa Leza!”
U babo batewu mbucakakankaminwa abo bakamusampaula umbona bulyo.
Kuhwa ciindi nicakashika akalendebwe kushikila lyakumbo kwakaba mushinze uushiya mbi mucishi coonse.
Ciindi nicakashika kwiwoola lye fuka, Jeso wakapozomoka ati, “Eli, Eli lama sabakatani?” Calo caamba ati Leza wangu, Leza wangu wanshiilaanzhi?
Bamwi babo bakaakuzhimine afwaafwi bakaamba ati, “Wezu muntu uloompolola Elaija.”
Umwi wabo wakalukanka waya wabweza inshisa weetoba mu waini uulula kwaamba amunwishe.
Pele bamwi bakaamba ati, “Mulindile tubone naa Elaija uleza kumufwutula.”
Ulimwi Jeso wakapozomoka iizwi ikando amane wafwa.
Shuumbwe shakayaluka ubobo boonse banji banji bakaakushoma mwa Leza bakabuka ku bafwu.
Jeso naakabuka ku bafwu, bakamuhwa mu shuumbwe baya kunjila mu munzhi uusalala momo mubakabonwa ku bantu banji banji.

Inzho mukando wa bashikalumamba u babo mbaakaakuli abo bakaakulindilila cuumbwe ca Jeso, nibakabona kuzungaana kwanshi u shakacitika, bakatiya cini cini baamba ati, “Cini cini wezu muntu kali Mwana Leza!”
Ansansa kakuli bakaintu banji banji bakaakulindila. Babo bakaakucilila Jeso kuhwa mu Galilaya u kumufwutaucila.
Akati kabo kakuli Maliya waku Magadala, u Maliya baina Jemusi u Jozefu, ulimwi u nokwabo banakwe Zebedi.
Inzho nikwakaba kumangolezha, Jozefu wakwa Alimatiya uwakaakuli uumwi wa ba shiciiya ba Jeso wakaya kwa Pilato.
Wezu muntu wakakumbila mutunta waka Jeso. Ngoonaawo Pilato wakalailila ati apewe.
Ulimwi Jozefu wakooputaila mutunta umulembo uutuba,
u kuuwoneka mu cuumbwe cakwe mwini, cipiya ncaakaakukololele umwala, wakakunkulilisha ibwe ikando amulyango wa cuumbwe amane waya.
Maliya waku Magadala u Maliya uumwi kabaliko koko, kabashite kulangana ucuumbwe.
Nibwakaca mu Sabata, bapaizhi bakando uba Falisi bakabungana kwa Pilato,
u kwaamba ati, “Mwami tulaazhibaluka ngaakaamba wezu mubeshi naakaakucipona aakuti, ‘Akaita mazuba otatwe ndakabuka.’

Inzho lailila kwaamba cuumbwe cakwe cilindilwe mpaka kushikila mazuba otatwe ayite. Nkaambo ba shiciiya balaba nibashika u kwiba mutunta, bamana bakabaambile bantu ati, ‘Wabuka ku bafwu.’ Ubobo lucengo lwabili lulakabiya kubaala lutaanzhi.”
Ateelele bobo Pilato wakabaambila ati, “Amutoleko balindizhi, mukabambe kabotu kwiingaina umbumukonzha.”
Ubobo bakaya kucibambisha cuumbwe ukushinka ibwe bamane bashiya mulindizhi.
Inzho Sabata niyakamana, buce bulyo mu buzuba butaanzhi bwa Nsunda, Maliya waku Magadala u Maliya umwi bakaya kubona cuumbwe.
Ubobo kwakaba kuzungaana kwanshi, nkaambo anjelo wa Mwami wakaseluka kuhwa kwizeulu, wakashika walikunkulusha ibwe amane walikala.
Ciwa cakwe kacili ukoya lulabo, shakusama shakwe kashituba buu.
Ukaambo kakutiya anjelo, balindizhi bakazhangama bakaba ukoya bantu bafwu.
Inzho anjelo wakabaambila bakaintu nibakashika ati, “Mutatiyi nkaambo ndizhi ati mulalanga Jeso wakakankaminwa aciciinkano.
Teko kono, wabuka umbona mbwaakaamba. Kamwiza mwaabone ngaakaakulele.
Inzho amufwaambaane muukuya mukabashimwine ba shiciiya ati wabuka ku bafwu, ulimwi ulabataangunina kuya ku Galilaya koko nkubakaamubonena. Mutaaluba aza ngundamushimwina.”
Babo bakaintu bakakuhwa ku cuumbwe balitiile kumwi kababotelelwe cini cini! Bakalukanka kuya kubashimwina ba shiciiya bakwe.
Jeso wakabaswaanganya amane wabaanzha ati, “Luumuno lube amwe.” Balo bakaswena ukukwata ku maulu bamukomba.
Amane Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Mutatiyi, kamuya mukabaambile bakwesu ati baye ku Galilaya koko nkubakaanjana kwaamba tukabonane.”
Inzho bakaintu nibakaakuciya, balindizhi bamwi bakanjila mu munzhi ukushimwina bantu u bapaizhi bakando shoonse shakacitika.
Ngoonaawo bapaizhi bakando nibakabungana antoomwi ubakando baba Juda bakayana muzeezo wakubapa mali manji manji bashikalumamba,
babaambila ati, “Bantu amubashimwine ati, ‘Ba shiciiya kabezhile mashiku kwiba mutunta nitwaakoona.’
Ceci aciteelela mweendelezhi tulamukombelezha kwaamba mutapewa mulandu.”
Ubobo babo balindizhi bakaatambula mali u kucita umbona mbukalaililwa. Mbubobo makani aza mbwaakamwaya akati kaba Juda kushika ubwasunu.
Nibakamubona bakamukomba, pele bamwi kabacizuluzha.
Jeso wakaswena afwaafwi wabaambila ati, “Ndapewa insana shoonse kwizeulu anshi.
Ubobo kamuya mukabayiishe bantu bamishobo yoonse, mukabapapatize mwizhina lyaka Taata ulya Mwana ulya Moza Usalala.
Mukabayiishe ati baabambe makani oonse ngundakamulailila. Ulimwi amulange, Ume ndaakulyaamwe lyoonse mpaka kushikila ku mamanino.”
Aza ngu makancilo a Makani Mabotu aamba sha Jeso Kilisito Mwana Leza.
Akakanka umbona mbwaakalemba mushinshimi Aizaya:
Leza wakaamba ati, “Ndakatuma mutumwa wangu kumbele kwako,
akakubambile inzhila.”
“Amubambe inzhila ya Mwami Leza!
Amululamike inzhila yakwe isuumane!”
Ubobo Johani Mupapatizhi wakalibonya mulukula kapapatiza bantu u kukambauka ati, “Amusanduke kunzhila shenu imbiyabi, mupapatizwe kwaamba Leza amulecelele shibi shenu.”
Inzho bantu banji banji ba mucishi ca Judiya umumunzhi wa Jelusalemu, bakaya kuteelela nshaakaakukambauka Johani. Nibakalilekelela shibi shabo, wakabapapatiza mu lweenje lwa Joodani.
Wakaakwaambilizha ati, “Uuzhiza munshi lyangu ulambaala bulemu, ume nsheelele kukotama ukwaangulula twaanzho twa mpato shakwe.
Ume ndamupapatiza u meenzhi, pele walo ulakamupapatiza u Moza Usalala.”
Nikwakaita bulyo mazuba mashoonto, Jeso wakahwa ku munzhi wa Nazanleta, mucishi ca Galilaya, ngoonaawo Johani wakamupapatiza mu lweenje lwa Joodani.
Jeso mbwaakamuhwila bulyo mu meenzhi, wakabona izeulu lyayaluka, u moza waleza wakamuselucila kuhwa mwizeulu ukoya inzhiba.
Inzho izwi lyakateelelwa kuhwa kwizeulu lyakaamba ati, “Ndiwe mwanangu nakufwunwa, ulimwi uwe ulanjinina.”
Ngoonaawo Moza Usalala wakamutola mulukula,
momo mwakaakuli bulyo banyama bamwisokwe, Jeso wakakala ice mulukula kwa mazuba ali makumi one. Inzho Shaatani mubeshi mukando, naakamana kumutepaula, baanjelo bakeza kumufwutaucila.
Inzho Johani naakakwatwa ukubikwa muntolongo, Jeso wakaya ku cishi ca Galilaya kukambauka makani mabotu a Leza.
Wakaamba ati, “Ciindi cashika, Bwami bwa Leza bwaswena afwaafwi! Ubobo amusanduke kuhwa ku shibi shenu, mushome Makani Mabotu.”
Jeso naakaakuya bweenda ku mulando wa lwaatele lwa Galilaya, wakayana balombwana bobile, Saimoni u Andulu munina, balazela inswi.
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Amuncilile kwaamba nkamucite bazezhi babantu.”
Ngoonaawo bakashiya tunyandi twabo bamucilila.
Naakaya lwaambele, wakabona banakwe Zebedi bobile, ba Jemusi u Johani. Kabali mu bwato balasasa tunyandi twabo.
Mbwakababonena bulyo wakabeta. Inzho bakashiya Zebedi ushabo ubasebezhi bakwe mu bwato, bakamucilila Jeso.
Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe bakashika mu munzhi wa Kapenaumi. Inzho nibwakaca mu buzuba bwa Sabata Jeso wakanjila mucikombelo caba Juda wakakanka kuyiisha.
Inzho bantu nibakateelela kuyiisha kwakwe bakazoowa, kaambo kakutakozhene u kuyiisha kwa balembi, mazwi aakwe alikwete insana.
Ngoonaawo umwi muntu wakaakunjililwe moza mubiyabi wakanjila mucikombelo caba Juda, wakakwiila wabuzha ati,
“No twakucitaanzhi uwe u Jeso waku Nanzaleta? Sa weza kutuzonauna? Ndikwizhi ati ndiwe Usalala wa Leza.”
Jeso wakalemanina moza mubiyabi ati, “Liinze, hwa mu muntu wezu!”
Moza mubiyabi wakakwiila, amane muntu wakasuntuka wawila anshi moza mubiyabi wakamuhwa.
Boonse bantu bakazoowa cini cini, bakakanka kulibuzha ati, “Anu ncinzhi ceci? Nkuyiisha kupiya kuli buti koku? Wezu muntu ulikwete insana shakulemanina myoza mibiyabi ulimwi ilacita ncaayaambila!”
Impuwo yaka Jeso yakazuwa mucishi coonse ca Galilaya.
Mbubakahwila bulyo mucikombelo caba Juda, wakaya kuŋanda yaka Saimoni antoomwi u Andulu u Jemusi u Johani.
Inzho naakashika aŋanda bakamushimwina ati inazhala Saimoni mulwazhi mubili.
Jeso wakaya nkwaakaakulele. Wakamukwata etashi wamubusha, ngoonaawo wakapona wakanka kufwutauka.
Kube kumangolezha bantu bamumunzhi wezo bakamuletela bantu boonse bakaakusata malwazhi andeene andeene u babo bakaakunjililwe myoza mibiyabi.
Bantu boonse ba mu munzhi momo bakabungana amulyango waŋanda yezho.
Jeso wakaponya bantu banji banji bakaakusata malwazhi aandeene andeene ukukusha myoza mibiyabi minji minji. Myoza mibiyabi kateezeezha kwaamba, nkaambo kakuti keemwizhi.
Nikwakaba kumancela Jeso wakabuka wahwa muŋanda. Amane wakamuhwa mu munzhi waya kubusena bwakuliiba kuya kukomba.
Saimoni u beenzhiina mbucakaakuli abo nibakabona ati Jeso tewo bakaya kumukapula.
Nibakamuyana, bakamushimwina ati, “Bantu boonse ndiwe baya bukapula.”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Tulyeelele kuya kuminzhi iimwi ituzhingulucile. Ndyeelele kuya nkabakambaucile abo kaambo ceco ncindakezhila.”
Inzho mulombwana umwi wakaakuli mulwazhi cinsenda wakeza kwa Jeso, wakamufwukamina wamulomba kwaamba amuyohwe. Wakaamba ati, “Naa ulazanda, ulakonzha kumponya.”
Jeso wakeetezhewa. Wakahungulula itashi lyakwe ukumwaampa, wamwaambila ati, “Ndazanda, pona!”
Ngoonaawo shicinsenda wakapona.
Jeso wakamulaila cini cini,

wakamwaambila ati, “Teelela, kutabi muntu nguushimwina makani aza, pele koya ukalitondezhe ku mupaizhi, ukape cipaizho mbuli mbwaakalailila Mozesi, kwaamba cikabe citondezho ku bantu boonse kwaamba wapona cini cini.”

Muntu wezo wakaya ulaya bwaambilizha makani aza, ubobo Jeso cakamukacila kunjila mu munzhi kaanzambwene. Ubobo wakakala kulaale u minzhi. Nikuba bobo bantu kabeza kwakwe kuhwa kumasena andeene andeene.
Nikwakaita mazuba mashoonto, Jeso wakabweela ku munzhi wa Kapenaumi, impuwo yakuti mwaali mu munzhi yakazuwa.
Bantu banji banji bakeza kubungana koko, iŋanda yakezula bantu bakaata. Jeso wakabakambaucila makani mabotu.
Naakaakucikambauka, kwakashika bantu bone bakamuletela mulema ngubakaakuzemwine amacila.

Inzho ukaambo kakuhula kwa bantu, bakakacilwa kumushisha afwaafwi u Jeso. Ubobo bakahumbula lululi lwa ŋanda kwanzanana awo ngaakaakubele Jeso. Bakaselusha macila ngaakaakulele mulema cakwaalengezha kuntambo.
Jeso naakabona lushomo lwabo, wakaambila mulema ati, “Mwanangu, shibi shako shalecelelwa.”
Bamwi balembi bakaakuliwo awo bakakanka kulibuzha mu myonzo ati,
“Nkaamboonzhi wezu muntu ncaasampulila Leza bolya? Kwiina muntu uukonzha kulecelela shibi shabantu cita Leza mwini ice.”
Pele Jeso wakazhiba ncibakaakutelaika, amane wakababuzha ati,
“Nciciliye cizumu, kwaamba shibi shako shalecelelwa naa ati buka bweza macila ako uyende?
Pele ndazanda muzhibe kwaamba ati, Mwanaa Muntu ulikwete insana ano anshi shakulecelela shibi.” Jeso wakamwaambila mulema ati,
“Zhimuka, bweza macila uukuya kwako!”
Wakabweza macila akwe ca kufwambaana waya, wakeenda bantu boonse balimulangilile. Inzho boonse bakazoowa cini cini bakatembaula Leza baamba ati, “Tatunacibwene cili bolya.”
Jeso wakaya ulimwi ku mulando wa lwaatele lwa Galilaya. Bantu banji banji bakamucilila beza kubungana, ngoonaawo wakakanka kubayiisha.
Inzho naakaakuya bweenda wakabona Levi shimutelo mwanakwe Alufayasi, ulishite amulimo wakwe. Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Ncilila.” Levi wakazhimuka, wamucilila.
Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe bakaya muŋanda mwa Levi, antoomwi uba shimitelo u bashishibi, nkaambo bunji bwabo bakamucilila.
Inzho bamwi balembi, bakaakuli bankamu yaba Falisi, nibakabona ati Jeso ulalya uba shimitelo, bakababuzha ba shiciiya bakwe ati, “No nkaamboonzhi ulalya antoomwi u bantu bali bolya?”
Jeso naakateelela bobo, wakabaingula ati, “Ubatali balwazhi tabazanda mushilishi, cita balwazhi. Ume ndiina kwiza kwita baluleme pe, ndakezhila ba shishibi.”

Ciindi cimwi ba shiciiya baa Johani Mupapatizhi u ba Falisi bakaakuliimya kulya. Bantu bamwi bakeza kwa Jeso bamubuzha ati, “No nkaamboonzhi ba shiciiya baa Johani Mupapatizhi u ba shiciiya baba Falisi balaliimya kulya pele ba shiciiya bako tabaliimya?”
Mukwiingula Jeso wakababuzha mubuzho ati, “Sa batambe kubwinga balakonzha kuliimya kulya ciindi shibwinga naacilyaabo? Pe pe, tabakonzha! Shibwinga naacilyaabo tabakonzha kucita bobo.
Pele nikuba bobo cilakashika ciindi ushibwinga naakaakushiwa nkubabele, ndilelyo beenzhiina nibakaaliimya kulya mukuusa.
“Kwiina muntu uusasa cikamba cacisani citana kuyosa, acisani cakale kale. Nkaambo kuti wacita bobo, cikamba ceco cakanka kuyosa, cilamonsola cisani cakale kale nkukuti cipulo cilakomena kubaala.

Ulimwi kwiina muntu uubika waini mupiya munkomo sha masalu makulukulu pe. Nkaambo inkomo shesho shilaanduka. Inkomo shilazonauka, waini ulapoomokela anshi. Inta kayi waini mupiya ulabikwa munkomo impiya.”
Ba Falisi bakaambila Jeso ati, “Langa, Mulawo toohuminya kwaamba ba shiciiya bako baakucita bolya mu buzuba bwa Sabata.”
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Sa mwiina nimwakabala Devidi mbwaakacita ciindi walo umbucakaakuli abo nibakafwa inzala?

Bakanjila muŋanda ya Leza bakalya cinkwa cakupa Leza. Ceci cakacitika ciindi Abiyata naakaakuli ngu mukando wa bapaizhi. Inzho kwiita mu mulawo wesu bapaizhi ice mbubakaakuhuminyiwa kulya cinkwa ceci, pele Devidi wakacilya, ukucaabana u babo mbucakaakuli abo.”
Jeso wakabashimwina ati, “Buzuba bwa Sabata bwakapangwa kwaamba buyohwe muntu, muntu wiina kulengwa ukaambo kabuzuba bwa Sabata.
Ubobo Mwanaa Muntu ngu Mwami wa buzuba bwa Sabata.”
Ulimwi Jesu wakanjila mucikombelo caba Juda, momo kamuli muntu wakaakupuutile itashi.
Kamuli u bantu bamwi bakaakuzanda kupa mulandu Jeso, ubobo bakamulanjisha kwaamba babone na ulamuponya muntu wezo mu buzuba bwa Sabata.
Jeso wakamwaambila muntu wezo wakaakupuutile itashi ati, “Kweza kono kumbele.”
Amane Jeso wakababuzha bantu ati, “No mulawo wesu ulatuhumizha kucitaanzhi mu buzuba bwa Sabata? Kuyohwa bantu naa kubazonauna? Kufwutula bumi bwa muntu na kumuyaya?”
Pele balo bakaliinza bulyo.
Inzho wakabalanjilila ca bukali, wakausa kaambo kabupapyu bwabo. Wakaambila muntu wezo ati, “Hungulula itashi lyako.” Naakalihungulula lyakaba kabotu.
Inzho ba Falisi bakamuhwa mucikombelo caba Juda baya kuswaangana ubamwi bakabunga kaba Helodiyani kwaamba bayane inzhila yakumuyaya Jeso.
Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe bakaya ku lwaatele lwa Galilaya, inkamu ya bantu yakamucilila. Bamwi bakahwa mucishi ca Galilaya, umucishi ca Judiya,
umu Jelusalemu, umucishi ca Idumeya kumutala wa lweenje lwa Joodani umuminzhi ya Taya u Sidoni. Baba bantu bakeza kwa Jeso nibakateelela shintu shinji shinji shizoosha nshaakaakuya bucita.
Ukaambo kakuhula kwa bantu, Jeso wakaambila ba shiciiya ati bamubambile bwato kwaamba bantu batamushaanicizha.
Nkaambo wakaponya bantu banji banji, ubobo balwazhi kabatonkana kwaamba bamukumye.
Ubakaakunjililwe moza mubiyabi kufwumbwa bamubona kabawila anshi kumbele kwakwe bakwiila ati, “Ndiwe Mwana Leza.”
Pele Jeso wakabashinka moza mubiyabi kwaamba batamuzubululi.
Inzho Jeso wakaliza alupili, waketa mbaakazanda mwini. Bakeza kwakwe,
inzho wakasala bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile kwaamba abe abo, wakabaulika ati mbatumwa. Wakabaambila ati, “Ndamusala kwaamba mube ame, nkamutume kuya kukambauka.
Mulakakwata insana shakukusha myoza mibiyabi mubantu.”
Mbubaba mbaakasala bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile, Saimoni walo Jeso ngwaakaulika ati Pita,
Jemusi u munina Johani, banakwe Zebedi, babo Jeso mbaakaulika ati Bowanejesi, ucipandulula ati bana bamakali,
Andulu, u Filipo, u Basolomeyo, u Matayo, u Tomasi, u Jemusi mwanakwe Alufeyasi, u Tadayasi, u Saimoni, wakaakuli mulondo,
u Judasi Shikalioti shikumwaaba.
Inzho Jeso wakenjila muŋanda, ulimwi bantu banji banji bakamubunganina cakuti Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe bakabula ciindi cakulya.
Basazhiina Jeso nibakateelela bobo bakaya kwaamba bakamukwate, kaambo bamwi bantu bakaakwaamba ati, “Wasondoka!”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakabeta bantu wabaambila mushikozhano ati, “Mbubuti Shaatani mbwaakonzha kukusha Shaatani?
Kuti cishi caandaana mu shipanzha, camana cakanka kulilwisha cini, ceco cishi cilawa.
Kuti mukowa waandaana mutubunga u kukanka kulilwisha ungamukamwini, wezo mukowa ulazundika.
Kuti bulelo bwa Shaatani bwalyaandaanya mutubunga, tabukala pe, bulazundwa ukumana.
“Kwiina uukonzha kunjila muŋanda ya muntu shinsana ukumunanga lubono, cita wataanguna kumwaanga wezo shinsana, na ati walozha kumunanga shoonse shili muŋanda yakwe.
“Cini cini ndamushimwina ati bantu balakonzha kulecelelwa shibi shoonse nshibakacita nishiba shakusampaula Leza.
Pele muntu wezo usampaula Moza Usalala takalecelelwa, kaambo wacita mulandu uutabi kulecelela.”
Jeso wakaamba bobo kaambo kakuti, bamwi bakaamba ati, “Ulinjililwe myoza mibiyabi.”
Inzho baina Jeso u banina, bakeza kuzhima ansengwe. Bakatuma muntu kwaamba amwite.
Inzho bantu banji banji mbucaakushite u Jeso bakamushimina ati, “Nguwelya banoko ubanyoko ansengwe, balakwita.”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Anu nguni bama u bakwesu?”
Amane wakabacebauka bakaakumuzhingulukile waamba ati, “Amubone, mbubaba babama u bakwesu!
Kufwumbwa uucita luzando lwa Taata ngumukwesu, ulimwi ngu bama.”
Wakabayiisha shintu shinji shinji mushikozhano. Mu kuyiisha kwakwe wakabashimwina ati,
“Amuteelele, kakuli shikuminza wakaya kukuminza maila.
Inzho naakaakuminza, imbuto shimwi shakawila munzhila, bazuni bakeza kushilya.
Shimwi shakawila ebwe aakaakuli ihu ishoonto bulyo, ndilyona shakamena ca kufwambaana.
Inzho izuba nilyakahwa shakakusa shazuma kaambo mizanda ina kusakana.
Shimwi shakawila umeya, meya naakakomena akashiyasa ukushishaanicizha shiina nishakeezha micelo.
Shimwi shakawila mwihu ibotu, shakeza, shamena, shaakomena ukweezha micelo; shimwi shakeezha makumi otatwe, shimwi makumi ali cisambomwi, shimwi mwaanda.”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakaamba ati, “Uukwete matwi naateelele.”
Inzho naakashaala mwini, ba shiciiya bakwe bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile ubamwi baakuli afwaafwi bakamubuzha kwaamba abapandululile shikozhanyo.
Jeso wakabashimwina ati, “Umwe mulipelwe luzhibo lwa masosece a bwami bwa Leza. Pele kuli babo bali ansengwe shoonse shilacitwa mushikozhanyo.
Kwaamba ati,
“Kubona babone,
pele batabonesha;
Kuteelela, bateelele,
pele batateelelesha.
Kwaamba ati batasandukacila kwa Leza,
kwaamba abalecelele shibi shabo.”
Ulimwi Jeso wakababuzha ati, “Sa mwiina kuciteelela cikozhanyo ceci? Anu ncikozhano cili buti ncimukaateelela?
Mushanji muntu ukanana makani a Leza.
Imbuto yakawila munzhila ilakozhana u bantu bacita ati mbubaatelelela bulyo mazwi a Leza, u Shaatani weza, ndilyona waakusha mu myonzo yabo.
Bamwi bantu balikozhene iimbuto yakawila mwihu lihumbile ebwe. Baba abo mbubateelelela bulyo mazwi, balaatambula ca kufwambaana u kubotelwa.
Pele nikuba bobo bayina mizanda, balacilila ku ciindi cishoonto bulyo, mbukwabela mapenzhi naaba makatazho, balalebwa.
Ulimwi bamwi bantu balakozhana iimbuto shakawila mu meya. Baba mbubantu bacita ati bateelela mazwi, baatambula kabotu kabotu,
pele mapakasho ashiindi sheno ulucengo lwa lubono, u mizeezo iimwi iyandeene andeene, yenjila mu myonzo yabo, ilaashaanicizha makani alakacilwa kuzhala micelo.

Pele imbuto yakawila mwihu ibotu, mbubabo bateelela mazwi a Leza ukwaabamba, ubobo balazhala micelo minji minji, shiindi shili makumi otatwe, bamwi shiindi shili makumi ali cisambomwi, ubamwi shiindi shili mwaanda.”
Kufwumbwa cintu cisosecelwe cilaazubululwa, ulimwi coonse cihumbilwe cilakahumbulwa.
Ukwete matwi naateelele!”
Wezo uukwete ulakazunjililwa, pele ukwete kashoonto ulakanangwa ukako nkaakwete.”
Ulimwi Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Bwami bwa Leza buli ukoya muntu uuminza imbuto umuunda wakwe.
Mashiku uloona bwaca wabuka, ku ciindi ceci imbuto shilamena ukukomena. Pele mukamwini tezhi mbushimena ukukomena.
Bulongo bwini mbubushikuzha shishango ukweezha micelo, busonga mbubutaanguna kumena, kweza cishiko umatuhu ku mamanino kulahwa ikunka lyamaila.
Inzho maila ashima, muntu ulabweza iceko u kukanka kwaacesa kaambo ciindi ca kutebula cashika.”
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Tulabukozhanya iinzhi bwami bwaka Leza? Ncikozhanyo nzhi cikonzha kubupandulula?
Buli ukoya kasece ka masitaadi kalo kali nkukasece kabaala kuceya ano anshi. Pele kuti muntu wakashanga mu muunda,
kalakomena kubaazha shishango shoonse ukuba isamu, bazuni balazaka shitaanto kumitabi yalyo.”
Mukukambauka kwakwe Jeso wakasebezha shikozhano shinji shinji shili ukoya shenshi nshibaakukozha kuteelela.
Wiina ncaakabaambila bulyo kutasebezha shikozhanyo. Pele ciindi naakaakuli mwini u ba shiciiya bakwe, kabapandulwila shintu shoonse.
Abe mangolezha kubuzuba mbubona bobo, Jeso wakaambila ba shiciiya bakwe ati, “Atulanducile kumutala welya.”
Bakeeshiya inkamu ya bantu, baya antoomwi u ba shiciiya bakwe mu bwato mumona mwakaakubele. Kakuli aamwi mato ngubakayaawo.
Inzho kwakaunga iwuwo ikando, u mankutisha akakanka kunjila, bwato kabuzanda kuloba.
Jeso wakaakoona mu bwato walishicila kunkombo. Inzho ba shiciiya bakwe bakamubusha baamba ati, “Akaka Mwiiyi, sa tukubwene ati tukalafwa?”
Jeso nakashinshimuka wakalilemanina iwuwo ati, “Lekakuunga!” Muuwo wakazhima. Awo mankutisha wakaambila ati, “Shiticila!” Ngoonaawo akashiticila.
Jeso wakababuzha ba shiciiya bakwe ati, “Nkaamboonzhi ncimutiya? Sa uninzho tamuna kushoma?”
Pele bakaakutiile cini cini, bakakanka kubuzhanya ati, “Anu wezu muntu uuli buti? Uteelelwa kumuuwo u mankutisha!”
Jesu u ba shiciiya bakalanduka lwaatele lwa Galilaya bakashika mucishi ca Bagelasini
Jesu mbwaakahwila bulyo mu bwato, wakaswaangana umuntu wakahwa kunamaumbwe. Muntu wezu kanjililwe moza mubiyabi.
Ulimwi kakala kunamaumbwe. Kakwiina wakaakulozha kumwaanga niiba inceetani.
Nkaambo kufwumbwa ciindi nibakamwaanga ku maulu ukumatashi kashikosaula inceetani iinshimbi. Kakwiina waakulonzha kumubombya pe.
Mashiku u muunza kakala kunamaumbwe, u kuya bweendeenda umapili kaya bupozomoka ukulinengaula mabwe.
Mbwaakamubonena Jeso alaale, wakamulukancila wafwukama kumbele kwakwe.
Wapozomoka iizwi ikando ati, “Ulazanda kuncita buti uwe u Jeso mwana Leza mukandosha? Ndakukomba mwizhina lya Leza utampenzha!”
Wakaamba bobo kaambo Jeso kamushimwinine kale ati, “Uwe u moza mubiyabi, muhwe mu muntu wezu!”
Inzho Jeso wakamubuzha ati, “No ndiweni izhina lyako?”
Wakaingula ati, “Ndime Inkamu, kaambo tuli banji banji.”
Moza mubiyabi wakamukumbila Jeso kwaamba ati, atotandi mucishi.
Inzho kubusena koko kakuli butanga bwa ngulube shakaakucela afwaafwi kumbali ku lupili.
Myoza mibiyabi yakamukumbila Jeso ati, “Tutume mu ngulube tukashinjile.”

Jeso wakeehuminya. Ubobo myoza mibiyabi yakahwa mu muntu wezo yaya kunjila mu ngulube. Butanga boonse bwa ngulube shili shuulu shobile bwakalukanka bwaya kuliwaala amukonka bwawila mu lwaatele bwafwa.
Beembezhi bangulube bakalukanka baya u minzhi uumatungu oonse balaya butola makani aza. Bantu bakaya kubona cakacitika.
Nibakashika kwa Jeso, bakayana mulombwana wakaakunjililwe inkamu ya myoza mibiyabi ulishiticile ulimwi ulyeenzene, ceci cakabatizha.
Babo bakalibonena cakacitika ku mulombwana wakaakunjililwe myoza mubiyabi u makani a ngulube, mbubakaya kubashimwina bantu.
Inzho bakakanka kumulomba Jeso kwaamba amuhwe mucishi cabo.
Jeso naakanjiila mu bwato, mulombwana wezo wakakushiwa myoza mibiyabi wakamulomba Jeso kwaamba baye aze.
Pele Jeso wakamukasha, wakamwaambila ati, “Koya ku munzhi kubasazhinoko, ukabaambile shoonse shizoosha nshaakucitila Mwami Leza ulimwi umbwaakufwila luse.”
Inzho wakayita mucishi citewa ati Minzhi iili ikumi, ulaya bukanana ncaakamucitila Jeso. U bantu boonse bakazoowa.
Jeso wakalanduka ulimwi kumutala wa lwaatele, koko nkwakayana ibunga lyabantu mbubakaswaangana abo a mulando.
Inzho umwi wabeendelezhi ba cikombelo caba Juda, utewa ati Jailosi wakeza kwa Jeso, ashike wamufwukamina.
Wakamulombesha cini cini ati, “Mwanangu mushimbi mulwazhi ca lufwu, ndakulomba kweza kuŋanda ukamwaampe itashi kwaamba apone abe kabotu.”
Inzho Jeso wakaya u Jailosi. Ikamu lyabantu lyakamucilila, lilaya bulimbana.
Kakuli mukaintu mulwazhi wakaakusata bulwazhi bwakuhwa bulowa, bwakamupenzha kumyaka iili ikumi u myaka yobile.
Bashilishi banji banji bakasoleka kumushilika pele bakakacilwa, u lubono lwakwe loonse lwakamana pele bulwazhi bwakaakuya bulyo kumbele.
Wakeeteelela impuwo ya Jeso, ubobo wakamucilila munkamu.
Wakatelaika mu monzo wakwe ati, “Kufwumba ndacikwata cisani cakwe ndapona.”
Wakacikwata cisani ca Jeso, ngoonaawo bulowa bwakacileka kuhwa, ulimwi wakaliteelela kabotu umubili wakwe kwaamba wapona.
Aze Jeso wakashiteelela insana kwaamba shamuhwa mu mubili wakwe. Ubobo wakabacebuka bantu bakaakumuzhingulucile wababuzha ati, “No nguni wankwata kucikobelo cangu?”
Ba shiciiya bakwe bakamwiingula ati, “Ulibabwene bantu mbubakuzhingulucile, no ulaamba buti ati nguni wankwata?”
Pele Jeso wakaakucicebauka kwaamba amubone wamukwata.
Inzho mukaintu wakazhiba cakamuciticila, wakatiya wazhangama, wakafwukama wamwaambila Jeso makani oonse calushinizho.
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Mwanangu lushomo lwako lwakufwula, koya muluumuno ukapone kubulwazhi bwako.”
Jeso nakaakucaambila mukaintu wezo, Kwakashika batume bakahwa kuŋanda yaka Jailosi baamba ati, “Mwanako wafwa kale. No ucimupenzhenzhaanzhi Mwiiyi?”
Pele Jeso wiina nakashibicila matwi shesho nshibakaamba, wakashimwina mukando wa cikombelo caba Juda ati, “Utatiyi pe, kushoma mwa Leza.”
Kwiina muntu uunji Jeso ngwaakahumizha kwaamba amushindicile, cita bulyo Pita, Jemusi u Johani munina.
Naakashika kuŋanda ya mweendelezhi wa cikombelo caba Juda, Jeso wakayana iyowe, kulila u koomoka.
Naakanjila, wakabaambila bantu ati, “Nkamboonzhi ncimucita ito u kulila bolya? Mwana wezu tafwile uloona.”
Nibakateelela bobo, bakamuseka. Ngoonaawo wakabatandila ansengwe boonse. Wakatola bulyo ushi u baina u ba shiciiya botatwe muŋanda mwaakuli mutunta wa mwana.
Wakakwata itashi lya mushimbi wamwaambila ati, “Talita kumi,” nkukwaamba ati, “Mushimbi! Ndakwaambila ati, buka!”
Ndilyona mushimbi wakabuka, wazhimuka wakanka kweendeenda. Kakwete myaka iili ikumi u myaka yobile. Bantu bakazoowa cini cini.
Wakabashimwinisha ati bataambila muntu naaba womwi kuli ceci cakacitika, amane wabashimwina ati bamupe cakulya mwana alye.
Nakahwa koko, Jeso wakaya kubanamuzhaabo ku Nanzaleta, ba shiciiya bakwe bakamucilila.

Mu buzuba bwa Sabata wakakanka kuyiisha mucikombelo caba Juda. Kamuli bantu banji banji, inzho nibakateelela kuyiisha kwakwe, boonse bakankamana bulyo. Bakanka kubuzhanya ati, “No wezu muntu wakeeyanakwi injiisho iili bolya? Mbusongonzhi bobu mbwaakwete? Uleecita buti yezhi milimo itondezha insana?
Sa ingwe mwanakwe Maliya, munina Jemusi, u Joze u Judasi u Saimoni? Inta abo bakaintu banina tuli abo.” Ubobo bakamukaka.
Katalozha kucita milimo yamaleele iitondezha insana, cita bulyo kwaampa matashi abantu bashoonto bulyo bakaakuli balwazhi mbaakaponya.
Jeso wakazoowa ukaambo kakuzuluzha kwabo.
Inzho Jeso wakaya akati kaminzhi kuya buyiisha bantu.
Waketa ba shiciiya bakwe bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile, wakabatuma bobile bobile. Wakabapa insana shakutanda myoza mibiyabi,
wakabalailila ati, “Mutabwezi niciba cintu comwi cakutolelezha mulweendo lwenu, niciba cinkwa, niiba inkomo yakusempwila, naaba mali mushikwama shenu, cita bulyo musako wakweenzha.
Musame bulyo impato, mutabwezi cikobelo cimwi kuleka cili a mubili.”
Ulimwi wakabaambila ati, “Mukabaalile kufwumbwa muŋanda mubakaamutambula kabotu mwamana mukakale mo kushicila mukamuhwe mu munzhi momo.
Kufwumbwa nkubakaakaka kumutambula, nikuba kumuteelela, mukalikunkumune lufwuko luli kumatende enu mukabashiye. Lufwuko lolu cilakaba cicenjezho nkubabele.”
Ngoonaawo ba shiciiya bakaya balaya bukambaucila bantu kwaamba basanduke ku shibi shabo.
Bakatanda myoza mibiyabi minji minji, ukunanika balwazhi banji banji mafwuta a oliva ukubaponya.
Pele bamwi bakaamba ati, “Ngu Elija.” Abo bamwi ati, “Mushinshimi, uuli ukoya uumwi wabashishimi bakale kale.”
Helodi naakateelela bobo wakaamba ati, “Ngu Johani Mupapatizhi ngundakakosozha mutwi, wabuka ku bafwu!”
Mwami Helodi mwini lwakwe nguwakatuma kwaamba Johani aangwe ukubikwa muntolongo. Wakamwaangila kaambo ka Helodiyasi wakaakuli muka Filipo munina, wezo ngwakatwala Helodi.
Nkaambo kakuti Johani Mupapatizhi wakamwaambila Helodi ati, “Taciluleme ku mulawo kwaamba uwe umutwale muka munyoko.”
Ceco ncicakapa ati Helodiyasi akwate inkoto yakuzanda kuyaya Johani, pele katalozha ukaambo ka Helodi.
Helodi kamutiya Johani nkaambo kamwizhi ati kali muntu uululeme, ulimwi uusalala. Ubobo wakamukobelela. Kacita ati amuteelela wapenga ku monzo. Pele nikuba bobo kazandisha kumuteelela.

Bumwi buzuba Helodiyasi wakamulya coolwe Johani. Kabuli buzuba Helodi nakacita ipobwe lyakusecelela kuzhalwa kwakwe, wakatamba boonse bakando bakando mubulelo bwakwe, ubakando balumamba, u basololi baku Galilaya.

Ciindi mushimbi mwanakwe Helodiyasi naakanjila mubaakubele kwiza kuzhanina Helodi ubeenzu bakwe, kuzhana kwakwe kwakababotela boonse bakaakulya ipobwe. Ngoonaawo mwami Helodi wakamwaambila mushimbi ati, “Nciizhi ncuuzanda? Ndakupa kufwumbwa ncuuzanda.”
Helodi wakapinga ati, “Kufwumbwa ncuukalomba ndakupa, nikuba kukosola cishi cangu akati.”
Mushimbi wakaya kubuzha kwa baina ati, “No nkalombeenzhi?”
Baina wakamwaambila ati, “Ukalombe mutwi wa Johani Mupapatizhi.”
Ndilyona mushimbi wakapiluka ku mwami ca kufwambaana walomba ati, “Ndazanda umpe mutwi wa Johani Mupapatizhi mu mutiba inzho bolya.”
Inzho mwami wakatompocelwa, pele katacikonzha kukaka kaambo wakapinga ku bushu bwabeenzu boonse bakeza kwipobwe.
Ndilyona ndilyona mwami wakatuma umwi mulindilinzhi wantolongo kuya kumukosola mutwi Johani Mupapatizhi. Mulindilizhi wezo wakaya kuntolongo wamukosola mutwi Mupapatizhi.
Wakooleta mutwi wa Johani amutiba wamupa mushimbi, mushimbi wakoopa baina.
Ba shiciiya baka Johani nibakateelela bakeza kubweza mubili, baya kuuzhika.
Inzho batumwa nibakapiluka nkwaakaakubatumine Jeso bakabungana antoomwi u Jeso bakamushimwina shoonse nshibakacita u kuyiisha.

Kakuli bantu banji banji, bamwi kabeza bamwi balaya, ubobo Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe bakabula ciindi cakulyoocezha ukulya. Inzho Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Katuya tuyane busena bwakulyoocezhizha nkutukonzha kuba tubeni ciindi cishoonto bulyo.”
Bakacila mu bwato kwaamba baye kubusena buliibile.

Inzho bantu banji banji bakababona nibakaakuya ulimwi bakabazhiba. Bantu bakaya lubilo babacingauzha kuhwa mu minzhi yoonse, bakataanguna kushika kubusena koko Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe kabatana kushika.
Jeso nakamuhwa mu bwato, wakabona bantu banji banji, wakabafwila inkumbu nkaambo kabali ukoya imbelele shiina mweembezhi. Wakakanka kubayiisha shintu shinji shinji.
Izuba nilyakaakuzanda kubila, ba shiciiya bakeza kwakwe bamwaambila ati, “Ciindi camana, ulimwi kono nkutubele nkukwisokwe.
Baambile bantu baye mu minzhi u masena ali afwaafwi kwaamba bakalyuulile shakulya.”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Ndimwena umwe noombape cakulya.”
Ba shiciiya bakamubuzha ati, “Sa ulazanda kwaamba tuukuya tukaule shinkwa sha mali ali myaanda yobile kwaamba tusanine bantu baba?”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakabaambila ba shiciiya bakwe ati babakalice bantu anshi mu mweenhu mutukamu tukamu.
Bakabakalika umbona bobo. Bakakala mutubunga twamyaanda ulimwi umutubunga twamakumi osanwe.
Jeso wakabweza shinkwa shosanwe iinswi shobile, walyaalala mwizeulu, walumba Leza amane washikomauna wabapa ba shiciiya kwaamba babaabanye bantu, asho inswi bakashaabanya mbubona bobo.
Inzho boonse bakalya bakekuta.
Ba shiciiya bakabwezelela bufwefwelenga bwashinkwa ubwanswi bwakashaala, bwakezuzha ikumi lya ntundu iintundu shobile.
Bantu bakalya kabali shuulu shili shosanwe shabalombwana.
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakalailila ba shiciiya bakwe ati banjile mu bwato basolole kuya ku Betisaida, walo wakashaala kwaamba aambile bantu ati bapiluke.
Amane kulazha wakaya ku lupili kuya kukomba.
Kube kumangolezha nikwakashiya anshi, bwato kabusacene akati ka lwaatele lwa Galilaya, pele walo kacili ku mulando ice.
Jeso wakabona ati ba shiciiya bakwe bali u mapenzhi aakushika bwato kaambo muuwo wakaunjisha. Akati kamashiku Jeso wakeza nkubaakubele uleza bweenda ameenzhi.
Nibakamubona uleza bweenda ameenzhi, bakakwiila kabazunga ati ambweni moza mubiyabi.
Boonse bakatiya nibakamubona.
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Amwiikwate myonzo! Mutatiyi Ndime!”
Amane wakanjila mu bwato mubaakubele. Ndilyona muuwo wakaliinza. Ba shiciiya bakazoowa cini cini.
Maleele akusanina shinkwa bantu bali shuulu shosane bayina ukaateelelesha ukaambo kakutashoma.
Jesu u ba shiciiya bakwe nibakalanduka lwaatele bakashoka ukwaanga bwato a mulando waku cishi ca Jenesaleti.
Mbubakahwila bulyo mu bwato, ndilyona bantu bakamuzhiba Jeso.
Bantu bakaindingana cishi coonse bakakanka kubweza balwazhi ukubatola kufwumbwa nkubakateelela ati nkwaabele Jesu, ukubooneka a minseme.

Kufwumbwa bulyo koko Jeso nkwakaita, u minzhi uumatungu, bantu kababweza balwazhi babo ukubatola kumushika, bakamulomba kwaamba abaampe nikuba kukwata bulyo kushikobelo shakwe. Ubobo boonse bakamukumya, bakapona.
Ba Falisi u balembi bamwi bakahwa ku Jelusalemu bakeza kubungana kwa Jeso.
Inzho nibakabona kwaamba ba shiciiya bakwe bamwi balalya shakulya u matashi aatasalali, nkukuti bayina nibakasamba kumatashi kwiingaina uciyanza caba Falisi ncibaakucita kwaamba bantu basalale.
Nkaambo ba Falisi antoomwi u ba Juda kabacilila lwiiyo lwa ba shaakale. Kabatankozha kulya cita basamba kumatashi kwiingaina uciyanza cabo.
Ulimwi tabakonzha kulya cintu cuulwa amushika, cita bacisalazhe bweelele. Nkwiili iimwi milawo yaba shaakale njibakaakucilila, iili ukoya yakusanzha inkapu, shibiya, mitiba yamukuba ukusalazha malo.
Ubobo ba Falisi u balembi bakamubuzha Jeso ati, “Nkaamboonzhi ba shiciiya bako tabacilila tunshiyanshiya ntutwakatambula kuhwa kuba shaakale besu, tabatondi balalya butasambile kumatashi?”
“baba bantu balandemeka umilomo yabo,
pele myonzo yabo
ili kulaale ame,
Kupaila kwabo nkwabulyo,
balayiisha tunshiyanshiya twa bantu
ukoya shiiyo shaka Leza!”
Ulimwi Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Milawo ya Leza mweesowa, mwakwatisha tunshiyanshiya twa bantu.”
Inzho wakabashimwina ati, “Mulasusha milawo ya leza kwaamba mucite milawo yatunshiyanshiya twenu.”
Mozesi wakamulailila ati, “Lemeka uso u banoko, Ulimwi Kufwumbwa wezo uusampaula ushi naa baina ulyeelele kufwa.”
Pele umwe mulaamba ati, Naa muntu kakwete cakupa ushi naa baina amana waamba ati, “Wezu ngu Kolobani,” caamba ati ceci nca Leza,
mulahuminya muntu wezo kutayohwa ushi u baina.
Ubobo mwaliubausha izwi lya Leza kwiitila mutunshiyanshiya twenu. Ulimwi nkushili ushimwi shintu shinji shinji shili bolya nshimucita.
Inzho waketa bantu banji banji kwaamba bazhize kwakwe, amane wakabaambila ati, “Amuteelele ncinzanda kumushimwina.
Ucinjila mu muntu tacimusofwaazha pe, pele ceco cihwa mukati ncicimusofwaazha muntu.
Wezo uukwete matwi naateelele.”
Inzho Jeso naakabashiya bantu wakanjila muŋanda, ba shiciiya bakwe bakamubuzha kwaamba apandulule makani aakashimpi.
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Anu amwe mwiina ncimwizhi. Sa tamwizhi ati kwiina cintu cinjila mu muntu kuhwa ansengwe cikonzha kumusofwaazha?
Nkaambo tacinjili mu monzo wakwe pele cilaya mwifwu, camana cahwa mu mubili.” Mu kwaamba bobo Jeso wakasalazha shilyo shoonse.
Ulimwi wakabashimwina ati, “Ucihwa mu muntu ncicisofwaazha muntu.
Nkaambo mukati kamuntu, mu monzo wakwe, mumuhwa mizeezo mibiyabi iipa kwaamba muntu ebe, ayaye,
acite mamambe umakanze mabiyabi oonse, bubeshi, mambonwa, lutuzhi, matushi, kulikumbuzha ubulimbushi.
Shoonse shibiyabi sheshi ushihwa mukati nshishisofwaazha muntu.”
Inzho Jeso naakakuhwa koko wakaya kumashi a Taya u Sidoni. Wakenjila muŋanda katazanda kwaamba bantu bazhibe ati nkwaali. Nikuba bobo katakonzha kuzuba, bantu bakazhiba ati mwaali muŋanda.
Ngoonaawo mukaintu umwi wakaakukwete mwana mushimbi uunjililwe moza mubiyabi naakateelela ati Jeso mwaali muŋanda, wakeza wamufwukamina.
Mukaintu wezu kali muhwamashi wamushobo waci Giliki kahwa ku Fonisiya mucishi ca Siliya. Wakamulomba Jeso kwaamba atande moza mubiyabi kuhwa mu mwanakwe.
Inzho Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Atutaangune kusanina bana, kaambo tacili cibotu kunanga bana cakulya ukuciwaala kubabwa.”
Mukaintu wakaingula ati, “Ncini cini Mwami, ubabwa balabwezelela ukulya bufwefwelenga buwila anshi kuhweetebulu!”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Waamba kabotu, ukaambo kamazwi ako aza bweela kwako, moza mubiyabi wamuhwa mu mwanako.”
Ngoonaawo mukaintu wezo wakapiluka kunganda yakwe weza kuyana mwanakwe ulilele abulo, u moza mubiyabi wamuhwa kale.
Jeso naakapiluka kuhwa ku cishi ca Taya, wakaita mu munzhi wa Sidoni ku lwaatele lwa Galilaya, wakaita akati kaminzhi Dekapoli.
Inzho bamwi bantu bakamuletela cimpama shikalenda, bakamulomba Jeso kwaamba amuponye, amwaampe itashi lyakwe.
Jeso wakamukusha abuleya wamutola kumabali, watunga minwe yakwe mu matwi a muntu wezo. Wakafwila mate amane wamulamba amulaka.
Ngoonaawo wakalyaalala kwizeulu walishinshimucila ukupozomoka ati, “Efata,” nkukwaamba ati, “Shinkuka.”
Ngoonaawo matwi a muntu wezo akashinkuka ndilyona ukalenda kakakosoka, wakakanka kwaamba kabotu.
Inzho Jeso wakabalailila ati batashimwini muntu naaba womwi, pele nikuba ati wakabakasha, balo bakatola impuwo kumbele.
Bakazoowa cini cini kuyana ati shintu shoonse kashilulamika. Bakaamba ati, “Bacimpama balamuteelela, ubashicintaamba balaamba!”
Kwiite mazuba mashoonto ulimwi ibunga lyabantu lyakeza kwa Jeso, pele kabaina shakulya, ubobo waketa ba shiciiya bakwe wabaambila ati,
“Banjetezha bantu baba, kaambo twakalaabo kwa mazuba ali otatwe ubwiina cakulya.
Kuti mbaambile ati babweele kuminzhi yabo iinzala balaakuya buwizuka munzhila, kaambo bamwi minzhi yabo ili kulaale.”
Ba shiciiya bakwe bakamwiingula ati, “No mono mulukula tulashiyanakwi shakulya shakusanina bantu banji banji bali bolya?”
Jeso wakababuzha ati, “No mulikwete shinkwa shongayi?” Bakaamba ati, “Shili ciloba.”

Ngoonaawo Jeso wakaambila ibunga lyabantu ati likale anshi. Amane wakabweza shinkwa shesho shili ciloba, walumba kwa Leza amane washikomauna, wapa ba shiciiya bakwe ati baabanye bantu. Ba shiciiya bakacita mbubona mbubakalaililwa.
Ulimwi kabakwete utuswi tushoonto bulyo, amane kulumba wakaambila ba shiciiya bakwe ati ato batwaabanye.
Boonse bantu bakalya bakekuta. Inzho ba shiciiya bakabwezelela bufwefwelenga bwakashaala bantu nibakakuta. Bakezuzha shinzuma shili ciloba.
Kakuli bantu bali shuulu shone. Jeso wakaambila bantu kwaamba baakuya.
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakanjila mu bwato u ba shiciiya bakwe baya ku cishi ca Dalumanuta.
Jeso wakalishinshimucila mu monzo waamba ati, “No kaamboonzhi bantu ba mazuba ano balazandisha citondezho? Cini cini ndamushimwina ati kwiina citindezho ncibakacitilwa pe!”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakabashiya wecila mu bwato wabweela kumutala wezhiba.
Ba shiciiya bakaluba kubweza shinkwa nibakacila mu bwato, kabakwete bulyo cinkwa comwi.
Ubobo Jeso wakabacenjezha ati, “Amucenjele kubumena bwa ba Falisi ubumena bwa Helodi.”
Ngoonaawo bakakanka kuzumanicizhanya akati kabo ati, “Wabona kwaamba twiina cakulya ncaambila bobo.”
Jeso wakaazhiba makani ngubakaakuzumanicizhanya, wakababuzha ati, “Nkamboonzhi ncimwaamba makani aakubula shinkwa? Sa uninzho tamuna kuteelelesha? Sa matelaishi enu acili mafwaafwi?
Sa menso enu taaboni? Sa matwi enu taateeleli? Sa tamuzhibaluka,
kwaamba ndakasanina bantu bali shuulu shili shosanwe kuhwa kushinkwa shili shosanwe? Ulimwi sa kwakezula intundu shongaaye shabufwefwelenga?” Bakamwiingula ati, “Ikumi ushitwesha shobile.”
Ulimwi wakabaambila ati, “Kuhwa kushinkwa shili ciloba, ndakasanina bantu bali shuulu shone, no mwakazuzha intundu shongaaye shabufwefwelenga?” Bakaingula ati, “Ciloba.”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakababuzha ati, “Sa umbuli ninzho tamuna kuteelelesha?”
Bakashika ku munzhi wa Betisaida. Bantu bamwi bakaleta mulombwana moofwu kwa Jeso ukumulomba kwaamba amwaampe itashi lyakwe amuponye.
Wakamukwata kwitashi moofwu wamusololela kuhwa mu munzhi. Wakamufwila mate mu menso akwe amane wamuhwumba matashi amenso wamubuzha ati, “Sa kuli cintu nciwabona?”
Moofwu wakayalula menso waamba ati, “Ndabona bantu beendeenda, pele balalibonya ukoya shisamu.”
Inzho Jeso wakahwumba matashi aakwe amenso a moofwu ulimwi, amane moofwu wakalanjisha, iimboni shakwe shakayaluka wakabonesha.
Jeso wakamulailila ati, “Koya kuŋanda yako, utabi nuunjila mu munzhi momu pe.”
Ngoonaawo Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe bakaya kuminzhi ya Sizaliya Filipi. Munzhila wakababuzha ati, “Amunshimwine, no bantu balaamba ati ndime ni?”
Ngoonaawo Pita wakamwiingula ati, “Ndiwe Kilisito, Munanike waka Leza.” Amane Jeso wakabalailila ati, “Mutashimwini muntu naaba womwi ku makani angu.”

Inzho Jeso wakakanka kuyiisha ba shiciiya bakwe ati, “Mwanaamutu ulyeelele kupenga mapenzhi manji manjii, ukukakwa kubakando babantu u bapaizhi bakando, u balembi. Balakamuyaya, pele kwakaita mazuba otatwe ulakabuka.”
Aza makani wakaamba kaanzambwene. Pita naakateelela bobo wakabweza Jeso waamutola kumabali wakanka kumulemanina.
Jeso wakacebuka ku bashiciiya bakwe, wakatapatila Pita ati, “Ahwe awa Shaatani! Nkaambo tutelaiki matelaishi a Leza, pele a bantu.”
Nkaambo kufwumbwa uufwini bumi bwakwe ulabusowa, pele uuzhimininwa bumi bwakwe ukaambo kangu ulakabuyana.
No muntu ulayana impinduunzhi mukuhuba inshi yoonse, amana wazhimininwa bumi bwakwe?
Naa nciinzhi muntu ncakonzha kupa kwaamba anunune bumi bwakwe? Kwiina pe!

Ubobo kufwumbwa muntu uusa insoni kukaambo kangu u kuyiisha makani angu ano anshi ali bantu ba mazuba ano batashomeki, aze Mwanaa Muntu ulakamukaka ciindi naakeeza mu bulemu bwa Ushi antoomwi u baanjelo basalala.”
Ulimwi Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Cini cini ndamushimwina ati, ngubali ano bamwi batakaafwi kabatana kububona bwami bwa Leza kabwiza iinsana.”
Shakusama shakwe shakakanka kumweka shakatuba buu. Kwiina muntu ano anshi ukonzha kushitubya bobo pe.
Ulimwi ba shiciiya baba bakabona Elija u Mozesi balabandika u Jeso
Pita wakamwaaambila Jeso ati, “Mwiiyi, cabota kwaamba ati tuli ano. Atuzace shifwutu shotatwe, cimwi cibe cako, cimwi caka Mosesi, cimwi caka Elija.”
Pele katacizhi ncakaakwaamba, nkaambo walo u beenzhiina kabafwile bukandu.
Ngoonaawo ba shiciiya bakacebauka pele kwiina muntu unji ngubakabona, cita bulyo Jeso ice.
Inzho nibakaakuya buseluka a lupili, Jeso wakabalailila ba shiciiya baba ati, “Sheshi nshimwabona mutashimwini muntu naaba womwi pe, mpaka cikashice ciindi ceco Mwanaa Muntu naakaabuka ku bafwu.”
Bakakuteelela kulaililwa koku, pele nikuba bobo kabacibuzhanya akati kabo ati, “No koku kubuka ku bafwu caambaanzhi?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Cini cini Elija nguuyelele kutaanguna kwiza kwaamba abambe shintu shoonse. Nikuba bobo no nkaamboonzhi Malembe alaamba ati Mwanaa Muntu ulyeele kupenga cini cini ukukakwa?
Cini cini ndamushimwina ati Elija wakeza kale, ulimwi bantu bakamucita mbubaakuzanda, umbona mbucilembelwe.”
Nibakashika kwaakuli ba shiciiya nokwabo, bakabona inkamu inkando ya bantu, kakuli u balembi ubakaakuzumanicizhanya u ba shiciiya.
Inzho nibakamubona Jeso bakazoowa cini cini, bakamulukancila kuya kumwaanzha.
Jeso wakababuzha ati, “Nciinzhi ncimwaakuzumanicizhanya abo?”
Umwi mulombwana waakuli munkamu wakamwiingula ati, “Mwiiyi, ume ndaleta mwanangu, uunjililwe moza mubiyabi uumukasha kwaamba.
Kufwumbwa ciindi nuumunjila, ulamucina anshi. Ulahwa iyohu ku mulomo ukuluma inkwino, umubili ulazuma ntaa. Inzho ndaakulombele ba shiciiya bako kwaamba batande moza mubiyabi, pele bakakacilwa.”
Jeso wakabuzha ati, “Akaka umwe nubantu bayina lushomo, anu nciindi cilamfwu buti nciinkakala amwe? Anu cilampe buti ciindi ncinkakala amwe? Amumulete kono kwangu!”
Ngoonaawo bakamuleta kwa Jeso.
Moza mubiyabi mbuwakamubonena bulyo Jeso wakakanka kumuzhangamya mwana, amane wakawa anshi ukwaalabana, wakakanka kukusha iyohu ku mulomo.
Jeso wakamubuzha ushi mwana ati, “No ceci cakamukanka liliye?”
Ushi wakaamba ati, “Kuhwa ciindi nakaakuli mwana mushoonto.
Shiindi shinji shinji wezu moza mubiyabi koozanda kumuyaya koomucinina u mulilo nimuba mu meenzhi. Pele na kuti kuli ncuukonzha kucita twalomba tufwile luse utuyohwe.”
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Anu ‘Na ulakonzha,’ caambaanzhi? Shintu shoonse shilakonzha kuba ku muntu uushoma.”
Ngoonaawo ushi mweembezhi wakapozomoka ati, “Ndashoma, pele ndakulomba ati unjohwe nzunde kutashoma kwangu!”

Jeso naakabona ati bantu banji banji baswena afwaafwi aawo ngakaakubele, wakoolemanina moza mubiyabi waakuli mu mweembezhi ati, “Uwe u moza utateeleli uushicintaamba muhwe mu mwana, ulimwi utakenjili mo linji!”
Inzho moza mubiyabi wakakwiila, wamucina anshi wahwa wamushiya uliwizucile, cakuti bantu bakaamba ati, “Wafwa.”
Pele Jeso wakamukwata kwitashi wamubusha wazhima.
Jeso naakanjila muŋanda, ba shiciiya bakwe bakamubuzha kumabali ati, “No nkaamboonzhi uswe twakacilwa kuukusha moza mubiyabi?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Kukomba bulyo nkukukonzha kukusha moza mubiyabi uli bolya.”
Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe nibakakuhwa koko, bakaita mucishi ca Galilaya. Jeso katazanda kwaamba ati kube muntu naaba womwi uuzhiba nkwaabele,
kaambo wakaakuyiisha ba shiciiya bakwe ati, “Mwanaa Muntu ulakaabwa ku bantu, balakamuyaya, pele nikuba bobo mu buzuba bwatatu ulakabuka ku bafwu.”
Pele balo bayina nibakakuteelelesha kuyiisha koku, ulimwi bakatiya kumubuzha.
Inzho Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe bakashika ku munzhi wa Kapenaumi, nibakenjila muŋanda, Jeso wakababuzha ba shiciiya bakwe ati, “No ncinzhi ncimwaakuzumanicizhanya munzhila?”
Balo bakaliinza bulyo, kaambo kakuti munzhila kabeza buzumanicizhanya makani akuti, nguuliye mukando akati kabo.

Jeso wakakala anshi, wabeta ba shiciiya bakwe bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile, amane wabaambila ati, “Kufwumbwa uuzanda kuba mutaanzhi akati kenu ulyeelele kuba mushaalizhi, abe mutwanga wa bantu boonse.”
Inzho Jeso wakabweza kana wakabika akati kabo, wakabukata wabaambila ati,
“Kufwumbwa uutambula kana kali ukoya kaka mwizhina lyangu ati ndime atambula. Ulimwi kufwumbwa uuntambula tatambuli bulyo ume pe, pele ulamutambula u wezo wakantuma.”
Johani wakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Mwiiyi, twakabona umwi muntu ulakusha myoza mibiyabi mwizhina lyako, inzho twakamukasha, nkaambo tali munayisha.”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Mutamukasha pe, kaambo kwiina muntu uucita maleele mwizhina lyangu uukonzha kunsandumucila ukufwambaana kumbishizha.
Nkaambo kufwumbwa uutali shinkondonokwesu ati ngwesu.
Amuzhibe ati kufwumbwa muntu uumupa inkapu ya meenzhi aakunwa ukaambo kangu, wezo muntu ulakatambula boonzo.
“Pele kufwumbwa ukaafwumpuzha umwi wa bashoonto baba ba shoma kwaamba abishe, wezo cilabota kwaamba waangwa ikangabwe munshingo ukuwaalwa mukankuni ka lwaatele.
Ubobo kuti na itashi lyako lyakupa kubisha, likosole! Nkaambo ncibotu kwaamba ukanjile mu bumi butamana ulibulizhizhe kubaazha kuwaalwa mwibibi lya mulilo uutamana kukwete matashi obile.
Mwalo momo maseni aabo mwaatafwi, ulimwi mulilo muutazhimi.
Ulimwi na cituta cetende lyako cakufwumpuzha ucikosole, ncibotu kunjila mu bumi butamana ulibulizhizhe kubaala kuwaalwa mwibibi lya mulilo uutamana kukwete shituta shobile.
Mwalo momo maseni aabo mwaatafwi, ulimwi mulilo muutazhimi.
Ulimwi kuti na linso lyako lyakupa kubisha lilobole. Nkaambo ncibotu kwaamba ukanjile mu bumi bwa Leza ucimbolyo, kubaala kwaamba ukasowelwe mwibibi lya mulilo uutamana u menso obile.
Mwalo momo maseni aabo mwaatafwi, ulimwi mulilo muutazhimi.”
“Nkaambo ukoya cakulya mbucilungwa mwino, mbubona bobo amwe mbumukaalulamikwa u mulilo wamapenzhi.
Mwino mubotu, pele kuti naa mwino wasampuka, no ulalungwa buti? Amube umwino mukati kenu, ulimwi amukale muluumuno ubeenzhinokwenu.”
Jeso wakahwa ku Kapenaumi, waya ku cishi ca Judiya cili kumutala wa lweenje lwa Joodani. Bantu banji banji bakamubunganina, wakabayiisha umbona mbwakaakucita lyoonse.
Ba Falisi bamwi bakeza kumubuzha Jeso mubuzho wakumulingulula ati, “Tushimwine, sa ku mulawo cililuleme kwaamba mulombwana aleke mwinakwe?”
Jeso wakabaingula umubuzho ati, “No Mozesi wakamulailila buti?”
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Mozesi wakamulembela mulawo wezu kaambo muli bazumu mitwi.
Pele ku makancilo a malenjelo, Leza wakalenga mulombwana u mukaintu.
Ubobo mulombwana ulakashiya ushi u baina ukukakatila kumwinakwe,
inzho bobile baba ulaba mubili womwi nana. Tabacili bobile linji, pele baba mubili womwi.
Babo Leza mbaaswaanganya kutabi muntu uuyelele kubaandaanya.”
Nibakapiluka kuŋanda, abo ba shiciiya bakamubuzha Jeso makani aza ngoona.
Wakabaambila ati, “Kufwumbwa wezo uuleka mwinakwe ukutwala uunji, waba shimamambe.
Mbumbona bobo u mukaintu uukuhwa kumulumyaakwe ukutwalwa ku mulombwana uunji ati wabucilwa.”
Bamwi bantu bakaleta banabo kwa Jeso kwaamba abaampe matashi ukubalonjezha, pele ba shiciiya bakabakasha bantu babo.
Jeso abone bobo wakabalemanina ba shiciiya bakwe, wakabaambila ati, “Amubaleke bana beze kwangu mutabakasha kaambo bwami bwa Leza mbwabo bali bolya.
Cini cini ndamushimwina ati, Kufwumbwa wezo uutatambuli bwami bwa Leza ukoya mwana, takabunjili pe.”
Inzho Jeso wakafwukata bana wabaampa matashi ukubalonjezha.
Jeso mbwakakancila bulyo lweendo lwakwe, mulombwana umwi wakamulukancila, wakamufwukamina wamubuzha ati, “U mwiiyi mubotu, ncintuunzhi cibotu ncinjelele kucita kwaamba njane bumi butamana?”
Inzho Jeso wakamubuzha ati, “No ulentila nzhi ati ndimubotu? Kwiina muntu mubotu cita Leza ice nana.
Uliizhi milawo ya Leza yaamba ati, Utabi nuuyaya, utabi shimamambe, utebi, utalenjelela uumwi kaambo, utabi mubeshi, lemeka uso u banoko?”
Wezo mulombwana wakaingula ati, “Mwiiyi, kuhwa kubwana bwangu kwiina nuuba womwi mulawo ngundatakacilila.”
Jeso wakamutongomwena ca lufwuno u kumwaambila ati, “Kwashaala cintu comwi. Koya ukauzhe shoonse nshuukwete, mali nguukayana, ukape bapushi, ubobo ulakakwata lubono kwizeulu, wamana uzhize uncilile.”
Naakaateelela aza mazwi wakausa wakaya ulicendenkene ku bushu nkaambo kahubile lubono lunji lunji.
Jeso wakabacebauka ba shiciiya bakwe wakabaambila ati, “Ncizumu ku bantu bahubi kunjila mu bwami bwa Leza!”
Aza makani akabazhinga ba shiciiya. Jeso wakabaambila ulimwi ati, “Banangu, ncizumu kunjila mu bwami bwa Leza.
Ncuubauba inkamela kunjila mulinso lyakasonde kubaala muntu muhubi kwaamba enjile mu bwami bwa Leza.”
Ba shiciiya nibakateelela bobo bakazoowa cini cini, bakabuzhanya ati, “Mwaamba alo kuli uukaafwutuka?”
Jeso wakabalanjilila wabambila ati, “Ku bantu ceci tacikozheka, pele Leza wiina ncaakacilwa pe.”
Inzho Pita wakaamba ati, “Bona, uswe twakashiya shoonse twakucilila.”

Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Ee imbubo, ulimwi ndamwaambila ati kufwumbwa uushiya iŋanda yakwe nibaba banina balombwana u bakaintu, naaba baina naa ushi, nibaba bana, niiba myuunda ukaambo kangu u Makani Mabotu,
ulakatambula shinji shinji ku ciindi ceno, myaanda myaanda ya maanda, banina balombwana u bakaintu, umanokwabo, u bana umyuunda kubicilizha u mapenzhi, pele muciindi cizhiza ulakayana bumi butamana.
Pele bataanzhi banji banji balakaba bashaalizhi abo bashaalizhi balakaba bataanzhi.”

Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe kabaya bweenda munzhila iiya ku Jelusalemu, pele Jeso kali lwaambele, ba shiciiya kabalibilicile, u bantu bakaakubacilile kabafwile bukandu. Ulimwi Jeso wakaambula ba shiciiya bakwe bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile wakakanka kubashimwina shoonse shizanda kumucitikila.
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Amubone tulaya ku Jelusalemu, koko Mwanaa Muntu nkwaakakaabwa ku bapaizhi bakando u ba maayi ba mulawo. Ulakabetekelwa lufwu, balakamwaaba kumatashi a bantu bakunze.
Balakamusaalizha ukumufwila mate, balakamuzupaula u kumuyaya. Pele kubuzuba bwatatu ulakabuka ku bafwu.”
Inzho Jemusi u Johani banakwe Zebedi, bakeza kwa Jeso bamwaambila ati, “U Mwiiyi, kuli cintu ncituzanda kwaamba utucitile.”
Jeso wakababuzha ati, “No ncinzhi ncimuzanda kwaamba mucitile?”
Bakamwiingula ati, “Tulazanda ati wakakala acuuna cako ca bulemu, ukatuhuminye kwaamba tukakale umwi kucilyo umwi kucimonsho cako.”
Bakamwiingula ati, “Tulakonzha.”
Inzho Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Cini cini munkapu mwiinkaanwina amwe mulakanwina mo, ulimwi mulakapapatizwa lupapatizo ndwinkaapapatizwa.
Pele kukala kuluya lwangu lwa cilyo na lwa cimonsho indime iimpa pe. Taata, nguukakapa masena aza kuli babo mbaakaasala.”
Inzho ba shiciiya babo bamwi bali ikumi nibakateelela makani aza, bakabalemanina ba Jemusi u Johani.
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakaboompolola boonse wabaambila ati, “Mulizhi ati akati ka bantu bakunze, bami baleendelezha iinsana, ulimwi balasebezha kami kami kulela bantu babo.
Pele kulyuumwe taceelele kuba bobo pe. Kufwumbwa uzanda kuba mukando ulyeelele kuba musebazhi wenu.
Kufwumbwa uzanda kuba mutaanzhi ulyeelele kuba mutwanga wabo boonse.
Nkaambo naaba Mwanaa Muntu wiina kwiza kusebezelwa, wakeza kusebezela bamwi milimo, ulimwi u kupa bumi bwakwe kwaamba anunune bantu banji banji.”

Inzho bakashika ku munzhi wa Jeliko. Jeso naakahwa mu munzhi antoomwi u ba shiciiya bakwe u bantu banji banji, umwi mulombwana moofwu shikulombelela kashite kumbali kunzhila, izhina lyakwe kali Batimeyasi mwanakwe Timeyasi.
Naakateelela ati ngu Jeso waku Nanzaleta waita, wakakanka kupozomoka ati, “Jeso, Mwana Devidi, mfwila luse!”
Bantu bakamulemanina u kumwaambila ati aliinze. Pele walo wakapozomokesha ati, “Mwana Devidi, mfwila luse!”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakazhima waamba ati, “Noomwite!”
Ubobo bakamwita mulombwana moofwu, bamushimwina ati, “Botelwa! Zhimuka ulakwita!”
Ngoonaawo wakacisowa cikobelo cakwe, wazhimuka weza kwa Jeso.
Inzho Jeso wakamubuzha ati, “Nciinzhi ncuuzanda ati nkucitile?”
Mulombwana moofwu wakamwiingula Jeso ati, “Mwiiyi, ndazanda kubona ulimwi.”
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Koya, kushoma ume kwakuponya.” Ngoonaawo wakacikonzha kubona ukumucilila Jeso nkwaakaakuya.
Inzho nibakaswena afwaafwi ku Jelusalemu, bakashika kuminzhi ya Betefage u Betani, afwaafwi ulupili lwa Maoliva. Jeso wakatuma ba shiciiya bobile.
Wakabaambila ati, “Kamuya ku munzhi welya uuli ambele. Nkukona kumanjililo mulakayana mwana wa mbongolo utanalizilwe muntu ulyanjilwe. Mukamwaangulule mumulete.
Na kulakaba muntu uukaamubuzha ati, ‘No ncinzhi ncimucitila bolya?’ Mukamwiingule ati, ‘Mwami ulamuzanda, ulamuzhola ninzho ninzho.’”
Inzho bakaya ku munzhi kolya, bakayana mwana wa mbongolo ulyaangilwe ansengwe ukasakuzho afwaafwi umulyango kumbali iinzhila.
Bamwi bantu bakaakuzhimine afwaafwi bakababuzha ati, “Umwe! Mucite buti, mwamwangulula mwana wa mbongolo?”
Bakabaambila umbona mbwakabashimwina Jeso.
Ubobo bakabahuminya. Inzho bakamuleta mwana wa mbongolo kwa Jeso, bamane babika shikobelo shabo ambongolo, Jeso wakaliza.
Bantu banji banji bakazala shikobelo shabo munzhila, abo bamwi bakabalaula tutabi twatusamu tukwete matuhu batuzala munzhila.
Bantu bakaakuya bweenda kumbele, u babo bakaakucilila munshi bakakanka kupozomoka ukutembaula Leza ati,
“Naatembaulwe Leza!
Uli u coolwe uzhiza mwizhina lya Mwami.
Leza alonjezhe bwami buzhiza bwa Mwami Devidi ushesu!”
Alumbwe Leza Namakungwe Mutalabala.

Jeso naakashika mu Jelusalemu wakaya kunjila muŋanda ya Leza, wakalanga langa shintu shoonse. Nikwakashiya wakamuhwa mu Jelusalemu waya ku Betani antoomwi u ba shiciiya bakwe bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile.
Nibwakaca bakakuhwa ku Betani, inzho Jeso wakafwa inzala.

Wakabona ikuzu alaale lyakakushuucile matuhu manji manji, ubobo wakaya kwaamba abone na kuli inkuzu. Pele naakashika afwaafwi wakayana kwiina inkuzu matuhu bulyo, kaambo ciindi ca nkuzu kacitana kushika.
Jeso wakalishinganya ikuzu lelyo ati, “Kutakabi muntu ukaalya inkuzu kulyuuwe ulimwi.”
U ba shiciiya bakwe bakamuteelela naakaamba bobo.
Nibakenjila mu Jelusalemu, Jeso wakaya kuŋanda ya Leza, wakabatanda bantu boonse bakaakuuzha ukuula. Wakaalumuna matebulu ngubakaakucincanyinya mali, ushuuna shabo bakaakuuzha inkwilimba.
Ulimwi katahuminya muntu uuzemwine kwiita mulubanza lwa ŋanda ya Leza.
Amane wakabayiisha bantu ati, “Mu mazwi a Leza cililembelwe ati, ‘Iŋanda yangu ilatewa ati niŋanda yakukombela ya mashi oonse.’ Pele umwe mweecita kuba cizubilo ca batewu.”
Bapaizhi bakando u balembi bakaateelela makani akacitika, ubobo bakakanka kukapula inzhila yakumuyaya Jeso. Pele kabatiya, kaambo kakuhula kwa bantu bakateelela kuyiisha kwakwe kukankamika.
Abe mangolezha Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe bakahwa mu Jelusalemu.
Buce cifwumo-fwumo nibakaita munzhila bakabona ikuzu ndyaakashinganya Jeso ndizumu kushicila kumizanda.
Pita wakazhibaluka u kwaamba ati, “Mwiiyi langa! Isamu ndiwakashinganya lyazuma.”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Amukwate lushomo mwa Leza.

Cini cini ndamushimwina ati, mulakonzha kwaambila lupili lolu ati, ‘Zhuka awo nguubele uliwaale mu lwaatele.’ Kuti kamutazuluzha mu myonzo yenu, pele kamushoma ca monzo oonse, ati ceco ncimwaamba cilakonzha kucitika.
Ubobo ndamushimwina ati ciindi ncimukomba mushome kwaamba ati ncimwalomba mwacitambula kale.
Ulimwi lyoonse nimukomba kamubalekelela boonse bakwete milandu kulyuumwe, kwaamba aze ushenu uuli kwizeulu amulekelele shibi shenu.
Nkaambo kuti umwe tamulecelela boonse bakwete milandu kulyuumwe, aze Ushenu uuli kwizeulu takamulecelela milandu yenu.”
Ulimwi bakabweela ku Jelusalemu. Jeso nakaakuya bweenda muŋanda ya Leza kwakeza bapaizhi bakando u balembi ubakando baba Juda,
bakoombuzha Jeso ati, “Mu mwizhina lyaani muucita shintu sheshi? Ulimwi nguni wakakutuma kucita shintu sheshi?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Ndamubuzha bulyo mubuzho womwi. Mwampandulwila, ame ndamwaambila wakantuma kucita shintu sheshi.
Amuŋambile, nguni wakatuma Johani kwaamba apapatize, ngu Leza na mbantu? Amunshimwine.”
Bakakanka kuzumanikana mulwabo beni ati, “No twaambe acani?” Kuti twaamba ati “Lwakahwa kwa Leza,” ulaamba ati, “No nkaamboonzhi mwiina ukamushoma Johani?”
Sa twaambe ati, “Lwakahwa ku bantu?” Pele bakatiya kwaamba bobo nkaambo bantu boonse bakaakushoma kwaamba Johani kali mushinshimi mwini mwini.
Bakamwiingula Jeso ati, “Tatwizhi.” Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Ame nshimushimwini wakantuma kucita sheshi.”
Ciindi ca kutebula micelo ya waini nicakashika, wakatuma musebezhi ku balimi kwaamba bamupe aze caabilo ca micelo yamumunda.
Pele balimi bakamukwata musebezhi wezo bamuuma ukumutanda, bamupilusha cinkambaminwe.
Ulimwi mukamwini muunda wakatuma uumwi musebezhi. Balimi bakamutulula luuma ukumupenzha cuusha insoni.
Ulimwi wakatuma uumwi musebezhi, wezo walo bakamuyaya. Ubamwi banji banji mbaakaakutuma bakacitwa mbumbona bobo, bamwi kabaumwa, bamwi kabayaiwa.
Kwakashaala womwi bulyo waakaakweelele kutumwa, wezo mwanakwe mukamwini muunda ngwaakaakufwini. Inzho ku mamanino wakamutuma mwanakwe ku balimi. Wakaamba ati, ‘Balakamupa bulemu mwanangu.’
Pele balimi nibakoombona bakashimwizhanya ati, ‘Nguwezu shimulyazhina. Kamwiza tumuyaye! Kwaamba muunda ube wesu.’
Ngoonaawo bakamukwata u kumuyaya, bamusowela ansengwe lya muunda.”
Amane Jeso wakababuzha ati, “No mukamwini muunda ulacitaanzhi? Cini cini ulakeza kubayaya balimi babo ukuupa muunda ku bantu banji.
Inta mwakaabala Malembe aamba ati,
“Ibwe ndibaakaka bazashi,
lyaba ndiibwe lya cooko lizandika.”
Mwami nguwakapa kwaamba sheshi shicitike ubobo shilazoosha cini cini.
Beendelezhi baba Juda nibakezhiba ati mbaakaakukumbilizha mu cikozhano ceci, bakasoleka kwaamba bayane inzhila ya kumwaanga Jeso. Pele bakatiya bantu ubobo bakaya bamushiya.
Ba Falisi u bantu bamwi bamukabunga kaba Helodiyani bakatumwa kwa Jeso kwaamba bamuyanine mulandu kwiita mu mazwi aakwe.

Bakashika kwakwe bamwaambila ati, “Mwiiyi, tulizhi ati uli muntu uululeme. Wiina makani unshibakutelaicila bantu, pele ulayiisha kabotu inzhila iniini ya Leza. Twaambile, sa cililuleme kwaamba tuukutela mutelo ku muleli mukando waku Loma? Sa tulyeelele kutela, na pe?”
Pele Jeso wakaazhiba maanu aabo. Ngoonaawo wakababuzha ati, “Nkamboonzhi ncimuningululila? Amulilete ili ndibone.”
Ubobo bakalileta ili lyomwi, Jeso wakababuzha ati, “No mutwi wezu ngwaani? Iizhina lilembelwewo ndyaani?” Bakamwiingula ati, “Nshamuleli mukando Kaisala waku Loma.”
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Amumupe Kaisala shakwe Kaisala, ulimwi sha Leza amumupe Leza.” Inzho Jeso kwiingula kwakwe kwakabakankamika cini cini.
“Mwiiyi, Mozesi wakatulembela mulawo wakuti, ‘Naa munyoko wafwa, washiya mukaintu wiina mwana, munina ulyeelele kumukona mukamufwu kwaamba amuzhalile bana mufwu.’
Kakuli balombwana babunina mu lushomo bali ciloba. Mukando wabo wakatwala, pele wakafwa wiina nakazhala mwana.
Wakaakumucilila wakamukona mukamufwu, pele aze wakafwa wiina bana. Uwatatu wakacita umbona bobo,
mpaka boonse bali ciloba bakamutwala u kufwa cakutazhala bana. Ku mamanino aze mukaintu wakafwa.
Inzho mubuzho wesu nguwezu, boonse bakabushiwa kuhwa kubafwu, no mukaintu wezu ulakaba waani, nkaambo boonse kabamutwele?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Muli bazhimini nkaambo tamweezhi mazwi aalembelwe, ulimwi tamushizhi insana sha Leza.
Nkaambo bantu bakabushiwa ku bafwu balakaakuli ukoya baanjelo bamwizeulu tabakatwalani pe.”

Inzho ku makani aakubushiwa ku bafwu sa mwiina nimwakabala mwibuka ndyaakalemba Mozesi ukaambo kacisoko cakaakuhwilima mulilo? Leza wakamwaambila Mozesi ati, “Ndime Leza wa Abulahamu, Leza wa Aizeki, Leza wa Jacobo.”
Ngu Leza wa bantu balanga tali Leza wa bafwu pe. Aakuli mbumutelaika bobo muli bazhimini cini cini.

Inzho kakuli umwi wa balembi wakaakuliwo wakateelela mubuzho. Wakabona kwaamba ati Jeso wakabaingula kabotu ba Saduki, amane wakeza kwa Jeso wamubuzha ati, “No nguuliye mulawo mukando ubaala iimwi yoonse?”
Fwuna Mwami Leza wako u monzo wako woonse, u moza wako woonse, u mizeezo yako yoonse, iinsana shako shoonse.”
Uumwi mulawo mukando wabili nguwezu, “Fwuna shimukobonoko umbona mbulifwini umwini. Kwiina mulawo mukando kubaala yezhi pe.”

Inzho muntu ulyeelele kufwuna Leza u monzo wakwe oonse, u mizeezo yakwe yoonse iinsana shakwe shoonse ulimwi afwune shimukobonina ukoya mbwalifwini mwini. Kucita bobo ncintu cikando kubaala kuleta banyama kwaamba batentwe acipaililo u kupa shipaizho shimwi kwa Leza.”
Kuhwaawo kwiina muntu wakamubuzha mubuzho ulimwi.
Jeso naakaakuyiisha muŋanda ya Leza wakabuzha ati, No balembi balaambilaanzhi ati Kilisito ulakahwa kumukowa waka Devidi.
Aakuli walo Devidi lwakwe mwini naakanjilwa Moza Usalala wakaamba ati,
Mwami Leza wakaamba ku Mwami wangu ati,
kala kuluya lwangu lwa cilyo,
mpaka nkabike ba shinkondonoko kunshi lyamatende ako.
Aakuli Devidi mwini wakamwita Kilisito ati, “Mwami.” No ninzho Kilisito ulaba buti mwanakwe Devidi?
Bana buleya bakakutambula kuyiisha kwa Jeso ca kubotelwa.
Inzho Jeso nakaakuyiisha wakaamba ati, “Amucenjele kubalembi bazandisha kuya bweenda kabasamine shikobelo shilamfwu, ukwaanzhiwa ca bulemu mu shisambalilo,
u kukala a shuuna shabulemu mu shikombelo shaba Juda u mapobwe.
Balacenga bamuka bafwu ukubananga imbono shabo, ulimwi balazanda kulibonya ku bantu mu kukomba shikombyo shabo shilamfwu. Cisubulo cabo kwa Leza cilaabaala kubiya.”
Bumwi buzuba Jeso naakaakushite muŋanda ya Leza kufwaafwi ucizobwelo ca mali, wakaakulanjilile bantu mbubabika mali. Bahubi banji banji bakaakubika mali manji manji.
Inzho kwakeza mukamufwu mupushi wabika tuli tushoonto shoonto tobile twamukuba.
Ngoonaawo Jeso waketa ba shiciiya bakwe wakabaambila ati, “Ndamushimwina ati wezu mukamufwu mupushi wapa kubaala boonse babika mucizobwelo.
Nkaambo babika tushoonto bulyo kuhwa kubuhubi bwabo, pele walo wezu mubupushi bwakwe wabika shoonse nshaakwete, wiina ncaashaazha muŋanda yakwe.”
Inzho Jeso mbwaakahwila bulyo muŋanda ya Leza, umwi wa bashiciiya bakwe wakamwaambila ati, “Mwiiyi, bona! Taaliboteli mabwe aza ubuzace bwa ŋanda yezhi!”
Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Inta mwaabona mazace aza makando ali bolya? Kwiina ibwe likaashaala lilizhilicilwe ebwe nina. Oonse alakoolomonwa.”
Inzho Jeso naakaakushite alupili lwa masamu a maoliva lulanjene iiŋanda ya Leza, ba Pita u Jemusi u Johani u Andulu bakamubuzha Jeso kumbali ati,
“Tushimwine, no ndililiye nishikaacitika shintu sheshi, ulimwi nciinzhi cikaaba citondezho ca kwaamba sheshi shintu shikalacitika?”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakakanka kubayiisha ati, “Amucenjele kwaamba kutabi muntu uumucenga.
Nkaambo bantu banji banji balakeza mwizhina lyangu, baamba ati, ‘Ndime Kilisito.’ Ulimwi balakasowa banji banji.
Mutakapenji mwakateelela ati koku kuli inkondo, nikuba kuteelela impuwo ya nkondo kumashi aakulaale. Sheshi shilyeelele kucitika, pele taalyaati ngumamanino aciindi.
Cishi cilakalwa u cishi nina, abo bwami u bwami nina. Kulakaba kuzungaana kwanshi mu masena andeene andeene. Ulimwi kulakaba inzala, pele aza ngu makancilo a mapenzhi.
Pele kaatana kushika mamanino, Makani Mabotu alyeelele kukambaukwa ku bantu boonse.
Ciindi nibakaamukwata u kumutola kunkuta mutakalipakashizha shakuyakwaamba, pele mukaambe kufwumbwa ceco ncimukaapewa aciindi awo, kaambo mazwi ngumuya kwaamba taali enu, Moza Usalala nguuya kwaamba.
Muntu ulakaaba munina kwaamba ayayiwe, abo bamazhali balakacita mbubona bobo kubanabo, bana balakahobelela babazhala ati bayaiwe.
Umwe mulakasulwa ku bantu boonse ukaambo kezhina lyangu. Pele wezo uzumanana kushicila ku mamanino ulaafwutulwa.
Wezo ukaayanwa alululi lwa ŋanda teelele kusowa ciindi kuseluka kwaamba akushe cintu muŋanda niciba comwi cakutolelela.
Muntu ukaayanwa umuunda atakalanga munshi kubweza cikobelo.
Kulakaba kupenga cini cini kuli babo bamishi ubanonsha ku mazuba azo!
Kamukomba Leza kwaamba sheshi shintu shitakacitici ciindi campeyo.
Nkaambo ku mazuba azo kulakaba mapenzhi makando abaala, aatanabwenwe kuhwa ciindi Leza naakalenga inshi kushika bwasunu. Ulimwi takukabi linji mapenzhi ali ukoya azo.
Kuti Leza natakaafwiinsha mazuba azo ukaambo ka bantu bakwe basale, nikwakaakwiina muntu uuti naakafwutulwa.
Ku ciindi ceco na muntu akamwaambile ati, “Bona nguwezu Kilisito na ati, ‘Bona, nguwelya!’ Mutakahumina.
Nkaambo kulakaba ba Kilisito babeshi ulimwi u bashinshimi babeshi. Balakacita shitondezho u shintu shizoosha kwaamba bakacenge bantu banji banji kubicilizha ubasale baka Leza caakukonzheka.
Ubobo amucenjele u kulibambila. Ndamushimwinina limwi shintu sheshi shoonse nishitana kucitika.”
Insana sha kwizeulu shilakazungaana, intongwezhi asho shilakawa.
Inzho Mwanaa Muntu ulakalibonya umakumbi uleza bwiza iinsana u bulemu.
Ulakatuma baanjelo kwaamba babunjike antoomwi bantu bakwe basale kuhwa kushooko shoonse shone shaano anshi.
Amwiiye ciiyo kuhwa ku mukuzu. Mitabi niitalika kushuuka, umatuhu nakanka kusonsa mulazhiba ati mainza aba afwaafwi.
Mbumbona bobo, mwakabona shintu sheshi shakanka kucitika, mulaazhiba ati ciindi caba afwaafwi.
Amuzhibaluke ati shintu sheshi shoonse shilaacitika ano anshi bantu baano mazuba kabatana kumaninina kufwa.
Izeulu iinshi shilakaloba, pele mazwi angu taakaloba.
Kamulindila, amucenjele nkaambo tamwizhi ciindi ceco nicikaashika.

Cilakaba ukoya muntu wakashiya basebezhi bakwe kwaamba baakulindila iŋanda yakwe, ciindi walo naakabweza lweendo lwa kuya kulaale. Umwi uumwi wakapewa mulimo wakucita, umulindizhi waamulyango wakamulailila ati alindile.
Ubobo amwe kamulindila, kaambo tamucizhi ciindi mukamwini iŋanda nakaashika, ambweni mangolezha, naaba akati kamashiku, naa kumancela niciba cifwumo fwumo.
Ulakaba naakaamuyana muloona akaposhoka cakutabulana.
Nciŋamba kwenu ndaambila boonse ati amulindile.”
Bakaamba ati, “Tutamukwati ciindi ce pobwe kaambo bantu balaba nibatubucila, balatulwisha.”
Inzho bamwi bakaakuliwo bakatongauka ca bukali ati, “No nkaamboonzhi ncaazonauninwa bolya aza mafwuta?
Kaayelele kuuzhiwa mali a baala amyaanda yotatwe ukwaapa bapushi.” Ubobo bakalemanina mukaintu wezo.
Pele Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Noomulece mutamupenzha, kaambo wancitila cintu cibotu.
Bapushi mulyaabo lyoonse, ulimwi mulakonzha kubayohwa kufwumbwa ciindi, pele tamuukuli ame lyoonse pe,
Mukaintu wezu wacita mbwaakonzha, woonanicila limwi mafwuta mubili wangu kwaamba ukazhikwe kabotu.
Cini cini ndamwaambila ati, kufwumbwa koko kukaakambaukwa Makani Mabotu mu luundu loonse, ceci ncaacita mukaintu wezu, cilakaba cizhibalusho cakwe.”
Inzho Judasi Shikalyote, wakaakuli umwi wa babo bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile, wakaya ku bapaizhi kwaamba amwaabe Jeso nkubabele.
Bakabotelwa cini cini nibakateelela makani aka Judasi, ulimwi bakamushomezha ati balaamupa mali. Judasi wakakanka kukapula ciindi cibotu cakwaaba Jeso.

Mu buzuba butaanzhi bwa cinkwa ciina bumena, buzuba bwakaakuyayiwa tumbelele twepobwe lya Kwiitilila, ba shiciiya bakamubuzha Jeso ati, “No nkukwi nkuuzanda kuya kulila ipobwe lya Kwiitilila, kwaamba tukakubambile?”
Jeso wakatuma ba shiciiya bakwe bobile, wabaambila ati, “Kamuya mu munzhi, mulakaswaangana u mulombwana uuzemwine intesho ya meenzhi.
Mukamucilile, kufwumbwa muŋanda mwaati akenjile, mukaambile mukamwini iŋanda ati, ‘Mwiiyi ulabuzha ati, no njiiliye iŋanda njinkaalila ipobwe lwa Kwiitilila u ba shiciiya bangu?’
Ulakamutondezha iŋanda inkando yeezeulu, indulice kale, momo mumweelele kutubambila shakulya.”
Ba shiciiya bakaya mu munzhi wezo, bakayana shoonse shili mbubona mbwakabaambila Jeso. Ngoonaawo bakabamba mulalilo we pobwe lya Kwiitilila.
Ciindi ca mangolezha, Jeso wakeza u ba shiciiya bakwe bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile.
Inzho nibakasengela shakulya, wakabashimwina ati, “Cini cini ndamushimwina ati, umwi akati kenu ulangaba, nguwena ngutulya aze.”
Ba shiciiya bakausa, ubobo bakakanka kulibuzha umwi uumwi ati, “Sa ndime, Mwami?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Nguwena ngutubwenga aze umutiba womwi akati kenu numuli ikumi ubatwesha bobile,
Nkaambo Mwanaa Muntu ulafwa mbubona mbwaalembelwe makani aakwe, pele kuli mapenzhi ku muntu wezo ukamwaaba Mwanaa Muntu, nicakabota kuti naatakazhalwa!”
Ciindi nibakaakulya, Jeso wakabweza cinkwa, amane kulumba kwa Leza wakacikomona, wabapa ba shiciiya bakwe. Waamba ati, “Amutambule mulye, wezu ngu mubili wangu.”
Wakabweza inkapu ya waini, amane kulumba kwa Leza, wakabatambika bakanwa.
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Bobu mbubulowa bwangu bwa mulongo mupiya, bwatililwa banji banji.
“Cini cini ndamwaambila ati nshikanwi linji mushinza wa mucelo wa ma oliva mpaka kubuzuba mbunkaanwa mushinza mupiya mu bwami bwa Leza.”
Nibakamana kwiimba lwiimbo bakaya ku lupili lwa masamu a oliva.
Pele ndakabushiwa ku bafwu ndakamusololela kuya ku Galilaya.”
Inzho Pita wakaingula ati, “Ume nshikakushiyi, nikuba kuti boonse bakakushiye.”
Jeso wakamushimwina Pita ati, “Cini cini ndakushimwina ati ubwasunu mashiku aza ngoona, ulantama kotatwe mukombwe katana kulila kobile.”
Pita wakashomezha cini cini ati, “Ume nikuba ku lufwu nshikakutama pe.”
Abo ba shiciiya bamwi boonse bakaamba mbubona bobo.
Nibakashika kubusena butewa ati Getisemani, Jeso wakashimwina ba shiciiya bakwe ati, “Amukale ano, ume ninciya kukomba kolya.”
Wakabweza Pita, u Jemusi u Johani, waakanka kulyeetezha ukupenga cini cini mu monzo.
Ubobo wakabashimwina ati, “Monzo wangu ulyuusile cini cini buusu bwa lufwu. Pele amushaale ano mulindile.”
Inzho wakaya lwaambele ashoonto, wafwukama anshi walomba ati caakukonzheka mapenzhi aza amwiitilile.
Wakakomba ati, Abba, Taata! Shoonse shintu shilakonzheka kwako, Ndakumbila ati cinwisho ceci cinjitilile, pele kutabi kuzanda kwangu, akube kuzanda kwako umwini.
Naakapiluka, wakayana ba shiciiya baloona, inzho wakabuzha Pita ati, “Saimoni sa uloona? Wakacilwakulindila kwa ciindi cishoonto bulyo?”
Wakabashimwina ati, “Amulindile kwaamba mutabi nimutepaulwa. Cini cini moza ulazanda, pele mubili wabula insana.”
Ulimwi wakabweela wakomba, waamba mazwi azo ngoona ngakaakwaambile lutaanzhi.
Ulimwi wakabweela ku bashiciiya wabayana baloona kaambo kabafwile tulo. Inzho bakabula ca kwaamba.
Jeso naakazhoka lweendo lwatatu, wakabaambila ati, “Muloona mwaliiba? Imbubo! Inzho amubone ciindi cashika, Mwanaa Muntu waabwa u matashi a ba shishibi.
Amuzhimuke tuukuya, amubone uzanda kungaba nguwezu washika ulyaafwaafwi.”

Jeso naakaakucaamba, wakashika Judasi wakaakuli uumwi wa bashiciiya bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile, kali iikamu lyabantu bakaakukwete maceba umisako. Yezhi ninkamu ya bapaizhi bakando, u balembi ulimwi ubakando ba cishi.
Inzho Judasi kabapele citondezho cakuti, “Nguwena wezo ngunkaashonta, ati inguwe mukamukwate mukamutole.”
Judasi mbwaakashicila bulyo, wakasuumana nkwaakubele Jeso waamba ati, “Mwiiyi.” Amane wamushonta.
Ngoonaawo bakamukwata Jeso bamwaanga.
Umwi wa babo bakaakuzhimine afwaafwi wakasomona iceba lyakwe, wakosola kutwi muzhice wa mupaizhi mukando.
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakaambila inkamu yezho ati, “Mweza kundwisha u maceba, umisako ukoya ndimuteu?
Mazuba manji manji ndakaakuli amwe muŋanda ya Leza, ndakaakumuyiisha pele mwiina nimwakankwata. Ceci cacitika kuzuzucizha maŋwalu.”
Ngoonaawo ba shiciiya boonse bakamwaala.
Umwi mukubushi wakaakulihumbile bulyo isani lituba, kaya bucilila Jeso.
Inzho nibakaakuzanda kumukwata wakabapuzhumuka, walukanka cintanda, wakashiya isani ndyaakaakusamine.
Bakamutola Jeso kuŋanda ya mupaizhi mukando, kwakaakubungene bakando babapaizhi ubakando ba cishi, ulimwi u balembi.
Pita kaya bubalya intende intende munshi lyabo, limwi wenjila mulubanza lwa ŋanda ya mupaizhi mukando. Wakakala antoomwi ubalindizhi kazota mulilo.
Bakando babapaizhi antoomwi u beendelezhi ba cikombelo, bakasoleka kwaamba bayane twaambo twakupa mulandu Jeso, pele bayina nibakatuyana.
Inzho kwakeza batumboni banji banji kumulenjelezha twaambo. Pele bakaishanya mu kwaamba kwabo.
Ngoonaawo bamwi bakazhimuka ukumulenjelela Jeso ati,
“Uswe twakamuteelela ulaamba ati, ‘Ndakeeumbulula iŋanda ya Leza yezhi yakazakwa u matashi, ulimwi mu mazuba otatwe ndakazaka iinji iitazakwa u matashi.’ ”
Abo babo bumboni bwabo bwakaishanya mbubona bulyo.
Ngoonaawo Mupaizhi mukando wakazhima kumbele lyabo boonse wamubuzha Jeso ati, “Sa wiina ca kwaamba mu twaambo totu ntubakulenjelezha?”
Pele Jeso wiina nakaingula pe. Mupaizhi mukando wakabuzha ulimwi ati, “Sa ndiwe Munanike, Mwanaa Leza Ulemekwa?”
Ngoonaawo Mupaizhi mukando wakazapaula cisani cakwe, waamba ati, “Mbumboniinzhi bunji mbutucilanjila?
Mwaliteelelela nubeni malweza aakwe aakusampaula Leza. No muzeezoonzhi ngumukwete?”
Boonse bakateelezhanya ati apewe mulandu wakufwa.
Bamwi bakakanka kumufwila mate, bamwanga cisani amenso ukumuuma balaamba ati, “Tushimwine, no nguni wakuuma?” Abo balindizhi bakamubweza ukumuuma inkumbazhi.
Inzho naakaita umwi mushimbi musebezhi wa mupaizhi mukando, Pita kali mulubanza ulishite kumanuma a bantu.
Naakamubona Pita ulazota, wakamulanjilila waamba ati, “Uwe wakaakuli u Jeso wa Nazanleta.”
Pele Pita wakatama ati, “Nshimwizhi, ulimwi nshicizhi ncuwamba.” Amane wazhimuka waya ansengwe aayela lubanza. Ngoonaawo mukombwe wakalila.
Inzho mukaintu wezo wakabona Pita, wakakanka kushimwina bakaakuzhimine afwaafwi ati, “Aze wezu kabali u Jeso.”
Pele Pita wakatama ulimwi. Nikwakaita ciindi cishoonto bakaakuzhimine afwaafwi bakashimwina Pita ati, “Cini cini uli wabo kaambo uli waku Galileya.”
Inzho wakakanka koombwezha ukupinga miya ati, “Nshimwizhi muntu wezu ngumwaamba.”
Ngoonaawo mukombwe wakakokoloka lwabili. Pita wakazhibaluka mbwakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Ulakantama kotatwe mukombwe katana kulila kobile.” Amane wakahwa, ulaya bulila.
Nibwakaca cifwumo fwumo, bapaizhi bakando antoomwi ubakando ba cishi, u balembi ubashinkuta boonse bakabuzhanya buzhanya makani. Bakamwaanga Jeso inceetani bamutola kwa Pilato.
Inzho Pilato wakamubuzha Jeso ati, “Sa ndiwe mwami waba Juda?” Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Waamba.”
Bapizhi bakando bakamutamicizha Jeso twaambo tunji tunji.
Pilato wakamubuzha ulimwi ati, “Sa twiinguli? Tuteelele twaambo tunji tunji ntubakutamicizha.”
Jeso kaliinzile bulyo, wiina niliba izwi lyomwi ndyaakakusha. Ubobo Pilato wakazhingwa cini cini.
Kufwumbwa ciindi ce pobwe lya kwiitilila, Pilato kazhibile kubakushizha mwaange womwi ngubapumpa.
Inzho kakuli muntu umwi uutewa Balabasi, wakaakwaanjilwe u beenzhiina ukaambo kabupapyu bwabo, bakayaya bantu ciindi nibaakucita manyongwe.
Inkamu ya bantu niyakabungana, bakakanka kumulomba Pilato ati abacitile ciyanza ncibacita lyoonse amwaka u mwaka ciindi ceco.
Pilato wakababuzha ati, “Sa mulazanda ati mwaangulwile mwami waba Juda?”
Ukuti kezhi ati bapaizhi bakando bakamwaaba Jeso kwakwe ukaambo kamunyono.
Pele bapaizhi bakando bakabashinikizha bantu kwaamba bamulombe Pilato ati abaangululile Balabasi, mu busena bwa Jeso.
Pilato wakabuzha ulimwi ati, “No wezu ngumwaamba ati mwami waba Juda mulazanda mucite buti?”
Bakapozomoka ati, “Naakankaminwe aciciinkano!”
Pilato wakababuzha ati, “Nkamboonzhi? No ncinzhi ncaacita?” Inzho nibakabaala ukupozomoka ati, “Naakankaminwe aciciinkano!”
Pilato mbwaakuzanda kuboshezha bantu, wakabaangulwila Balabasi. Amane kumuzupauzha Jeso, wakamwaaba kwaamba akakankaminwe aciciinkano.
Bashikalumamba bakamutola Jeso alubanza lwa ŋanda ya mweendelezhi, baketa bashikalumamba nokwabo boonse bakaakuliko.
Bakamusamika cikobelo cacilambo ca shicisu, baluka mushini wameya, bamane bamusamika ku mutwi.
Bakakanka kumusaalizha ati, “Wabonwa Mwami waba Juda.”
Ulimwi bakamuuma ku mutwi u musako, bamufwila mate, bamane bamufwukamina.
Nibakamana kumusaalizha bobo, bakamusamununa icanshi, bamane bamusamika shikobelo shakwe mwini, bamusololela kuya kukankaminwa aciciinkano.
Bamane bakamutola Jeso kubusena butewa ati, “Gologota,” ucipandulula ati busena bwa kaanza.
Ngoonaawo bakamutambika waini muhwele umululwe, pele Jeso wakakaka kumunwa.
Bakamukankamina Jeso aciciinkano, bakakanka kwaabana shakusama shakwe akati kabo, bakauma insolo kwaamba bazhibe uyelele kubweza cisani cimwi ucimwi.
Jeso nibakamukankamina aciciinkano kacili ciindi cekasaalizhi.
Mazwi aamba ncibakamuyayila akalembwa ezeulu lya mutwi wakwe ati, “Wezu ngu mwami waba Juda.”,
Ulimwi kakuli ushimwi shiciinkano shobile a kaakukankaminwe bafwumpi bobile, umwi kali kucilyo umwi kucimonsho kwa Jeso.
(Aza akacitwa kuzuzucizha cakaamba mushinshimi ati wakafwa ukoya shishibi.)
Inzho, seluka aciciinkano ulifwutule umwini.
Bapaizhi bakando u balembi bakamusaalizha Jeso, bakasabwizhanya ati, “Kafwutula bamwi, pele takonzha kulifwutula mwini.
Atuumbone Munanike wa Leza, Mwami wa Izilaili mbwaakaseluka aciciinkano, nitukamushoma.”
Abo balombwana mbakaakukankamininwe abo bakamusaalizha Jeso.
Izuba nilyakashika akalendebwe, kwakaba mushinze uushiya mbi anshi yoonse, mpaka ciindi izuba nilyakashika a cilanga nkumu.
Nikwakaita mawoola ali otatwe, Jeso wakapozomoka iizwi ikando ati, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakatani?” Ucipandulula ati, “Leza wangu, Leza wangu, wanshiilaanzhi?”
Bamwi bantu bakaakuzhimine afwaafwi, bakaamba ati, “Amuteelele, uleta Elija!”

Umwi wabo wakalukanka waya kubweza inshisa weetoba mu waini muhwele indulwe, weetunga kulusako lwesumo, walukankila kwa Jeso wamushinshika ku mulomo waamba ati, “Tulabona naa Elija uleza kumukusha aciciinkano.”
Jeso wakapozomoka amane wafwa.
Inzho umwi mukando wa bashikalumamba wakaakuzhimine afwaafwi uciciinkano naakabona Jeso mbwaakafwa, wakaamba ati, “Cini cini wezu muntu kali Mwanaa Leza.”
Baba mbubakaakucilila ukuyohwa Jeso naakaakuli mucishi ca Galilaya. Ulimwi kakuli ubamwi bakaintu mbucakeza antoomwi u Jeso ku Jelusalemu.
Jozefu waku Alimatiya naakashika, izuba kalili afwaafwi ukwibila.

Jozefu kali muntu mulemu wankamu wankuta ikando yaba Juda. Kali muntu wakaakulanjila kwiza kwa bwami bwa Leza. Nikuba kuti bobu kabuli buzuba bwakulibambila buzuba bwa Sabata, Jozefu wiina ukatiya, wakaya kuzhima kumbele lya mweendelezhi Pilato, walomba mutunta wa Jeso.
Pilato wakazoowa naakateelela ati Jeso wafwa kale. Wakoompolola shikalumamba wamubuzha ati no kwaita ciindi cilamfwu buti kuhwa naafwa.
Naakateelela mbwaakaamba shikalumamba, Pilato wakaambila Jozefu ati ulakonzha kubweza mutunta.
Jozefu wakaula cisani cituba, mwakahunga mutunta amane kuuwangula aciciinkano waya kuubika mu cuumbwe cakaakushilwe mwibwe ndibaakolola. Wakakunkulusha ibwe ikando lyakayalwa amulyango.
Maliya waku Magadala u Maliya baina Joze bakaakweebela u kubona mbwaakazhikwa Jeso.
Inzho nibwakaita buzuba bwa Sabata, Maliya waku Magadala, u Maliya baina Jemusi u Salome bakaula mafwuta aanunka kalonze kwaamba bakananike mutunta wa Jeso.
Cifwumo fwumo mu buzuba butaanzhi bwa nsunda, mbulyakapasulila bulyo izuba, bakaya ku cuumbwe.
Nibaakuya munzhila, kabaya bubuzhanya ati, “No nguni ukakatukunkulushizha ibwe ku mulyango wa cuumbwe?” Nkaambo kalili ikando cini cini.
