Inzho nibakasansula menso bakabona ati ibwe ndikunkulushe kale.
Bakenjila mu cuumbwe bayana mukubushi ulishite kucilyo, ulisamine cikobelo cituba buu, ubobo bakakankamana cini cini.
Mukubushi wezo wakabaambila ati, “Mutatiyi. Ndizhi ati mulakapula Jeso waku Nanzaleta, wezo ngubaakankamina a ciciinkano. Temo mono wabuka. Amulange ngaawa ngubaa kumoonecele.
Inzho kamuya mukabashimwine ba shiciiya bakwe antoomwi u Pita ati, ‘Wasolola kuya ku Galilaya nkumukakoombonena, mbubona mbwaakamwaambila!’ ”
Ngoonaawo bakahwa mu cuumbwe, balukanka kaambo bakatiya ukuzoowa cini cini.
Mu buzuba butaanzhi bwa nsunda cifwumo fwumo, Jeso naakabuka ku bafwu, wakataanguna kulibonya kwa Maliya waku Magadala, wezu ngumukaintu ngwaakakusha myoza mibiyabi iili ciloba.
Ngoonaawo Maliya wakaya kushimwina babo mbucaakukala aze Jeso, koko nkubakaakuungumene balalila.
Pele balo nibakateelela ati Jeso wabuka ku bafwu, ulimwi u kwaamba ati Maliya wamubona, bayina nibakaashoma makani aza.
Kuhwaawo Jeso wakalibonya mucimo ca mushobo unji ku bashiciiya bobile bakaakuya bweenda munzhila iiya kumatungu.
Abo baba bakakananina banamaleya, pele bayina nibakabashoma pe.
Munshi wakeza kulibonya ku bashiciiya bali ikumi uutwesha womwi ciindi nibakaakulya. Jeso wakabatapatila ukaambo kakuzuluzha kwabo, ukutashoma babo bakamubona kaambo kakuzuma myonzo.
Inzho wakabaambila ati, “Kamuya mu luundu loonse, mukakambauke Makani Mabotu ku bantu bamishobo yoonse.
Wezo ukaashoma u kupapatizwa, ulaafwutuka, pele wezo uutakaashomi ulakazulwa.
Shitondezho sheshi shilakalibonya ku bashomi, balakatanda myoza mibiyabi mwizhina lyangu, balakacilozha kwaamba mishobo yaandeene andeene.
Balakabweza bazoka u matashi, nibakaanwa cikola cili buti, tacikabakoli. Bakabika matashi abo abalwazhi, balakapona.”
Inzho batumwa bakaya balaya bukambauka koonse koonse, u Mwami Jeso kali abo kaya bubazumya zumya mu milimo yabo, ukuzuzukizha makani kwiita mu shitondezho.
Ku makancilo kakuli Izwi. Inzho Izwi kali antoomwi u Leza, ulimwi Izwi kali Leza.
Izwi kali u Leza ku makancilo,
shoonse shintu shakaba kwiita mwakwe, kuti naatakaakwiko nikwaaakwiin a cintu niciba comwi ciliko.
Bumi kabuli mwakwe, ulimwi bumi kooli mumuni ku bantu boonse.
Mumuni ulamunika u mushinze, pele mushinze wiina niwakazunda.
Johani wakeza kupa bumboni bwa mumuni wezu, kwaamba bantu boonse bashome kwiita mubumboni bwakwe.
Johani walo ingwe wakaakuli Mumuni, pele wakeza kupa bumboni bwa Mumuni.
Mumuni mwini mwini wezo uumunikila bantu boonse wakeza mu luundu.
Izwi kali mu luundu, ulimwi luundu lwakalengwa kwiita mwakwe, nikuba bobo bantu bayina nibakamuzhiba.
Wakeza ku bantu bakwe mwini, pele bantu bayina nibakamutambula pe.
Pele bantu babo bakamutambula u kumushoma wakabapa insana shakuba banakwe Leza.
Bayina nibakaba banakwe Leza kwiita mukuzhalwa kuhwa ku mubili, nikuba kuluzando lwa muntu, pele kunsana sha Leza.
Inzho Izwi wakaba muntu, wakazhalwa ku mubili, wakeza kukala akati kesu, ulizwile luse u lushinizho. Uswe twakabubona bulemu bwakwe, bulemu bwashimuzhalwa ice kwa Ushi.
Johani wakapa bumboni kwiita mumulumbe ngwaakakambauka ati, “Inguwe wezu ngundakaakwaamba ati, ‘Uuzhiza munshi lyangu ulambaala, nkaambo kaliko kale ume ncitana kuzhalwa!’”
Ukaambo kabube bwakwe buzulile, uswe twakatambula luse lunji lunji.
Nkaambo Leza wakapa Mulawo kwiita mwa Mozesi, pele luse u lushinizho lwakeza kwiita mwa Jeso Kilisito.
Kwiina naaba womwi wakamubona Leza. Cita Leza ice nana, walo uuli afwaafwi U ushi, nguwakatuzubululila Ushi mbwaabele.
Mbubobu bumboni mbwaakapa Johani kuba Juda, ciindi nibakatuma bapaizhi u Balevi kuhwa ku Jelusalemu, kwaamba bakamubuzhe ati, “No ndiweni?”
Walo wiina naakakaka, wakabaingula cakushomeka ati, “Indime Kilisito Munanike waka Leza!”
Bakamubuzhisha ati, “Tushimwine, no ndiweni, kwaamba tukabashimwine batutuma.”
“Kuli uuwolobwezha mulukula ati,
‘Amululamike Inzhila ya Mwami!’”
Inzho babo bantu bakatumwa kuba Falisi,
bakamubuzha ulimwi ati, “No nkaamboonzhi ulapapatiza naa tuli Kilisito, ulimwi tuli Elaija naa Mushinshimi.”
Johani wakabaingula ati, “Ume ndamupapatiza u meenzhi bulyo. Pele akati kenu ngaali ngumutezhi.
Uzhiza munshi lyangu, walo ngunteelele kuba muzhice wakwaangulula twaanzho twa mpato shakwe.”
Aza makani oonse akacitikila ku munzhi wa Betani, uuli amutala wa lweenje lwa Joodani, momo Johani mwaakaakupapatiza.
Nibwakaca Johani wakoombona Jeso uleza kwakwe, ngoonaawo wakamwaambila ati, “Amubone Mwanaa Mbelele, uukusha shibi shaluundu!
Inguwe ngundakaakwaamba ati, Uuzhiza munshi lyangu ulambaala, nkaambo kaliko kale ume ncitana kuzhalwa.
Ume lwangu cintamwizhi, pele nciceco ncindakezhila kupapatiza u meenzhi kwaamba azubululwe kuba Izilaili.”
Ulimwi Johani wakapa ubumwi bumboni bwakuti, “Ndakabona Moza Usalala uleza buseluka kuhwa kwizeulu ukoya inzhiba, weza wamukala.

Ume lwangu ncitana kumuzhiba, pele Leza wezo wakantuma kupapatiza u meenzhi wakaŋambila ati, ‘Kufwumbwa muntu nguukabona ulaselukilwa ukukalwa u Moza wa Leza, ati inguwe wezo uupapatiza u Moza Usalala.’
Inzho ume ndimwini ndakalibonena, nciceco ncimpela bumboni bwakuti, wezu ngu Mwanakwe Leza.”
Nibwakaca Johani wakaakuzhimine ulimwi u ba shiciiya bakwe bobile.
Naakamubona Jeso ulaya bweenda wakaamba ati, “Amubone nguwelya Mwanaa Mbelele wa Leza!”
Ba shiciiya babo bobile nibakaateelela azo makani bakamucilila Jeso.
Jeso naakacebuka wakababona baleza bumucilila, amane wakababuzha ati, “No mulazandaanzhi?” Bakamwiingula ati, “Labi, anu ulakala kwi?” Labi, cilapandulula ati Mwiiyi.
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Kamwiza mubone.” Kalili kale lyakumbo, bamane bakaya aze kuya kubona nkwaakaakukala. Bakalibizha koko nkukona nkaambo kalimanine kale izuba.
Umwi wa babo bobile bakamuteelela Johani naakaakwaamba kali Andulu, munina Saimoni Pita.
Ndilyona Andulu wakaya kumukapula munina Saimoni, wamwaambila ati, “Twamuyana Munanike waka Leza” leli izwi lilaamba Kilisito.
Amane wakamutola Saimoni kwa Jeso. Jeso wakamutongomwena wakaamba ati, “Ndiwe Saimoni mwanakwe Johani, pele ulaakutewa ati Kefasi.” Ceci cilaamba ati Pita naa “Mwala.”
Nibwakaca Jeso wakatelaika kuya ku Galilaya, koko nkwaakayana mulombwana uutewa ati Filipo amane wamwita ati, “Ncilila!”
Filipo kali waku Betisaida koko nkubakaakukala ba Andulu u Pita.
Filipo wakayana Natanyele, amane wakamwaambila ati, “Twamuyana muntu ngwaakalemba Mozesi mwibuka lya Mulawo. Inguwe nguulembelwe umu mabuka a bashinshimi, ngu Jeso waku Nanzaleta mwanakwe Jozefu.”
Natanyele wakabuzha ati, “Sa amo mu Nanzaleta mulakonzha kuhwa cintu cibotu?” Filipo wakamwiingula ati, “Kweza ukalibonene umwini.”
Inzho Jeso naakamubona Natanyele uleza nkwaabele, wakaamba ati, “Nguwezu muna Izilaili mwini mwini, uutacengi!”
Natanyele wakoombuzha ati, “No wanzhiba buti?” Jeso wakaingula ati, “Ndaukubwene kale niwaakushite mucinhule ca bukuzu Filipo katana ukwita.”
Ngoonaawo Natanyele wakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Mwiiyi, ndiwe Mwana Leza! Ndiwe Mwami wa Izilaili!”
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Sa washoma bobo nkaambo ndakwaambila ati ndakubona niwaakushite mucinhule ca bukuzu? Ulakabona shintu shikando kubaala ali ceci!”
Ulimwi Jeso wakaamba ati, “Cini cini ndamushimwina ati, mulakalibona izeulu liliyalukile u baanjelo baleza balaliza ukuseluka a Mwanaa Muntu.”
Nikwakaita mazuba obile kwakaba bwinga mu munzhi wa Kana mu Galilaya, u baina Jeso kaliko,
Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe kabatambilwe kubwinga bobo.
Inzho waini naakamana, baina Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Waini wamana.”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Baama, utaakunshimwina cakucita. Ciindi cangu tacina kushika pe.”
Baina Jeso wakaambila batwanga ati, “Mucite shoonse nshaakamushimwina.”
Inzho awo kakuli matalo ali cisambomwi akaakubikwa meenzhi umbona buli ciyanza caba Juda cakulisalazha. Italo lyomwi kalizula intesho shosanwe shameenzhi.
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Amwaazuzhe meenzhi aza matalo.” Bakaazuzha woonse amulomo.
Amane Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Amuteke meenzhi mwamana mwaatole kuli shikusengela.” Bakaateka ukwaatola.
Ngoonaawo bakamupa shikusengela, naakasola, wakayana ati ngu waini, pele wiina naakazhiba nkuyakahwa. Batwanga bakateka meenzhi kabeezhi makani. Amane wakamwita shibwinga,
wamwaambila ati, “Woonse muntu ulataanguna kusengela waini mubotu, abona ati batambe bakolwa, ndilelyo naasengela waini bulyo.”
Jeso wakaacita maleele aakutaanguna mu munzhi wa Kana mucishi ca Galilaya, wakatondezha insana shabulemu bwakwe, u ba shiciiya bakwe bakamushoma.
Mulubanza lwa ŋanda ya Leza wakayana bantu bamwi balauzha iŋombe, iimbelele, iinkwilimba. Bamwi kabali bashikucinca mali.
Ngoonaawo wakapesa ciswepu caloozhi, ukubatanda boonse muŋanda ya Leza, antoomwi iimbelele iiŋombe shabo. Wakatataula mali a muwaya waya ngubakaakucincanya ulimwi wakapindamuna matebulu abo.
Wakabashimwina babo bakaakuuzha inkwilimba ati, “Amushikushe! Muteeciti iŋanda ya Taata kuba cisambalilo!”
Inzho ba shiciiya bakwe baazhibaluka Malembe aamba ati, busungu bwakufuna iŋanda yako bwanzonauna.
Inzho bakando baba Juda bakeza kwakwe umubuzho wakuti, “Maleelenzhi nguukatutondezha aakatuzhibya ati ulyeelele kucita bolya?”
Ba Juda bakamwita ati, “Cakatutolela myaka iili makumi one u myaka cisambomwi kuzaka Iŋanda ya Leza yezhi, no uwe ulakonzha buti kwiizaka mu mazuba otatwe?”
Pele walo kaamba mubili wakwe naakaamba iŋanda ya Leza.
Ba shiciiya bakaazhibaluka aza makani ciindi Jeso naakabuka ku bafwu, ati anu nciceci ncaakaakwaamba. Bakaashoma Malembe oonse ukwaahumina mazwi oonse akaamba Jeso.
Jeso naakaakuli mu Jelusalemu, ciindi ce pobwe lya kwiitilila, bantu banji banji bakamushoma Jeso nibakabona shitondezho sha nsana nshaakacita.
Pele Jeso wiina naakabashoma bantu, nkaambo kabezhi bantu boonse mbubabele.
Ulimwi katazanda muntu naaba womwi kumupa bumboni bwa umwi, nkaambo walo mwini kezhi shakaakuli mu myonzo yabo.
Inzho kakuli muntu wankamu yaba Falisi izhina lyakwe kali Nikodimasi, mweendelezhi waba Juda.
Wakeza kwa Jeso mashiku u kumwaambila ati, “Mwiiyi mukando, tulizhi ati uwe uli mwiiyi uuhwa kwa Leza, nkaambo kwiina muntu ukonzha kucita shitondezho shizoosha nshuucita kuti katali u Leza.”
Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Cini cini ndakwaambila meni meni ati, muntu atazhalwa bupiya takonzha kunjila umbwami bwa Leza.”
Nikodimasi wakaamba ati, “No muntu mukando ulakonzha buti kuzhalwa lwabili? Sa ulakonzha kunjila mwifwu lyakabaina kwaamba azhalwe?”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Cini cini kuti muntu tazhalwa ku meenzhi, ulimwi uku Moza Usalala takonzha kunjila umbwami bwa Leza.
Cizhalwa ku mubili, mubili, pele Moza Usalala ulazhala moza.
Utazhingwa bobo mbundaamba ati, Ulyeele kuzhalwa bupiya.
Muuwo ulaunga kufwumbwa mbuuzanda. Ulooteelela bulyo, pele tukonzha kuzhiba nkuuhwa naa nkuuya. Ubobo tukonzha kuzhiba mbwaabele wezo uzhalwa ku Moza Usalala.”
Nikodimasi wakabuzha ati, “No ceco cintu cilaba buti?”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Inta uwe uli mwiiyi waba Izilaili, no tweezhi buti aza makani?
Ndakwaambila meni meni, uswe tulapa bumboni bwa shintu nshitwizhi ukumushimwina nshitwakabona, pele tamulibambile kubutambula bumboni bwesu.
Na mwiina nimwakashoma indakamushimwina shintu shaanshi ano, no mulakozha buti kushoma kuti ndamwaambila shintu sha kwizeulu?
Nkaambo kwiina muntu wakaya kale kwizeulu cita bulyo Mwanaa Muntu wezo wakahwa kwizeulu.”
kwaamba uukaamushoma, akayane bumi butamana.
Nkaambo mbubolya Leza mbwaakeefwunisha inshi, wakapa mwanakwe shimuzhalwa ice kwaamba kufwumbwa ukaamushoma atakafwililili, pele akayane bumi butamana.
Nkaambo Leza wiina kutuma Mwanakwe ano anshi kwaamba abeteke bantu, pele kwaamba bantu bafwutulwe kwiita mwakwe.
“Wezo umushoma tabetekwa, pele wezo utamushomi wabetekwa kale, nkaambo wiina kushoma mwizhina lya Mwanaa Leza shimuzhalwa ice.
Inzho lubeta ndulolu, mumuni wakashika anshi, pele bantu bakoozandisha mushinze nkaambo milimo yabo mibiyabi.
Kufwumbwa ucita cibi ulyuuswile mumuni ulimwi tashika kumumuni nkaambo ulatiya ati shibi shakwe shilabonwa.
Pele muntu ucita shiluleme uleza kumumuni kwaamba milimo yakwe ibonwe ati yacitwa kwiita mu kuteelela Leza.”
Kuhwaawo, Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe bakaya ku cishi ca Judiya. Wakakala koko kwa mazuba mashoonto ukupapatiza.
Johani aze wakaakupapatiza umulonga wa Enoni kumbali uku Salimu nkaambo nkukwakaakuli meenzhi manji manji. Bantu kabeza kupapatizwa.
Ceci ciindi Johani katana kubikwa muntolongo pe.
Inzho bamwi ba shiciiya baka Johani bakakanka kukazhanya umu Juda umwi ku makani akusalazha kwakanshiya nshiya kabo.

Ubobo bakaya kwa Johani baamba ati, “Mwiiyi, welya muntu ngumwakaakuli aze umutala kwiwe ku lweenje lwa Joodani, welya nguwakaakwaamba, ubwasunu nguwelya ulapapatiza, ubobo bantu banji banji balaya kwakwe.”
Johani wakaingula ati, “Kwiina muntu uukonzha kuyana cintu niciba comwi na kuti wiina kucitambula kuhwa kwa Leza uli kwizeulu.
Umwe muli bakamboni bangu, mulizhi mbundakaamba ati, ‘Indime Kilisito ndakatumwa bulyo kusololela Kilisito.’

Ciindi ca bwinga, nabwinga, uushibwinga balaakuli antoomwi. Pele mulongwaakwe shibwinga ulazhima ambali u kumuteelela. Inzho ulabotelwa cini cini ku mazwi aka shibwinga. Ubobo ame ndiinininwe cini cini.
Walo ulyeelele kubaala kulemekwa, ume ndemekwe ashoonto.”
Wezo uhwa kwizeulu uli ezeulu a bantu boonse, pele uhwa anshi ngwaanshi ulimwi ulaamba bulyo shaanshi. Wezo uhwa kwizeulu uli ezeulu abantu boonse.
Ngu kamboni wa shintu nshaakabona u kuteelela, pele kwiina ubutambula bumboni bobu.
Pele kufwumba ushoma mazwi aakwe ulazhibisha ati Leza ngwa lushinizho ku mazwi akwe.
Wezo wakatumwa kwa Leza ulaamba mazwi aka Leza, nkaambo Leza wakamupa Moza Usalala cakulitakata.
Leza Taata ulimufwinishi Mwanakwe cakuti wabika shintu shoonse munsana shakwe.
Wezo uushoma Mwana ulikwete bumi butamana, pele wezo uutashomi takayani bumi, pele ulaakuli mubukali bwa Leza.
Inzho ba Falisi bakateelela ati Jeso ulasandula ukupapatiza ba shiciiya banji banji kubaala Johani.
Nikuba ati Jeso lwakwe mwini katapapatizi, cita bulyo ba shiciiya mbubakaakupapatiza.
Inzho Jeso naakazhiba aza, wakakuhwa ku Judiya, wakabweela ku Galilaya.
Mulweendo lwakwe lolu kali shikwiita mu Samaliya.
Koko kubusena kakuli mukalo waka Jakobo. Jeso mbwaakaakukatele wakakala kumbali ku mukalo wezo. Kacili ciindi ceshikati.
Ngoonaawo wakashika mukaintu umwi Musamaliya kwiza kuteka meenzhi, amane Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Mpa meenzhi nwe.”
Ceco ciindi ba shiciiya kabaile mu munzhi kuula shakulya.
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Kuti niwaakucizhi cipo ncazanda u kupa Leza, u wezo ukukumbila meenzhi aakunwa, aze niwamukumbila naakupa meenzhi a bumi butamana.”
Mukaintu wakaamba ati, “Mwami, inta wiina ucakutesha, ulimwi wezu mukalo mulamfwu, inzho azo meenzhi a bumi butamana ulaateka buti?
Sa uwe uli mukando kubaala taata Jakobo wakatupa mukalo ngwaakaakunwa mwini ubanakwe iiŋombe shakwe?”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Boonse baanwa meenzhi aza balafwa inyota ulimwi.
Pele muntu unwa meenzhi ngumupa ume, takafwi linji inyota pe. Azo meenzhi alakaba katinti kameenzhi a bumi muli nguwe, katutuntumuka bumi butamana.”
Mukaintu wakaamba ati, “Mwami mpa azo meenzhi kwaamba intakafwi linji inyota, ulimwi intakezhiza linji kono kuteka meenzhi.”
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Koya ukamwite mulumyaako muzhize aze.”
Mukaintu wakaingula ati, “Nshitwelwe.” Ngoonaawo Jeso wakaingula ati, “Uli kabotu niwaamba ati tutwelwe,
nkaambo wakaakutwelwe kubalombwana bosanwe, u wezo uukutwele ninzho tali mulumyaako, ubobo waamba meni meni.”
Mukaintu wakaamba ati, “Mwami inzho ndazhiba ati uli mushinshimi.
Bamatata bakaakukombela mulupili lolu, pele nuba Juda mulaamba ati bantu balyeelele kukombela Muŋanda ya Leza ku Jelusalemu.”
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Mukaintu nshoma, ciindi cilakashika nimutakaamukombi Taata mulupili lolu nikuba ku Jelusalemu.”
Mulakomba ncimutezhi, pele uswe tulakomba ncitwizhi nkaambo lufwutuko lulahwa kuba Juda.
Pele ciindi cilakashika, ulimwi cashika kale, lelyo babo bamukomba calushinizho nibakaamukomba Taata mu moza u mu lushinizho. Babo imbabo mbaazanda Taata ati baakumukomba.
Leza ngu Moza, ubobo bamukomba balyeelele kumukomba mu moza u mu lushinizho.
Mukaintu wakaamba ati, “Ndizhi ati Mesiya ulakeza, uli ngu mufwutuli, akashika ulakatutondezha shintu shoonse.”
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Ume intwaamba aze ndime wezo nguuamba.”

Ngoonaawo ba shiciiya bakwe bakashika. Bakazhingwa nibakayana ati Jeso ulabandika u mukaintu. Nikuba bobo kwiina naaba womwi wakoombuzha mukaintu wezo ati, “No ulazandaanzhi?” Na kumubuzha Jeso ati, “Mwaambaanzhi uwezu?”
Inzho mukaintu wezo wakeeshiya intesho yakwe waya ku munzhi u kwaambila bantu ati,
“Amweende mukamubone muntu wanshimwina shintu shoonse nshindakacita. Sa ingwe Kilisito?”
Bantu bakooshiya munzhi baya kwa Jeso.
Ku ciindi ceco ba shiciiya bakamweenzelezha Jeso ati, “Mwiiyi lya.”
Walo wakaamba ati, “Ume ndikwete cakulya ncimutezhi.”
Ubobo ba shiciiya bakakanka kulyaambauzha mulwabo beni ati, “Sa kuli wamuletela cakulya?”
Pele Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Cakulya cangu nkucita luzando lwa Leza wakantuma, u kumaninzha mulimo wakwe.”
Inta mulaamba ati, “Kucisheele myezhi yone kwaamba tutebule.” Ndamushimwina ati amwiibone myuunda, maila abizwa kale, alalindila bulyo kutebulwa.
Mutebuzhi wahola kale kumulimo wakwe, ulabunjika micelo iitola ku bumi butamana. Kwaamba wezo wakashanga u wezo utebula batangalile antoomwi.
Kaka kashimpi kaamba ati, “Umwi mushanji, umwi mutebuzhi nkeni keni.
Amwe ndamutuma kwaamba mutebule nshimwatakalima. Ubakalima mbanji, umwe mweelya coolwe milimo yabo.”
Basamaliya banji banji mu munzhi bakamushoma Jeso nkaambo kamazwi ngakaamba mukaintu aakuti, wanshimwina shoonse nshindakacita.
Basamaliya bakamukumbila Jeso kwaamba akale abo mu munzhi, ubobo wakakala abo kwa mazuba obile.
Inzho bantu banji banji bakashoma ukaambo kamazwi ngaakabayiisha Jeso.
Bakamwaambila mukaintu ati, “Twashoma kutali ku mazwi nguwatushimwina pele ukaambo kakuti twaliteelelela tubeni, ubobo twazhiba ati wezu cini cini ngu mufwutuli waluundu.”
Naakamana mazuba obile, Jeso wakakuhwa wakaya ku Galilaya.
Jeso mwini wakapa bumboni bwakuti, kwiina mushinshimi uulemekwa mucishi ca kwabo.
Naakashika, bantu bamu Galilaya, bakamutambula kabotu, nkaambo kabaliko kwipobwe lya kwiitilila u kubona shintu shoonse nshaakacita mu Jelusalemu ciindi ce pobwe nkaambo abo kabaliko.
Naakateelela ati Jeso wakuhwa ku cishi ca Judiya weza ku Galilaya, wakeza kumukumbila ati akaponye mwanakwe ku Kapenaumi, nkaambo kazanda kufwa.
Jeso wakamwita ati, “Kwiina akati kenu uushoma cita mwabona citondezho cizhinga u maleele.”
Wezo mweendelezhi wakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Mwami kweza naatana kufwa mwanangu.”
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Koya bulyo mwanako wapona.” Wezo muntu wakaashoma mazwi akaamba Jeso wakabweela kwakwe.
Kacili munzhila, basebezhi bakwe bakamucinga bamwaambila ati, “Mwanako wapona.”
Wakababuzha ciindi ncaakaliteelela kabotu. Bakaamba ati, “Uzona ishikati niyakamuleka impeyo.”
Ngoonaawo ushi wakazhiba ati, nciciindi Jeso naakamwaambila ati mwanako wapona. Inzho lwakwe mwini wakashoma kubikilizha umbucihwa abo boonse.
Aza ngu maleele abili ngaakacita Jeso ku Kana. Wakaacitila mu Galilaya ciindi naakahwa ku Judiya.
Nicakamana ceci, Jeso wakaya ku Jelusalemu kwipobwe lyaba Juda.
Inzho mu Jelusalemu kufwaafwi ku mulyango utewa ati wambelele, kakuli kazhiba kakaakutewa ati Betisaida muci Hibulu. Kwizhiba leli kakuzakilwe twaanda tosanwe.
Momu mutwaanda kamoona balwazhi banji banji, boofwu u balema u bapuutile.

[Nkaambo kabashoma ati kakuli shiindi shimwi anjelo wa Leza naakaakwiza kunjila ukuhundaula meenzhi a mukazhiba. Ubobo kufwumbwa mulwazhi wataanguna kuliwaala mukazhiba ciindi meenzhi naahundaulwa, kapona kubulwazhi bwakwe nibuba buti.]
Mukaanda kamwi kamuli muntu waakuli mulwazhi kwa myaka iili makumi otatwe iitwesha iili lusele.
Jeso naakamubona wakazhiba ati kali mulwazhi kwa ciindi cilamfwu. Wakamubuzha ati, “Sa ulazanda kupona?”
Mulwazhi wakaingula ati, “Mwami ndiina unjizha mu meenzhi ciindi meenzhi naahundaulwa. Kufwumbwa ndazanda kunjila mwizhiba ndayana umwi wanjitila kale.”
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Zhimuka bweza macila ako uyende.”
Ndilyona wezo mulombwana wakaba kabotu. Wakazhimuka, waabweza macila akwe amane weenda.
Ceci cakacitika mu buzuba bwa Sabata,
ubobo bakando baba Juda bakamwaambila wezo muntu wakashilikwa ati, “Ubwasunu mbuzuba bwa Sabata tweelele kubweza macila ako pe.”
Walo wakabaingula ati, “Wezo wamponya wandailila ati, ‘Bweza macila ako uyende!’”
Balo bakamubuzha ati, “Anu nguni wezo wakwaambila ati, ‘Bweza macila ako uyende?’”
Inzho wezo muntu katezhi ati wamuponya nguni, nkaambo Jeso wakanjila mubantu banji banji bakaakuli kubusena bobo.
Kwiite bulyo ciindi cishoonto Jeso wamuyana wezo muntu muŋanda ya Leza, wakamushimwina ati, “Teelela, bona nizho wapona, utaciti linji cibi kwaamba utakashikilwa mapenzhi aanji mabiyabi a baala.”
Ngoonaawo wezo muntu wakaya kubaambila bakando baba Juda ati ngu Jeso wakamuponya.
Ubobo ba Juda bakatalika kumupenzha Jeso kaambo kamaleele aza akacitwa mu buzuba bwa Sabata.
Pele Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Taata ulasebeza lyoonse, ubobo ame ndyeelele kusebeza umbona mbwaasebeza.”
Aza makani akeensha kubapa ba Juda inzhila shakumuyaya Jeso. Bakaamba ati wasotoka mulawo wa buzuba bwa Sabata, ukulyaamba ati ushi ngu Leza. Calo caamba ati ulalibika mucimo ca Leza.

Jeso wakabashimwina ati, “Cini cini ndamwaambila ati, Mwana takonzha kulicitila cintu mwini ice pe. Ulakonzha bulyo kucita milimo njaabona kwa Ushi, nkaambo yoonse milimo njaacita Ushi aze Mwana njaacita.
Nkaambo Ushi ulimufwini Mwana, ubobo ulamutondezha shoonse shintu nshaacita. Ulimwi ucimutondezha milimo mikando iibaala njakaacita kwaamba mukazhingwe.
Nkaambo mbubona Ushi mbwaabusha bafwu u kubapa bumi, aze Mwana ulapa bumi kufwumbwa muntu ngwaazanda.
Ushi tabeteki muntu pe, wabika Mwana kwaamba ababeteke boonse.
Kwaamba boonse bakamulemeke Mwana umbona mbubamulemeka Ushi. Woonse muntu utamulemeka Mwana, ati u Ushi wakamutuma, tamulemeka.
“Ndamushimwina meni meni ati, woonse uuteelela mazwi angu u kumushoma wezo wakantuma, ulikwete bumi butamana. Ubobo takabetekwa, nkaambo wayokolwa mu lufwu, wanjizhiwa mu bumi.
Cini cini ndamushimwina ati ciindi cilyaafwaafwi kushika, ulimwi cashika kale, lelyo bafwu nibakaaliteelela izwi lya Mwana Leza. U babo bakaliteelela u kushoma balakaba u bumi.
Nkaambo umbona Ushi mbwaali makancilo a bumi, aze Mwanakwe wakamucita kwaamba abe makancilo a bumi.
Mwanakwe wakamupa insana shakubeteka bantu nkaambo ngu Mwanaa Muntu.
Mutazhingwa kuli ceci, nkaambo cilakashika ciindi boonse bali mu shuumbwe nibakaaliteelela izwi lyakwe,
bamana balakabuka ku bafwu. Inzho babo bakacita kabotu balakabucila bumi butamana babo bakacita shibi balakabukila balakapewa mulandu wa lufwu.”

“Kwiina ncinkonzha kucita munsana shangu ndimwini, ndabeteka kwiingainya umbwaanshimwina Taata, ubobo lubeta lwangu luliluleme. Nshiciti luzando lwangu ndimwini, ndacita bulyo luzando lwa wezo wakantuma.
“Kuti ndakanka kulipandulula ndimwini, ati bumboni bwangu tabuzulile.
Ngaali umwi uumpandulula, ulimwi ndizhi ati bumboni mbwaapandulula mbwa cini cini.
Wakatuma bantu kwa Johani, wakabapa bumboni bwa cini cini.
Nshaamba ati ndazanda bumboni buhwa ku bantu pe, aza makani ndaamba bulyo kwaamba mufwutulwe.
Johani kali ukoya ilambe lizaka ukumweka, umwe mwakabotelwa kukala u mumuni wakwe kwa kaindi kashoonto.

Bumboni mbwinkwete mbukando kubaala bobo mbwaakapa Johani. Amwiibone yezhi milimo njincita, njiyezho njaakampa Taata kwaamba njicite. Injiyo njiimpandulula u kupa bumboni bwakwaamba Taata nguwakantuma.
Taata wakantuma wakapa bumboni bumpandulula. Mwiina nimwakaliteelela izwi lyakwe niciba ciindi comwi pe, aco ciwa cakwe tamunacibwene.
Awo mazwi aka Taata teemo muli umwe, nkaambo toomushomi wezo ngwaakatuma.
Mulaabalisha Malembe nkaambo mulatelaika ati mumuyanwa bumi butamana. Inta kayi ngaamupa bumboni bwangu.
Mwamana mulakaka kwiza kwangu kwaamba muyane bumi butamana.
“Ume nshikapula bulemu buhwa ku bantu.
Pele ndimwizhi mbumubele. Ndizhi ati umwe tamumufwini Leza.
Ume ndakeza mwizhina lyaka Taata, mwamana tamuntambuli. Pele kuti umwi weza mwizhina lyakwe mwini mulamutambula.
Mulatambula bulemu buhwa kubeenzhinokwenu, tamutambuli bulemu buhwa kwa Leza. No mulakonzha buti kunshoma?
Mutatelaici ati ume ndime inkaamupa mulandu kwa Taata. Nguwena wezo Mozesi ngumushoma nguukamupa mulandu
Kuti nimwakamushoma Mozesi ame nimwanshoma, nkaambo Mozesi wakampandulula mu Malembe aakwe.
Pele kuti na tamwaashomi Malembe aka Mozesi, no mulaashoma buti mazwi angu?”
Inzho Jeso wakaya umutala umwi wezhiba lya Galilaya, lelyo litewa ati lwaatele lwa Tibeliyasi.
Bantu banji banji bakamucilila nkaambo bakabona shitondezho sha nsana nshaakaponya balwazhi.
Jeso wakaya alupili awo ngaakaya kukala u ba shiciiya bakwe.
Inzho ipobwe lya kwiitilila lyaba Juda kalili afwaafwi.
Inzho Jeso naakasansula menso wakabona inkamu inkando ya bantu ileza kwakwe, amane wakoombuzha Filipo ati, “Anu tulakashuula kwi shakulya kwaamba baba boonse bantu balye?”
Naabuzha bobo kamusunka bulyo Filipo kwaamba ateelele mbwaakaaingula nkaambo mwini walo kacizhi kale cakucita.
Filipo wakaingula ati, “Nitukaula shinkwa sha mali a siliva ali myaanda yobile tabazulili bantu boonse nikuba kusola kapanzha kashoonto bulyo.”
Ngoonaawo umwi shiciiya uutewa ati Andulu munina Saimoni Pita wakaamba ati,
“Kuli mweembezhi uukwete tunkwa tosanwe twaapangwa kubufwu bwa bale iiswi shobile. Pele tashibazulili baba bantu boonse.”
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Noombakalike bantu.” Abusena bobo kakuli bwizu bunji bunji. Inzho bakakala anshi, mweelwe wabalombwana kooli shuulu shosanwe, kutabala bakaintu u bana.
Jeso wakashibweza shesho shinkwa, amane kulumba wakapa babo bakaakushite. Umbona bobo wakabapa iinswi. Inzho boonse bakekuta.
Bamane kulya, Jeso wakabalailila ba shiciiya bakwe kwaamba babwezelele bufwefwelenga bwashinkwa boonse bwakashaala nibakaakulya bantu kwaamba kubule cilyo cizonauka.
Ubobo bakabubwezelele bufwefwelenga bwashinkwa shosanwe bwakashaala ukuzuzha intundu shili ikumi iintundu shobile.
Bantu nibakacibona ncaakacita Jeso bakaamba ati, “Ncobeni wezu inguwe mushinshimi ulangilwa kwiza anshi.”
Jeso wakazhiba ati bantu balazanda kumubika a bwami ubobo ulimwi wakaya kukala ku lupili ice.
Kumangolezha ba shiciiya baka Jeso bakaselemuka baya kwizhiba,
koko bakanjila mu bwato kwaamba balanduke kuya umutala umwi wezhiba, kuya u Kapenaumi, kwakashiya Jeso katana kwiza nkubakaakubele.
Kwakaba mankutisha mwizhiba nkaambo kwakaba ikunku.
Ba shiciiya nibakashika bwato makilomita ali osanwe na cisambomwi, bakabona Jeso uleza nkubakaakubele ezeulu ameenzhi, ceco cakabatizha cini cini.
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Ndime mutatiyi.”
Ubobo bakamuhuminya kunjila mu bwato, ndilyona bwakashoka kumuuma nkubakaakuya.

Nibwakaca inkamu yakakusheele umutala umwi wezhiba, yakazhiba ati kakuli bulyo bwato bomwi bwakasebezha ba shiciiya kulanduka kuya umutala umwi. Ulimwi bakabona ati Jeso wiina naakanjila mu bwato u ba shiciiya bakwe bakamushiya bakaya beni.
Inzho amwi mato akahwa ku Tibeliyasi, akashika ku mulando wakaakuli afwaafwi u busena ngubakalila shinkwa bantu, Mwami Jeso naakamaninzha kulumba Leza.
Inzho bantu nibakabona ati Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe tabewo abusena bobo, bakanjila mu twato baya ku Kapenaumi kukapula Jeso.
Nibakamuyana Jeso umutala umwi bakamubuzha ati, “Mwiiyi no washika liliye kono?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “cini cini mwiina kunkapula ati nkaambo mwakalamwa shitondezho shangu, pele nkaambo kakuti mwakalya ukukuta.
Inzho mutaakusebezela shilyo shimana bulyo, pele amusebezele shilyo shikalilila kushicila ku bumi butamana. Sheshi nshishilyo Mwanaa Muntu nshaakaamupa. Nkaambo Leza Taata wakamubika cikanto.”
Inzho abo bakamubuzha ati, “No tucite buti kwaamba tusebeze milimo yaka Leza?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Leza ncaazanda kwaamba ati mumushome wezo ngwaakatuma.”
Ulimwi bakamubuzha ati, “No ulacita citondezho nzhi ncitukabona kwaamba tukushome? No mulimo nzhi nguukacita?
Ba shaakale bakalya mana mulukula, umbona mbukulembelwe ati, Wakabapa cilyo cihwa kwizeulu kwaamba balye!”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Ncobeni ndamwaambila meni meni tali Mozesi wakabapa cilyo cihwa kwizeulu, pele Taata nguupa cilyo cini cini cihwa kwizeulu.
Cilyo cihwa kwizeulu nguwezo uuhwa kwizeulu, nkaambo nguupa bumi ku bantu banshi yoonse mbwiibelele.”
Bakamwiingula ati, “Mwami kuhwa bwasunu kutupa cinkwa ceci lyoonse.”
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Ndime cinkwa cipa bumi. Kufwumbwa muntu uzhiza kwangu takafwi linji inzala, aze wezo uushoma mwangu takafwi linji inyota pe.
Pele umbona mundamwaambila kale ati, nikuba ati mulimbwene, tamunshomi pe.
Pele boonse babo mbaakampa Taata baleza kwangu, ulimwi kufwumbwa uuzhiza kwangu nshimutandi pe,
nkaambo ume ndiina kwiza ano anshi kuhwa kwizeulu kwiza kucita luzando lwangu ndimwini pe. Ndakezhila kucita shizanda wezo wakantuma.
Inzho wezo wakantuma ulazanda ati intazhimininwa naaba womwi wa babo mbaakampa, pele nkababushe mu buzuba bwamamanino.
Nkaambo lolu nduluzando lwa Taata, kwaamba oonse wabona Mwana u kumushoma ayane bumi butamana. Ulimwi ume ndakababusha mu buzuba bwamamanino.”
Bateelele bobo bakando baba Juda bakakanka kutongauka nkaambo wakaamba ati, “Ndime cinkwa cakahwa kwizeulu.”
Bakaamba ati, “Sa wezu tali Jeso mwanakwe Jozefu? Ushi u baina tulibezhi. No ncinzhi cimwaambya ati wakahwa kwizeulu?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Mutatongauci pe.
Kwiina ukonzha kwiza kwangu atamuswenya afwaafwi Taata wakantuma. Kwaamba ume nkamubushe mu buzuba bwamamanino.
Bashinshimi bakalemba ati, ‘Boonse ulakabayiisha Leza.’ Ubobo kufwumbwa wakayiya u kucilila mazwi aka Taata uleza kwangu.
Ceci tacaamba ati kuli muntu wakamubona Taata pe, cita bulyo ume indakahwa kwa Leza, ndime indakamubona.
Cini cini ndamwaambila ati kufwumbwa uunshoma ulikwete bumi butamana.
Ndime cinkwa cipa bumi.
Bamaushenu bakalya mana mulukula pele nikuba bobo bakafwa.
Inzho nciceci cinkwa cakahwa kwizeulu, kufwumbwa muntu uucilya takafwi.
Ndime cinkwa ca bumi cakahwa kwizeulu. Kuti muntu wacilya ceci ulaakupona shikwense uushikwense. Cinkwa ceco ncinkaamupa mubili wangu ngunkaapa, kwaamba bantu banshi yoonse bakayane bumi.”
Ngoonaawo bakando baba Juda bakakanka kukazhanya mulwabo beni ati, “Anu wezu muntu ulatupa buti mubili wakwe kwaamba tulye?”
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Cini cini ndamushimwina ati, kuti tamuuli mubili wa Mwanaa Muntu u kunwa bulowa bwakwe, mwiina bumi.
Woonse uulya mubili wangu u kunwa bulowa bwangu ulikwete bumi butamana, ulimwi ndakamubusha mu buzuba bwakumamanino.
Nkaambo mubili wangu nkukulya kwini kwini abo bulowa bwangu nkukunwa kwini kwini.
Wezo uulya mubili wangu u kunwa bulowa bwangu ulishite mwangu, ame ndishite mwakwe.
Taata wakantuma mbwaali mumi ame ndimumi ukaambo kakwe. Ubobo wezo uulya mubili wanngu ulakakwata bumi ukaambo kangu.
Ceci ncicinkwa cakahwa kwizeulu, tacili ukoya ceco ncibakalya bamaushenu pele nikuba bobo bakafwa. Kufwumbwa muntu uucilya ceci cinkwa ulaakuli mumi lyoonse.”
Aza makani Jeso wakaamba naakaakuyiisha mucikombelo caba Juda ku Kapenaumi.
Ba shiciiya banji banji nibakaateelela aza makani bakaamba ati, “Aza makani makando. Anu nguni uukonzha kwaateelela?”
Cakutashimwinwa Jeso naakazhiba ati bakaakutongauka ukaambo ka makani aza, wakabaambila ati, “Sa aza makani amupezha?
No cilaba buti, kuti mwamubona Mwanaa Muntu waliza wabweela nkwaakaakubele?
Moza Usalala nguupa bumi butamana. Mubili tokonzha kukwata bumi kwaakwiina moza. Mazwi ngumwaambila Moza ulimwi mbumi.
Pele ngubali bamwi bantu batashomi.” Jeso kabezhi kuhwa ku makancilo babo batakaakumushoma ulimwi u wezo uuti akamwaabe.
Ulimwi wakaamba ati, “Nciceci ncindamushimwinina ati kwiina ukonzha kwiza kwangu cita wahumizhiwa kwa Taata.”
Kuhwaawo, ba shiciiya bakwe banji banji bakapiluka bacileka kumucilila.
Inzho Jeso wakababuzha babo bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile ati, “Sa amwe mulazanda kunshiya?”
Uninzho twashoma u kuzhiba ati ndiwe Usalala wakahwa kwa Leza.”
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Ndime indakamusala umwe numuli ikumi ubatwesha bobile pele umwi wenu ngu Shaatani.”
Wakaakwaamba Judasi mwanakwe Saimoni Shikaliyoti, nikuba ati kali wankamu yabo bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile, inguwe wakaakuya kumwaaba.
Nishakamana shesi shintu, Jeso wakaya mu minzhi ya Galilaya. Wiina naakazanda kushika mucishi ca Judiya nkaambo kakuti bakando baba Juda kabazanda kumuyaya.
Inzho ciindi ce pobwe lyaba Juda lya matente nicakaswena afwaafwi,
banina bakamwaambila ati, “Kacili cibotu ati niwakuhwa kono uye ku Judiya kwaamba ba shiciiya bakeebone milimo yezhi yansana njuucita.
Nkaambo muntu uuliseseka u kucita mulimo wakwe kumabali takonzha ukwata impuwo pe. Ncibotu kucita milimo yako kaanzambwene kwaamba bantu ba mu luundu beebone.”
Banina bakaamba bobo nikuba ati abo kabatamushomi.
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Ciindi cangu tacina kushika cakuya koko, pele umwe cenu nkucili lyoonse.
Bantu baanshi tabamusuli, pele ume balinswile nkaambo ndapa bumboni bwa milimo yabo mibiyabi.
Kamuya nubeni koko kwipobwe ume nshiyi pe, nkaambo ciindi cangu cakuya kwipobwe leli tacina kushika.”
Naakamana kwaamba bobo wakashaala mu Galilaya.
Nibakaya banina, munshi aze Jeso wakaya, pele wiina kweenda kaanzambwene wakaliseseka.
Koko kwipobwe bakando baba Juda bakamukapula, bakabuzha ati, “No ulikwi?”
Ubobo bantu kabakazhanya ku makani aakwe. Bamwi kabaamba ati, “Muntu uuli kabotu.” Pele bamwi kabaamba ati, “Pe pe ulacenga, ulabasowa bantu.”
Nkaambo kakutiya bakando baba Juda kwiina wakaakwaamba makani aza kaanzambwene.
Ipobwe nilyakashika akati, Jeso wakanjila muŋanda ya Leza ukutalika kuyiisha.
Ba Juda bakazhingwa cini cini u kwaamba ati, “Anu wezu muntu uutayiile ukuba Wakashizhiba buti sheshi shintu shoonse?”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Kuyiisha koku takuli kwangu pe, kulahwa kwa Taata wakantuma.
Kufwumbwa muntu uuzanda kucita shizanda Leza, wezo nguukonzha kuzhiba kuyiisha kwangu naa kulahwa kwa Leza, naa nkwangu ndimwini.
Nkaambo muntu uuwamba munsana shakwe mwini, ulazanda bulemu bwakwe mwini. Pele wezo uuzanda bulemu bwa wezo wakamutuma ulashomeka ulimwi kwiina lucengo mwakwe.
Inta Mozesi wakamupa Mulawo? Nikuba bobo kwiina uwomwi wenu uyicilila. Munkanzilaanzhi kunjaya?”
Inkamu ya bantu yakaamba ati, “Wasondoka uwe. Nguni uuzanda ukuyaya?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Ndakacita mulimo wansana sha Leza womwi, mumane noonse mwakazhingwa.
Mozesi wakamupa ciyanza cakupalula [nikuba ati ceci ciyanza kacitali cakwe ncabamatata bakale kale.] Mulapalula muntu mu buzuba bwa kulyoocezha butewa ati Sabata.
Na mulapalula muntu mu buzuba bwa Sabata kwaamba Mulawo waka Mozesi utasotokwa, no nkaamboonzhi mulandemanina ukaambo kukuponya muntu mu Buzuba bwa Sabata?
Amubeteke cakutalanga kumenso. Mubeteke cabululami.”
Inzho bamwi bantu bakahwa ku Jelusalemu bakakanka kubuzha ati, “Sa wezu ingwe ngubakanza kuyaya?
Inta nguwezu ulakanana kaanzambwene kwiina uncibaamba. Nkukuti abo beendelezhi balizhi ati wezu muntu inguwe Kilisito mwini mwini.
Pele uswe tulikwizhi nkwaahwa wezu muntu, Kilisito akazhiza kwiina muntu ukaazhiba nkwaakahwa.”
Jeso naakaakuciyiisha muŋanda ya Leza wakapozomoka ati, “Sa cini cini mulinzhi ume unkundakahwa? Ndiina kwiza munsana shangu ndimwini pe. Wezo wakantuma ulashomeka, pele umwe toomwizhi.
Ume ndimwizhi nkaambo ndakahwa kwakwe, nguwakantuma.”
Ubobo bantu bakaakuzanda kumukwata pele kwiina naaba womwi wakalozha nkaambo ciindi cakuti akwatwe kacitana kushika.
Bantu banji banji kuhwa munkamu bakamushoma bakaamba ati, “Sa wezo Kilisito uuzhiza ulakacita shitondezho shibaala ali sheshi nshaacita wezu muntu?”
Ba Falisi bakaateelela manhwiinhwi abantu aza aaka Jeso, ubobo bapaizhi bakando bakatuma balindizhi ba Muŋanda ya Leza kwaamba bakamwaange Jeso.
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Tulaakucili amwe ciindi cishoonto bulyo nintana kuya kuli wezo wakantuma.
Ku ciindi ceco mulakankapula pele tamukanjani, nkaambo koko nkunkaaya tamukashikako.”
Ngoonaawo bakando baba Juda bakakanka kubuzhanya ati, “Anu wezu ulazanda kuya kwi nkututakonzha kumuyana? Sa ulazanda kuya kuminzhi yaba Giliki kukala bantu besu kwaamba akayiishe ba Giliki?
Ulaamba ati, ‘Mulakankapula, pele tamukanjani!’ No kwaamba ati, ‘Koko kunja tamukashikako,’ cilaambaanzhi?”
Ulimwi Malembe alaamba ati, mulonga wameenzhi aapa bumi ulakakunka kuhwa ku monzo wakwe.”
Mu kwaamba bobo kaamba Moza Usalala ngubakaatambula babo bamushoma. Nkaambo ku ciindi ceco Moza Usalala katana kupewa nkaambo Jeso katana kunjila mu bulemu bwakwe.
Bamwi bantu kuhwa munkamu, nibakaateelela aza makani bakaamba ati, “Wezu muntu Mushinshimi mwini mwini!”
Bamwi bakaamba ati, “Wezu muntu ngu munanike wa Leza.” Pele abo bamwi bakaakubuzha ati, “Sa Mesiya ulyeelele kuhwa mu Galilaya?
Sa Malembe taamba ati Kilisito ngwa luhubo lwaka Devidi, ulimwi ati ulakahwa ku Betelehemu mu munzhi mwakaakukala mwami Devidi?”
Ubobo munkamu yezho kwakaba kwaandaana ukaambo ka Jeso.
Bamwi bakaakuzanda kumukwata pele bakakacilwa kucita bobo.
Inzho balindizhi bakapiluka, bapaizhi bakando u ba Falisi bakababuzha nibakashika ati, “No mwabulayi kumuleta?”
Bakaingula ati, “Uswe tatunoombwene muntu waamba bolya!”
Ba Falisi bakababuzha ati, “Sa inzho amwe wamucenga?
Sa kuli bamwi beendelezhi nibaba ba Falisi bamushoma?
Kwiina pe cita bulyo inkamu ya bantu balimbushi bateezhi milawo yaka Mozesi ubobo Leza ulakabashinganya!”
“Sa mulawo wesu ulatuhuminya kupa mulandu muntu uutana kubetekwa kaambo kakwe, kwaamba cibonwe ncaakacita?”
Balo bakamwiingula ati, “Sa aze uli waku Galilaya? Kabale mu Malembe ulakayana ati kwiina naaba womwi mushinshimi uhwa mu Galilaya.”
Ngoonaawo bakaandaana umwi waya kwakwe.
Kuhwaawo Jeso wakaya ku lupili lwa masamu a Oliva.
Ubobo cifwumo-fwumo wakapiluka waya kunjila muŋanda ya Leza. Wakakala wakakanka kuyiisha bantu boonse.
Ngoonaawo balembi u ba Falisi bakamuletela mukaintu umwi wakakwatwa bumambe bakamuhimika akati.
Bamane bakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Mwiiyi, wezu mukaintu wakwatwa bumambe.
Inzho u mulawo waka Mozesi ulatulailila kubauma mabwe bakaintu bali bolya. No uwe ulaamba buti kukaambo kaka?”
Kabaamba bobo kwaamba bamuyanine ngawo mulandu. Pele Jeso wakakotama bulyo wakanka kulemba anshi umunwe.
Bakatolelela kumubuzha mibuzho yezho, wakakotamuka wabaambila ati, “Kufwumbwa uuyina cibi akati kenu awa ataangune kufwusa ibwe a mukaintu wezu.”
Amane wakakotama ulimwi wakakanka kulemba anshi.
Nibakateelela bobo, bakakanka kusomauka womwi womwi balaya buya kuhwa kubakando mpaka limwi kwaya kushaala mukaintu wezo ice awo.
Jeso naakakotamuka wakamubuzha wezo mukaintu ati, “Mukaintu, no balikwi? Sa kwiina uwashaala uukupa mulandu wa lufwu?”
Wezo mukaintu wakaingula ati, “Kwiina Mwami.” Ngoonaawo Jeso wakamwaambila ati. “Ame nshikupi mulandu pe. Koya utakabisha linji.”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Nikuba ati ndalipandulula ndimwini, bumboni bwangu bulishinizhe, kaambo ume ndikwizhi nkundakahwa unkunja. Pele umwe tamukwizhi nkundakahwa unkunja.
Umwe mulabeteka buntu kumubili, pele ume nshibeteki muntu naaba womwi pe.
Nikuba ati ndabeteka, kubeteka kwangu kuliluleme kaambo nshili ice pe. Taata wakantuma ngutubeteka aze.
Kayi inta mu Milawo yenu kulilembelwe ati bumboni bwa bantu bobile bulishinizhe.
Ee ume ndalipandulula ndimwini, pele aze Taata wakantuma ulampandulula.”
Bakamubuzha ati, “Anu Uso wezo ulikwi?” Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Umbona mbumutenzhi ume aze Taata tamukonzha kumuzhiba pe. Kuti nimwaakwinzhi ume, u Taata aze nimwaakumwizhi.”
Aza makani Jeso wakaambila muŋanda ya Leza kumbali u busena bwakutambulila mulumbo, pele kwiina wakacilozha kumukwata kaambo ciindi cakwe kacitana kushika.
Ulimwi Jeso wakaamba ati “Ume ndaya. Nikuba ati mukankapule, mulakafwa bulyo mu shibi shenu. Koko nkwinja tamukonzha kushika.”
Bakando baba Juda bakakanka kubuzhanya buzhanya ati, “Ulaamba ati tatukonzha kushika nkwaaya, sa ulazanda kuliyaya?”
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Umwe muli baanshi ano, ume ndakahwa kwizeulu. Muli baanshi pele ume nshili waanshi ano.”
Nciceco ncindakamwitela ati mulakafwila mu shibi. Na tamushomi ati, “Ume Ndime Wezo, cini cini mulakafwila mu shibi.”
Balo bakamubuzha ati, “Anu ndiweni?” Jeso wakaingula ati, “Ncicona ncindamushimwina ku makancilo.
Ndikwete makani manji-manji akwaamba, ulimwi aakumubeteka. Wezo wakantuma ulashomeka, ubobo oonse makani ngundakateelela kwakwe ingawo ngaazo ngumpandulula ano anshi.”
Bayina kuzhiba ati Jeso wakakwaamba makani aka Ushi.
Ubobo Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Mwakamusumpula Mwanaa Muntu nimukaazhiba ati ‘Ume Ndime Wezo,’ ulimwi nshilicitili ndimwini cintu, pele ndaamba makani mbuli mbwakanjiisha Taata.
Wezo wakantuma tuli aze, nshili ice pe, kaambo lyoonse ndacita shintu shimubotela walo.”
Banji banji bakamuteelela naakaakwaamba aza makani bakamushoma.
Inzho Jeso wakabashimwina ba Juda babo bakamushoma ati, “Kuti mwaabamba mazwi angu, mulaba ba shiciiya bangu beni beni.
Ubobo mulakaazhiba meni meni, awo meni meni alakamulubula.”
Bamwi bakaingula ati, “Uswe tuli banakwe Abulahamu, twiina nitwakaakuli bazhice ba muntu mbutwakabela. Ulatwita buti ati tulakalubulwa?”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Ndamwaambila meni meni, kufwumbwa ucita cibi muzhice waco.
Muzhice tali wa mukwashi lyoonse pe, cita mwana wa muŋanda.
Ubobo kuti Mwana wamulubula, ati mwalubulwa cini cini.
Ndizhi ati muli banakwe Abulahamu, pele mwamana mulazanda kunjaya, kaambo kakuti mazwi angu taakala mushamba shenu.
Ndaamba shintu nshindakabona kwa Taata, pele umwe mulacita shintu nshakaamwaambila uswenu.”
Balo bakaingula ati, “Taata ngu Abulahamu.” Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Nimwaakuli banakwe Abulahamu nimwaakucita milimo njaakaakucita walo.
Pele inzho mulakanza kunjaya ume nimwaambila makani meni meni ngundakateelela kwa Leza. Abulahamu kataciti shili bobo pe.
Umwe mulacita milimo ya uswenu.”
Bakamwaambila ati, “Tatuli bana bakazhalilwa umbumambe, tulikwete taata womwi bulyo, walo uuli ngu Leza.”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Kuti Leza naa kuli ngu Uswenu sa nimwaakuzanda kunjaya, kayi inta ume ndakahwa kwa Leza. Ndiina kulizhila lwangu ndimwini pe, Leza nguwakantuma.
No nkaamboonzhi tamuteeleli nshiŋamba? Nkaambo tamuzanda kuteelela mazwi angu.

Umwe muli banakwe ushenu Shaatani, u luzando lwenu nkucita nshaazanda ushenu. Walo lyoonse muyazhi, ulimwi mubeshi kuhwa ku makancilo. Tazanda lushinizho kaambo mwakwe mwiina lushinizho. Walo kuti wakanana shabubeshi ati wacita shimweelele, kaambo mubeshi, ulimwi nguushabo babeshi boonse.
Ume ndamushimwina meni meni pele tamunshomi pe.
Nguni akati kenu uukonzha kunjanina cibi? Naa ndaamba meni meni kaamboonzhi tamunshomi?
Woonse muntu waka Leza ulateelela mazwi a Leza. Pele umwe ukaambo kakuti tamuhwi kwa Leza ncimutaateeleli mazwi a Leza.”
Inzho bakando baba Juda bakaamba ati, “Anu twaakwaambile kabotu nitwaamba ati ‘uli mu Samaliya ulimwi ulinjililwe moza mubiyabi.’”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Nshinjililwe moza mubiyabi pe. Pele tamundemeka, Taata ngumutaleka.
Nshikapula bulemu bwangu ndimwini. Nkwaali uumpa bulemu, wezo uukaamubeteka.
Cini cini ndamwaambila ati kufwumbwa muntu uubamba mazwi aangu takafwi pe.”

Inzho ba Juda bakamwaambila ati, “Inzho twazhiba ati ulinjililwe moza mubiyabi, nkaambo Abulahamu wakafwa, abo bashinshimi bakafwa umbona bobo, pele uwe ulaamba ati, kuti muntu kabamba mazwi ako takafwi.
Sa uwe uli mukando kubaala taata Abulahamu wakafwa? Naa bashinshimi? Anu uwe walibona buni?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Na kuti ndalitembaula ndimwini, ati bulemu bwangu mbwabulyo. Pele nkwaali uumpa bulemu ngu Taata wezo umwe ngumwaamba ati Leza wenu.
Wezo umwe ngumutana kuzhiba pe, pele ume ndimwizhi. Kuti ndaamba ati nshimwizhi ati ndaba mubeshi ukoya umwe. Ume ndimwizhi cini cini ulimwi mazwi akwe ndaabamba.
Uswenu Abulahamu wakatangala kubona kwaamba ulakakubona kwiza kwangu. Wakakubona, ubobo wakabotelwa cini cini.”
Balo ba Juda bakamwita ati, “Uwe uutana ukukwata myaka iili makumi osanwe, wakamubonena kwi Abulahamu?”
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Ndamwaambila meni meni, katana kuzhalwa Abulahamu ume ndakaakuliko kale.”
Bateelele bobo bakabweza mabwe kwaamba bamuume pele wakazuba wamuhwa muŋanda ya Leza.
Jeso naakaakuya bweenda wakabona muntu wakazhalwa moofwu.
Ba shiciiya bakwe bakamubuzha ati, “Mwiiyi, no nguni wakacita cibi cakapa ati wezu muntu azhalwe moofwu, mbazhali bakwe na ncakwe mwini?”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Tacili cibi cabo bakamuazhala naa cakwe mwini pele nkuti Leza atondezhe milimo yakwe kwiita mu muntu wezu.
Nicicili ciindi ca muunza tulyeelele kusebeza milimo yakwe wezo wakantuma, nkaambo mashiku a Leza lelyo muntu naatakonzha kusebeza pe.
Nincili anshi, ndimumuni wanshi!”
Amane kwaamba bobo, wakafwila mate anshi, wakakanda bulongo umate azo amane wamunanika kumenso wezo moofwu,
amane wakamulailila moofwu ati, “Koya ukasambe mukazhiba ka Silowamu.” Ceci cilaamba ati, kutumwa. Ngoonaawo wakaya wasamba. Naakapiluka wakeza ulabona.
Inzho banamuzhaabo u babo bakaakumubona ulalomba bakaamba ati, “Sa wezu ingwe welya wakaakuyanwa ulishite ulalombelela?”
Bamwi bakahumina ati, “Inguwe,” pele bamwi bakakazha ati, “Ingwe balakozhana bulyo.” Walo mwini wakaingula ati, “Ndime.”
Bakamubuzha ati, “No bwasunu wabona buti?”
Wakabaingula ati, “Muntu uutewa ati Jeso nguwakanda bulongo amane wananika kumenso ukundailila ati, ‘Koya kukazhiba ka Silowamu ukasambe.’ Mane ndaya ukusamba ngoonaawo ndabona.”
Bakamubuzha ati, “No ulikwi ninzho?” Walo wakaingula ati, “Nshimubwene nkwaapama.”
Bakamutola kuba Falisi wezo muntu wakaakuli moofwu.
Kamuli mu buzuba bwa kulyoocezha butewa ati Sabata lelyo Jeso naakakanda bulongo ukumubonya.
Ba Falisi bakamubuzha ulimwi, “Anu wakubonya buti?” Walo wakabaingula ati, “Wanamba bulongo kumenso, mane ndaya kusamba ngoonaawo ndacikonzha kubona.”
Bamwi ba Falisi bakaamba ati, “Wezu muntu tahwi kwa Leza pe, nkaambo tabamba buzuba bwa Sabata.”
Pele bamwi bakaamba ati, “Sa muntu shishibi ulakonzha kucita shitondezho shili bolya?” Ubobo bakaandaana mulwabo.
Ku mamanino bakamubuzha ulimwi wezo mulombwana wakaakuli moofwu ati, “No uwe ulatelaika buti umuntu wezu?” Walo wakaingula ati, “Mushinshimi.”
Ba Falisi bayina kushoma ati wezu muntu kali moofwu ulimwi ukuti wakabonyewa, ubobo baketa bakwabo
ukubabuzha ati, “Sa wezu ngu mwana ngumwaamba ati wakazhalwa moofwu? No inzho wabona buti?”
Bakwabo bakaingula ati, “Tulizhi ati wezu mwanesu, ulimwi wakazhalwa moofwu,
pele tatwizhi mbwaacilozha kubona, u wezo wamuponya tatumwizhi. Noomubuzhe mwini, ulamushimwina nkaambo wezu muntu mukando!”
Bakwabo bakaamba bobo kaambo kabatiya bakando baba Juda, babo bakakuhumizhenye kale ati kufwumbwa uukamwaamba ati Jeso ngu Munanike wa Leza ulatandwa mucikombelo caba Juda.
Nciceco bakwabo ncibakaambila ati, “Noomubuzhe mwini, nkaambo mukando.”
Ulimwi bakamwita lwabili wezo muntu wakazhalwa moofwu, bakamwita ati, “Shomezha kwa Leza kwaamba ulaamba meni meni, nkaambo uswe tulizhi ati wezu muntu wakubonya ngushishibi.”
Walo wakaingula ati, “Naa wezo muntu ngushishibi ume shizhi, pele comwi cintu ncinzhi ncakuti ndaakuli moofwu pele inzho ndabona.”
Bakamubuzha ati, “No wakucita buti? Wakubonya buti?”
Wakabaingula ati, “Ndamushimwina kale, pele mwiina kunteelela. No mucizandilaanzhi kwaateelela ulimwi? Sa amwe mulazanda kuba ba shiciiya bakwe?”
Inzho bakamutuka ukumwita ati, “Uwe ndiwe shiciiya wakwe, uswe tuli ba shiciiya baka Mozesi.
Tulizhi ati Leza kabandika u Mozesi, pele wezo muntu tatumwizhi unkwaakahwa pe.”
Wezo mulombwana wakabaingula ati, “Ceci cilazhinga cini cini! Toomwizhi unkwaakahwa, pele ume wambonya.
Tulizhi ati Leza tabatabi ba shishibi, ulataba bulyo wezo muntu uumutiya u kucita nshaazanda.
Kuhwa kumalengelo anshi takunateelelwe muntu naaba womwi wakabonya muntu wakazhalwa moofwu.
Kuti wezo muntu naataakuhwa kwa Leza naatakacikonzha pe.”
Balo bakamwita ati, “Sa uwe ulakonzha kutuyiisha uwakazhalilwa mu shibi?” Ngoonaawo bakamutonkaika ukumutandila ansengwe.
Jeso wakateelela ati ba Juda bamutandila ansengwe muntu wakaakuli moofwu, naakamuyana wakamubuzha ati, “Sa ulashoma mu Mwanaa Muntu?”
Walo wakaingula ati, “Nguni Mwanaa Muntu Mwami, nshimwina kwaamba mushome.”
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Ulimubwene nkaambo ngumwaamba aze.”
Wakaamba ati, “Ndashoma Mwami.” Ngoonaawo wakamufwukamina Jeso.
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Nkaambo kubeteka nkundakezhila, kwaamba boofwu babone abo babo babona boofwaale.”
Bamwi ba Falisi bakaakuli afwaafwi bakaateelela makani aza ngaakaamba bakamubuzha Jeso ati, “Sa aswe tuli boofwu?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Kuti nimwaakuli boofwu nimwaakwiina mulandu pe, pele inzho mbumulyaamba ati, ‘Mulabona,’ ceci cilaamba ati mucikwete cibi.”
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Cini cini ndamwaambila ati, kufwumbwa wezo uutanjilili ku mulyango wa caanda ca mbelele, pele ulaliza u kunjila munzhila iimwi, wezo mutewu ulimwi mufwumpi.
Wezo unjilila ku mulyango ngu mweembezhi wambelele.
Mulindizhi waamulyango ulamuyalulila, imbelele shilaliteelela izwi lyakwe. Ulashoompolola mazhina ukushisololela kuya ansengwe.
Amana kushikusha ulashisololela, asho shilamucilila nkaambo imbelele shililizhi izwi lyakwe.
Mweenzu tashimucilila, shilamutiya, nkaambo tasheezhi mazwi a beenzu.”
Jeso wakabaambila cikozhano ceci pele bayina ukaciteelela ncicaamba.
Inzho ulimwi Jeso wakaamba ati, “Cini cini ndime mulyango wambelele.
Boonse bakantaangunina kushika mbafwumpi ulimwi mbatewu, pele imbelele shiina nishakabateelela.
Ndime mulyango kufwumbwa uunjila kwiita mwangu ulafwutulwa. Ulaakunjila ukuhwa ansengwe amana ulaakuyana macelelo.
Mutewu ulezhila bulyo kwiba, u kuyaya ukuzonauna, pele ume ndakezhila kwaamba bantu mbape bumi, abo bumi buzulile.
“Ndi mweembezhi mubotu. Mweembezhi mubotu ulilibambile kwaabila imbelele bumi bwakwe.
Musebezhi uhola mali, uutali ngumukamwini imbelele, abona umpe weza kuluma imbelele, ulalukanka washishiya imbelele, ubobo umpe ulashiluma shamana shimwi shilamwaala.
Ulalukanka nkaambo musebezhi bulyo. Wiina makani iimbelele.
Ume ndi mweembezhi mubotu. Ndishizhi imbelele shangu asho shilinzhi.
Imbelele shangu asho shilinzhi umbona Taata mbweenzhi, ame ndimwizhi Taata. Ulimwi ndilibambile kupa imbelele bumi bwangu.
Ndikwete ushimwi imbelele shitali mu caanda ceci. Asho ndakashileta, shilakaliteelela izwi lyangu, ubobo bulakaba butanga bomwi, umweembezhi womwi.
“Taata ulimfwini nkaambo ndaaba bumi bwangu, kwaamba ulimwi nkabutambule.
Kwiina muntu uukaananga bumi bwangu pe, pele ndakabwaaba ndimwini. Ndikwete insana shakubwaaba ukubutambula ndimwini. Aza ngu malailile ngundakapewa kwa Taata.”
Kwakaba kwaandaana akati kaba Juda ulimwi ukaambo kamazwi aza.
Bunji bwabo bakaamba ati, “Wezu muntu ulinjililwe moza mubiyabi, wasondoka. Ngwaanzhi ngumuteelela?”
Pele bamwi bakaamba ati, “Muntu uunjililwe moza mubiyabi takonzha kwaamba bolya. Sa moza mubiyabi ulakonzha kubonya muntu moofwu?”
Inzho cakashika ciindi ce pobwe lya kusalazha iŋanda ya Leza ku Jelusalemu, muciindi camweto.
Jeso wakaakweendeenda muŋanda ya Leza, mu busena bwaakutewa ati Iluze lyaka Solomoni.
Bakando baba Juda bakamubunganina ukumubuzha ati, “Anu ulakalizubulula liliye antangalala kwaamba tutazuluzha linji mu myonzo? Tushimwine naa ndiwe Kilisito?”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Ndakamushimwina kale, pele tamushomi. Yezhi milimo njincita mwizhina lya Taata njiipa bumboni.
Pele umwe tamushomi kaambo tamuli imbelele shangu.
Imbelele shangu shilaliteelela izwi lyangu ame ndishizhi, asho shilancilila.
Ume ndashipa bumi butamana. Tashikafwi, ulimwi kwiina muntu uukonzha kunanga pe.
Nkaambo Taata ncaakampa ncikando kubaala shoonse, ubobo kwiina uukonzha kucikusha mwitashi lyakwe.
Ume u Taata tuli muntu womwi.”
Ba Juda bakabweza mabwe kwaamba bamuume.
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Ndakamutondezha milimo mibotu minji-minji iihwa kwa Taata. No nguuliye akati ka milimo mibotu yezhi ngumuzanda kungumina mabwe?”
Ba Juda bakamwiingula ati, “Tatukuumini milimo mibotu pe, pele kaambo kakuti ulasampaula Leza. Uwe uli muntu bulyo, wamana ulalibika kuba ukoya Leza.”
Na Leza wakabeta ati mbuba leza babo bantu bakaakukananinwa mazwi akwe. Malembe alishinizhe lyoonse.
Sa mulakonzha kumwaamba wezo Taata ngwakasalazha ukumutuma anshi ati ulasampaula Leza, ukaambo kakuti ndaamba ati Leza ngu Taata?
Naa nshiciti milimo njaazanda Taata kwaamba njicite, mutanshomi.
Pele kuti naa ndeecita, nimutanshomi ume yalo bulyo milimo nimweeshoma kwaamba mukonzhe kuzhiba u kuteelelesha, ati Taata uli mulyuume, ame ndili mwa Taata.”
Ulimwi bakasoleka kumukwata, pele wakabapuzhumuka.
Ubobo bantu banji-banji bakeza kwakwe, bakaamba ati, “Johani wiina naakacita citondezho ca nsana, pele shoonse nshaakaamba sha muntu wezu nshini-shini.”
Koko bantu banji-banji bakamushoma Jeso.
Wezu Maliya inguwe wakananika Mwami Jeso mafwuta, ukumupukuta ku maulu umasusu akwe. Inzho Lazalo munina nguwaakuli mulwazhi.
Ubobo baba banina bakaintu bobile bakatuma mulumbe wakuti, “Mwami mulongwaako mulwazhi.”
Jeso naakaateelela aza makani wakaamba ati, “Bobu bulwazhi tabuli bwa lufwu pe. Mbwakuleta bulemu kwa Leza, kwaamba Mwanaa Leza akalemekwe ukaambo kabulwazhi bobu.”
Jeso kabafwini ba Maliya u Malita u munyokwabo Lazalo.
Pele nikuba ati wakatambula mulumbe wakuti Lazalo mulwazhi, wakaakucishite koko kubusena kwa mazuba obile.
Naakamana aza mazuba wakabaambila ba shiciiya ati, “Atubweele ku cishi ca Judiya ulimwi.”
Ba shiciiya bakamwaambila ati, “Mwiiyi inta kayi ndinizho-ninzho awa ba Juda nibakaakuzanda ukuuma mabwe, saa ulazanda kubweela nkukona ulimwi?”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Inta buzuba bulikwete mawoola ali ikumi u mawoola obile? Muntu uuyenda muunza talifwumpuli kaambo uleenda mu mumuni waanshi ano.
Pele wezo weenda mashiku ulalifwumpula nkaambo wiina mumuni.”
Amane kwaamba bobo wakabaambila ba shiciiya bakwe ati, “Lazalo mulongweesu uloona, inzho ndaya nkamubushe.”
Ba shiciiya bakamwita ati, “Mwami, naa uloona ulateelela kabotu.”
Jeso wakaakwaamba koona kwa lufwu, pele balo kabatelaika ati nkoona kwatulo.
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakabashimwina ati, “Lazalo mufwu,
pele ukaambo kenu ndabotelwa kwaamba ume nciteko naakafwa ubobo mulakashoma. Atweende.”
Ngoonaawo Tomasi, Didimasi cipandulula ati ngwa maanga, wakabaambila bashiciiyanina ati, “Atweende aswe tukafwe aze.”
Ciindi Jeso naakashika wakayana Lazalo uli kale mu cuumbwe kuliitile umazuba one.
Betani katali kulaale uku Jelusalemu, kooli mushinzo uulampa makilomita otatwe.
Nciceco ba Juda banji-banji bakeza kwililwe lya Lazalo kwiza kulizha banina ba Maliya u Malita.
Malita naakateelela ati Jeso washika wakaya kumutambula, Maliya kashite muŋanda.
Ngoonaawo Malita wakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Mwami, kuti niwakaakuliko mukwesu naatakafwa,
pele nikuba bobo ndizhi ati kufwumbwa nciwakumbila kwa Leza ulakupa.”
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Munyoko ulabuka.”
Malita wakaingula ati, “Ndizhi kwaamba ati ulakabuka ulimwi kububuke bwa bafwu, mu buzuba bwamamanino.”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Ndime kubuka ku bafwu u bumi. Wezo unshoma, nikuba ati wafwa ulakabuka ulimwi.
Boonse bapona u kushoma mwangu, tabakafwi. Sa ulashoma bobo?”
Malita wakaingula ati, “Ee ndashoma bobo Mwami ati ndiwe Kilisito Mwanakwe Leza, wezo uuzhiza anshi ano.”
Naakamana kwaamba bobo Malita wakaya ukwita Maliya mucece wakwe, wamuhwiila kumabali ati, “Mwiiyi nkwaali washika, ulakwita.”
Naakateelela bobo Maliya wakazhimuka calubilo kuya nkwaakaakubele Jeso.
Nkaambo lelyo Jeso katana kushika amunzhi, kacili kunze lya munzhi koko nkwaakamuswaanganya Malita.
Inzho ba Juda bakaakumulizha Maliya muŋanda bakamucilila nibakabona ati wazhimuka calubilo nkaambo bakazunga ati ulaya kulila ku cuumbwe.
Inzho Maliya wakashika koko nkwakaakubele Jeso, mbwaakamubonena bulyo wakalikankata kumatende akwe wamwaambila ati, “Mwami kuti niwakaakuliko, mukwesu naatakafwa pe.”
Jeso naakabona Maliya u ba Juda balalila, wakapenga cini cini mu monzo u kweetezhewa.
Wakabuzha ati, “No nkukwi nkumwakamuzhika?” Bakaingula ati, “Mwami kweza ubone.”
Jeso wakalila.
Ubobo ba Juda bakaamba ati, “Amubone mbwaakumufwini!”
Bamwi bakaamba ati, “Wezu muntu wakamubonya moofwu sa katalozha kukwabilila Lazalo kwaamba atafwi?”
Inzho Jeso u mapenzhi manji manji mu monzo, wakaya ku cuumbwe. Inzho cuumbwe kacili cikolole mwibwe ulimwi kaanshinkilwe ibwe ikando.
Amane wakabaambila ati, “Amulikushe ibwe.”
Malita munina mufwu wakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Mwami, ceno ciindi ulanunka, nkaambo inzho kuliitile mazuba one kuhwa naakazhikwa.”
Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Inta kayi ndakushimwina kale ati, kuti wanshoma ulabubona bulemu bwa Leza.”
Ubobo bakalikusha ibwe. Ngoonaawo Jeso wakalyaalala kwizeulu waamba ati, “Taata, ndakulumba nkaambo wanteelela.
Ee ndizhi ati lyoonse ulanteelela, pele ndaamba bobo ukaambo ka bantu baba bali ano kwaamba bashome ati ndiwe uwakantuma.”
Naakamana kwaamba bobo wakapozomoka iizwi ikando walailila Lazalo ati, “Hwa!”
Ubobo wezo wakaakuli mufwu wakahwa uliputaililwe ku maulu ukumatashi shisani shiputailwa bafwu, ukumutwi kaputaililwe cisani. Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Amumuzambulule ayende.”
Ba Juda banji banji bakamushindikila ku cuumbwe Maliya mucece waka Lazalo, bakamushoma Jeso nibakabona ncaakacita.
Pele bamwi akati kabo bakaya u kwaambila ba Falisi ncaakacita Jeso.
Ubobo bapaizhi bakando u ba Falisi bakabunjika inkuta inkando u kwaamba ati, “Anu tucite buti? Nkaambo wezu muntu wacita shitondezho sha nsana shinji-shinji!
Kuti tumuleke kwaamba aakuciya bucita bolya, boonse bantu balakanka kumushoma, kwamana ati ba Loma baleza kubuzonauna bobu busena busalala antoomwi umushobo wesu woonse.”
Inzho umwi wabo uutewa ati Kayafa, wakaakuli ngu mupaizhi mukando kumwaka wezo, wakabaambila ati, “Sa mwiina maanu umwe!
Tamwizhi ati ncibotu kwaamba muntu womwi abafwile banamaleya kubaala ati mushobo woonse uzonaunwe?”
Ceci ncaakaamba kacitali cakwe mwini pe, pele mbwaakaakuli ngu mupaizhi mukando kumwaka wezo wakashinshima makani aakuti Jeso ulyeelele kufwila bantu boonse,
ulimwi kutali bulyo mushobo wezo ice, pele kwaamba akobolole ukubunjika antoomwi boonse banakwe bamweele inshi yoonse.
Ubobo kuhwa mu buzuba bobo bakakanza kumuyaya Jeso.
Ukaambo kako Jeso wiina naakeenda linji kaanzambwene mu Judiya, pele wakaya kubusena buli kumbali ulukula, ku munzhi wa Efulemu. Koko nkwaakakala u ba shiciiya bakwe.
Ipobwe lya Kwiitilila lyaba Juda kalili afwaafwi, ubobo bantu banji-banji bahwa mu minzhi yaandeene andeene bakaakulibeelezha kuya ku Jelusalemu kwaamba bakalisalazhe kwiingaina uciyanza caba Juda.
Bantu bakaakumukapula Jeso koko, kababuzhanya-buzhanya nibakaakweendeenda muŋanda ya Leza ati, “Sa mulatelaika ati tashika kwipobwe leli?”
Abo bapaizhi bakando u ba Falisi bakapa malailile aakuti kufwumbwa muntu uukwizhi nkwaabele abazhibye kwaamba bamukwate.
Nikwakashaala mazuba ali cisambomwi kalitana kushika Ipobwe lya Kwiitilila, Jeso wakashika mu munzhi wa Betani mwakaakukala Lazalo wezo ngwaakabusha ku bafwu.
Inzho bakamwiikila ukumusenjelela cilalilo cakumusekelela, Malita nguwakaakusengela. Lazalo kali uumwi wa babo bakaakulya u Jeso.

Maliya wakabweza impawo yamafwuta a dula, akaakununka kalonze nkaambo akapangwa iinsende yabwema bubotu. Amane wakananika shituta shaka Jeso ukushishoba umasusu aakwe. Ubobo muŋanda mwakezula bwema bubotu bwamafwuta azo.
Ngoonaawo Judasi shikaliyoti umwi wa bashiciiya baka Jeso, wezo nguwena wakaakuli shikumwaaba wakaamba ati,
“Nkaamboonzhi aza mafwuta ncaatauzhiwa myaanda yotatwe yamali, amana azo mali naapewa bapushi?”
Nakaamba bobo kootali muzeezo wakuyohwa bapushi, pele nkaambo kakuti kali mutewu, mbwaakaakuli ngumuzobozhi wankomo, keba mali amwi ukuliyohwa mwini munzhila shakwe.
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Mulece bulyo wezo mukaintu. Aza mafwuta wakaula kulibambila kuzhikwa kwa mubili wangu.
Bapushi mulaakuli abo lyoonse, pele ume tatuukuli amwe lyoonse.”
Inzho ba Juda banji-banji nibakazhiba ati Jeso uli ku Betani, bakaya koko, kabatayi kubona bulyo Jeso pele u kubona Lazalo wezo ngwaakabusha ku bafwu.
Ubobo bapaizhi bakando bakakanka kukanza kuyaya Lazalo,
nkaambo kakuti ba Juda banji-banji nibakamubona bakakanka kushikaka injiisho shabo u kushoma Jeso.
Nibwakaca inkamu inkando ya bantu bakaakuzhile kwi Pobwe lya Kwiitilila yakateelela ati Mwami Jeso uleza ku Jelusalemu.
Ubobo bakatema malala u kuya kumucinga balaya bupozomoka ati,
“Naatembulwe Leza!
Ulilonjelwe wezo uuzhiza mwizhina lya Mwami Leza,
Leza amulonjezhe Mwami wa Izilaili!”
Inzho Jeso bakamuletelela mwana wa mbongolo amane waliza, umbona mbukulembelwe ati,
Mu munzhi wa Ziyoni,
nguwezo Mwami wako uleza bwiza,
ulilizile mwana wa mbongolo.”

Lutaanzhi ba shiciiya bakwe bayina nibakaateelelesha aza makani kushikila buzuba Jeso mbwaakabushiwa mu bulemu. Ndilelyo nibakazhibaluka ati makani aza akakulembelwe kaakanana sha Jeso ulimwi shesho shintu shakamucitikila kale Jeso.
Bantu banji-banji mbucakaakuli abo naakamoompolola Lazalo mu cuumbwe ukumubusha ku bafwu bakaba bakamboni ba shintu shesho ulimwi bakatolele kuta bushaamba.
Nciceco ncibakaila kumucinga nkaambo bakateelela ati nguwakacita citondezho ceco ca nsana.
Ubobo ba Falisi bakaamba ati, “Kwiina ncitukacita! Amubone bantu mucishi coonse bamucilila!”
Inzho kakuli ba Giliki bamwi bakaakwiile kukomba kwipobwe lelyo.
Baba bakeza kwa Filipo uuhwa mu munzhi wa Betisaida mucishi ca Galilaya bamwita ati, “Twalomba tulazanda kubona Mwami Jeso.”
Ngoonaawo Filipo wakamushimwina Andulu aza makani, bamane bakaya antoomwi kwa Jeso.
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Cashika ciindi cakuti Mwanaa Muntu alemekwe.
Cini cini ndamwaambila ati, kuti insece ya maila yatashangwa mwihu kwaamba ifwe, lyoonse ilaakuli insece yomwi bulyo. Pele kuti yashangwa mwihu, ilakazhala insece shinji-shinji.
Wezo uufwini bumi bwakwe ulakabusowekelwa, pele uutabufwini bumi bwakwe ano anshi ulakayana bumi butamana.
Kufwumbwa muntu uunsebezela, ulyeelele kuncilila, kwaamba koko nkumbele aze mutwanga wangu akabe ko. Kufwumbwa muntu uunsebezela ulaakulemekwa kwa Taata.”
“Akaka monzo wangu wapenga cini cini. Anu ŋambe acani? Sa ŋambe ati, ‘Taata nhuna kumapenzhi a ceno ciindi’? Pe pe, koku kupenga nkundakezhila.
Taata, Leta bulemu kwizhina lyako.” Ngoonaawo kwizeulu kwakateelelwa izwi lyaamba ati, “Ndaleta kale bulemu, ulimwi ncileta bulemu.”
Bantu banji-banji bakaakuzhimine awo bakaliteelela lelyo Izwi, bakaamba ati, “Yalila inhula.” Pele bamwi bakaamba ati, “Anjelo nguwaakukanana kwakwe.”
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Leli Izwi lyateelelwa ukaambo kenu, kutali kangu.
Inzho lubeta lwaanshi lwashika, inzho muleli waanshi ano ukalatandwa.
Inzho ciindi ume ndakasumpulwa kuhwa anshi, ndakakwela boonse bantu kwangu.”
Jeso wakaamba aza mazwi kutondezha lufwu lwakwe lwamapenzhi mbulukaaba.
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Mumuni ulaakucili amwe kwa kaindi kali mbukabele. Kamweenda mumuni nuuciliko kwaamba mushinze utamweenzha, nkaambo muntu weenda mu mushinze takuboni nkwaaya.
Inzho nimucikwete mumuni amuushome, kwaamba mube bantu ba mumuni.” Amane kwaamba bobo Jeso wakaahwa wabazuba.
Nikuba ati Jeso wakacita shitondezho shinji-shinji kaanzambwene, bayina nibakamushoma pe.
Ceci cakaba bobo kwaamba ati azuzucizhiwe makani akaamba Aizaya mushinshimi ati,
“Mwami anu mbubani
bakakooshoma mulumbe wesu,
ulimwi mbubani bakaashibona
insana shako inkando?”
Ubobo bayina kumushoma Jeso umbona mbwakaamba Aizaya ati,
ulimwi weezumya myonzo yabo,
cakuti tabakonzha kubona u menso abo,
nikuba kuzhiba mu myonzo yabo,
ukusandukila kwakwe
kwaamba abaponye.”
Aizaya wakaamba aza mazwi nkaambo wakabubona bulemu bwaka Jeso ukubupandulula.
Pele nikuba bobo ba Juda u beendelezhi banji banji bakamushoma Jeso. Pele bayina kulwaamba lushomo lwabo kaanzambwene ukaambo kakutiya ba Falisi ati balabatanda mucikombelo caba Juda.
Baba bakando, kabazanda kutembaulwa ku bantu kubaala kutembaulwa kwa Leza.
Ngoonaawo Jeso wakapozomoka ati, “Wezo unshoma tashomi ume bulyo, pele ulamushoma u wezo wakantuma.
Ulimwi kufwumbwa wambona, ati wamubona u wezo wakantuma.
Ndakeza anshi kwaamba mbe mumuni wanshi, kwaamba kufwumbwa wezo ukaanshoma atakakala mu mushinze.
Kufwumbwa uteelela mazwi angu amana taabamba, nshimupi mulandu pe, nkaambo ndiina kwiza kubeteka inshi, pele ndakezhila kwiifwutula.
Babo bankaka ukutaatambula malailile aangu, balikwete uubabeteka. Mazwi ngundakaamba ngaakaamuzula kubuzuba bwamamanino.
Nkaambo nshaamba mazwi a munsana shangu ndimwini, pele Taata wakantuma nguwampa mulawo wakwaamba mazwi ngunjelele kwaamba.
Ubobo, ndizhi ati milawo yakwe ilapa bumi butamana. Shoonse nshiŋamba ndashaamba mbuli mbundakalaililwa kwa Taata.”

Kakusheele buzuba bomwi kalitana kushika ipobwe lya kwiitilila, Jeso wakazhiba ati ciindi cakwe cakwaahwa anshi ano kuya kwa Ushi caba afwaafwi. Mbwaakaakubafwini bantu bakwe baanshi ano, kabafwuni cini cini kushicila ku mamanino.
Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe nibakaakulya mulalilo, Shaatani koonjizhizhe kale muzeezo wakumwaaba Jeso kuba shinkondonina mu monzo waka Judasi Shikaliyoti mwanakwe Saimoni.
Jeso mbwaakaakwizhi ati Ushi wakamupa insana shoonse, kezhi ati wakahwa kwa Leza ulimwi ulakabweela kwa Leza.
Wakazhimuka awo ngubakaa kulya mulalilo amane wasamununa cikobelo cakwe amane walyaanga mucibuno cisani cakulipukusha.
Amane wakabika meenzhi mu mutiba wakusambila amane wakakanka kubasanzha ba shiciiya kumatende uku bapukuta u cisani cakupukusha meenzhi ncaakaakulyaangile mucibuno.
Inzho naakashika ali Saimoni Pita, Pita wakaamba ati, “Mwami sa ndiwe uuyelele kusanzha matende angu?”
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Inzho tucizhi ncincita, pele kwaita ciindi ulakacizhiba ukuciteelela ncicaamba.”
Pele Pita wakaamba ati, “Pe pe ume utansanzha!” Jeso wakaamba ati, “Kuti intakusanzha ati tucili linji shiciiya wangu.”
Ateelele bobo Pita wakaamba ati, “Caakuli bobo Mwami utansanzha bulyo kumatende pele unsanzhe kumatashi ukumutwi.”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Muntu wasamba kale ulasalala, teelele kusamba ulimwi cita bulyo kumatende? Umwe noonse mulasalala cita bulyo muntu womwi.”
Jeso kamwizhi kale shikumwaaba ncakaambila ati umwe noonse mulasalala cita bulyo muntu womwi.
Mulenta ati, ‘Mwiiyi’ na ‘Mwami.’ Muli kabotu nimwaamba bobo nkaambo mbucibele.
Inzho mwabona ume ndi Mwiiyi u Mwami wenu ndamusanzha kumatende enu, amwe mulyeelele kwaamba muukusanzhanya kumatende.
Ume ndamupa citondezho, ubobo mulyeelele kwaamba amwe muukucita umbona.
Cini cini ndamwaambila, muzhice tali mukando kubaala shimatwangaakwe, aze mutumwa tali mukando kubaala wezo wakamutuma.
Kuti naa mulishizhi sheshi, mulilonjelwe kuti kamushicita.
Ndamushimwinina limwi aza makani kwaamba akacitika mukashome ati Ume Ndime Wezo.
Cini cini ndamwaambila ati kufwumbwa watambula wezo ngundatuma ati wantambula ame, wezo uutantambula ati wiina kumutambula u wezo wakantuma.”
Naakamana kwaamba aza makani, Jeso wakapenga cini cini mu monzo, ubobo wabaambila kaanzambwene ati, “cini cini ndamushimwina ati, umwi wenu awa ulangaba.”
Inzho ba shiciiya bakatalika kulangana kumenso cakuzhingwa u kutazhiba ngwaakaakwaamba.
Umwi wa bashiciiya bakwe, wezo ngwaakaakufwini, kazeeme kwa Jeso.
Ubobo Pita wakamuhwiila ati, “Mubuzhe naa nguni ngwaamba.”
Wezo shiciiya wakaakuzeeme kwa Jeso wakamubuzha ati, “Mwami, no nguni nguamba?”
Jeso wakaingula ati, “Nguwezo ngunkataanguna kupa cinkwa.” Amane kubwenga cinkwa ncakakomona wakapa Judasi mwanakwe Saimoni Shikaliyoti.
Mbwaakapelwa bulyo Shaatani wakamunjila. Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Fwambaana cicite ncuuzanda kucita.”
Beenzhiina bakaakulya aze kwiina wakacizhiba ncaakaamwitela bobo Jeso.
Bamwi bakatelaika ati Judasi mbwaakaakuli ngumuzobozhi wankomo yamali, ambweni Jeso wakaakumwaambila ati akaule shintu shepobwe, naa ati akape shimwi shintu kubapushi.
Inzho mbwaakatambulila bulyo cinkwa, Judasi wakazhimuka wahwa ansengwe. Ceco ciindi kaali mashiku.
Judasi naakaya, Jeso wakaamba ati, “Inzho bulemu bwa Mwanaa Muntu bulaya buzubululwa, ulimwi kwiita mwakwe, bulemu bwa Leza bulaya buzubululwa.
Na kuti bulemu bwa Leza bwazubululwa kwiita mu Mwana, nkukuti aze Leza mwini ulakabuzubulula bulemu bwa Mwanaa Muntu aciindi ncicona.
Banangu, ndaakuli amwe kwa ciindi cishoonto bulyo. Mulakankapula, pele umbona mbundakabaambila ba Juda, amwe ndamushimwina ati, ‘Koko nkunja tamukonzha kushika pe.’
Ndamupa mulawo mupiya wakuti, amufwunane umbona mbumufwini, amwe mufwunane umwi uumwi,
Mwacita bobo, bantu balakamuzhiba ati muli ba shiciiya bangu.”
Saimoni Pita wakamubuzha ati, “Anu ulaya kwi Mwami?” Jeso wakaingula ati, “Koko nkwinja tamukonzha kuncilila ninzho, pele mulakancilila kwaita ciindi.”
Pita wakabuzha ati, “Mwami no nkaamboonzhi ncintakonzha u kucilila ninzho? Ume ndakonzha kwaaba bumi bwangu ukaambo kako.”

Jeso wakaingula ati, “Sa ulatelaika ati ulakonzha kwaaba bumi bwako ukaambo kangu? Cini cini ndakushimwina ati, uwe bwasunu mashiku aza ngoona katana kulila mukombwe ulaakuntamine kale shiindi shotatwe.”
“Myonzo yenu itapengi. Amushome mwa Leza, ulimwi amunshome ame.
Muŋanda ya Taata muli masena manji manji, nikwataakuli bobo indatamwaambila ati ndaya kumubambila masena.
Ndakamana kumubambila masena, ndakazhoka ulimwi nkamutole koko nkumbele, kwaamba amwe mukabe nkuko.
Muliizhi inzhila iiya koko nkwinja.”
Tomasi wakaamba ati, “Mwami tatukwizhi nkuuya, no tuleezhiba buti inzhila?”
Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Ndime iinzhila, ndime lushinizho ulimwi ndime bumi. Kwiina muntu uuzhiza kwa Taata cita kwiitila mulyuume.
Kuti nimwaakwinzhi kabotu, aze Taata nimwaakumwizhi. Pele kuhwa ninzho mwamuzhiba ulimwi mulimubwene.”
Filipo wakaamba ati, “Mwami tutondezho Uso kwaamba tushome.”
Jeso wakamwita ati, “Calampa ciindi ncitwakala amwe Filipo, uninzho tamuna kunzhiba? Kufwumbwa wambona ati u Taata wamubona. No ulaamba buti ati, ‘Tutondezhe Uso’?
Sa tushomi ati ume ndili mwa Taata aze Taata uli mulyuume? Mazwi ngumwaambila taali angu ndimwini, ngaka Taata wezo upona ukusebeza milimo kwiita mulyuume.
Amushome kwaamba ndili mwa Taata aze Taata uli mulyuume, naa pe, amushome ukaambo ka milimo njincita.
“Cini cini ndamwaambila ati, wezo uunshoma, aze ulakakonzha kucita milimo yezhi njicita. Ulakacita milimo ibaala ali yezhi, nkaambo ume ndaya kwa Taata.
Kufwumbwa ncimukaalomba mwizhina lyangu ndakacicita, kwaamba Taata akalemekwe mu Mwana.
Kuti mwalomba kufwumbwa ncintu mwizhina lyangu ndakacicita.”
“Na mulimfwini, amucilile milawo yangu.
Ndakamukombela kwa Taata kwaamba ulakamutumina uumwi muyohwi ngumukaakala aze lyoonse
Wezo uuli ngu Moza Usalala walushinizho. Walo bantu baanshi ano ngubatakonzha kutambula nikuba kumuzhiba. Umwe mulimwizhi kaambo mulyaaze ulimwi ulakaba muli umwe.
“Ndakaya, nshikamushiyi ukoya bamushaala, ndakapiluka ulimwi nkumumbele.
Nikuba bobo, muciindi cishoonto bulyo, baanshi tabakamboni linji, pele umwe mulaakumbona kaambo ndimumi ulimwi amwe mulaakuli bomi.
Pele buzuba bobo bwakashika, mulakazhiba ati ndili mwa Taata amwe muli mwangu, umbona mwindi muli umwe.
“Wezo utambula milawo yangu ukwiicilila ulimfwini ulimwi wezo uumfwini ulakafwunwa kwa Taata, ame ndakamufwuna, ulimwi ndakalizubulula kwakwe.
Judasi, uutali Shikaliyoti wakaamba ati, no kaamboonzhi ulakalibonya bulyo kulyuuswe kutali ku bantu boonse baanshi?
Jeso wakamwiingula ati, kufwumbwa muntu uufwini, ulacilila milawo yangu, ubobo Taata ulakamufwuna cakuti ume u Taata tulakeza tukakale u wezo muntu.
“Wezo uutanzanda taabamba mazwi angu. U mazwi azo ngumuteelela taali angu pe, alahwa kwa Taata wakantuma.
“Ndamushimwinina limwi aza makani nitucili amwe.
Pele akashika muyohwi, Moza Usalala, wezo ngwaakaatuma Taata mwizhina lyangu, ulakamuyiisha shoonse shintu ulimwi ulakaakumuzhibalusha shintu shoonse nshindakamushimwina nitwaakuli amwe.
“Ndamushiila luumuno. Ndamupa luumuno lwangu. Lutali ukoya luumuno lolo ndubapa baanshi ano, ubobo myonzo yenu itapenji.
Mwanteelela indamwaambila ati, ‘Ndaya pele ndakazhoka ulimwi.’ Kuti nimwaakumfwini nimwabotelwa kwaamba ndaya kwa Taata, mukando kubaala ume.
Ndamushimwina ninzho sheshi shintu kashitana kucitika kwaamba shakacitika mukashome.
Inzho nshicimwaambila linji makani aanji, kaambo muleli waanshi ano uleza. Wiina insana shakunzunda.
Pele ndacita ukoya mbwaakandailila Taata, kwaamba bantu baanshi bazhibe ati ndimufwini Taata.
“Inzho amuzhimuke atwaahwe ano abusena.”
“Ndime musaansa mwini mwini, Taata ngu mulimi.
Inzho kufwumbwa mutabi uutazhali mulyuume ulookosola, pele wezo uuzhala ulookokola kwaamba uzhalishe.
Umwe ndamusalazha kale u mazwi ngundamukananina.
Amukakatile kwangu, ame kulyuumwe. Kwiina mutabi uukonzha kuzhala micelo wini bulyo utali ku cishiko camusaansa, umbona bobo amwe tamukonzha kuzhala micelo cita kamuli kulyuume.
“Ume ndime isamu lya musaansa, umwe muli mitabi. Wezo uukalilila kwangu ame kwakwe nguukaazhala micelo minji minji, kaambo kuti mwaandaana ame kwiina ncimukonzha kucita pe.
Kuti muntu takalilila mulyuume, uli ukoya mutabi wakosolwa wamana wazuma. Mitabi iili bobo ilabwezwa u kusowelwa mu mulilo ukutentwa.
Ubobo kuti mwakalilila mulyuume u mazwi aangu akalilila muli umwe, mulakonzha kukumbila kufwumbwa ncimuzanda mulakapewa.
Taata ulapewa bulemu kuti mwazhala micelo minji minji, amwe ndilelyo nimukaalitondezha ati muli ba shiciiya bangu.
Umbona mbwaamufwini Taata ame ndimufwini, inzho amushaale mu lufwuno lwangu.
Kuti mweebamba Milawo yangu, mulakalilila mu lufwuno lwangu, umbona mbundakeebamba Milawo yaka Taata ukukalilila mu lufwuno lwakwe.
“Ndamushimwina aza kwaamba lutangalo lwangu lube muli umwe, alo lutangalo lwenu lumaninine.
Mulawo wangu nguwezu, amufwunane umbona mbwiimufwini ame.”
Kwiina muntu uukwete lufwuno lukando luli bolya, lwakwaaba bumi bwakwe ukaambo kabalongwaakwe.
Mwaakucita nshindamulailila mulaakuli balongwaangu.
Nshicimwiti linji ati batwanga bangu nkaambo batwanga tabacizhi ncaacita shimatwangaabo. Inzho ndaakumwita ati muli balongwaangu, nkaambo ndakamushimwina shoonse nshindakateelela kwa Taata.
Mwiina kunsala, ndime indakamusala kwaamba muukuya mukazhale micelo minji minji iitakaamana. Inzho Taata ulakamupa kufwumbwa ncimukaakumbila mwizhina lyangu.
Ubobo ndamulailila kwaamba amufwunane umwi uumwi.
Kuti bantu baanshi bakamusule mukazhibaluke ati ndime bakataanguna kusula.
Mwaakuli baanshi ano, inshi yoonse ilaakumufwini ukoya banamuzhaabo. Pele ume ndakamusala kuhwa anshi yezhi, tamucili baanshi pe, nciceco inshi nciimuswile.

Kamwaazhibaluka mazwi ngundakamushimwina akuti, mutwanga tali mukando kubaala shimatwangaakwe. Na ume bantu bakampenzha, amwe balakamupenzha umbona. Na bakaatambula mazwi angu, amwe enu balakaatambula.
Pele balakacita shoonse sheshi ukambo kangu, nkaambo tabamwizhi wakantuma.
Kuti indatakeza kubayiisha, nibaakwiina mulandu wa cibi, pele inzho bayina cilitamizho kumulandu wa cibi cabo pe.
Wezo uunswile, ulimuswile u Taata.
Kuti indatakacita milimo itanacitilwe akati kabo, nibaakwiina mulandu wa cibi. Nikuba bobo bakeebona milimo yangu, pele bakansula ume antoomwi u Taata.
Sheshi shakacitwa umbona mbukulembelwe mu milawo yabo ati, “Bakansula bwiina ukaambo.”
Pele muyohwi ulakashika, wezo ngunkaatuma kuhwa kwa Taata, walo uuli ngu Moza walushinizho uuhwa kwa Taata. Nguukeza kupa bumboni bumpandulula.
Amwe mbubona muli bakamboni bangu kaambo twakaakuli amwe kuhwa ku makancilo.
Ndamushimwina aza oonse kwaamba mutaleka kushoma.
Balakamutanda mu shikombelo shaba Juda. Ulimwi cilakashika ciindi lelyo bantu nibakaamuyaya, bakaakuzunga ati balacita mulimo mubotu kwa Leza.
Balakashicita bobo nkaambo tabamwizhi Taata ame tabenzhi.
Pele ndamushimwina aza kwaamba cakashika ciindi cakucita sheshi shintu, mukazhibaluke ati ndakaakumushimwinine kale.
“Ndiina ukamushimwina sheshi shintu ku makancilo nkaambo ndakaakuli amwe.”
Pele inzho ndapiluka kuli wezo wakantuma, pele kwiina uumbuzha nkwinja.
Inzho bolya mundamushimwina, mwakwata mapenzhi mu myonzo.
Pele nikuba bobo ndamushimwina meni meni, ncibotu kulyuumwe kwaamba nje. Nkaambo kuti nshiciti bobo, Muyohwi takazhiza kwenu pe. Pele kuti ndaya ndakamutumina Muyohwi.
Inzho akashika ulakabazula baanshi kwaamba balikwete mulandu ku makani a cibi, ukumakani a bululami ukumakani a lubeta.
Balikwete cibi nkaambo kakuti tabanshomi.
Ku makani abululami balikwete mulandu nkaambo kakuti ndabweela kwa Taata, ubobo tabacimboni linji pe.
Ku makani a lubeta, balikwete mulandu nkaambo muleli wanshi ano wabetekwa kale.
“Ndikwete mazwi manji manji aakumwaambila pele tamukonzha kwaateelelesha ninzho.

Pele akashika Moza walushinizho, ulakamusololela u makani meni meni oonse. Nkaambo takaamba shakwe mwini, pele ulakapandulula shesho shoonse nshaakateelela kwa Taata, ubobo ulakamushimwina shintu shiciza.
Ulakandetela bulemu nkaambo ulakatola nshiŋamba ukumupandululila.
Shoonse shaka Taata shangu. Nciceco ncindaambila ati, ulakashitola nshiŋamba ukumupandululila.”
“Kwaita ciindi cishoonto tamukamboni, ulimwi kwaita ciindi cishoonto mulakambona.”

Inzho bamwi ba shiciiya bakakanka kubuzhanya mulwabo ati, “Anu makaninzhi aza ngaamba ati, ‘Kwaita ciindi cishoonto tamukamboni, pele ulimwi kwaita ciindi cishoonto mulakambona,’ ‘Nkaambo ndaya kwa Taata?’”
Bakaamba ati, “Anu kwaita ciindi cishoonto cilaambaanzhi? Tatucizhi ceco ncaamba!”
Jeso wakazhiba ati balazanda kumubuzha, ubobo wakababuzha ati, “Sa mulabuzhanya celya ncindaamba ati, ‘Kwaita ciindi cishoonto tamukamboni, ulimwi kwaita ciindi cishoonto mulakambona?’
Cini cini ndamushimwina ati, mulakalila u koomoka, pele baanshi balakasekelela. Mulakalyeetezha, pele kuusa kwenu kulakasanduka kuba lutangalo.

Ciindi mukaintu naali mu mishika yakutumbuka ulalyeetezha cini cini u monzo nkaambo ciindi cakupenga cashika. Pele amana kutumbuka ulaaluba mapenzhi, ukaambo kakubotelwa ati mwana watumbukwa ano anshi.
Umbona bobo mbucibele kulyuume, inzho mulyuusile pele ndakeza kumubona ulimwi, myonzo yenu ilakezula lutangalo lwiina ukaamunanga linji.
“Kubuzuba bobo kwiina ncimukaabuzha. Ulimwi ndamushimwina ati, Taata ulakamupa kufwumbwa ncimukaalomba mwizhina lyangu.
Kushikila uceno ciindi tamunalombele cintu mwizhina lyangu. Amulombe, mulatambula kwaamba mutangale cini cini.”
“Lyoonse ndamwambila mushikozhano kumushimwina sheshi shintu. Pele ciindi cilakashika nintakaamwaambila linji mushikozhano, pele ndakamupandululila shoonse shintu shaka Taata.
Mu buzuba bobo mulakamulomba Taata mwizhina lyangu. Nshaamba ati ndakamukombela kwa Taata,
nkaambo Taata ulimufwini. Nciceco amwe ncimwakamfwunina u kushoma ati ndakahwa kwa Taata.
Ume ndakahwa kwa Taata kwiza ano anshi, ulimwi inzho ndeshiya inshi ndaya kwa Taata.”
Ba shiciiya bakwe bakaamba ati, “Ee cini cini ninzho waamba cakaanzambwene, twaambila mutushimpi!
Inzho twazhiba ati ulishizhi shoonse shintu, ubobo kwiina ukakubuzha cintu, inzho ukaambo ka makani aza twashoma kwaamba wakahwa kwa Leza.”
Jeso wakabaingula ati, “Sa ninzho mwashoma?
Ciindi cilashika, pele cashika kale cakuti mumwaale kuya mwenu mwenu, mukanshiye ice. Pele nikuboobo nshikaakuli ice nkaambo Taata uli ame.
Ndamushimwina makani aza kwaamba muyane luumuno muukunshoma. Ano anshi umwe muli u mapenzhi makando, pele nikuba bobo ndabuzunda bubiyabi bwa anshi.”
Jeso naakamana kwaamba aza makani, wakalyaalala kwizeulu waamba ati, “Taata, ciindi cangu cashika. Leta bulemu ku Mwanako kwaamba aze Mwanako akuletele bulemu.
Umbona mbuwakamupa insana abantu boonse shakupa bumi butamana kuli babo boonse mbuwakamupa.
Bumi butamana cilaamba kuzhiba uwe, Leza walushinizho ice bulyo, u Jeso Kilisito nguwakatuma.
Ndaleta bulemu bwako ano anshi, indakamaninzha mulimo nguwakantuma kwaamba ngucite.
Ubobo Taata mpa bulemu mbundezhiza ku bushu kwako, bulemu bobo mundakaakukwete indakaakuli aze, inshi niyataakuna kulengwa.
“Ndakalizubulula izhina lyako ku bantu mbuwakampa kuhwa ano anshi kwaamba bakuzhibe. Kabali bako pele wakampa ubobo bakashicilila injiisho shako.
Balizhi ati shoonse nshinkwete shakahwa kwako,
nkaambo ndabayiisha mazwi nguwakandailila. Bakaatambula ubobo balizhi lushinizho lwakuti ndakahwa kwako ulimwi balashoma ati ndiwe uwakantuma.
Baba imbabo mbunkombela. Nshikombeli bantu boonse baanshi. Ndakombela babo mbuwakampa nkaambo mbako.
Boonse bangu mbako, abo bako mbangu, ulimwi balandetela mulemu.

Nshicili anshi linji, nkaambo ndeza kwako, pele balo bacili ano anshi. Taata uwe Usalala, ubakwabilile bantu mbuwakampa kwiita munsana shezhina lyako, kwaamba babe muntu womwi umbona aswe mbutuli womwi.

Ciindi indaakuli abo ndakakubalela mwizhina lyako babo mbuwakampa. Ndakabakwabilila munsana nshiwakampa. Kwiina naaba womwi wakazhimina cita bulyo wezo wakaakweelele kuzonauka, umbona bwaamba Malembe.
Pele inzho ndeza kwako, nikuba bobo sheshi shintu ndashikanana nincili anshi kwaamba babotelwe cini cini umbona mumbotelelwe.
Ndabayiisha mazwi ako, ubobo baanshi balibaswile nkaambo tabacili banamuzhaabo, umbona ame mbuntali waanshi.
Nshibakombeli kwaamba ubakushe anshi pele ati ubakwabilile ku mubiyabi.
Tabali banshi yezhi umbona ame mbuntali wanshi yezhi.
Basalazhe u mazwi ako, nkaambo mazwi ako ngalushinizho.
Umbona mbuwakantuma mu luundu, ame ndabatuma mu luundu.
