Nkaambo kabo ndalisambulala, kwaamba abo basalale mu lushinizho.
“Nshikombeli bulyo baba bali awa ice, pele ubabo ba shoma kwiita mu mazwi abo.
Ndabakombela kwaamba boonse babe womwi, umbona uwe Taata mbuuli mulyuume, ame mulyuuwe, abo umbona babe mulyuuswe kwaamba luundu loonse lushome ati ndiwe uwakantuma.
Umbona mbuwakampa bulemu ame ndabapa bulemu kwaamba babe womwi umbona aswe mbutuli womwi.
Ume ndili mubabele, aze uli mulyuume, kwaamba bakamantane cini cini, kwaamba luundu luzhibe ati ndiwe uwakantuma, ulimwi ulibafwini umbona mbumfwini.
Taata, ndazandisha cini cini kwaamba abo babo mbuwakampa bakabe koko nkwiimbele. Kwaamba bakabubone bulemu bwangu bobo mbuwakampa inshi keetana kulengwa ukaambo kakuti ulimfwini.
Taata umululami, nikuba ati bantu baanshi bayina nibakakuzhiba, pele ume ndikwizhi, abo balizhi ati ndiwe uwakantuma.
Ndakabazhibya izhina lyako, ulimwi ndaakucibazhibya, kwaamba lufwuno lolu ndumfwini lube mubabele, ame mbe mubabele.”
Naakamana kwaamba aza makani, Jeso wakaya u ba shiciiya bakwe mwitala lya kakonka ka Kidiloni. Koko kubusena kakuli muunda wa masamu a Oliva, koko Jeso u ba shiciiya bakwe bakenjila mu muunda wezo.
Inzho aze Judasi shikumwaaba kabwizhi bobo busena nkaambo shiindi shinji shinji Jeso nkwaakufwini kubunganina u ba shiciiya bakwe.
Inzho Judasi wakashika kubusena bobo iinkamu ya bashikalumamba ubakando ba ŋanda ya Leza, bakatumwa ku bapaizhi bakando u ba Falisi, bakeza balikwete malambe, u mizenge u shilwisho.
Inzho Jeso mbwaakaakucizhi cakaakweelele kumucitikila, wakaya kubabuzha ati, “Anu nguni ngumukapula?”
Bakaingula ati, “Tulazanda Jeso waku Nanzaleta.” Wakabaambila ati, “Ndime.” Aze Judasi wezo wakamwaaba kazhimine abo.
Jeso nakabaambila ati, “Ndime” bakasesuluka bamane bawa anshi.
Jeso wakababuzha lwabili ati, “Anu nguni ngumukapula?” Bakaingula ulimwi ati, “Ngu Jeso waku Nanzaleta.”
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Ndamushimwina kale ati ‘Ndime.’ Inzho naa ndime mukapula Amubaleke baba mbutulyaabo baye.”
Koku kakuli kuzuzucizha Malembe aamba ati, “Kwiina naaba womwi wa babo mbuwakampa ngundakasowekelwa.”
Inzho Saimoni Pita mbwaakaakukwete iceba, wakalikusha munkomo wakosola kutwi kwa cilyo kwa muzhice wa mupaizhi mukando. Wezo muzhice izhina lyakwe kali Malikasi.
Jeso wakamwaambila Pita ati, “Libweezhe iceba lyako munkomo yalyo, sa ulatelaika ati nsheelele kunwina munkapu yezhi yamapenzhi njaampa Taata?”
Ubobo bashikalumamba u mukando wabo ulimwi ubasebezhi baba Juda bakamukwata Jeso u kumwaanga.
Bakataanguna kumutola kwa Anasi mukwe wakwe Kayafa wakaakuli ngu mupaizhi mukando mu mwaka wezo.
Kayafa inguwe wakabaambila ba Juda ati cilyeelele kwaamba womwi muntu afwile buleya.
Inzho Saimoni Pita u shiciiya umwi bakamucilila Jeso. Wezo shiciiya umwi wakenjila antoomwi u Jeso mulubanza lwa ŋanda ya mupaizhi mukando nkaambo kabazhibene aze.

Pele Saimoni Pita wakashaala ansengwe ulizhimine kufwaafwi ku mulyango. Inzho shiciiya wezo umwi wakaakuzhibilwe ku mukando wa bapaizhi wakapiluka ansengwe, wamwaambila mukaintu wakaakulinda amulyango amane wakamunjizha Pita mukati.
Mukaintu wakaakuli amulyango wakabuzha Pita ati, “Sa uwe tuli umwi wa bashiciiya ba muntu wezu?”
Pita wakamwiingula ati, “Pe pe.”
Inzho bazhice ubasebezhi ba ŋanda ya Leza bakakunka mulilo kwaamba bazote kaambo kakuli impeyo. Aze Pita kazhimine abo kumulilo ulazota.
Inzho mupaizhi mukando wakabuzha Jeso shabashiciiya bakwe ulimwi injiisho shakwe.

Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Ndakaakuyiisha bantu baanshi kaanzambwene, ulimwi coonse ciindi ndakaakuyiisha mu shikombelo shaba Juda u muŋanda ya Leza, momo bantu boonse mubabungana. Kwiina ncindakaseseka mu kuyiisha kwangu.
No kaambonzhi ncimumbuzhizha? Amubabuzhe bantu bakanteelela kaambo balizhi shindakaakwaamba.”
Jeso nakaamba bobo, umwi wa balindizhi wakaakuzhimine afwaafwi wakamuuma lukumbazhi Jeso lwamenso wamubuzha ati, “Sa mbumwiingula mupaizhi mukando bobo?”
Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Na ndabisha, nshimwina cibiyabi ncindaamba. Pele aakuli ndaamba ciluleme, no ncinzhi nciwangumina?”
Inzho Anasi wakamutuma Jeso kwa Kayafa mupaizhi mukando, Jeso wakaya mwaange.
Saimoni Pita kazhimine kumulilo ulazota, bakamubuzha ati, “Sa uwe tuli umwi wa bashiciiya ba muntu wezu?” Pele Saimoni wakakaka waamba ati, “Pe pe nshili!”
Umwi muzhice wa mupaizhi mukando, musazhiina u muntu ngwakakosola kutwi Pita, wakamubuzha ati “Sa uwe indiwe ndabona ku muunda kolya bwasunu muli antoomwi umuntu welya?”
Ulimwi Pita wakakaka. Ngoonaawo mukombwe wakalila.

Kuhwa kwa Kayafa, Jeso bakamutola ku cibetekelo. Kacili ciindi ca cifwumo fwumo, balukando kando baba Juda bayina nibakenjila mwibetekelo nkaambo kabatiya kwaamba ati balasofwaala banjila. Nkaambo kabazanda kulya Ipobwe lya Kwiitilila.
Ngoonaawo Pilato wakahwa ansengwe wababuzha ati, “No mulandunzhi ngumumupa muntu wezu?”
Bakamwiingula ati, “Muntu wezu nataakuli shishibi, nitwaatamuleta kwako.”
Pilato wakabaambila ati, “Noomutole mukamubeteke nubeni kwiingaina u milawo yenu.” Ba Juda bakaingula ati, “Tatuhumizhiwa kukosola mulandu walufwu lwa muntu.”
Sheshi shakacitika kwaamba mazwi ngakaamba Jeso a lufwu lwakwe mbwakaafwa azuzucizhiwe.
Pilato wakanjila ulimwi mwibetekelo, weta Jeso amane wakamubuzha ati, “Sa uli Mwami waba Juda?”
Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Sa ulaamba makani aza kuhwa ku monzo wako, na kuli bakushimwina makani angu?”
Pilato wakaamba ati, “Sa ume ndi mu Juda?” Bashicishinoko u bapaizhi mbubakwaaba kwangu, No wacitaanzhi?

Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Bwami bwangu tabuli bwa anshi ano. Kuti bwami bwangu nibwakuli bwa anshi, batwanga bangu nibalwa kwaamba intabwa kubakando baba Juda. Pele Ume bwami bwangu tabuli bwa anshi ano pe.”

Ngoonaawo Pilato wakaamba ati, “Eena anu uli mwami?” Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Waamba kabotu kwaamba ati, ndi mwami. Incico ncindakazhalilwa, ulimwi ncindakezhila, kwaamba ati nkape bumboni bwa lushinizho, ubobo kufwumbwa muntu uuzhi lushinizho ulanteelela.”
Pilato wakabuzha ati, “No lushinizho caambaanzhi?”
Nakamana kwaamba bobo, wakahwa ansengwe ulimwi kuya kushimwina bakando baba Juda ati “Wezu muntu wiina mulandu.
Pele mulikwete kanshiya nshiya kakumwangululila mwaange omwi ciindi ce Pobwe lya Kwiitilila. Sa mulazanda ati mwaangululile Mwami waba Juda?”
Bantu bakapozomoka ati, “Pe pe! Twaangululile Balabasi, kutali muntu wezu pe!” Inzho wezo Balabasi kali mutewu.
Ngoonaawo Pilato wakalailila ati Jeso aumwe tulusu.
Bashikalumamba bakapanga mushini wameya, bakamusamika ku mutwi, bamane bakamusamika icanshi lya cilambo ca bwami ca shicisu.
Kabaya kwakwe kumusaalizha ati, “Wabonwa Mwami waba Juda!” Ukumuuma inkumbazhi.
Pilato wakahwa ansengwe ulimwi waambila ba Juda ati, “Ndamuleta ansengwe kwaamba muzhibe ati wina mulandu muntu wezu!”
Ubobo Jeso bakamukusha ansengwe kasamine mushini wameya icanshi lya cilambo ca shicisu. Inzho Pilato wakabeta ati, “Nguwezu mulombwana!”

Bapaizhi bakando u balindilizhi ba ŋanda ya Leza nibakamubona Jeso, bakapozomoka ati, “Naakankaminwe a ciciinkano! Naakankaminwe a ciciinkano!” Pilato wakaamba ati, “Amumutole mukamukankamine nubeni, nkaambo ume ndiina kumuyanina mulandu.”
Ba Juda bakamwita ati, “Tulikwete mulawo uututondezha ati wezu muntu ulyeelele kufwa, kaambo ulalyaamba ati Mwanakwe Leza.”
Pilato naakateelela mazwi aza, wakatiya cini cini.
Ubobo wakanjila ulimwi mwibetekelo wamubuzha Jeso ati, “Anu uhwa kwi?” Jeso wiina nakaingula.
Inzho Pilato wakamwaambila Jeso ati, “Sa tuzanda kunshimwina? Sa twinzhi ati ndikwete insana shakukwangulula u shakukukankanina?”
Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Niwaakwiina insana kuti niwatakapewa kuhwa kwizeulu insana shakubeteka pe. Nikuba bobo wezo wakantuma kwako ulikwete cibi cikando.”

Pilato naakateelela bobo kazanda kumwangulula, pele bakando baba Juda bakapozomoka ati, “Kuti na umwaangulule muntu wezu ati, tuli mulongwaakwe muleli mukando waku Loma. Kufwumbwa muntu ulipa kami kami ati ngushinkondonina Kaisala, mweendelezhi mukando waku Loma.”
Pilato naakateelela mazwi aza, wakamukusha Jeso ansengwe, ukumukalika a cuuna cakubetekela, abusena butewa ati, Lubanza lwa Mabwe, muci Alamaiki balaamba ati Gabata.
Inzho kabuli buzuba bwakulibambila Ipobwe lya Kwiitilila, ciindi ceshikati. Pilato wakaambila ba Juda ati, “Nguwezu Mwami wenu!”

Balo bakapozomoka, “Tatumuzanda, tatumuzanda! Naakankaminwe a ciciinkano!” Pilato wakabeta ati, “Sa ndakonzha kukankamina Mwami wenu?” Bapaizhi bakando bakaamba ati, “Twiina unji mwami kunze lya muleli mukando waku Loma.”
Ngoonaawo wakabapa mu matashi abo kwaamba ati bakamukankamine.
Ubobo bakamukwata bamutola kuya kumukankamina.
Wakabweza mwini ciciinkano cakwe wakaya kushika kubusena butewa ati, Kaanza muci Alamaiki ati Gologota.
Koko bakamukankamina antoomwi u balombwana bobile, umwi kuluya lumwi uumwi kuluya lumwi, Jeso kali akati kabo.
Pilato wakalemba cizhibyo caamba ati, “Jeso waku Nanzaleta, Mwami waba Juda,” calo cakabikwa ezeulu aciciinkano cakwe Jeso.
Bantu banji banji bakacibala nkaambo bobo busena kabuli afwaafwi u munzhi ulimwi kacilembelwe muci Alamaiki, umuci Latini umuci Giliki.
Bakando babapaizhi bakamwita Pilato ati, “Utalembi ati Mwami waba Juda pele lemba ati, ‘Kaamba ati ndi Mwami waba Juda.’ ”
Pilato wakaingula ati, “Ncindalemba ndalemba.”

Bashikalumamba nibakamana kumukankamina Jeso bakashaapaula shisani shakwe mu shipanzha shone kwaamba boonse bazululie. Ulimwi bakabweza cikobelo cakwe cakaakwiina mubundo kacili comwi bulyo kuhwa kwizeulu mpaka anshi.
Bakaamba ati, “Ceci tutacizapula atucuumine bulyo cisolo kwaamba tubone uukacitola.” Ceci cakacitwa kuzuzucizha Malembe aamba ati,
“Bakashaabana shisani shangu akati kabo beni bamane bacuumina cisolo cikobelo cangu.” Nciceci ncibakacita bashikalumamba.
Kumbali kuciciinkano caka Jeso kakuzhimine baina Jeso, u munina baina, u Maliya muka Kulopasi antoomwi u Maliya Magadalena.
Jeso wakamubona baina u shiciiya ngwaakaakufwini balizhimine amane wamwaambila baina ati, “Mukaintu, nguwezo mwanako.”
Amane wakaambila shiciiya ati, “Nguwezo banoko.” Kuhwaawo, wezo shiciiya wakamubweza baina Jeso kuya kumulela.
Bakaleta impawo yakaakuzwile waini ulula, bamane bapanga inshisa yakasamu ka hisopu beetoba bamupa,
amane kusola waini ulula wezo, Jeso wakaamba ati, “Kwamana.”
Ku mazwi aza wakoofwulika mutwi amane wafwa.

Ukaambo kakuti kabuli buzuba bwa mucisanu bwakulibambila, ulimwi Ba Juda kabatazanda kwaamba ati mibili ikuli ashiciinkano mu buzuba bwa Sabata. Ubobo bakando baba Juda bakamukumbila Pilato kwaamba babo bakaakuli ashiciinkano bakombaulwe maulu bakushiwe ashiciinkano.
Ubobo bashikalumamba bakaya babakombaula maulu a mutaanzhi, bamane baya kuli uumwi wa babo bakakukankamininwe u Jeso.
Pele nibakashika kwa Jeso bakayana ati wafwa kale ubobo bayina nibakaakombaula maulu aakwe.
Pele umwi wabashikalumamba wakabweza isumo wamuyasa mu citeku, awo ngoonaawo kwakapoomoka meenzhi u bulowa.
Muntu wakacibona ceci wakapa bumboni, ulimwi bobu bumboni bulishinizhe kwaamba ati amwe mushome. Ulimwi ulizhi ati ncaamba ncalushinizho.
Sheshi shintu shakacitwa kuzuzucizha Malembe aamba ati, kwiina cifwuwa cakwe niciba comwi cikaacolwa.
Ulimwi kuli Malembe aamba ati, balakamulanga wezo ngubakayasa.
Kuhwaawo Jozefu waku Alimataya wakakumbila mubili waka Jeso kwa Pilato kwaamba oobweze. Wezo Jozefu aze kali shiciiya waka Jeso pele ukaambo kakutiya ba Juda kazubaila. Bamuhuminye bulyo wakoobweza.
Nikodimasi wezo wakaakuswaile Jeso mashiku, wakeza waletelezha utununcilizho tuhwele mila u aloyi tulema makilo ali makumi otatwe.
Baba balombwana bobile bakoobweza mubili waka Jeso ukuuhungaila mwisani lya telelini ukumunanika tununcilizho toto umbona mbuli tunshiyanshiya twakuzhikwa twaci Juda.
Koko nkubakamukankaminina Jeso kakuli muunda. Momo mu muunda kamuli cuumbwe ciina wakaakuzhikilwe mo.
Ubobo ukaambo kakuti kabuli buzuba bwakaakutewa ati bwaca mulaba mu Sabata, ulimwi cuumbwe mbucakaakuli afwaafwi bakamuzhika Jeso momo mu cuumbwe.
Cifwumo fwumo mu buzuba butaanzhi bwa nsunda kaacishiya anshi, Maliya Magadalena wakaya ku cuumbwe, inzho wakabona ati ibwe lyakushiwa amulyango wa cuumbwe kalitewo.
Wakapiluka wakalukanka kuya kwa Saimoni Pita ukwa wezo shiciiya ngwaakaakufwini Jeso, wabambila ati, “Bamukusha Mwami mu cuumbwe, tatukwizhi nkubamutola!”
Ubobo Pita u wezo shiciiya bakaya ku cuumbwe.
Boonse kabaya bulukanka pele wezo shiciiya uumwi wakamushiya Pita, wakataanguna kushika ku cuumbwe.
Naakashika wakasondela, wakabona shisani shililundene, pele wiina naakanjila mu cuumbwe.
Saimoni Pita, wakaakumucilile munshi, naakashika, wakenjila mu cuumbwe. Wakabona shisani shililundene.
Pele kasani kakaakwaanjilwe ku mutwi wa Jeso, kalo kakahunjilwe ambali ice.
Ngoonaawo aze shiciiya wakataanguna kushika ku cuumbwe naakanjila. Wakabona u kushoma.
Pele kabatana kwaateelelesha Malembe aamba ati Jeso ulakabuka ku bafwu.
Ba shiciiya bakabweela kumaanda abo.
Pele Maliya wakashaala ulizhimine ansengwe acuumbwe ulalila. Inzho naakaakulila, wakoonga wasondela mu cuumbwe
wakabona baanjelo bobile balisamine shisani shituba balishite awo akaakulele mubili waka Jeso, umwi ku mutwi umwi kumatende.
Bakamubuzha ati, “Anu ulilaanzhi mukaintu?”
Wakaingula ati, “Bamutola Mwami wangu nshikwizhi nkubamubika.”
Amane wakacebuka kumanuma wabona Jeso ulizhimine pele wiina naakamuzhiba.
Jeso wakamubuzha ati, “Mukaintu, no ulilaanzhi? Nguni nguukapula?” Mukuzunga ati ngumukamwini muunda, Maliya wakaamba ati, “Mwami, naa ndiwe uwamukusha, nshimwina nkuwamubika nkamubweze.”
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Maliya!” Maliya wakacinduluka wamulangilila waamba muci Alamaiki ati, “Laboni” calo caamba ati, “Mwiiyi.”
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Utankwati kaambo nshina kupiluka kwa Taata. Koya bulyo ku bakwesu ukabaambile ati, ‘Ndaya kwa Taata uuli ngu uswenu. Leza wangu, amwe ngu Leza wenu.’ ”
Maliya Magadalena wakaya ku bashiciiya kutola mulumbe wezu wakuti, “Ndamubona Mwami!” Amane wakabashimwina shoonse nshaakamulailila.
Kumangolezha mu buzuba bobo, buzuba butaanzhi bwa nsunda, ba shiciiya nibakaakubungene, shitendele kashiingilwe kutiya ba Juda, Jeso wakeza wazhima akati kabo waamba ati, “Luumuno alube amwe!”
Amane kwaamba bobo wakabatondezha matashi aakwe uciteku. Ba shiciiya bakasapwa nibakamubona Mwami.
Jeso wakaamba ulimwi ati, “Luumuno alube amwe! Umbona mbwaakantuma Taata ndamutuma amwe.”
Amane wakabazozela waamba ati, “Amutambule Moza Usalala.
Kuti mwabalekelela kufwumbwa muntu shibi shilalekelelwa, pele kuti mwiina kushilekelela tashilekelelwa.”
Inzho umwi wa ba shiciiya bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile, Tomasi uutewa ati wamaanga katewo ciindi Jeso naakeza.
Ubobo ba shiciiya bakamushimwina ati, “Twamubona Mwami!”
Pele Tomasi wakaamba ati, “Ume nshishomi cita nkeebone mikofwu ya nembe ukunjizha minwe yangu aciteku.”
Kwiite insunda yomwi ba shiciiya bakaakuliyalilile muŋanda, ciindi ceco aze Tomasi kalimo. Shitendele kashiingilwe pele Jeso wakeza wazhima akati kabo waamba ati, “Luumuno alube amwe!”
Amane wakamwaambila Tomasi ati, “Bika momu munwe wako, ulimwi tandabika itashi lyako aciteku cangu. Leka kuzuluzha, shoma.”
Tomasi wakaamba ati, “Mwami wangu ulimwi u Leza wangu!”
Amane Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Sa washoma kaambo wambona? Balilonjelwe coolwe babo batana kumbona pele balashoma.”
Jeso wakacita shitondezho shinji shinji amenso a ba shiciiya bakwe azo aatalembelwe mwibuka leli.
Pele alo aza akalembwa kwaamba mushome ati Jeso ngu Kilisito, Mwanaa Leza ulimwi mukumushoma muyane bumi mwizhina lyakwe.
Nishakamana sheshi shoonse, Jeso wakalibonya ulimwi ku bashiciiya bakwe kwizhiba lya Tibeliyasi. Inzho mbubolya mbucakaakubele.
Saimoni Pita, u Tomasi uutewa ati wamaanga, Natanyele waku Kana mu Galilaya, banakwe Zebedi ubamwi ba shiciiya bobile kabali antoomwi.
Awo Samoni Pita wakaamba ati, “Ume ndaya nkazela inswi.” Boonse bakaingula ati, “Tulaya aswe.” Ngoonaawo bakaya ukuzela boonse pele kwiina uncibakayaya mashiku azo.
Ifwumofwumo Jeso wakazhima kumbali kunkomwe, pele ba shiciiya bayina kumuzhiba ati ngu Jeso.
Wakaboolobwezha ati, “Beenzuma sa mwiina inswi?” Balo bakaingula ati, “Twiina.”
Ushiciiya wezo ngwaakaakufwini Jeso wakaamba ati, “Ngu Mwami.” Pita mbwaakateelela ati, “Ngu Mwami.” Wakalihumba cikobelo cakwe ceezeulu kaambo kacisamununine amane waliwaala mu meenzhi.
Bamwi ba shiciiya bakamucilila mu bwato kabaya bukwela kanyandi kazwile inswi kuya ku mulando mushinzo wantaamu shili mwaanda.
Nibakashoka bakayana mulilo wamakala ulamotoka kulazocewa inswi ulimwi kakuli ucinkwa.
Jeso wakaamba ati, “Amulete inswi shimwi nshimwakwasha.”
Saimoni Pita wakaliza mu bwato wakakwelela a muuma kanyandi. Kakazwile maswi makando ali mwaanda u makumi osanwe aatwesha otatwe, pele naahula bobo azo maswi kanyandi kaina kuzapuka.
Jesu wakabeta ati, “Kamwiza tususule.” Kwiina naaba womwi shiciiya wakasola kumubuzha ati, “Ndiweni?” Nkaambo kabezhi ati ngu Mwami.
Jesu wakabweza cinkwa wabapa ulimwi wakacita umbona bobo ukunswi.
Ceci nizho cakaba ciindi catatu kulibonya ku bashiciiya bakwe kuhwa naakabushiwa ku bafwu.
Nibakamana kulya, Jeso wakamubuzha Saimoni Pita ati, “Saimoni mwanakwe Johani, sa ulifwini kubaala bamwi?”
Wakaingula ati, “Ee Mwami, aze ulizhi ati ndikufwini.”
Jesu wakamushimwina ati, “Sheembele imbelele shangu.”
Ulwabili Jesu wakamubuzha ati, “Sa ulifwini cini cini?”
Wakaingula ati, “Ee Mwami aze ulizhi ati ndikufwini.”
Jesu wakamushimwina ati, “Beembele bana ba mbelele shangu.”
Ulimwi lweendo lwatatu wakamubuzha ati, “Saimoni mwanakwe Johani, sa ulifwini?”
Pita wakabiilwa nkaambo ninzho lolu lweendo kaluli lwatatu kumubuzha, ubobo wakaamba ati, “Mwami ulishizhi shoonse shintu, ulizhi ati ndikufwini!”
Jesu wakamwita ati, “Sheembele imbelele shangu.
Cini cini ndakushimwina ati, ciindi niwakaakuli mwana wakakulibambila u kuya kufwumbwa nkuuzanda, pele wakomena ulakaakutandabika itashi amana umwi muntu ulakakwaanga ukukutola nkutazanda kuya.”
Mu kwaamba bobo, Jeso wakaakutondezha lufwu lwaka Pita mbulukaaleta bulemu kwa Leza. Amane Jeso wakaamba ati, “Ncilila!”
Amubone bulyo Pita, wakamubuzha Jeso ati, “No wezu mulombwana walo mbuti?”
Jeso wakamwiingula ati, “Naa ndazanda ati apone kushicila nkapiluka, cuukwete kwi? Ncilila!”
“Ubobo impuwo yakazuwa yakuti wezu shiciiya takafwi. Pele Jeso kataamba ati takafwi, wakaamba ati, cuukwete kwi kuti ndaamba ati, kuti ndazanda, ulaakupona lyoonse mpaka nkabweele cikukwete kwi?”
Wezu nguushiciiya wakaamba aza, nguwaakashibona ukushilemba, ulimwi tulizhi ati ncaakaamba ncalushinizho.
Inzho kakuli aamwi maleele ngaakacita Jeso. Kuti naakalembwa oonse, inzho yoonse inshi niyakuzwile mabuka azo aati naakalembwa.
mpaka kushicila ciindi naakatolwa kwizeulu. Pele katana kutolwa kwizeulu, wakapa malailile kwiita mu Moza Usalala ku batumwa bakwe mbaakasala.
Amane kufwa u kubuka, wakalitondezha nkubabele munzhila shishiyene shiyene. Wakalibonya ukubandika abo makani a bwami bwa Leza kwa mazuba ali makumi one.
Ulimwi nibakaakubungene antoomwi, wakabapa mulawo wakuti, “Mutamuhwi mu Jelusalemu, pele mulindile cipo ceco Taata ncaakamushomezha, ncindakamwaambila kale.
Nkaambo Johani wakapapatiza u meenzhi, pele umwe mulakapapatizwa u Moza Usalala kwakaita mazuba mashoonto bulyo.”
Inzho batumwa nibakaakubungene atoomwi u Jeso, bakamubuzha ati, “Mwami, sa ninzho ukalababweezhezha bwami ba Izilaili?”
Jeso wakabaambila ati, “Tacili cenu cakuzhiba shiindi nishikaacitika nkaambo shili munsana sha Taata.
Pele Moza Usalala akeza ali umwe mulakatambula insana, mulaaba bakamboni bangu mu Jelusalemu umu Judiya moonse, ulimwi umu Samaliya, ukumamanino anshi.”
Amane kwaamba bobo, wakatolwa kwizeulu boonse balimulanjilile. Ngoonaawo ikumbi lyakabashinkila bakaleka kumubona.
Inzho kabacilanjile mwizeulu, ndilyona kwakeza balombwana bobile bakaakusamine shisani shituba, beza kuzhima afwaafwi.

Balombwana babo bakaambila ba shiciiya ati, “Umwe nubantu bamu Galilaya, ncinzhi ncimuzhimine awa ukulyaalala mwizeulu? Wezu Jeso watolwa mwizeulu, ulakeza ulimwi munzhila njiyona njimwamubona ulaya kwizeulu.”
Inzho batumwa bakabweela ku Jelusalemu kuhwa ku lupili lwa masamu a Oliva. Mushinzo wakuhwa ku Jelusalemu kuya koko kooli mufwaafwi cini cini.

Bakenjila mu Jelusalemu, bakaya kuŋanda koko nkubakaakukala. Batumwa baba kabali ba, Pita u Johani, u Jemusi, u Andulu, u Filipo, u Tomasi, u Batolomeyo, u Matayo, u Jemusi mwanakwe Alufayasi, u Saimoni mulondo, u Judasi mwanakwe Jemusi uunji.
Baba boonse kabalyaabile kukomba ca monzo womwi, antoomwi u Maliya baina Jeso, u banina Jeso u bakaintu bamwi.
Nikwakaita mazuba mashoonto kwakaba muswaangano wa babo ba bunina mwa Jeso, boonse antoomwi kabatandila kumwaanda u makumi obile. Inzho Pita wakazhimuka
waamba ati, “Bakwesu, kasheelele kucitika shesho shakaambwa mu maŋwalu shizeeme ku makani aka Judasi. Moza Usalala wakaamba kwiita mwa Devidi, ushaawezo wakasololela babo bakamukwata Jeso.
Judasi kali umwi wesu, aze kasalilwe kwaamba asebeze antoomwi aswe.”
Mali ngakayana Judasi kumulimo wakwe wa cibi ngwaakacita, wakaula muunda. Momo mwaakawila kusolozha mutwi anshi, waanduka efwu, shoonse shamwifwu lyakwe shakahwa shawila anshi.
Bantu boonse bakala mu Jelusalemu bakaateelele makani aza. Ubobo mucaambo cabo bakaulika muunda wezu ati “Akelidama,” cipandulula ati, “Muunda wabulowa.”
“Iŋanda yakwe alikabe itongo.
Kutabi muntu ukala mo pe!”
Ulimwi kulilembelwe ati,
“Muntu uunji akabweze busena bwamulimo wakwe!
Kukancila ciindi Johani naakakambauka makani a lupapatizo kuya kushika kubuzuba nitwakaandaana u Jeso nakatolwa kwizeulu. Nkaambo ulyeelele kupa bumboni antoomwi aswe bwakuti Jeso wakabuka ku bafwu.”
Ubobo bakanoma mazhina abantu bobile, ba Jozefu waakutewa ati Basabasi ulimwi kaakutewa ati Jasitasi, u Matiyasi.
Inzho bakakomba ati, “Mwami ulizhi myonzo ya bantu boonse, tutondezhe na nguni abantu baba bobile nguwasala
kwaamba abweze wezu mulimo wa butumwa mu busena mbwakashiya Judasi ciindi naakaya kubusena bumweelele.”
Bamane kukomba bakawaala cisolo, inzho wakasalwa ngu Matiyasi. Ubobo wakazunjilwa abatumwa bali ikumi uutwesha womwi.
Ngoonaawo kwakateelelwa muhuhumo wakeza kuhwa mwizeulu ukoya ikunku lyeuwo, lyakazuzha iŋanda yoonse momo mubaakushite.
Ngoonaawo kwakabonwa itungamwenje lya milaka ya mulilo uhwilima. Yezhi milaka ya mulilo yakakala ali umwi uumwi muŋanda momo.
Boonse bakenjilwa Moza Usalala, bakakanka kwaamba mu mishobo iinji kwiingaina u Moza mbuwakabeendelezha.
Inzho mu Jelusalemu kakuli bashomi ba Juda bakaakukala momo bakahwa mu mashi oonse aandeene andeene.
Inzho kuhuluma nikwakateelelwa, bantu banji banji bakeza kubungana. Boonse bakazhingwa nkaambo umwi uumwi wabo wakabateelela bashomi babo balakanana mu mushobo wakwe mwini.
Bakazoowa ukuzhingwa, ucakuti bakabuzha ati, “Sa baba bantu baamba bolya tabali ba Galilaya?
No caba buti kwaamba uswe toonse tubateelele balaamba mu mishobo yesu?
Uswe tubamwi twahwa ku cishi ca Patiya, bamwi ku Medesi, uku Elamaiti, bamwi bahwa ku Mesopotamiya uku Judiya, uku Kapadosiya, bamwi ku Pontasi uku Ezha,
abo bamwi bahwa ku Fuligiya u Pamfiliya, bamwi bahwa ku Ijipiti u mu masena aku Libiya kufwaafwi uku Sailini, ulimwi bamwi mbeenzu bahwa ku Loma.

Kakuli ba Juda uba kunze babo bakasanduka kuba ba Juda. Tubamwi tuli mushobo wa Kileti uwa ma Alabu, pele nikuba bobo toonse twabateelela balaamba mu mishobo yesu tubeni. Balakanana shintu shikando shesho Leza nshakacita!”
Mukuzoowa ukuzhingwa cini cini, bakatolelela kubuzhanya ati, “No ceci caambaanzhi?”
Bamwi bakakanka kusaalizha ati, “Baba bantu bakolwa waini mupiya.”

Ngoonaawo Pita wakazhimuka antoomwi u ba shiciiya bamwi bali ikumi uutwesha womwi. Inzho wakakanka kwaamba iizwi ikando kunkamu ya bantu bakaakubungene, wakaamba ati, Umwe nuba Judama, amwe noonse numukala mu Jelusalemu amumpupulale, mwaateeleleshe makani aza ŋunzanda nkwaamba.
Baba bantu bayina kukolwa pe mbuli mbumutelaika, nkaambo cicili cifwumo fwumo.
Pele ceci incico ncaakaamba mushinshimi Jowelu ati,
Ndakenjizha Moza wangu mubantu boonse.
Banenu balombwana u bashimbi balakashinshima.
Bakubushi balakabona shilengaano,
abo bamacembele balakalota shiloto.
Ee, ndakenjizha Moza wangu mubatwanga bangu,
balombwana u bakaintu mu mazuba azo.
Ulimwi balakaashinshima mazwi angu.
Ndakacita shizoosha mwizeulu, ushitondezho anshi ano.
Kulakaba malowa, u mulilo, iingubi yabushi.
Izuba lilakashiya mbi! Awo mwezhi ulakasubila pyu! Ukoya bulowa,
kabutana kushika buzuba bwa Mwami, bukando bwa bulemu.
Inzho kufwumbwa wezo uuwompolola izhina lya Mwami ulakafwutuka!”

“Umwe nuba Izilailima amwaapupulalishe mazwi aza! Welya Jeso Munanzaleta, kali mulombwana wezo Leza ngwakatondezha ati inguwe ngwaakasala. Ceci cakalibonya kwiita mu milimo mikando u maleele, u shintu shizoosha, shesho nshaakacita Leza kwiita mwa Jeso. Umwe nubeni mulyeezhi makani aza, nkaambo kaacitika akati kenu.

Ulimwi Leza mu makanze u muluzhibo lwakwe, wakaakosolela limwi makani aka Jeso kwaamba ulakaabwa kulyuumwe. Ubobo mwakamuyaya, nkaambo mwakamupa ku bantu batacilila mulawo kwaamba bamukankamine aciciinkano.
Pele Leza wakamubusha ku bafwu ukumuhuna kwisukusho lya lufwu, nkaambo kacili cizumu kwaamba asungwe kunsana sha lufwu.”
Nkaambo Devidi ulaamba shakwe mwini ati,
“Ndakamubona Mwami Leza kali kumbele lyangu lyoonse,
nkaambo lyoonse uli kwitashi lyangu lya cilyo, kwaamba intazungaana.
Ubobo monzo wangu wabotelwa,
awo mulaka wangu ulizwile lutangalo,
mubili wangu awo ulaakuli mubulanjizhi.
Nkaambo tukashiyi moza wangu mu cuumbwe.
Tukalekela musalazhi wako kubola.
Wakenzhibya inzhila ya bumi,
Ulakanzuzha lutangalo ku bushu bwako.”
“Nubakwesu, ndazanda kumukananina butazhimba aka Devidi shaakale wesu. Walo wakafwa ukuzhikwa, u cuumbwe cakwe nkucicili ubwasunu.
Nkaambo kali mushinshimi, wakazhiba kwaamba Leza wakamushomezha ca kupinga ati ulakabika a cuuna cakwe umwi wabanakwe.
Mukubona shiza kumbele a mazuba, Devidi wakaamba shakubuka ku bafwu kwa Munanike wa Leza ati,
“Nshikamushiyi mu cuumbwe,
u mubili wakwe tookabola pe!”
Inzho Leza wakamubusha wezu Jeso ku bafwu, ulimwi toonse tuli bakamboni ba makani aza.
Wakasumpulwa kwitashi lya cilyo lya Leza, ukutambula Moza Usalala kuhwa kwa leza ushi, mbubona mbwaakamushomezha. Inzho sheshi nshimubona u kuteelela nizho, nshipo shesho Jeso nshaatuntila aalyuuswe.
Devidi wiina naakaya kwizeulu, pele nikuba bobo wakaamba ati,
“Mwami Leza wakaambila Mwami wangu ati,
‘Kala kwitashi lyangu lya cilyo.
Mpaka nkacite ba shinkondonoko kwaamba babe cilyatilo ca matende ako.’
“Ubobo umwe nuba Izilaili amuzhibe kwaamba ati, wezu Jeso nguwena ngumwakakankamina aciciinkano, Leza wamubika kwaamba abe ngu Mwami ulimwi ngu Munanike.”
Nibakateelela bobo cakabakwata kumyonzo. Bakaambila Pita u batumwanina ati, “No tucite buti bakwesu?”
Pita wakabaambila ati, “Amusanduke, mupapatizwe umwi uumwi wenu mwizhina lya Jeso Kilisito kwaamba mulecelelwe shibi shenu, mutambule cipo ca Moza Usalala.
Nkaambo cishomezho ceci ncicenu umwe u banenu, u babo boonse bali kulaale, babo Mwami Leza wesu mbaakaketa.”
Pita wakabakananina kwiita mu mazwi manji manji aamwi, ukubeenzelezha ati, “Amulihune ku bantu baano mazuba bataluleme.”
Babo bakaahumina makani ngaakakambauka Pita bakapapatizwa. Mu buzuba bobo mbubona, mweelwe wa bantu bakazunjilwa kunkamu ya bashomi wakashika afwaafwi ku shuulu shotatwe.
Baba bantu kabaswaangana kuteelela nshibakaakuyiisha batumwa shiindi shoonse. Kabakala mu lukamantano lwa bunina, kabakomauzhanya shinkwa u kukomba antoomwi.
Bantu boonse bakalifwiinsha nkaambo kamaleele u shintu shizoosha shakaakucitwa kwiita mubatumwa.
Boonse bashomi kabali antoomwi, bakasanganya shoonse nshibakaakukwete.
Bakauzha inshi iimbono shabo u kwaabana mali kwiingaina iipenzhi lya muntu umwi uumwi.
Mazuba oonse kabaswaangana muŋanda ya Leza ca monzo womwi, ulimwi kabakomauna shinkwa mumaanda abo ukulya shilyo calutangalo u myonzo iishite.
Kabatembaula Leza ukubotezha bantu. A buzuba u buzuba Mwami Leza wakaakubazunjilila bantu bakaakuya bufutulwa.
Bumwi buzuba kumalyakumbo ciindi ca kukomba, ba Pita u Johani bakaya kuŋanda ya leza

Inzho kumanjililo a ŋanda ya Leza ku mulyango uutewa ati Mubotu, kakuli muntu mulema kuhwa mwifwu lyabaina. Wezu muntu kazemunwa mazuba oonse ukubikwa awo amulyango kwaamba aakulomba shipo ku bantu bakaakunjila muŋanda ya Leza.
Inzho naakabona ba Pita u Johani balazanda kunjila muŋanda ya Leza, wakabalomba kwaamba bamupe shipo.
Inzho Pita u Johani bakamulanjilila, amane Pita wakamwaambila ati, “Tulanjilile!”
Ubobo wakabalanjilila, katelaika ati balazanda kumupa cintu cimwi.
Ngoonaawo Pita wakamwaambila ati, “Siliva u goludi ndiina, pele ceco nciinkwete ndakupa. Mwizhina lya Jeso Kilisito waku Nazanleta, enda!”
Amane wakamukwata kwitashi lya cilyo wamuzhimika. Ngoonaawo matende u shipokoto shakakwata insana.
Wakazhimuka ca kufwambaana, ulimwi wakakanka kweenda wanjila muŋanda ya Leza antoomwi uba Pita u Johani, ulaya busotauka ukutembaula Leza.
Boonse bantu nibakamubona ulaya bweenda bakamutembaula Leza.
Nibakezhiba ati inguwe shikulomba lomba shipo welya wakaakukala ku mulyango waŋanda ya Leza utewa ati Mubotu, bantu bakazoowa cini cini ukuzhingwa kuli ceco cakamuciticila.
Inzho muntu wezo kaya bucilila ba Pita u Johani. Bantu boonse bakazoowa ukulukancila nkubaakubele ba Pita u Johani mwibetecelo lyakaakutewa ati ibetecelo lya Solomoni.
Pita abone bobo wakabaambila bantu ati, “Nubalombwana ba Izilaili, kaamboonzhi camuzoosha ceci? No nkaamboonzhi ncimutulanjilila, ukoya twasebezha insana shesu tubeni kwaamba wezu muntu ayende?

Leza wa Abulahamu u Aizeki u Jacobo, Leza waba shaakale besu, wapa bulemu musebezhi wakwe Jeso. Welya ngumwakaaba kuba shinkondonina, ulimwi ngumwakakaka kwa Pilato, nikuba kuti Pilato kazanda kumwaangulula.
Wezu Jeso kali muntu uusalala uululeme, pele umwe mwakamukaka u kwaambila Pilato ati amwaangululile muyazhi mu busena bwakwe.
Ubobo mwakamuyaya mukamwini bumi, pele Leza wakamubusha ku bafwu. Inzho uswe tuli bakamboni bakwe.
Ndizhina lya Jeso lyamuponya wezu muntu, kubulema bwakwe mbumwizhi kabotu, lushomo mwa Jeso ndulwapa muntu wezu ngumulanjilile kwaamba apone.
“Inzho bakwesu, ndizhi ati umwe u basololi benu mwakamucita bolya Jeso nkaambo mwaakwiina ncimwizhi.
Pele Leza wakacaamba kale mu bashinshimi boonse ati, Munanike wakwe ulyeelele kuya kupenga, ubobo wazuzucizha.
Inzho amusandukile kwa Leza kwaamba shibi shenu shimwayiwe, ulimwi shiindi shakubukulushiwa shizhize kuhwa kubushu bwa Leza.
Ulimwi kwaamba amutume Kilisito wezo ngumwakapewa inguwe Jeso.
Wezo ulyeelele kutambulwa kwizeulu mpaka cikashice ciindi Leza nakaacita shintu shoonse kuba shipiya, mbubona mbwaakakanana kale kale mu bashinshimi bakwe basalala.
Mozesi wakaamba ati, ‘Mwami Leza ulakatuma umwi munyokwenu kwaamba abe mushinshimi ukoya ume. Mukashiteelele shoonse nshaakaamushimwina.
Kufwumbwa wezo uutakaashiteeleli nshaakaamushimwina mushinshimi wezo ulakazandulwa kuhwa mubantu.’”
Bashinshimi boonse kukancila kwa Samuwele, kubika u babo bakacilila, bakaambilizha shamakani a mazuba ano.
Ubobo ndimwe bana ba bashinshimi ulimwi bana ba cihuminano ceco Leza ncaakapanga ubamaushenu. Wakaamba kwa Abulahamu, ati, “Kwiita mulunungu lwako ndakabalonjezha bantu boonse baanshi ano.”
Ubobo Leza wakasala Musebezhi wakwe ukumutuma kulyuumwe kutaanguna, kwaamba amulonjezhe u kwaamba ati umwi uumwi wenu asanduce kuhwa mubusofwaazhi bwenu.
Ciindi Pita u Johani nibakaakucaamba ku bantu, kwakeza bapaizhi u mukando wa balindizhi ba muŋanda ya Leza u ba Saduki.
Baba bantu bakalemana nkaambo Pita u Johani kabayiisha bantu ukukambauka ati Jeso wakabuka ku bafwu, calo citondezha ati bafwu boonse balakabuka.
Inzho bakabakwata, mbwaakaakuli mangolezha bakababika muntolongo kulindila ati butaangune buce.
Pele nikuba bobo, bantu banji banji bakateelela kukambauka kwa Pita u Johani bakashoma. Inzho mweelwe wabalombwana bakashoma wakakomena wakashika afwaafwi ushuulu shosanwe.
Nibwakaca basololi baba Juda ubakando ba cishi, u balembi bakabungana mu Jelusalemu.
Mumuswaangano wezo kamuli ba Anasi, wakaakuli ngu mupaizhi mukando u Kayafa u Johani ulimwi u Alekizanda kubicilizha ubamwi bakaakuli ba basazhiina mupaizhi mukando.
Bakazhimika batumwa babo ku bushu bwabo, bakakanka kubabuzha ati, “No wezu mulimo mwakoocita munsana nzhi na ndizhina lyaani ndimwakasebezha?”
Inzho Pita, mbwaakaakuzwile Moza Usalala, wakabaingula ati, “Umwe nubeendelezhi u nubakando babantu,
sa mulatubuzha makani a mulimo mubotu wakacitwa ku muntu wezu mulema, ulimwi u mbwaapona?

Inzho amuzhibe ceci, umwe antoomwi u bantu bamu Izilaili, wezu mulombwana ulizhimine ano ku bushu bwenu wakapona ukaambo kansana shezhina lya Jeso Kilisito wa Nazanleta. Wezo nguwena ngumwakakankamina a ciciinkano, pele Leza wakamubusha ku bafwu.
Jeso inguwe waambwa mu maŋwalu ati,
“‘Ibwe ndimwakakaka umwe nubazashi,
lyaba ndiibwe lya cooko ca ŋanda lizandika.’
“Inzho lufwutuko taluyanwa mu muntu uunji, nkaambo kwiina izhina linji ano anshi ndibapelwe bantu kwaamba libafwutule.”
Nibakabona kubula bukandu kwa Pita u Johani bakazoowa, kwaambisha nibakateelela ati kabali bantu bulyo bayina nibakaliiya pe. Ngoonaawo bakazhiba ati kabali ba shiciiya ba Jeso.
Cakabakacila kubakazha ba Pita u Johani nkaambo kabamubwenu muntu wezo ngubakaponya kazhimine ngubakaakubele.
Bakabaambila bulyo ati bamuhwe munkuta. Ngoonaawo babeteshi bakalihwiya.
Bakaamba ati, “No tubacite buti baba bantu? Nkaambo bantu boonse bakala mu Jelusalemu balizhi kabotu kwaamba aza maleele mbubakaacita, ulimwi tatukonzha kwaakaka pe.
Pele kwaamba impuwo ya makani aza itazuwa koonse koonse, atubakonge kwaamba kutabi muntu ngubakaambila shezhina lya Jeso.”
Bamane kulihwiya bakabeta ukubalailila ati, batabi nibaamba linji na kuyiisha mwizhina lya Jeso.
Pele Pita u Johani bakabaingula ati, “Umwe nubeni amusale na nciciliye cintu ciluleme ku bushu bwa Leza, kuteelela umwe na kuteelela Leza.
Uswe tatukonzha kuleka kushaamba shitu nshitwakateelela ukulibonena lwesu tubeni.”
Nibakamana kubweelela kubakonga bakabaleka baya. Cakabakacila kukosola cisubulo cakubapa nkaambo bantu boonse kabatembaula Leza ku cintu ceco cakacitika.
Nkaambo myaka ya muntu wezo ngubakaponya keebaala ku makumi one.
Nibakalekwa ba Pita u Johani bakabweela kubalongwaabo baya kubakananina ncibakabaambila bakando babapaizhi ubakando ba cishi.
Bashomi nibakateelela makani azo, bakakomba kwa Leza ati, Muninde Nameese, Chilenga wakalenga izeulu iinshi u lwaatele u shintu shoonse shili mu luundu!
Moza Usalala wakaamba kwiita mwa Taata Devidi musebezhi wako ati,
“Ncinzhi ncibalemanina bakunze?
Nkamboonzhi bantu ncibakanza shintu shabulyo?
Bami baanshi balibambila,
baleli baswaangana kwaamba
balwe u Mwami Leza, u Munanike wakwe.”
Bakabungana kucita shesho uwe nshiwakakanza kale nkwaamba shilaacitika munsana u mu luzando lwako.
Inzho Mwami bona bolya mbubatukonga, twalomba utupe insana tubasebezhi bako, twaambe makani ako cakutalitibauka.
Tandabika itashi lyako kwaamba ubaponye bantu ulimwi upe kwaamba maleele u shitondezho shizoosha acitwe mwizhina lya Jeso musebezhi wako uusalala.”
Inzho nibakamana kukomba, abusena awo ngubakaakubungene akazungaana. Boonse bakenjilwa Moza Usalala, ngoonaawo bakakanka kwaamba mazwi a Leza cakutalitibauka.
Insana inkando sha Leza shakabasololela batumwa, bakapa bumboni bwa kubuka kwa Mwami Jeso ku bafwu, ulimwi luse lukando lwakabaselucila.
Kakwiina muntu akati kabo wakaakupenga cintu. Babo bakaakukwete myuunda naaba maanda, bakauzha ukuleta mali ngubaakuyana.
Azo mali kapewa ku batumwa, abo bakaakwaabanya akati ka bantu kwiingaina iipenzhi lya muntu umwi uumwi.
Inzho kakuli muntu umwi wakaakutewa ati Jozefu wa luhubo lwa Levi wakazhalilwa ku cishi ca Saipulasi, wezo ngubakaulika batumwa ati Banabasi, nkukwaamba ati Shikuzumya zumya.
Aze mbubona bobo wakauzha muunda ngwaakaakukwete amane waleta mali ku batumwa.
Inzho muntu umwi wakaakutewa ati Ananiyasi u mwinakwe Safila, abo bakauzha lubono lumwi ndubakaakukwete.
Bakapangana u mwinakwe kwaamba bashiye mali amwi ngubakauzha lubono lwabo, u kutola amwi ku batumwa.
Pele, Pita wakaamba ati, “Ananiyasi, no nkaambonzhi wahumizha Shaatani kweendelezha monzo wako, kwaamba ucenge Moza Usalala, niwaseseka cipanzha cimwi ca mali nguwakayana niwakauzha lubono lwako?
Sa niwataakuna kuluuzha lubono lolu kalutali lwako? U ciindi niwakaluuzha, sa mali kaatali ako? No kayi wakatelaika buti mu monzo wako kucita cintu cili bolya? Wiina kucenga bantu, wacenga Leza!”
Ngoonaawo Ananiyasi naakateelela mazwi aza wakawa anshi wafwa lufwu lwakwaanzuka. Inzho boonse bakateelela cakacitika bakatiya cini cini.
Ngoonaawo kwakeza bakubushi booputa mu masani mutunta waka Ananiyasi baya kuuzhika.
Nikwakaita ciindi ca mawoola ali otatwe muka shikwaahwa Ananiyasi, wakeza kunjila mubakaakubele batumwa, pele katezhi cakacitika.
Pita wakamubuzha ati, “Nshimwina baama, sa wezu ngumweelwe wa mali oonse ngumwakayana nimwakauzha lubono lwenu umulumyaako?”
Wakaingula ati, “Ee inguwe.”

Ngoonaawo Pita wakamubuzha ati, “No kaamboonzhi uwe u mulumyaako mwateelezhanya kwaamba musukushe Moza wa Mwami? Wababona bantu baakwiile kuzhika mulumyaako mbubaba amulyango, inzho balakubweza aze bakakuzhike.”
Aciindi ngoonaawo wakawa anshi kumatende aka Pita, wafwa. Inzho bakubushi babo nibakenjila bakayana kwaamba mukaintu aze ulifwile. Bakamubweza baya kumuzhika kumabali u mulumyaakwe.
Ubobo imbungano yoonse u bantu bamwi bakaateelela makani aza bakatiya cini cini.
Batumwa bakacita maleele manji manji ushitondezho shizoosha akati ka bantu. Boonse bashomi kababungana antoomwi mwibetecelo litewa ati lya Solomoni.
Kwiina uunji wakasoleka kubasangana watakaakuli mushomi, Pele bantu bamwi bakaakubatembaula.
Nikuba bobo bantu banji banji balombwana u bakaintu bakaakuzunjilwa ku Mwami.
Ubobo bantu bakaakuleta balwazhi banji banji ukubooneka kumbali kunzhila amalo abo, kwaamba Pita ayita cinhule cakwe cibakutuzhe bapone.
Bantu banji banji bakashika kuhwa mu minzhi ilanjene u Jelusalemu. Bakaleta balwazhi babo u babo baakunjililwe myoza mibiyabi, inzho boonse bakapona.
Inzho mupaizhi mukando u babo mbakaakuli abo bamunkamu yaba Saduki bakafwa munyono.
Bakabaanga batumwa u kubabika muntolongo ya buleya.
Pele mashiku anjelo wa Leza wakeza kuyalula milyango ya ntolongo wabakusha batumwa u kubaambila ati,
“Kamuya muŋanda ya Leza, mukaambile bantu boonse sha bumi bobu bupiya.”
Batumwa bakaateelela malailile aza. Kumancela bakenjila muŋanda ya Leza u kukanka kuyiisha.
Inzho mukando wa bapaizhi u balongwaakwe nibakashika, bakoompolola bakando bakando baba Juda kumuswaangano mukando. Ulimwi bakatuma kuntolongo kwaamba batumwa baletwe nkubabele.
Babo bakatumwa nibakashika bakayana ati batumwa tabemo muntolongo. Bakapiluka kunkuta u kuya kubulana ati,

“Nitwashika kuntolongo twayana kwaamba milyango yoonse iliyalilwe ulimwi iliinjilwe kabotu kabotu, ubalindizhi twabayana ngubali a milyango. Pele nitwayalula milyango, twayana mukati mwiina muntu ulimo.”
Inzho mukando wa balindizhi ba ŋanda ya Leza u bapaizhi bakando nibakateelela bobo bakazhingwa kwaamba ncinzhi cacitika ku batumwa.
Ngoonaawo umwi muntu wakashika wabaambila ati, “Amuteelele! Balya balombwana mbumwakaakubikile muntolongo bali muŋanda ya Leza, balayiisha bantu!”
Ubobo mukando wa balindizhi ba muŋanda ya Leza wakaya u bantu bakwe kuya kuleta batumwa. Pele bayina kusebezha insana, nkaambo bakatiya kwaamba bantu balaba nibabauma mabwe.
Bakabaleta batumwa kunkuta. Inzho mupaizhi mukando wakabaambila ati,

“Umwe twakamulailila kwaamba mutayiisha linji mwizhina lya muntu wezu. Pele inzho amubone mbumwacita! Impuwo yakuyiisha kwenu yazuwa moonse mu Jelusalemu. Mulazanda kubika bulowa bwa muntu wezu a mitwi yesu!”
Ngoonaawo Pita u batumwa bamwi bakaingula ati, “Tulyeelele kuteelela Leza kubaala bantu!”
“Leza wabatatesu uwakabusha Jeso ku bafwu, wezo ngumwakayaya nimwakamukankamina aciciinkano.
Pele Leza wakamusumpula ukumukalika abusena bwa bulemu, ati abe Musololi u Mufwutuli, kwaamba bantu ba Izilaili basanduke u kutambula lulecelelo lwa shibi shabo.
Uswe tuli bakamboni ba shintu sheshi antoomwi u Moza Usalala, wezo Leza ngwaakapa babo boonse bamuteelela.”
Babeteshi nibakateelela makani aza, bakalemana cini cini cakuti kabazanda kubayaya batumwa.
Pele umwi wabo mu Falisi utewa ati Gamaliyeli, mwiiyi wa Mulawo, kali muntu wakaakulemekwa cini cini u bantu boonse, wakazhima munkuta walailila ati batumwa botatwe babo baye ansengwe.
Ngoonaawo wakaambila babeteshinina ati, “Nubana Izilailima atucenjele kuli ceco ncituzanda kucita ku bantu baba,

Amuzhibaluke kwaamba mazuba akamana, kakuli muntu umwi wakaakutewa ati Tiyudasi. Wakakanka kulyeensheensha kuba muntu utiiwa, ulimwi kakwete balombwana baakumucilila bashika ku myaanda yone, pele nakayayiwa, boonse bakaakumucilila bakamwaala u milimo yakwe yakamana.
Munshi kwakeza Judasi waku Galilaya ku ciindi ca kubalwa kwa bantu, aze mbubona wakakwela bantu banji banji bakaakumucilila. Pele aze wakayayiwa, bakaakumucilila bakamwaala.
Inzho ku makani aza ngutukwete bwasunu, ndamushimwina ati kutabi cintu ncimucita ku bantu baba, Amubaleke bulyo. Nkaambo aakuli mulimo wabo wezu wakacitwa u bantu, mulabona kwaamba toohwililila.
Pele na kuti ulahwa kwa Leza tamukonzha kubazunda pe, mulayana kwaamba mulalwa u Leza!”
Babeteshi boonse bakacilila malailile mana Gamaliyeli.
Nibakamana kubandika bakabeta batumwa kwaamba banjile mukati, bamane bakabazupaula tulusu ukubalailila ulimwi kwaamba tabeelele kuyiisha mwizhina lya Jeso, ngoonaawo bakabaleka.
Batumwa bakahwa munkuta balibotelelwe cini cini nkaambo balo cakababela cibotu kupenzhewa ukaambo kezhina lya Jeso.
Buzuba u buzuba kabayiisha u kukambauka Makani Mabotu muŋanda ya Leza u mumaanda abo, balaamba ati Jeso ngu Munanike wa Leza.

Mu mazuba azo ciindi bashomi nibaakuya buhula ku mweelwe, kwakaba matongaushi akati kaba Juda bakakwaamba ci Heleni u babo bakaakwaamba ci Juda, nkaambo bamuka bafwu babo, kabatabakwati kabotu muciindi cakwaabanya shipo shabuzuba u buzuba.
Ubobo batumwa bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile bakaswaanganya inkamu yoonse ya bashomi u kubaambila ati, “Taciluleme kwaamba uswe tucileke kukambauka mazwi a Leza tuukukwete kwaabanya shakulya.
Inzho nubakwesu amusale balombwana bali ciloba akati kenu, mbumwizhi kwaamba balizwile Moza u busongo, kwaamba bapewe mulimo wezu.
Pele uswe lwesu tulalyaaba kumulimo wa kukomba u kukambauka.”

Inzho inkamu yoonse yakabotelwa ku makani aza, ngoonaawo bakasala Sitivini mulombwana wakaakuzwile lushomo u Moza Usalala, u Filipo, u Polokolasi u Nikana, u Timoni, u Pamenasi u Nikolasi waku Antiyoki, wezo wakasanduka kale kuba mu Juda katana kuba mushomi.
Baba balombwana bakaletwa ku batumwa. Batumwa bakabakombela ukubaampa matashi.
Inzho Mazwi a Leza akazuwa koonse koonse, u mweelwe wabashomi wakaakuya buhula mu Jelusalemu. Bapaizhi banji banji bakashoma.
Inzho Sitivini kazwile luse iinsana sha Leza. Kacita maleele ushitondezho sha nsana akati ka bantu.

Pele nikuba bobo bamwi bantu bakaakumukazha, kwaambisha babo bankamu ya cikombelo caba Juda cakaakutewa ati ca Bantu Baangulule. Baba kabali ba Juda bahwa ku Sailini uku Alekizandiliya, ulimwi kakuli bamwi bakaakuhwa kumashi a Siliya u Ezha. Baba bantu bakakanka kukazhanya u Sitivini
Moza wa Leza wakamupa busongo bunji bunji Sitivini, cakuti kabatakonzha kuzhima ku busongo u Moza ngwaakaakwaambya.
Ubobo bakalya makulo u bantu bamwi kwaamba bamulenjelele twaambo Sitivini twakuti, “Twakamuteelela ulaamba makani aakusampaula Mozesi u Leza!”
Mukucita bobo bakaleta lupyopyongano akati ka bantu, bakando bakando ba cishi, u balembi. Ngoonaawo bakamukwata Sitivini u kumutola kunkuta.
Bakaleta bakamboni babeshi bakaamba ati, “Wezu muntu lyoonse ulaamba makani aakusampaula iŋanda ya Leza iisalala u Mulawo.
Nkaambo twakamuteelela ulaamba ati, Jeso waku Nazanleta ulakeumbulula iŋanda ya Leza, ukusandula shiyanza nshaakatupa Mozesi!”
Inzho boonse babo bakaakuli munkuta bakamutongomwena Sitivini, bakabona bushu bwakwe bwaba ukoya bushu bwa anjelo.
Inzho mupaizhi mukando wakamubuzha Sitivini ati, “Sa twaambo totu ntwini twini?”
Wakamwaambila ati, ‘Ushiye mukwashi wako u cishi cako, uye ku cishi ncinkaakutondezha.’
Ngoonaawo Abulahamu wakacishiya cishi ca Caludiya, waya kukala ku Halani. Afwe bulyo ushi, Leza wakamukusha ukumuleta mucishi ceno ncimushite ninzho.
Leza wiina kumupa inshi niiceya kwaamba lube lukono lwakwe. Pele waamushomezha ati walo, u luhubo lwakwe, balakakona inshi yezhi, nikuba kwaamba ati ku ciindi ceco Abulahamu kaina mwana pe.
Leza wakamwaambila ati, ‘Baluhubo lwako balakakala mucishi ca bantu banji, babo bakaabacita buzhice, ukubapenzhewa kwa myaka iili myaanda yone.’
Ulimwi Leza wakaamba ati, ‘Ndakabapa cibebyo bantu babo mbubakaasebezela milimo.’ Kuhwaawo, balakamuhwa mucishi ceco balakampaila mu busena bono.

Inzho Leza ulakabapa ciyanza ca kupalulwa kwaamba cibe citondezho ca cihuminano. Ubobo Abulahamu wakamupalula Aizeki naakaba u mazuba ali lusele kuhwa kukuzhalwa. Aizeki wakazhala Jakobo, Jakobo wakazhala bana bali ikumi ubatwesha bobile, babo balo mbubashaakale besu.
wakamufwutula mu mapenzhi akwe oonse ulimwi wakamuyohwa Jozefu ciindi naakalibonya ku bushu bwa Falawo mwami wa Ijipiti. Ubobo Falawo wakamubika Jozefu a bweendelezhi bwa cishi u bwa ŋanda yakwe.
Inzho kwakaba inzala mu cishi ca Ijipiti u Kenani, inzala yezho yakaleta mapenzhi manji manji ku bantu. Ba shaakale besu kabatakonzha kuyana cakulya.
Jakobo naakateelela ati ku Ijipiti kuli cakulya, wakatuma banakwe ku Ijipiti mulweendo lwabo lutaanzhi.
Mulweendo lwabo lwabili, Jozefu wakalipandulula ku banina, ulimwi wakamuzhibya Falawo shabanina.
Jozefu wakatuma kwa ushi kwaamba azhize ku Ijipiti antoomwi ubanakwe. Ku ciindi ceco Jakobo kakwete bantu bashika ku makumi ali ciloba ubatwesha bosanwe.
Inzho Jakobo wakaya ku Ijipiti koko nkwaakaya kufwila walo u ba shaakale besu.
Mitunta yabo yakatolwa ku Shekemu nkuyakazhikwa mu shuumbwe nshaakaula Abulahamu u mali kuhwa ku banakwe Hama.
Ku ciindi ceco kwakalela mwami unji mu Ijipiti wataakumwizhi Jozefu.
Wezo mwami wakasebezha lucengo u kupenzha bantu besu. Kashinicizha ba matumbu kusowa twana tutece kwaamba tufwe.
Ceco nciciindi Mozesi naakazhalwa. Kali mwana mubotu cini cini. Wakakala ukulelwa u bayina muŋanda ya ushi kwa mwezhi yotatwe.
Naakakushiwa muŋanda, mwanakwe Falawo mukaintu wakamubweza wayakumulela ukoya mwanakwe wakulizhalila.
Ubobo Mozesi wakayiya busongo bwa bantu bamu Ijipiti cakubumaninina. Milimo yakwe u mazwi akwe kakwete insana.
Inzho naakabona umwi wabo ulapenzhewa kumuna Ijipiti, wakamuyohwa muna Izilaili nina, wakayaya muna Ijipiti wezo.
Walo wakatelaika ati mukucita bobo banina balazhiba ati ngu Leza wamusebezha kwaamba abafwutule. Pele bayina nibakazhiba.
Nibwakaca Mozesi wakabona ba Izilaili bobile balalwa beni ubeni. Mu kuzanda kubahuna wakabaambila ati, ‘Akaka bakwesu, no ncinzhi ncimulwila nubantu bamukowa?’
Wezo shikukanka mweenzhiina wakeza wamutonka Mozesi, wamwaambila ati, ‘No nguni wakakubika kwaamba ube muleli umubeteshi akati kesu?
Sa ulazanda kunjaya bolya mbuwakayaya muna Ijipiti welya zona?’
Ateelele bobo Mozesi, wakalukancila ku Midiyani, nkwaakaya kukala u kuzhala bana bobile balombwana.
Mozesi wakazoowa naakabona ceci, inzho wakaswena afwaafwi ku cihuna kwaamba aboneshe. Ngoonaawo wakateelela izwi lya Mwami lyaamba ati,
‘Ndime Leza waba shaakale benu, ba Abulahamu u Aizeki u Jakobo.’ Mozesi wakazhangama wakatiya, wiina nakasola kulanga ko.
Ngoonaawo Mwami wakamwaambila ati, ‘Samununa impato shako, nkaambo awo nguuzhimine ngaabusena busalala.
Cini cini ndalanga, ndaabona mapenzhi ngubapenga bantu bangu mu Ijipiti. Ndateelela kutongauka kwabo, inzho ndeza kwaamba mbahune, ndazanda nkutume ubweele ku Ijipiti.’
Mozesi wakabasololela bantu kuhwa mu Ijipiti. Kacita maleele u shitondezho shizoosha mu Ijipiti u lwaatele Lusubila, u mulukula kwa myaka iili makumi one.
Mozesi nguwakaambila ba Izilaili ati, ‘Leza ulakatuma mushinshimi kuhwa akati ka banyokwenu uuli ukoya ume.’
Mozesi kali antoomwi ubazhali besu ba Izilaili, nibakaakubungene mulukula u anjelo ngubakaamba aze alupili lwa Sinai u ba shaakale besu, ukutambula mazwi a bumi u kwaatambika kuli uswe.
“Pele ba shaakale besu bakakaka, bayina kumuteelela, u myonzo yabo keezandisha kupiluka ku Ijipiti.
Bakaambila Aloni ati, ‘Tupanjile baleza bati batusololele, nkaambo tatwizhi camucitikila Mozesi wezo wakatukusha ku Ijipiti.’
Ceco nciciindi ncibakabumba cibumbwa ca moombe, bakacipa impaizho yakucilemeka, u kutangalila milimo ya matashi abo.
Ubobo Leza wakabafwutamina wabashiya mu shibi shakukomba shintu sha kwizeulu. Mbubona mbukulembelwe mwibuka lya bashinshimi ati,
“Umwe nubana Izilaili! Sa takulikwangu
nkumwakaleta mulumbo wa banyama mbumwakayaya
ku myaka iili makumi one mulukula?
Mwakakomba Molaci leza wa kupanga iintongwezhi ya leza wenu Lefani. Shesho kashili shibumbwa nshimwakapanga kwaamba muukushipaila.
Ubobo ndakamutandila kulaale kubaala cishi ca Babiloni.
Abo ba matata umbona bakalileta antoomwi u Joshiwa naakabatola kuya kukona cishi ca mishobo yezho Leza njakatanda. Bakakala alyo mpaka kushicila ciindi ca mwami Devidi.
Leza wakamufwila luse Devidi. Devidi wakamukumbila Leza kwaamba amuhumizhe kwaamba ayane busena bwa kuzaka iŋanda iikaba ya Leza ngwaakaakukomba Jakobo.
Pele Solomoni nguwamuzakila iŋanda yezho Leza.
“Nikuba ati Namakungwe mutalabala takala mu maanda aazakwa u bantu, ukoya mbwakaamba mushinshimi ati,
inshi ncicilyatilo ca maulu angu.
No mulanzacila iŋanda, iili buti?
No mbulikwi busena bwangu bwakulyoocezhezha?
Sa taali matashi angu aakalenga shintu shoonse?’
Sa kuli mushinshimi naaba womwi ngubatakapenzha ba shaakale benu? U babo bakashinshima kwiza kwa Musalazhi wa Leza bakabayaya. Amwe ninzho mwamwaaba u kumuyaya.
Umwe numwakatambula Milawo ya Leza yakaletwa anshi ano u baanjelo, pele mwiina nimwakeecilila pe.”
Inzho nibakateelela makani ngakaamba Sitivini bakeenduka, bakakanka kuceka meno ca bukali.
Pele Moza Usalala wakamunjila Sitivini, ngoonaawo wakalyaalala kwizeulu u kubona bulemu bwa Leza u Jeso ulizhimine kwitashi lya cilyo lya Leza.
Ngoonaawo wakaamba ati, “Amubone! Ndalibona izeulu lyayaluka, u Mwanaa Muntu ulizhimine kwitashi lya cilyo lya Leza!”
Bantu bakaashinka matwi abo ukupozomoka iizwi ikando, boonse bakakulumucila kwa Sitivini.
Bakamukusha ansengwe lya munzhi bamuuma mabwe. Bakamboni bakapasaula shikobelo shabo bamane bakabika ku maulu a mulombwana utewa ati Saulu kwaamba abakwatile.
Nibakaakumuuma mabwe, Sitivini wakakomba ati, “Mwami Jeso tambula moza wangu!”
Wakafwukama anshi wapozomoka ati, “Mwami utabapi mulandu wa cibi ceci!” Amane kwaamba bobo, wakafwa.
Aze Saulu wakahumina kwaamba cabakabotu kumuyaya.

Bobo mbubona buzuba, imbungano yaba Kilisito yamu Jelusalemu yakakanka kupenzhewa cini cini. Ubobo bashomi boonse bakalukanka bamwaala kuya mu masena oonse a Judiya u Samaliya. Mu Jelusalemu kwakashaala bulyo batumwa.
Balombwana bamwi bashomi bakamuzhika Sitivini, ulimwi bakamulila cini cini.
Pele Saulu wakasoleka kwaamba akwate bashomi u kuyaya imbungano. Kaya iŋanda iiŋanda kuya bukwata bashomi balombwana u bakaintu u kubabika muntolongo.
Inzho babo bakamwaala bakaya insamwailila mucishi coonse kuya bukambauka Makani Mubotu.
Filipo wakaya ku munzhi mukando waku Samaliya, kuya kukambauka makani a Munanike wa Leza ku bantu ba mucishi.
Bantu banji banji nibakateelela makani ngakaamba Filipo, u kubona maleele ngaakacita bakashoma.
Myoza mibiyabi yakaakuhwa mubantu banji banji, keelila ca kupozomoka, ulimwi bantu banji banji balema ubakakupuutile mibili bakapona.
Ubobo mu munzhi momo mwakaba lutangalo lukando cini cini.
Inzho mu munzhi wezo kamuhwa mulombwana umwi wakaakutewa ati Saimoni. Kali shimabibo wakaakuzoosha bantu mu Samaliya, nkaambo kalitembaula ati kali mulombwana mwini mwini.

Ulimwi bantu boonse ba mu munzhi wezo, balemekwa u bantu bulyo kabamulumbaizha u kumupa bulemu, ulimwi kabamushoma. Ubobo kabamutembaula ati, “Wezu muntu ulikwete insana sha Leza uutewa ati, ‘Leza Mukando’ ”
Saimoni wakaakubazoosha bantu umabibo akwe, cakuti abo bantu bakakanka kumuteelela.
Ciindi Filipo naakakambauka Makani Mabotu, ukukanana sha bwami bwa Leza usha Jeso Kilisito, bantu banji banji bakaintu u balombwana bakashoma u kupapatizwa.
Aze Saimoni wakashoma, naakamana kupapatizwa wakakala antoomwi u Filipo. Inzho cakamuzoosha naakabona maleele u shitondezho nshaakaakucita Filipo.
Batumwa bakaakuli mu Jelusalemu bakateelela ati abo bantu bamu Samaliya batambula mazwi a Leza. Ngoonaawo bakatumako Pita u Johani.
Inzho nibakashika koko, bakaya kukombela bashomi kwaamba batambule Moza Usalala.
Nkaambo Moza Usalala kootana kushika a muntu naaba womwi wabo, nikuba kwaamba ati bakapapatizwa mwizhina lya Mwami Jeso.
Ba Pita u Johani bakaampa matashi abo a bashomi, ngoonaawo bakatambula Moza Usalala.
Inzho Saimoni welya wakaakuli shimabibo, naakabona kwaamba Moza wapewa ku bantu babo bakaampwa matashi ku batumwa, wakazanda kupa mali ba Pita u Johani.
Wakabaambila ati, “Amumpe insana sheshi kwaamba ame ndukucita ati kufwumbwa muntu ngundaampa matashi watambula Moza Usalala.”
Pele Pita wakamwiingula ati, “Kufwa bulyo u mali ako! Uwe ulatelaika ati cipo ca Leza cilaulwa u mali!
Wiina busena niciba caabilo mu mulimo wesu, nkaambo monzo wako tooluleme ku bushu bwa Leza.
Ulyeelele kusanduka ku cibi ceci ncuutelaika. Ukombe ku Mwami kwaamba akulekelele kumizeezo iili mumonzo wako.
Nkaambo ndabona kwaamba uli muntu uuzwile indulwe ya munyono, uli mwaanje ku cibi.”
Inzho Saimoni wakaambila Pita ati, “Ndalomba bakwesu, amunkombele ku Mwami kwaamba kutabi cintu niciba comwi cincitikila ku makani aza ngumwaŋambila.”
Ba Pita u Johani nibakamana kupa bumboni u kwaamba mazwi a Mwami bakabweela ku Jelusalemu. Nibakaakuya bakaita mu minzhi minji minji ya mucishi ca Samaliya kabaya bukambauka Makani Mabotu.
Inzho anjelo wa Mwami Leza wakaambila Filipo ati, “Zhimuka u kuya kumukwakwa uli kucibizhi, uyita mulukula kuhwa ku Jelusalemu kuya ku Gaza.”

Ubobo Filipo wakazhimuka waya, wakayana mulombwana waku Isiyopiya muzhibe, wakaakuli muntu mulemu. Wezu muntu kapelwe insana shakubamba lubono lwa Kandasi mwami mukaintu wa cishi ca Isiyopiya. Wakahwa ku Jelusalemu kupaila Leza, kaya ku munzhi kwakwe mucikoci.
Kaya bubala cakupozha mwibuka lya mushinshimi Aizaya.
Ngoonaawo Moza Usalala wakaambila Filipo ati, “Koya afwaafwi u cikoci celya.”
Filipo naakaswena afwaafwi, wakamuteelela muntu wezo ulabala mwibuka lya mushinshimi Aizaya. Ngoonaawo wakamubuzha ati, “Sa uliteelele ncaamba makani azo nguubala?”
Wezo muntu waku Isiyopiya wakaingula ati, “Pe pe, nshaateelele, cita kuti kwaba muntu uumpandululila.” Ngoonaawo Filipo wamukumbila ati ndakumbila ndize mucikoci tubambane.
Makani a cibalo ncaakaakuya bubala muna Isiyopiya wezo ngaaza,
“Kali ukoya imbelele iiya kuyayiwa.
Kali ukoya mwanaa mbelele utalila nashizwa boza.
Ubobo wiina naakayalula mulomo wakwe.
Wakalibonzha ulimwi wiina naakabetekwa bweelele.
Kwiina ukakaamba shaluhwubo lwakwe anshi ano, nkaambo bumi bwakwe bwabwezwa kuhwa anshi.”
Ngoonaawo muna Isiyopiya wakamwita Filipo ati, “Mpandululila, no wezu mushinshimi waambani ku makani aza, sa ulalyaamba lwakwe mwini na ulaamba muntu unji?”
Inzho Filipo wakayalula mulomo wakwe, kukancila makani a cibalo ceco ncicona, wakamwaambila shamakani Mabotu a Jeso.
Nibakakuya bweenda mumukwakwa, bakashika kubusena bwakaakukwete meenzhi. Ngoonaawo muna Isiyopiya wakaamba ati, “Amubone ngaaza meenzhi. No cinzhi cinkasha kupapatizwa?”
Filipo wakaingula ati, “Ulakonzha kupapatizwa na washoma u monzo wako oonse.”
Ubobo muna Isiyopiya wezo wakaamba ati, “Ee, ndashoma ati Jeso Kilisito ngu Mwanaa Leza.”
Muna Isiyopiya wakanzhimika cikoci cakwe, inzho boonse bobile bakanjila mu meenzhi, ngoonaawo Filipo wakamupapatiza.
Nibakahwa mu meenzhi, Moza wa Mwami Leza wakamutola Filipo. Muna Isiyopiya wina linji nakamubona Filipo. Muna Isiyopiya wakaya mu mushinzo wakwe ca lutangalo.
Ngoonaawo Filipo wakaliyana ku munzhi wa Azotusi. Koko kaya bukambauka Makani Mabotu mu minzhi mpaka wakashika ku Sizaliya.
Ku ciindi ceco Saulu kapenzha ba shiciiya ba Mwami ukukanza kubayaya. Wakaya ku mupaizhi mukando,

wakalomba maŋwalu aamuhumizha kwaamba ati aye ku shikombelo shaba Juda shili mu Damasikasi. Kakanzile kwaamba ati na ulayana ba shiciiya ba Mwami Jeso munzhila abakwate ukubaanga boonse, balombwana u bakaintu, abalete ku Jelusalemu.
Inzho naakashika afwaafwi u munzhi wa Damasikasi, mumuni uhwa kwizeulu wakamumwekela.
Ngoonaawo wakawa anshi, wakateelela izwi lyaamba ati, “Saulu, Saulu! Ncinzhi ncumpenzhenzha?”
Saulu wakabuzha ati, “Anu ndiweni Mwami?”
Ulimwi wakamwaambila ati, “Ndime Jeso wezo ngupenzha.
Pele zhimuka, njila mu munzhi molya, ulimwi ulakaambilwa shoonse nshuyelele kucita.”
Balombwana mbucakaakuli u Saulu, bakazhingwa, bakabula ucakwaamba. Abo izwi bakaliteelela, pele kwiina muntu ngubakabona.
Saulu wakazhimuka, wakasoleka kuyalula menso, pele katakonzha kubona pe. Ubobo beenzhiina bakamukwatilila kwitashi bakamunjizha mu munzhi wa Damasikasi.
Kwakaita mazuba otatwe kataboni pe, ulimwi wiina nakalya u kunwa.

Mu munzhi wa Damasikasi, kamukala mulombwana wakakutewa ati Ananiyasi, kali shiciiya waka Jeso. Mwami wakamwaambila Ananiyasi mu cilengaano, ulimwi wakateelela Mwami Leza wamwaambila ati, “Ananiyasi!”
Wakaingula ati, “Ndime ano Mwami.”
Ngoonaawo Mwami wakamwita ati, “Zhimuka uye kumukwakwa utewa ati, ‘Mukwakwa Usuumene.’ Wakashika kuŋanda yaka Judasi, ukabuzhe muntu uhwa ku Tasasi utewa ati Saulu. Muntu wezo ulakomba.
Ubobo mucilengaano wakabona mulombwana utewa ati Ananiyasi ulenjila muŋanda uku mwampa matashi kwaamba ati amubonye ulimwi.”
Ananiyasi wakamwiingula ati, “Mwami, bantu banji banji bakanshimwina makani a muntu wezu, u shintu shinji shinji shakacitwa ku bantu bako bamu Jelusalemu.
Inzho nguwezu weza kono ku Damasikasi iinsana nshakapewa u bapaizhi bakando kwaamba azhize akwate babo boonse boompolola izhina lyako.”
Pele Mwami wakamwita ati, “Koya bulyo, nkaambo wezo muntu ncisebezho cangu cisale cakutola izhina lyangu ku bantu bakunze, uku bami, uku bantu ba Izilaili.
Ulimwi ume ndimwini ndakamutondezha shintu shoonse mbuli mbwayelele kupenga ukaambo kangu.”

Ubobo Ananiyasi wakaya wakanjila muŋanda, wakamwampa matashi Saulu, wakaamba ati, “Saulu mukwesu, Mwami wantuma, Jeso mwini lwakwe, wezo nguwakabona munzhila niwakakwiza kono. Wantuma ati uwe ubone, ulimwi uzuzhiwe Moza Usalala.”
Ngoonaawo kwakahwa shintu shili ukoya maamba answi mu menso aka Saulu, ubobo wakakonzha kubona ulimwi. Wakazhima, wapapatizwa.
Inzho nakamana kulya, wakakwata insana ulimwi.
Saulu wakakala mazuba ali mbwaabele u bashomi bamu Damasikasi.
Amane wakenjila mu shikombelo shaba Juda wakanka kukambauka makani a Jeso. Wakaakwaamba ati, “Jeso inguwe Mwanaa Leza.”
Boonse bakamuteelela bakazhingwa u kubuzha ati, “Sa wezu ingwe mulombwana wakaakuyaya bashomi mu Jelusalemu? Sa tezhile kukwata bashomi ukubatola ku bapaizhi bakando?”
Pele bukambaushi bwa Saulu kabukwete insana cini cini, ulimwi u bumboni bwakwe bwakuti, Jeso ngu Munanike wa Leza kabulamika. Uba Juda bakaakukala mu Damasikasi bakazoowa, kabatakonzha kumwiingula.
Pele Saulu wakaazhiba makanze abo aza mabiyabi. Babo bantu kabalindila muunza u mashiku kwaamba bamubona bamuyaye.
Inzho bumwi buzuba mashiku ba shiciiya baka Saulu bakamubika mucinzuma cikando ncibakaisha acipulo ca bwaanda, bakaciselemuna anshi uloozhi.
Saulu naakaya ku Jelusalemu wakasoleka kwaamba asangane u bashomi, pele balo kwiina nibakuhumina kwaamba ati aze mushomi nokwabo, ulimwi kabamutiya.

Inzho mulombwana umwi wakaakutewa ati Banabasi wakamutola Saulu ku batumwa. Wakabapandululila mbuli Saulu mbwakabona Mwami mumukwakwa, u Mwami mbwaakamwaambila. Ulimwi wakabapandululila mbuli Saulu mbwaakakambauka ciinu inu mwizhina lya Jeso ku Damasikasi.
Inzho saulu wakakala abo u kuya bweendeenda mu Jelusalemu moonse ulaya bukambauka mwizhina lya Mwami cakutatiya.
Wakabandika ulimwi wakazumanicizhanya u bama Juda bakaakwaamba ci Giliki, pele balo kabazanda kumuyaya.
Inzho ba bunina nibakezhiba bobo, bakamubweza Saulu bamutola ku Sizaliya bamane bamutuma ku Tasasi.

Ku ciindi ceco imbungano ya bashomi mu masena oonse a Judiya, u Galilaya u Samaliya keeli muluumuno, ulimwi keeya buzakwa. Ulimwi yakaakweenda ca kutiya Mwami, ulimwi mukuyohwewa u Moza Usalala, yakakomena.
Pita wakeendeenda mu minzhi minji minji, wakaswaya u bashomi bakaakukala ku Lida.
Koko nkwakayana mulombwana wakaakutewa ati Eneyasi, wakaakuli mulema ulimwi katacilozha kubuka abulo kwa myaka iili lusele.
Pita wakaambila Eneyasi ati, “Jeso Kilisito ulakuponya Zhimuka hunga kasasa kako.” Ngoonaawo Eneyasi wakazhimuka.
Bantu boonse bakaakukala mu Lida uku Shalo nibakamubona Eneyasi bakacindulucila ku Mwami.
Mu munzhi wa Jopa kamuli mukaintu wakaakutewa ati Tabita. Muci Giliki katewa ati Dokasi. Mukaintu wezu wakapa ciindi cakwe coonse kumulimo wakucita shibotu ukuyohwa bantu bapushi.
Ncicona ciindi ceco wakasata u kufwa. Mubili wakwe bakoosanzha ukuuwoneka muŋanda ya mwizeulu.
Munzhi wa Jopa kootali kulaale u munzhi wa Lida, ubobo bashomi bamu Jopa bakateelela ati Pita kali ku Lida, bakamutumina balombwana bobile u makani aakuti, “Twakulomba fwambaana kwiza kono.”

Ubobo Pita wakalibambila amane wakayaabo. Naakashika koko bakamutola muŋanda ya mwizeulu, bamuka bafwu boonse babo mbaakaakuyohwa Dokasi, bakeza kumubunganina Pita, balalila ukutondezha shisani u shikobelo nshaakaluka Dokasi nakaakucipona.
Inzho Pita wakabalomba kwaamba bahwe ansengwe. Ngoonaawo wakafwukama u kukomba. Amane wacindulucila kumutunta waamba ati, “Tabita buka!” Ngoonaawo Tabita wakalanga, abone Pita wakabuka wakala.
Pita wakatambika itashi lyakwe wamukwata Tabita kwitashi wamuzhimika. Amane wakoompolola boonse bashomi u bamuka bafwu, wamutambika bulanga nkubabele.
Impuwo ya makani aza yakazuwa moonse mu Jopa ubobo bantu banji banji bakashoma mu Mwami.
Pita wakakala mazuba manji manji mu Jopa, kabaalile kwa Saimoni shikusuka masalu.
Mucishi ca Sizaliya kamuli muntu umwi wakaakutewa ati Koneliyasi, nguwakaakuli mukando wa bashikalumamba Baciloma bakaakutewa ati bashilikani baku Itali.
Wezu muntu u mukwashi wakwe woonse kabakomba Leza. Kayohwa cini cini ba Juda bakaakuli bapushi, ulimwi coonse ciindi kakomba Leza.
Bumwi buzuba ciindi ca malyakumbo wakabona cilengaano. Mucilengaano momo wakabona anjelo wa Leza keza kwakwe ulaamba ati, “Koneliyasi!”
Koneliyasi wakamulanjilila anjelo cabukandu waamba ati, “No mbuti Mwami?”
Anjelo wakamwiingula ati, “Leza wabotelwa kukomba kwako u shipo nshuupa bapushi, ubobo ulilibambile kukwiingula.
Inzho tuma balombwana bamwi ku Jopa kwaamba baye bakamwite mulombwana uutewa ati Saimoni Pita.
Ulibaalile muŋanda ya Saimoni shikusuka masalu, uuzacile afwaafwi u lwaatele.”
Naakaya anjelo, Koneliyasi waketa basebezhi bakwe bobile, uushikalumamba womwi. Wezo shikalumamba kali uumwi wa balindizhi bakwe, ulimwi kazandisha kukomba Leza.
Koneliyasi wakabaambila makani oonse akacitika amane wakabatuma ku Jopa.
Nibwakaca ciindi nibakaakuli afwaafwi kushika ku Jopa, Pita wakaliza ezeulu alululi lwa ŋanda kuya kukomba. Kacili ciindi izuba nilishika akalendebwe.
Ku ciindi ceco Pita kafwile inzala kazanda kulya, nciciindi nibakaakumufwutaucila cakulya, wakabona cilengaano.
Wakabona izeulu lyayaluka, amane wakabona cintu cileza bwiza anshi cili ukoya cisani cikando caanjilwe mushooko shone.
Mucisani momo kamuli banyama bamishobo mishobo, u bakalaba u bazuni bauluka mu muuwo.
Wakateelela izwi lyaamba ati, “Buka Pita uyaye ulye!”
Pele Pita wakaamba ati, Pe pe Mwami! Mundakabela nshinalile cintu citasalali na cisofweele.
Inzho izwi lyakaamba ulimwi ati, “Cintu ceco Leza ncaasalazha utacaamba kutasalala pe.”
Ceci cakacitika shiindi shili shotatwe, kumane bobo cintu ceco cakatolwa kwizeulu ulimwi.

Inzho ciindi Pita naakaakucitweluka mu monzo wakwe, bupanduluzhi bwa cilengaano ncakabona. Balombwana mbaakatuma Koneliyasi bakashika u kubuzha kwaakuli iŋanda ya Saimoni. Bakeza kuzhima acilyango ca bwaanda.
Bakabuzha ati, “Sa kuli mweenzu ano uutewa ati Saimoni Pita?”
Pita kacitelaika kwaamba ateeleleshe cilengaano ncicaamba, Moza wa Leza wakamwaambila ati, “Teelela! Bantu botatwe ngubali ano balakukapula.
Zhimuka useluce utemuki pe, ulimwi utatiyi kuya abo kaambo ndime indabatuma.”
Ubobo Pita wakaseluka waya kubalombwana babo wabaambila ati, “Ndime muntu ngumukapula. No ncinzhi ncimwezhila?”

Bakamwiingula ati, Mukando wa bashikalumamba uutewa ati Koneliyasi nguwatutuma. Muntu mubotu uukomba Leza ulimwi ulabapa bulemu cini cini ba Juda. Wakaambilwa u anjelo wa Leza kwaamba akoompolole kuŋanda yakwe kwaamba ateelele ceco ncuuzanda kumwaambila.
Pita wakabatambula ukubenjizha muŋanda ukubapembelezha kwaamba boone.
Nibwakaca wakalibambila waya abo antoomwi u babunina mu lushomo bamwi bakahwa ku Jopa.
Buzuba bwakacilila bakashika ku Sizaliya koko Koneliyasi nkwaakaakubalanjila antoomwi ubasazhiina ubeenzhiina babo mbaakaakutambile.
Inzho Pita naakaakuzanda kunjila muŋanda, bakaswaangana u Koneliyasi. Koneliyasi wakawila anshi wamufwukamina Pita.
Pele Pita wakamuzhimuna waamba ati, “Zhimuka, ume ndi muntu bulyo.”
Inzho nibaa kucibandika, wakenjila muŋanda mwaakayana bantu banji banji balibungene.

Wakabaambila ati, “Umwe lwenu nubeni mulizhi kabotu kabotu kwaamba ku mulawo wabukombi bwesu, mu Juda teelele kuswaya na kuswaangana u bakunze. Pele Leza wakantondezha ume ati nsheelele kwaamba muntu, ati tasalali na ulisofweele.
Ubobo ncimwabona kwaamba nimwantumina bantu ndiina kukaka. Inzho amunshimwine ncimwentila?”

Koneliyasi wakaamba ati, “Kacili ukoya ceno ncicona ciindi mazuba otatwe aza ayita, ndakaakukomba muŋanda yangu ciindi ca malyakumbo. Ngoonaawo ndakabona mulombwana wakaakusamine shisani shibeka beka, weza wazhima ku bushu bwangu
waamba ati, ‘Koneliyasi! Leza wateelela kukomba kwako ukuzhibaluka milimo yako ya luse njuucita.
Tuma bantu ku Jopa kuya kwita mulombwana uutewa ati Saimoni Pita. Mweenzu wa Saimoni shikusuka masalu uukala kufwaafwi u lwaatele.’
Mbubobo mundakatuma bantu babo, inzho mbuwashika cabota. Inzho toonse ngutuli ano ku bushu bwa Leza, tulalindila kuteelela ceco ncakulailila Mwami ati waambe.”
Pele mumishobo woonse kufwumbwa muntu uumutiya ukucita ciluleme ulatambulwa kwakwe.
Mulyeezhi makani azo ngaakatuma ku bantu ba Izilaili, aakukambauka Makani Mabotu a luumuno kwiita mwa Jeso Kilisito, walo uuli ngu Mwami wa bantu boonse.
Ulimwi mulizhi shakacitika mu Judaya yoonse kukancila mucishi ca Galilaya, ciindi Johani naakamana kukambauka sha lupapatizo lwakwe.

Mulishizhi sha Jeso waku Naznaleta, mbuli mbwaakananikwa Moza Usalala kwa Leza ukupewa insana. Nkaambo kakuti Leza kabali aze, wakeendeenda koonse koonse, ulaya bucita milimo mibotu u kuya buponya babo bakaakupenzhewa u Shaatani.
Uswe tuli bakamboni ba shintu shoonse nshaakacita mu Jelusalemu umucishi coonse caba Juda. Nikuba bobo bakamukankamina aciciinkano bamuyaya.
Pele Leza wakamubusha ku bafwu mu buzuba bwatatu, wakalibonya kali mumi.
Pele wiina kulibonya ku bantu boonse pe, wakabonwa bulyo kuli uswe tubakamboni, babo Leza mbaakasala kale. Uswe intwakalya u kunwa aze ciindi Leza naakamubusha ku bafwu.
Ulimwi Jeso wakatulailila kwaamba tukambauke Makani Mabotu ku bantu, tubaambile ati walo inguwe ngwaakasala Leza kwaamba abe ngumubeteshi wa bomi u bafwu.
Bashinshimi boonse kabaambilizha shakwe ati, kufwumbwa uumushoma ulaalecelelwa shibi shakwe kwiita munsana shezhina lyakwe.”
Pita naakaakucaamba, Moza Usalala wakeza abantu boonse bakaakupupulala makani ngakaakwaamba.
Inzho bashomi baci Juda mbucakeza u Pita kuhwa ku Jopa bakazoowa kubona ati Leza wapa cipo cakwe ca Moza Usalala uku bantu bakunze.
Nkaambo bakabateelela balaamba mu mishobo iinji, ukutembaula ati Leza mukando. Ngoonaawo Pita wakaamba ati,
“Baba bantu batambula Moza Usalala mbubona mbutwakatambula aswe. Sa kuli muntu uukonzha kubakasha kupapatizwa u meenzhi?”
Inzho bakabalaila kwaamba bapapatizwe mwizhina lya Jeso Kilisito. Bamane bakamulomba Pita kwaamba akale abo kwa mazuba mashoonto.
Inzho batumwa u bashomi bakaakuli mucishi ca Judiya bakateelela kwaamba ati abo bakunze bakalitambula izwi lya Leza.
Pita naakabweela ku Jelusalemu, bankamu ya bapalule, yezho yakaakuzandisha kupalula bantu bakunze, bakamutongaucila.
Bakamwaambila ati, “No nkaambonzhi uwe wakaya kunjila muŋanda ya bantu bakunze batali bapalule ulimwi wakalya abo.”
Pita wakabapandululila makani oonse mbwakaakubele kuhwa ku makancilo.

Wakabashimwina ati, “Ciindi indakaakukomba mu munzhi wa Jopa, ndakabona cilengaano. Ndakabona cintu cakaakuboneka ukoya cisani cikando caanjilwe mushooko shone, cileza bwiza anshi kuhwa mwizeulu, ceza kushika awo ngundaakubele.
Indakacilanjisha, ndakabona ati kacikwete banyama bahubwa u bamwisokwe, u bakalaba, u bazuni ba mu muuwo.
Ngoonaawo ndakateelela izwi liŋambila ati, ‘Zhimuka Pita yaya ulye!’
Pele ume ndakakaka, ndakaamba ati, ‘Pe pe Mwami! Nkaambo kwiina indakaakulile cintu cisofweele niciba citasalali.’
Izwi lyakaamba ulimwi kuhwa kwizeulu ati, ‘Utaamba cintu ncaasalazha Leza ati tacisalali.’
Ceci cakacitika shiindi shili shotatwe, ku mamanino cintu ceci cakabweela kwizeulu.
Inzho aciindi awo ngoona, balombwana botatwe bakatumwa kuhwa ku Sizaliya bakashika kuŋanda nkundakaakubele.

Awo Moza wa Leza wakanshimwina ati mfwambaane kuya abo ku Sizaliya. Ulimwi ndakashindicilwa u bakwesu bali cisambomwi kuya koko ku Sizaliya. Toonse antoomwi twakaya kunjila muŋanda ya mulombwana utewa ati Koneliyasi.
Koneliyasi wakatwaambila mbuli mbwaakabona anjelo ulizhimine muŋanda yakwe. Wezo anjelo nguwakamwaambila ati, ‘Tuma umwi muntu ku Jopa kuya kwita mulombwana uutewa ati Saimoni Pita.
Azhize akwaambile mazwi a kakuletela lufwutuko u mukwashi wako woonse.’
Inzho mbundakakancila bulyo kwaamba, bakatambula Moza Usalala umbona mbutwakootambula aswe ku makancilo.
Ubobo ndakatelaika makani ngakaamba Mwami ati, ‘Johani wakapapatiza u meenzhi, pele umwe mulakapapatizwa u Moza Usalala.’
Inzho aakuli Leza wakapa bantu bakunze cipo ceco ncicona ncaakatupa uswe ciindi nitwakashoma mu Mwami Jeso Kilisito, no ume ndamukazha buti Leza?”
Bankamu ya bapalule nibakateelela mazwi aza bakazulwa. Bakamutembaula Leza ati, “Nkukuti Leza wakapa bakunze ciindi ca kwaamba basanduke abo bayane bumi.”
Pele nikuba bobo, kuli bamwi bakahwa ku Sayipulasi uku Sayilini bakaya kushika ku Antiyoki kuya bwaamba makani ku bantu bakunze, u kubakambaucila sha Mwami Jeso.
Insana sha Mwami kashili abo, u bantu banji banji bakasandukila ku Mwami.
Aza makani akateelelwa ku mbungano yakaakuli mu Jelusalemu, ayo yakatuma mulombwana uutewa ati Banabasi kuya ku Antiyoki.
Naakashika wakabona luse lwa Leza, ulimwi wakabotelwa u kubazumya zumya kwaamba bakwatishe mu Mwami u myonzo yabo yoonse cakutaleka.
Banabasi kali muntu mubotu wakaakuzwile Moza Usalala u lushomo. Bantu banji banji bakashoma mu Mwami.
Kuhwaawo Banabasi wakaya ku Tasasi kuya kukapula Saulu.
Naakamuyana wakamuleta ku Antiyoki. Baba bobile bakaakubungana mu mbungano kwamwaka woonse, u kuyiisha bantu banji banji. Koku ku Antiyoki bashomi nkubakataanguna kutewa ati Bana Kilisito.
Inzho ku ciindi ceco bamwi bashinshimi bakaya ku Antiyoki kuhwa ku Jelusalemu.
Umwi wabo katewa ati Agabasi. Wakazhima washinshima kwiita mu Moza Usalala, ati kulakaba inzala inkando anshi yoonse. [Ceci cakacitika ciindi Kilaudiyasi naakaakuli ngu muleli mukando waku Loma.]
Inzho ba shiciiya bakatelaika ati bayohwe bashomi nokwabo ba kucishi ca Judiya, kwiingainya muntu umwi uumwi mbwaakaakulozha.
Inzho nibakamaninzha kubunganya shipo shabo, bakashipa Banabasi u Saulu kwaamba bashitole kubakando ba mbungano yaku Jelusalemu.
Ku ciindi ceco mwami Helodi wakakanka kukwata bamwi bashomi ukubapenzha
Wakayaya Jemusi munina Johani iiceba.
Naakabona ati ceci cakababotela ba Juda, wakakwata Pita. Ceci cakacitika muciindi ce pobwe lya cinkwa ciina bumena.
Pita naakakwatwa wakabikwa muntolongo, momo mwakaakulindililwa iinkamu shone shaba shikalumamba bakaakuli bone bone. Helodi kakanzile kubeteka Pita munkuta ya buleya ku mamanino eepobwe.
Ubobo Pita kali muntolongo, pele ba mbungano kabamukombela cini cini ku Mwami Leza.

Mashiku azo ngoona Helodi wakakutelaika ati bwaca Pita amulete kubuleya, Pita kalele akati kabashikalumamba bakakumulindilila bobile. Kaanjilwe inceetani shobile, ulimwi kakuli banji balindizhi bobile bakaakulinda ku mulyango wantolongo.
Ngoonaawo kwakashika anjelo wa Mwami, mumuni wakamweka muntolongo. Anjelo wakatikaanya Pita wamubusha wamwita ati, “Fwambaana zhimuka!” Ngoonaawo inceetani shakaloka kuhwa kumatashi aakwe.
Anjelo wakaamba ati, “Lyaange lutambo lwako, usame indyasho shako.” Pita wakacita bobo. Ulimwi anjelo wakaamba ati, “Sama icanshi, uncilile!”
Pita wakamucilila kuhwa muntolongo. Pele katezhi kwaamba ncaakaakucita anjelo kacili ca cini cini. Walo katelaika ati ncilengaano.

Bakamwiitilila mulindizhi mutaanzhi, u wabili beza bamwiitilila, mpaka baya kushika ku mulyango wamamanino wa shibulo, wamanjililo amu munzhi. Mulyango wakayaluka wini, bamane bakahwa. Bakeenda kuya kushika ku mamanino a mukwakwa, ngoonaawo anjelo wakamushiya Pita.

Inzho Pita wakazhiba cakaakucitika, ngoonaawo wakaamba ati, “Inzho ndazhiba cini cini ati Mwami nguwatuma anjelo kwiza kunhuna kuhwa munsana sha Helodi u kushintu shesho ba Juda nshibakaakutelaika ati shilancitikila.”
Nakaazhiba bobo, wakaya kuŋanda ya Maliya baina Johani Maako. Koko kakubungene bantu banji banji bakaakukomba
Pita naakashika wakakonkomona acitendele ca mulyango waansengwe. Inzho musebezhi uutewa ati Loda wakeza kutaba.
Pele naakateelela izwi lyaka Pita wakabotelwa cini cini. Wakalukancila muŋanda katana ukuyalula ku mulyango, kuya kubashimwina ati, “Pita ngaali ansengwe!” Balo bakamwiingula ati,
“Uli musondoshi uwe!” Pele mushimbi wezo wakaambisha ati nga cini cini. Bakaingula ati, “Nkukuti ngu anjelo wakwe.”
Pele ku ciindi ceco Pita wakaakucikonkomona amulyango. Ku mamanino bakamuyalulila citendele. Inzho nibakamubona bakazoowa.

Pita wakatambika itashi lyakwe kwaamba baliinze, amane wakabapandululila mbuli Mwami mbwamukusha muntolongo. Ulimwi wakabaambila ati, “Mubashimwine aza ba Jemusi u babunina boonse.” Amane wakahwa u kuya kunji.
Nibwakaca balindizhi ba ntolongo bakanyongana cini cini. Bakaamba ati, “No Pita waya kwi?”
Inzho mwami Helodi naakateelela wakapa malailile akuti Pita akapulwe. Pele bayina nibakamuyana pe. Helodi amane kubabuzha buzha balindizhi, wakalailila ati bayayiwe.
Aza makani naakamana, Helodi wakakuhwa ku cishi ca Judiya u kuya ku cishi ca Sizaliya nkwaakaya kukala kala.

Inzho Helodi wakabalemanina cini cini bantu ba mu minzhi ya Taya u Sidoni. Ubobo bantu ba mu minzhi yezhi bakatuma kakamu ka bantu kwaamba bakabonane aze. Cishi cabo mbucakaakuyana cakulya kuhwa ku mwami Helodi, bakataanguna kwaambila Bulasitusi, mulombwana wakaakuli ngu mweendelezhi waŋanda ya mwami Helodi. Nibakashika ku mwami Helodi bakamulomba kwaamba kube luumuno akati kabo.
Nibwakashika buzuba bwakaakusalilwe, Helodi wakasama sha bwami waya kukala a cuuna ca bwami amane wakabandika u babo bantu.
Inzho babo bantu bakapozomoka ati, “Aza mazwi ngaka Leza taali a muntu pe!”
Ngoonaawo anjelo wa Leza wakamuuma Helodi nkaambo wiina kupa bulemu Leza. Kwiite kaindi wakaliwa maumba wakafwa.
Inzho izwi lya Leza lyakaakuya buzandaala mucishi coonse.
Ba Banabasi u Saulu bakamaninzha mulimo ngubakatumwa, ubobo bakakuhwa ku Jelusalemu batolelezha u Johani Maako.

Mu mbungano yaku Antiyoki kamuli bashinshimi uba maayi, ba Banabasi u Simiyoni wakaakutewa ati Muntuushiya, u Lusiyasi uuhwa ku munzhi wa Sailini, u Manayeni wakakomenena muŋanda ya Helodi wakaakuli mweendelezhi wacipanzha cane ca cishi, u Saulu.
Cimwi ciindi imbungano niyakaakukomba ukuliimya kulya, Moza Usalala wakabaambila ati, “Amunzandwile ba Banabasi u Saulu kwaamba bakancitile mulimo ngundakabetila.”
Nibakamana kuliimya kulya bakakomba bakabaampa matashi bamane bakabatuma.
Ba Banabasi u Saulu nibakatumwa u Moza Usalala, bakaya ku munzhi wa Selusiya. Bahwe koko bakanjila mu bwato bukando kuya ku Saipulasi.
Nibakashika mu munzhi wa Saipulasi bakakambauka izwi lya Leza mu shikombelo shaba Juda. Bakatolelezha u Johani Maako kwaamba ati akabayohwe.
Bakakosola akati ka cilwa ca Saipulasi kuya kushika ku Pofosi, koko nkubakayana shimabibo utewa ati Bajeso, mu Juda wakaakuli mushinshimi mubeshi.
Kali mulongwaakwe u muleli waacilwa wakakutewa ati Segiasi Paulusi wakaakuli mulombwana musongo. Inzho mweendelezhi wakoompolola Banabasi u Saulu, nkaambo kazanda kuteelela izwi lya Leza.
Pele Elimasi welya shimabibo wiina kuuhumina muzeezo. Wakasoleka kumushinkila muleli kwaamba ati atashomi mu Mwami.
Inzho Saulu, nguwena wakaakutewa ati Paulu wakazula Moza Usalala, amane wakamutwaanana shimabibo wezo,
wamwaambila ati, “Uwe u mwanakwe Shaatani, uutazanda shiluleme shoonse, ulikwete maanu a bweeleenze aalucengo. Ciindi coonse ulasoleka kunyonganya shintu shini shini sha Mwami!
Inzho itashi lya Leza lilakuuma. Ndilyona nizho uloofwaala, ulaleka kubona ku ciindi cili mbucibele.”
Ngoonaawo Elimasi kumenso kwakashiya, wakakanka kubona ingubi. Wakakanka kweenda cakutubwaincila ukwaampaampa kwaamba ayane muntu uumukwata kwitashi ukumweenzha
Inzho mweendelezhi naakabona cakacitika wakashoma. Ulimwi wakazoowa cini cini nakateelela injiisho sha Mwami.
Inzho Paulu umbucaakulyaabo bakakuhwa ku Pafosi baya ku munzhi wa Pega uuli mu Pamfiliya. Nibaakucili koko Johani Maako wakabashiya wapiluka ku Jelusalemu.
Nibakahwa ku Pega bakaya ku Antiyoki mucishi ca Pisidiya. Mu buzuba bwa kulyoocezha butewa ati Sabata, bakaya kunjila mucikombelo caba Juda u kukala anshi.
Inzho kubala kuhwa mu mulawo u bashinshini nikwakamana, bakando ba cikombelo caba Juda bakabaambila ati, “Bakwesu na mulikwete makani aakuzumya zumya bantu amubakananine.”
Paulu wakazhimuka watambika itashi lyakwe mwizeulu kubuleya, wabaamba ati:
“Nuba Izilailima amwe noonse nubantu ba kunzze, amunteelele!
Leza waba Izilaili wakasala ba shaakale besu, ulimwi wakabacita kwaamba babe mushobo mukando nibakaakuli mu Ijipiti. Leza wakabakusha mu Ijipiti iinsana shakwe inkando.
Wakabeenzha ukubabamba mulukula kwa myaka iili makumi one.
Mucishi ca Kenani Leza wakazonauna mishobo iili ciloba u kucita bantu bakwe kwaamba bafwuwe inshi yezho.
Sheshi shoonse shakatola myaka itiikashike afwaafwi ku myaanda yone u myaka iili makumi osanwe.
“Kuhwaawo Leza, bantu bakwe wakabapa babeteshi, kwiza kushika ku ciindi ca mushinshimi Samuwele.
Bantu nibakalomba mwami, Leza wakabapa Saulu mwanakwe Kishi, wamushobo wa Benjamini. Wakabalela kwa myaka iili makumi one.

Naakamukusha a bwami, wakapa Devidi kwaamba abe ngu mwami wabo. Mbubolya Leza mbwakaamba ku makani aka Devidi, ‘Ndayana mwa Devidi, mwanakwe Jesi, muntu ngumfwini nkaambo nguukonzha kucita nshinzanda kwaamba acite.’
Kuhwa mu mazhalane aka Devidi, Leza wakatuma Jeso kwaamba abe mufwutuli waba Izilaili mbubona mbwakashomezha kale kale.
Inzho Jeso katana kukanka kucita mulimo wakwe, Johani wakabakambaucila ba Izilaili boonse kwaamba balyeelele kusanduka u kupapatizwa.
Johani naakaakuli afwaafwi u kumaninzha mulimo wezu wakabuzha ati, ‘No mulatelaika ati ume ndime ni? Ume indime wezo pe, pele nkwaali uzhiiza munshi lyangu wezo nguntakonzha kusamununa impato.’
“Bakwesu, nubanakwe Abulahamu, amwe noonse nubantu bakunze numutiya Leza, aza makani a lufwutuko akatumwa kulyuuswe.

Nkaambo bantu bakala mu Jelusalemu antoomwi u basololi babo bayina nibakezhiba ati Jeso ngu mufwutuli. Ulimwi bayina nibakaateelelesha mazwi a bashinshimi a balwa mu Sabata u Sabata. Ciindi nibakapa Jeso mulandu wa kuyayiwa, bakazuzucizha mazwi a bashinshimi.
Ulimwi nikuba kuti bayina nibakamuyanina kaambo keelele lufwu, nikuba bobo bakamulomba Pilato kwaamba ayayiwe.
Nibakamana kucita shoonse shakalembwa ukaambo kakwe, bakamwaangula aciciinkano baya kumuzhika mu cuumbwe.
Inzho Leza wakamubusha ku bafwu,
ulimwi wakabonwa ku bantu banji banji mbaakaakweenda abo kuhwa ku Galilaya kuya ku Jelusalemu. Babo balo ubali mbubakamboni ku bantu ba Izilaili.
Inzho twamuletela Makani Mabotu azo Leza ngaakashomezha ba shaakale besu.
Waazuzukizha kulyuuswe tulunungu lwabo kwiita mukubusha Jeso ku bafwu, mbubona mbucilembelwe mu Ntembauzho ati,
“‘Uwe uli mwanangu
ubwasunu ndaba uso.’
‘Ndakakupa cilonjezho cini cini cisalala ncindakashomezha Devidi.’
Ubobo ulaamba ulimwi mu ntembauzho imwi ati,
‘tukamuleka musalazhi wako kwaamba abole.’
Nkaambo mu mazuba a bumi bwakwe, Devidi wakasebezela bantu bakwe mukucita cizanda Leza, amane wakafwa ukuzhikwa antoomwi ubamaushi. Mubili wakwe wakabolela mu cuumbwe.
