Pele wezo Leza ngwaakabusha ku bafwu wiina naakabola pe.
Inzho nubakwesu, ndazanda kwaamba muzhibe ati kwiita mumuntu wezu, lulecelelo lwa shibi lulakambaukwa kulyuumwe, ulimwi mwake woonse ushoma ulaangululwa kushintu shoonse.
Ubobo amuzhibe ati kufwumbwa uushoma mwa Jeso ulaangululwa ku shibi shoonse shesho mulawo wa Mozesi nshutakonzha kumukusha.
Ubobo amucenjele kwaamba ceco ncibakaamba bashinshimi citakabi nicicitika kulyuumwe:
Nkaambo kamulimo wezu nguncita mu mazuba enu ngumutashomi,
nikuba kuti umwi wamwaambila.’”
Inzho

Bantu nibakamwaala kuhwa kumuswaangano wa cikombelo caba Juda, bunji bwa ba Juda u bantu bakunze bakaakucilila bukombi bwaci Juda bakacilila ba Paulu u Banabasi. Inzho bakabaambila makani aakubazumya zumya kwaamba batolelele kukala mu luse lwa Leza.
Mu buzuba bwa Sabata yakacilila, bunji bwa bantu mu munzhi bakaya kuteelela izwi lya Mwami.
Ba Juda nibakabona makamu makamu abantu bakafwa munyono, bakakanka kushikazha nshaakaakwaamba Paulu u kumutuka.

Pele nikuba bobo ba Paulu u Banabasi bakaamba cilombwana cakutatiya ati, “Kulyeelele kwaamba mazwi a Leza akambaukwe kuli umwe ca kutaanguna. Pele nkaambo kakuti mwaakaka, mwatondezha kwaamba bumi butamana tabumweelele. Ubobo tulamushiya tulaya ku bantu bakunze.
Nkaambo aza ngu malailile Mwami Leza ngaakatupa nakaamba ati,
“Ndakucita kwaamba ube mumuni ku bantu bakunze
u kuleta lufwutuko inshi yoonse.”
Bantu bakunze nibakateelela bobo bakatangala cini cini ukutembaula izwi lya Mwami. Ulimwi babo basalilwe kwaamba babe u bumi butamana bakashoma.
Izwi lya Mwami lyakamwaala mucishi coonse ceco.
Pele ba Juda bakanyonganya bakando bakando ba mucishi u bakaintu ba mashi baakuzhibicilwe bakaakuli bakombi ba Leza. Bakakanka kupenzha, Paulu u Banabasi bakabatanda mucishi cabo.
Inzho balo batumwa bakakunkumuna lufwuko kumatende abo, kucenjezha kutashoma kwa babo bantu, bamane bakaya ku Ikoniyamu.
Pele bashomi bamu Antiyoki bakazula Moza Usalala ulimwi bakabotelwa.
Inzho ba Paulu u Banabasi bakanjila antoomwi mucikombelo caba Juda mu munzhi wa Ikoniyamu. Bakayiisha mucikombelo momo cakuti, bantu banji banji ba Juda uba Giliki bakashoma.
Pele ba Juda babo batakashoma bakakanka kunyonganya bantu bakunze kwaamba ati babasule ba bunina.

Batumwa bakakala koko kwa ciindi cilamfwu, kabakambauka cakubula bukandu makani a Mwami, ulimwi kabatondezha ati luse lwakwe ndwa cini cini kwiita munsana nshaakabapa shakucita maleele ushitondezho shizoosha.
Inzho bantu ba mu munzhi wezo bakaandaana, bamwi bakacilila ba Juda, bamwi bakacilila batumwa.
Inzho bantu bakunze uba Juda antoomwi u beendelezhi babo nibakateelezhanya ati babapenzhe batumwa ukubauma mabwe.
Inzho batumwa nibakaazhiba makani aza, bakalukancila ku Lisitila uku Debe, minzhi ya Likoniya u muminzhi iimwi yeenjelele.
Koko bakakambauka Makani Mabotu.
Mu munzhi wa Lisitila mwakaakukala mulombwana umwi wakaakuli mulema ku maulu, katacikonzha kweenda kuhwa naakazhalwa.
Kapupulele ciindi Paulu nakaakukambauka, Paulu wakabona kwaamba wakashoma, ulimwi kakonzha kupona. Ubobo wakamutongomwena,
amane wapozomoka ati, “Zhimuka zhimicila!” Ngoonaawo mulombwana wezo wakasotoka wakanka kuya bweendeenda.
Inzho ikamu lyabantu nilyakabona ncaakacita Paulu, bakakanka kusaba mu mushobo wabo wa Cilikawoni ati, “Ba leza baba bantu, ulimwi baseluka anshi!”
Banabasi bakamupa izhina lya Zusi, u Paulu bakamupa lya Hemesi, nkaambo nguwakaakuli mwaambilizhi wabo.
Mupaizhi wa Zusi wakaakukwete cikombelo afwaafwi u munzhi mukando, wakaleta basune u maluba luba ku mulyango wa munzhi, nkaambo walo antoomwi u bantu kabazanda kupa cipaizho ku batumwa.
Pele ciindi ba batumwa ba Banabasi u Paulu nibakateelela ncibaakuzanda kucita babo bantu, bakazapaula shisani shabo bakalukancila akati kankamu ya bantu balaya bwaamba ati,

“Nciinzhi ncimucitila bolya? Uswe tuli bantu bulyo, umbona mbumubele amwe! Twamuletela Makani Mabotu, kwaamba mucinduluke muleke kukomba shintu sheshi shiina mulimo. Mucindulucile kwa Leza mumi, wezo wakalenga izeulu iinshi u lwaatele u shintu shoonse shilimo.
Kale kale Leza wakaakulecela bantu kuya munzhila yabo beni.
Pele ciindi coonse Leza ulalitondezha kwiita mu shintu shibotu nshaacita. Ulamupa inhula kuhwa kwizeulu u shilyo shilabizwa muciindi ceelele. Ulamupa shakulya, ubobo mulabotelwa mu myonzo yenu.”
Nikuba kuti batumwa bakaamba aza mazwi, kabatakonzha kubalesha bantu kupa cipaizho nkubabele.

Inzho kakuli ba Juda bamwi bakahwa ku Antiyoki waku Pesidiya uku Ikoniyamu bakabalengaulila kwaamba babakake batumwa, babe kuluya lwabo, bakamuuma mabwe Paulu ukumukwelela ansengwe lya munzhi, bakazunga ati ambweni wafwa.
Pele bashomi nibakamubunganina ukumuzhinguluka, wakabuka u kuyaabo mu munzhi. Buzuba bwakacilila Paulu u Banabasi bakaya ku Debe.
Inzho Paulu u Banabasi bakakambauka Makani Mabotu mu Debe ukusandula bantu banji banji. Bamane bakapiluka ku Lisitila, uku Ikoniyamu mpaka baya kushika ku Antiyoki waku Pisidiya.
Bakazumya zumya bashomi u kubapa insana shakukalilila mu lushomo, kababayiisha ati, “Tulyeelele kwiita mu masukusho manji manji kwaamba tukenjile mu Bwami bwa Leza.”
Bakasala beendelezhi mu mbungano imwi iimwi. Bamane kukomba ukuliimya kulya, bakabaampa matashi, bababika mu matashi a Mwami, momo mubaakubicile lushomo boonse.
Bamane kweendeenda cishi coonse ca Pasidiya bakaya kushika ku Pamfiliya.
Koko bakakambauka izwi mu Pega bamane bakaya ku Ataliya.
Kuhwa koko bakapiluka umato kuya ku Antiyoki, kubusena koko bantu nkubakabika ba Paulu u Banabasi mu matashi a Leza kwaamba abalonjezhe kumulimo ngubakamaninzha.
Nibakashika ku Antiyoki bakabunganya imbungano u ku bapandululila makani oonse azo Leza ngakacita kwiita mubabele, ulimwi umbuli Leza mbwakabayalulila milyango ya lushomo ku bantu bakunze.
Ku Antiyoki bakakala ko ciindi cilamfwu u ba shiciiya.

Inzho ba Paulu u Banabasi bakazumanikana abo ku makani aza. Ubobo ba Paulu u Banabasi kubicilizha u bashomi bamwi bakasalwa kwaamba baye ku Jelusalemu kutola kaambo kaka ku batumwa uku bakando ba mbungano.

Baba bantu bakatumwa iimbungano. Bakaita ku Fonisiya uku Samaliya balaya bukananina bashomi makani aakuti abo bantu bakunze bakasandukila ku Mwami. Aza makani akaleta lutangalo cini cini kuli ba bunina boonse.
Nibakashika ku Jelusalemu, bakatambulwa ubakando ba mbungano u batumwa. Abo bakabapandululila shoonse shesho Leza shaakacita kwiita mubabele.
Pele bamwi bashomi, babo kale kale bakaakuli ba mbungano yaba Falisi, bakazhimuka u kwaamba ati, “Bantu bakunze balyeelele kupalulwa ukupewa malailile aakucilila Mulawo wa Mozesi.”
Inzho batumwa ubakando ba mbungano bakaswaangana antoomwi kwaamba babambe makani aza.

Bamane kubandika kwa ciindi cilamfwu, Pita wakazhimuka waamba ati, “Bakwesu, mulizhi ati Leza wakansala kale kale kwaamba nkambauce Makani Mabotu ku bantu bakunze, kwaamba bateelele mulumbe u kushoma.
Ulimwi Leza uuzhi myonzo ya bantu wakacibika aatuba, kwaamba bantu bakunze ulabatambula kwiita mukubapa Moza Usalala, mbubona mbwaakatupa aswe.
Wiina naakaandaanya akati kesu abo, nkaambo wakasalazha myonzo yabo ukaambo kalushomo.
No ninzho nkaamboonzhi ncimuzanda kulingulula Leza, ciindi nimuzanda kubatwika mikuli milemu yezho bashaakale naaba uswe njitutakonzha kubweza?
Pe pe bakwesu, inta tulashoma ati tulafwutulwa ukaambo ka luse lwa Mwami Jeso, mbubona bulyo abo.”
Inkamu ya bantu keeliinzile ukupupulala Banabasi u Paulu nibakaakupandulula shitondezho sha nsana u maleele nshaakacita Leza akati ka bantu bakunze kwitila mubabele.
Nibakamaninzha kwaamba, Jemusi wakazhimuka wabeta ati, “Amumpupulale nubakwesu!
Simiyoni wapandulula mbuli Leza mbwaakatondezha ati bakunze ulabalecelela kwiita mukusala bamwi ukubacita ati babe bantu bakwe mwini.
Awo mazwi a bashinshimi aleendelana uceci, mbubona Mwami Leza mbwaakaamba mu Mazwi akwe aakuti,
ukubusha bwami bwaka Devidi bwakawa.
Ndakaabusha busha matongo aabo,
ndakaazakulula ulimwi,
kwaamba bamwi basheele babo bakapula Mwami,
ulimwi u bantu bakashaala babo boonse bakapula izhina lya Mwami, ubantu bakunze boonse babandwa izhina lyangu, bobo mbwaamba Mwami, ucita shintu sheshi
kwaamba shizhibwe
kuhwa kale kale.”
“Ume muzezo wangu ngwakuti, tatweelele kupenzha bantu bakunze abo basanduka kuba bana Leza.
Pele tulyeelele kubalembela luŋwalu lwakuti tabeelele kulya shilyo shitasalali u shakapaizhiwa ku mizhimu, ukutacita buhuule ukutalya banyama bashinwa ulimwi u kutalya bulowa.
Nkaambo kuhwa kale kale Mozesi kakwete bantu bakambauka Milawo yakwe muminzhi yoonse, ulimwi keebalwa mu Sabata u Sabata mushikombelo sha ba Juda.”

Inzho batumwa antoomwi ubakando ba mbungano ya Leza yoonse, bakakwata muzeezo wakusala balombwana bamwi kuhwa munkamu yabo ukubatuma ku Antiyoki antoomwi u Paulu u Banabasi. Bakasala Sailasi u Judasi utewa ati Basabasi. Balombwana baba bobile ka balemekwa cini cini akati ka banyokwabo mu lushomo.
Bakabapa u luŋwalu lwaamba ati,
“Bakwesu, uswe tubatumwa antoomwi ubakando ba mbungano twamwaanzha noonse nubashomi ulimwi ubakwesu bakunze bahwa mu Antiyoki, umu Siliya umu Silisiya.
Twakateelela ati bamwi bankamu yesu bakeza koko kwiza kumupenzha ukumunyonganya utwaamba ntubakamwaambila, nikuba ati twiina nitwakabatuma makani ngubakeza kwaamba.
Ubobo twakaswaangana antoomwi ukuteelezhanya ati tusale bamwi bantu munkamu yesu ukubatuma nkumubele. Baleza antoomwi u bafwunwa besu, balongweesu ba Banabasi u Paulu.
Bantu baba bakalyaaba mu mulimo wa Mwami Jeso Kilisito.
Inzho twamutumina ba Judasi u Sailasi kwaamba beze bamwaambile meni meni kuhwa kumilomo yabo, makani aza ngoona ngutwalemba mu luŋwalu lolu.
Nkaambo Moza Usalala nguwakatusololela kwaamba tutamubikili mikuli inji kunze lya yezho milawo iiyelele.
Mutaakulya buzani bupaizhiwa ku mizhimu, mutaakulya bulowa, mutaakulya banyama bashinwa. Ulimwi amulyaambule ku cibi cabumambe. Mwaakushibamba sheshi ati mulacita kabotu.”
Ngoonaawo babo bakatumwa nibakaahwa awo bakaya ku Antiyoki, koko nkubakaya kubunganya antoomwi yoonse inkamu ya bashomi u kubapa luŋwalu.
Inzho bantu nibakalubala, makani akaakulimo akabapa lutangalo ukubazumya zumya.
Pele ba Judasi u Sailasi balo mbubakaakuli bashinshimi bakatola ciindi cilamfwu balaamba mazwi aakuzumya zumya babunina u kubapa insana.
Inzho nikwakaita ciindi cili mbucibele bakalayana u babunina kwaamba bapiluke muluumuno kuli babo bakabatuma.
Paulu u Banabasi bakashaala mu Antiyoki kwa ciindi cili mbucibele, koko balo nkubakaakuyiisha u kukambauka izwi lya Mwami antoomwi ubamwi banji banji.
Inzho nikwakaita mazuba, Paulu u Banabasi bakaamba ati, “Atupiluke tukaswaye bakwesu mu minzhi yoonse mutwakakambauka izwi lya Mwami kwaamba tukabone mbubabele.”
Banabasi wakaakuzanda ati bamutolelele u Johani Maako.
Pele Paulu wiina ukacibona kwaamba cililuleme kumutola, nkaambo lweendo lwabo lutaanzhi wiina nakalumaninzha abo. Wakaloboka ukubashiya mu Pamfiliya
Kwakaba kukazhanya cini cini akati kabo, cakuti bakashika mubaandaana. Banabasi wakabweza Maako baya u bwato ku Saipulasi.
Inzho Paulu wakasala Sailasi, babunina nibakamana kubakombela kwaamba Mwami abalonjezhe bakazhimuka.
Bakaya, balaya buzumya zumya imbungano, bakaita ku Siliya uku Silisiya.
Paulu wakaya kushika ku Debe uku Lisitila koko nkwaakaakukala mushomi umwi uutewa ati Timoti. Baina kali mu Juda ulimwi kali mushomi, pele ushi kali mu Giliki.
Boonse babunina bakaakukala mu munzhi wa Lisitila uwa Ikoniyamu, kabaamba ati Timoti muntu uuli kabotu
Inzho Paulu wakazanda kumutolelela Timoti. Ubobo wakamupalula. Wakacita bobo nkaambo ba Juda boonse bakaakukala mu masena azo kabezhi ati ushi Timoti kali mu Giliki.
Mu minzhi mubaakuya bwiita, kabaya bwaambila bashomi milawo yezho yakapewa ulimwi njibakahuminya batumwa antoomwi ubakando mu Jelusalemu, ukubalailila kwaamba beecilile.
Ubobo bantu ba mbungano shesho bakazuma mu lushomo ulimwi kabaya buhula a buzuba u buzuba.
Inzho bakaita mucishi ca Filigiya umu Galatiya, Moza Usalala wakabakasha kukambauka mucishi ca Ezha.
Nibakashika mucishi ca Misiya, bakasoleka kuya mucishi ca Besiniya pele Moza waka Jeso wakabakasha.
Ubobo bakeenda kuya ku cishi ca Misiya baya kushika ku munzhi wa Tilowasi.
Mashiku azo Paulu wakabona cilengaano. Mulombwana uuhwa ku Masedoniya wakeza kuzhima ku bushu bwakwe wamwaambila ati, “Kweza ku Masedoniya ukatuyohwe.”
Naakamana kubona cilengaano ceci Paulu, twakalibambila kuya ku Masedoniya kaambo twakahumina kwaamba Leza watwita kuya kukambauka Makani Mabotu ako.
Nitwakahwa ku Tilowasi twakaya u bwato twasuumana kuya ku mulando wa Samotulasi. Inzho nibwakaca twakaya ku Niyapolisi.
Kuhwaawo twakeenda umaulu kuya ku Filipi munzhi mukando wa mucishi ca Masedoniya, awo koolelwa u ba Loma. Twakakala mazuba manji manji mu munzhi wezo.

Mu buzuba bwa Sabata twakamuhwa mu munzhi twakaya ku lweenje nkutwakaakutelaika kwaamba ati ambweni tulakonzha kuyana busena nkubakombela ba Juda. Twakaya kukala ukubandika u bakaintu mbutwakayana balibungene koko.

Umwi wabakaintu babo bakatuteelela kali Lidiya uuhwa ku Tiyatila. Kali shimakwebo wamasani a muulo mukando a cilambo ca shicisu, ulimwi kali mukaintu wakaakukomba Leza. Inzho Mwami wakayalula monzo wakwe kwaamba amuyiishe nshakaakwaamba Paulu.
Inzho Lidiya u mukwashi wakwe woonse bakapapatizwa. Amane wakabeta waamba ati, “Na mwambona ati ndimushomi mwini mwini wa Mwami, amuzhize munjile muŋanda yangu.” Ulimwi wakatusungilizha kuya kwakwe.

Bumwi buzuba ciindi nitwakaakuya kubusena bwakukombela, twakaswaanganya kamwale muzhice wakaakunjililwe myoza mibiyabi yakaakumupa kushinshima. Mukucita bobo kakonzha kuyanina mali manji manji bashimatwangaakwe.
Wakatucilila u Paulu, ulaya bukwemba ati, “Baba balombwana mbasebezhi ba Namakungwe Keemba Mutalabala! Balaambilizha kulyuumwe mbuli mbumukonzha kufwutulwa.”

Wezu kamwale kacita bobo kwa mazuba manji manji, limwina Paulu cakamucima. Wakacebuka u kwaambila moza mubiyabi ati, “Mwizhina lya Jeso Kilisito, ndakulailila ati hwa!” Ncicona ciindi ceco moza mubiyabi wakamuhwa.
Inzho shimatwangaakwe nakezhiba ati cakaakumuletela mali caya, bakabakwata ba Paulu u Sailasi babakwelela ku beendelezhi bankuta ya buleya.
Bakabaleta ku babeteshi Baciloma u kwaamba ati, “Baba balombwana baci Juda batuletela mapenzhi mu munzhi wesu.
Balayiisha tunshiyanshiya tuteendelana u milawo yesu. Uswe tuba Loma tatukonzha kwaamba tuukucilila nikuba kucita tunshiyanshiya totu pe!”
Inkamu ya bantu niyakateelela bobo yakakanka kubalwisha batumwa. Abo babeteshi bakalailila ati shisani sha Paulu u Sailasi shizapaulwe bamana baumwe milusu.
Bamane kubauma, bakababika muntolongo ukulailila mulindizhi wantolongo kwaamba abike maanu kubalanga.
Inzho mulindizhi amane kutambula malailile aza, wakanjizha Paulu u Sailasi mukaanda kamukati muntolongo. Wakaanga maulu abo kushisamu shobile shilemu cini cini.
Inzho akati kamashiku, Paulu u Sailasi kabakomba u kwiimba inyimbo sha Leza. Bashintolongonina kababapupulele.
Ngoonaawo kwakaba mundindimo wanshi. Intolongo yoonse yakazungaana kuya kushika ku mwiimbi. Ubobo milyango yantolongo yakayaluka, iinceetani nshibakaakwaanjilwe baanje boonse shakawa.
Inzho mulindizhi wantolongo naakashinshimuka, wakabona milyango yantolongo yoonse iliyalukile, wakatelaika ati baanje boonse baloboka baya. Ubobo wakabweza iceba lyakwe kwaamba aliyaye.
Ngoonaawo Paulu wakapozomoka waamba ati, “Utaliyaya pe! Toonse mutuli!”
Mulindizhi wakaamba ati akuletwe mumuni. Ndilyona ndilyona wakenjila ulayabuzhangama waya kuliwaala anshi ku maulu aka Paulu u Sailasi
Amane wakabatola ansengwe wababuzha ati, “Nubashimalelo angu, no ncite buti kwaamba mfwutulwe?”
Bakamwiingula ati, “Shoma mu Mwami Jeso, nukafwutuka uwe u ba ŋanda yako boonse.”
Bamane bakamukambaukila mazwi a Mwami antoomwi ubamwi bakaakuli muŋanda yakwe.
Ngoona aciindi ceco ca mashiku mulindizhi wantolonga wakabatola waya kubasanzha ukubakanda ashilonda shabo. Ngoonaawo walo uba mukwashi wakwe bakapapatizwa.
Amane wakatola Paulu u Sailasi kuŋanda yakwe waya kubapa cakulya. Inzho kwakaba kubotelwa cini cini akati kamukwashi woonse, kaambo ninzho bakashoma mwa Leza.
Nibwakaca, babeteshi bakatuma bantu u malailile aakuti, “Amubaleke balombwana babo baye.”
Inzho mulindizhi wantolongo wakaambila Paulu ati, “Babeteshi batuma malailile akuti uwe u Sailasi mukushiwe muntolongo. Ubobo kamuya. Mweende muluumuno.”

Pele Paulu wakabaambila ati, “Kwiina mulandu ngubakatuyanina pele twakaumwa akati kabuleya nikuba kuti tuli ba Loma! Bamane bakatubika muntolongo. Pele ninzho balazanda ati batukushe kamushiwe. Tacibi pe! Balyeelele kwaamba ati beni babeteshi Baciloma bezhize kono batukushe.”
Bantu bakatola makani aza ku babeteshi. Inzho nibakateelela ati Paulu u Sailasi kabali ba Loma, bakatiya cini cini.
Ubobo bakaya kulilecelela, bamane bakabakusha muntolongo ukubalomba kwaamba bamuhwe mu munzhi.
Inzho Paulu u Sailasi bakahwa muntolongo bakaya kuŋanda yaka Lidiya. Koko nkubakaya kuswaangana u babunina, bakabaambila mazwi aakubazumya zumya bamane bakaya.
Inzho nibakaita mu munzhi wa Amfipolisi umu Apolonia bakashika ku Tesalonika kubusena kwaakuli cikombelo caba Juda.
Mbuli ciyanza cakwe Paulu wakaya kunjila mucikombelo. Wakashisha ma Sabata otatwe ulakanana u bantu twaambo tuli mu maŋwalu.
Wakaakupandulula ukutondezha kuhwa mu maŋwalu ati Munanike keelele kupenga ukubushiwa ku bafwu. Paulu kabaambila ati, “Wezu Jeso ngumwaambila inguwe Munanike wa Leza.”
Bamwi bakalamwa u kushoma, ubobo bakacilila Paulu u Sailasi, ulimwi iinkamu iimwi inkando yaba Giliki bakaakukomba Leza, kubicilizha u bakaintu bakaakukwete impuwo bakacilila.

Pele ba Juda bamwi bakenjilwa munyono, bakakanka kubunganya inkamu ya bantu bakole mukuku mbubakaakuyana mu mikwakwa. Ubobo bakanyonganya munzhi woonse, bamane baya kulwisha iŋanda yaka Jasoni mubaakuzanda kukwata Paulu u Sailasi kwaamba babatole ku bantu.

Inzho nibatakabayanamo muŋanda, bakakwata Jasoni u babunina bamwi, babakulaanya babatola kubakando ba munzhi balaya bupozomoka ati, “Baba bantu, balaya bucita manyongwe mu minzhi yoonse, inzho mbubaba beza mu munzhi wesu!
Wezu Jasoni nguubalela muŋanda yakwe. Balasotoka milawo ya mweendelezhi mukando waku Loma. Balaamba ati kuli uumwi mwami utewa ati Jeso.”
Inzho aza mazwi akaleta lupyopyongano, bantu boonse bakalemana kubicilizha ubakando ba munzhi.
Bakando ba munzhi bakaliisha Jasoni umbucakaakuli abo mali azandika, kwaamba baangululwe, nibakaliya bakabaleka.
Naakaba mangolezha, babunina bakatumya Paulu u Sailasi ku Beleya. Nibakashika bakaya ku cikombelo caba Juda.

Bantu baku Beleya kabakwete myonzo myaangulushi iizanda kuteelela kubaala baku Tesalonika. Kabazandisha kuteelela makani cakulyaaba. Ulimwi kabalingula mu maŋwalu a buzuba u buzuba kwaamba bateeleleshe na shesho nshakaakwaamba Paulu shilishinizhe.
Ba Juda banji banji bakashoma, bakaintu balemu bazhibicilwe u balombwana ba Giliki abo bakashoma.
Pele ba Juda baku Tesalonika nibakateelela ati Paulu wakakambauka izwi lya Leza mu Beleya bakeza kubusha manyongwe, bakakanka kubunganya ukusengelezha bantu.
Ndilyona ndilyona babunina bakatumya Paulu kuya ku lwaatele, pele Sailasi u Timoti bakashaala mu Beleya.
Inzho balombwana bakashindikila Paulu bakamushisha ku Asenisi, bamane bakapiluka ku Beleya u malailile kuhwa kwa Paulu akuti ba Sailasi u Timoti bamucilile ca kufwambaana.
Paulu nakaakucilindila ba Sailasi u Timoti mu Asenisi, wakabiilwa cini cini naakabona munzhi woonse mbuwakaakuzwile ba leza bapanje.
Ubobo wakaabana matelaishi uba Juda ubantu bakunze mucikombelo cabo, ulimwi ubantu bashomi. Kabandika ubantu mumishika ubabo boonse bakaakuyanwa.
Bamwi bantu basongo batewa ati ba Epikuleyani u ba maayi batewa ati ba Sitoyiki bakakazhanya u Paulu. Bamwi kabaamba ati, “Nciinzhi ncaamba wezu utayiile?”
Bamwi bakaamba ati, “Ulalibonya ukoya ulaamba makani a baleza bakunze.” Bakaamba bobo nkaambo Paulu wakakambauka makani a Jeso u bubuce bwa bafwu.
Inzho bakamutola Paulu kumuswaangano waba Aleopagasi, bamwaambila ati, “Tulazanda kuzhiba lwiiyo lukando lolu nduukwete.
Shimwi shintu nshuyiisha uwe twiina nitwakashiteelela pe, shaba sheenzu kuli uswe. Ubobo tulazanda kuzhiba ncishaamba.”
Nkaambo baku Asenisi ubeenzu bakeza mu munzhi wezu kabazandisha kuteelela makani mapiya.
Inzho Paulu wakazhima kumbele lya nkuta ya Aleopagasi u kwaamba ati, “Umwe nubalombwana baku Asenisi ndabona kwaamba muli bantu bazandisha kukomba.

Nkaambo indaakweendeenda mu munzhi wenu, ndakaakulanga langa mu masena mumupailila, ndakayana cipaililo cilembelwe ati, ‘Ukwa Leza utezhibilwe.’ Ceco ncimupaila nikuba kuti tamucizhi nciceco ncinzanda kumukambaucila.
Wezo Leza nguwakalenga izeulu iinshi, u shintu shoonse shilimo, ulimwi takala mu maanda aazakwa u matashi a bantu pe.
Alimwi kwiina cintu ncaapengele cikonzha kuhwa kubantu, nkaambo walo nguupa bumi u moza ngutuzoza, ushimwi shoonse.
Ulimwi kuhwa ku muntu womwi ngwaakalenga, mishobo ya bantu yoonse muyakahwa u kucita kwaamba bakale ano anshi yoonse. Mwini Leza nguwakabika shiindi sha bumi bwabo u nkubeelele kuya kukala.
Wakacita bobo ati bakonzhe kumukapula, kwaamba ambweni balakonzha kumuzhiba. Nikuba bobo Leza tali kulaale kuhwa kulyuumwi uumwi wesu pe.
Inta balaamba ati,
“‘Mwakwe mutuponena, mutweendela ulimwi mutubele.’
Mbubona mbubakalemba basongo benu ati,
“‘Aswe tuli banakwe.’
Inzho mbubona mbutuli banakwe Leza, tatweelele kutelaika ati Leza ulakozhanyiwa ubaleza bapange ba goludi nibaba ba siliva, na ibwe lyakabezwa ca buuza ulimwi ukucitwa mu maanu abantu.
Leza wiina kushibika maanu shibi shabo ciindi bantu nibatakaakuna kumuzhiba, pele ninzho ulabalailila bantu boonse umasena oonse kwaamba baleke shibi shabo.
Nkaambo Leza wakabamba kale buzuba mbwaakeezhiza kubeteka inshi yoonse cabululami kwiita mu muntu wezo ngwaakasala. Wakatondezha ku bantu boonse ati inguwe ngwaakasala kaambo wakamubusha ku bafwu.”
Inzho nibakateelela ati Paulu waamba makani aakubuka ku bafwu, bamwi akati kabo bakamuseka, pele bamwi bakaamba ati, “Tulazanda ukatwaambile ulimwi makani aza.”
Paulu wakakuhwa kumuswaangano wakaya.

Bamwi bakaba kuluya lwakwe, bakashoma. Akati ka bantu babo kakuli umwi wakaakutewa ati Dayonisiasi. Wezu kali wankamu ya Aleopagasi, ulimwi kakuli u mukaintu umwi wakaakutewa ati Damalisi, u bashomi bamwi.
Munshi lyaaza, Paulu wakamuhwa mu Asenisi wakaya ku Kolinto.

Koko nkwakaswaanganya mu Juda umwi uutewa ati Akwila, wakazhalilwa mu munzhi wa Pontusi. Wezu muntu antoomwi u Pulisila mwinakwe kabali beenzu bakahwa ku cishi ca Itali, nkaambo muleli mukando wa Loma utewa Kilaudiyasi, wakapa malailile aakuti ba Juda boonse bamuhwe mu munzhi wa Loma. Paulu wakaya kubabona.
Ulimwi ukaambo kakuti kabakwete mulimo womwi, ubobo wakakala abo nkaambo boonse kabali bashikuluka matente.
Paulu kabandika u bantu mucikombelo caba Juda lyoonse mu Sabata. Kazanda kwaamba ba Juda u ba Giliki bahumine Makani Mabotu.
Ciindi Sailasi u Timoti nibakashika kuhwa ku Masedoniya, Paulu wakapa ciindi cakwe coonse kwizwi, kupa bumboni bwakuti Jeso ngu Munanike wa Leza.

Inzho nibakamukazha u kumwaambila shintu shitaluleme, walo wiina naakakazhanya abo, wakapampumuna bulyo lufwuko kushisani shakwe u kubaambila ati, “Mwaliyaya nubeni! Ume ndiina mulandu pe. Kuhwa bwasunu ndaakukambaukila bantu bakunze.”
Amane wabashiya walonga waya kuŋanda ya muntu umwi uutewa ati Titiyasi Jusitasi, wakaakuli mukombi wa Leza. Iŋanda yakwe keebambene ucikombelo caba Juda.
Inzho Kilisipusi mweendelezhi wa cikombelo caba Juda wakashoma mu Mwami antoomwi uba mukwashi wakwe woonse. Ba Kolinto banji banji bakooteelela Mulumbe, bakashoma, ulimwi bakapapatizwa.
Bumwi buzuba ciindi ca mashiku Paulu wakabona cilengaano, Mwami Jeso wakamwaambila ati, “Utatiyi pe, kukambauka bulyo utacileka,
nkaambo ume ndili aze. Kwiina naaba womwi uukonzha kukucisa. Nkaambo ndikwete bantu banji banji momu mu munzhi.”
Ubobo Paulu wakakala koko kwamwaka omwi umyezhi iili cisambomwi, kayiisha bantu izwi lya Leza.
Inzho Galiyo naakabikwa a bweendelezhi bwa cishi ca Akaya, ba Juda bakabungana, bakamukwata Paulu bamutola kunkuta.
Bakaamba ati, “Wezu muntu ulashinicizha bantu kukomba Leza munzhila iteendelezhanya u mulawo!”
Paulu naataakazhimuke ati aambe, Galiyo wakaambila ba Juda ati, “Nikwaakuli ati wezu muntu wabisha na wacita mulandu mukando ku mweenzhiina, indakateelela kaambo kenu nuba Juda.
Pele mbwaali ati aza makani alaamba sha mazwi umazhina bulyo, u shintu shamilawo yenu. Umwe kaambo amukakabeteke nubeni. Ume nshikonzha kuba mubeteshi wa shintu shili bobo pe!”
Amane wakabatanda kuhwa acuuna ca lubeta.
Ngoonaawo boonse bakakwata mulombwana uutewa ati Sositinesi, mweendelezhi wa cikombelo caba Juda. Bakamuuma kumbele lya babeteshi, pele ceco ciina nicakamupenzha Galiyo nashoonto.
Inzho bakashika ku munzhi wa Efeso, koko Paulu nkwaakashiya Pulisila u Akwila. Wakenjila mucikombelo caba Juda u kuya kubandika abo.
Bantu bakamulomba kwaamba akale abo mazuba manji manji, pele wakakaka.
Pele naakabalaya wakabaambila ati, “Kuti kaluli luzando lwa Leza, ndakapiluka kono.” Ngoonaawo wakenjila mu bwato waya wakuhwa ku Efeso.
Inzho naakashika ku munzhi uutewa ati Sizaliya, wakaya kwaanzhanya iimbungano, amane wakaya ku Antiyoki.
Naakakala kaindi kali mbukabele mu Antiyoki, wakamuhwa, wakaita mucishi ca Galatiya u Filigiya waya ulaya buzumya zumya bashomi boonse.
Aciindi awo umwi mu Juda uutewa ati Apolosi, wakazhalilwa mu munzhi wa Alekizandiliya wakeza ku Efeso. Kali mwaambi musongo uucizhi kubandika twaambo. Ulimwi maŋwalu keezhi cini cini.
Wakaakuyiisha kabotu munzhila ya Mwami, ulimwi kaluwene cini cini mu kuyiisha sha Munanike wa Leza bululeme. Pele nikuba bobo kezhi bulyo lupapatizo lwaka Johani.
Wakakanka kwaamba cakutatiya mucikombelo caba Juda. Ciindi Pulisila u Akwila nibamuteelela, bakamutola kuŋanda yabo kwaamba bakamupandululile bululeme inzhila ya Leza.

Apolosi wakatelaika kuya ku Akaya, ubobo babunina bamu Efeso bakamuzumya zumya, ukulembela maŋwalu bashiciiya kwaamba bamutambule kabotu. Naakashika koko wakabayohwa cini cini babo bakaba bashomi kwiita mu luse.
Aze wakakazhanya u ba Juda akati kabuleya, kabatondezha kuhwa mu maŋwalu ati Jeso ngu Munanike wa Leza.
Ku ciindi ceco Apolosi naakaakuli mu Kolinto, Paulu wakaandula akati kacishi, wakaya kushika ku Efeso. Koko nkwakayana ba shiciiya bamwi,
mbakabuzha ati, “Sa mwakatambula Moza Usalala nimwakashoma?”
Bakamwiingula ati, Pe pe, uswe twiina nitwakateelela ati kuli u Moza Usalala.
Ngoonaawo Paulu wakababuzha ati, “No mwakapapatizwa lupapatizo nzhi?” Bakaingula ati, “Lupapatizo lwa Johani.”
Inzho nibakateelela bobo, bakapapatizwa mwizhina lya Mwami Jeso.
Ngoonaawo Paulu wakabaampa matashi akwe, bakawilwa Moza Usalala, bakakanka kwaamba mishobo iinji, u kukambauka mazwi a Leza.
Boonse antoomwi kabali balombwana baakuzanda kushika kwikumi ubatwesha bobile.
Kuhwaawo Paulu wakanjila mucikombelo caba Juda. Wakakambaucila bantu cakutatiya kwa mwezhi yotatwe, wakasoleka kubanjizha mu lushomo kwiita mukubandika abo sha Bwami bwa Leza.
Pele bamwi babo kabali bacikaka koobwa, bayina nibakashoma, ulimwi bakaamba mazwi aakusampaula bashoma inzhila
Ceci cakacitika kwa myaka yobile, ubobo bantu boonse bakaakukala mu cishi ca Ezha ba Juda u ba Giliki bakateelela izwi lya Leza.
Inzho Leza wakacita maleele manji manji aazoosha kwiita mwa Paulu.
Bantu kabacita ati na watola tutaulu nituba tusani ntwaakaakusebezha Paulu kubalwazhi, kabapona malwazhi abo, ulimwi u myoza mibiyabi keekushiwa mubantu.

Abo ba Juda bamwi bakaakuya bweendeenda u kuya bukusha myoza mibiyabi, bakasoleka kusebezha izhina lya Mwami Jeso kucita bobo. Bakaambila myoza mibiyabi ati, “Ndamulailila mwizhina lya Jeso wezo ngwaakambauka Paulu kwaamba muhwe.”
Baba bakaakucita bolya kabali bana bali ciloba bamulombwana umwi wakaakuli Mupaizhi Mukando utewa ati Sikeva.
Pele moza mubiyabi wakabaambila ati, “Jeso ndimwizhi, u Paulu ndimwizhi, noomwe ndimwe bani?”
Ngoonaawo mulombwana wakaakunjililwe moza mubiyabi wakabasotocela ca nsana wakakanka kubauma ukubazapaulila shakusama. Inzho bakalukanka kuhwa muŋanda yakwe cintanda bali u shilonda.
Ba Juda uba Giliki boonse bakaakukala mu Efeso bakaateelela makani aza. Ceci cakabaletela bukandu, ulimwi bantu bakatembaula izhina lya Mwami Jeso u kumupa bulemu.
Bashomi banji banji bakeza kulihuminina kubuleya ukulizubulula shibi nshibakacita.
Abo bashimabibo banji banji bakaleta mabuka abo ukwaatenta mu mulilo bantu boonse kabalanjilile. Nibakasanganya muulo wamabuka oonse wakashika ku shuulu shili makumi osanwe a mali a siliva.
Munzhila yezhi, izwi lya Mwami lyakaya impuwo ulimwi lyakakwata insana.
Inzho shintu sheshi nishakamana kucitika Paulu wakazeeza kuya ku Jelusalemu kwiita mu Masedoniya uku Akaya. Wakaamba ati, “Ako ku Loma ndyeelele nkaswaye.”
Inzho wakatuma Timoti u Elasitosi, balombwana bobile bakaakumuyohwa kwaamba baye ku Masedoniya walo naakaakucili mu Ezha.
Inzho ku ciindi ceco ncicona kwakabuka mapenzhi manji manji mu Efeso ku makani aakucilila inzhila ya Mwami.
Umwi mufwuzhi wa siliva uutewa ati Demetiliyosi wakapanga tukozhano twa siliva twa cikombelo ca leza mukaintu mupanje utewa ati Atemisi, makwebo aza akaleta impindu inkando kubasebezhi.

Ubobo Demetiliyosi wakoompolola basebezhi boonse antoomwi, ulimwi u bantu bamwi bakaakukwete mulimo uukozhene ungwaakaakucita, wabaambila ati, “Balombwanama, mulizhi ati buhubi bwesu bulahwa mu mulimo wezu ngutukwete.

Ulimwi mulibwene u kuliteelelela kwaamba tamuli bulyo mu Efeso, pele mucishi coonse ca Ezha mbucibelele, wezu Paulu mbwaaongelezha u kusandula bantu banji banji. Ulaamba ati baleza bakupanga u matashi a bantu tabali baleza pe.

Tuli mwipenzhi ikando, nkaambo calibonya ati mulimo wesu wabula bulemu ku bantu. Ulimwi taali azo bulyo, ipenzhi limwi ndyakuti, iŋanda ya leza wesu Atemisi ilasampuka. Aze leza wezu ulabula bulemu. Wezu ngu leza uukombwa u muntu woonse uukala mu Ezha ulimwi iinshi yoonse.”
Inzho bantu nibakateelela makani aza bakalemana cini cini, bakakanka kupozomoka ati, “Atemisi wamu Efeso ngu mukando cini cini!”

Lupyopyongano lwakakomena cini cini, lwakamwaala mu munzhi woonse. Inkamu yakakwata Geyasi u Alisitakosi balombwana bobile baku Masedoniya bashilweendonina Paulu. Ndilyona ndilyona bakabatola kucibanza cakusobanina.
Paulu mulwakwe kazanda kulitola kunkamu ya bantu, pele bashomi bakamukasha.
Bamwi bakaakuli bakando ba cishi ca Ezha, kabali balongwaakwe Paulu, bakamutumina mazwi aakumulomba ati atabi naalibonya kucibanza cakusobanina.
Inkamu yoonse ya bantu keeyindingene. Kabapozomoka bamwi balaamba ceci ubamwi ceci. Bamwi kabatacizhi ucakabaleta.

Bamwi bantu bakatelaika ati Alekizanda nguuli kaambo, nibakabona bama Juda bamutonkela kumbele lya buleya. Inzho Alekizanda wakatambika itashi lyakwe mwizeulu kwaamba bantu baliinze, ulimwi wakasoleka kulikusha mukaambo.
Pele bantu nibakezhiba ati kali mu Juda, boonse bakapozomokesha, kababweelela mazwi ngoona omwi aakuti, “Atemisi wamu Efeso ngu mukando cini cini!”

Ku mamanino mulombwana umwi wakaakuli mulembi wa mu munzhi, wakabalesha kusaba bantu. Wakabaambila ati, “Nubalombwana ba mu munzhi wa Efeso, ncitu cizhibilwe ku bantu boonse ati uswe tubantu ba mu munzhi weno, tuli bantu balemeka cikombelo ca leza Atemisi, ulimwi tulalemeka ibwe lyakahwa kwizeulu.
Kwiina muntu uukonzha kushikaka shintu sheshi. Ubobo amuliinze, mutabindaana kucita cintu niciba comwi.
Mwaleta bantu baba kono nikuba kuti bayina kwiba mucikombelo, nikuba kusampaula leza wesu.
Na kuti Demetiliyosi ubashimilimo nina, balikwete kaambo u muntu umwi, balakonzha kutolana kunkuta mazuba basebezhi nibasebeza.
Pele na nkucili cimwi cintu ncimuzanda, cilyeelele kubambwa iimbungano ya bashicishi.
Nkaambo ku cintu ceci cacitika bwasunu, tulakonzha kupewa mulandu wakuleta manyongwe. Kwiina ncitukonzha kutamicinzha, ulimwi kwiina kaambo keni keni nkutukapa.”
Amane kwaamba bobo, wakabaambila bantu ati atumwaale.
Inzho nilwakamana lupyopyongano, Paulu wakaswaanganya bashomi u kubaambila mazwi aakubazumya zumya. Amane wakabalaya waya ku Masedoniya.
Wakaita akati kamashi azo ulaya buzumya zumya bashomi mu twaambo tunji tunji. Wakaya kushika ku Giliki.
Wakakala koko kwa mwezhi yotatwe. Wakaakulibambila kuya ku cishi ca Siliya, naakazhiba ati ba Juda balamukanza, wakatelaika kwaamba apiluke ayite ku Masedoniya.
Sopata mwanakwe Pilusi uuhwa ku Beleya bakaya aze, u Alisitakosi u Sekundusi bahwa ku Debe. Timoti uba Tikikasi u Tolofimasi bahwa ku cishi ca Ezha.
Baba bakasolola bakaya kutulindila ku munzhi wa Tulowasi.
Nilyakamana ipobwe lya cinkwa ciina bumena, aswe twakaya u bwato kuhwa ku munzhi wa Filipi. Inzho naakamana mazuba osanwe twakaswaangana ku Tulowasi koko nkutwakakala insunda yomwi.

Mu buzuba butaanzhi bwa nsunda, twakabungana antoomwi ukukomona cinkwa. Nitwakamana Paulu wakakanka kwaambila bantu makani. Ukaambo kakuti kazanda kwaamba bwaca aakuya, wakaamba mpaka kushika akati kamashiku.
Kakuli malambe manji manji muŋanda ya mwizeulu mutwakaakubungene.

Ulimwi kakuli mweembezhi uutewa ati Yutikasi wakaakushite ewindo lya ŋanda. Inzho nkaambo kakuti Paulu wakatola ciindi cilamfwu ulaamba, Utikasi wakakanka kufwukula mpaka limwi woona. Inzho nakaakoona wakawa kuhwa ewindo lya ŋanda yatatu ya mwizeulu. Nibakaya kumulanga bakayana ulifwile.
Paulu wakaseluka anshi, wakaliwaala a mubili wamweembezhi ukumukumbata. Ngoonaawo wakaambila bantu ati, “Mutapengi ucilanga!”
Naakamana wakapiluka muŋanda ya mwizeulu. Wakakomona cinkwa walya. Wakabandika abo kwa ciindi cilamfwu, limwi bwaca amane wakalaya.
Inzho bantu bakamutola kuŋanda yakwabo mweembezhi wezo kali kabotu, ulimwi bakatangala cini cini.
Inzho twakataanguna kuya u bwato ku Asosi, koko nkutwakaakweelele kubweza Paulu mu bwato. Wakatwaambila kucita bobo nkaamba walo wakasolola umaulu kuya koko.
Inzho nitwakaswaangana aze ku Asosi, twakamulizika mu bwato kuya ku munzhi wa Mitiline.
Nibwakaca twakakuhwa koko twakaya ku munzhi wa Kiyosi u bwato. Buzuba bwakacilila twakaya kushika ku munzhi wa Asosi, muzuba bwatatu twakashika ku Miletasi.

Pele Paulu wakakwata muzeezo wakuya kwiita afwaafwi u munzhi wa Efeso, kwaamba atasowa ciindi mucishi ca Ezha, nkaambo kabindeene kwaamba afwambaane kushika ku Jelusalemu, ati na cilakonzheka, akashike mu buzuba bwa Pentekositi.
Paulu naakaakuli ku Miletasi wakatuma mulumbe ku Efeso wakulomba bakando ba mbungano kwaamba akaswaangane abo.
Nibakashika, Paulu wakabaambila ati, “Mulizhi mundakakala amwe, kuhwa kubuzuba butaanzhi indakashika mucishi ca Ezha.
Ndakasebezela Mwami cakulicesha akati ka mapenzhi umumause nkaambo ka shintu nshibakancita ba Juda.
Mulizhi ati kwiina cintu niciba comwi ncindakaseseka caakukonzha kumuyohwa, pele ndakamukambaukila ukumuyiisha mubuleya ulimwi umumaanda enu.
Ndakacita bobo kuba Juda u ba Giliki, ndakaakubalomba uku bacenjezha ati balyeelele kusanducila kwa Leza u kushoma mu Mwami Jeso.
Inzho amubone ndaya ku Jelusalemu, kaambo Moza Usalala mbuwandailila. Nshizhi cikaanciticila koko.
Pele ncinzhi bulyo ncakuti, Moza Usalala wancenjezha ati intolongo u mapenzhi shilanindila mu minzhi mikando yoonse.
Pele nshitelaici ati bumi bwangu bulikwete muulo kwangu. Cikando ncakuti ndyeelele kumaninzha mulimo wangu ngwakampa Mwami Jeso, wakwaambilizha Makani Mabotu a luse lwa Leza.
“Ndakeendeenda akati kenu noonse, kuya bukambauka Bwami bwa Leza. Inzho ndizhi ati tamukamboni linji pe.
Ubobo ndaamba cakushinizha ati na kuli bati bazhimine bwasunu koko nkwabo bamukamwini, ume ndiina mulandu.
Nkaambo kwiina ncindakaseseka kwenu. Pele ndakamukambaukila shoonse Leza nshaazanda.
Ubobo amulisunge nubeni, ulimwi mubambe butanga boonse bobo mbwaamupele Moza Usalala kweembela. Amweembele imbungano ya Leza yezho njaakanununa kwiita mubulowa bwa Mwanakwe.
Ndizhi kwaamba mbwinkaahwila bulyo, baumpe babutambo balakashika akati kenu, tabakamuleka pe.
Naaba akati kenu nubeni, kulakeza bamwi baamba shakubeya kwaamba bakwele bashomi nkubabele.
Ubobo amulibambe, ulimwi muzhibaluke ati kumyaka yotatwe ndakaiisha umwi uumwi wenu mashikati u mashiku, umisozhi minji minji.
“Inzho ndamushiya mu matashi a Leza u mumakani a luse lwakwe. Alo alakonzha kumuzaka u kumupa shileleko shesho nshaazobwela bantu bakwe boonse.
Ndiina indakalikumbuzha siliva naaba goludi wa muntu naaba omwi.
Umwe nubeni mulizhi ati ndakasebeza u matashi angu aza kuliyanina nshinzanda ushizanda beenzuma.

Ndakamutondezha mu shintu shoonse kwaamba muukusebeza ca nsana munzhila yezhi, tulyeelele kuyohwa balengushi ukuzhibaluka mazwi azo mwini Jeso ngaakaamba akuti, ‘Kuli cileleko kupa kubaala kutambula.’”
Inzho Paulu naakamana kwaamba, wakafwukama abo anshi u kukomba.
Boonse kabalila nibakaakumukumbata u kumushonta ciindi naakaakulaya.
Ucakabaala kubaletela buusu kumyonzo mazwi ngakaamba ati tabakamuboni linji. Bamane bakamushindikila kuya kubwato.
Inzho nitwakamana kulayana twakenjila mu bwato twasuumana kuya ku Kosi, nibwakaca twakashika ku Lodisi. Tuhwe koko twakaya ku Patala.
Koko twakayana bwato bwakaakuya ku Fonisiya, ubobo twakenjila twabushikula twaya.

Inzho twakaya kushika kubusena bumwi nkutwaakukonzha kubona ku mulando wa Saipulasi, ubobo twakaita kuluya nkuuli kucibizhi, twaya ku Siliya. Twakaya kushoka ku mulando wa Taya koko nkushaakuya kukushizhiwa shoonse shintu shaakuli mu bwato.
Koko twakayana bashomi mbutwakakala abo insunda yomwi. Kwiita munsana sha Moza, bakamwaambila Paulu ati atayi ku Jelusalemu.
Pele ciindi cesu nicakamana twakalaya u kuya mulweendo lwesu. Inzho boonse balombwana u benabo u bana bakatushindicila kuhwa mu munzhi, nitwakashika ku mulando twakafwukama twakomba.
Ngoonaawo twakalayana u kunjila mu bwato, balo bakabweela ku munzhi.
Twakaya mulweendo lwesu kuhwa ku Taya kuya kushika ku Pitolemaisi nkutwakaya kwaanzha bakwesu, ulimwi twakakala abo buzuba bomwi.
Mu buzuba bwakacilila, twakaya kushika ku munzhi wa Sizaliya. Nitwakashika koko twakaya kuŋanda ya mukambaushi uutewa ati Filipo, uumwi wabalombwana babo bali ciloba bakasalwa ku Jelusalemu.
Kakwete bana bashimbi bone bataakuna kutwalwa, ubakaakushinshima.
Twakaakuli koko kwaamazuba manji manji ciindi naakashika mushinshimi uuhwa ku cishi ca Judiya uutewa ati Agabasi.

Inzho wakeza nkutwaakubele wabweza lutambo lwa Paulu walyaanga kumatashi u kumatende, amane waamba ati, “Mbubolya mbuwaamba Moza Usalala, ‘Mukamwini lutambo lolu balakamwaanga umbona bolya ba Juda mu Jelusalemu, bamana bakamupe kumatashi a bantu bakunze.’
Nitwakaateelela makani aza, uswe ubamwi bantu bakoko twakamupembelezha Paulu kwaamba atayi ku Jelusalemu.”
Pele walo wakaingula ati, “Ncinzhi ncimulilauka ukulengaanya monzo wangu? Ume ndalibambila kale, ukutali bulyo kuya kwaangwa mu Jelusalemu, pele nikuba kuya kufwila ko ukaambo ka Mwami Jeso.”
Twakakacilwa kumupembelezha kwaamba atayi. Ubobo twakamuleka bulyo twaamba ati, “Alucitwe luzando lwa Mwami Leza.”
Nitwakakala mazuba ali mbwaabele koko, twakaanga twesu u kuya ku Jelusalemu.
Bamwi bashomi bahwa ku Sizaliya twakaya abo, bakatutola muŋanda ya muntu ngutwaakweelele kubaalila, Munasoni uuhwa ku Saipulasi. Wezu walo kali mushomi kuhwa ku mazuba a kale kale.
Nitwakashika mu Jelusalemu babunina bakatutambula kabotu cini cini.
Buzuba bwakacilila twakaya antoomwi u Paulu kuŋanda kwa Jemusi. Ubakando ba cikombelo boonse kabaliwo.
Paulu naakamana kubaanzha wakabapandululila shintu shoonse nshaakacita Leza akati ka bantu bakunze kwiita mu milimo yakwe.
Nibakateelela makani aza bakamutembaula Leza. Bakaambila Paulu ati, “Mukwesu Paulu ulakonzha kubona ati kuli shuulu shuulu shaba Juda baba bashomi, babo balyaabile ca kumaninina kucilila Mulawo.

Baba bantu bakaambilwa ati ulaya buyiisha ba Juda boonse bakala mushishi sha bantu bakunze kwaamba baleke kucilila Milawo ya Mozesi, u kubaambila ati bataakupalula banabo nikuba kucilila tunshiyanshiya twesu.
No tucite buti? Nkaambo bantu balyeelele kuteelela ati nkuuli wakashika.
Inzho mbubolya mbutuzanda kwaamba ucite. Kuli bantu bone kono bakalipinga kwa Leza.

Inzho koya ukasangane abo kwipobwe lyakulisalazha, ukabaliile shipo shizandika kwa Leza. Bamana nibati bakasakulwe. Munzhila yezhi bantu boonse balakazhiba ati makani ngubakaambilwa taashinizhe, ulimwi balakabona ati ulacilila Milawo ya Mozesi.

Inzho ku makani a bantu bakunze babo bakashoma, twabatumina luŋwalu lwakuti twakateelezhanya ati tabeelele kulya cakulya cakapaizhiwa ku mizhimu, nikuba kulya bulowa, nibaba banyama bashine, ulimwi ati batantamuke kumamambe.”

Inzho buzuba bwakacilila Paulu wakabweza balombwana babo bone baya antoomwi kuya kulisalazha. Kuhwaawo wakanjila muŋanda ya Leza kuya kubazhibya bantu buzuba bwamamanino ku ciindi cakulisalazha, lelyo umwi uumwi wabo nakaapa cipaizho cakwe.
Mazuba ali ciloba nakaakuli afwaafwi kwaamba amane, bamwi ba Juda bahwa ku cishi ca Ezha bamubone Paulu muŋanda ya Leza, bakashinicizha bantu banji banji ukumukwata Paulu.

Bakakanka kupozomoka ati, “Nubana Izilaili, amutuyohwe! Wezu ngumuntu uuya bweenda koonse bulyo, u kuya buyiisha bantu kwaamba basampaule ba Izilaili, u Milawo ya Mozesi ulimwi iiŋanda ya Leza. Ulimwi ninzho ngaawa waleta bantu ba Giliki muŋanda ya Leza, wasofwaazha busena bwakwe busalala.”
Bakaamba makani aza nkaambo Paulu bakamubona kali antoomwi u mulombwana uutewa ati Tulofimasi uuhwa ku Efeso, ubobo bakatelaika ati ambweni Paulu nguwamuleta muŋanda ya Leza.
Inzho iyowe lyakakomena mu munzhi woonse, bantu boonse bakalukancila ko, bakamukwata Paulu bamukwelela ansengwe lya ŋanda ya Leza. Ngoonaawo milyango ya ŋanda ya Leza yakayalwa.
Inzho babo bantu nibakaakuzanda kwaamba bamuyaye Paulu, makani akashika ku mweendelezhi wa bashikalumamba.
Ngoonaawo wakatuma bashikalumamba ulimwi ubakando babeendelezha ca kufwambaana. Inzho bantu nibakabona mweendelezhi uleza u bashikalumamba, bakaleka kumuuma Paulu.
Ngoonaawo mweendelezhi wa bashikalumamba wakaya kwa Paulu wamukwata, amane wakabalailila ati bamwaanje iinceetani shobile. Naakamana wakababuzha ati, “No nguni wezu muntu, ulimwi ncinzhi ncaacita?”
Bakaishanya bwaambe, bamwi bakaamba ceci bamwi ceci. Inzho mweendelezhi wiina naakazhiba meni meni ubobo wakalailila bashikalumamba bakwe ati bamutole Paulu nkubahwa.
Bakamutola ulaya bweenda abo kuya kushika amalizilo aamulyango waŋanda ya mwizeulu, awo bashikalumamba bakamukatula Paulu nkaambo bantu kabashaankane cini cini.
Bantu bakaakuya bucilila kabaya bupozomoka ati, “Naafwe!”
Inzho bashikalumamba nibakaakuzanda kumunjizha mukati, Paulu wakaambila mweendelezhi wa bashikalumamba ati, “Ndalomba ndazanda kwaambile cimwi cintu.”
Mweendelezhi wakabuzha Paulu ati, “Sa ulaamba ci Giliki?
Sa indiwe muna Ijipiti welya wakakubushizhe lupyopyongano aza mazuba ayita, ukusololela shuulu shone shabapapyu mulukula?”
Paulu wakaingula ati, “Pe pe, ume ndi mu Juda ndakazhalilwa mu munzhi wa Tasasi, mucishi ca Silisiya. Ndi mwinizhi wa mu munzhi mukando wa bulemu. Ndakomba ndeka ŋambe u bantu.”
Ngoonaawo mweendelezhi wakamuhuminya kwaamba ku bantu. Inzho Paulu wakazhima amalizilo watambika itashi lyakwe ku bantu. Inzho nibakaliinza, Paulu wakabaambila muci Alamu.
“Nubakwesu unumatata, amunteelele nkaambo ndazanda kulyaambilila ku bushu bwenu.”
Nibakateelela ati ulaamba muci Alamu bakaliinza. Inzho Paulu wakaamba ati,

“Ume ndi mu Juda mwini mwini, ndakazhalilwa ku Tasasi mucishi ca Silisiya, pele ndakakomenena mono mu Jelusalemu, Gamaliyeli nguwaakuli mwiiyi wangu. Ndakayiishiwa bululeme milawo yaba shaakale besu. Ulimwi ndakaakuli muntu uulipele kwa Leza mbubona mbumubele umwe noonse numuli ano bwasunu.
Ndakaakupenzha bantu bacilila inzhila impiya ya Mwami Jeso, ukubayaya. Ndakaanga balombwana u bakaintu ukubawaala muntolongo.”

Mupaizhi mukando u babeteshi bankuta balakonzha kwaahumina aza makani ati meni meni. Nkaambo imbabo bakampa maŋwalu aakuya bucilila bakwesu ku Damasikasi. Inzho ndakaya koko kwaamba nkabaanje babo bantu banzhila yezhi, ukubaleta ku Jelusalemu kabaanjilwe inceetani kwiza kusubulwa.
“Inzho indakaakuya bweenda munzhila iiya ku Damasikasi, ciindi ca mashikati, mumuni mukando wakamweka kuhwa kwizeulu wanzhinguluka.
Ndakawa anshi, ulimwi ndakateelela izwi lyaamba ati, ‘Saulu, Saulu! Ncinzhi ncuumpenzhezha?’
Ndakabuzha ati, ‘No ndiweni Mwami?’ Wakanyingula ati, ‘Ndime Jeso wa Nanzaleta, nguupenzha.’
Mbutwaakuli abo bakoobona mumuni, pele izwi lya wezo wakaakwaamba bayina ukaliteelela.
Ndakabuzha ati, ‘No ncite buti Mwami?’ Mwami wakanyingula ati, ‘Zhimuka koya ku Damasikasi koko nkuukakaambilwa shoonse nshuuyelele kucita.’
Ndakoofwaala nkaambo kamumuni wakamwekesha, ubobo bashilweendoma bakankwata kwitashi ukunjizha mu munzhi wa Damasikasi.
“Mu munzhi momu kakuli mulombwana umwi waakutewa ati Ananiyasi, kali muntu wa Leza uucilila Milawo, ulimwi ba Juda boonse bakaakukala mu Damasikasi kabamulemeka.
Wakeza kwangu wazhima afwaafwi waamba ati, ‘Mukwesu Saulu, menso ako naabone ulimwi!’ Ngoonaawo ndakacikonzha kulanga ulimwi, ndakamubona.
Inzho Wakaamba ati, ‘Leza waba shaakale besu wakusala kwaamba uzhibe luzando lwakwe, u kwaamba ati ubone bululami bwa Muzhice wakwe, ulimwi u kuteelela izwi lyakwe.
Nkaambo ulakaba kamboni wakwe wakwaambila bantu shintu nshuubona u kuteelela.
No ulindila nzhi? Zhimuka upapatizwe shisanzhiwe shibi shako, ompolola izhina lya Mwami.’
“Inzho ndakapiluka ku Jelusalemu. Ciindi indakaakukomba muŋanda ya Leza ndakabona Mwami mukati ka mizeezo yangu ulaamba ati,
‘Fwambaana muhwe mu Jelusalemu, nkaambo bantu kono kwiina nibakateelela bumboni bwako bwa makani angu.’
Ndakaingula ati, ‘Ee Mwami, balizhi kabotu kwaamba ati ndakaakuya mu shikombelo shaba Juda, kuya kwaanga ukuuma babo bakaakushoma mulyuuwe.
Ulimwi u kamboni wako Sitivini naakayayiwa, ume ndimwini ndakakuliko, ndakateelezhanya u babo bakamuyaya, ulimwi ndime indakaakulindila shisani shababo bakamuyaya.’
“Inzho Mwami wakaŋambila ati, ‘Koya bulyo nkaambo ndakakutuma kulaale kuli bantu kunze.’ ”
Bantu kabapupulele mpaka kushika ciindi Paulu nakaamba mazwi aza, inzho bakasaba ukupozomoka ati, “Naahwe anshi! Nkaambo teelele kupona!”
Ciindi bantu nibakaakucisaba ukusowaila shakusama shabo ukufwusa ihu mwizeulu,
mweendelezhi waba shikalumamba baba Loma wakalailila bantu kwaamba bamunjizhe muŋanda Paulu, ulimwi wakabalaila ati aumwe kwaamba bayane na nkaambonzhi ba Juda ncibakaakumuhoolosha bolya.

Pele nibakamwaanga kwaamba bamuume, Paulu wakaambila umwi mukando wa bashikalumamba wakaakuzhimine afwaafwi ati, “Sa cili mu mulawo kwaamba ati umwe muume muntu waci Loma katana u kubetekwa u kuyaninwa mulandu?”
Shikalumamba wezo naakateelela bobo, wakaya ku mweendelezhi wa bashikalumamba u kuya kumubuzha ati, “Anu ncinzhi ncuzanda kucita? Welya muntu mu Loma!”
Ubobo mweendelezhi wakaya kwa Paulu wamubuzha ati, “Amba kabotu, sa uli mu Loma?”
Paulu wakamwiingula ati, “Ee.”
Mweendelezhi wakaamba ati, “Ume bu Loma ndakabuula mali manji manji.”
Paulu wakaamba ati, “Ume mbwakuzhalwa.”
Ngoonaawo babo bantu bakaakuzanda kumubuzha mibuzho bakasesuluka, u mweendelezhi wakatiya naakazhiba ati Paulu kali mu Loma, ulimwi kaanjilwe inceetani.

Inzho mweendelezhi wa bashikalumamba kazandisha kwaamba ezhibe na mulandunzhi ba Juda ngubaakuzanda kumupa Paulu. Ubobo buzuba bwakacilila wakamwaangulula, amane wakalailila bapaizhi bakando kwaamba baswaangane. Inzho wakaleta Paulu wamuzhimika kumbele lyabo.
Inzho Paulu wakabatongomwena ba shinkuta waamba ati, “Bakwesu ndazeeza ati ndapona bumi bubotu kubushu bwa Leza kushika bwasunu.”
Mupaizhi mukando Ananiyasi naakateelela bobo wakaambila babo bakaakuzhimine afwaafwi u Paulu ati bamuume ku mulomo.
Paulu wakaamba ati, “Aze Leza ulakuuma, uwe ubwaanda bulambilwe mulambo utuba! Ulazanda kumbeteka ku Mulawo pele aze woosotoka mulawo niwalailila ati ngumwe.”
Inzho bantu bakaakuzhimine afwaafwi u Paulu bakamwaambila ati, “Uwe ulatuka mupaizhi mukando wa Leza!”
Mbwaakaambila bulyo bobo, ba Falisi u ba Saduki bakakanka kukazhanya akati kabo beni ubobo shakaba inkamu shaandeene.
Nkaambo ba Saduki balaamba ati bantu tabakabuci ku bafwu, ulimwi ati kwiina baanjelo u myoza. Pele ba Falisi balashihumina sheshi shoonse ati nkushili.

Izwanga lyakakomena kwakaba iyowe. Inzho bamwi balembi bakaakuli bankamu yaba Falisi bakazhimuka ukukazha cini cini ati, “Kwiina cintu niciba comwi cibiyabi ncitwayana ku muntu wezu! Ambweni kuli moza umwi na anjelo wakamwaambila!”

Bakakazhanya cini cini cakuti mweendelezhi wa bashikalumamba wakatiya ati bantu bakalamuzapaula Paulu, ubobo wakalailila bashikalumamba bakwe kwaamba banjile mukati munkamu bakamukushe mo, bamutole muŋanda yabo.
Ngoona mashiku azo, Mwami wakeza kuzhima afwaafwi u Paulu wamwaambila ati, “Cikwate camba! Nkaambo bolya mbuwaŋambilizha mono mu Jelusalemu ulyeelele uku Loma ukacite mbubona.”
Nibwakaca, bamwi ba Juda bakaswaangana kwaamba bayane muzeezo wakumucita Paulu. Bakapinga ati tabeelele kulya u kunwa cintu niciceya mpaka bamuyaye Paulu.
Kabali bantu baitilila ku makumi one bakaakukwete muzeezo wezu.
Bakaya ku mukando wa bapaizhi u kubakando ba cikombelo babaambila ati, “Twapinga ati twiina nitukaalya cintu mpaka tumuyaye Paulu.

Ubobo umwe antoomwi u babeteshi boonse, mutume ku mweendelezhi wa bashikalumamba kwaamba amulete Paulu kwenu, mumucenge ati mulazanda kubweza makani meni meni kuhwa kwakwe. Uswe tulaakulibambile kumuyaya katana kushika koko.”
Inzho umwi mwiwa waka Paulu mulombwana wakaateelela makanze abo, ubobo wakaya kunjila muŋanda mwaakaakubele Paulu waya kumwaambila makanze azo.
Ngoonaawo Paulu waketa umwi wa bashikalumamba, wamutuma ati, “Mutole wezu mweembezhi ku mweendelezhi wa bashikalumamba ukamushimwine ati ulikwete makani akumwaambila.”

Shikalumamba wezo wakabweza mweembezhi wamutola ku mweendelezhi wa bashikalumamba. Ashike wamwaambila ati, “Mwaanje Paulu kentile, wanomba ati ndete mweembezhi wezu kwako nkaambo ulikwete kaambo nkazanda kukwaambila.”
Mweendelezhi wakakwata mweembezhi kwitashi wamutola kumabali, wamubuzha ati, “Waleta akucani?”
Mweembezhi wakaamba ati, “Bamwi ba Juda bateelezhanya kwaamba bakeze kwako zona, kwiza kulomba ati umutole Paulu kunkuta, bakucenge ukoya balazanda kuteelelesha kaambo kakwe.

Pele mutakahumina, kaambo kuli balombwana babaala ku makumi one bakaazuba munzhila kulindila Paulu. Boonse bakalipinga ati tabakali nikuba kunwa mpaka bakamuyaye Paulu. Bolya ninzho balilibambile kale kucita bobo. Balalindila bulyo mbukaamba.”
Inzho mweendelezhi wa bashikalumamba wakaambila mweembezhi ati, “Utaambila muntu uunji ati wanshimwina aza makani. Ngoonaawo wakamuleka mweembezhi wakapiluka.”

Inzho mweendelezhi wa bashikalumamba waketa balukando lukando bobile wabaambila ati, “Amubambe bashikalumamba bali myaamda iili yobile baye ku Sizaliya antoomwi ubashimbizhi bali makumi ali ciloba. Ulimwi ubashimasumo bali myaanda yobile, balibambile kweenda bwasunu mashiku ciindi bantu nibamana kulalila.
U Paulu mumubambile imbizhi, mukamushishe kabotu ku mweendelezhi wa cishi Felikisi.
Ulimwi wakabalembela luŋwalu lwaamba ati:
“Ndime Kilaudiyasi Lisiyasi ndalembela uwe uulemekwa Felikisi. Ndakwaanzha.
Ba Juda bakakwata mulombwana wezu ulimwi balazanda kumuyaya. Ciindi indakazhiba ati mu Loma, ndakaya u bashikalumamba bangu kuya kumuhuna.
Ndakaakuzanda kuzhiba mulandu ngubakamupa, ubobo ndakamutola kunkuta yabo.
Ndakayana ati kwiina cintu ncaakakucitile ceelele kwaamba ayayiwe nikuba kubikwa muntolongo. Mulandu ngubakaakumupa kooli wamibuzho ya milawo yabo.
Pele indakaambilwa ati ba Juda balazanda kumuyaya, ndakatelaika kwaamba mutume kwako. Ndakaabaambila babo bamupa mulandu kwaamba bezhize bakushimwine mulandu wakwe.”
Inzho bashikalumamba Baciloma bakacita mbubona mbubakaambilwa. Bakamutola Paulu baya kumushiya ku munzhi wa Antipatilisi mashiku azo ngoona.
Buzuba bwakacilila bashikalumamba ba shimaulu bakapiluka nkubakala bakashiya bashimbizhi kwaamba baakuciya u Paulu.
Balo bakaya kumushisha ku Sizaliya u kuya kupa luŋwalu ku mweendelezhi wa cishi, bakamushiya Paulu mu matashi akwe.
Mweendelezhi wakabala luŋwalu amane wakamubuzha Paulu kwaamba amushimwine kuluya lya cishi nkwaakahwa. Naakateelela ati ulahwa ku Silisiya
wakamwaambila ati, “Ndakakuteelela bakashika bashimulandunoko.” Amane wakalailila ati Paulu akwabililwe u bashikalumamba ulimwi abikwe mu maanda ngaakashiya mwami Helodi.

Naakaita mazuba osanwe, mukando wa bapaizhi Ananiyasi wakaya ku Sizaliya, wakatola ubakando ba cikombelo ulimwi uushimulawo umwi utewa ati Tetulasi. Bakaya kulibonya u mweendelezhi Felikisi u kupandulula makani a mulandu ngubakamupa Paulu.

Inzho nibakamwita Paulu Tetulasi wakabeteka nkaambo kakwe bolya, “Uulemekwa! Busolozhi bwako bwabusongo bwakatuletela ciindi caluumuno cilamfwu, ulimwi shintu shinji shinji shibotu shilyeelele kwaamba shilacitwa mukusumpula ukuleta bubotu mucishi cesu.
Sheshi shintu shili bolya shilatambulwa kuli uswe cakulumba munzhila shoonse u masena oonse.
Nikuba bobo nshizanda ukusowela ciindi, ubobo ndalomba kwaamba upupulale matongaushi esu mubufwaafwi.
Twayana ati wezu muntu ulaungumuka. Ulaleta lupyopyongano akati kaba Juda inshi yoonse, ulimwi ngumusololi wankamu iitewa ati ba Nanzaleta.
Naakaakuzanda kusofwaazha iŋanda ya Leza twakamukwata. Twakaakuzanda kumubeteka kwiita mu mulawo wesu.
Pele naakashika mweendelezhi Lisiyasi, wakamubweza ca kusebezha insana wamukusha mu matashi esu.
Amane wakapa malailile aakwaamba ati babo bazanda kumupa mulandu bezhize kumbele lyako. Nikuba kumubuzha buzha uwe lwako umwini ulaliteelelela totu twaambo ntutwakwaambila.”
Abo ba Juda bakahumina u kwaamba ati azo meni meni mbutubele twaambo toonse.
Inzho mweendelezhi wakapa Paulu ciindi ca kwaamba, aze Paulu wakaamba ati:
“Ndizhi ati uli mubeteshi wa cishi ceno kwa ciindi cilamfwu, ubobo ndibotelelwe kwaamba ndyaambilile kumbele lyako.
Mulakonzha kuzhiba nubeni ati kwaita bulyo mazuba ali ikumi kuhwa indakashika ku Jelusalemu kwiza kukomba.
Ba Juda bayina nibakanjana ndakazhanya umuntu muŋanda ya Leza. Nikuba kunjana ndaleta lupyopyongano akati ka bantu, nimuba mu shikombelo shaba Juda, nimuba mumunzhi ili buti.
Tabakonzha kutondezha ati shintu sheshi nshibantamicizha ngushili.

Ncinhumina bulyo kulyuumwe nciceci, ndakomba Leza waba shaakale besu kwiita mukucilila inzhila ya Mwami Jeso, yezho njibaamba ati nja bantu bapapile. Ulimwi ndashoma shintu shoonse shilembelwe mu Milawo ya Mozesi u mabuka a bashinshimi.
Ndikwete lulanjilo lomwi mwa Leza ulukozhene ulolo ndubakwete baba bali awa lwakuti, boonse bantu baluleme u bataluleme balakabushiwa ku bafwu.
Ubobo ndasoleka lyoonse mbuli munkonzha, kwaamba ndukusalala mu monzo kumbele lya Leza u bantu.
Ciindi indaakucita mulimo wezu wakulisalazha, bakanjana muŋanda ya Leza. Kakwiina inkamu ya bantu njindaakuli ayo, ulimwi kakwiina lupyopyongano pe.
Pele kakuli ba Juda bamwi bahwa ku cishi ca Ezha. Babo abo balyeelele kwiza kono u kupa kaambo kabo kulyuumwe, bambeteke na balikwete kaambo nkubakonzha kumpa.
Nibaba beni baba bali ano nabaambe na kuli mulandu ngubakanjanina ciindi indakabetekwa munkuta yabo.
Cita bulyo cintu comwi ncindakaamba indaakuzhimine kumbele lyabo. Ndakaamba ati, ‘Mwambeteka bwasunu ukaambo ka bulangizhi bwangu bwakuti, bafwu balakabuka.’ ”
Inzho Felikisi mbwaakaakweezhi kabotu makani a nzhila ya Mwami Jeso, wakayala u mazwi aakuti, “Mulandu wenu ndakookosola akashika mweendelezhi Lisiyasi.”
Amane wakapa malailile kwashikalumamba wakaakulanga Paulu ati aakumubamba, pele balindizhi balyeelele kumupa lwaanguluko kwaamba aakubonana ubalongwaakwe bakonzha kumuyohwa.

Inzho nikwakaita mazuba ali mbwaabele, Felikisi wakeza u mwinakwe Dilasila wakaakuli mu Juda. Felikisi wakatuma kwaamba Paulu aletwe kwakwe. Bakeza kumupupulala ciindi naakaakubandika shalushomo mwa Kilisito Jeso.

Pele Paulu nakaakucikanana makani a bululami ukulyeendelezha mu bumi, ulimwi u makani a buzuba bwa lubeta, Felikisi wakafwa bukandu, wakaambila Paulu ati, “Mbubo lyaninzho! Ulakonzha kuya. Ndakayana ciindi cibotu ndakakoompolola.”
Nikuba bobo kakwete bulanjizhi bwakuti ambweni Paulu ulamupa mali a cishinka mulomo, ubobo kafwuzha fwuzha kumoompolola ukubandika aze.
Inzho nikwakaita myaka yobile, Posiyasi Fesitosi wakeza kubweza busena bwa Felikisi bwa bweendelezhi bwa cishi. Inzho Felikisi mbwakaakuzanda kulisepya kuba Juda, wakashiya Paulu muntolongo.
Inzho kwiite mazuba otatwe kuhwa ciindi Fesitasi nakashika mucishi, wakaya ku Jelusalemu kuhwa ku Sizaliya.
Ngoonaawo bapaizhi bakando u bakando baba Juda bakeza kwakwe kuleta matongaushi abo u kupa mulandu Paulu.
Bakamulomba Fesitasi Kwaamba abafwile inkumbu Paulu atolwe ku Jelusalemu. Bakabalomba calucengo, nkaambo kabakanzile kumuzubilila munzhila u kumuyaya Paulu.
Fesitasi wakabaingula ati, “Paulu mwaanje mu Sizaliya, ulimwi ume ndili afwaafwi kuya ko.
Ubobo atukaye antoomwi ubasololi benu ku Sizaliya kwaamba bakamupe kaambo wezu mulombwana na kuli cibiyabi ncaakacita.”
Fesitasi wakakala abo mazuba ali lusele na ikumi, amane wakabweela ku Sizaliya. Buzuba bwakacilila wakenjila munkuta wakalailila ati Paulu aletwe.
Paulu naakashika, ba Juda bakahwa ku Jelusalemu, bakazhima bamuzhinguluka bakanka kumulenjelela twaambo tunji tunji twakumupa mulandu. Pele kabatalozha kupa bumboni bwakuti twaambo totu ntwini twini.
Paulu wakalizumananina mwini ati, “Ndiina indakasotoka Milawo yaba Juda, niiba iŋanda ya Leza, naaba Muleli Mukando waku Loma.”
Fesitasi kazanda kubotezha ba Juda, ubobo wakabuzha Paulu ati, “Sa utolwe ku Jelusalemu kwaamba nkakubetekele nkuko?”

Paulu wakamwiingula ati, “Ndizhimine munkuta ya muleli mukando waku Loma, momo munjelele kubetekelwa. Kwiina cibiyabi ncindakacita kuba Juda mbuli mbumwizhi amwe. Kuti na ndakasotoka mulawo u kucita cintu cimwi ceelele lufwu, nshikaki kufwa pe.

Na kuti ndibishizhe, ulimwi ndakacita mulandu uyelele lufwu nshitiyi pe. Pele na kuti twaambo ntubampa katutali twini twini, kwiina muntu uyelele kuntambika mu matashi abo. Ndalishisha ku Muleli mukando waku Loma.”
Fesitasi naakamana kubandika ubashikumubula, wakaambila Paulu ati, “Mbuwalishisha ku Muleli Mukando waku Loma, ulaya kumuleli mukando waku Loma nkukona.”
Inzho nikwakaita mazuba ali mbwaabele, mwami Agilipa u Benisi mwinakwe bakashika ku Sizaliya kwiza kuswaya u kwaanzha Fesitasi.
Nibakakala mazuba manji manji, Fesitasi wakaambila mwami Agilipa mulandu waka Paulu. Wakaamba ati, “Kuli muntu umwi kono ngwakashiya muntolongo Felikisi.
Inzho indakaakuli ku Jelusalemu, bakando babapaizhi u bakando baba Juda, bakaleta makani kwangu, bakanomba ati wezu muntu apewe mulandu wa lufwu.

“Ndakabaambila ati tacili ciyanza caba Loma kupa mulandu muntu naaba ni, kuti shimulandunina katewo. Bashikaambo boonse balyeelele kuletwa munkuta antoomwi kwaamba umwi uumwi wabo akonzhe kulyaambilila mukamwini.
Nibakashika kono boonse ndiina indakasowa ciindi, ndakenjila munkuta ukulailila ati Paulu aletwe.
Inzho bashikumupa mulandu bakazhimuka munkuta, pele kwiina mulandu ngubakaamba nuuba womwi wamilandu yezho nyindaakutelaika ati njibamupele.
Kaambo nkubakwete bulyo, nkamakani aakukazhanya u Paulu, mu twaambo twabukombi bwabo, u makani a muntu umwi wakafwa utewa ati Jeso, wezo Paulu ngwaamba ati mumi.
Ndakaakwiina mundaakukonzha kuyana twaambo twini twini twamakani aza mbuli mbwaabele. Ubobo ndakamubuzha Paulu kwaamba na ulazanda kuya ku Jelusalemu kwaamba akabetekelwe nkuko.

Pele walo wakalishisha ku Muleli Mukando waku Loma, wakalomba ati alangwe u bashikalumamba mpaka kaambo kakwe kakashike ku muleli mukando waku Loma. Ubobo ndakalailila ati kacaanjilwe mpaka akatumwe ku muleli mukando waku Loma.”
Agilipa wakaamba ati, “Ame lwangu ndaakuzanda kumuteelela muntu wezo.”
Fesitasi wakaamba ati, “Ulaamuteelela zona mabala.”

Nibwakaca Agilipa u Benisi mwinakwe bakeza balisamine shabulemu, ulimwi bakacitilwa shiyanza sha cishi shakutondezha kusekelela u kupa bulemu ku muntu mukando. Bakenjila muŋanda yakubunganina, bakashindicilwa u basololi babashikalumamba ubakando ba munzhi. Inzho Felisitasi wakalailila ati Paulu aletwe.

Ngoonaawo Felisitasi wakaamba ati, “Ku mwami Agilipa, amwe noonse nutuli amwe mono. Mwamubona muntu wezu ngubaswile ba Juda boonse bakala kono uku Jelusalemu. Bakandetela matongaushi abo kukaambo kakwe. Bakapozomoka ati teelele kupona.
Pele ume ndayana ati wiina mulandu ngwaakacita ngwayelele kukosolelwa lufwu. Ulimwi aze mwini mbwakalishisha ku muleli mukando waku Loma, ndakatelaika kwaamba ati mutume ku Loma.

Nikuba bobo ndiina kaambo keni keni kakulemba ku muleli mukando waku Loma. Ubobo ndamuleta kono kulyuumwe, kwaambisha ku mwami Agilipa! Kwaamba twamana kumubuzha buzha kaambo kakwe mbukabele njane ncinjelele kulemba.
Nkaambo ndashoma ati tacili ca busongo kwaamba ntume mwaanje kwiina u kutondezha mulandu wakwe mbuubele.”
Inzho Agilipa wakaambila Paulu ati, “Wapewa insana shakulyaambilila umwini.” Inzho Paulu wakatambika itashi lyakwe ukulyaambilila mwini ati,
“Mwami Agilipa, ndalibona ati ndikwete coolwe, kwaamba bwasunu ndyaambilile ndimukamwini mulandu ngubampa ba Juda.
Kwaambisha ceci cabota nkaambo umwe mulizhi kabotu makani a shiyanza shoonse shaba Juda. Ubobo ndamulomba kwaamba munteelele kabotu.”
“Ba Juda boonse balizhi kabotu bumi bwangu mundapona kuhwa kubwana bwangu. Balizhi kwaamba kuhwa ku makancilo ndakaakukala mucishi cakwesu ulimwi umu Jelusalemu mwaloolona.
Balinzhi kwa ciindi cilamfwu, ulimwi na balazanda, balakonzha kupa bumboni bwakuti, kuhwa ku makancilo ume ndakaakuli wankamu yaba Falisi, yezho iyendelezha twaambo twabukombi bwesu.
Inzho ndizhimine ano ukubetekwa ukaambo kalulanjilo lwangu mucishomezho ceco Leza ncaakashomezha ba shaakale besu.

Ceci ncicishomezho ncibalanjila kutambula bantu bamishobo yesu iili ikumi iitwesha yobile, babo bakomba Leza mashikati u mashiku. U mwami mulemu, inzho kaambo kakuba ululanjilo lolu, ncipelwa mulandu kuba Juda.
Umwe numuli ano noonse, no ncinzhi cimuzhinga kwaamba ati Leza ulabusha bafwu?
Ceco incico ncindaacita mu Jelusalemu. Ndakapewa insana ku bapaizhi bakando, ulimwi ndakabika bantu banji banji muntolongo. Ulimwi nibakaakubetekwa ame ndakaakuhumina.

Shiindi shinji shinji ndakaakuya bubasubula mu shikombelo shaba Juda, ndakaakuzanda kwaamba balusule lushomo lwabo. Ndakaakuli mukali cini cini mu makani aza, ndakaakuya u muminzhi imwi u mashi andeene andeene.”
“Kaka nkukaambo kakantola ku munzhi wa Damasikasi, munsana u malailile ngundakapewa kuhwa ku bapaizhi bakando.
Mwami, twakaakuya bweenda mumukwakwa ciindi ca mashikati indakabona mumuni uuhwa kwizeulu, uumweka cini cini kubaala izuba wakatuzhinguluka u babo mbutwakaakuli abo.
Toonse twakawa anshi. Inzho ndakateelela izwi lyaamba muci Alamu ati, ‘Saulu, Saulu! Ncinzhi ncuumpenzhezha? Ulalicisa bulyo kuti kusansa mulenzha kunsonga yesumo.’
Inzho ndakabuzha ati, ‘No ndiweni Mwami?’ Walo wakaingula ati, ‘Ndime Jeso nguupenzha.
Pele zhimuka! Ndalibonya kwako kwaamba nkusale ube musebezhi wangu. Ukaambile bamwi shintu shesho nshiwabona kulyuume bwasunu. U shesho nshinkaakutondezha.
Ndakakuhuna kuhwa kuba Izilaili uku bantu bakunze, nkaambo inkuko nkundakutuma.

Ukayalule menso abo ukabakushe mu mushinze kubatola mu mumuni. Ukabakushe munsana shaka Shaatani ukabanjizhe kwa Leza kwaamba ati, kwiita mu lushomo lwabo mulyuume, bakalecelelwe shibi shabo u kuyana busena akati ka bantu mbakasala Leza.’
“U mwami Agilipa, ndiina indakakaka kucihumina cilengaano ceco ncindakabona kuhwa mwizeulu.
Ndakakambauka kukancila mu Damasikasi kuya kushika ku Jelusalemu, ulimwi umucishi coonse ca Judaya ukubantu bakunze, ati balyeelele kusanduka kuhwa mu shibi shabo ukutambula Leza.
Aza ngu makani ngubakankwatila ba Juda ciindi indaakuli muŋanda ya Leza ulimwi kabazanda kunjaya.

Pele kushicila bwasunu ngu Leza uunjohwele, ubobo ncinzhimine ano kwaamba mpe bumboni bwangu ku bantu boonse, bana u bakando kufwumbwa bulyo. Ceci ncindaamba incico ncibakaakwaamba bashinshimi u Mozesi ati cilakacitika,
ca kwaamba ati Munanike wa Leza ulyeelele kupenga ukuba mutaanzhi kubuka ku bafwu, kwaamba makani a lufwutuko akakambaukwe kuba Juda uku bantu bakunze, kwaamba aza makani akabe mumuni nkubabele.”
Inzho Paulu naakaakucikanana bobo, Fesitasi wakapozomoka ati, “Paulu uli musondoshi! Lwiiyo lwako lwakusondola!”

Paulu wakaingula ati, “Pe pe, U mwami wangu nshisondokele. Makani nguŋamba nga cini cini. Ulimwi ame monzo ulishite. Ndashoma ati balaacilila kabotu kabotu makani oonse, kaambo ceci cintu kacitali cisesece.
Mwami Agilipa, ulishizhi shoonse sheshi. Ceco incico cimpa kwaamba u monzo uushite. Ndishinizhe kwaamba ati makani aza oonse balaacilila kabotu kabotu, nkaambo cintu ceci kacitali cisesece pe.
U mwami Agilipa, sa ulaashoma mazwi a bashinshimi? Ndizhi ati ulaashoma!”
Inzho mwami Agilipa wakaambila Paulu ati, “Sa ulazanda kunsandula ati mbe muna Kilisito muciindi cishoonto ceci?”
Inzho Paulu wakaingula ati, “Ciindi nicikaceya na nicikakomena, kukomba kwangu nkwakuti, uwe umwami ubamwi banteelele ano bwasunu, babe ukoya ume, kukusha bulyo inceetani sheshi nshiŋanjilwe!”
Inzho mwami Agilipa, u Benisi mwinakwe, umusololi wa munzhi, u babo mbaakaakushite abo bakazhimuka.
Nibakahwa muŋanda kabaya bulyaambauzha ati, “Wezu muntu kwiina cibiyabi ncaakacita ceelele kwaamba ayayiwe nikuba kubikwa muntolongo.”
Agilipa wakaambila Fesitasi ati, “Kuti naatakalishisha ku muleli mukando waku Loma, naangululwa bulyo.”

Inzho muzeezo wakuya ku Itali u bwato niwakahuminwa, Paulu antoomwi uba shintolongo nina bamwi, bakabikwa mu matashi aka Juliyasi. Wezu muntu kali mukando wankamu yaba shikalumamba baku Loma itewa ati, “Bashikalumamba ba muleli mukando waku Loma.”

Twakanjila mu bwato bwakahwa ku Adilamitiyamu bobo mbutwakayana bulibambilwe kushikulwa kuya kwiita mu milando ya cishi ca Ezha. Aze Alisitakosi uuhwa mu munzhi wa Tesalonika mucishi ca Masedoniya twakaya abo.
Mu buzuba bwakacilila twakashika ku Sidoni. Inzho Juliyasi kali muntu shiluse kwa Paulu. Wakamuleka ati anjile mu munzhi kubona balongwaakwe kwaamba bamuyohwe shintu nshaakaakupengele.
Kuhwa koko twakaita kumilando ya cishi ca Saipulasi kaambo muuwo wakaungisha cini cini.
Twakalanduka lweenje lulangene ushishi sha Silisiya u Pamfiliya, twakashika ku Mila mucishi ca Lisiya.
Koko mukando wa bashikalumamba wakayana bwato bwakahwa ku munzhi wa Alekizandiliya kabuya ku Itali, amane wakatunjizha mumo.

Nkaambo kamuuwo wakaakuunga, bwato kabweenda bulyo ashoonto shoonto, ku mamanino twakaya kushika afwaafwi u munzhi wa Sinidasi. Inzho nkaambo kakuti muuwo wakaitilila kuunga, twakaita kuluya lwacilwa ca Kileti kwaakufwukeme, twaya kwiita afwaafwi u munzhi wa Salimone.
Twakabembeleka kumbali ku mulando, nikuba kwaamba twakayana mapenzhi mulweendo lwesu, twakaya kushika kubusena butewa ati Milando Mibotu afwaafwi u munzhi wa Laseya.
Mbucakalibonya ati kweenda mu bwato kulatuletela mapenzhi, twakakala ciindi cilamfwu koko mpaka nicakaita ciindi cakuliimya kulya. Inzho Paulu wakabacenjezha bantu ati,
“Nubalombwanama, ndabona ati lweendo lwesu kuhwa ano kuya kumbele lulaba lwantenda. Lubono lunji lunji lulazonauka antoomwi u bwato, twabula coolwe u bantu balafwa.”
Pele mukando wa bashikalumamba wakashihumina shakaamba mukando wabwato umukamwini bwato, kubaala kaambo nkakabaambila Paulu

Cilwa ceci kacili cibotu kukala muciindi ca mweto, ubobo bantu banji banji bakaakuli mulweendo lolu kabazanda kwaamba baakuciya kumbele, kwaamba caakuhumina bakashice ku mulando wa Finikisi. Wezo mulando kooli mu cilwa ca Kileti kuya kucibizhi lwaambo, ulimwi ukumbala lwaambo, koku nkubaakuzanda kuya kukala muciindi ca mweto.

Inzho kwakaunga muuwo wakahwa kucibizhi, wakaakuunga ashoonto bulyo. Ubobo balombwana bakatelaika ati bacite mbubakaakuzanda. Ngoonaawo bakaangulula bwato babushikula. Bakabembeleka kumbali ku Kileti.
Kabatana ukusakana kwakaunga iwuwo ikando lyakaakutewa ati, “Lyambala lweewe.” Lyakaunga kuhwa ku cilwa ca Kileti.
Mankutisha akatonka bwato kuhwa kumanuma. Kacitahumina kwaamba bwato buye kuhwa muuwo, ubobo twakabuleka kwaamba buye koko muuwo nkuwakaakuya.
Twakashitililwa ukalwa kashoonto katewa ati Kauda nitwaakaita nkukali kucibizhi. Inzho koko mu mapenzhi, twakacinkonzha kukaanga kato kashoonto kaangwa kubwato nkubuli munshi.
Bakakakwelela mukati ukukaanga intambo. Bakatiya ati balaba nibapatila mu musenga afwaafwi u mulando wa Libiya. Masani ayenzha bwato bakaahunga kwaamba bwato buye kuya muuwo.
Pele iwuwo liina nilyakaleka kuunga pe. Buzuba bwakacilila bakasowa shindunduli shimwi mumeenzhi.
Inzho nibwakaca bakakanka kukusha shakaakuli mu bwato u kushisowa mu meenzhi.
Izuba iintongwezhi kashitalibonya kwa mazuba manji manji nkaambo kewuwo lyakaakuungisha cini cini. Limwina bulanjizhi mbutwaakukwete bwakuti tulafwutuka bwakamana.

Nikwakaita ciindi cilamfwu cakutalya, Paulu wakazhima akati kabo wenshinsa iili mukooze ati, “Kuti nimwakanteelela nubalombwanama, nitwatakakuhwa ku Kileti, shoonse sheshi shakuzonaucilwa ukuzhimininwa kwa shintu nishataakwiwo.
Pele ninzho ndamulomba kwaamba mukwate shamba kaambo kwiina naaba womwi muntu uukafwa, pele bulyo bwato mbubukazonauka.
Nkaambo mashiku aza ayita, anjelo uuhwa kwa Leza wangu wezo ŋunkomba kezhile.
Waŋambila ati, ‘Paulu, utatiyi! Ulyeelele kuya kubetekwa ku Muleli Mukando waku Loma, ulimwi bona Leza wakupa babo boonse mbumuli abo mu bwato.’
Ubobo nubalombwanama, shamba ashimukale! Nkaambo ndamushoma Leza kwaamba shoonse shilacitika umbona mbwaaŋambila.
Tulakasowelwa a muuma wacilwa cimwi.”

Bobu kabuli buzuba bwe kumi u mazuba one, iwuwo nilyakatuzuwaika koku ukoku mu lweenje lwa Andiliya. Inzho akati kamashiku, bashikweenzha bwato bakatelaika ati ambweni twakaakuya buswena afwaafwi umuuma.

Ubobo bakawaala lutambo mu meenzhi lwa kaakwaanjilwe cintu cilemu kwaamba beelece bulamfwu bwameenzhi. Bakayana ati kaalampa tukokola tuli mwaanda u makumi obile. Ulimwi bakeenda ashoonto, inzho nibakeeleka bakayana ati, kaalampa tukokola tuli makumi ali ifwuka.
Inzho bakatiya ati bwato bulaba nibuuma mu mabwe. Bakawaala mabwe a ŋongo one malemu akukwasha bwato nkubuli kunshi kwaamba buteenda, bakakanka kukomba ati kulabosha bwaca.
Bashikweenzha bwato kabazanda kuloboka kuhwa mu bwato. Bakabika kato mu meenzhi bamane bacita ukoya bazanda kuya kubika mabwe a ŋongo kumbele lya bwato.
Pele Paulu wakaambila mukando wa bashikalumamba u bashikalumamba ati, “Kuti baba bashikweenzha bwato bamuhwe mono tamufwutuka pe.”
Ubobo bashikalumamba bakakosola lutambo yakaakwaanjilwe kato bakaleka kaya.
Inzho nibwakaakuzanda kuca Paulu wakabalomba kwaamba balye shakulya. Wakaamba ati, “Aba mazuba ali ikumi u mazuba one mulalindila cakutalya.
Ubobo ndamulomba ninzho ati amulye, mulyeelele kulya kwaamba mukwate insana. Kwiina nikaba kasusu komwi kali a mitwi yenu kakazhimina.”
Mbwaakamanina kwaamba bobo, Paulu wakabweza cinkwa, wakalumba kwa Leza amane wacikomona wakacilya boonse balimulanjilile.
Babone bobo shamba shabo shakabakala, ulimwi uumwi uumwi wabo wakalya.
Toonse antoomwi mu bwato, twakaakuli myaanda yobile u makumi ciloba, ubatwesha bali cisambomwi.
Boonse nibakamana kulya ukukuta, bakasowa maila mu meenzhi kwaamba bwato bulemunukwe.

Nibwakaca bashikweenzha bwato bayina ukacizhiba cishi ceco, pele bakabona busena awo lwaatele ngulwaakukwete cikobo, ulimwi awo meenzhi ngakaakuli mafwaafwi. Ubobo bakazeeza kwaamba bakashoshe nkuko bwato.

Ngoonaawo bakakosola intambo shakaakukwete mabwe a ŋongo aakwata bwato bashishiya mu meenzhi. Ulimwi bakaangulula intambo shikwata mubalo wakucinduluzha bwato. Bamane bakaangulula isani lya kumbele lya bwato kwaamba muuwo ucikonzhe kutonkela bwato kumbele, inzho bakaanzanana kumuuma.
Pele bwato bwakaya kupatila mu musenga nkubuli kumbele. Bwakapatila cakuti kabutakonzha kweenda, ulimwi nkubuli kunshi bwakaanduka mu shipanzha shipanzha, nkaambo mankushita kaakwete insana.
Inzho bashikalumamba bakapanga muzeezo wakuyaya baanje boonse kwaamba kutabi naaba womwi wabo uukasamba ukuhubuka kwaamba alukance.
Pele mukando wa bashikalumamba kazanda kumufwutula Paulu, ubobo wakabakasha kucita mbubaakutelaika. Wakaambila babo bakaakulozha kusamba ati baliwaale mu meenzhi basambe kuya kumuuma.
Babo batacizhi kusamba bacilile munshi baakuya bukwatilila kumapulanga na ku shintu shimwi shabwato shikonzha kweempa. Bobo mbutwakalanduka ukufwutuka toonse.
Inzho nitwakalanduka twakazhiba ati acilwa ngutwakashoka kacitewa ati cilwa ca Moluta.
Bantu ba mucishi momo bakatufwila luse. Kacili ciindi inhula niyakatalika kuwa ulimwi kakutontola, bakatukunkila mulilo ukututambula kabotu toonse twakakala kuzota.
Paulu wakabwezelela tukuni, inzho naakaakuzanda kutubika amulilo kwakahwa muzoka, nakateelela ibanga banga lya mulilo wakazambila kwitashi lyaka Paulu.

Bashicishi nibakabona muzoka ulalenjela kwitashi lyaka Paulu, bakakanka kulyaambauzha ati, “Wezu muntu ulyeelele kuba muyazhi, nkaambo nikuba kuti wafwutuka mu meenzhi, malweza alimucilile takonzha kupona.”
Pele Paulu wakamuhupulila mu mulilo, wiina ukulicisa.

Bantu bakamulanjilila, kabatelaika ati ukalazhimba itashi nikuba kuwa anshi u kufwa. Pele nibakalindila ciindi cilamfwu, u kubona ati kwiina cintu cibiyabi cakamuciticila bakacinca matelaishi abo bakatalika kwaamba ati wezu ngu leza!

Afwaafwi bulyo kuhwaawo ngutwakaakubele kakuli myuunda ya muntu utewa ati Pubuliyasi wakaakuli mukando wacilwa ceco. Aze wezu wakatutambula ca kubotelwa ulimwi twakaakuli beenzu bakwe kwa mazuba otatwe.
Inzho ushi Pubuliyasi kali mulwazhi mubili ukusulula kalowa. Paulu wakenjila muŋanda mwakaakubele, waya kukomba amane wakamwaampa matashi akwe u kumuponya.
Ceci nicakacitika balwazhi boonse ba mucilwa ceco bakeza ulimwi bakapona kumalwazhi abo.
Bakatupa shipo shinji shinji, u ciindi nitwakenjila mu bwato ati tuukuya, bakatubicila ushimwi shintu shinji shinji mu bwato shesho shakaakuzandika mulweendo lwesu.
Nikwakaita myezhi yotatwe twakaya u bwato bwakahwa ku Alekizandiliya bwakaakutewa ati, “Baleza bamaanga,” bwalo bwakaakushite ciindi coonse ca mweto mu cilwa ceco.
Inzho twakaya kushika ku munzhi wa Sailakusi, u kukala mo mazuba otatwe.
Kuhwa koko twakeenda kuya kushika ku munzhi wa Legiyumu. Buzuba bwakacilila, muuwo wakakanka kuunga uuhwa kucibizhi, inzho nikwakaita mazuba otatwe twakashika ku munzhi uutewa ati Puteyoli.
Koko nkutwakayana bamwi bakwesu bakatulomba ati tukale abo kwansunda yomwi. Nitwakahwa koko twakaya kushika ku Loma.

Inzho koko babunina nibakateelela, bakeenda mpaka kuya kushika kubusena butewa ati Isambalilo lya Apiyusi, bamwi kubusena butewa ati Maanda aakulila Otatwe. Bakatucinga kwaamba tuswaangane abo. Paulu naakababona, wakalumba Leza, ulimwi ceci cakamuzumya zumya.
Nitwakashika mu Loma, Paulu bakamuhuminya kwaamba akale mwini u bashikalumamba bakaakumulinda.

Inzho nikwakaita mazuba otatwe, Paulu wakakoba ba Juda ba mu munzhi momo kwaamba baswaangane abandike abo. Nibakabungana, wakabaambila ati, “Nubakwesu, nikuba kuti ndiina ncindakabishizha bantu besu, nikuba ku tunshiya nshiya twabashaakale besu, ndakaangwa mu Jelusalemu ukupewa ku matashi a ba Loma.
Balo bakambuzha mibuzho, nibakamana kabazanda kuŋangulula nkaambo bakayana ati kwiina mulandu ŋundakacita wakaakweelele kwaamba njayiwe.
Pele ba Juda bakakaka kwaamba ŋangululwe, kaka nkukaambo kakampa ati ndishishe Ku mweendelezhi Mukando, nikuba bobo ndiina mulandu wakubapa bakwesu.
Kaka nkukaambo nkundamwitila kwaamba mushimwine. Ndyaanjilwe bolya mu nceetani nkaambo ka wezo ngubalanjila bantu ba Izilaili.”

Inzho balo bakaingula ati, “Tatuna kutambula maŋwalu aahwa ku Judiya aamba makani ako. Ulimwi kwiina naaba womwi wa bakwesu wakashika kwiza ku tushimwina makani aza, nikuba kwaamba cintu cimwi cibiyabi nciwakacita.
Pele tulazanda kuteelela mizeezo yako mbwiibele, nkaambo tulizhi ati koonse bulyo bantu balaamba shakukazhanya iinkamu yezho njunjilile.”

Bamane bakasala buzuba bwa kwiza kuswaangana u Paulu ulimwi. Kubuzuba bobo kwakeza bantu banji banji kubusena Paulu nkwakaakukala. Kuhwa cifwumo fwumo, kuya kushika ciindi ca mashiku Paulu wakaakupandulula makani aamba bwami bwa Leza. Wakasoleka cini cini kubasandula ati bashome Jeso kwiita mukubapandululila mazwi mbwaalembelwe mu Milawo ya Mozesi ulimwi u mumaŋwalu a bashinshimi.
Bamwi bakaashoma mazwi akwe, pele bamwi bayina nibakashoma.
Ubobo bakaya balyaandeene mukuhumina kwabo, ciindi Paulu nakaamba makani aza aakuti, cini cini Moza Usalala wakalulika niwakaamba kwiita mu mushinshimi Aizaya kuba shaakale besu ati,
“Cini cini mulakateelela, pele tamukateelelesha
u kubona mulakabona, pele tamukabonesha.
Nkaambo maanu abantu baba mafwaafwi,
awo matwi abo baashinka u menso abo baayala.
Nikwataakuli bobo nibaakubona u kuteelela umaanu nibaakukwete
aakuti bakonzhe kusanduka kwaamba mbaponye ukubalonjezha.”
Ulimwi Paulu wakaamba ati, “Ndazanda kwaamba muzhibe ati lolu lufwutuko lwa Leza lwatumwa ku bantu bakunze, balo balakateelela!”
Paulu naakamana kwaamba mazwi aza, ba Juda bakaya balaya bukazhanya akati kabo.
Inzho yakaba myaka yobile Paulu kashite muŋanda njaakaakulilipilila mukamwini, ulimwi kabatambula kabotu boonse bakaakwiza kumuswaya.
Wakaakukambauka bwami bwa Leza u kuyiisha makani a Mwami Jeso Kilisito. Kaamba cakutatiya ulimwi kali mwaangulushi.
Ume ndime Paulu mutwanga wa Jeso Kilisito, mutumwa mwite, wakasalilwa Makani Mabotu a Leza.
Makani Leza ngaakashomezha kwiita mu bashinshimi bakwe mbuli mbwaamba Malembe Asalala.
Ngaaza Makani Mabotu a Mwanakwe Leza wakazhalwa ku luhubo lwa Devidi ku mubili.
Pele wakaambwa ati mwanakwe Leza munsana sha Moza Usalala, kwiita mukubuka ku bafwu. Wezu ngu Jeso Kilisito Mwami wesu.
Muli wezu, Leza twakapewa luse ubutumwa, buletela mishobo yoonse Makani Mabotu kwaamba bamushome u kumuteelela.
Inzho amwe mbubona, muli bamwi bababo mbaaketa Leza kwaamba mube bakwe Jeso Kilisito.
Ndalembela kuli umwe noonse, nubafwunwa baka Leza numuli mu Loma, bakatewa kuba bana Musalali. Leza Tatesu u Jeso Kilisito Mwami wesu, amufwile luse u kumupa luumuno.
Kutaanguna ndalumba Leza wangu kwiita mwa Jeso Kilisito ukaambo kenu, nkaambo kakuti inshi yoonse bantu balaamba bulyo shalushomo lwenu.
Nkaambo Leza ngumanina milimo u monzo wangu woonse, kukambauka Makani Mabotu a Mwanakwe, ngu kamboni wangu kwaamba coonse ciindi ndamutelaika mu kukomba kwangu.
Ubobo ndalomba ati ambweni mu luzando lwa Leza, ndakakonzha kushika koko nkumubele.
Nkaambo ndazandisha cini cini kumubona kwaamba tukaabane amwe shilonjezho sha moza shakumuzumya zumya.
Cintu cikando ncakuti, tukalizumye zumye toonse mu lushomo.
Ndikwete cikwelete, kuba Giliki u babo batayiile, basongo, u balimbushi.
Nkukaambo kako ume ndazandisha kumukambaucila Makani Mabotu amwe numuli ku Loma.
Nkaambo ka Makani Mabotu aza, bululami bwa Leza bwakazubululwa kwiita mu lushomo, mbuli mbukulembelwe ati, “Muntu ululeme, ulapona u lushomo.”
Inzho bukali bwa Leza buhwa kwizeulu bwazubululwa ukaambo kakutazhiba Leza u kutalulama kwa babo bashinkila lushinizho nkaambo kamafwunze abo.
Ubobo, shesho muntu nshaakonzha kuzhiba sha Leza shilalibonya, nkaambo Leza wakashizubulula.
Nkaambo kukancila kumalengelo anshi, insana shabu Leza bwakwe shiteeli, nikuba ati tashibonwa, shilazhibwa kwiita mushitu nshaakalenga. Ubobo bantu bayina mbubakonzha kutama pe
Nikuba kuti kabamwizhi Leza, bayina nibakamulemeka ukumulumba, nkaambo mu mizeezo yabo kabakwete matelaishi mabiyabi, u myonzo yabo yabulimbushi yakaba mu mushinze.
Kabazunga ati mbasongo, anu mbalimbushi.
Muciindi ca kukomba Leza uutafwi, bakakanka kukomba baleza bapanje bakozhene u bantu bafwa, na bazuni na banyama na bazoka.
Ubobo Leza wakabaleka kwaamba bacite shamafwunze shamu myonzo yabo shuusha insoni, ukutalemeka mibili yabo.
Bakaleka sha Leza sha lushinizho u kucilila shabubeshi, bakakomba ukusebezela shilenje mu busena bwakulemeka ukusebezela Leza wakashilenga, walo kutembaulwa lyoonse! Ameni.
Ubobo Leza, wakabaleka ati bacite shamafwunze shuusha insoni. Abo bakaintu bakeeleka milimo ya bukaintu mibotu u kucilila milimo isofweele yakulyana inkwela mukaintu u mukaintu nina.

Mbubona bobo abo balombwana bakashiya milimo yabo yabulombwana ku bakaintu, bakakanka kulyana inkwela u balombwana nokwabo. Bakacita shiyanza shiyazha insoni, mukucita bobo bakaliletela cisubulo ca milimo yabo yamafwunze.
Inzho ukaambo kakuti bayina nibakazanda kubika maanu sha Leza, Leza wakabaleka mu matelaishi aabo beni mabiyabi, kwaamba bacite shintu shiteelele kucitwa.
Myonzo yabo ilizwile bubiyabi, ubuli ukoya bulyato, u munyono, u buyazhi, u bulwati, u lweeno, u buhwizhi ulimwi u bubeshi.
Tabazanda Leza, mbubashikasampusampu, mbubashikantu kantu, balalipa,
bayina maanu, bayina lushomo, bayina luse, bantu bateetezhewa.
