Balyuuzhi mulawo wa Leza wakuti, “Bantu bacita shili bolya, balyeelele kufwa. Nikuba bobo tabaciti bulyo shesho, pele balabeensheensha babo bashicita.”
Tulizhi ati lubeta lwa Leza ku bantu bacita milimo iili bobo luliluleme.
Anu ulatelaika buti uwe ubeteka bamwi bacita milimo iili mbuli yezho aakuli aze uleecita mbubona? Sa uwe ulatelaika ati lolu lubeta lwa Leza lulakakushinzha?
Sa ulaubausha luse lwa Leza lunji lunji lukutola kululekelelo lwakwe? Sa twizhi ati Leza ulakufwila luse kaambo ngu shicamba ulakupa luzhibo lukutola ku kusanduka?
Pele uwe uli shicinguni mupapyu uutazanda kusanduka, ubobo ulaliletela bukali bwa Leza mbwaakaatondezha mu buzuba mbwaakaabeteka bantu boonse mubululami.
Mu buzuba bobo Leza ulakababweezhezha boonse bantu kwiingainya u milimo yabo.
Babo bacita shibotu ca bushicamba, u kukapula bulemu, iinsana, u bumi butamana, Leza ulakabapa bumi butamana.
Pele bantu mbubashikalifwune balakazha shiluleme nshaamba Leza balacita shitaluleme, ubobo Leza ulakabalemanina cini cini.
Kulakaba kupenga ukuusa kuli babo boonse bacita shibiyabi, kukancila kuba Juda kushikila kuba Giliki,
pele kulakaba kutembaulwa, u kulemekwa, u luumuno kuli boonse bacita shibotu, kutaanguna ba Juda, kwamana ba Giliki.
Nkaambo Leza wiina lusalululo pe.
Boonse babo bantu bakabisha ukaambo kakutazhiba Mulawo, balakazonaunwa nikuba ati kabatoozhi Mulawo, u babo bezhi mulawo balakabetekwa kwiita mu mulawo.
Kaambo bantu tabalulamikwa kwa Leza ukaambo kakuti bakootelela Mulawo, cita babo bacita caamba Mulawo mbubakaalulamikwa.
Nkaambo bantu bakunze, bayina Mulawo, pele ciindi nibacita shintu shaamba Mulawo, nikuba ati bayina Mulawo wa Mozesi balaba mulawo lwabo beni.
Shintu nshibacita sha mulawo shilatondezha ati, Mulawo wezo ulilembelwe mu myonzo yabo. Balizhi ati sheshi shililuleme mu mizeezo yabo, nkaambo balalibeteka beni, cimwi ciindi ulabakwabilila.
Mbucikaaba mu buzuba bobo kwiita mwa Jeso Kilisito, Leza ulakabeteka maseseke ali mu myonzo yabo, kwiingainya u Makani Mabotu aza ngunja bukambauka.
Pele uwe nuulyaamba ati uli mu Juda, ulashoma Mulawo, ulimwi ulalikankaizha mwa Leza.
Ulilwizhi luzando lwa Leza. Ulimwi kaambo kakuti wakayiishiwa Mulawo, nkukuti ulizhi kwaandaanya shintu shiluleme ushibiyabi.
Na ulashoma ati ulasololela boofwu, ulimwi uli mumuni wa babo bali mu mushinze,
shikulailila balimbushi, mwiiyi wa bantu bayina luzhibo, kaambo kakushoma luzhibo luhwa ku Mulawo ukunjiisho shalushinizho,
inzho uwe uyiisha bamwi, sa tukonzha kuliyiisha umwini? Sa uwe uu kambaukila bantu ati batebi, sa uleba?
Uwe uukasha bantu kucita bumambe, “Sa ulacita bumambe?” No uwe uukomba shibumbwa, sa uleba muŋanda yamapayi a shibumbwa?
No uwe ulikankaizha mu Mulawo wa Leza, sa tumuusha insoni Leza ciindi nuusotoka Mulawo?
Cili umbona mbuli mbukulembelwe ati, “Bantu bakunze balasampaula izhina lya Leza ukaambo kenu.”
Inzho kupalulwa kulayohwa kuti na muntu wacilila Mulawo. Pele kuti na wasotoka Mulawo, nicaakuli kabotu kwaamba naatakapalulwa bulyo.
Naa kuti muntu utana kupalulwa kacilila Mulawo wa Leza, sa kwa Leza takozhene u wezo mupalule?
Nkukaambo kako kuti wezo uutana kupalulwa naa ulacilila Mulawo, ulakakuzula uwe umu Juda mupalule, uukwete Milawo ya Leza, wamana uleesotoka.
Mu Juda mwini mwini, tali bulyo shikoopopa amenso. Ulimwi kupalulwa kwini kwini takuli koko bantu nkubacita kumibili pe.

Pele mu Juda mwini mwini nguwezo mu Juda mu monzo. Ulimwi kupalulwa kwini kwini nkukoko kwamumonzo, ukucitwa u Moza Usalala. Takucitwa mukukwata Mulawo mulembe pe, muntu uuli bobo ulalumbwa kwa Leza, kutali ku muntu.
Anu ba Juda balababaala buti bakunze? No kupalulwa kulaleta bubotuunzhi?
Pele kuli bubotu bukando buyanwa. Nkaambo ukutaanguna, Leza wakapa ba Juda mazwi akwe.
Wakabapela nzhi? No kuti naa bamwi kabatashomeki, sa kutashomeka kwabo kulakonzha kupa ati aze Leza atashomeki?
Bobo imbo pe! Pele bantu balyeelele kuzhiba ati, Leza ulashomeka, nikuba ati bantu boonse mbabeshi. Umbona mbuli mbukulembelwe ati,
“Ulyeelele kubonwa ati uliluleme ciindi nuukanana,
ulimwi utazulwa ciindi nibakubeteka bamwi.”
Pele na bubeteshi bwesu butaluleme bulatondezha ati lubeta lwa Leza luliluleme, no tulaamba acani? Sa tulakonzha kwaamba ati Leza taluleme naatupa cisubulo? Awa ndaamba ukoya muntu uutashomi.
Bobo imbo pe! Kuti Leza nataakululeme, no ulakonzha buti kubeteka bantu ba anshi?
Pele na kuti kwiita mububeshi bwangu, bushomeshi bwa Leza bulalibonya ukumuletela bulemu, no nkaamboonzhi ncimpewa mulandu wabushishibi?
No nkaamboonzhi bamwi bantu ncibatutamicizha ati tulaamba ati, “Atucite cibi kwaamba bubotu buzhize?” Babo balakapewa cisubulo cibeelele.
Anu twaambe acani? Sa uswe tuba Juda tuliluleme kubaala bakunze? Pe pe, tatubabaali, nkaambo twaamba kale ati boonse ba Juda uba Giliki baleendelezhewa u cibi.
Mbuli mbukulembelwe mu Malembe ati,
“Kwiina ululeme, naaba womwi pe,
kwiina uteelela, nikuba kwiina ukapula Leza.
Boonse baleya, boonse bulyo babisha.
Kwiina naaba womwi ucita ciluleme, kwiina naaba womwi pe.
Balasebezha milaka yabo kwaamba shabubeshi. Mu milomo yabo muli bulohu bwabazoka buyaya.
Munzhila shabo muli kuzonauna ukupenzha.
Ulimwi tabeezhi inzhila ya luumuno.
Inzho tulizhi ati shoonse shaamba Mulawo wa Leza shilakwatilizha babo bali mu Mulawo, kwaamba ati babule matamino, kwaamba Leza azule luundu loonse.
Nkaambo kwiina muntu naaba womwi ukonzha kululamikwa kwa Leza kwiita mukucita cizanda mulawo, kaambo mulawo ulapa kwaamba bantu bazhibe ati babisha.
Inzho bululami bwa Leza bwazubululwa kutali ku mulawo, nikuba ati mulawo u bashinshimi mbubakamboni babululami.
Bobu mbululami bwa Leza kwiita mu lushomo mwa Jeso Kilisito kuli babo boonse ba shoma nkaambo kwiina lusalululo pe.
Nkaambo boonse bantu bakabisha, ukulela kubulemu bwa Leza.
Pele ninzho balalulamikwa bulyo ukaambo ka luse lwa Leza, kwiita mulunununo lwa Jeso Kilisito.
Leza wakapa Mwanakwe, kwaamba lufwu lwakwe, ibe inzhila yakulekelela shibi shabantu bamushoma. Ceci ncitondezho cabululami bwa Leza. Kale kale Leza, kaleka bulyo shibi shabantu.
Kazanda kutondezha ku ciindi ceno kwaamba ati uliluleme, ulimwi ulakonzha kululamika wezo ushoma mwa Jeso.
No nciinzhi cikonzha kupa muntu kulyeensheensha? Kwiina pe! Mulawo nzhi? Sa mulawo wa milimo? Pe pe! Kaambo cintu cikando kwa Leza ndushomo.
Nkaambo tulaamba ati muntu ulalulamikwa u lushomo kwa Leza, ukutali kucilila milimo ya Mulawo.
Sa Leza ngwa ba Juda balo? Sa balo bakunze tali Leza wabo? Ee abo bakunze ngwabo.
Nkaambo Leza uli womwi bulyo, uu lulamika ba Juda kwiita mu lushomo nguubalulamika u bakunze kwiita mu lushomo.
Sa cilaamba ati, tusowe Mulawo kwiita mu lushomo lolu? Bobo imbo pe. Meni meni ngakuti mu lushomo tulazumya Mulawo.
No tulaamba acani ku makani aka Abulahamu ushesu ku mubili?
Nkaambo kuti Abulahamu nakalulamikwa u milimo, nakaakukwete cintu cimupa kulyeensheensha, pele kutali ku bushu bwa Leza.
Nkaambo maŋwalu alaamba ati, “Abulahamu wakashoma Leza, ubobo Leza wakamwita ati mululami.”
Inzho kuti muntu wasebeza ulalumbulwa, bulumbu bobu tacili cipo ca luse pe, nceelelo ca muntu wasebeza mulimo wakwe.
Pele kuli wezo wiina milimo, pele ulashoma muli wezo u lulamika ba shishibi, lushomo luli bobo ndulupa ati Leza amululamike.
Nciceco ncaakaambila Devidi ati mbalonjezhe bantu babo Leza mbaalulamika nikuba ati kwiina milimo njibakacita kwaamba abalonjezhe.
Devidi wakaamba ati,
“Balilonjelwe babo Leza mbakalecelela micito ya kutacilila milawo yakwe, u babo bali shibi shahumbwa.
Ulilonjelwe wezo muntu, Mwami ngwaatabalila shibi.”
Sa bulonjezhe bobu mbwa bantu bapalule bulyo, naa ubatali bapalule? Nciceco ncitwaambila ati, “Abulahamu wakashoma, ubobo Leza wakamwita ati mululami.”
No ndililiye naakatewa ati mululami? Sa, kali kale mupalule naa katana? Katana kupalulwa pe.

Abulahamu wakapalulwa kuba citondezho cabululami ncaakaakukwete mu lushomo natakaakuna kupalulwa. Ubobo Abulahamu ngumuzhali wa babo boonse ba shoma, nkaambo Leza ulabeta ati boonse mbalulami, unibatana kupalulwa.
Ulimwi Abulahamu, ulatewa ati ngu ushabo babo batali bapalule. Kutali bulyo bapalule ice, pele babo beenda munzhila ya lushomo, njakaakukwete tatesu Abulahamu naatakaakuna kupalulwa.
Na kuti bashikukona mbubabo ba mulawo nkukuti lushomo lwabula mulimo, aco cishomezho ca Leza caba ca bulyo.
Nkaambo Mulawo nguuleta cisubulo, pele koko kwiina mulawo, taboosotoki.

Umbona mbukulembelwe ati, “Ndakucita kwaamba ati ube ushabo wamishobo yoonse.” Leza mwini nguwakamushimwina Abulahamu ceci cishomezho. Leza mwini ngwaakashoma, ngu Leza uubusha bafwu, uwaamba shintu shiza kumbele ukoya shakacitwa kale.
Abulahamu wakashoma u kulanjila, nikuba kuti kakwiina nkaambo kakaakumupa bulanjizhi, ubobo wakaba ngu ushi wa mashi manji manji. Umbona mbwaamba Malembe ati, “Bolya mbulukaaba luhubo lwako.”
Abulahamu wiina nakamaninwa lushomo nikuba kuti kakwete myaka yakuzhalwa iitandila kumwaanda, ulimwi kezhi ati insana kashiya bumana, aze Saala kamuhwile mucimo cakuzhala.
Nikuba bobo wiina naakaleka kushoma ulimwi katazuluzha naashoonto pe. Pele wakatolelela kushoma Leza cini cini ukumutembaula.
Wakahuminisha ati Leza ulakonzha kucita nshaakashomezha.
Ceci, “Cakabalilwa kwa Abulahamu ati Mululami.”
Aza mazwi aamba ati, “Cakabalwa kwa Abulahamu,” ayina naakalembelwa bulyo Abulahamu.
Pele alatukwatilizha aswe nututewa ati tuli balulami nkaambo tulashoma Leza wakabusha Jeso ku bafwu.
Jeso wezo wakaabwa ukaambo ka shibi shesu, ulimwi wakabuka ku bafwu kwaamba tululamikwe.
Inzho Leza mbwaatululamika ku lushomo, tulikwete luumuno kwiita mwa Jeso Kilisito Mwami wesu.
Kwiita mwa Jeso Kilisito, wakatuyalulila inzhila ya luse momo mutuponena ninzho, ulimwi tulalyeensheensha mubulanjizhi bwa bulemu bwa Leza.
Ukutali bulyo bobo pe, pele tulalyeensheensha nikuba ati tulapenzhewa, nkaambo tulizhi ati mapenzhi ngaapa kukakatila.
Ulimwi kukakatila cakutazhoka munshi kulapa ciimo cibotu, ulimwi ciimo cibotu cilapa bulanjizhi.
Inzho bulanjizhi bobu tabututompokezha nkaambo tulizhi ati Leza wakabika lufwuno mu myonzo yesu kwiita mu Moza Usalala ngutwakapewa.
Nkaambo nitwaakucili balengushi, aciindi ceelele, Kilisito wakatufwila uswe tubantu batezhi Leza.
Ncintu cizumu kutelaikila muntu kwaamba ulakonzha kufwila mululami. Cita ambweni kufwila muntu uutondezha luse.
Pele Leza ulatutondezha lufwuno lwakwe nkaambo uswe nitwaakucili mu shibi, Kilisito wakatufwila.
Inzho mbuli mbutwakatewa ati tulalulamikwa Kwiita mu mubulowa bwakwe, tulakafwutulwa kwiita mwa Kilisito kubukali bwa Leza.
Kaambo uswe twakaakucili ba shinkondonina u Leza, pele kwiita mu lufwu lwa mwanakwe, twakaba balongwaakwe Leza. Inzho mbutuli balongwaakwe Leza, nkukuti twafwutulwa u bumi bwaka Kilisito.
Kutali bulyo bobo pe, pele tulalyeensheensha mwa Leza kwiita mu Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito wezo utuswaanganya kwa Leza.
Leza katana kupa mulawo, cibi kaciliwo ano anshi, pele kuti kwaakwiina mulawo cibi tacibalwa pe.
Nikuba bobo, kuhwa ciindi caka Adamu kushicila ciindi caka Mozesi, bantu kabafwa, kubikilizha u babo batakacita cibi, cikozhene uceco ncaakacita Adamu, Inzho Adamu ncikozhano ca wezo wakaakucizhiza.

Pele cipo ncaapa Leza mu luse lwakwe tacikozhani u cibi caka Adamu. Kaambo na kuti bantu boonse balafwa ukaambo kamuntu womwi bulyo, cilishinizhe kwaamba ati luse lwa Leza ucipo ncaapa mu luse lwa muntu womwi Jeso Kilisito, cilabaala ali shoonse kaambo cilapa bantu banji banji kulonjezhewa.

Ulimwi kuli kwandaana akati ka cipo ncaapa Leza ku luse lwakwe u cibi ca muntu womwi. Ukaambo kako muntu naakabisha ciindi comwi wakakosolelwa lufwu. Pele cipo ca luse lwa Leza cilalulamika bantu bakwete shibi shinji shinji.
Na kuti bantu balafwa ukaambo kakubisha kwa muntu womwi, ncalushinizho kwaamba ati boonse batambula shileleko shaluse lwa Leza ucipo cabululami Kwiita mu muntu womwi Jeso Kilisito, balakaba u bumi.
Inzho mbuli kubisha komwi mbukwakaleta lubeta ku bantu boonse, umbona bobo umulimo wabululami womwi waletela bantu boonse bululami u bumi.
Ulimwi, umbuli kutacilila malailile kwa muntu womwi, ncicakapa ati bantu boonse babe ba shishibi, umbona bobo kucilila malailile kwa muntu womwi, kulapa ati bantu boonse batewe ati mbalulami.
Inzho mulawo wakaletwa ati bantu boonse bazhibe kabotu kuhula kwa shibi shabo. Pele shibi nishakahula, alo luse lwa Leza lwakahulisha.
Ukoya cibi mbucakalela kwiita mu lufwu, umbona bobo luse lwakalela kwiita mubululami, ukuleta bumi buteeli ku bantu boonse kwiita mwa Jeso Kilisito Mwami wesu.
No ninzho tulaamba acani? Sa tuukucili mu shibi kwaamba luse lwa Leza luhule?
Bobo imbo pe! No mbuti uswe utwakafwa ku cibi mbutukonzha kwaamba tuukucipona mucibi?
Sa tamwizhi ati uswe toonse nitwakapapatizwa mwa Jeso Kilisito, twakapapatizwa mu lufwu lwakwe?
Ubobo twakazhikwa antoomwi u Jeso kwiita mulupapatizo lwa lufwu, kwaamba ati mbubona Kilisito mbwaakabushiwa ku bafwu u bulemu bwa ushi, aswe tweende mu bumi bupiya.
Nkaambo na kuti twaswaangana antoomwi u Jeso Kilisito mu lufwu lwakwe, Umbona bobo tulakaswaangana mukubuka ku bafwu umbona mbwaakabuka.
Tulizhi ati buntu bwesu bukulukulu bwakakankaminwa antoomwi u Jeso ciindi naakakankaminwa aciciinkano, kwaamba ati mubili wa cibi ubule insana ali uswe.
Nkaambo kufwumbwa kuti muntu wafwa, ati waangululwa ku cibi.
Pele na twakafwa u Kilisito, tulashoma ati aswe tulakapona aze.
Tulizhi ati Kilisito mbwaakabushiwa ku bafwu, takafwi linji pe. Lufwu talumweendelezha linji.
Nkaambo lufwu ndwaakafwa, wakafwa ku cibi ciindi comwi bulyo, pele bumi mbwaapona ulaponena kwa Leza.
Mbubona bobo amwe mulyeelele kutelaika ati muli bafwu ku cibi, ulimwi mulikwete bumi mwa Leza kwiita mwa Kilisito Jeso.
Inzho mutahuminya cibi ati cimusololele ukweendelezha mibili yenu ifwa, ulimwi mutacilila shisushi sha mubili.
Mutaaba linji shizo shenu ukoya shisebezho shamilimo mibiyabi ya cibi, pele amulyaabe mbuli bantu bakahwa mu lufwu kuya mu bumi, mube shizo sha bululami kwa Leza.
Nkaambo tamweelele kuhuminya cibi kwaamba cimweendelezhe, nkaambo tamweendelezhewa u Mulawo, bumi bwenu buleendelezhewa u luse lwa Leza.
Anu twaambe acani? Sa, tucite cibi nkaambo kakuti bumi bwesu tabweendelezhewa u Mulawo, buleendelezhewa u luse lwa Leza? Imbo bobo pe!

Sa tamwizhi ati na mwalyaaba kuba bazhice kuli umwi, mulaba bazhice ba wezo ngumuteelela? Mulakonzha kuba bazhice ba wezo ngumuteelela, nikuba ku cibi citola ku lufwu, naa bazhice ba kuteela, calo citola ku bululami.
Pele Leza naalumbwe cini cini nkaambo mwakaakuli bazhice ba cibi, pele mazuba ano, muteelela ca monzo womwi kunjiisho nshibakamuyiisha.
Inzho mbumwakahunwa ku cibi, mwaba bazhice ba bululami.

Ndamupa cikozhano ca shintu shicitika nkaambo kabuntu bwenu bulengushi. Mwakaaba shizo shenu kwaamba shibe mubuzhice bwa shintu shisofweele u kutacilila malailile, shalo shitola kukutacilila malailile kubaala. Inzho amwaabe shizo shenu kwaamba shibe mubuzhice bwa kubululami butola kubusalazhi.
Nkaambo nimwakaakuli bazhice ba shibi, kamutazandika kuba balulami.
No mbubotuunzhi mbumwakayana nimwakaakucita shintu sheshi shimuyazha insoni mazuba ano? Mamanino a shintu shesi ndufwu.
Pele ninzho mwakalubulwa kuhwa ku cibi ukuba bazhice baka Leza. Mulikwete bulumbu bwenu butola kubusalazhi, ubobo mamanino enu mbumi butamana.
Nkaambo bulumbu bwa cibi ndufwu, pele cipo ca Leza mbumi butamana kwiita mwa Jeso Kilisito Mwami wesu.
Inzho nubakwesu umwe numwizhi mulawo, sa tamwizhi ati Mulawo uleendelezha muntu ciindi nacipona?
Mukaintu utwelwe, ulyaanjilwe ku mulawo wa mulumi nacipona. Pele naa mulumyaakwe wafwa, ataati waanguluka ku mulawo wezo.

Nciceco ncicona mukaintu utwelwe ncaatelwa ati wabucilwa nkaambo wacita bumambe, na weenda umuntu unji ciindi mulumyaakwe naacipona. Pele na kuti mulumyaakwe wafwa, mukaintu ulaanguluka ku mulawo, ulimwi na kuti watwalwa ku mulombwana unji ati tabucilwa.
Umbona bobo, amwe nubakwesu, mwakafwa ku mulawo kwiita mu mubili waka Kilisito kwaamba muswaanganyiwe kwa wezo wakabushiwa ku bafwu, kwaamba tweezhe mucelo wa Leza.
Nkaambo kakuti, nitwakaakupona mu buntu, milimo yaku mubili ya shisushi sha shibi yakabushiwa u mulawo mushizo shesu, u kuzhala mucelo wa lufwu.
Pele inzho twaanguluka ku mulawo, twakafwa kuli ceco cakaakutwaanjile, kwaamba tube bazhice munzhila impiya ya moza, batali ba mulawo mulembe wa kale kale.
Inzho kwiita mu mulawo wezu, cibi cakayana inzhila imbiyabi iileta cibi ca kulikumbuzha mulyuume. Nkaambo kwaakwiina mulawo cibi ncifwu.
Ume ndakaakupona kwiina Mulawo, pele inzho niwakashika Mulawo, cibi cakazubuluka,
ulimwi ndakafwa. Nguwena Mulawo wezo ukanana sha bumi, wayanika ati ume wakandetela lufwu.
Nkaambo cibi cakayana inzhila yakuncenga kwiita mu Mulawo, cimane cakanjaya.
Nikuba bobo Mulawo ulasalala, ulimwi malailile alasalala, aliluleme, ulimwi ali kabotu.

Sa nkukuti cilapandulula ati cintu cibotu ncicakandetela lufwu? Imbo bobo pe! Pele cibi, kwaamba ati cibonwe mbucibele, cakasebezha cintu cibotu kundetela lufwu. Ubobo cibi cilaitilila kubiya kwiita mu malailile.
Nkaambo tulizhi ati Mulawo ngwa Moza. Ulimwi ume ndili waku mubili, ndakauzhiwa ukoya muzhice ku cibi.
Nshizhi cimpa kucita cintu ncincita. Nkaambo ceco ncinzanda kucita nshiciciti pe, pele ndacita ceco ncintazanda kucita.
Mbukuli ati ndacita ceco ncintazanda kucita, ndahumina ati Mulawo mubotu.
Pele indime niincita cibi ncincita pe, cibi cili mulyuume ncicimpa kucita.
Nkaambo ndizhi ati mulyuume nkukuti mu mubil wangu, mwiina cibotu cilimo pe. Nkaambo ndazanda kucita cibotu, pele nshiciciti.
Cibotu nciinzanda kwaamba ncite nshikonzha kucicita pe, pele ndacita cibiyabi nciintazanda kucita.
Kuti na ndacita ceco ncintazanda kucita, indime niincicita, pele cibi cili mwangu ncicimpa kucicita.
Ubobo ndayana mulawo wakuti, ninzanda kucita cibotu aco cibi cilanhulila.
Nkaambo Mulawo wa Leza ulambotela cini cini mu monzo wangu.
Pele ndabona ati mushizo shangu muli mulawo unji uulwisha Mulawo uli mu monzo wangu. Ulancita buzhice ku mulawo wa cibi.
Maawe ndimupenzhi! Nguni ukanhuna ku mubili wezu uuntola ku lufwu?
Naalumbwe Leza kwiita mwa Jeso Kilisito Mwami wesu. Ubobo kumuzeezo wangu ndimuzhice ku mulawo wa Leza, pele kubuntu bwangu ndimuzhice ku mulawo wa cibi.
Ubobo, inzho kwiina kuzulwa kuli babo bali mwa Jeso Kilisito.
Nkaambo Mulawo wa Moza wa bumi mwa Kilisito Jeso, waŋangulula kuhwa ku mulawo wa shibi u lufwu.

Nkaambo ceco mulawo nciwatakaakukonzha kucita ukaambo kakuti wakabula insana mu mubili, Leza wakacikonzha. Wakatuma mwanakwe mu mubili uli ukoya wesu u ku makani a cibi. Ulimwi wakabeteka cibi cili mu buntu,
kwaamba ati ceco cizanda Mulawo cizuzucizhiwe mulyuuswe nututeendela mubili, pele utweendela mu Moza.
Nkaambo babo beendela mu mubili, balatelaika sha mubili. Pele babo beenda mu Moza balatelaika sha Moza.
Nkaambo kubika matelaishi ku mubili ndufwu, pele kubika matelaishi ku Moza mbumi u luumuno.
Ubobo matelaishi a ku mubili ngu shinkondonina u Leza, nkaambo taalimfwiinsha ku mulawo wa Leza, nkaambo taankonzha.
Babo baponena ku mubili, tabakonzha kumubotezha Leza pe.
Pele umwe tamuli mu mubili pe, muli mu Moza, aakuli cilishinizhe ati Moza wa Leza ulapona muli umwe. Kufwumbwa muntu wiina Moza wa Kilisito, wezo ati tali wakwe pe.
Pele na kuti Kilisito mwaali muli umwe, nikuba kuti mibili yenu ilifwile ukaambo ka cibi, pele myoza yenu ilikwete bumi ukaambo kabululami.
Naa kuti Moza wa wezo wakabusha Jeso Kilisito kuhwa ku bafwu uli muli umwe, nkukwaamba wezo wakabusha Jeso Kilisito ku bafwu, nguukaabusha mibili yenu iifwa, kwiita mu Moza wakwe uuli muli umwe.
Nkukaambo kako nubakwesu, tulikwete cikwelete, citali ca kumubili, kwaambo tupone bumi bwa ku mubili.
Nkaambo kuti na mulapona caku mubili, ati mulakafwa, pele kuti na mulayaya micito ya kumubili kwiita mu Moza wa Leza, ati mulakapona.
Kaambo boonse ubasololelwa u Moza wa Leza, baba mbanakwe Leza.
Nkaambo Moza ngumwakatambula toomuciti buzhice pe, kwaamba ati ulimwi muukutiya, pele mwakatambula Moza wa buzhale. Ulimwi ciindi nitwaamba ati, “Abba,
Nguwena Moza wezo ulapa bukamboni kumyonzo yesu kwaamba ati tuli banakwe Leza.

Na kuti tuli banakwe Leza, nkukuti tuli bashilukono, bashilukono lwa Leza, bashilukono antoomwi u Kilisito. Kufwumbwa kuti na tulapenga antoomwi u Kilisito, ati tulakatambula bulemu antoomwi u Kilisito.
Nkaambo ndatelaika ati, aza mapenzhi ngutukwete ninzho, taakonzha kweelezhewa u bulemu bwa Leza bobo bukaazubululwa kuli uswe.
Nkaambo abo bulenje bulisukamine bulalanjila kuzubululwa kwa banakwe Leza.
Nkaambo bulenje bwakaba bwa buliwo kutali ku luzando lwa shilenge, pele nkaambo kakwe wezo wakazanda ati cibe bobo.
Pele inzho kwaakuli bulanjizhi bwakuti shilenge sheshi shilakaangululwa kuhwa ku buzhice ubwakubola kwaamba bakatambule lwaanguluko lwa bulemu, lwa banakwe Leza.
Nkaambo tulizhi ati kushicila ku ciindi ceno, shilenge shoonse shilapenga u kusata malwazhi ukoya mukaintu uuli mu mishika yakutumbuka.
Tashili shilenge ice shipenga bobo, pele uswe intukwete micelo mitaanzhi ya Moza, tulooloma mu myonzo yesu ciindi nitusukeme kulindila kwaamba Leza atucite kuba banakwe mukunununa mibili yesu.
Nkaambo twakafwutulwa mukulanjila koku. Inzho kulanjila ncuubwene u menso tabuli bulanjizhi. Anu nguni akati kesu ukonzha kulanjila ceco ncaabwene u menso?
Na tulalanjila shesho nshitutana kubona, tulyeelele kushilanjila ca monzo usukeme wabu shicamba.
Mbubona bobo Moza ulatuyohwa mubulengushi bwesu, nkaambo tatucizhi umbutweelele kukomba, pele Moza ungamukamwini ulatukombela u mukooloma kutakonzha kwaambwa mu mazwi.
Ubobo Leza uuzhi shili mu myonzo ya bantu, uliizhi kale mizeezo mbwiibele, nkaambo Moza ulabakombela bana musalazhi mu luzando lwa Leza.
Ulimwi tulizhi ati mu shintu shoonse Leza ulasebezela bubotu bwa babo bamufwini, nkukuti babo mbaaketa mu makanze akwe.
Nkaambo babo Leza mbaakaakwizhi kale, wakabasalila limwi kwaamba bakozhane u mwanakwe, kwaamba mwanakwe akabe ngu mwana mutaanzhi akati ka babunina banji banji.
Inzho babo mbaakasalila, limwi imbabo mbubona mbaaketa. Ubobo babo mbaaketa, abo wakabalulamika, ulimwi babo mbaakalulamika, imbabo mbubona mbaakapa bulemu.
Inzho anu twaambe buti ku makani aza? Na Leza uli aswe, no nguni uukonzha kutulwisha?
Wezo watakasha mwanakwe mwini, pele wakamwaaba ukaambo kesu toonse, no ulakonzha buti kukacilwa kutupa shintu shoonse antoomwi u mwanakwe?
Sa nguni ukonzha kubapa kaambo babo basale kwa Leza? Leza mbwaakabalulamika.
Sa nguni ukonzha kubazula? Ngu Jeso Kilisito wakafwa, ee, nikuba bobo wakabushiwa. Ulimwi uli kwitashi lya cilyo lya Leza, ulimwi nguutukombela kwa ushi.
No nguni ukonzha kutwaandaanya ku lufwuno lwa Kilisito? Sa mapenzhi naa makatazho, ambweni nkupenzhewa, na inzala, na mbupushi, nishiba shitizha, nikuba kuyayiwa?
Mbuli mbukulembelwe ati,
“Nkaambo kako uswe tulafwa ciindi coonse.
Tulalibonya ukoya imbelele shiya kukuyaiwa.”
Pele mu shintu sheshi shoonse, tuli bazundi babaala kwiita mwa Kilisito wakatufwuna.

Nkaambo ndishinizhe kwaamba ati, kwiina cintu, niluba lufwu, nibuba bumi, nibaba baanjelo, nibaba bashikulela, nishiba shintu shaano mazuba, nishiba shiciza, nishiba insana, shikonzha kutwaandaanya u lufwuno lwa Leza.

Nishiba shintu sha mu moza, nishiba sha anshi nshitutateelelesha, nishiba shilenge shili buti shoonse, kwiina cintu niciba comwi cikonzha kutwaandaanya ku lufwuno lwa Leza ndutukwete mwa Kilisito Jeso Mwami wesu.
Ndaamba cakushinizha kwiita mwa Kilisito, nshibeyi pe. Awo monzo wangu nguupa bumboni mukusololelwa u Moza Usalala,
nkaambo ndi usile cini cini ulimwi cilacisa ku monzo wangu.
Nkaambo kuti nicaakukozheka, Leza naanshinganya uku ŋandaanya u Jeso Kilisito, ukaambo ka bantu ba mushobo wangu bakwesu ku mubili.
Baba mba Izilaili babo Leza mbaakasala ati babe banakwe, bulemu u shipangano u kupa mulawo u kukomba ulimwi u shishomezho,
maushabo akasokela ku luhubo lukando lwa ci Hebulu, nkaambo nkukumukowa waka Kilisito mu buntu bwakwe. Ubobo Leza uyendelezha shintu shoonse atembaulwe lyoonse, Ameni.
Inzho tacaamba ati izwi lya Leza lyakacilwa. Kayi takuli kwaamba ati boonse ba Izilaili mba Izilaili beni beni.
Ulimwi tacaamba ati boonse ba lunungu lwaka Abulahamu, mbanakwe Leza. Luhubo nundakakushomezha ulakalukwata kwiita mwa Aizeki mwanako.
Ceci cilaamba ati, tabali bana bazhalwa ku mubili, batewa ati mbana ba Leza, pele bana ba cipangano mbubatewa ati mba luhubo lwini lwini.
Nkaambo izwi lya cishomezho ca Leza lilaamba ati, “Ku ciindi ceci ncicona, Saala ulakakwata mwana mweembezhi.”
Takuli bulyo bobo, nkaambo mbubona bobo mbucakacitika ukwa Labeka, wakemita kwa ushesu Aizeki.
Inzho bana baba nibatakakuna kuzhalwa, u kucita cintu cibotu na cibiyabi, kwaamba bukanze bwa Leza bwakusala butolelele,
nkaambo teeli milimo, mbwite bwakwe. Leza wakaambila Labeka ati, “Mukando ulakasebezela mucece wakwe.”
Nkaambo Malembe alaamba ati, “Ndakamufwuna Jakobo, pele Isau ndakamusula.”
No twaambe acani? Sa twaambe ati Leza taluleme? Imbo bobo pe!
Nkaambo wakaambila Mozesi ati, “Ndakafwila luse wezo ŋunkaafwila luse, ulimwi ndakamufwila inkumbu wezo ŋunkaafwila inkumbu.”
Ubobo cikando tacili ceco ncaazanda muntu, naaba matunta akwe, pele cikando nduse lwa Leza.
Umbona mbuli mbutubala mu Malembe ati, “Leza wakaambila Falawo ati, ndakubika a bwami kwaamba kwiita mulyuuwe ntondezhe insana shangu, ulimwi u kwaamba izhina lyangu lizhibwe inshi yoonse.”
Ubobo Leza ulafwila luse muntu kufwumbwa wezo ngwaazanda, ulimwi ulazumya monzo ku muntu kufwumbwa ngwaazanda.
Inzho umwe mulakaambaati, “Naa cili bobo, no Leza ulakonzha buti kuyanina muntu butongo? Ubobo no nguni ukonzha kukazha ncazanda Leza?”
No ndiweni uwe umuntu bulyo ukazhanya u Leza? Sa cibiya cilakonzha kwaambila mubumbi ati, “No, wamumbilaanzhi bolya?”
Sa mubumbi wiina ceelelo cakubumba shibiya shobile kuhwa kumufwuma womwi, amana ulasebezha cibiya cimwi kumulimo wa bulemu, cimwi kumulimo wiina bulemu?
Sa kuti Leza naakazanda kutondezha bukali bwakwe, kwaamba ati bantu bazhibe insana shakwe, naatakaba shicamba, naakabalekelela babo boonse mbaakaakuzanda kuzonauna?
Sa katazanda ati atondezhe bulemu bwakwe mbubuli bukando kuli babo mbaakafwila luse, lolo ndwaakatubambila kwaamba tukatambule bulemu bwakwe,
kubicilizha aswe tuba kunze intwakatewa, kutali bulyo kuhwa kuba Juda baloolona?
Umbona mbuli mbwaamba Leza kwa Hosiya mushinshimi ati,
“Babo batakaakuli bantu bangu, ndakabeta ati mbantu bangu.
U wezo ŋundatakaakufwini, ndakamwita ati, ‘Nakufwunwa.’”
Nkaambo Leza ulakacita lubeta ku bantu baanshi ano kufwambaana u kumanizha!”
Mbubona mbwaakashinshima Aizaya ati, “Kuti Mwami Namakungwe Mutalabala naatakatushiila luhubo, aswe intwakaba bwakaba Sodomu, u Gomola.”
Sa twaambe acani? Bakunze batakabukapula bululami bwa Leza, bakabuyana bululami, nkukuti mbululami bwa kwiita mu lushomo.
Pele ba Izilaili babo bakaakusola kuba balulami kwiita mukubamba Mulawo, bakakacilwa kuuzuzucizha Mulawo wezo.
Nkaamboonzhi? Nkaambo kabazanda kuba balulami kunze lya kushoma, pele bulyo mukusola kucita milimo mibotu yabo. Bakalifwumpula kwibwe.
Mbuli mbukulembelwe ati,
“Amulange, ndabika mu Zioni ibwe limfwumpula,
ulimwi umwala uba unsha,
kufwumbwa wezo uukaashoma mwakwe,
takaushiwa insoni.”
Nubakwesu, cintu ncinzandisha u monzo wangu woonse, ulimwi ncinkomba kwa Leza, nkwaamba ati bafwutulwe bantu bangu ba Izilaili.
Nkaambo ndakonzha kupa bumboni ati baba bantu balikwete lwiici lwa kusebezela Leza, pele bayina luzhibo.
Nkaambo kakubula luzhibo lwa bululami buhwa kwa Leza, bakanka kukapula inzhila shabo beni, bayina kulifwiinsha kwa Leza.
Nkaambo Kilisito, ngumamanino a Mulawo kwaamba kube bululami kuli babo boonse ba shoma.
Pele bululami buhwa ku lushomo bulaamba ati, “Mutaakwaamba mu myonzo yenu ati, ‘Anu nguni ukonzha kuya kwizeulu?’” Ceco cilaamba kuleta Kilisito anshi.
Ulimwi, “No nguni ukonzha kuya anshi,” kwaamba akalete Kilisito kuhwa ku busena bwa bafwu?
No cilaamba acani? “Izwi talili kulaale aswe, lili ku mulomo umu monzo wako.” Nkukwaamba ati, izwi lyaamba shalushomo ndutukambauka,
nkaambo na waamba u mulomo wako ati Jeso ngu Mwami, ulimwi na kuti washoma mu monzo wako, ati Leza wakamubusha ku bafwu, ati ulafwutulwa.
Nkaambo muntu ulahumina mu monzo ubobo ulalulamikwa, ulimwi ulalyaambilila u mulomo ubobo ulafwutulwa.
Nkaambo Malembe alaamba ati, “Kwiina naaba womwi ushoma mwa Jeso ukaafwa insoni pe.”
Nkaambo kwiina caandaanya akati kaba Juda u ba Giliki, nkaambo Leza ngu Mwami wabo boonse. Ulalonjezha babo boonse bamoompolola.
Nkaambo Malembe alaamba ati, “Kufwumbwa muntu uwompolola mwizhina lya Mwami Leza, ulakafwutulwa.”
No balakamoompolola buti wezo ngubatakashoma? Ulimwi no balakamushoma buti wezo ngubatakateelela? Ulimwi no balakamuteelela buti kwa kwiina ubakambaukila?
Ulimwi no balakonzha buti kukambauka na kwiina wabatuma? Mbuli mbukulembelwe ati, “Taaliboteli matende a babo baleta Makani Mabotu?”
Pele takuli ati boonse bakaahumina Makani Mabotu. Nkaambo mushinshimi Aizaya, ulaamba ati, “Mwami, no nguni wakooshoma mulumbe wesu?”
Ubobo kushoma kuleza u kuteelela, u kuteelela izwi lya Kilisito.
“Mazwi abo akaya inshi yoonse.
Makani abo akashika ku mamanino anshi.”
sa ba Izilaili bayina nibakaateelela aza Makani Mabotu? Ca kutaanguna Mozesi wakaamba ati,
“Ume ndakamucita kwaamba ati mukabafwile munyono babo ba mushobo wiina mbuubele,
Ndakamupa bukali ukaambo ka bantu mbumwizhi ati mbalimbushi.”
“Ume ndakayanwa ku bantu u bayina nibakankapula.
Ndakalibonya kuli babo bayina nibakabuzhabuzha shangu.”
Leza wiina kubakaka bantu bakwe pe, bantu mbaakasala kale. Sa tamweezhi Malembe mbwaamba aka Elija mushinshimi, naakakomba ukulilauka kwa Leza makani a bana ba Izilaili?
Wakaamba ati, “Mwami, bakayaya bashinshimi bako banji banji, ulimwi bakazonauna shipaililo shako. Kwashaala bulyo ume ice, ulimwi ame balakapula bumi bwangu.”
No Leza wakamwiingula acani? Wakamwiingula ati, “Mulwangu ndimwini ndibambile balombwana bali shuulu shili ciloba u bayina nibakakomba leza wabubeshi Baala.”
Umbona bobo u mazuba ano, kuli mweelwe mushoonto bulyo wa babo mbaakasala Leza mu luse lwakwe.
Pele na kuti wakabasala mu luse lwakwe tacikonzha kuba mukaambo ka milimo njibakacita pe.
Inzho tulaamba acani? Ba Izilaili bayina nibakaciyana ncibakaakuzanda, pele basale bakaciyana, banamunji bakaba bashicinguni.
Umbona mbuli mbukulembelwe ati,
“Leza wakabapa moza wakuhoolozha.
Menso abo taaboni, u matwi abo taateeleli, kushika uceno ciindi.”
“Amuleke itebulu lyabo kabe kooze iiliba,
cibe cilebyo ca kusubulwa kwabo.
Leka menso abo akwate loofwe, kwaamba bataboni,
myoongo yabo yoobe lyoonse.”
Inzho ndabuzha, sa baba bantu balalifwumpula kwaamba ati bawe? Imbo bobo pe! Pele kubisha kwabo kwaleta lufwutuko ku bantu bakunze kwaamba ati ba Izilaili bafwe munyono.
Ubobo twabona ati kubisha kwaba Izilaili kwakaleta shileleko anshi ano, ulimwi na kubisha kwa ba Izilaili kwakaleta shileleko ku bantu bakunze, no kuzunjilwa kwabo kuzwile, kulakapandululaanzhi?
Inzho ndazanda kwaambila umwe nuba kunze, mbuli mundi mutumwa wenu umwe numutali ba Izilaili, ndeekomenya milimo ya butumwa bwangu.
Ambweni mukucita bolya, ndakonzha kupa ati bakwesu bafwe munyono, ubobo bamwi babo bakahunwe ukufwutulwa.
Nkaambo kuti kukakwa kwaba Izilaili, kwaletela ati inshi yoonse isanduke kuhwa ku bunakusulwa ukuba banakufwunwa bakwe, no cilakaba buti mu kutambulwa kwabo? Cili bulyo ukoya bumi kuhwa kubafwu.
Kuti naa muntu wapa cipanzha citaanzhi cacinkwa kwa Leza, nkukuti cinkwa coonse cashaala cilasalala. Na kuti muzanda ulasalala, nkukuti ayo mitabi ilasalala.

Na mitabi imwi yacisamu ca oliva yakakombolwa, inzho uwe nikubaati uli cisamu camwisokwe, wakalungwa akati kamitabi yezho imwi ya cisamu, inzho wakanka kwaabana shakulya shihwa kumizanda yacisamu ca Oliva cishanje.
Nkukaambo kako, tweelele kusampaula mitabi. Na ulacita bobo, zhibaluka ati indiwe nuukwatilile mizanda, pele mizanda njiikukwatilile.
Inzho mulaamba ati, “Mitabi yakakosaulwa kwaamba tulamatikwe uswe.”
Ee, umbona bobo. Bakakombauka nkaambo bayina nibakashoma, ubobo umwe mulishite mucisamu nkaambo kakushoma kwenu. Ubobo tamweelele kulisumpula pe. Pele amutiye, mutalisumpula.
Nkaambo na Leza wiina naakahuna ba Izilaili ubali ukoya mitabi yacizhalwa, sa ulatelaika ati uwe ulakonzha ukushinzha?

Inzho amuzhibe ati Leza ngu shiluse cini cini, ulimwi mukali. Mukali kuli babo bawa, pele ulikwete luse kwenu na kuti mwaitilizha mu luse lwakwe. Naa kuti amwe mulasampaula luse lwakwe ati amwe mulaakonoka.
Ubobo kwaamba ba Izilaili, batakakatili linji kukaka u kutashoma kwabo balilekelela, Leza ulakabalamatika ulimwi.

Nkaambo uwe uwa kunze uli ukoya mutabi wa oliva wa mwisokwe wezo Leza ngwaakalunga ku cisamu ca oliva, tuli cisamu cishange, wakalungwa bulyo Izilaili bali ukoya ceci cisamu cishange. Sa tacili cuuba uba kupilusha mitabi mikososhi ku cishiko ca cisamu ca oliva ulimwi?

Bakwesu, nkwaali maseseke ngunzanda kumuzhibya kwaamba ambweni mulatelaika ati muli basongo. Maseseke azo ngaaza, ba Izilaili baba bashicinguni, ubobo kulaakuli bobo mpaka bakunze boonse bakamuzhibe Leza.
Ndilelyo ndilyona ba Izilaili boonse nibakakafwutulwa. Mbubona mbukulembelwe ati,
“Mufwutuli ulakeza kuhwa ku Ziyoni.
Inguwe, ukaakusha bubiyabi bwa Jacobo.
Inzho kwaamba makani mabotu, ba Izilaili mbubashinkondonina Leza ukaambo kenu. Pele kwaamba shakusalwa, ba Izilaili Leza mbubanakufwunwa ukaambo kaba shaakale babo.
Nkaambo shipo ubwite bwa Leza tashisanduka eta muntu ukumulonjezha.
Nkaambo kale kale umwe nubakunze, kamutamuteeleli Leza, pele inzho Leza, wamufwila luse nkaambo ba Izilaili bakaakumukaka ukutamupupulala.
Inzho umbona bobo ba Izilaili tabapupulali Leza kwaamba ati mukutambula luse lwa Leza umwe, abo balutambulile ngawo.
Nkaambo Leza wakacita ati bantu boonse babe baanje ukaambo kakutamuteelela. Wakacita bobo kwaamba ati abafwile luse boonse.
Shili mbuli mbukulembelwe ati,
“Anu nguni uuzhi matelaishi a Mwami Leza?
Nguni uukonzha kumubula?
kwaamba amana walo akamuzholele?”

Inzho nubakwesu, nkaambo ka luse lwa Leza lunji lunji, ubobo ndamukumbila ati amulipe mibili yenu yoonse kwaamba mube cipaizho cikwete bumi, cisalala, cibotezha Leza. Yezhi njiinzhila iluleme yakukomba Leza.
Mutailila bukale bwa bantu bakunze, pele Leza asandule mizeezo yenu. Ndilelyo nimukonzha kuzhiba luzando lwa Leza, ngoonaawo mulazhiba shibotu, ushabulondo, ushimubotezha Leza.

Nkaambo kwiitila munsana nshaakampa Leza mu luse lwakwe, ndamwaambila ati mutalyeensheensha kubaala mbumubele pe. Kwaambisha nkwakuti amuliceshe ukulifwiinsha mu matelaishi kwiingainya umbumubele. Kweendelezhanya u lushomo lolo Leza ndwaapa muntu umwi umwi.
Nkaambo mbukuli mubili womwi, ulikwete shizo shinji shinji, ubobo shizo shesho shilikwete milimo yaandeene-andeene.
Umbona bobo aswe tubashikushoma, nikuba ati tuli banji banji, ubobo tuli mubili womwi mwa Kilisito Jeso. Ubobo tuliswaangene mbuli shizo sha mubili womwi.
Tulikwete shipo shishiyene shiyene kwiingaina u luse ndwaakatupa Leza. Na cipo cesu ncabushinshimi, atucisebezhe kwiingainya u lushomo lwesu.
Na ncabusebezhi, atusebezhe. Na ncabwiiyi, atuyiishe.
Na ncakuzumyazumya bamwi, atubazumye zumye. Wezo uupa, naape u monzo womwi. Wezo aze musolozhi, naasololele ca bunkutwe. Aze wezo ufwa luse, naacite bobo ucakubotelwa.
Lufwuno lwenu lutabi bulyo lwakuupaupa amenso. Sula cibi, kakatila cibotu.
Amufwunane cini cini ukoya bantu babunina mu lushomo. Kamubaalana kutondezha bulemu.
Mukusebezela Mwami, mucite mulutangalo, mutabi bakata pe.
Amubotelwe mukulanjila kwenu. Kamukwata shamba shenu ciindi ipenzhi lyamushikila. Amuzume kukomba lyoonse.
Amwaabane shakuyohwa banamusalazhi nokwenu, ubabo bayina nshibakwete, ulimwi amutambule beenzu u matashi obile.
Amubotelwe u babo babotelwe, amulile u babo balila.
Amuteelezhanye ciindi coonse. Mutalisumpula, pele amuteelezhanye ubantu bulyo. Mutatelaici ati muli basongo.
Na muntu wamucitila cibiyabi, mutamubweezhezha. Amucite shibotu kubantu kumenso aabantu boonse.
Na cilakonzheka, amusoleke kukala muluumuno u bantu boonse.

Nubafwunwa, mutazhola cibi ku muntu, mumuleke bulyo, nkaambo ulakamupa Leza mwini cisubulo mubukali bwakwe. Kayi Malembe alaamba ati, “Amubaleke ndime iimpa cisubulo, ndakabasubula.” Mbwaamba Mwami Leza.
Mbukuli bobo, amucite umbona mbuli Malembe mbwaamba, “Na kuti shinkondonoko wafwa inzala, mupe cakulya. Na wafwa inyota, mupe meenzhi akunwa. Nkaambo wacita bobo, ati walundika makala amutwi wakwe.”
Mutazundwa ku shibi pe, pele amuzunde shibi u kucita shibotu.
Muntu woonse ulyeelele kupupulala u kuteelela baleli. Nkaambo kwiina bulelo cita buhwa kwa Leza. Baleli baliwo Leza nguwakabapa u kubabika.
Nkaambo wezo utateeleli, nkukuti ulakaka cakabikwa u Leza. Nkaambo wezo ucita bobo ulapewa cisubulo.
Nkaambo baleli tabeelele kutiiwa pe, ku bantu bacita shibotu, cita kuti bacita cibiyabi. Sa ulazanda kutatiya baleli? Cita ciluleme, ubobo muleli ulakakulumbaizha cini cini.

Nkaambo muleli mutwanga wa Leza, uukucitila shibotu. Pele kuti naa ulacita shibiyabi, mutiye muleli, nkaambo ulikwete insana ushakukupa cisubulo. Nkaambo muleli, mutwanga wa Leza, uusubula bacita shibi mu busena bwakwe Leza.
Nkukaambo kako mulyeelele kupupulala u kuteelela baleli, ukutali bulyo ati, kamutiya bukali bwa Leza bulyo. Pele nkaambo ka matelaishi enu nubeni, ati mulyeelele kucita bobo.
Nciceco ncicona ncimupela mutelo, nkaambo baleli mbatwanga ba Leza nibacita mulimo wezu.
Ubobo amutele shikwelete shoonse; Amupe mitelo kuli babo beelele kupewa mitelo, amupe bulemu kuli babo beelele kupewa bulemu.
Mutakwati cikwelete ku muntu, cita bulyo cakufwunana. Nkaambo uufwini mweenzhiina ulazuzucizha Mulawo wa Leza.
Nkaambo Milawo yaamba ati, “Utaciti bumambe, utayaya, utebi, utabi shimunyono,” u milawo imwi yoonse ilashimpila a Mulawo wezu waamba ati, “Fwuna mweenzhinoko umbona mbuulifwini umwini.”
Uufwini mweenzhiina, takonzha kumubishizha. Ubobo uufwini mweenzhiina, wazuzucizha shoonse shaamba Mulawo.
Ubobo amucite sheshi, nkaambo mulizhi ati ciindi cakubuka kuhwa kutulo cashika. Nkaambo, ciindi cakwaamba tufwutulwe cili afwaafwi kubaala mbucakaakubele lelyo nitwakashoma.
Bushiku bwaumbuluka, bulazanda kuca. Inzho atuleke milimo yoonse yoomushinze, tubweze shilwisho shamumuni.
Atweende bweelele, mbuli bantu beenda mashikati. Tutabi bashindya, na bakolwa, na bacita shitaluleme, na balwati, na bashimunyono.
Pele amusame Mwami Jeso Kilisito, mutashiteeleli shaku mubili, ulimwi ukubotelwa micito yanshisho.
Muntu umwi ku lushomo lwakwe, ulakonzha kulya kufwumbwa cintu. Pele wezo utana kushima mu lushomo, ulalya bulyo cishu umicelo.
Wezo ulya, atasampauli mweenzhiina utali, aze wezo utali, teelele kumupa kaambo wezo ulya, nkaambo aze Leza wakamutambula.

No ndiweni uwe, nuubeteka u kupa kaambo kumusebezhi wa muntu umwi? Cili bulyo ku Mwami wakwe ice, nguukonzha kumukosolela. Pele inzho ndizhi ati, ulakonzha kushima nkaambo Mwami ulakonzha kumuyohwelezha.

Nkaambo muntu umwi ulatelaika ati buzuba bumwi buli kabotu kukomba Leza kubaala bumwi. Pele aze umwi ulatelaika ati mazuba oonse alikozhene bulyo. Ubobo muntu woonse ulyeelele kulamwa mu monzo wakwe mwini.

Wezo uulemeka buzuba bumwi, ulacita bobo kulemeka Mwami. Aze wezo uulya kufwumbwa cakulya, ulacita bobo kumulemeka Mwami, nkaambo ulalumba Leza. Aze wezo uuliimya cakulya, ulacita bobo kulemeka Mwami ulimwi ulalumba Leza.
Nkaambo kwiina muntu naaba womwi akati kesu, uupona mwini, nikuba wezo uufwa mwini.
Nkaambo nitukwete bumi, tuli boomi mu Mwami, unitufwa, tulafwila mu Mwami. Ubobo nituli boomi, naa nitufwa, tuli bakwe Mwami.
Ukaambo ka ceco, Kilisito wakafwa, u kubuka ku bafwu kwaamba ati abe Mwami waboonse ba bumi ubafwile.
Nkaambo Malembe alilembelwe ati,
Leza wakaamba ati, “Kufwumbwa kuti ncipona, mbwaamba Mwami
mahwi oonse alakamfwukamina,
ulimwi u milaka yoonse, ilakahumina ati ndime Leza.”
Ubobo woonse wesu, ulakalyaambilila makani a shesho nshaakacita, ku bushu bwa Leza.
Ukaambo kako, tatubetekani linji, pele tuteelezhanye ati, tutabi nitubika cilifwumpuzho niciba cilebyo munzhila ya mukwesu.
Ndizhi ulimwi ndizhishi ucakutakazha ku Mwami Jeso ati, kwiina cintu niciba comwi cibisha muntu pe. Pele ku muntu ulitelaisha ati ncibi, kuli wezo, ncibi cini cini.

Nkaambo na munyoko mu lushomo ulapenzhewa ukaambo ka shilyo shesho nshuulya, nkukuti tuceenda linji mu lufwuno. Ubobo utalecela cilyo ceco ncuulya kwaamba cizonaune uumwi wa babo mbaakafwila Kilisito.
Inzho amucenjele kwaamba ati mutapi bantu kaambo kakusampaula bubotu mbumucita.
Nkaambo bwami bwa Leza, tabuli bwakulya ukunwa pe. Pele mbwa bululami, mbwa luumuno u kubotelwa kuletwa mu Moza Usalala.
Nkaambo wezo usebezela Kilisito munzhila yezhi, watambula ukubotezha Leza, ubobo u bantu bamuhumina, cini cini ati musebezhi wa Leza.
Ubobo atucite shesho shikonzha kuleta luumuno u kuzakana mu lushomo.
Utazonauni milimo ya Leza ukaambo ka cakulya pe. Cini cini shintu shoonse shilasalala shilakonzha kuliwa, pele mukilisito ulabisha ciindi naalya ceco cikonzha kuleta kulifwumpula ku mweenzhiina.
Ncibotu kulilesha kulya buzani, naa kunwa cikola nikuba kucita cimwi cintu ucikonzha kuleta kulifwumpula ku munyoko.
Lushomo lwako nduukwete, ube alo umwini kumenso a Leza. Uli u coolwe wezo utalibeteci mwini ceco ncaakahumina.
Pele wezo ucikazha, naalya cintu wabisha kale, nkaambo shesho nshaacita tashishomi ati shilyeelele kucitwa. Ubobo kufwumbwa citali ca lushomo ncibi.
Inzho uswe intwakashima mu lushomo tulyeelele kubweza mukuli wa balengushi. Tutalibosha mulwesu tubeni pe.
Ubobo nkukuti uumwi umwi wesu ulyeelele kuleta kubotelwa ku mweenzhiina mukumuyohwa ati lushomo lwakwe lushime.
Nkaambo Kilisito wiina naakalibotezha mwini. Pele mbuli mbukulembelwe ati, “Masampu a babo bakaakukusampaula, eza kwangu ame.”
Nkaambo shoonse mu Malembe, shakalembwa kwaamba shituyiishe. Malembe alatuyiisha kuba bashicamba kwaamba ati tube ubulangizhi bwini bwini.
Inzho Leza wabushicamba ukuzumya zumya amupe lukamantano kuli uumwi umwi numucilila mukozhano waka Kilisito Jeso.
Ubobo amumulemeke u monzo womwi Leza ulimwi Ushi Mwami Jeso Kilisito.
Inzho amutambulane umbona mbuli Kilisito mbwaakamutambula kwaamba ati Leza alemekwe.
Nkaambo ndamushimwina ati, Kilisito wakaba muzhice waba Juda mwizhina lya lushinizho lwa Leza, kwaamba ati azuzucizhe shishomezho shesho sha Leza kuli babo ba shaakale,
u kupa bakunze nkaambo kakulemeka Leza ukaambo kalulecelelo lwakwe. Mbubona mbuli mbukulembelwe mu Malembe ati,
“Ubobo ndakakutembaula akati ka buntu bakunze,
ukwiimbila Izhina lyako inyimbo shakukutembaula.”
“Amusekelele nu bantu bakunze, antoomwi u bantu ba bakwe!”
“Akaka, amutembaule Leza umwe nu bantu bakunze noonse,
amumutembaulishe, umwe noonse nu bamishobo yoonse.”
“Umwi wa luhubo lwaka Jesi ulakeza,
ulakezhila kulela bakunze,
umwakwe balakayana bulanjizhi bakunze.”
Ubobo Leza upa bulanjizhi, amuzuzhe kubotelwa u luumuno loonse mukuhumina kwenu, mu kwaamba mukakomene mululanjilo kwiita munsana sha Moza Usalala.
Nubakwesu, ume ndizhishi makani enu, ati mulikwete bumi buli kabotu u luzhibo loonse, ulimwi mulakonzha kuyiishanya.
Pele nikuba ati, mu luŋwalu lwa makani amwi ndakamulembela cakupozha kwaamba muzhibalushe shintu shimwi. Ndakacita bobo ukaambo ka luse lolo Leza ndwaakampa,

ukunsala ati mbe musebezhi wa Kilisito Jeso ku bantu bakunze. Ndakambauka ukoya mupaizhi wa Makani Mabotu a Mwami Leza, kwaamba ati abo bantu bakunze bacitwe ukoya mulumbo ukonzha kutambulwa kwa Leza, usalazhiwa u Moza Usalala.
Inzho mbuli mundi mwa Kilisito Jeso, ndikwete cintu cakulyeenseensha ukaambo ka milimo njinsebezela Leza.
Nkaambo nshikonzha kukanana shintu shinji, cita bulyo shesho Kilisito nshaacita kwiita muli ume, kwaamba ati bantu bakunze bacilozhe kucilila kwiita mwizwi umu micito,
u munsana shashitondezho u malele, u munsana sha Moza wa Leza, kwaamba ati kuhwa ku Jelusalemu, kuya kushicila ku Ililikumu, ndazuzucizha mulimo wa Makani Mabotu a Kilisito.
Pele lyoonse ndazandisha kukambauka Makani Mabotu ukutali nkubakakambaucilwa kale sha Kilisito, kwaamba ati ambweni intazaci antalisho ya muntu umwi.
Mbuli mbwaamba Malembe ati,
“Babo batakashimwinwa shakwe
balakabona,
u babo bayina nibakateelela, balakateelela.”
Pele ninzho, ndamaninzha milimo yangu mono mu masena, nikuba ati kwa myaka minji minji ndakaakuzandisha kwiza kumubona.

Uninzho ndikwete muzeezo wakumwiitila koko, mulweendo lwangu lwa kuya ku Sipeni. Ndakabotelwa kumuswaya kwa mazuba mashoonto bulyo. Ndakamana kusansala amwe kwaciindi cishoonto, ndazanda ati mukanjohwe mulweendo lwangu.
Nkaambo ba shikombelo shaku Masedoniya uku Akaya bakabotelwa kupa milumbo yakuyohwa bapushi akati ka bantu ba Leza baku Jelusalemu.

Nkaambo na kuti bantu bakunze bakeza kwaabana shileleko shaku Moza uba Juda, cakababotela kucita bobo, nkaambo wakaba mulimo wabo kuyohwa bayina ncibakwete ku makani ashileleko sha shintu sha anshi ano.
Ndamaninzha mulimo wakupa milumbo yezhi, ndakaitila koko mulweendo lwangu lwa kuya ku Sipeni.
Ndizhi kwaamba ndakashika koko, ndakamuletela shileleko shinji shinji shaka Kilisito.
Inzho ndamukumbila nubakwesu, kwiita mu Mwami Jeso Kilisito, u mululufwuno lwa Moza Usalala, atukombe amwe ca nsana abusena bwangu.
Amunkombele kwaamba Leza ankwabilile intawila mu matashi abantu bayina lushomo mu Judiya. Ulimwi amukombe ati banamusalazhi baku Jelusalemu bakatambule milimo yezhi njindatumwa ati mbatolele.
Kwamana bobo, mu luzando bulyo lwa Leza, ndakashika koko ndibotelelwe ukusangabalilwa.
Leza wa luumuno abe amwe noonse. Ameni.
Inzho ndazanda kumulumba mukaintu munyokwesu mu lushomo Febi, ushimilimo wambungano yaku Cenkiliya.

Amukamutambule u matashi obile mu Mwami, umbona mbuli mbuceelele ku banamusalazhi. Amumuyohwe ku makani a shintu shoonse nshaazanda kwenu, nkaambo aze mwini kali muyohwi mubotu wa bantu banji banji ukwangu ume ndimwini.
Bakaakulibambile kuyaiwa ukaambo kangu. Ubobo ndabalumba, nikuba ati nshili ume ice nana iinumba, pele ubambungano yoonse ya bantu bakunze.
Mubaanzhe bantu bakombela muŋanda yabo.
Mumwaanzhe Epenetasi mufwunwa wangu, ngumutaanzhi waku Ezha wakasanduka kwa Kilisito.
Mumwaanzhe Maliya, wezo wakamusebezela cini cini cakulipa.

Amumwaanzhe Andulonika u Juniasi, bashiluhuboma, twakaakuli baanje antoomwi muntolongo. Kabazhibilwe cini cini akati kabatumwa antoomwi ame, ulimwi mbubataanzhi kuba ba Kilisito, ume ncitana kusanduka pe.
Mumwaanzhe Amfiliatasi nakufwunwa mu Mwami.
Mwaanzhe u Abanasi shimilimoma mwa Kilisito, u Sitaku ngunzandisha.
Ndamwaanzha Apele muna Kilisito mubizu. Mubaanzhe babo boonse bamukowa waka Alisitobulasi.
Ndamwaanzha shicishima Helodiyoni. Amubaanzhe mu Mwami babo boonse ba mukwashi waka Nasisasi.
Ndamwaanzha Tulufena u Tulufosa, bashimilimo babo mu Mwami.
Mumwaanzhe Lufo wakasalwa u Mwami, ulimwi amumwaanzhe baina, nkaambo ngu baama ame.
Amubaanzhe babo ba Asinkilitasi, u Fulegoni, u Hemesi, u Patulobasi, u Hemasi, u bakwesu boonse mbucilyaabo.
Amubaanzhe babo ba Filologasi, u Julia, u Neleyasi u munina mukaintu, u Olimpasi u banamusalazhi boonse mbubashite abo.
Amwaanzhanye calufwuno. Imbungano shoonse sha Kilisito, shamwaanzha.
Inzho ndamukumbila, nubakwesu, amubacenjelele babo ubaandaanya beenzhinokwabo u kupa kwaamba bacite milandu. Mukucita bobo, balashiya injiisho nshibakaiya. Ubobo amubatantamuke.
Nkaambo bantu bali bobo tabasebezeli Kilisito Mwami wesu pe. Pele balasebezela nshibazanda beni. U mazwi mabotu a bumpelenje balacenga ubatana kushima mu lushomo.
Nkaambo bantu boonse baliiteelele impuwo yenu yakuteelela Leza. Ubobo ndabotelwa ukaambo kenu, nikuba ati ndazanda mube basongo mu shintu shibotu ulimwi mutenjili ku shibi pe.
Ubobo Leza uupa luumuno ulakazonauna Shaatani kunshi kumatende enu.
Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito, amufwile luse.
Ume ndi Tetiyasi, ndamwaanzha mu Mwami, ndime mulembi wa luŋwalu lolu.
Mwami Jeso Kilisito amufwile luse noonse. Ameni.
Inzho Leza shinsana shoonse, ulakumuzumya zumya kwiitila mu Makani Mabotu ngunkambauka aamba sha Jeso Kilisito. Makani aza kaali maseseke kwa myaka minji minji,
pele inzho shakalembwa u bashinshimi shazubululwa, ubobo mbuli mbwaakalailila Leza wiina mamanino, shazubululwa ku bantu bamishobo yoonse kwaamba ati bashome u kuteelela.
Leza ice shibusongo, naalemekwe kwiita mwa Jeso Kilisito ciindi coonse. Ameni.
Ndime Paulu wakatewa kuba mutumwa wa Kilisito Jeso mu luzando lwa Leza. Ndili u Sositinesi mukwesu.
Leza Tatesu u Mwami Jeso Kilisito, bamufwile luse u kumupa luumuno.
Lyoonse ndalumba Leza wangu ukaambo kenu, ukaambo ka luse ndumwakapewa mukukamantana u Kilisito Jeso.
Ukaambo kalukamantano lwenu u Kilisito, mulihubile munzhila shoonse. Mu kwaamba kwenu ulimwi u muluzhibo.
Nkaambo makani aamba sha Kilisito alibonya kuba meni meni akati kenu.
Ubobo umwe kwiina cipo ca luse ncimubula, ciindi nimulindila kwiza kwa Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito.
Leza ulakamuzumya zumya mpaka kushicila ku mamanino kwaamba mutakapewa kaambo mu buzuba bwa Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito.
Leza ulashomeka, ulimwi nguwakamwita kwaamba mube mu lukamantano u mwanakwe Jeso Kilisito Mwami wesu.

Inzho ndamukumbila nubakwesu, mwizhina lya Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito, kwaamba noonse muteelezhanye, kutabi kwaandaana akati kenu pe. Pele amukamantane antoomwi ca kumaninina iitelaishi lyomwi, u muzeezo womwi bulyo.
Nkaambo ndakateelela makani aahwa kumukwashi wa Kilowe, aamba ati, kuli kuzwangana akati kenu.

Inzho nciŋamba ncakuti umwi uumwi wenu ulaamba shakwe mwini. Umwi ulaamba ati, “Ume ndacilila Paulu,” uumwi ati, “Ume ndacilila Apolosi,” Uumwi ati, “Ume ndacilila Kefasi,” ulimwi umwi ati, “Ume ndacilila Kilisito.”
Sa Kilisito mwaapaule? Sa Paulu nguwakakankaminwa aciciinkano ukaambo kenu? Sa mwakapapatizwa mwizhina lyaka Paulu?
Ndalumba Leza kwaamba kwiina naaba womwi wenu ngundakapapatiza! Cita bulyo Kilisipasi u Gayasi.
Ubobo kwiina ukonzha kwaamba ati wakapapatizwa mwizhina lyangu.
Pele atubone, ndakapapatiza ba mukwashi wa Sitivini, kunze kwa baba, nshitelaiki ati kuli uunji ngundakapapatiza pe.

Nkaambo Kilisito wiina naakantuma kupapatiza pe, pele kukambauka Makani Mabotu. Ubobo, ndyeelele kukambauka cakutacilila busongo bwa bantu, kutiya ati insana sha lufwu lwa Kilisito aciciinkano shitabi shabulyo.
Inzho makani amba sha lufwu lwa Kilisito Jeso aciciinkano ngabulimbushi kuli babo bazhimini, pele kwesu uswe utuli munzhila ya lufwutuko, ninsana sha Leza.
Nkaambo kulilembelwe ati,
“Ndakazonauna busongo bwa basongo,
Ndakapilinganya maanu a bashiluzhibo.”
Ncizumu kwaamba bantu bamuzhibe Leza mu busongo bwabo. Ubobo cakamubotela Leza kwaamba afwutule babo ba shoma kwiitila mu makani ngutukambauka ngubaamba ati ngabulimbushi.
Nikuba ati ba Juda balazanda kubona maleele, abo ba Giliki balakapula busongo.
Uswe tulakambauka sha Kilisito uwakankaminwa aciciinkano, kuba Juda aza makani ncilebyo, ako ku bantu bakunze mbulimbushi.
Pele kuli babo mbaaketa Leza, ba Juda nibaba ba bahwa mashi, balizhi ati Kilisito ninsana u busongo bwa Leza.
Nkaambo ceco cilibonya ukoya bulimbushi bwa Leza, mbusongo kubaala bwa bantu, aco cibonwa ukoya bufwafwalishi bwa Leza, cilikwete insana kubaala shabantu.
Nubakwesu, amutelaike, no mwakaakuli bani ciindi Leza naakamwita? Mbashoonto akati kenu bakaakuli basongo, na bashinsana na bakaakuli balemu.

Pele Leza mu kuzanda kwakwe, wakasala shintu nshibatelaika bantu ba anshi ano ati nshabulimbushi kwaamba abaushe insoni basongo. Ulimwi Leza wakasala shintu shiina insana sha anshi ano kwaamba abaushe insoni bantu ba shinsana.
Ulimwi Leza wakasala shintu nshibatelaika bantu baanshi ati shiina mulimo, kwaamba shesho nshibatelaika ati shilikwete bulemu shibe shabulyo.
Leza wakacita bobo ati, kutabi muntu naaba womwi ulisumpula kumenso akwe.
Pele Leza wakamuswaanganya antoomwi u Jeso Kilisito kwaamba abe mbubusongo bwesu, wakatululamika kwa Leza. Twakaba bantu baleza basalala ulimwi balubushi.
Cili umbona mbucilembelwe umalembe ati, “Wezo uzanda kulikankaizha, ulyeelele kulikankainzha ceco Mwami ncaakacita.”
Ubobo nubakwesu indakeza kwenu, ndiina kwiza kumukambaukila makani maseseke a lushinizho azo Leza ngaakatuzubulwila mu mazwi a buuza akulitondezha busongo.
Nkaambo ndakalisalila kutazhiba cintu niciba comwi akati kenu, cita bulyo Jeso Kilisito wezo wakankaminwa a ciciinkano.
Ubobo ndakeza kwenu, mubulengushi umubukandu u kuzhangama cini cini.
Mu kwaamba kwangu umu kukambauka kwangu, ndiina kusebezha mazwi aakweenzelezha, pele ndakasola kusandula ukuleta bantu, munzhila yakutondezha insana sha Moza Usalala,
ndakacita bobo kwaamba lushomo lwenu lutazhimi a busongo bwa muntu, pele munsana sha Leza.
Pele akati kenu umwe numwakashima tulasebezha mazwi a busongo, nikuba kuti busongo bobu tabuli bwa bantu naa bwabaleli baanshi ano, babulelo bumana.
Pele busongo mbutwaamba mbusongo bwa Leza bwa maseseke akwe. Bobo Leza mbwakaambilizha katana kulenga inshi, busongo bwakuleta bulemu kulyuuswe.
Kwiina naaba womwi wa baleli ba anshi ano ubwizhi busongo bobu, nkaambo kuti nibakaakubwizhi, nibatakamukankamina aciciinkano Mwami wa bulemu.
Pele umbona mbukulembelwe ati,
“Shesho muntu nshaatakabona naa kuteelela,
shesho muntu nshaatakatelaika,
inshisho Leza nshaakabambila babo bamufwini.”
Pele uswe, Leza wakatuzubululila sheshi kwiita mu Moza Usalala. Nkaambo Moza Usalala ulalingula shintu shoonse naaba maseseke a Leza.
Sa kuli muntu uuzhi matelaishi a muntunina? Kwiina, cita bulyo moza wa muntu uuli mukati mwakwe. Umbona bobo kwiina muntu ukonzha kuzhiba shintu sha Leza kunze lya Moza wa Leza.
Uswe twiina nitwakatambula moza wa anshi ano, pele twakatambula Moza uhwa kwa Leza, kwaamba ati atuzhibye shipo Leza nshaatupa mu luse lwakwe.
Tulakambauka sheshi kutali u makani na mazwi ayiishiwa u busongo bwa buntu, pele bulyo u mazwi ayiishiwa u Moza wa Leza, ubobo tulapandulula shintu sha Moza wa Leza kuli babo bakwete Moza wa Leza.
Inzho babo batali bamu Moza wa Leza, tabatambuli shintu sha Moza wa Leza, nkaambo bobu mbulimbushi nkubabele, ulimwi tabakonzha kushizhiba nkaambo sheshi shilazhibwa bulyo u Moza Usalala.
Bantu bamu Moza, balakonzha kubeteka shintu shoonse, pele balo kwiina ukonzha kubabeteka.
Cili ukoya mbwaamba Malembe ati,
“Anu nguni uzhi mizeezo ya Mwami?
No nguni ukonzha ku mulailila?”
Inzho uswe tulikwete mizeezo ya Kilisito.
Inzho ume nubakwesu, ncintakonzha kumwaambila ukoya bantu ba Moza Usalala, pele ndakamwaambila ukoya bantu bamubili bacili bana bashoonto mwa Kilisito.
Ndakamusanina mukupa kutali cilyo cizumu. Nkaambo kamutalibambile kulya cilyo cizumu, uninzho tamulibambile.

Nkaambo mucili bantu baku mubili, akati kenu kuli munyono u kuzwangana. Ceci ncicitondezha ati mucili mu buntu, ulimwi mulacilila u kucita shabuntu. Sa tacitondezha ati mucili bantu ba mubili, ulimwi mulapona muzhila ya buntu?
Nkaambo bamwi balaamba ati, “Uswe tulacilila Paulu,” bamwi ati, “Uswe tulacilila Apolosi,” sa tamuli ukoya bantu bulyo?
Nikuba bobo, anu Apolosi nguni? No Paulu aze nguni? Inta toonse tuli batwanga ba Leza ubakamuleta ku lushomo. Umwi uumwi wesu ulasebeza mulimo ngwaakapewa u Mwami.
Ume ndakashanga, Apolosi wakatuntulila, pele upa ati shimene ngu Leza.
Amubone, uushanga naaba shikutuntulila, kwiina umbwaabele, cita bulyo Leza uushipa kukomena.
Wezo uushanga u wezo uutuntulila, boonse balikozhene bulyo, ulimwi umwi uumwi ulakatambula bulumbu bwakwe bumweelele kuhwa kwa Leza.
Nikuba bobo tuli bashimilimonina Leza, tulasebeza antoomwi, umwe muli muunda wa Leza, ulimwi muli mazake a Leza.
Kwiita mu luse ndwaakampa Leza, ndakazaka intalisho ukoya muzashi muuza, pele uuzaka antalisho yezho ngunji. Inzho muzashi umwi uumwi, acenjele mbuli mbwaayelele kuzaka.
Nkaambo kwiina uukonzha kuzaka intalisho iinji kubaala yezhi yakabikwa kale. Intalisho yezhi ngu Jeso Kilisito.
Antalisho yezhi, muntu ulakonzha kuzaka ulubulo lwa goludi, u siliva, naaba mabwe meebeshi, nikuba u masamu, bwizu naaba mabu.
Mulimo wa muntu woonse ulakabonwa, nkaambo mu buzuba bwa lubeta shilakatondezhewa. Buzuba bobo bulakashika u mulilo, ubobo mulilo ulakazubulula milimo ya muntu umwi uumwi mbwiibele.
Kuti shesho muntu nshaakazaka antalisho tashipiile, muzashi wezo ulakatambula bulumbu.
Pele kuti naa mulilo watenta buzake, muzashi wezu ulakazhimininwa shintu shoonse, nikuba bobo ulakafwutulwa, pele ukoya welya muntu wazokolwa mu mulilo.
Sa tamwizhi ati umwe muli iŋanda ya Leza, ukuti Moza wa Leza uli muli umwe?
Kufwumbwa wezo uzonauna iŋanda ya Leza, aze Leza ulakamuzonauna. Nkaambo iŋanda ya Leza ilasalala, ubobo umwe ndimwe iŋanda ya Leza.
Mutalicengi nubeni. Kuti na umwi akati kenu kalitelaisha ati musongo mu ciindi ceno mu kwaamba shintu shaluundu, ulyeelele kulicita ukoya muntu mulimbushi, kwaamba abe musongo mwini mwini.
Kayi busongo bwaku mibili, mbulimbushi kwa Leza. Nkaambo kulilembelwe ati, “Leza ulabakwasha basongo umbumpelenje bwabo.”
Ulimwi Malembe alaamba ati, “Mwami ulizhi ati, matelaishi abo ngabulyo.”
Ubobo kutabi muntu ulikankaizha ku bantu nina, nkaambo shintu shoonse nshenu.
Naaba Paulu na Apolosi na Pita niiba inshi yezhi u bumi u lufwu u shesho shiliko ushiciza kumbele, nikuba kuti shoonse nshenu,
umwe muli bakwe Kilisito, aze Kilisito ngwaka Leza.
Mbubolya mbumweelele kutelaika, kwaamba ati tuli babanzhi bakwe Kilisito, ulimwi tuli basebezhi bakambauka makani maseseke a Leza.
Inzho cizandika kubashikubanza ncakuti balyeelele kushomeka.
Pele ume lwangu ndimwini, ndiina makani nikuba kuti ndabetekwa amwe, niikaba inkuta ya bantu. Nikuba bobo, nshilibeteci ndimwini pe.
Ndiina cinkopa mu monzo wangu, nikuba bobo tacaamba ati ndiina mulandu pe. Mwami nguumbeteka.

Ubobo mutabeteci muntu kacitana kushika ciindi ceelele, katana kushika Mwami. Walo ulakazubulula shintu shisesece shili mu mushinze u makanze oonse ali mu myonzo ya bantu. Ubobo muntu umuntu ulakatembaulwa u Leza mbuli mbwaayelele.

Inzho nubakwesu, ndaamba shintu sheshi sha Apolosi ame ukaambo kenu ati mwiiye nkutubele kaambyo ncikapandulula kaamba ati, “Amucilile cilembelwe umbona mbucilembelwe mutaitilizha.” “Amucileke ciyanza cakulisumpula akati kenu ukaambo” kakuti nubamwi mulacilila umwi kunyansha umwi.
Anu nguni wakamupa bukando kubaala bamwi? Sa tali Leza wakamupa shintu shoonse nshimukwete? Naa mwakapewa bulyo, no kaamboonzhi mulalisumpula a shintu nshimwakapewa bulyo?
Sa nkukwaamba mwakwata kale shintu shoonse shizandika? Sa mwahuba kale? Sa mwaba bami uswe katutana? Nicaakuli cibotu kuti nimwaakuli bami nkaambo nitwaakweendelezha antoomwi amwe.
Nciceco ncindabona kwaamba ati uswe tubatumwa Leza wakatubika munshi kumanuma, ukoya mbantu bapewa mulandu wa lufwu. Twaba ukoya cintu cakweebela ku shilenje shoonse, ku baanjelo uku bantu.
Uswe tuli balimbushi nkaambo ka Kilisito, pele umwe muli basongo nkaambo mulikamantene u Kilisito. Uswe tulilengucile, pele umwe muli bazumu. Umwe mulalemekwa, uswe tulasampaulwa.
Kushicila ku ciindi ceno tulafwa inzala iinyota, twiina shakusama, tulaumwa ukutuntulika.
Tulasebeza cini cini kwaamba tuyane shizandika. Ku ciindi bantu nibatwaamba shibiyabi, tulabalonjezha. Ciindi nibatupenzha tulaliinza bulyo,
ciindi nibatutamikizha, tulalifwiinsha bulyo ukwiingula ca lufwuno. Kushicila uceno ciindi tulasampaulwa ati tuli ifwushungu lyaanshi yeno, ulimwi bantu balitubicile kuba itombe.
Ndamulembela aza makani kutali kumuusha insoni pe, ndamubula bulyo, mbuli banangu banakufwunwa.

Nikuba bobo, cilakonzheka kwaamba ati mulikwete ba maayi banji banji umbumi bwenu bwabu Kilisito. Pele bama ushenu tabali banji banji pe. Ume ndakaba ukoya ushenu umbumi bwenu mu lukamantano u Kilisito, nkaambo ndakamukambaukila Makani Mabotu.
Inzho ndamulomba, amunjiye ume.
Ubobo ndaamutumina Timoti, mwanangu ushomeka mu Mwami, kwaamba amuzhibalushe inzhila shangu mwa Kilisito, shesho nshinjiisha umasena oonse mu mbungano shoonse.
Bamwi balalisumpula, ukoya nshikezi linji koko.
Pele ndeza koko ca kufwambaana naa Mwami camubotela, ndilelyo ninkaazhiba nshibakonzha kucita babo balisumpula, ukutali bulyo shesho nshibaamba,
nkaambo bwami bwa Leza tabutondezhewa u kwaamba mazwi bulyo pe, pele bulabonwa kwiita munsana.
Inzho amusale ncimuzanda. Sa nkezhize koko u musako, na u monzo wa lufwuno wakulifwiinsha?
Pele mwamana mulalisumpula! Inta kayi mulyeelele kubiilwa ulimwi ukumukusha akati kenu wezo wakacita citonda cili bobo!
Nikuba ati nshili amwe ku mubili, pele ku moza ndili kale amwe, ndamubeteka kale muntu wezo wakacita citonda ukoya tuli amwe
mwizhina lya Mwami Jeso, mwakabungana, ame ndakaakuli amwe ku moza antoomwi insana sha Mwami wesu Jeso,
muntu wezo mukamwaabe kunsana shaka Shaatani, mubili wakwe ukazonaunwe. Pele moza wakwe ukafwutulwe mu buzuba bwakashika bwa Mwami.
Noombukushe bumena bwakalekale kwaamba mube cikandekande cipiya, ndizhi kale ati mbumubele. Nkaambo, Kilisito, uutewa ati ngu Mwanaa Mbelele we Pobwe lya Kwiitilila, wakayaiwa kale.
Ubobo atusekelele ipobwe lyesu, tutasebezha bumena bwakalekale bwabubiyabi ukubiya monzo, pele ucinkwa ciina bumena, monzo mubotu u lushinizho.
Ndakamulembela mu luŋwalu lwangu ati, mutateelezhanya u bashimamambe.
Takuli kwaamba ati mutateelezhanya u bantu boonse anshi ano batewa ati mbubashimamambe, bashindya, bafwumpi nibaba bashikukomba shibumbwa. Nkaambo kuti nikwaakuli bobo, nimwataakuli anshi ano.

Pele inzho ndamulembela ati na kuli muntu naaba womwi waamba ati mushomi, pele kali shimamambe na shindya na shikukomba mizhimu na shimatushi na cakolwa naaba mutewu, muntu wezo uli bobo, tamweelele nikuba kulya aze pe.
Sa kubeteka bantu bakunze mulimo wangu? Sa umwe tamweelele kubeteka bashomi nokwenu babisha?
Leza nguubeteka bakunze babo, mbuli mbwaamba Malembe ati, “Amumukushe muntu wezo mubiyabi akati kenu.”
Kuti na umwi muntu akati kenu ulikwete kaambo umweenzhiina, no mbubuti mbwaakonzha kuya kubetekwa u bantu bakunze kuleka kubetekwa ku bantu ba Leza?
Sa tamwizhi ati bashomeka mbu bakaabeteka bantu ba anshi? Inzho na kuti bantu ba anshi balakabetekwa amwe, sa tamukonzha koombolozha tukani tushoonto twamushobo wezu akati kenu?
Sa tamwizhi ati tulakabeteka milandu yaba anjelo? No tulakacilwa buti kubeteka sha anshi ano?
Kuti na mulikwete milandu ku shintu shili ukoya sheshi, no nkaamboonzhi ncimwiitolela ku babeteshi banyanshiwa mu mbungano yenu?
Ndaamba bobo kwaamba ati muushe insoni. Sa nkukuti mulanshimwina ati kwiina muntu musongo naaba womwi akati kenu ukonzha kubeteka twaambo akati kabashomi?
No kayi mbubuti mushomi mbwaabetesha wamushobonina ku bantu bankuta, ulimwi kunkuta yababo batali bashominina?
Inzho calibonya kale kwaamba ati mwakacilishiwa nkaambo mulatola milandu yenu kuya mulabetekwa kunkuta. No nkaamboonzhi tamuhumina bulyo kubishizhiwa? No nkaamboonzhi tamuhumina kwibilwa?
Pele mulabisha ukwibila bamwi, ulimwi sheshi mulashicita ukubashomi nokwenu.
Sa tamwizhi ati basofweele tabakatambuli Bwami bwa Leza? Inzho mutalicengi pe! Kutali babo bulyo nibaba bahuule u bakomba baleza bapange ba shimamambe u balombwana batwalana u balombwana nokwabo,
ubatewu, ubashaacihule mwangu, ubacakolwa, babeshi, nibaba bashikufwumpa. Kwiina wa babo ukaatambula bwami bwa kwizeulu bwa Leza.
Bobo mbubakaakubele bamwi akati kenu. Pele umwe mwakasanzhiwa, ukusalazhiwa, ukululamikwa mwizhina lya Mwami Jeso Kilisito u Moza wa Leza wesu.
“Ucakulya ncefwu, alyo ifwu ndyacakulya,” nikuba bobo Leza ulakazonauna shoonse shobile. Mubili tooli wamamambe, pele ngwakusebezha mulimo wa Mwami nkaambo Mwami ngumukamwini mubili.
Nkaambo Leza wakabusha Mwami Jeso ku bafwu, aswe umbona ulakatubusha munsana shakwe.
Sa tamwizhi ati mibili yenu nshizo sha mubili wa Kilisito? Sa ntole shizo sha mubili wa Kilisito ukushicita ati shiswaangane umubili wamuhuule? Bobo imbo pe!
Sa tamwizhi ati wezo uliswaanganya umuhuule, ati ulaba mubili womwi u wezo? Nkaambo umbona mbuli mbukulembelwe ati, “Babo bobile balakaba mubili womwi.”
Pele wezo uliswaanganya u Mwami, ulaba Moza womwi u Mwami.
Amuleke bumambe. Shibi shoonse nshaacita muntu, tashibisha mubili, pele shimamambe ulabishizha mubili wakwe mwini.
Sa tamwizhi ati mibili yenu iŋanda ya Moza Usalala uuli muli umwe ngumwakatambula kwa Leza? Ubobo tamuli nubeni pe, muli u Leza.
Mwakaulwa umuulo mukando. Ubobo amusebezhe mibili yenu, ca bulemu bwaka Leza.
Inzho ndazanda kwiingula mibuzho njimwakanembela. Ee, ncintu cibotu mulombwana kutatwala.
Pele kulesha bumambe, woonse mulombwana ulyeelele kutwala, aze mukaintu ulyeelele kuba umulumyaakwe mwini.
Mulombwana ulyeelele kucitila mwinakwe sheelele sha muŋanda, aze mukaintu umbona ulikwete insana a mubili wa mulumi.
Ubobo mukaintu takonzha kucita mbwaazanda a mubili wakwe, cita mulumi. Umbona bobo aze mulombwana takonzha kucita mbwaazanda a mubili wakwe, cita mwinakwe.

Tamweelele kukashanya, cita kuti mwahumizhanya kucita bobo kwa ciindi cili mbucibele, kwaamba mulipe kukukomba. Mwamana mulyeelele kuswaangana ulimwi, kwaamba Shaatani atamusunki ukaambo kakukacilwa kukwata shamba.
Nciŋamba nkumuhuminya bulyo, kutali ati ndamupa mulawo pe.
Nicabota kuti bantu boonse nibaakuli ukoya ume. Nikuba ati muntu umwi uumwi ulikwete cipo cakwe mwini cihwa kwa Leza, umwi cili bolya, aze umwi cipo cili bunji.
Inzho kuli babo batatwelwe u bamuka bafwu, ndabaambila ati ncibotu kwaamba ati bakale bulyo, ukoya ume.
Pele kuti naa tabakonzha kuba bashicamba, balyeelele kutwala. Ncibotu kutwala kubaala kulikumbuzha.
Pele kuti naa walekwa, naakale bulyo katanda, na takuli bobo, naateelezhanye umulumi. Umbona bobo aze mulumi teelele kumuleka mwinakwe pe.
Inzho kuli babo bamwi nkukuti ndaamba ati, pele ume ndiina mulawo uuhwa ku Mwami, na kuli umwi mushomi uutwele mukaintu utashomi, mukaintu wezo na ucizanda kutwalwa, mulumi teelele kumuleka pe.
Ulimwi na kuli mukaintu utwelwe ku mulombwana utashomi, kuti mulombwana wezo ucizanda kutwalana, teelele kukuhwa pe.

Nkaambo mulumi utashomi ulalonjezhewa ukaambo kamwinakwe uli mu lushomo, aze mukaintu utashomi ulalonjezhewa ukaambo ka mulumi ushoma. Nikwataakuli bobo, banenu nibataakusalala. Pele umbona mbuli mbucibele inzho, balasalala.

Pele kuti naa wezo utashomi wazanda kulekana, umbona bobo abalekane, nkaambo mu mulandu uuli bobo mushomi mulombwana naa mukaintu ati taanjilwe. Nkaambo Leza wakatwita kwaamba ati, tube u bukale bwa muluumuno.
Nkaambo uwe, u mukaintu mushomi, no ulizhi buti ati ambweni ulakafwutula mulumyaako? Aze u mulombwana mushomi, no ulizhi buti ati ambweni ulakamufwutula mwinako?
Inzho umwi uumwi ulyeelele kukala umbumi mbwaakapewa ku Mwami Jeso, kwiingaina umbwaakaakubele ciindi Leza naakamwita. Wezu ngu mulawo ngundamupa ku mbungano shoonse.
Na kuti umwi kali mupalule kale ku ciindi naakahumina bwite bwa Leza, ataseseka bupalule bwakwe. Naa kuli utana kupalulwa mukuhumina bwite bwa Leza, atapalulwa pe.
Nkaambo bupalule bwiina makani, ako kutapalulwa kwiina makani, pele cintu cikando nkubamba u kucilila milawo ya Leza.
Uumwi umwi ulyeelele kukala umbona mbuli mbwaakaakubele kuhwa ciindi naakateelela ukuhumina bwite kwa Leza.
Sa wakaakuli muzhice ciindi Leza naakakwita? Ciina makani. Pele kuti naa ulakonzha kuyana lwaanguluko, nikuba bobo kala umbona mbuli muzhice.
Nkaambo kufwumbwa mwite kwa Leza ciindi ncaali muzhice, wezo mwaangulule kale, ulimwi ngwakwe Mwami. Umbona bobo aze wezo wakaakuli mwaangulule kale ku ciindi ca bwite bwakwe, muzhice wa Kilisito.
Umwe mwakaulwa umuulo mukando, ubobo, mutabi bazhice babantu.
Inzho, nubakwesu, umwi uumwi ulyeelele kukala u Leza umbona mbuli mbwaakaakubele ku ciindi ca bwite bwakwe.
Inzho ku makani a babo batana kutwala, ubatana kutwalwa ndiina mulawo uhwa ku Mwami, pele ndamupa mizeezo yangu ukoya muntu uushoma nkaambo Mwami wakantondezha luse lwakwe.
Inzho ndatekaika bulyo ati ukaambo kamasukusho ali afwaafwi kucitika, muntu akale umbona mbuli mbwaabele.
Sa ulitwele? Inzho utasoli kumuleka. Sa tutwele? Utasoli kutwala.

Pele naa kuti watwala, ati wiina kubisha pe. Nakalindu kuti na watwalwa ati wiina mulandu. Bantu babo batwalene balakayana mapenzhi mu bumi. Ubobo ndazanda bulyo kumukusha kumapenzhi a bumi bono. Nkukuti ndamuhuna kuhwa kumakatazho azo aakutwalana.
Nciŋamba nubakwesu ncakuti, ciindi caceya cisheele. Ubobo, babo batwele babe ukoya batatwele,
abo babo balila, babe ukoya batalila, abo babo babotelelwe, babe ukoya batabotelelwe, abo babo ba shikusambala babe ukoya bayina makwebo,
abo babo basebezha shintu sha bumi bwa anshi batabici myonzo yabo ku shintu shesho. Nkaambo shiyanza sha anshi u bubotu bwasho bulakaita ukumana.
Inzho ndazanda muleke kulibilika. Mulombwana utatwele naalipakashizhe ku makani a Mwami, mbwayelele kubotezha Mwami.
Pele muntu utwele, ulabika maanu ku shintu shaanshi, kwaamba ati abotezhe mwinakwe,

ubobo mizeezo yakwe yaba yamaanka maanka. Pele mukaintu utatwelwe na mushimbi utezhi mulombwana, ulabilaanina shintu sha Mwami, mbwayelele kusalala ku mubili uku moza. Pele mukaintu utwelwe ulakwata busongo ku shintu shaanshi, kwaamba ati abotezhe mulumyaakwe.
Aza ndaamba bobo kwaamba ati muyohwe, nshizanda kumubicila mukuli pe. Pele ndazanda ati mucite shoonse shizandika kumukwata acikoshi, ulimwi mulyeelele kulyaaba ca kumaninina kusebezela Mwami.
Kuti na muntu umwi ulatelaika ati talilemeka kabotu kunakalindu ngwaazanda kutwala, kuti wamukacila kuukwata monzo mbuli mbwaayelele, noomuleke atwale tacili cibi, acite mbwaatelaika.
Pele kuti mulombwana watelaika mu monzo wakwe cakutashinicizhiwa, kwaamba ulakonzha kukwata monzo wakwe, ulimwi wazeeza mu monzo wakwe ati atamutwali nakalindu, wezo muntu ataati wacita kabotu.
Ubobo mulombwana uutwala nakalindu ngwaakasesa ulacita kabotu, pele wezo uutatwali ulabaala kucita kabotu.

Mukaintu ulyaanjilwe ku mulawo walutwalano, ku ciindi mulumi naacili mumi. Kuti mulumi wafwa, ulaanguluka u kuya kutwalwa kufwumbwa kuli wezo ngwaazanda, kufwumbwa kuti mulombwana uuzanda kumutwala kali mushomi.
Pele muzeezo wangu ngwakuti, wezo mukaintu ulabaala kubotelwa aakushite katanda. Ulimwi ndatelaika ati ame umbona ndikwete Moza wa Leza.
Inzho kwaamba makani a mubuzho ngumwakalemba a shilyo shipaizhiwa ku baleza bapange, tulizhi ati, “Toonse tulikwete luzhibo.” Pele inzho luzhibo lulapa bantu kulisumpula, pele lufwuno lulazaka.
Kuti na umwi ulatelaika ati ulikwete luzhibo lwacintu cimwi, tana kuzhiba mbwaayelele kuzhiba.
Pele kuti na umwi ulifwini Leza, wezo muntu ulazhibwa u Leza.
Inzho ku makani aakulya shilyo shipaizhiwa ku baleza bapange, tulizhi ati baleza bapange na shibumbwa bayina ncibazhiminina, ulimwi tulizhi ati kuli bulyo Leza womwi.
Nikuba ati nkubali babo batewa ati ba “leza” mwizeulu na anshi, pele nikuba ati nkubali ba “leza” banji banji, u “bami” mbanji banji,

uswe tulikwete bulyo Leza womwi, Tatesu wakalenga shoonse tulapona ukaambo kakwe, ulimwi kuli bulyo Mwami womwi, Jeso Kilisito. Leza wakalenga shintu shoonse kwiitila mwakwe, ulimwi tulapona kwiita mwake.

Nikuba bobo tabali bantu boonse bakwete luzhibo lolu pe. Pele bamwi bantu kabalizhibile kukomba baleza bapange, ubobo uceno ciindi kuti balya shilyo shipaizhiwa ku baleza bapange, nkaambo kakuti matelaishi abo akwaandaanya shibotu ushibiyabi mafwaafwi, balatelaika ati balasofwaazhiwa u shilyo.
Cakulya tacituswenya afwaafwi u Leza. Kwiina uncituzhimininwa na kuti twiina kulya shakulya shimwi, ulimwi na kuti twalya shakulya shimwi, kwiina ncituyana.
Inzho mulyeelele kucenjele kwaamba ati lwaanguluko lwenu citabi cilebyo ku bantu bayina insana mu lushomo.

Nkaambo kuti na umwi wakubona, uwe uukwete luzhibo, ulalya muŋanda ya baleza bapange, sa ceci tacikonzha kumusengula kwaamba aze alye shilyo shipaizhiwa ku baleza bapange nkaambo matelaishi akwe mafwaafwi takonzha kwaandaanya shibiyabi u shibontu?
Ubobo kwiita muluzhibo lwako wezo muntu wiina insana mu lushomo ulazonaunwa, ulimwi ulapa ati mushomi noko wezo Kilisito ngwaakafwila azhimine.
Munzhila yezhi mulabishizha Kilisito ciindi nimubishizha ba Kilisito nokwenu, u kucita shilonda kumizeezo yabo iitakonzha kwaandaanya shibiyabi u shibotu.
Ubobo kuti na cilyo calebya mushomi nokwesu, nshikalyi linji buzani, kwaamba ati intakalebya linji bashomima.
Sa nshili mwaangulushi? Sa nshili mutumwa? Sa ndiina kumubona Jeso Mwami wesu? Sa indimwe micelo ya mulimo wangu mu Mwami?
Nikuba ati bamwi tabatelaiki ati ndimutumwa, pele kuli umwe ndimutumwa walushinizho nkaambo umwe muli bakamboni ba butumwa bwangu mu lukamantano u Mwami.
Mbubolya mu mbaingula babo bankazha.
Sa tatweelele kutambula cakulya na cakunwa?
Sa tatweelele kutola benesu munyendo shesu? Umbona mbubacita batumwa bamwi, banina Mwami Jeso u Pita, na kubweza mwinangu mu Kilisitoma munyendo shesu?
Na ume u Banabasi ndiswe ice intweelele kusebeza kwaamba tuliyanine nshitubula umbumi?
Sa kuli shikalumamba ulihozha mwini mu mulimo wakwe? Sa nguni ulima muunda wa masaansa kwamana bobo tali micelo yawo? Sa kuli mweembezhi wabutanga utanwi mukupa?
Sa ndaamba mazwi aza munsana shabuntu? Sa mulawo Leza ngwaakapa Mozesi toamba bobo umbona awo?
Nkaambo kulilembelwe mu Mulawo wa Mozesi ati, “Utamwaanga kazongo ku mulomo musune uya bulyatauka maila ciindi ca kutebula.” Sa Leza ulabika maanu kumusune?

Sa Mozesi naamba bobo, taamba uswe? Cini cini ndiswe akalembela. Nkaambo kufwumbwa ulima mu lushomo, ushikukukulula, balyeelele kusebeza mulimo wabo kwaamba bakonzhe kuyana caabilo ku maila abo mukutebula.
Uswe twamushanjila shintu sha Moza. Sa inzho ncinzhi cini cikando cikonzha kutukasha kutambula nkumubele nshitubula mu bumi bwesu?
Naa bamwi balyeelele kutambula sheshi, no uswe cili buti, sa tatweelele kubabaala?
Pele twiina nitwakacita bobo. Pele twahuminya shintu shoonse kwaamba tutabiki cilebyo munzhila ya Makani Mabotu aaka Kilisito.
Sa tamweezhi akuti babo bacita mulimo wa Muŋanda ya Leza, balayana cakulya kuhwa Muŋanda ya Leza, ulimwi u babo bapa mulumbo acipaililo balaabana shilyo shesho shapewa acipaililo?
Umbona bobo, Mwami wakalailila ati abo bakambauka Makani Mabotu balyeelele kutambula nshibabula mu bumi kwiita mukukambauka.

Pele ume ndiina indakasebezha insana sheshi nshindakaakweelele kusebezha. Ulimwi ndiina kulemba luŋwalu lolu mu kuzanda kusebezha insana sheshi pe. Meni meni ngakuti, ndakonzha kufwa bulyo kubaala ati umwi ankashe ceco cimpa kulisumpula.
Kuti naa ndakambauka Makani Mabotu, nsheelele kulisumpula pe. Nkaambo Mwami wakandailila kucita bobo. Maawe! Malweza, kuti naa nshikambauki Makani Mabotu!
Indakalizandila ndimwini, indaakulanjila kutambula bulumbu. Pele nkaambo kakuti ndiina indakashoma, nkukuti ndasebeza bulyo nkaambo Mwami nguwakantuma.
No ninzho bulumbu bwangu nciinzhi? Mbubobu, mbwakuti nkakambauke Makani Mabotu ubutalipilwa mali ulimwi nsheelele kulanjila kutambula cintu mukukambauka Makani Mabotu nikuba ati ndyeelele kutambula.
Nikuba kuti ndi muntu mwaangulushi ku bantu boonse, ndalicita kuba muzhice wabo boonse, kwaamba ndete banji banji.

Ciindi nindaakuli u ba Juda, ndaakuba ukoya mu Juda, kwaamba mbasandule. Kuli babo beelele kucilila Mulawo Leza ngwaakapa Mozesi, nikuba ati nsheendelezhewa u Mulawo pe, kwaamba nkalete bacilila Mulawo.

Munzhila njiyona yezhi indakaakuli u bakunze ndakaakupona ukoya utezhi mulawo Leza ngwaakapa Mozesi kwaamba ati mbasandule. Ubobo tacaamba ati nshicilila mulawo wa Leza pe, pele cini cini ndacilila mulawo waka Kilisito.

Kuli babo batana kushima mu lushomo ndaba ukoya mbubabele, kwaamba ncikonzhe kubasandula. Ku bantu boonse ndakaba ukoya mbubabele kufwumbwa inzhila, kwaamba ncilozhe kuleta banji banji ukufwutula bamwi babo.
Shoonse sheshi ndashicita nkaambo ka Makani Mabotu, kwaamba ume mbweze lubahu mushilonjezho shamakani Mabotu.
Sa tamwizhi ati mukuzundana boonse balukanka pele womwi bulyo nguutambula bulumbu? Amwe umbona mulyeelele kulukanka ati muyane bulumbu.

Inzho baba bazanda kusobana balalikasha mu shintu shoonse, balacita bobo kwaamba batambule mushini wamatuhu utakala ciindi cilamfwu, pele uswe tulacita bobo kwaamba tukatambule mushini utamana nikuba buti.
Ubobo nshilukanka bulyo, nshilwi ukoya muntu uuma bulyo muuwo pe.
Pele ndapenzha mubili wangu ukuukoma, kwaamba ube muzhice kwangu, kutabi bulyo ati ndamana kukambaukila bamwi, ume lwangu ndimwini intakabi muntu uyelele kutola lubahu.
Ubobo, boonse bakapapatizwa mwikumbi u mulwaatele kutondezha kwaamba balacilila Mozesi.
Boonse bakalya cilyo comwi caku moza,
ulimwi boonse bakanwa cakunwa comwi bulyo. Ubobo bakaakunwa cakunwa kuhwa ku mwala waku moza wezo wakabashindicila. Mwala wezo ngu Kilisito.
Pele Leza wiina naakabotelwa micito yabunji bwabo, ubobo bakafwa, mitunta yabo keesabangene mulukula.
Ulimwi tutabi bantu bakomba baleza bapange umbona mbuli mbubakaakucita bamwi akati kabo. Tulabala mu Malembe ati, “Bantu bakakala anshi ati balye u kunwa, inzho bakazhimuka ukuzhana cakuliluba.”
Tutaciti bumambe ukoya mbubakacita bamwi, ulimwi bakafwa buzuba bomwi bali makumi obile a shuulu ushuulu shotatwe, ukaambo ka bumambe.
Tatweelele kusunka Kilisito ukoya mbubakacita bamwi, ubobo bakalumwa bazoka bakafwa.
Mutatongauki mbuli mbubakacita bamwi, ulimwi bakazonaunwa u anjelo wa lufwu.
Shoonse shintu sheshi shakacitika kuli babo kwaamba ati shibe shitondezho ku bantu. Ulimwi shakalembwa kwaamba ati shitucenjezhe uswe intupona ceno ciindi ciya ku mamanino anshi.
Ubobo wezo utelaika ati muzumu mu lushomo, naacenjele kwaamba atawi.

Masunko aamushicila taashiyene umasunko aashicila bantu boonse. Leza ulashomeka, takonzha kumuleka ati musunkwe kubaala insana shenu pe. Pele kuti naa mwasunkwa, walo ulamupa inzhila yamatiilo, kwaamba mukakonzhe kukakatila.
Ukaambo kako, nubafwunwa, amulisosolole ku baleza bapange.
Ndamushimwina ukoya bantu basongo, amulibeteke ku makani aza ngundamushimwina.
Ciindi nitunwa munkapu yakutembaula aciindi ca mulalilo wa Mwami sa tatwaabana bulowa bwaka Kilisito? U ciindi nitulya cinkwa ncitukomona, sa tatuswaangani umubili wa Kilisito?
Kuli cinkwa comwi nana, uswe nituhula buti, tuli mubili womwi, kaambo toonse tulalya cinkwa comwi.
Amuzeeze bucita ba Izilaili. Babo balya shipo shipewa kwa Leza. Sa tabaabana antoomwi mu mulimo wa Leza acipaililo?
Sa ndaamba ati shesho shilyo shipewa ku baleza bapange kuli mbushibele, na leza mupange kuli mbwaabele?
Imbo! Nciŋamba ncakuti shesho nshibapa batakombi shilapewa ku myoza mibiyabi kutali kwa Leza. Inzho nshizanda ati umwe muswaangane u myoza mibiyabi pe.
Tamukonzha kunwa mu nkapu ya Mwami ulimwi umu nkapu ya myoza mibiyabi. Ulimwi tamukonzha kulya e tebulu lya Mwami ulimwi e tebulu lya myoza mibiyabi.
Sa mulazanda kwaamba Mwami alwe bufwi? Sa mulatelaika ati mulamubaala insana Mwami?
Mutabi nimukapula bubotu bwenu nubeni, pele mukapule bubotu bwa beenzhinokwenu.
Namulye kufwumbwa cuuzhiwa acisambalilo cabuzani, mutaakubuzha buzha ukaambo ka mizeezo yenu.
Nkaambo kulilembelwe ati, “Inshi nja Mwami u shintu shoonse shiyanwa anshi ano.”
Kuti na umwi wa bantu batashomi wamoompolola kukulya, mwamana mwaya aze, amulye bulyo kufwumbwa ceco ncimwasombwa cakutabuzha kwaamba mutapengi mu mizeezo yenu.
Pele kuti na umwi muntu wamwaambila ati, “Ceci cakulya capaizhiwa ku baleza bapange,” mutalyi pe, ukaambo ka wezo wamushimwina ulimwi ukaambo ka mizeezo yenu.
Awa ndaamba mizeezo ya muntu umwi wezo, itali yenu umwe pe. Umwi ulakonzha kubuzha ati, No ninzho, sa nkukwaamba ati nduleke lwaanguluko lwangu kaambo kamuzeezo wa muntu umwi?
Kuti na ndalya u kulumba Leza ku shakulya shangu, no nkaamboonzhi muntu umwi ncayelele kuntongaucila kushilyo shesho nshindakombela?
Ubobo, nikuba ati mulalya u kunwa, na kufwumbwa ceco ncimucita, amushicite shoonse kwaamba Leza alemekwe.
Bumi bwenu citabi cilebyo kuba Juda, nibaba ba Giliki, nikuba ku mbungano ya Leza.
Umbona mbunsoleka kubotezha bantu boonse mu shintu shoonse nshincita, cakutalibotezha ndimwini pe. Ndazanda kwaamba ati bantu banji banji bafwutulwe.
Ndamutembaula nkaambo lyoonse mulacilila tunshiya nshiya ntundakamushiila, ukukwatisha injiisho shoonse nshindakamuyiisha.
Pele ndazanda ati muteeleleshe kwaamba mutwi wa mulombwana woonse ngu Kilisito, ulimwi mulombwana ngu mutwi wa mukaintu, nkaambo Leza ngu mutwi wa Kilisito.
Ubobo, kufwumbwa mulombwana ukomba, nikuba kushinshima, ataakulihumbile ku mutwi, ulasampula mutwi wakwe.
Pele kufwumbwa mukaintu ukomba ukushinshima ubwiina ncaalihumbile ku mutwi, ulasampula mutwi wakwe, nkaambo ncintu comwi bulyo ukoya mukaintu musakule munkulu.
Kuti naa mukaintu talihumbile ku mutwi, asakulwe bulyo munkulu. Inzho mbuciletela insoni mukaintu kusakulwa munkulu, nikukaba kumemaunwa bulyo, ulyeelele kulihumba ku mutwi.
Mulombwana teelele kulihumba ku mutwi nkaambo ncikozhano ulimwi mbulemu bwa Leza. Pele mukaintu mbulemu bwa mulombwana.
Nkaambo mulombwana wiina naakalengwa kuhwa ku mukaintu, pele mukaintu wakahwa ku mulombwana.
Ulimwi mulombwana wiina naakalengelwa mukaintu, Pele mukaintu wakalengelwa mulombwana.
