Ubobo, munzhila yezhi, ukaambo ka baanjelo, mukaintu ulyeelele kukwata citondezho ca nsana ku mutwi wakwe.
Nikuba bobo, mu bumi bwesu bwamu Mwami, takukonzha kuba mukaintu kwiina mulombwana. Ulimwi takukonzha kuba mulombwana kwiina mukaintu.
Nkaambo umbona mbuli mukaintu mbwaakahwa ku mulombwana, aze mulombwana ulazhalwa ku mukaintu. Ceci cakaba nkaambo Leza mbwaakazanda.
Inzho amulibeteke nubeni makani aza, sa cililuleme kwaamba mukaintu akombe Leza ubwiina ncaalihumbile ku mutwi?
Inta bube bwa buntu bwesu bulatondezha ati mulombwana akukwete masusu malamfwu, cilakonzha kuleta insoni.
Pele kuti mukaintu kakwete masusu malamfwu mbulemu bwakwe. Nkaambo Leza wakamupa masusu malamfwu kwaamba ati cibe cakulihumba ku mutwi.
Kuti naa kuli muntu uzanda kukazha makani aza, ume ncinkonzha kwaamba ncakuti, uswe twiina ciyanza cili bobo, nishikaba imbungano sha Leza.
Pele kuli amwi malailile nguntakonzha kumweesheensha, kaambo ciindi nimubungana ku shikombelo tamuciti shibotu, pele mulacita shibiyabi.
Nkaambo ucakutaanguna, ndakateelela ati ciindi nimubungana kulya mulalilo wa Mwami, kuli kwaandaana akati kenu. Ame ndahumina ati makani aza alishinizhe.
Cini cini kulyeelele ati kube kwaandaana akati kenu kwaamba ati bantu beni beni balibonye.
Inzho nimubungana tooli mulalilo wa Mwami ngumulya.
Nkaambo ciindi nimukanka kulya, uumwi umwi ulalya cakulya cakwe mwini, kwamana umwi ulafwa inzala, umwi ulakolwa.

No ncinzhi? Sa mwiina maanda aakulila u kunwina? Na nkukuti mulazanda kusampula imbungano ya Leza kwaamba babo bayina ncibakwete mubaushe insoni? No ninzho mushimwine acani? Imbo pe, nshikonzha kumweensheensha.
Nkaambo ume ndakatambula kuhwa ku Mwami makani azo ngundakamushiila, aakuti Mwami Jeso mashiku azo ngoona naakaabwa wakabweza cinkwa,
ngoonaawo, naakamana kulumba Leza, wakacikomona waamba ati,, “Wezu ngu mubili wangu ngumwakomonenwa. Amucite bobo kwaamba cibe cizhibalusho cangu.”
Munzhila njiyona yomwi, wakabweza inkapu, waamba ati, “Yezhi inkapu ncicihuminano cipiya uca bulowa bwangu. Kamucite bobo, kufwumbwa ciindi ncimunwa, kwaamba ati cibe cizhibalusho cangu.”
Nkaambo kufwumbwa ciindi ncimulya cinkwa ceci u kunwina mu nkapu yezhi, mulaambilizha lufwu lwa Mwami kushicila akazhoke.
Nku kaambo kako kufwumbwa ulya cinkwa ceci u kunwina mu nkapu yezhi cakutalemeka Mwami, ulikwete cibi ku mubili u bulowa bwa Mwami.
Muntu woonse ulyeelele kulilingula lwakwe mwini, amana naayelele kulya u kunwa mu nkapu yezho.
Kufwumbwa wezo ulya u kunwa cakubula luzhibo lwa mubili wa Mwami, u kunwa mu nkapu yezho, ulalibeteka mwini.
Nciceco akati kenu nu banji banji, ncimusatila u kukonauka mushizo ulimwi bamwi ncibafwila.
Pele kuti intwaakulibeteka tubeni, kabotu kabotu, intwataakunjila mulubeta pe.
Pele ku ciindi Mwami naatubeteka, ulatubula kwaamba ati tutakazulwa antoomwi u bantu ba anshi.
Ubobo nubakwesu kufwumbwa ciindi ncimubungana antoomwi kulya mulalilo, kamulindizhanya.
Kuti na umwi ulifwile inzala, ulyeelele kulilalimwi kuŋanda yakwe, kwaamba ati mutalileteli cisubulo ukaambo kakubungana kwenu kutaluleme. Inzho makani amwi, ndeza kumulailila ndakashika koko.
Inzho nubakwesu, nshizanda kwaamba ati mubule luzhibo ku makani a shipo sha Moza Usalala.
Mulizhi ati ciindi nimwakaakuli bakunze mwakaakusololelwa u baleza bapange bataamba, ulimwi bakamusowa munzhila shinji shinji.

Ubobo ndazanda muzhibe ati kwiina muntu naaba womwi uusololelwa u Moza wa Leza uukonzha kwaamba ati, “Jeso ashinganyiwe,” ulimwi kwiina ukonzha kwaamba ati, “Jeso Mwami,” cita wezo wasololelwa u Moza Usalala.
Kuli inzhila shishiyene shiyene, shakusebeza, pele Mwami ngutusebezela uli womwi bulyo.
Ulimwi kuli milimo yaandeene andeene, pele Leza usebeza uli womwi kwiita mubantu boonse.
Moza Usalala ulatondezhewa munzhila shandeene ku muntu umwi uumwi kuleta bubotu ku bantu boonse.
Ku muntu umwi Moza Usalala ulapa kukanana ca busongo, aze umwi, Moza nguwena ulapa luzhibo.
Kuli umwi nguwena Moza ulapa cipo ca lushomo. Ulimwi kuli umwi, Moza nguwena bulyo ulapa cipo cakuponya.

Kuli umwi ulapa cipo cakucita maleele, umwi cipo cabushinshimi, umwi cipo cakwandaanya shihwa ku Moza Usalala ushitahwi ku Moza Usalala. Umwi cipo cakukanana milaka iyandeene andeene, umwi cipo cakupandulula milaka.
Pele nguwena wezo Moza Usalala womwi nguucita shoonse sheshi. Ulapa muntu umwi uumwi mbuli mbuuzanda.
Toonse twakapapatizwa mu Moza Usalala womwi, nibaba ba Juda, nibaba ba Giliki, nibaba bazhice, nibaba baangulule, nkaambo toonse twakanwa mu Moza womwi.
Mubili tooli cizo comwi pe, pele nshizo shinji shinji.
Kuti naa itende lyaamba ati, “Muntali itashi, nshili cipanzha ca mubili,” Sa ceco cilapa kwaamba ati litabi cipanzha ca mubili?
Kuti naa ako kutwi kwaamba ati, “Muntali linso, nshili cipanzha ca mubili, sa ceco cilapa kwaamba ati, kutwi koko takuli cizo ca mubili?”
Kuti naa mubili woonse niwaakuli linso, no nitwaakuteelela buti? Kuti naa woonse niwaakuli kutwi, no nitwaakununkuzha buti bwema?
Pele umbona mbuli mbukubele, Leza wakabamba shizo sha andeene mu mubili, cimwi ucimwi wakacibamba mbuli mbwaakazanda.
Inzho nikwaakuli ati shizo shoonse, ncizo comwi, no mubili niwaakuli buti?
Mbuli mbucibele, kuli shizo shinji shinji, pele mubili uli womwi.
Inzho linso talikozha kwaambila itashi ati, “Ndiina aze mulimo!” Awo mutwi tookonzha kwaambila shituta ati, “Ndiina aze mulimo!”
Pele shizo sha mubili shesho shikoya shina insana u mulimo, asho shilazandwa cini cini.
Asho shizo shesho nshitutelaika ati tashilemekwa tulashilemeka cini cini. Asho shizo shesu shuusha insoni, tulashikwabilila cini cini.
Nikuba bobo shizo sheebeshi tatushikwabilili. Pele Leza nguwakalunganya mubili caakuti, wakapa bulemu bukando kwiitila ku shizo shiina bulemu.
Wakacita bobo ati kutabi kwaandaana mu mubili, pele bulyo ati shizo shoonse shikwatane kabotu.
Kuti naa cizo comwi calicisa, shizo shoonse shilateelela kucisa. Ulimwi cizo comwi calemekwa shizo shoonse shilatangalila antoomwi.
Inzho umwe noonse muli mubili waka Kilisito. Umwi uumwi akati kenu ncizo ca mubili.

Leza mu mbungano yakwe wakabika bantu baba, batanzhi mbatumwa, babili mba shinshimi, batatu mba maayi, ulimwi bamwi mbuba shimaleele, bamwi balaponya, bamwi mbasolozhi, bamwi balaamba milaka yaandeene.
Sa boonse mbatumwa? Sa boonse mbashinshimi? Sa boonse mbuba maayi? Sa boonse balacita maleele? Sa boonse balaponya?
Sa boonse balipelwe shipo shakuponya? Sa boonse mbubashikuyohwa bamwi? Sa boonse balaamba milaka inji? Sa boonse balakonzha kupandulula milaka?
Pe pe, pele amubike myonzo yenu ku shipo shikando.
Inzho ndamutondezha inzhila imbotusha kubaala shoonse.
Nikuba kuti ndaamba milaka ya bantu, niiba yaba anjelo, pele na ndiina lufwuno, ati ndaakuli ukoya ingoma na mulangu uulila bulyo.

Ulimwi naa ndikwete cipo cabushinshimi, u kuzhiba makani oonse maseseke, ukukwata luzhibo loonse, ulimwi kuti na ndikwete lushomo lunji lunji lukonzha kukusha mapili, pele ndaakwiina lufwuno, kwiina mumbele pe.
Nikuba ati ndaabanya lubono lwangu loonse, naakupa mubili wangu kwaamba ati utentwe, pele ndaakwiina lufwuno, ati ndiina impindu.
Lufwuno lulakalika monzo, lufwuno lulikwete inkumbu. Lufwuno lwiina munyono ulimwi talulisumpula.
Lwiina cisapi na kunyenauna. Lufwuno lwiina bushikalifwune, talulicitili munzhila yandulo lwini, talulemani lemani nikuba kubikilila.
Talubotelwa bantu bacita shitaluleme, pele lulabotelwa kuli bacita shiluleme.
Lufwuno lulalekelela shintu shoonse, taluleka kushoma u kulanjila, ulimwi ndulunga shicamba mu shintu shoonse.
Lufwuno talumana, pele bushinshimi bulakamana, ako kwaamba mishobo inji kulakamana, alo luzhibo lulakamana.
Nkaambo alo luzhibo lwesu taluzulile, abo bushinshimi bwesu tabuzulile.
Pele ceco cizulile cakashika, ceco citaluleme cilakamana.
Indakaakuli mwana, ndakaakwaamba ukoya mwana, ukutelaika ukoya mwana, ulimwi ukuteleela ukoya mwana. Pele ciindi indakakomena, ndakashileka inzhila shabwana.

Nshitubona ninzho shili ukoya shintu shamu cimbonimboni citaboni kabotu. Pele ku ciindi cizhiza tulakabonana menso u menso. Luzhibo ndunkwete mazuba ano ndushoonto, ku ciindi ceco ndakazhibisha umbona ukoya Leza mbweenzhi kabotu kabotu.
Inzho kuli shintu shotatwe, lushomo, lulanjilo u lufwuno, pele cibaala ali shoonse, ndufwuno.
Amukapule lufwuno, ulimwi mubike monzo woonse ku shipo shipewa u Moza Usalala, kwaambisha cipo cakukambauka makani a Leza.
Nkaambo muntu waamba mulaka utateelelwa, taambila bantu pe. Ulaamba u Leza, nkaambo kwiina muntu naaba womwi ushizhiba nshaamba. Moza Usalala nguumwaambya makani maseseke a Leza.
Pele babo bashinshima balaambila bantu makani a kubazaka u kubazumya zumya, ulimwi u kubaumbulizha.
Wezo ukanana mulaka utazhibilwe ulalizaka lwakwe mwini, pele wezo ushinshima Makani a Leza ulazaka imbungano yoonse.

Inzho ndazanda kwaamba ati noonse mwaambe mu milaka, pele cintu ncinzanda kubaala, ncakwaamba ati Makani a Leza ateelelwe. Wezo ushinshima mukando kubaala wezo ukanana milaka inji ukwiina upandulula, kwaamba ati imbungano izakwe.
Inzho nubakwesu, cilakamuyohwaanzhi kuti ndeza kumwaambila mu milaka njimutezhi? Kwiina ncimukakayana cita kuti, ndamuletela cizubuluzho camakani a Leza, muluzhibo, na mubushinshimi, na kuyiisha.
Nishiba shintu shiina bumi shilila shili ukoya mutolilo, kalumbu na kankobele. Kuti na bashilizha bayina kweendelana mazwi, uuteelela takonzha kuluzhiba lwiimbo lwiimbwa.
Ulimwi kuti naa impeta keetalila kabotu, no nguni ukonzha kulibambila inkondo?
Amwe umbona mbukubele, kuti naa kamwaamba mazwi mu milaka itateelelwa, no kulazhibwa buti makani aambwa? Nkaambo mulaakwaambila bulyo muuwo.
Cini cini nkwiili mishobo yaandeene andeene ano anshi, pele kwiina mushobo wiina ncuuamba pe.
Na nshiteeleli mushobo waambwa, ndaba mweenzu kuli wezo waamba, aze ulaba mweenzu kwangu.
Inzho mbumuzandisha u myonzo yoonse shipo nshuupa Moza Usalala, amusoleke kushikapula, kwaambisha shipo shizaka imbungano.
Wezo ukanana mulaka unji ulyeelele kukomba ati apewe cipo cakupandulula.
Kuti na ndakomba mumulaka unji, moza wangu ulakomba, pele muzeezo wangu wiina impindu.
No ndyeelele kucita buti? Ndyeelele kukomba u moza wangu ulimwi u matelaishi, ukwimba u moza wangu, umaanu angu.
Kuti waamba mazwi aakulonjezha mu moza, no kuti kakuli muntu mweenzu ngumuli aze, utateeleli sha Moza, no ulahumina buti, “Ati Ameni” ku mazwi nguulumbya Leza? Kayi nkaambo tacizhi ncuwamba!
Nuukamulumba Leza kabotu kabotu, pele bantu mu mbungano tabazakwa.
Ndalumba Leza nkaambo ndakomba milaka inji kubaala umwe noonse,
pele mu mbungano ndabotelwa kwaamba mazwi naaba osanwe bulyo alakonzha kuteelelwa kabotu, kwaamba nkayiishe bamwi, kubaala kwaamba ikumi lya shuulu sha mazwi mu milaka inji.
Nubakwesu, mutabi ukoya bana mu matelaishi pe. Mukubisha amube ukoya bana batacizhi cibi, pele mukutelaika amube bakando.
Mu mulawo cililembelwe ati,
“Ndakaamba ku bantu baba kwiita mu milaka itazhiibilwe,
u mumilomo ya bahwa mashi,
nikuba bobo tabakanteeleli pe,” mbwaamba Mwami.
Milaka nkukuti tacili citondezho ku bantu ba shoma, pele kuli batashomi, abo bushinshimi tabuli bwa babo batashomi, mbwabashomi.
Kuti imbungano yabungana antoomwi, kwamana noonse mwakanka kwaamba mu milaka, kwamana kwenjila beenzu na bantu batashomi, sa tabakonzha kwaamba ati mwasondoka?
Pele kuti na noonse mulashinshima, ngoonaawo kwanjila umwi utashomi na mweenzu, muntu wezo balamuzula boonse, nkaambo mazwi abo boonse alamunjila.
Makani maseseke mu monzo wakwe alazubuluka, ubobo ulakotama u kukomba Leza, ulimwi ulaamba ati Leza ngaali akati kenu.

No tulacita buti, nubakwesu? Ciindi ncimubungana antoomwi, umwi ulikwete lwiimbo, umwi ciiyo cakuyiisha, umwi cintu Leza ncaamuzubululila, umwi ulazanda kwaamba mulaka unji, umwi ulapandulula. Shoonse sheshi shilyeelele kucitwa muciyanza cizaka imbungano.
Na kuli bazanda kwaamba milaka inji babe bobile naa botatwe bulyo, bataitilili awo pe, ulimwi kulyeelele kwaamba muntu womwi aciindi. Kwamana kube umwi upandulula mazwi azo.
Pele kuti naa kwiina upandulula, baliinze bulyo mu mbungano, inzho muntu wezo akati kenu alyaambile mwini u kwaambila Leza mu monzo buliinzile.
Kwaamba shababo bashinshima, abo mbubona akube bashinshimi bobile naa botatwe bulyo, kwaamba bamwi baalingule makani aambwa na meni meni.
Pele naa umwi ushite mu mbungano, wazubululilwa mazwi ahwa kwa Leza, wezo ushinshima aliinze.
Nkaambo noonse mulakonzha kushinshima, kufwumbwa bulyo mwapana ciindi kucita ati boonse baiye ulimwi boonse cibazumye zumye.
Ulimwi bashinshimi mbubeendelezha myoza yabu shinshimi.
Nkaambo Leza tali walupyopyongano, ngwaluumuno. Asho imbungano sha banamusalazhi mbushibele.
Bakaintu balyeelele kuliinza mu mbungano. Nkaambo balo tabahuminyiwa kukanana mubungano, pele abalibombye umbona mbuli mulawo mbuuamba.
Na kuli cintu ncibazanda kubuzha, babuzhe balumyaabo kumaanda. Nkaambo cilausha insoni bakaintu kukanana mu mbungano.
Sa mazwi a Leza akahwa nkumubele, na ndimwe ice numwakashikilwa izwi?
Kuti naa umwi ulyaamba ati ndi mushinshimi, na ati ulikwete cipo ca Moza Usalala, ulyeelele kuzhiba ati shintu sheshi, nshindamulembela malailile aahwa ku Mwami.
Pele na kuli muntu ushikaka sheshi, aze Leza ulakamukaka.
Ubobo nubakwesu, amubike myonzo yenu ku kushinshima, pele kwaamba milaka inji mutaakukasha pe.
Pele shintu shoonse shilyeelele kucitwa kabotu kabotu ulimwi bweelele.
Inzho nubakwesu, ndazanda kumuzhibalula Makani Mabotu ngundakamukambaucila. Azo ngumwakatambula nguluzhimine lushomo lwenu.
Mwaakwatisha mulumbe wa Makani Mabotu alamufwutula, cita akuli mwakashoma ca bulyo.
Nkaambo kutaanguna ndakamupa ceco ncindakatambula, ucakuti Kilisito wakafwa ukaambo ka shibi shesu, umbona mbuli Malembe mbwaamba.
Wakazhikwa, wakabushiwa mu buzuba bwatatu umbona mbuli Malembe mbwaamba.
Amane wakalibonya kwa Pita, ukuli bali ikumi ubobile.
Ulimwi wakalibonya ku bantu bakaakubaala ku myaanda yosanwe aciindi comwi, banji banji bacipona uceno ciindi, nikuba ati bamwi bakafwa.
Ulimwi wakalibonya kwa Jemusi, amane ku batumwa boonse.
Ku mamanino wakalibonya kwangu ndimwini ume, iindi ukoya mwana watakazhalwa mbubazhalwa boonse.
Nkaambo ume ndimushoontosha ku batumwa boonse, nsheelele kutewa ati ndimutumwa pe, nkaambo ndakaakupenzha imbungano ya Leza.
Pele ndili bolya mumbele bwasunu ukaambo ka luse lwa Leza, ulimwi luse lwakwe kwangu lwiina ukaba lwabulyo pe. Ndakasebeza milimo kubaala boonse batumwa kwiita mu luse lwa Leza luli kwangu.
Nikuba kukambauka kwangu na kwabo, kwiina makani. Toonse tulakambauka Makani Mabotu azo ngumwakashoma umwe.
Inzho ncitukambauka ncakuti Kilisito wakabushiwa ku bafwu, no nkaamboonzhi nubamwi ncimwaambila ati, “Bafwu tabakabuci ulimwi?”
Kuti na bafwu tababuci, nkukuti aze Kilisito wiina naakabushiwa pe.
Kuti na Kilisito wiina naakabuka, nkukuti kukambauka kwesu nkwabulyo, amwe kushoma kwenu nkwabulyo.
Caakuli ati bafwu tababushiwa, nkukuti tulapa bumboni bwakubeya, nitwaamba ati Leza wakamubusha Kilisito ku bafwu. Na cilishinizhe kwaamba bafwu tabakabuci, nkukuti Leza wiina naakamubusha Kilisito.
Kuti na cilishinizhe kwaamba bafwu tababushiwa, ati u Kilisito wiina naakabushiwa pe.
Kuti naa Kilisito wiina naakabushiwa, lushomo lwenu ndwabulyo. Nkukuti mucili mu shibi shenu.
Ubobo, babo bakafwila mwa Kilisito, nkukuti bakafwililila.
Na bulanjizhi bwesu mwa Kilisito kabuli bulyo bwa bumi bono, tulyeelele kufwilwa inkumbu kubaala bantu boonse.
Pele meni meni ngakuti Kilisito wakabushiwa ku bafwu. Nkukuti alishinizhe akuti bafwu balakabuka.
Umbona mbuli lufwu mbulwakeza u muntu, abo bubuke bwa bafwu bwakeza u muntu.
Nkaambo umbona bantu boonse mbubafwa ukaambo kakuti mbana baka Adamu, umbona bobo boonse mbubakaabuka mwa Kilisito.
Pele muntu umwi uumwi ulakabushiwa ku ciindi cakwe ceelele, Kilisito ngumucelo mutaanzhi, inzho aciindi cakwiza kwakwe, mbubabo bamushoma.
Inzho mamanino alakashika, Kilisito ulakapa bwami kwa Leza ushi, akamana kuzonauna beendelezhi boonse u bulelo, iinsana shoonse.
Kilisito ulyeelele kweendelezha mpaka akazunde ba shinkondonina u kubabika kunshi ku matende akwe.
Shinkondonina ukaashaalila kuzonaunwa ndufwu.

Nkaambo Malembe alaamba ati, “Shintu shoonse wakashibika kunshi kumatende akwe.” Mazwi amba ati shintu shoonse shakabikwa kunshi kumatende akwe, taamukwatilizha Leza mwini lwakwe, nkaambo nguwakashibika shintu shoonse munshi lyaka Kilisito.
Inzho shintu shoonse shakamana kubikwa kunshi kumatende akwe, Kilisito ulakaba munshi lya Leza, wezo wakabika shintu shoonse ku matende aka Kilisito. Nkukuti Leza nguukaayendelezha shintu shoonse.
Na tacili bobo, no balacita buti babo bantu bapapatizwa mu busena bwa bafwu? Kuti na bafwu tabakabushiwa, no nkaamboonzhi bantu balapapatizwa umbusena bwa bafwu?
No caakuli bobo, nkaamboonzhi ncitulibika mu mapenzhi ciindi coonse?
Akaka nubakwesu, ndalanjila lufwu mazuba oonse! Ndalumbila nkaambo ndyeelele kulisumpula ukaambo kenu, ndalisumpula mwa Kilisito Jeso Mwami wesu.
Anu indakayana impinduunzhi kulwa u munyama wabutambo waku Efeso, nkaambo ka mizeezo ya buntu? Naa bafwu tababushiwa, anu atucite mbuli mbubaamba ati, “Katulya u kunwa, kayi zona tulafwa.”
Mutacengwa pe, “shimweenda umineme, aze ulaminama.”
Amushiticile cabululami, mutabisha linji. Bamwi benu tabamwizhi Leza. Ndaamba bobo kwaamba muushe insoni.
Umwi muntu ulakonzha kubuzha ati, “Anu bafwu balaabushiwa buti? Sa balakaba u mibili ili buti?”
Uwe, umulimbushi! Sa twizhi ati ncushanga tacimena u kupona cita cataanguna kufwa
Ulimwi ceco ncushanga tacikozhani uceco cikaamena pe, ulashanga insece ya maila niiba insece inji bulyo.
Pele Leza ulaibamba mbuli mbwiibele. Nguupa insece imwi imwi mubili.
Inzho takuli ati mibili yoonse ilakozhana. Kuli buzani bwa bantu, kuli buzani bwa banyama, ubuzani bwa bazuni, ulimwi kuli munyomfwu wa nswi.
Kuli shilenge sha kwizeulu u sha anshi. Bulemu bwa sha kwizeulu mbunji, abo bulemu bwa sha anshi buli bunji.
Kuli bulemu bwe zuba u bulemu bwa mwezhi u bulemu bwa ntongwezhi ulimwi intongwezhi imwi imwi ilyaandeene kuhwa kubulemu bwa imwi.
Abo bubuke bwa bafwu mbububele umbona bobo. Nituzhika, cili ukoya tulashanga. Cazhikwa cilabola, pele cakabushiwa tacikabola linji pe.
Cishangwa ciina bulemu, pele cilakabushiwa mu bulemu ulimwi cishangwa ncilengushi cilakabushiwa cilikwete insana.
Cizhikwa mubili wa buzani, cibuka mubili wa moza. Kuti na kuli mubili wa buntu, nkukuti u mubili wa moza nkuuli.
Umbona mbukulembelwe ati, “Adamu mutaanzhi wakaba mumi,” pele Adamu mushaalizhi wakaba moza upa bumi.
Tacaamba ati mubili wakutaanguna ngwa moza pe, ngwa buntu, amana wamunshi ngwa moza.
Muntu mutaanzhi Adamu wakahwa anshi, ngwa bulongo, muntu wabili Kilisito wakahwa kwizeulu.
Umbona mbucitewa ati kwakaakuli muntu wabulongo, abo bantu mbubabele. Ulimwi umbona mbwaabele muntu uhwa kwizeulu, u bantu ba kwizeulu mbubabele.
Umbona mbutukozhene u muntu wabulongo, atukozhane ukoya muntu wa kwizeulu.
Ndamwaambila nubakwesu, muntu waku mubili u bulowa takonzha kunjila mu bwami bwa Leza, niciba cifwa tacikonzha kunjila kuli shitafwi.
mukaindi kashoonto bulyo mukulaba kwa linso, kumpeta yamamanino, nkaambo impeta ilakalila ulimwi bafwu balakabushiwa umibili itafwi, amana aswe tulakasandulwa.
Nkaambo mubili wezu ubola, ulyeelele kusanduka kuba mubili utabola, ulimwi mubili wezu ufwa ulyeelele kusanduka kuba mubili utafwi.
Ciindi mubili ubola wakasanduka kuba utabola, uufwa wakasanduka kuba utafwi, indilyo nishikaaba shakalembwa mu Malembe ati,
“Lufwu lwazonaunwa, kuzunda kwashika.”
Uwe lufwu, ndulikwi lubola lwako?”
Lubola lwa lufwu ncibi, aco cibi cilayana insana ku Mulawo.
Pele naalumbwe Leza utupa kuzunda kwiita mu Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito.
Nciceco, nubakwesu bafwunwa, amuzume mutazungaana pe, amubike myonzo yenu lyoonse ku mulimo wa Mwami nkaambo mulizhi ati milimo yenu mu Mwami teeli ya bulyo pe.
Mu buzuba butaanzhi bwa nsunda lyoonse umwi umwi ulyeelele kuzobola cintu kufwumbwa ncaakwete, kwaamba ati twakashika tutakasowa ciindi kubunganya milumbo.
Kwaamba mbuunkaashikila bulyo, ndakatuma babo mbumukaasala, ndakabapa u maŋwalu aakubapandulula kwaamba bakatole milumbo yenu ku Jelusalemu.
Kuti naa cilyeelele kwaamba ati ame nkaye, ati ndakaya abo.
Ambweni ndakeza kukala amwe mpaka mweto ukamane, kwaamba mukacikonzhe kunjohwa mulweendo lwangu loonse kufwumbwa nkunkaaya.
Nkaambo nshizanda kumubona calubilo lubilo pe, pele ndazanda kwaamba ati nkakale amwe kwa mazuba manji manji, kuti naa Mwami wahuminya.
Pele mu Efeso ndakakala kushicila mazuba e Pobwe lya Pentekositi.
Kono Leza wanjalulila mulyango kwaamba ati ncite mulimo mukando, nikuba ati kuli bashikukazha banji banji.
Ubobo kutabi muntu umunyansha pe. Mumushindicile muluumuno, kwaamba akashike nkumbele, nkaambo ndamulanjila antoomwi u bakwesu.
Inzho, aze mukwesu Apolosi, ndakamukumbila kwaamba ati ashike koko a muswaye antoomwi u bashomi bamwi, pele walo katazanda kwaamba ati azhize ninzho. Ulakeza akayana ciindi.
Amucenjele, amuzume, mutabi bakandu mu lushomo lwenu!
Shoonse nshimucita ashicitwe mu lufwuno.
Ndamukumbila kwaamba ati mulibozhe ku bantu bali bobo basebeza ca nsana u babo mbubasebeza abo.
Ndabotelwa kuti ba Sitivini u Fotunatosi u Akekisi, bashika kono nikuba ati umwe tamwiko, bali ukoya banjila mu busena bwenu.
Bakanzumya zumya ku moza mbubona mbuba muzumya zumya amwe. Amubalemeke bantu bali bobo.
Bashomi abo bamwaanzha. Amwaanzhanye mu lufwuno lwini lwini lwa buna Kilisito cakusunsana mu matashi.
Ume, ndi Paulu, ndalemba kwaanzha koku itashi lyangu.
Kuti na kuli muntu utazanda Mwami Jeso Kilisito, ashinganyiwe. Ameni!
Luse lwa Mwami Jeso lube amwe.
Lufwuno lwangu alube amwe noonse mu Mwami Jeso Kilisito. Ameni.
Ndamwaanzha nu bambungano ya Leza ili ku Kolinto u bana musalazhi boonse bali mu cishi ca Akaya coonse.
Luse u luumuno lwa Leza Tatesu u lwa Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito lube amwe.
Inzho atumulumbe Leza Ushi, Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito, Tatesu shiluse, ulimwi Leza uutubumbulizha munzhila shoonse.
Ulatubumbulizha mu mapenzhi esu oonse, kwaamba aswe tukalozhe kubumbulizha babo bali mu mapenzhi, umbona mbuli Leza aswe mbwatuzumya zumya.
Nkaambo umbona mbututeelela shicisa shinji shinji antoomwi u Kilisito, umbona bobo Kilisito kwiita mwakwe, ulatuzumya zumya.

Kuti twapenga, ndimwe tupengela kwaamba mubumbulizhiwe ukufwutulwa. Kuti twabumbulizhiwa, amwe mulabumbulizhiwa. Inzho amulindile ca bushicamba kwaamba ati muyane insana shakwiita mu mapenzhi oonse aswe ngutuyana.
Bulanjizhi bwesu kuli umwe tabuzungaana pe, nkaambo tulizhi umbona mbumwaabana mapenzhi aswe, umbona bobo amwe balakakaabana kubumbulizhiwa kwesu.
Mubwini, twakaakutelaika ati twatambula cisubulo ca lufwu, kwaamba tutalishomi lwesu tubeni, pele tushome bulyo Leza uubusha bafwu.
Wezo wakatuhuna kumapenzhi a lufwu, ulimwi ulakatuhuna. Kuti twakabika bulanjizhi bwesu boonse mwakwe tulizhi ati ulakatuhuna ulimwi.
Amwe amutusangane, mutuyohwe kukomba kwaamba banji banji bakatuzhiminine mukulumba Leza ku shilonjezho nshitwakapewa kwiita mushikombyo shinji shinji.

Ncitweelele kulyeensheensha nciceci, ncakuti mizeezo yesu ilatupa kuhumina kwiina kuzuluzha nkaambo bumi bwesu ano anshi mbutupona mbumi bululeme akati kenu, nkaambo Leza wakatupa bumi busalala. Bumi bobo tabuli bwa busongo bwa anshi ano, pele mbwa luse lwa Leza nkumubele.
Twamulembela bulyo nshimukonzha kubala u kuteelela. Tulashoma ati ku mamanino mulakashiteelelesha.
Umbona mbumuteelela ashoonto ninzho, ndashoma ati mu buzuba bwa Mwami Jeso, tulakalyeensheensha ukaambo kenu, amwe mulakalyeensheensha ukaambo kesu.
Nkaambo kakuti ndakashoma, ndakaakuzanda ati ntaangune kwiza koko nkumubele kwaamba mukalonjezhewe kobile.
Ndakaakuzanda kumuswaya indakaakuya ku Masedoniya. Ulimwi ndakaita ndapiluka kwaamba munjohwe mulweendo lwangu lwa kuya ku Judiya.
Sa indakakwata muzeezo wakumuswaya mulatelaika ati ndakacita shiina mukumo? Sa makanze angu kaali akulizanda, ukoya muntu waku mubili, uyingula ati “Ee” na “Pe pe” aciindi comwi?
Mbuli Leza mbwaashomeka, mazwi esu kwenu kaatali, “Ee” na “Pe pe,” aciindi comwi.
Nkaambo Jeso Kilisito, Mwanaa Leza upona wakakambaukwa akati kenu u mukwesu Sailasi u Timoti, antoomwi ame, katali “Ee” na “Pe pe” umwakwe muli bulyo izwi lyaamba ati, “Ee.”
Nkaambo Kilisito ngu, “Ee” ku shishomezho sha Leza shoonse. Nciceco umwa Kilisito, tulahumina nitwaamba ati “Ameni” mu kulemeka Leza.
Pele ngu Leza ucita ati aswe tube bakwe Kilisito. Ulimwi inguwe wakatutuma.
Ulatubika caando ca lushomo lwesu, ukutupa Moza Usalala mu myonzo yesu kuba cishomezho ca shintu shiciza.
Leza ngu kamboni wangu nshibeyi pe. Ulizhi ati ncindatakazhila ku Kolinto, nkwaamba ati muhune kubukali bwangu.
Pele ceci tacaamba ati tulazanda kumuminya, tuli bashimilimo nokwenu. Tulazanda kusebezela antoomwi amwe, kwaamba mutangale, nkaambo mulizhimine alushomo lwenu cakutazungaana.
Ubobo ndakatelaika kwaamba ati nsheelele kwiza koko kumuswaya u kumupa mapenzhi ulimwi.
Nkaambo kuti naa ndamupenzha, no nguni ukaakonzha kumbotezha? Cita babo mbubabo mbubona mbumpenzha.
Ndakalemba bobo, kwaamba ndakashika intakaushiwa insoni ku bantu babo beelele kunsamausha. Nkaambo ndashoma ati ciindi nimbotelwa amwe mulabotelwa.
Ndakamulembela u monzo ucisa cini cini u kulila misozhi minji minji mutabi mubuumba, pele ati muzhibe mbwimufwini.
Pele kuti na umwi wabishizha mweenzhiina, indime ngwabishizha, pele kufwiinsha makani, ati wamubishizha noonse.
Cilabota kwaamba ati wezu muntu wapewa cisubulo u bantu boonse cimweelele.
Inzho muntu uli bobo ulyeelele kulekelelwa u kumuzumya zumya kwaamba ata ungumana.
Inzho ndamukumbila kwaamba ati mumutondezhe lufwuno ulimwi.
Ndamulembela bobo kwaamba ati musunke, nzhibe na mulateelela malailile angu oonse.
Kufwumbwa wezo ngumwalecelela, ame ndamulekelela umbona, na kuli cintu ceelele kulecelela, ndacita bobo ku bushu bwa Kilisito ukaambo kenu.
Nkaambo tulibwizhi bucenjezhu bwa Shaatani ulimwi tatuzanda ati atucenge.
Pele ndakapenga cini cini mu monzo, nkaambo ndiina uka muyana mukwesu Taitasi kolya. Ubobo ndakabalazha u kuya ku Masedoniya.
Pele atumulumbe Leza utweenzha lyoonse ukutupa kuzunda mu lukamantano u Jeso Kilisito. Ulimwi kwiita mulyuuswe luzhibo lulazandaala kumasena oonse ukoya bwema bubotu buhwa mukuzhiba Kilisito.
Nkaambo uswe tuli tununkilizho twa Kilisito kwa Leza akati kababo bakaafwutulwa, ulimwi uku bazhimini.
Ku bazhimini, mbwema butizha butola ku lufwu, pele kuli babo bafwutulwa, mbwema bubotu buleta bumi. Inzho no nguni ukonzha kuucita mulimo wezu?
Nkaambo tatuli ukoya bamwi bantu bazanda impindu ku mazwi a Leza. Pele tuli antoomwi u Kilisito, tulakambauka shalushinizho. Tulizhimine ku bushu bwa Leza wakatutuma.
Sa twakanka kulyeensheensha lwesu tubeni? Sa tulyeelele kucita ukoya mbubacita bamwi bantu, kwaamba tuyane maŋwalu aakutupandulula kwiza kuli umwe na kuhwa kuli umwe?
Umwe nubeni ndimwe luŋwalu lwesu lulembelwe mu myonzo yesu, kwaamba luzhibwe u kubalwa ku bantu boonse.

Inzho umwe nubeni mulatondezha ati ndimwe luŋwalu ndwakalemba Kilisito u kulutuma kwiita mulyuuswe. Lwiina nilwakalembwa u inki acilembelo ca mabwe pe, pele u Moza wa Leza upona ngwaakalemba mu myonzo ya bantu.
Twaamba bolya nkaambo tulikwete lushomo mwa Leza kwiita mwa Kilisito.
Anu ndiswe bani intulitelaisha ati tulakonzha kuucita mulimo wezu tubeni? Insana nshitukwete shilahwa kwa Leza.
Walo nguutupa insana kwaamba tube ba shimilimo ba Cipangano Cipiya. Mu Cipangano Cipiya ceci Leza tatupi milawo milembe, pele ulatupa Moza. Milawo milembe ilaleta lufwu, pele Moza ulatupa bumi.
Sa mulimo wa Moza Usalala toobaali bulemu?
Kuti na cintu cituletela lufwu cakeza u bulemu, nkukuti mulimo utululamika kwa Leza ulikwete bulemu bubaala.
Ceco cakaakukwete bulemu bwakutaanguna ciina bulemu ninzho kuti twacikozhanya u bulemu bubaala bwa ninzho.
Na kuti ceco cimana kacikwete bulemu, nkukuti ceco citamana cilikwete bulemu bubaala.
Inzho mbutukwete bulanjizhi buli bobo, tulaamba cakutatiya.
Tatuli ukoya Mozesi, wakaakubika cishitilizho ku bushu bwakwe, kwaamba ba Izilaili batabuboni bulemu bobo bwakaakuya buzhibingana.

Nikuba bobo, kabali bazumu mitwi, cini cini kushicila ubwasunu, ciindi nibabalilwa mabuka a cipangano cakale kale, ncicona cilishitilizho ceci cilihumbile, cilakonzha bulyo kukushiwa kuti muntu waba mwa Kilisito.
Uceno ciindi babo babala Milawo ya Mozesi, cishitilizho ceco cilahumba myonzo yabo.
Pele muntu naacindulucila ku Mwami, cishitilizho cilakushiwa.
Inzho Mwami ngu Moza, ubobo koonse nkuubele Moza wa Mwami, kuli lwaanguluko.

Inzho uswe toonse, intuli u mashu mahumbulule, ngutubonya bulemu bwa Mwami kuba cimboniboni cakwe. Tulasanduka kuba mu cinkozha cakwe, tulakacinca kuhwa mu bulemu bumwi u kunjila mu bulemu bumwi bubaala. Nkaambo bulahwa ku Mwami walo uli ngu Moza.
Inzho mu luse lwa Leza tulikwete mulimo wezu, ubobo nciceco ncitwiina bulenga.

Twashikaka shoonse shiyanza shamaseseke u shalucengo shiyazha insoni. Tatucengi nikuba kusandula Mazwi a Leza, pele tulaamba lushinizho ku bushu bwa Leza. Ubobo tulazanda ati bantu boonse bashome ukutuhumina mu mizeezo yabo.
Na kuti Makani Mabotu ngutukambauka maseseke, nkukuti alisesekelwe bulyo ku bantu bazhimini.
Babo tabashomi nkaambo Shaatani utewa ngu leza wabo uwa anshi ano woofwaazha mizeezo yabo kwaamba bataboni mumuni wa Makani Mabotu aatondezha bulemu bwa Kilisito, uli ncicikozhano ca Leza.
Nkaambo tatulikambauki tubeni pe, tulakambauka ati Jeso Kilisito Mwami, ukuti uswe tuli basebezhi benu nkaambo ka Jeso.
Nkaambo Leza wakalailila ati, “Akube mumuni umunika mu mushinze.” Leza inguwe nguwena umunika mu myonzo yesu kwaamba tuzhibe bulemu bwakwe bobo butumunicila kuhwa ku bushu bwa Jeso Kilisito.
Pele uswe tulikwete lubono lolu lwa Moza, tuli ukoya intesho shabulongo kutondezha ati insana sheshi shizoosha shilahwa kwa Leza, tashili shesu pe.
Tulashaanicizhiwa munzhila shinji shinji, nikuba bobo tatushanunwa. Tulapenzhewa, pele tatumaninwa bulanjizhi.
Mbanji banji batulwisha, pele Leza tatulekelezha. Tulaumputwa, pele tatuzonaunwa.
Lyoonse tulisempwile lufwu lwaka Jeso mu mibili yesu, kwaamba bumi bwa Jeso abo bubonwe mu mibili yesu.
Ciindi ncitupona tulaabwa ku lufwu nkaambo ka Jeso, kwaamba bumi bwa Jeso abo bubonwe mu mibili yesu ya buntu.
Ubobo, lufwu lulasebeza mulyuuswe, pele bumi bulasebeza muli umwe.
Nkaambo tulizhi ati wezo wakabusha Mwami Jeso ku bafwu, aswe ulakatubusha antoomwi u Jeso u kuya kutubika amwe ku bushu bwakwe.
Shintu shoonse sheshi shilacitwa ukaambo kenu kwaamba ati luse lwashika ku bantu banji banji, lukonzha kuleta kulumba cibaala ukaambo ka bulemu bwa Leza.
Ukaambo kako, tatuli balenga ku monzo. Nikuba kuti mubili wangu ulaya bubola, pele moza wangu ulabukulushiwa a buzuba u buzuba.
Nkaambo mapenzhi esu ngaciindi cishoonto ulimwi maubauba, pele alakatuletela bulemu bukando cini cini, bulemu butamana, tabwiingaina u mapenzhi pe.
Tatulanga ku shintu shibonwa pe, pele tulalanga ku shintu shitabonwa. Nkaambo shintu shibonwa nshaciindi cishoonto bulyo, pele shesho shitabonwa shiina mamanino pe.
Nkaambo tulizhi ati, mibili yesu ncicifwutu mutukala ano anshi kuti cafwa, tulikwete iŋanda iihwa kwa Leza, iŋanda iitafwi ya kwizeulu, iŋanda iitazakwa u matashi a muntu, ulimwi iŋanda yashikwense.
Nkaambo mucifwutu mutubele ninzho tulatonjela, ubobo kulanjila kwesu nkwakuti tusame mubili mupiya mutukaakala kwizeulu,
twakeesama mibili mipiya tutakayanwa ati tuli cintanda.
Nkaambo nitucili mu mubili wezu, tulatonjela mu mapenzhi esu, taali ati tulazanda kusamununwa, pele tulazanda kusamikwa ulimwi, kwaamba ceci cifwa cikaminwe ku cintu cikwete bumi.
Leza wakatubamba kwaamba tusanduke, ubobo wakatupa Moza Usalala kuba cishomezho cakwe ca shesho shizhiza.
Ubobo uswe lyoonse twiina bukandu, nikuba ati tulizhi kwaamba nitucili mu mubili tuli kulaale u Mwami.
Nkaambo tuleendela mu lushomo, ukutali mukubona.
Twiina ncitutiya, ulimwi cilabota kwaamba uswe tumuhwe mu mubili tukakale u Mwami.
Ubobo nikuba ati tuli afwaafwi na kulaale u Mwami mu mibili yesu, ncituzanda kubotezha Mwami.
Nkaambo toonse tulyeelele kuya kuzhima ku cuuna calubeta ca Kilisito. Koko muntu umwi umwi nkwaakaatambula shimweelele, kwiingaina unshaakacita mu mubili wakwe wa anshi ano, shibotu na shibiyabi.
Inzho tulizhi ncicaamba kutiya Mwami, kwaamba tukombelezhe bamwi bantu. Leza ulitwizhi ca kumaninina, ulimwi tulashoma ati amwe mulitwizhi mu mizeezo yenu.
Tatulyeensheensha lwesu tubeni kulyuumwe ulimwi, pele tulazanda ati umwe mulisumpule ukaambo kesu. Kwaamba ati mubaingule babo balisumpula ku shintu shibonwa u menso kutali mu monzo.
Kuti na twakaakulibonya ukoya basondoshi, twakaakuli bobo nkaambo ka Leza. Kuti na tulishitikile, tuli bobo ukaambo kenu.
Lufwuno lwa Kilisito ndulutweendelezha nkaambo tulizulilwe ati womwi wakafwila boonse, nkukaambo kako boonse bakafwa mwaabele.
Wakafwila boonse kwaamba ati abo bapona bataliponeni lwabo beni, pele baponene wezo wakabafwila ukubushiwa ukaambo kabo.
Nkaambo kako, kuhwa ninzho kwiina muntu ngutubeteka kuhwa kubuntu bwesu. Nikuba ati limwi twakaakumwizhi Kilisito ku mubili wesu, inzho imbo mbutucimwizhi linji bobo.
Kuti naa muntu waba mwa Kilisito, ati walengwa bupiya. Shintu shikulukulu shamana shoonse shaba shipiya.
Makani oonse aza alahwa kwa Leza, wezo utuzhola kwakwe mwini kwiita mwa Kilisito. Ubobo wakatupa mulimo wakuzholana.
Ceci cilapandulula ati kwiita mwa Kilisito, Leza wakazhola luundu loonse kwakwe. Tabala shibi shabantu, ubobo watupa makani aamba mulongo u Leza.
Tuli bazhiminizhi baka Kilisito, ubobo Leza ulamukombelezha kwiita mulyuuswe. Ukaambo kako twamukomba mwizhina lyaka Kilisito kwaamba ati, amuzholwe kwa Leza.
Kilisito kaina cibi, pele Leza wakamubika shibi shesu, kwaamba ati uswe tube balulami kwa Leza.
Inzho mbuli mbutusebeza antoomwi ku ncito sha Leza, mutatambuli luse lwa Leza ca bulyo pe.
Nkaambo Leza ulaamba ati,
“Muciindi ceelele ndakamuteelela,
ukumuyohwa mu buzuba bwa lufwutuko.” Amuteelele, ceno nciciindi ceelele, bwasunu mbubuzuba bwa lufwutuko.
Uswe tatuzanda kubika imfwumpu munzhila ya muntu naaba womwi, kwaamba mulimo wesu utakwati butongo.
Pele mu shintu shoonse tulalitondezha ati tuli basebezhi ba Leza, tuli bashicamba cini cini mu mapenzhi u mu makatazho umu malowe
u mukuumwa u mukwaangwa u mu mapyopyongano u mu mapakasho u mukufwubwa tulo u munzala
u mu busalazhi u muluzhibo, umu bushicamba u munkumbu umu Moza Usalala umu lufwuno lwini lwini
umu mazwi alushinizho u munsana sha Leza. Tulasebezha shilwisho sha bululami mu matashi oonse obile, kulikwabilila u kulwa.
Bantu balatunyansha uku tusampaula. Balatwaamba shibiyabi u shibotu. Balatweelezha bubeshi, pele nikuba bobo tulishinizhe.
Balacita ukoya tabatwizhi, anu balitwizhi. Balatubona ukoya bantu bafwu, pele tuli bomi. Balatubona ukoya bantu basubulwa, nikuba bobo tatuyayiwa.

Balatubona ukoya bantu bali mu mause, anu tulabotelwa lyoonse. Balatubona ukoya bantu bapushi, nikuba bobo tulahubya banji banji. Balatubona ukoya bantu bayina ncibakwete, nikuba bobo tulikwete shintu shoonse.
Umwe nuba Kolinto, twakamwaambila aluleme kutamwiita kumbali, myonzo yesu ili bukwazhi kuli umwe.
Uswe twiina nitwakamuyalila myonzo yesu, pele umwe mwakaliyalila nubeni myonzo yenu.
Inzho ndamwaambila ukoya bana, amwe amutuyalulile myonzo yenu.
Mutafwungwa antoomwi u batashomi. No bululami bulasangana buti u bubiyabi? No mulongoonzhi uliwo akati kamumuni u mushinze?
Sa Kilisito u Shaatani balakonzha kusangana? No mushomi bakozhene buti u wezo utashomi?
Nchihuminanoonzhi iŋanda ya Leza nciikwete uba leza bapange? Nkaambo uswe tuli iŋanda ya Leza mumi, mbuli Leza mbwaamba ati,
“Ndakaba u bantu bangu u kukala akati kabo,
ndakaba Leza wabo, abo balakaba bantu bangu.
mbwaamba Mwami Leza.
“Mutakutuzha cintu citasalali, ninkaamutambula.
amwe mulakaba banangu beembezhi u bashimbi,
mbwaamba Mwami Leza shinsana shoonse.”
Inzho nubafwunwa, tulikwete shishomezho sheshi, atulisalazhe lwesu tubeni ku shintu shoonse shisofwaazha mibili u myoza. Ulimwi mukulemeka Leza, tukale bumi bulondoshi busalala.
Amuyalule myonzo yenu. Kwiina muntu ngutwakabishizha, naa ngutwakanyansha, nikuba kucenga.
Niŋamba bobo, nshizanda kumupa mulandu pe. Ndakamwaambila kale ati umwe muli mu myonzo yesu, tulaakuli amwe lyoonse ku bumi u ku lufwu.
Ndamushoma lyoonse, ndalisumpula cini cini ukaambo kenu. Mu mapenzhi esu oonse camba cilinshite, ulimwi nditangele cini cini.
Pele Leza uuzumyazumya batompelwe wakatuzumyazumya naakashika Taitas.

Kutali bulyo kushika kwakwe, kwaambisha u mazwi akwe aamba mbumwakamuzumya zumya. Wakatwaambila ati mulazandisha kumbona, umbumuusile ukaambo ka mapenzhi angu, umbumulibambile kunjohwa. Ubobo ndabotelwa cini cini.
Nikuba ati luŋwalu nundakamulembela lwakamuusha insoni, tacimpenzha kwaamba ati ndakalulemba. Nikuba ati lwakamuusha insoni, ndizhi ati luŋwalu lolo lwakamuusha insoni kwa ciindi cishoonto bulyo.

Inzho ndayininwa, kutali kwaamba ati cakamucisa ku monzo, pele ukaambo kakuti kuciswa ku monzo kwenu kwakamuletela kusanduka. Buusu bwenu bwakamuletela cimo cakutambulwa kwa Leza, ubobo twiina nitwakamubishizha naashoonto pe.
Nkaambo buusu bwa buna Leza bulapa kusanduka kutola ku lufwutuko. Ulimwi tabuusha insoni, pele buusu bwa buntu bulaleta lufwu.

Amubone Leza ncaamucitila mukuungumana kwenu. Kwamuletela busungu, bwakubonesha ati mwiina kampenda. Bobu bukali, bwamupa kupakamana, u kulyaaba, u kulibambila kusubula babisha. Ubobo mwalitondezha ati mwiina kampenda ku makani oonse.

Inzho nikuba ati ndakamulembela luŋwalu lolo, ndiina kulemba ukaambo ka wezo wakabisha, nikaba kaambo ka wezo ngwaakabishizha, pele ndakamulembela kwaamba kusanduka u kulyaaba kwenu kwesu ukuli uswe kuzhibwe kwa Leza.
Ceci ncicatubumbulizha.
Ukutali bulyo bobo, pele twakabotelwa cini cini, ukaambo kakubotelwa kwaka Taitasi, nkaambo umwe noonse mwakamusamausha.

Ndakamwaambila Taitasi ati ndalyeensheensha ukaambo kenu. Ciina kungusha insoni pe. Umbona mbushishinizhe nshindakamushimwina, asho nshindakamushimwina Taitasi shakulyeensheensha ukaambo kenu kashili sha lushinizho.
Monzo waka Taitasi uli nkumubele ciindi coonse, kwaambisha ciindi naatelaika mbumwakaatambula mazwi angu noonse, umbumwakamutambula ca bulemu ukulibonzha.
Ndabotelwa kuzhiba ati, ndakonzha ndamushoma ca kumaninina.
Bantu ba mbungano shesho bakapenga kumasunko manji manji, pele nikuba ati kabali bapushi bakapa ca monzo womwi. Shesho shoonse nshibakapa, bakapa u matashi obile.
Ndazanda kupa bumboni bwakuti bakapa kwiingainya iinsana shabo ulimwi bakapa kubaala ansana shabo cakutashinikizhiwa.
Bakatukumbila ca monzo womwi kwaamba tukwate coolwe cakusangana antoomwi ku milimo ya kuyohwa bana musalazhi mu Judiya.
Bakacita mbutwatakaakulanjila, nkaambo akutaanguna bakalyaaba ku Mwami ulimwi mu luzando lwa Leza bakalyaaba kuli uswe.
Ubobo twakamukumbila Taitasi kwaamba ati mbwaakookanka mulimo wezu wa luse, ulyeelele kuumaninzha akati kenu.
Inzho mbuli mbumulisungulile kucita kabotu mu shintu shoonse, mu lushomo, mu kwaamba, muluzhibo, mukulyaaba, ulimwi umbona mbutumufwini, ubobo amutolelele kucita kabotu mu mulimo wezu wa luse.
Ceci ncindamwaambila tooli mulawo pe. Pele ndazanda kubona na kulisungula kwenu u lufwuno lwenu ndwa cini cini kwiingaina ubamwi mbubatondezha.
Mulizhi mbulubele luse lwa Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito, nikuba ati kali muhubi, wakaputa ukaambo kenu, kwaamba bupushi bwakwe bumuhubye umwe.
Mwakali mwakaakuli bataanzhi, takuli kupa bulyo, pele mutondezhe ati mulazandisha kucita.
Inzho amulibambile kwaamba mumaninzhe mulimo wezo. Ulimwi amusungwaale kumaninzha mulimo mbumwaakubele akutaanguna, amupe kwingainya umbumukonzha.
Kuti na muntu ulilyaabile, Leza ulatambula cakutangala ceco ncaapa muntu wezo, Leza tashinikizha muntu kupa ncaatakwete.
Nshaamba ati bamwi balemununwe, umwe muukumininwe, pele ndazanda ati mwiingaine.
Ku makani akwiingaina, ndaamba ati mbumukwete shinji shinji ciindi ceno, amuyohwe babulizhizhe kwaamba ati kumbele bakakwata shinji shinji, abo bakamuyohwe, kwaamba shintu shikaingaine.
Mbuli Malembe mbwaamba ati, “Wezo wakatebulisha, ciina kuhula, pele wezo wakatebula ashoonto bulyo, wiina uncaakabula.”
Pele atumulumbe Leza, wezo wakapa Taitasi monzo wakulyaaba mbubona mundyaabile ame kuli umwe.
Nkaambo wiina naakacita bulyo nshitwakamulailila, nkaambo kakuti kalyaabile wakalileta mwini kulyuumwe.
Twamutuma Taitasi antoomwi u mukwesu uzhibilwe cini cini mu mbungano shoonse ukaambo kamulimo wakukambauka Makani Mabotu.
Wezu muntu wakasalwa iimbungano kwaamba atuyohwe mu mulimo wa kwaaba shipo sha luse, kwaamba tupe bulemu ku Mwami, ulimwi ukutondezha ati tulazandisha kuyohwa.
Tatuzanda ati bantu batulengelele ciindi nitwaaba shipo shaluse.
Nkaambo tulazanda kucita shiluleme, ku Mwami, uku bantu.
Twatuma umwi mukwesu akati kabo, wezo ngutwasunka shiindi shinji shinji u kuyana ati ulilyaabile ku shintu shinji shinji. Pele ninzho ulilyaabile cini cini nkaambo ulamushoma umwe.
Taitasi mulongwaangu, ulimwi ngutusebeza aze mu mulimo wa kumuyohwa. Pele bakwesu babo mbucili abo, batumwa iimbungano, ndabapa mulimo wa kulemeka Kilisito.
Ubobo amubatondezhe lufwuno lwenu, kwaamba ati imbungano shimwi shilubone. Bazhibe ati tatulubizhizhe mukulyeensheensha ukaambo kenu.
Inzho ku makani a mulumbo wa milimo wa banamusalazhi ku Judiya, nsheelele kumulembela mazwi manji manji pe.

Nkaambo ndizhi ati mulilibambile kuyohwa, Kako nkukaambo kakulyeensheensha kwangu ku bantu baku Masedoniya. Ndakabashimwina ati bantu baku Akaya kabalibambile kuyohwa kuhwa mwakali, ubobo kulisungula kwenu, kwapa kwaamba banji banji balyaabe.
Pele ninzho ndatuma bakwesu baba kwaamba kulyeensheensha kwesu kutabi kwa bulyo, kwaamba musole kulibamba, umbona mbuli mundakamwaambila.
Kuti naa ndeza u bantu bamwi baku Masedoniya, bamana bayana ati tamuna kulibambila, tulasampuka nkaambo twakabaambila kale mbutumushoma. Inzho umwe isampu lyenu lilakaba buti?

Nkaambo ndakatelaika ati ndyeelele kulomba bakwesu kwaamba bataangune kwiza koko kwenu kwaamba babambe makani a cipo cibotu ncimwakashomezha. Ceci ncipo cakwaanguluka, citali cipo cakupa u myonzo yobile.
Kamuzhibaluka ati, wezo ucesha kushanga ulatebula cipo cishoonto, pele wezo uhuzha kushanga ulatebulisha.
Umwi umwi, ulyeelele kupa kwiingainya umbwaalitaisha mu monzo wakwe, Mutapi cakutasenguka ku monzo nikuba cakushinikizhiwa, n kaambo Leza ulifwini wezo uyininwa kupa.
Leza ulakonzha kumwaabila shilonjezho shinji shinji kwaamba lyoonse mukwate shintu shakuliyohwa nubeni, u shintu shinji shinji shakumanya milimo mibotu ya luse.
Umbona mbuli mbukulembelwe ati,
“Ulaminza koonse koonse,
ulaabila bapushi,
bululami bwakwe mbwa shikwense.”
Ulakamupa buhubi ku shintu shoonse kwaamba bwaabi bwenu buye kumbele, bantu banji banji balakalumba Leza twakabapa cipo cenu.
Nkaambo shipo sha mulimo wezu tashikayohwa bulyo banamusalazhi, pele shilakakupaana mu ntembauzho shinji shinji shakulumba Leza.
Kwiita mubumboni bwalimo wezu mulapa bulemu Leza, nkaambo mulacilila Makani Mabotu aka Kilisito. Ulimwi bantu balakatembaula Leza ukaambo ka bwaabi bwa kwaabana shipo u bantu bamwi boonse.
Inzho balakamukombela ca kumutelaika, nkaambo Leza wakamufwila luse cibaala.
Leza naalumbwe nkaambo ka cipo cakwe cikando cizoosha, citaambika.
Ume lwangu ndi Paulu, ndamukumbila cakulibonzha, mu lweenzo lwaka Kilisito. Ume ndimubonhu ciindi nitulanjene kaanzambwene, pele nshitiyi kumushimwina ciindi nintewo!
Inzho ndalomba kwaamba ciindi nitulyaamwe, nsheelele kuba shilusunsu, nkaambo ndakonzha kuba shilusunsu kuli babo beendela ku mubili.
Nikuba ati tuleendela ku mubili, tatulwi inkondo kusebezha shilwisho sha kumubili.
Shilwisho shesu tashili sha kumubili, pele shilikwete inshana shabu Leza shakuzonauna shizubilo shizumu.
Tulamanya kukazhanya ukulisumpula, ukusola kuleta bantu kwaamba bamuzhibe Leza. Tulaanga mizeezo yankazhizha shoonse kwaamba shicilile Kilisito.
Mpaka mukazhibe mbumweelele kucilila, tulilibambile kusubula kufwumbwa wezo utacilila.
Amulange shintu shili ku bushu bwenu. Kuti na mulashoma ati muli baka Kilisito, amuzhibaluke ati aswe mbubona tulashoma mwa Kilisito umbona mbumushoma amwe.
Nikuba kuti ndaitilizha ashoonto kulyeensheensha ukaambo kansana shesu nshitwakapewa ku Mwami kwaamba tumuzake kutali kumuzonauna, tacikangusha insoni pe.
Nshizanda kubonwa ati ndazanda kumukonga u maŋwalu angu pe.
Nkaambo bamwi balaamba ati, “Maŋwalu akwe malemu ulimwi alikwete insana, pele ku mubili aakuli aswe, ulalibonya kuceya ulimwi ulaamba cakulicesha.”
Bantu bali bobo balyeelele kuzhiba ati ncitwaamba mu maŋwalu ciindi nitutewo incico ncitucita ciindi nituliwo.
Tatuli ukoya babo balisumpula ulimwi tatuliingainya abo. Pele nibalyeeleka muli cabo beni ukulikozhanya, balalitondezha kuba balimbushi.
Uswe nikuba bobo, tatukakonzha kulyeensheensha ca kwiitilizha acipimo, pele tulakabamba cipimyo camulimo wezo Leza ngwaakatupa, amwe muli mukati mucipimyo ceco.
Ubobo twiina nitwakaitilizha kulyeensheensha, intwatakacita bobo kuti nitwakamweenzha. Nkaambo ndiswe intwakataanguna kumuletela Makani Mabotu aka Kilisito.

Tatulyeensheensha kubaala mbutubele mu milimo yabamwi bakasebeza akati kenu. Cintu cikando ncakuti, tulalanjila kwaamba lushomo lwenu lwaakuya bukomena, nkukuti aswe mulimo wesu akati kenu, ulakomenesha,
ukuti aswe tulakakonzha kukambauka Makani Mabotu mu mashi ali kumbele lyenu. Nkaambo tatuzanda kulyeensheensha mu milimo yakacitwa kale mu busena bwa muntu unji pe.
Mbuli Malembe mbwaamba ati, “Wezo ulyeensheensha, alyeensheenshe mu Mwami.”
Nkaambo wezo ulitembaula mwini, teelele kutambulwa pe, pele uyelele kutambulwa nguwezo muntu Mwami ngwaatembaula.
Ndalomba kwaamba nati amukwatile shamba ashoonto umbulimbushi bwangu, nikuba ati mwakanka kale kucita bobo.
Ndamufwila bufwi, ukoya bufwi bwa Leza, nkaambo ndakamushomezha kumutwazha kwa Kilisito, ukoya nakalindu wiina kampenda.
Pele nditiile kwaamba ati umbona muzoka mbwakacenga Eva amwe umbona myonzo yenu ikalacengwa, mukalaleka kutiya Kilisito ca busalazhi.

Mulacita ati kwashika muntu ukambauka Jeso unji kutali Jeso wezo ngutwakakambauka, naa mwatambula moza unji kuleka moza wezo ngumwakatambula, nikuba kutambula makani mabotu anji kuleka alya ngutwakamukambaucila, mulamwiilila ca kufwambaana.
Inzho ume shilitengula kuli babo mbumwaamba ati, “Mbatumwa basale.”
Nikuba kuti nshili muyiishe kuba muuza mukukanana, pele ndikwete luzhibo. Pele ceci twakacibikaatuba munzhila shoonse u mushintu shoonse.
Sa ndakabisha kulifwiinsha kwaamba ati umwe musumpulwe, nkaambo ndakamukambaucila Makani Mabotu a Leza ukwiina ncinhola?
Cili ukoya ndakeba ku mbungano imwi mukutambula kuyohwewa kuhwa kuli mbabo kwaamba musebezele.

Nikuba bobo ciindi indakaakuli amwe, indakaakuzanda cintu, ndiina muntu ngundakapa mukuli pe, bakwesu bahwa ku Masedoniya bakantumina shintu shoonse nshindakaakuzanda. Ndalitantamuna kuba mukuli ulimwi ndaakucita bobo.
Umbona lushinizho lwa Kilisito mbululi mwangu, ndaambisha ati kwiina muntu ukonzha kunkasha kulyeensheensha ku shintu sheshi mu masena oonse a mucishi ca Akaya.
Sa ndaamba bobo ati nshimufwini? Pe pe, Leza ulizhi ati ndimufwini!
Ceco cincita nshi cileka pe, kwaamba mbakashe bantu bazanda kulyeensheensha ati baliingaine aswe mu mulimo wezu.
Bantu balyeensheensha bobo mbatumwa babeshi, mbubashikoopopa amenso, balalibonya ukoya mbatumwa baka Kilisito.
Tacizoosha ceci pe, nkaambo aze mwini Shaatani ulalibeesha kuba ukoya anjelo wa mumuni.
Ubobo tacili cintu ceenzu kwaamba batwanga bakwe babo balalibeesha kuba batwanga baluleme nikuba ati mamanino abo alakaba kwiingaina u milimo yabo.
Ndabweelela kwaamba ati kutabi muntu naaba womwi utelaika ati ndimulimbushi. Nikuba ati mulatelaika bobo, amuntambule ukoya muntu mulimbushi, kwaamba ame ndyeensheenshe ashoonto.
Ceci ncindaamba camakani akulyeensheensha kwa kutatiya, nshaamba mbwaazanda Mwami pe. Ndalyeensheensha ukoya muntu mulimbushi.
Bantu banji banji balalyeensheensha kwiingainya ushiyanza shakumubili. Ame ndaakucita umbona.
Nubasongo ukuba, no mulabaleka buti balimbushi!
Mulaleka bantu kumutola mubuzhice na bamunanga lubono na bashikweena na bamutengula u babo bamuuma inkumbaizhi kumenso.
Ndausa insoni kwaamba ati uswe tuli balenga muli shesho.
Pele kufwumbwa ceco muntu ncalyeensheensha aco, ame ndalyeesheensha mubulimbushi bwangu.
Baakuli Bahibulu! Ame umbona. Baakuli ba Izilaili! Ame umbona. Baakuli baluhubo lwaka Abulahamu! Ame umbona.
Baakuli basebezhi baka Kilisito? Ume ndabaala, ndaamba ukoya muntu musondoshi, ndababaala ku milimo mikando. Ndababaala kubikwa muntolongo, u kuumwa u kuzanda kuyayiwa shiindi shinji shinji.
Shiindi shosanwe bakando baba Juda bakanguma mitatula iili makumi otatwe umitatula ifwuka.
Shiindi shotatwe ndakaumwa misako kubakando baba Loma, ulimwi lweendo lomwi ndakaumwa mabwe. Shiindi shotatwe ndakafwilwa bwato, ciindi cimwi ndakazumbaanyiwa mu lwaatele muunza u mashiku.

Shiindi shinji shinji ndakaakuli mu mishinzo, ndakaakuli mu mapenzhi amunyenje u muntenda shabafwumpi u kupenzhewa ku bashicishima, ndakapenzhewa ku bantu bakunze, ndakapenzhewa mu minzhi, ndakapenzhewa mulukula, ndakapenzhewa mu lwaatele, ndakapenzhewa ku bakwesu babeshi.

Lyoonse ndakaakuyanwa u milimo mizumu u mapenzhi, shiindi shinji shinji ncintoona tulo, ndakaakufwa inzala iinyota, ulimwi ndakakuliimya kulya, ndaakakufwa impeyo ukaambo kakubula cakusama u cakulihumba.
Kusanganya ali sheshi, a buzuba ndalibilika ukaambo ka mbungano shoonse.
Nguni ulengucile? Ame ndilengucile. Nguni walebwa, sa ume tacincisa ku monzo?
Kuti na ndyeelele kulyeensheensha, ndalyeensheensha mu shintu shesho shitondezha bulengushi bwangu.
Leza, Ushi Mwami Jeso, wezo utembaulwa lyoonse, ulizhi ati nshibeyi pe.
Nindakaakuli ku Damasikasi, mweendelezhi wakabikwa u mwami Aletasi, wakabika bashikalumamba kumilyango yoonse ya bwaanda kwaamba bankwate.
Pele bakanselushizha mucinzuma kuhwila ewindo lya bwaanda, inzho mbubobo mundakafwutuka ku makanze akwe.
Ndyeelele kulyeensheensha, nikukaba ati taciyohwa pe, pele ndamushimwina bulyo makani a shilengaano Mwami nshaakanzubululila.
Ndizhi muntu umwi muna Kilisito, wezo walo kumyaka ili ikumi u myaka yone yaita, wakakwempelwa kwizeulu lyatatu. Nshizhi na kali mu mubili naa mu moza, Leza mwini nguuzhi.
Ndizhi bulyo ati wezo muntu wakakwempwa u kutolwa ku Paladaizi. Nshizhi naa kali mu mubili na ku moza, Leza nguuzhi.
Koko ku Paladaizi wakateelela shintu shitaambwa shitonda shesho muntu nshaateelele kwaamba.
Sha muntu wezo ndakonzha kulyeensheensha, pele nikuba ati nshikonzha kulyeensheensha ume ndimwini pe, cita bulyo bulengushi bwangu.
Nikuba ati ndalyeensheensha, nshikonzha kuba mulimbushi pe, nkaambo ndaakwaamba meni meni. Pele nshilyeensheensha, kwaamba kubule uutelaika ati ndimwini mwini kubaala mundibonya na mbubanteelele.

Inzho kwaamba intalyeensheensha ca kwiitilizha ukaambo kakuzubululilwa shintu shinji shinji shibotu nshindakabona. Ndakayaswa buya mu mubili, ceci cicisa, cili ukoya buya mutumwa wa Shaatani mbwaasebezha kumpenzha, kwaamba intaitilizha kulyeensheensha.
Kushiindi shotatwe ndakamukumbila Mwami kwaamba amangule buya bobo.

Pele wakaŋambila ati, “Luse lwangu lulizulile.” Nkaambo insana shangu shilalulamikwa umbulengushi. Ubobo ndalyeensheensha mubulengushi bwangu ca kubotelwa, kwaamba nkwate insana sha Kilisito kwaamba lube mulyuume.

Nkaambo ka Kilisito, umbulengushi bwangu camba cilinshite, bantu balantuka, ndayana buzumu zumu, ndapenzhewa, ndaita mu malowe manji manji ukaambo ka Kilisito. Nkaambo ciindi ninengucile, ninkwata insana.
Inzho ndalibonya ukoya mulimbushi, ndimwe numumpa kwaamba mbe bobo. Ndimwe numwaakweelele kunzhiminina. Nikuba ati nshibalwa, pele nshili mushoonto ku batumwa benu bakando pe.
Shitondezho shabutumwa bwini bwini, shakacitwa akati kenu cambakala, shitondezho shizhinga, u maleele akacitwa ca bushicamba.
Sa kuli cintu niciba comwi ku mbungano yenu ncindatakalulika kubaala imbungano shimwi shoonse, cita bulyo ati ndiina indakamulomba kwaamba munjohwe mali? Na mbubobo, amundekelele.

Inzho lolu ndwatatu lwakulibambila kwiza kumuswaya. Ubobo nshizhiza kumuminya pe, nkaambo nshizanda lubono lwenu, pele ndimwe nzanda. Bana tabeelele kuzobolela bakwabo lubono pe, pele bakwabo mbubeelele kuzobolela banabo.
Ume ndabotelwa cini cini kupa shintu shangu shoonse ulimwi u kulyaaba lwangu ndimwini ukaambo kenu. Kuti naa ndimufwinishi, sa nkukuti umwe mumfwune ashoonto?
Ambweni mulakonzha kuhumina kwaamba ati ndiina indakamuminya pe. Pele cimwi ciindi umwi ulakonzha kwaamba ati ndakasebezha maanu ukumuteya kooze kalucengo.
Sa ndakamucenga kwiita muli babo mbundakamutumina?
Ndakakumbila Taitasi u mulombwana umwi mukwesu mwa Kilisito kwaamba bamuswaye. Sa Taitasi wakamucenga? Sa toonse twiina nitwakacita shintu u monzo womwi? Na twiina nitwakeendela munzhila yomwi?
Sa mulatelaika ati uswe lyoonse tulazanda kulikwabilila kulyuumwe? Tulaamba ukoya Kilisito mbwaazanda ati twaambe ku bushu bwa Leza. Ubobo shoonse nshitwaakwaamba nsha kumuzaka nubafwunwa.

Ndatiya kwaamba ambweni ndashika koko ndayana ati tamuli ukoya mbunzanda, amwe nubeni mulakanjana ati nshili ukoya mbumuntelaikila. Ndatiya ati ambweni kulakonzha kuba kuzwangana u munyono u bukali ubu shikalifwune u kutamikizhanya u buhwizhi u kulisumpula u lupyopyongano.

Ndatiya kwaamba ciindi ncinkaashika koko ulimwi Leza wangu ulakampa kulifwiinsha, nkaambo cilakampa kulila bantu banji banji batakabeba nibakabisha ku busofwaazhi uku bumambe u kushintu shibiyabi nshibakaakucita.
Ndakabacenjezha babo bakabisha ubamwi boonse, ulimwi ndabacenjezha ninzho ninteko, mbuli mbundakacita nindakamuswaya lwabili, kwaamba ndakazhoka nshibaleka pe.
Inzho mbwaali mulazanda bumboni bwakuti Kilisito nguwaamba muli ume. Takuli ati mulenga kumubula, pele insana shakwe mushili muli umwe.
Nkaambo wakakankaminwa mukubula insana, pele ulapona munsana sha Leza. Tuli balengushi mwakwe, pele mukumusebezela tulakapona u Jeso munsana sha Leza.
Amulilingule lwenu nubeni, mubone naa mulikwete lushomo. Amulisunke lwenu nubeni. Sa tamwizhi ati Jeso Kilisito uli muli umwe? Kuti naa imbo mbumubele bobo, nkukuti mwakacilwa!
Ndashoma ati mulakonzha kubona kwaamba uswe twiina kukacilwa pe.
Tulamukombela kwa Leza kwaamba mutabisha. Kutaamba ati tulibonye ukoya bantu bakazunda kale masukusho, pele kwaamba ati umwe mucite ciluleme, nikuba kuti uswe tulalibonya ukoya twakacilwa.
Nkaambo uswe tatukonzha kucita cintu citeendelana u lushinizho, tulyeelele kucilila lushinizho.
Nkaambo tulatangala kwaamba tuli balengushi, pele umwe mulikwete iinsana. Ncitukombela lyoonse kwaamba umwe mubaale kucita kabotu.
Ubobo ndamulembela sheshi shoonse nintana kwiza, kwaamba ndakashika intakasebezha insana shakampa Mwami calusunsu. Mwami wakampa insana kwaamba ati nzake imbungano, kutali kwiiyaya pe.
Inzho ndamaninzha nubakwesu, imbubo amushaale kabotu. Amushibambe kabotu shintu nshindakamuyiisha, amuteelezhanye umwi uumwi, amukale muluumuno, ubobo Leza shilufwuno u luumuno ulaakuli amwe.
Amwaanzhanye ca lufwuno.
Bana musalazhi boonse balamwaanzha.
Luse lwa Mwami Jeso Kilisito, u lufwuno lwa Leza Tatesu, u lukamantano lwa Moza Usalala shibe amwe noonse.
Ndime Paulu mutumwa, watakatewa umuntu kuba mutumwa na ukaambo kakuzanda kwa muntu, pele nkuzanda kwa Jeso Kilisito u Leza Taata wakamubusha ku bafwu.
Ume ubashomima mbutulyaabo twatuma myooni ku cikombelo ca Galatiya.
Tatesu Leza u Mwami Jeso Kilisito amupe luse u luumuno.
Kwaamba atufwutule kumusela wezu washibi, Kilisto wakaaba bumi bwakwe ukaambo ka shibi shesu, kwiita mukulemeka luzando lwaka Leza Tatesu.
Bulemu nabube kwa Leza shikwense u shikwense! Ameni.
Ume ndamuzhingwa! Muciindi cishoonto ceci caita mwamukaka wezo wakamoompolola kwiita mu luse lwaka Kilisito, mwakanka kutambula makani aanji.
Mubwini kwiina aanji makani mabotu, pele ndaamba bobo nkaambo nkubali bamwi ubamupenzha nkaambo balasoleka kucinca makani aka Kilisito.
Pele naa kuli umwi, wesu naaba anjelo wa kwizeulu, weza kumukambaucila mulumbe uyishenye u wezo ngutwakamukambaucila, wezo naabe muntu mushinganye!
Umbona mbutwakaamba kale, uninzho ndabweelela ulimwi, naa nkwaali umukambaucila mulumbe unji kuleka welya ngumwakatambula, wezo naabe mushinganye!
Sa ndaamba bobo cilaba ukoya ndaliboshezha ku bantu naaba kwa Leza? Na ambweni ndazanda kuzhibwa ku bantu? Kuti indaakukwete wezo muzeezo indataakuli muzhice waka Kilisito.
Inzho nubakwesu ndazanda kumushimwina kwaamba muzhibe ati wezu mulumbe mubotu ngwinkambauka wiina ukahwa ku muntu pe.
Ndiina kuutambula kuhwa ku muntu ulya maila, ulimwi kwiina muntu wakanjiisha pe. Ngu Jeso Kilisito lwakwe mwini nguwakanzubululila.
Ndime indakaakuli musolozhi akati kaba Juda bamusela wangu mubukombi bwaci Juda, ulimwi ncitalibanza ku makani atwaambo twa tunshiyanshiya ba shikale.
kunzubululila Mwanakwe, kwaamba nkakambauke makani mabotu aka Jeso ku bantu bakunze, ndiina ku muntu nkundakaya kwaamba ambule,
nikuba kuya ku Jelusalemu kuli babo bakaakuli batumwa kale ume ncitana kuba. Ncindakacita nkuya bulyo ku Alebiya mane ndazhokela ku Damasikasi.
Kwiite myaka yotatwe indakaya ku Jelusalemu u kubuzha makani kwa Pita, twakakala aze insunda shobile.
Ndiina unji mutumwa ngundakabona cita bulyo Jemusi munina Mwami Jeso.
Oonse aza ngundamuletela meni meni alishinizhe ku bushu bwa Leza!
Kuhwaawo, ndakaya kumashi a Siliya uku Silisiya.
Ku ciindi ceco bantu mu shikombelo shamu Judiya kabatenzhi.
Kabateelele bulyo impuwo njibakaakwaamba bantu yakupenzha cikombelo, pele inzho nguukambauka makani a lushomo ndwaakaakuzanda kuyaya!
Ubobo bakamutembaula Leza ukaambo kangu.

Ndakaya nkaambo Leza wakanzubululila kwaamba ndyeelele kuya. Kukabeta kakumbali u basololi ndakapandulula makani mabotu ngunkambauka ku bantu bakunze. Ncitazanda nkwaamba ati mulimo ngundakacita kale naa nguncisebeza uzonauce.
Ushilweendoma Taitasi, nikuba ati kali mu Giliki wiina kushinikizhiwa kupalulwa,

pele kabazanda kwaamba ati apalulwe. Inzho babo bashikulibeesha ati mbashomi, balo bakalinjizha munkamu yesu calweeno, kwaamba babone lwaanguluko ndutukwete mulukamantano lwesu u Kilisito Jeso. Kabazanda kutucita buzhice,
pele kwaamba mukwate bwini bwa makani mabotu twiina nitwakabashoma naashonto.
Ncibakabona ncakuti Leza wakampa mulimo wakukambauka makani mabotu ku bahwa mashi, umbona Pita mbwaakapewa mulimo wakukambauka makani mabotu akati kaba Juda.
Nkaambo kwiita munsana shaka Leza, ume ndakaba mutumwa ku bantu, umbona Pita mbwaakaba mutumwa kuba Juda.

Ba Jemusi u Pita u Johani kabali basololi bashomwa, bakaakulibonya ati njimisemu. Bakabona luse nundapewa, Nikuba bobo bakezhiba ati Leza wakampa wezu mulimo, ubobo bakatusunsa u matashi u Banabasi kutondezha ati tuli bashimulimo womwi. Twakateelezhanya ati ume u Banabasi tuye ku babantu bakunze balo baye kuba Juda.
Bakatulailila bulyo ati lyoonse tuukubazhibaluka bapenzhi bamunkamu yabo, walo wakaakuli ngumulimo ngundakaakulyaabile kucita.
Pita naakashika ku Antiyoki ndakamulemanina kaanzambwene nkaambo wakalubizha cini cini.

Kabatana kushika bantu mbaakatuma Jemusi, Pita wakaakulya antoomwi u bantu bakunze ba shoma. Pele nibakashika baba balombwana, wakacileka kulyaabo nkaambo wakaakutiya babo bakaakukwete muzeezo wakuti baba bantu balyeelele kupalulwa.
Ubamwi bashomi baci Juda bakakanka kutiya ukoya Pita, ucakuti u Banabasi aze mbubona wakakanka kutiya.

Indakabona ati tabaponi ubwaamba mulumbe wa Makani Mabotu, ndakamwaambila Pita umbushu bwabo boonse ati, “Uwe uli mu Juda, pele waakupona ukoya muntu wa kunze, kutaponi bupona ba Juda. No inzho ulabashinikizha buti bahwa mashi kwaamba bapone ukoya ba Juda?”
Cini cini tuli ba Juda ukuzhalwa, tatuli bahwa mashi ba shishibi, mbuli mbubatewa.

Pele tulizhi ati muntu ulalulamikwa bulyo kwa Leza kwiita mu lushomo mwa Jeso Kilisito, kutali kucita caamba Mulawo. Aswe mbubona twakashoma mwa Kilisito Jeso kwaamba tululamikwe kwa Leza kwiita mu lushomo mwa Kilisto Jeso, ukutali kucita caamba Mulawo. Nkaambo kwiina uululamikwa kwa Leza kwiita mukucita caamba Mulawo.
Inzho naa kuti twasoleka kululamikwa kwa Leza kwiita mukukamantana u Kilisito, tulayanwa ati tuli ba shishibi umbona mbuli bahwa mashi. Sa ceci cilaamba ati Jeso ulacizanda cibi? Bobo imbo pe!
Kuti ndakanka kululamika ceco ncindakayaya cilatondezha ati ndishikusotoka Mulawo.
Ku Mulawo, ndakafwa kale kwaamba mpone mwa Leza.
Ndakakankaminwa antoomwi u Kilisito ubobo shiciponi, pele Kilisito nguupona mwangu. Bumi mbwiimpona umubili, ndapona kwiita mu lushomo lwa Mwanakwe Leza, wakanzanda kumpa bumi bwakwe.
Nshilukaci luse lwa Leza, nkaambo kuti bululami kabuyanwa kwiita mukubamba Mulawo, ati Jeso kwiina ncaakafwila!
Umwe nuba Galatiya balimbushi! Nguni wakamulowa? Mwakalibonena u menso enu Jeso Kilisito mbwaakafwa aciciinkano!
Amunshimwine, saa mwakootambula Moza Usalala waka Leza kwiita mukucita caamba Mulawo naa mukwiita mu kuteelela Izwi lyaka Leza ukulishoma?
Anu mwalimbuka buti? Mwakakanka u Moza wa Leza, saa mulazanda kululamikwa u mibili?
Sa luzhibo lwenu loonse lwabula ncilwaamba? Pe pe lulikwete ncilwaamba!
Sa Leza ulamupa Moza u kucita maleele akati kenu ukaambo kakuti mwakacilila Mulawo na nkaambo mwaakaatelela Makani Mabotu ukwaashoma?
Kamuzhibaluka inzho ati, banakwe Abulahamu beni beni mbubabo bali lushomo.
Maŋwalu akaambila limwi ati, Leza ulakabalulamika bantu bakunze kwiita mu lushomo. Ubobo maŋwalu akakanana Makani Mabotu kwa Abulahamu ati, “Kwiita mwako, Leza ulakabalongezha boonse bantu.”
Abulahamu wakashoma, ubobo wakalongezhewa. Inzho boonse ba shoma balalongezhewa umbona mbwaakalongezhewa.
Inzho cilasalala kwaamba kwiina ukaasalazhiwa ukaambo ka Mulawo, nkaambo maŋwalu alaamba ati, “Pele bulyo muntu ululamikwa kwa Leza kwiita mulushomo, nguukaapona.”
Mulawo wiina makani u lushomo. Cita bulyo bwaamba maŋwalu ulimwi ati, “Kufwumbwa ucita shoonse shaamba Mulawo, ulakapona.”
Kilisito wakacicita ceci kwaamba shilonjezho Leza nshaakashomezha Abulahamu shipewe ku bantu bakunze kwiita mwa Kilisito Jeso, kwaamba ati kwiita mu lushomo tutambule Moza ngwaakashomezha Leza.
Nubakwesu, nkandasebezha cikozhano ca buzuba u buzuba. Kuti bantu bateelezhanya cihuminano cimwi, bamana balembezhanya, kwiina ukonzha kucicinca.
Leza wakapa cishomezho Abulahamu u lunungu lwakwe. Malembe naamba ati “u lunungu lwakwe” taamba banakwe banji banji, alaamba bulyo mwanakwe womwi nana, wezo walo ngu Kilisito.

Nciŋamba ncakuti, Leza wakapanga cipangano u Abulahamu amana wakashomezha kucibamba. Mulawo walo wakapewa nikwakaita myaka iili myaanda yone u makumi otatwe a myaka tookonzha kuyaya cipangano u kuyaya cishomezho ca Leza.
Nkaambo kuti cipo ca Leza kacizhimine a Mulawo, ati tacicizhimine a cishomezho cakwe. Nikuba bobo nkaambo kacishomezho Leza ncaakamupela ceco cipo Abulahamu.

No inzho Mulawo wakapewa ati kubeenzhi? Mulawo wakazungilwa kwaamba utondezhe kucita cibi mbukubele, ulimwi wakabikwa kwaamba uukuliko kushicila lolu lunungu lwaka Abulahamu lukashice walo uli nguuli cishomezho ceco. Mulawo wakapewa ubaangelo umuntu womwi shikuzhimaakati.
Takuzandika muzhiminizhi kwaakuli muntu womwi bulyo, aze Leza uli womwi.

Sa inzho nkukuti Mulawo ulakazhanya u cishomezho ca Leza? Bobo imbo pe! Nkaambo kuti bantu nibakatambula Mulawo wezo waakukonzha kuleta bumi, ati woonse muntu naakukonzha kululamikwa kwiita mukuubamba.
Maŋwalu alaamba ati, “Inshi yoonse ili mubulelo bwa cibi, aco cipo ucishomezhewa ukaambo ka lushomo mwa Jeso Kilisito cilapewa kuli babo ba shoma.
“Nicataakuna kushika ciindi ca lushomo, toonse twakaakuli baanje ku Mulawo, twakayalilwa mpaka kushika lolu lushomo nilwakazubululwa.
Ubobo Mulawo wakaakutweendelezha kushicila Kilisito naakashika, kwaamba tululamikwe kwa Leza kwiita mu lushomo.
Inzho bolya mbutwaba muciindi ca lushomo, Mulawo toocitweendelezha linji.”
Nkaambo noonse muli banakwe Leza mu lukamantano u Kilisito Jeso.
Mwakapapatizwa mu lukamantano u Kilisito, ubobo ninzho mwasamikwa bumi bwaka Kilisito.
Ubobo, inzho kuciina lwaandaano umu Juda u muhwa mashi, u bazhice u baangulukile, u bakaintu u balombwana, muli muntu womwi mu lukamantano u Kilisito Jeso.
Kuti kamuli baka Kilisito, ati muli lunungu lwaka Abulahamu, mulakatambula ceco ncaakashomezha Leza.
Inzho ndaamba ati na kuti mwana uyelele kukona lubono lwaka ushi kacili mushoonto, kwiina mbubaishenye u muzhice, nikuba ati loonse lubono ndukono lwakwe.
Naacili mwana nkubali bantu bamweembela ukweendelezha lubono lwakwe kushicila ceco ciindi ncaabicile ushi.
Aswe mbubona katuli bazhice bamyoza iiyendelezha yaano anshi ciindi nitwataakuna kukomena ku Moza.
Pele ciindi ceelele nicakashika, Leza wakamutuma Mwanakwe. Wakatumbukwa ku mukaintu ulimwi wakapona mu mulawo waci Juda,
kwiza kunununa babo bakakwaangilwe ku Mulawo, kwaamba tube banakwe Leza.
Kutondezha ati muli banakwe, Leza wakootuma Moza wa Mwanakwe mu myonzo yenu, Moza walo uuwompolola ati, “Taata, Taata.”
Inzho tamucili bazhice muli bazhale. Ulimwi inzho mbumuli bazhale, Leza ulakamupa shesho nshaabambilile banakwe.
Kale kale kamutamwizhi Leza, ubobo mwakaakuli bazhice ba shintu shitali Leza.
No inzho bolya mbumwamuzhiba Leza, na ŋambe ati bolya mbwaamuzhiba Leza muzandilaanzhi kupiluka ku myoza yezho iilela iina iinsana? Nkaamboonzhi mulazanda kuba bazhice babo ulimwi?
Mulaicizha mazuba amwi, umyezhi u shiindi shamumwaka u myaka.
Mwanzoosha! Sa nkukuti yoonse milimo njindakamusebezela yazonauka?
Ndamulomba nubakwesu, amube ukoya ume. Ukuba tulikozhene bulyo. Mwiina ncimwakambishizha.
Mulizhi mbuli mbundakamukambaucila makani mabotu lweendo lwakutaanguna, nkuti kaambo ndakasata.
Bobu bulwazhi bwangu bwakamupenzha amwe mu myonzo pele mwiina nimwakansanana nikuba kunkaka pele mwakantambula ukoya anjelo waka Leza ulimwi na ukoya mbumukonzha kumutambula Kilisito Jeso mwini.
No lutangalo lwenu lwaya kwi bwasunu? Nicakuli celya ciindi, nimwakonzha kukusha menso enu, u kumpa.
Sa inzho ndaba shinkondonokwenu nkaambo ndamukananina bwini?

Babo bantu baamba shakubeya kukaambo ka Makani Mabotu balamutondezha lufwuno kwaamba bamutantumune kwangu, pele makanze abo taali mabotu. Ncibazanda nkutwaandaanya kwaamba umwe mubafwune umbona mbubamufwini.
Ncibotu kukwata lufwuno luli bolya kuti muzeezo kooli umbotu, ceci ncalushinizho lyoonse, ukutali bulyo nitulyaamwe.
Banangu! Alimwi ndipengele ukoya mutumbu mbwaapengana naasunga, mpaka amwe mukabe ukoya Kilisito.
Kacibosha ati tulyaamwe ninzho, kwaamba ati indabweza inzhila inji yakumwaambila, nkaambo mulimpenzhizhe ku monzo!
Inzho ndazanda kubabuzha babo bacizanda kuba bazhice ba Mulawo akati kenu, Sa tamuciteelele ncuuwamba Mulawo?
Cililembelwe ati, Abulahamu kakwete bana bobile, umwi kali wa mukaintu muzhice, umwi kali wa mukaintu muzhale.
Mwana wa mukaintu muzhice wakazhalwa ku mubili kwiingaina umbubazhalwa bantu boonse, pele mwana wa mukaintu muzhale wakazhalwa kwiita mucishomezho.

Aza makani alyeelele kuteelelwa mu mankumbilizha. Bakaintu baba balazhiminina shihuminanano shobile. Wezo uuli bana bakazhalwa umbuzhice ngu Haga, ubobo ulazhiminina cihuminano cakapewa ku lupili lwa Sinayi.
Haga uuzhiminina Lupili lwa Sinayi muci Alabu, ulazhiminina Jelusalemu wabwasunu umbuzhice u bantu bakwe boonse.
Pele Jelusalemu wa kwizeulu ngu mwana muzhale ulimwi ngunokwesu.
Nkaambo maŋwalu alaamba ati,
“Botelwa, uwe u mukaintu uutazhali!
Wompolola u kupozomoka calutangalo, uwe uuyina niwakakuteelela kucisa kwa kusunga!
Nkaambo mukaintu wakaakushiilwe kumulumi ulakakwata bana banji banji
kubaala wezo mukaintu uuyina naakashiiwa kumulumi.”
Inzho umwe nubakwesu, muli banakwe Leza ukaambo kacishomezho, umbona mbwaakashomezhewa Aizeki.
Ceno ciindi cilikozhene mbuli lelya, mwana wakazhalwa kumubili naakapenzha wezo wakazhalwa ku Moza waka Leza ukoya mbucibele ninzho.
Pele no alo Malembe aamba acani? Alaamba ati, “Mutande mukaintu muzhice u mwanakwe baakuya, nkaambo mwana mukaintu muzhice wiina lukono ndwaayelele kwaabana u mwana wa mukaintu muzhale.”
Inzho bakwesu tatuli bana bamukaintu muzhice, pele tuli bana bamukaintu muzhale.
Tatuli bazhice nkaambo Kilisito wakatwaangulula. Inzho amuzhibe ati tamuli bazhice, mutahumina linji kuba bazhice.
Amuteelele! Ume ndi Paulu ndamushimwina ati kuti muhumine kupalulwa, nkukuti Kilisito wiina linji incito kwenu.
Ndamushimwina ati, kufwumbwa muntu wahumina kupalulwa wezo ulyeelele kulibambila kuucilila woonse Mulawo.
Babo benu basoleka kululamikwa kwa Leza kwiita mukubamba Mulawo balisambula beni kwa Kilisito. Mulisakene ku luse lwaka Leza.
Tulisukeme mubulanjizhi bwesu nkaambo tulashoma ati Leza mu Moza wakwe, ulakatululamika kwiita mu lushomo lwesu.
Nkaambo twaakuli mwa Kilisito Jeso, kwiina lwaandano luliwo kubapalule ubatali bapalule, cikando ndushomo lusebeza kwiita mu lufwuno.
Mwakaakucita kabotu limwina! No nguni wakamukasha kwaamba mucilile meni meni?
Kupembelezha koku takuhwi kwa Leza walo umoompolola.
Balaamba ati, “Kulabikwa bulyo bumena bushoonto kwaamba coonse cakandwa cifwutumuce.”
Ndamushoma mu Mwami, camba cilinshite, tamukabwezi muzeezo unji. Ulimwi kufwumbwa ukamunyonganya naakaba ni, ulakamusubula Leza.
Pele ume lwangu bakwesu ndakambauka ati kupalulwa kulazandika, no nciiyi ncibacimpenzhezha? Kuti na ceco ncabwini, nkukuti kukambauka kwangu kwa ciciinkano kakuteelele kuleta mapenzhi.
Ulimwi cilabosha babo bamutonkaika noombalece balizhibe
Nkaambo bakwesu mwaketilwa lwaanguluko. Pele lolu lwaanguluko lutamupi kucita shizanda mibili yenu. Pele kwiita mu lufwuno amusezele umwi uumwi.
Nkaambo woonse mulawo wakafwiinshiwa kuba mulawo womwi bulyo, uuwamba ati, “Fwuna munamuzeenu umbona mbuulifwini.”
Pele kuti muukupona ukoya banyama bamwisokwe, ubalwa ukucisana, amucenjele kwaamba mutakamana kucisana.
Nciŋamba ncakuti, amuuleke Moza usololele bumi bwenu, ubobo mulaleka kucita shisushi shizanda mibili yenu.

Nkaambo shesho shizanda mubili wa buntu shilakazhanya ushizanda Moza, asho shizanda Moza shilakazhanya u shesho shizanda mubili wa buntu. Baba bobile tabalyatana, ubobo ceci cilaamba ati tukonzha kucita ncuuzanda.
Kuti Moza nguukusololela, ati tucili muzhice wa Mulawo.
Ushicita mubili shilyaatuba: mafwunze, busofwaazhi u micito mibiyabi yakutalilemeka,
kukomba mituni u bulozhi, ukusulana ukulwa, u munyono, bukali umazwanga ukwaandaana umipampo mipampo,
kulikumbuzha, bunwishi, u shimwi shili bobo. Ndamucenjezha ninzho umbona mbundakamucenjezha kale. Babo bacita sheshi shili bolya tabakanjili umbwami bwa kwizeulu.
Pele micelo ya Moza njiyezhi: lufwuno, lutangalo, luumuno, bushicamba, inkumbu, busamaushi, kushomeka,
bubonhu u kulitiba. Kwiina Mulawo ulwisha sheshi shili bolya.
Ulimwi babo bali kwa Kilisito Jeso, baka kankamina aciciinkano mibili yabo, u shisushi umakanze.
Twaakupona u moza tulyeelele kweendelezhewa u Moza.
Tatweelele kulisumpula na kubishizhanya na kufwilana munyono.
Bakwesu, kuti naa umwi wenu ulacita cibiyabi, babo benu bakwete Moza, abamoolole camoolela, pele bacenjele kwaamba batatepaulwa abo.
Amuyohwane kubweza mikuli nkaambo mukucita bobo muleebamba Milawo yaka Kilisito.
Nkaambo na kuti babo bayina umbubabele balatelaika ati kuli mbubabele, balalicenga beni.
Amwiibeteke micito yenu nubeni. Amulikankaizhizhe ku milimo yenu mibotu kutali yabeenzhinokwenu.
Nkaambo muntu umuntu ulyeelele kubweza mukuli wakwe mwini.
Babo bayiishiwa izwi lya Leza, balyeelele kwaabana shintu shoonse shibotu u babo babayiisha.
Mutacengwa pe, kwiina muntu uukonzha kulimbusha Leza. Muntu ulatebula ceco ncaashanga.
Nkaambo wezo ushanga ku mubili wakwe, ulakatebula butebuzhi bwa shintu shibozhi, pele wezo ushanga ku Moza, kuhwa ku Moza mulakatebula butebuzhi bwa bumi buteeli.
Ubobo tutakatali kucita shiluleme, kaambo kuti tatukatali ukuleka, ciindi cilakashika lelyo nitukaatebula butebuzhi.
Ubobo kufwumbwa lelyo nitwayana ciindi, atusebezele bubotu bwa bantu boonse, kwaambisha babo bamukowa wa lushomo.
Amwaabone mabala ngundalemba iitashi lyangu mbwaali makando!
Babo bantu bamushinikizha kupalulwa mbubalisumpula ku shintu shaku mubili. Balacita bobo kwaamba batapenzhewa ukaambo ka ciciinkano caka Kilisito.
Nkaambo nibaba babo bapalulwa tabeecilila Milawo, balazanda ati mupalule kwaamba baakulisumpula ku shiyanza shaku mubili.
Pele ume lwangu, bobo imbo pe, kwaamba ndyeelele kulisumpula, cita bulyo muciciinkano caka Jeso Kilisito, nkaambo kwiita muciciinkano inshi ilifwile kulyuume, ame ndifwile kunshi.
Ciina u makani muntu na mupalule na tapalulilwe, nkaambo kakando nkakuba mulenge mupiya.
Ku bantu boonse bacilila injiisho yezhi, luumuno u luse lwa Leza lube abo, lube abo kubicilizha u bantu boonse baka Leza!
Kuhwa ninzho, akubule uumpenzha linji nkaambo mikofwu njinkwete a mubili ilatondezha ati ndimuzhice waka Jeso.
Luse lwa Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito lube amwe noonse nubakwesu. Ameni.
Akube luse u luumuno kuli umwe kuhwa kwa Leza Tatesu u Mwami Jeso Kilisito.
Atumulumbe Leza ushi Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito wakatupa shileleko shoonse sha moza shikanana sha kwizeulu.
Leza wakatusala mwa Jeso Kilisito katana ukulenga inshi kwaamba tusalale u kubula kampenda ku bushu bwakwe.
Nkaambo kalufwuno wakakanzila limwi kutusala kwaamba atucite kuba banakwe mwa Jeso Kilisito.
Atutembaule luse lwakwe lwa bulemu ndwaakatupa bulyo kwiita muli wezo ngwaafwini.
Leza wakatunununa nkaambo kabulowa bwa mwanakwe, ulimwi wakatulecelela shibi shesu ukaambo ka luse lwakwe lunji lunji
ndwaakatutondezha muluzhibo umbusongo bwakwe.
Leza wakatuzubululila makanze akwe a kaakusesekelwe ngakazeeza kucita mwa Kilisito.
Ceco Leza ncaakaakukanzile kucita muciindi ceelele ncakuti, umwa Kilisito aswaanganye shintu shoonse sha mwizeulu u shaanshi.

Shintu shoonse shilacitika kwiingainya umakanze aka Leza. Ulimwi wakatusala kwaamba tube bantu bakwe mwini babo mbaakakanzila limwi mu mizeezo yakwe yakucita shintu kwaamba shoonse shicitike kwiingaina u luzando lwakwe.
Walo kazandisha ati uswe tubataanzhi mukulanjila Kilisito, tutembaule bulemu bwa Leza.

Amwe mwakateelela mazwi a Leza meni meni, ali ngu Makani Mabotu a lufwutuko lwenu, ulimwi mwakashoma Kilisito. Leza wakamubika citondezho cakuzhibya ati muli bantu bakwe naakamupa Moza Usalala ngwakashomezha.
Moza Usalala ncicitondezho cakuti tulakatambula shileleko shoonse Leza nshaakashomezha. Leza wakacita bobo kwaamba tutembaule bulemu bwakwe.
Ukaambo kasheshi shintu, kuhwa indakateelela makani a lushomo lwenu mu Mwami Jeso u lufwuno lwenu ku bashomi nokwenu,
ndiina indakaleka kulumba Leza. Ndamutelaika lyoonse mu kukomba kwangu.
Ndakomba ati Leza wa Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito, Tatesu wa bulemu amupe Moza wabusongo, umuzubulwile Leza kwaamba mumuzhibe.
Ndakomba ati Moza Usalala umunice mu myonzo yenu kwaamba muzhibe shesho Leza nshaakamwitila, ulimwi muzhibe shileleko shikando Leza nshaakamushomezha kupa bantu bakwe.
Ulimwi amuzhibe ati insana shakwe shilasebeza mulyuuswe tubashomi. Insana shesho inkando,
Leza nshakasebezha naakabusha Kilisito ku bafwu u kumukalika kwitashi lyakwe lya ku cilyo mu busena bwa kwizeulu.
Wakamubika ezeulu lyabo boonse beendelezhi u bakando u bami, ulimwi uli ezeulu a mazhina ushuuna shoonse shili ano anshi u kwizeulu, kutaamba bulyo ciindi ceno, pele u ciindi cizhiza.
Leza wakabika shintu shoonse kunshi lya maulu akwe, ulimwi wakamucita kwaamba abe ngu mutwi wa shintu shoonse mu mbungano.
Imbungano ngu mubili wakwe, nkukuzulila kwakwe wezo u uzwile mu shintu shoonse mu shiyanza shoonse.
momo mumwakaakubele ciindi nimwakaakucilila inzhila shabantu ba mu luundu lolu, usha beendelezhi ba bwami bwa mu muuwo, usha moza wezo usebeza mubantu batateeleli Leza.
Mbubona aswe mbutwakaakubele, ulimwi twakaakucilila shisushi sha bumi bwa buntu bwa ku mibili.
Pele nkaambo kalufwuno u luse lwakwe lunji lunji,
Leza wakatupa bumi nikuba kuti twaakufwile mu shibi shesu. Nduse lwa Leza lwakamufwutula.
Ulimwi Leza wakatubusha ku bafwu antoomwi u Kilisito, ukutupa busena bwa bulemu mwizeulu.
Wakacita bobo kwaamba atondezhe luse lwakwe lunji lunji ululecelelo kwiita mwa Kilisito Jeso.
Nkaambo mwakafwutulwa u luse lwa Leza kwiita mukushoma. Mwiina kufwutulwa ukaambo kashesho nshimwakacita, pele ncipo ca Leza.
Teeli milimo yenu, kwaamba kutabi naaba womwi ulikankaizha.
Nkaambo tuli milimo yaka Leza, wakatulenga mwa Jeso kwaamba tucite milimo mibotu, yezho Leza njaakatubambila kwaamba twiicite.
Umwe nu bantu bakunze amutelaike mbumwakaakubele kale kale. Ba Juda kabamwita ati, “Batali bapalule.” Kabalisumpula nkaambo kabupalule bwabo, cintu cakaakucitwa ku mibili yabo.

Inzho amutelaike kwaamba ku ciindi ceco kamutamwizhi Kilisito. Mwakaakuli bantu ba mashi batali basale ba Leza. Mwakaakwiina caabilo mu shipangano nshakashomezha Leza ku bantu bakwe. Mwakaakwiina lulanjilo ano anshi ulimwi mwakaakwiina Leza.
Pele inzho mwaswaangana u Kilisito Jeso, umwe nimwakaakuli kulaale u Leza, mwaswena afwaafwi nkaambo kabulowa bwa Kilisito
Nkaambo Kilisito mwini wakatuletela luumuno naakaswaanganya bakunze u ba Juda kuba ciinga comwi. Wakazonauna bwaanda mu mubili bwakusulana akati kesu.
Wakamanya mulawo u malailile anguwo, kwaamba kuhwa ku mishobo yobile apange ciinga comwi cipiya, wakacita bobo kwaamba alete luumuno.
Kilisito wakafwa aciciinkano kwaamba amanye kusulana, abike mishobo yobile antoomwi ati ube mubili womwi. Inzho mishobo yezhi yakayanyanyiwa kwa Leza.
Ubobo Kilisito wakeza ulakambauka Makani Mabotu aluumuno kuli umwe nubamashi numwakaakuli kulaale u Leza, u luumuno kuba Juda babo bakaakuli afwaafwi.
Nkaambo muli Kilisito uswe toonse tuba Juda ulimwi u bakunze twakacikonzha kushika kwa Taata nitwakatambula Moza omwi.
Ubobo umwe nubamashi tamucili banaabeni na beenzu, pele muli beninzhi noonse antoomwi u bantu baleza, ulimwi muli bantu ba mukwashi wa Leza.
Mulizacilwe a mwiimbi wakabikwa u batumwa u bashinshimi, inzho Kilisito Jeso ndiibwe lya mucooko ca mwiimbi.
Umwa Jeso iŋanda yoonse ilibanjililwe ciinu inu, ulimwi ilaya bukomena kuba iŋanda ya Mwami Leza isalala.
Umwa Kilisito, amwe mulazakwa kwaamba mube cikalilo ca Leza kwiita mu Moza wakwe.
Nciceco ume ndi Paulu mwaanje waka Kilisito Jeso ukaambo kenu umwe nu bakunze,
ndashoma mwakateelela ati ndakapewa luse lwa Leza lwakucita mulimo wa kumukambaucila.
Leza wa kanzubulwila maseseke akwe, mbubona mundakamulembela mubushoonto bulyo.
Inzho ciindi nimubala mulakonzha kulubona luzhibo ndunkwete lwakuteelelesha makani ngaakaseseka Kilisito.
Uba kale kale bayina ukaazhiba aza masesece Leza ngaakazubulula u Moza Usalala ku batumwa u bashinshimi bakwe basalala.

Aza maseseke ngakuti, kwiita mu Makani Mabotu bantu bakunze abo balyeelele kukona sha Leza antoomwi u ba Juda, balaba shizo sha mubili womwi boonse. Ulimwi balatambulila antoomwi shishomezho sha Leza mwa Jeso Kilisito.
Ndakaba musebezhi wa kukambauka Makani Mabotu kwiita mucipo ca luse, ceco Leza, ncaakampa kwiita mu milimo yansana shakwe.
Nikuba kuti akati ka bantu baleza ndime mushoonto kubabaala boonse, Leza wakampa mulimo wa kukambaucila bantu bakunze Makani Mabotu, a buhubi bwiina ubaala mbwaatupele mwa Jeso Kilisito.
Ulimwi mulimo wangu ngwakupandululila bantu boonse maseseke a Leza kuhwa ku malenjelo ashintu shoonse
Muzeezo wakwe ngwakuti, kwiita mu mbungano, busongo bwa Leza bunji bunji buzhibwe ku beendelezhi, ubami beendelezha mu mazeulu.
Leza wakazanda kwaamba shintu sheshi shicitike kwiingaina u muzeezo wakwe uteeli, walo wakahwililila mwa Jeso Kilisito Mwami wesu.
Nkaambo kakuti tulashoma mwa Kilisito, tuleza kwa Leza ca kwaanguluka ulimwi tatuzuluzha.
Ubobo ndamulomba mutalengaani ukaambo ka mapenzhi ngundamupengela, nkaambo bobu mbubulemu bwenu.
Ubobo ndafwukama anshi kwa Taata,
koko kuhwa izhina lya mukwashi oonse mwizeulu ano anshi.
Ndakomba ati kuhwa kubulemu bwa buhubi bwakwe, amupe insana sha kumuzumya kwiita mu Moza uli mukati kabuntu bwenu.
Ndalomba ati kwiita mu lushomo, Kilisito akale mu myonzo yenu. Ulimwi ndakomba ati mushimpwe u kuzhima mu lufwuno,
kwaamba mucikonzhe kuteelelesha antoomwi u bashomi boonse umbwamba, umbulamfwu, umbulondo bwa lufwuno lwa Kilisito
Amuluzhibe lufwuno lwaka Kilisito nikuba kuti lulakatazha kulumaninina kuluzhiba, kwaamba Leza akale muli umwe ca kumaninina.
Inzho akube bulemu kwa Leza wezo ukoonzha kucita shibaala ali shesho nshitulomba nishiba nshitutelaika kwiita munsana shakwe shisebeza mulyuuswe.
Naalemekwe Leza mu mbungano kwiita mwa Kilisito Jeso kushika kumazhalane oonse, shikwense u shikwense. Ameni.
Ume, ndimwaange ukaambo kakusebezela Mwami, ndamulomba kwaamba ati mupone bumi buli ukoya mbumwakaakubele ciindi Leza naakamwita.
Amulibonzhe u kulifwiinsha u kukakatila lyoonse. Mulekelelane ca lufwuno
ulimwi musoleke kubamba lukamantano luhwa ku Moza Usalala, luumuno lumuswaanganye antoomwi.
