Kuli mubili womwi u Moza Usalala womwi, mbubona mbukuli lulangilo lomwi Leza ndwaakamoompolwela.
Kuli Mwami womwi u lushomo lomwi u lupapatizo lomwi.
Kuli Leza womwi Ushabo bantu boonse. Walo ulababaala boonse, ulasebeza kwiita muli boonse, ulimwi uli mubantu boonse.
Pele umwi uumwi wesu wakatambula cipo ncakapewa kwa Kilisito kwiingainya umbwakaabanya.
Mbuli mbukulembelwe ati,
“Ciindi nakaliza kwizeulu,
Wakatola banji banji bakaakwaanjilwe,
wakapa shipo ku bantu bakwe.”
Inzho mbuli mbulyaamba izwi lya Leza ati, “Wakaliza,” no kuliza caambaanzhi? Cilaamba ati, wakataanguna kuseluka wenjila anshi eni.
Inzho wezo wakaseluka, inguwe nguwena wakaliza kuya mwizeulu lya mazeulu, kwaamba azulile koonse koonse.
Inzho inguwe wakapa shipo ku bantu kwaamba ati bamwi babe batumwa, bamwi babe bashinshimi, bamwi babe bakambaushi, bamwi babe beembezhi u ba maayi.
Wakacita bobo kwaamba ati boonse bantu baleza balibambile mulimo wakufwutaucila ukuzaka mubili waka Kilisito.
Ubobo ku mamanino toonse tulakaba u lukamantano lomwi lwakushoma u kuzhiba Mwana Leza. Inzho tulakakomena mubukale bwesu tukakozhane u Jeso mu shiyanza shoonse.
Tatukabi linji ukoya bana bashoonto bapepululwa bulyo kufwumbwa kuya muuwo walwiiyo lwalucengo lwa bantu basongo basowa bantu.
Pele mubwini bwa moza wa lufwuno tulyeelele kwaamba tukomene mu shintu shoonse mwa Kilisito, walo uuli ngu mutwi
uyendelezha mubili woonse ukuswaanganya shizo shoonse. Ulimwi cizo ucimwi ucimwi kuti casebeza mulimo nguceelele, mubili woonse ulakomena kwiita mu lufwuno.
Inzho kuzhiminina Mwami ndaambisha cini cini ati tamweelele kupona ukoya bantu bakunze, bamizeezo iina mbwibele.
Ulimwi u matelaishi abo ali mu mushinze. Mbazhimini ku bumi bwa Leza ukaambo kakubula luzhibo, ulimwi nkaambo myonzo yabo mizumu tabazholwa.
Tabafwi insoni kucita shintu shisofweele, tabalisenda nibakacita cibi cili buti.
Inzho umwe bobo imbo mbumwakayiishiwa makani aka Kilisito.
Mbuli ba shiciiya bakwe, makani akwe meni meni mwakaateelela, mwakayiishiwa sha bwami shili mwa Jeso.
Ubobo amucileke kupona bumi bwakalekale bwabunyama, bwalucengo busofweele.
Mizeezo u myonzo yenu neebe mipiya,
amusame buntu bupiya bobo bwakalengwa mu cinkozha ca Leza. Bulitondezhe bwini, mu bumi bwini bwini bululeme busalala.
Na kuti walemana, utalecela bukali kwaamba bukutole mu shibi, utalemani buzuba boonse pe.
Mutamulecela Shaatani kwaamba amutepaule.
Babo bakaakwiba, bacileke kwiba bakanke kusebeza kwaamba baliyanine bukalo bwa bantu bashomeka u kuyohwa bapenzhi.
Mutaakupwazaika kwaamba, pele amwaambe mazwi mabotu akonzha kuyohwa ukuzaka bamwi mu mapenzhi abo, kwaamba babo bamuteelela bayane lwiiyo.
Ulimwi utapi kwaamba Moza Usalala wa Leza ubiilwe, nkaambo ncicikanto ncimubicilwe cizhibya ati muli bakwe, cishomezho cakuti buzuba bulakashika nimukakaangululwa.
Inzho amukushe yoonse imfwundimfwundi, kulemana u bukali u kuzwangana, kutamikizhanya ukusulana kuli buti koonse.
Amube ba shinkumbu ulimwi ba shiluse kuli umwi uumwi. Amube u myonzo mibonhu yakulekelelana, mbubona amwe Leza mbwakamulekelela kwiita mwa Kilisito.
Inzho mbumuli banakwe Leza mbaafwini, mulyeelele kumukozha.
Amupone bumi bwa lufwuno, mbubona Kilisito mbwakatufwuna. Wakalyaaba mwini lwakwe ukaambo kesu kwaamba cibe cituuzho u cipaizho kwa Leza cabwema bubotu.
Mbumuli bantu ba Leza, bumambe u kulikumbuzha nikuba kulisofwaazha kuli koonse takweelele kwaambwa akati kenu.
Kutabi mafwunze aunsha insoni nituba twaambo twabulimbushi, ukusabwizhanya kwenu kutabi kwalucengo pele akube kwakutembaula Leza.
Amuzhibishe kwaamba ati kwiina muntu uusofweele naaba shimamambe naa shaacihule mwangu ukonzha kukona bwami bwaka Kilisito u bwami bwa Leza.
Kutabi muntu uumucenga ku mazwi bulyo atasebezi, nkaambo shintu shili bolya nshishileta bukali bwa Leza ku bantu batamucilila.
Ubobo mutaakweenda abo.
Ku mazuba a kale kale amwe mwakaakuli mu mushinze, pele mazuba ano muli mu mumuni wa Mwami. Ubobo kamweenda ukoya bantu bali mu mumuni.
Nkaambo mucelo wa mumuni ulayanwa mu shintu shoonse shibotu, shiluleme sha cini cini.
Amuliiye shintu shibotezha Mwami.
Mutabi nimuyanwa mu milimo mibiyabi ya mu mushinze, pele amwiizubulule ishaale atuba.
Nkaambo cilausha insoni nikuba bulyo kushaamba nshibacita mu maseseke.
Inzho mumuni nguuzubulula kwaamba shilibonye shishaale atuba.
Nciceco ncikulembelwe ati,
“Buka uwe nucoona,
Buka kuhwa ku bafwu, u Kilisito ulakumunikila.”
Amucenjele cini cini mukweenda kwenu. Muteenda ukoya bantu bayina ncibezhi, pele amweende mbuli bantu basongo.
Ciindi mutacisowa amucisebezhe bweelele, kaambo ano mazuba mabiyabi.
Ubobo mutabi balimbushi, pele amuzhibe ceco Leza ncaazanda.
Mutakolwa mukuku ulamupa kulebwa, pele amusololelwe u Moza Usalala.
Amwaambauzhanye kwiita mu ntembauzho, iinyimbo shamu Moza, amwiimbile Leza inyimbo shakubotelwa kuhwa mu myonzo yenu.
Mwizhina lya Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito, lyoonse mulumbe Leza Tatesu ukaambo ka shintu shoonse.
Amulemekane umwi uumwi mbubona mbumumulemeka Kilisito.
Nu bakaintu amulibonzhe ku balumyeenu mbubona mbumulibonzha ku Mwami.
Nkaambo mulombwana ngu mutwi wa mukaintu mbubona Kilisito mbwaali mutwi wa mbungano, ili ngu mubili wakwe ulimwi ngu mufwutuli wanjiyo.
Mbubona imbungano mbwiilibonzha kwa Kilisito, abo bakaintu balyeelele kulibonzha ku balumyaabo mu shintu shoonse.
Nu balombwana numutwele nombafwune benenu, mbubona Kilisito mbwakeefwuna imbungano u kulyaaba ukaambo kanjiyo,
kwaamba esalazhe u kwiisanzha mu meenzhi kwiita mwizwi lyakwe.
Kazanda ati ibe imbungano yakwe mukamwini yabulemu, iina butongo nikaba kabala niciba cibiyabi cimwi, pele ibe inondoshi ulimwi iisalala.
Ubobo balombwana batwele balyeelele kubafwuna benabo mbubona mbubafwini mibili yabo. Wezo uufwini mwinakwe ati ulyuufwini mubili wakwe.
Nkaambo kwiina muntu uswile mubili wakwe, uloosanina ukuubamba kabotu, mbubona u Kilisito mbwaacilila imbungano
iili ngu mubili wakwe, inzho uswe tuli shizo sha mubili wakwe.
Mbubona mbwaamba maŋwalu ati, “Nkaambo kako mulombwana ulakashiya ushi u baina ukukakatila kumwinakwe, inzho bobile baba balakaba mubili womwi.”
Aza mazwi alatwaambila makani maseseke, pele alaamba sha Kilisito iimbungano.
Pele ulimwi a Leza kwenu, kwaamba woonse mulombwana uutwele, afwune mwinakwe umbona mbwaalifwini mwini. Ulimwi mukaintu uutwelwe ulyeelele kupa bulemu mulumyaakwe.
Nkaambo mazwi a Leza alaamba ati, “Lemeka uso u banoko.” Wezu ngu mulawo mutaanzhi ukwete u cishomezho.
“Wacita bobo ulakwata coolwe ulimwi uloongola ano anshi.”
Citabi bulyo cakulitondezha ciindi nibamubwene kwaamba baakumufwini, pele amube ukoya bazhice baka Kilisito, mucite luzando lwa Leza ca monzo woonse
Amusebeze cakwaanguluka, ukoya numusebezela Mwami Leza ubatali bantu balya maila.
Nkaambo mulizhi ati kufwumbwa cibotu ncaacita muntu naaba muzhice naaba muzhale ulakatambula bulumbu ku Mwami.
Amwe nuba shimatwanga nombakwate kabotu bazhice mbubona bulyo. Mutaakubakonga nkaambo noonse mulikwete shimalelo wenu womwi uli kwizeulu utasalulula.
Ku mamanino ndaamba ati amuzume mu Mwami u munsana shakwe inkando.
Amusame shilwisho sha Leza kwaamba mucikonzhe kulwa u makanze aakufwumba fwumba kwa Shaatani.
Nkaambo inkondo yesu teeli yakulwa ku mubili, pele njakulwa u beendelezhi bashibwami uba shinsana batundile ba mu mushinze wa anshi ano. Ulimwi njakulwa u myoza mibiyabi ili mu masena a mwizeulu.
Ubobo amushibweze shoonse shilwisho sha Leza, kwaamba ati mukacikonzhe kuzhima bwakashika buzuba bubiyabi. Mwakamana kulwa, mulakazhima nci!
Ubobo amuzume, lushinizho alube ukoya lutambo ndumulyaanga mu cibuno, bululami bube ukoya cikobelo calubulo ncimusama a camba.
Kulibambila kukambauka Makani Mabotu aluumuno cibe ukoya indyasho shakumatende.
Kubaala ali shoonse amukwate lushomo kwaamba ibe intobo yenu yakuzhimya mihwi ihwilima njafwusa mubiyabi.
Lufwutuko lwenu alube ukoya imfwuse ya kumukwabilila, ulimwi amusebezhe izwi lya Leza, lyalo lili ndiiceba lya Moza Usalala.
Amukombe mu Moza Usalala mu shiindi shoonse, mumulombe Leza kwiita munkombyo shaandeene. Amupakamane kukala, mutaleka kukombela bana musalazhi boonse.
Amunkombele ame kwaamba Leza ampe mazwi akukambaucila bantu maseseke ali mu Makani Mabotu.
Nikuba kuti ndili muntolongo ukaambo ka Makani Mabotu, pele ndimuzhimininzhi wa Mwami Leza. Ubobo amunkombele kwaamba ŋambe Makani Mabotu cakulitakata.
Incico ncindamutumina kuli umwe ati amwaambile mbutupona ulimwi amuzumye zumye.
Leza Tata u Mwami Jeso Kilisito amupe luumuno, lufwuno u lushomo nubakwesu.
Leza abafwile luse boonse bamufwini Mwami Jeso Kilisito u lufwuno lutamana.
Leza Taata u Mwami Jeso Kilisito amufwile luse u kumupa luumuno.
Ndalumba Leza wangu lyoonse niimuzhibaluka.
Lyoonse nimukombela, ndakomba calutangalo,
ukaambo ka shintu nshimwakacita nimwaakunjohwa kumwaya Makani Mabotu kuhwa nimwakaateelela kushicila bwasunu.
Ulimwi ndizhishi kwaamba wezu mulimo mubotu ngwaakakanka muli umwe Leza ulakoomaninzha mpaka mu buzuba bobo Jeso Kilisito mbwaakaazhoka.

Nceelelo kuli ume kwaamba ndukuliteelela bolya nkaambo monzo wangu uli ali umwe lyoonse, nkaambo ume nikuba ati ndili muntolongo mu maceetani, ninkwabilila u kwaazumya aza Makani Mabotu. Noonse umwe twakaabana amwe ceci coolwe ncaakampa Leza.
Leza ulizhi ati ndimufwini noonse u lufwuno luli ukoya lwa Kilisito.
Ndakomba ati mukomene, mukuzandisha kuzhiba u kuteelelesha koonse,
nkaambo nimukazhibisha kusala shibotu nshaazanda Leza. Ubobo mulalondoka u kubula kampenda nimulindila buzuba bwa Jeso Kilisito.
Bumi bwenu bulatondezha incito shiluleme shihwa kwa Jeso Kilisito, kwaamba boonse bantu balemeke u kulumbaizha Leza.
Ndazanda kumuzhibya bakwesu kwaamba shesho shakancitikila shakayohwa cini cini kwaamba mulumbe wa Makani Mabotu umwaale.
Balindizhi ba ŋanda ya mwami ubamwi bulyo balizhi kwaamba ati ndyaangilwe nkaambo ndi musebezhi wa Kilisito.
Ukaambo kakuti ndimwaange, bakwesu banji banji ba shoma mu Mwami, cakabazumya zumya, ukukambauka mazwi a Leza cakutafwa bukandu.
Nkubali bamwi bakambauka makani a Kilisito ukaambo kamunyono u kuzanda kukazhanya, pele nikuba bobo nkubali bakambauka u myonzo ili kabotu.
Baba, mbubamukambauka ca lufwuno ulimwi balizhi ati Leza wakampa mulimo wakukambauka Makani Mabotu.
Bamwi tabaakambauki bweelele makani aka Kilisito. Mbubashikulizanda ulimwi balazanda bulyo kunzungila mapenzhi mubwaange bwangu.
Pele ciina makani nikuba ati balakambauka makani aka Jeso munzhila italuleme niiba iluleme, kufwumbwa bulyo kuti Jeso wakambaukwa ume ndaininwa.
Cini cini ndaakuciya bubotelwa nkaambo ndizhi ati kwiita mu kukomba kwenu u luyohwo lwa Moza Usalala ngwaapa Jeso Kilisito, ndakaangululwa.
Ndalindila ca monzo woonse kwaamba nkwate camba ninzho u ciindi cizhiza kwaamba Kilisito apewe bulemu mulyuume naaba ati ndimumi na ndimufwu.
Ndaakupona, ndaponena kusebezela Kilisito, pele kuti ndafwa, impindu kwangu.
Kuti ndaakucipona ati ndayana coolwe cakusebezela bamwi. Ashintu sheshi shobile, shicizhi ncinkonzha kusala.
Ndaakwata maanka-maanka. Kuzandisha kwangu nkuya kwa Kilisito nkaambo ncicibaala kubota!
Pele ukaambo kenu bulyo, cilyeelele kwaamba ndukucipona.
Awo nshishinshaika pe, ulimwi ndizhi ati ndaakucipona u kukala amwe noonse kwaamba lushomo lwenu lukomene ukumubotela.
Ubobo ndakashika kwenu mulakakwata cakulyeensheensha mu bumi bwenu mu lukamantano u Kilisito ukaambo kangu.

Inzho cintu cikando ncimweelele kuzhiba ncakuti bukale bwenu bweendelane u Makani Mabotu aamba sha Kilisito. Niinkazhiza kumubona, naa ndili kulaale, ndazanda ati nteelele ati mulikwatishe u monzo womwi. Ulimwi ndazanda ati nteelele kwaamba mulikwete muzeezo womwi ulimwi ukuti mulayohwana kulwa inkondo yakukwabilila lushomo luhwa ku Makani Mabotu.
Mutabalekela ba shinkondonokwenu kwaamba bamukonge munzhila niiba buti. Sheshi shilatondezha kwaamba balakazonaunwa pele umwe mulakafwutulwa. Leza nguukaamucitila aza,
nkaambo wamupa ciindi cakumusebezela u kumupengela.
Inzho umwe mulalwa inkondo antoomwi ame. Njiyona njimwakabona ndalwa ulimwi ncilwa uninzho umbona mbumuteelele.
Mulikwete insana kaambo mulikamantene u Kilisito ulimwi lufwuno lwakwe lwamuumbulizha. Mulikwete lukamantano lwa Moza Usalala, ubobo amukwate intenda iinkumbu kuli umwi uumwi.
Ndamulomba kwaamba mumbotezhe cini cini kwiita mukukamantana u lufwuno lomwi. Amushicite sheshi ca monzo womwi u muzeezo womwi.
Mutaciti cintu niciba comwi cakulyeensheensha nikuba kulisumpula, pele amulibombye ukutelaika bamwi ati bali kabotu kubaala umwe.
Mutaciti shimuyohwa nubeni pele amucite umwi uumwi ciyohwa mweenzhiina.
Mulyeelele kukwata monzo uli ukoya welya ngwaakaakukwete Jeso Kilisito.
Walo kakwete cimo ca Leza, pele wiina naakalikakatizha kuba ukoya Leza.
Pele wakalibonzha cibaala naakabweza cimo cabuzhice ukuba muntu ukoya bantu boonse.
Naakaba muntu wakalibonzha u kucilila shabuntu kushicila ku lufwu lwakwe lwa aciciinkano.
Nciceco Leza ncaakamusumpulila cibaala u kumupa izhina ibotu libaala a mazhina oonse.
Ubobo boonse balakaamba ati Jeso Kilisito Mwami u kulemeka Leza Taata.
Inzho nubanakufwunwa bangu, umbona mbumwakaakunteelela nitwakaakuli amwe, inzho amunteeleleshe bolya mbututali amwe. Amusebeze kubaala ca kutiya u kuzhangama kutondezha lufwutuko lwenu.
Nkaambo ngu Leza usebeza muli umwe, uumupa kuzanda kucita u kulozha kucita luzando lwakwe.
Amucite shintu shoonse cakutatongauka nikuba kukazhanya,
kwaamba mubule kampenda, mulondoke ukoya bana ba Leza bayina kabala akati ka bantu bapilingene balubizha beenzhiina. Akati ka bantu bali bobo mumweke akati kabo ukoya intongwe shili mwizeulu,
mukubapa mazwi aapa bumi. Na mwacita bobo ndaakwata cakulyeenseensha akazhoka Kilisito. Ndilelyo nicikaalibonya ati ncitalukanka ca bulyo na kusebeza ca bulyo.
Lushomo lwenu luli ukoya cipaizho cipewa kwa Leza. Nikuba ati bulowa bwangu bwatilwa acipaizho ceco ukoya cipo, Ndabotelwa u kusekelela antoomwi amwe noonse.
Umbona bobo amwe mulyeelele kusecelela ukwiininwa antoomwi ame.
Kuti kazanda Mwami Jeso, ndafwambaana kumutumina Timoti kwaamba monzo wangu ukankale ndakateelela mbumupona.
Kwiina unji ngutumutelaika aze.
Bamwi balazanda bulyo kuliyohwa lwabo beni kutali makani aka Kilisito Jeso pe.
Mulizhi kale ati bumi bwaka Timoti mbubotu. Umbona mbuli mwana mbwaasebeza u ushi, aze wasebeza ame kunjohwa mu milimo ya Makani Mabotu.
Ubobo ndashoma ati ndamutuma ca kufwambaana ndamana kuzhiba mbushikambela shintu.
Pele ndashoma mu Mwami ati ndakafwambaana kushika lwangu ndimwini.
Ndatelaika kwaamba ndyeelyeelele kumutumina Epafulasi mukwesu shimposo ngumwakatuma, shimilimoma ulimwi ngushikalumambama. Mwakamutuma kwaamba anjohwe.
Inzho ulamutelaika noonse ulimwi ulipengele u monzo umbona mbumwakateelela ati wakaakusata.
Cini cini kasatile cakuzanda kufwa. Pele Leza wakamweetelela, kutali nguwe bulyo pele ame umbona kwaamba intazungizhilwa mapenzhi ezeula aazo ngunkwete kale.
Nciceco ncinzandila kumupilusha ca kufwambaana kwaamba mubotelwe mwamubona ulimwi ukuti kulibilika kwangu kuceye.
Ubobo noomutambule u lutangalo lukando mbuli munyokwenu mu Mwami, bantu bali ukoya wezu balyeelele kulemekwa.
Kali afwaafwi kufwa ukaambo kakusebezela Kilisito. Wakabwaaba bumi bwakwe kwaamba emaninzhe milimo yezho njimwataakulozha kucita.
Kumaninzha nubakwesu ndaamba amusekelele mu lukamantano u Mwami. Ndiina makani kubweelela kulemba makani ngundakamulembela kale, nkaambo ceco cilamuyohwa.
Amubacenjelele bantu basofweele babo batalilemeka, bali ukoya babwa, babo bacita shibi, babo bapalule bulyo kumibili.
Nkaambo uswe ndiswe bapalule beni beni, utusololelwa u Moza mu kukomba Leza. Tulalikankaizhizha mu lukamantano ndutukwete mwa Kilisito Jeso, tatushomi shicitwa ku mubili pe.
Nikuba bobo ame ndikwete shaku mubili nshiinshoma kwaamba ndyeensheenshe. Na kuli muntu utelaika ati ulikwete shintu shili bobo shakulyeensheensha, ume ndamubaala.
Nkaambo indakazhalwa, ndakapalulwa mu buzuba bwa lusele. Ume ndi muna Izilaili, wamushobo wa Benjamini. Ndimu Hibulu waba Hibulu. Ku makani a mulawo waba Juda, ndakaakuli mu Falisi.
Ndakaakuli muntu uzandisha mulimo wangu cakuti ndakeepenzha imbungano. Kwaamba shabululami bwaku Mulawo, ndakaakwiina kampenda.
Pele ukaambo ka Kilisito, shoonse nshindakaakuzunga ati shilikwete impindu, ubwasunu ndashibona ati nshabulyo.

Cini cini shintu shoonse ndashizhiba ati nshabulyo ukaambo kampindu inkando njindayana kwiita mukuzhiba Jeso Kilisito Mwami wangu. Ukaambo kakwe, ndakashileka shoonse ukushibona ati shiina mulimo, nshabulyo, kwaamba njane Kilisito,

ulimwi njanwe mu lukamantano lwakwe ca kumaninina. Nshilyaamba ati ndimululami kwiita mukubamba Mulawo, pele bululami bwangu bulahwa mukushoma Kilisito. Bobu bululami bulahwa kwa Leza ulimwi bulizhimine alushomo.
Ndazanda kuzhiba Kilisito insana shakamubusha ku bafwu. Ulimwi ndazanda kwaabana mapenzhi akwe kwaamba tukozhane aze mu lufwu lwakwe.
Ndacita bobo kwaamba ambweni ame ndakabushiwa ku bafwu.
Takuli ati ndashitambula kale sheshi shintu naa ati ume ndilondokele kale. Pele ndalukanka kwaamba nkashikwate sheshi shintu nkaambo Kilisito Jeso wancita kwaamba mbe wakwe.
Bakwesu nshaamba ati ndasheenzha kale pe. Pele comwi bulyo ncincita nciceci, ndashiya shoonse shili munshi, ndipamine bulyo shintu shili kumbele.
Ubobo ndalukankila impa ili kumbele, kwaamba nkabuyane bulumbu bwa kwizeulu mbwaatwitila Leza mu lukamantano u Kilisito Jeso.
Inzho toonse uswe nitushimine kale, tulyeelele kuzeeza bulyo shesho. Pele na kuli umwi uzeeza bunji, Leza ulamuzubululila shesho.
Inzho atukwatishe shesho nshitwakayana kale.
Lyoonse ndamwaambila, uninzho ndazanda kwiituluka ca kulila ati nkubali banji batondezha bumi bwabo kwaamba mbubashinkondonina injiisho yakuti Kilisito wakatufwila aciciinkano.
Ku mamanino balakazonaunwa nkaambo leza wabo, nshishesho shizanda mibili yabo. Balalisumpulila shintu nshibakweelele kufwila insoni. Mizeezo yabo ili a shintu sha buntunshi.
Pele uswe munzhi wesu uli kwizeulu, mufwutuli ngutulindila nkwaakaahwila. Wezo utewa ati Mwami Jeso Kilisito,
ulakeesandula mibili yesu ibola kwaamba ikabe ukoya mubili wakwe wa bulemu, kwiita munsana shikonzha kukoma shintu shoonse kwaamba ashilele.
Inzho nubakwesu mbunzandisha, babo mbunzhimbile banjinina. Umwe umumpa kulisumpula, amuzhime cakushankamana mu lukamantano lwa bumi bwenu u Mwami nubanakufwunwa bangu.
Ndabakumbila ba Yuwodiya u Sintike kwaamba ati bateelezhanye ukoya babunina mu Mwami.

Ulimwi ndakulomba aze umusebezhima mwini-mwini kwaamba ubayohwe baba bakaintu nkaambo twakasebeza abo ca nsana mukumwaya mulumbe wa Makani Mabotu. Ulimwi bakasebeza u Kilementi u basebezhima banji banji bali mazhina Malembe kale mwibuka lya bumi.
Amusekelele mu lukamantano lwenu u Mwami lyoonse, ulimwi ndabweelela, amusekelele!
Bantu boonse abakubone kulibonzha kwenu. Mwami uli afwaafwi kwiza.
Mutalibilici ku cintu niciba comwi pe, pele mu kukomba kwenu koonse amukumbile kwa Leza shesho nshimwiina u monzo wakulumba lyoonse.
Ubobo luumuno luhwa kwa Leza lubaala busongo bwa bantu boonse lulakeebamba myonzo yenu u mizeezo yenu yoonse mu lukamantano u Kilisito Jeso.
Kumaninzha nubakwesu amutelaike shintu shibotu shitembaulika shoonse shili ukoya shalushinizho, shilemekwa, shiluleme, shilondoshi, sheebeka ulimwi shabulemu.
Amucilile nshimwakaiya ukutambula kwangu ulimwi u nshimwakabona ndacita u shesho nshimwakateelela ati ndakashicita. Ubobo Leza upa luumuno ulakaba amwe.

Ndasekelela cini cini mu lukamantano lwesu u Mwami ati uninzho nikwaita ciindi cili mbucibele, mwakanka ulimwi kulibonya ati mulantelaika. Mwakaakuntelaika cini cini nikuba ati kamwiina ciindi cakutondezha bobo.
Nshaamba aza makani ca muntu utongauka pe, nkaambo ndakayiya ati ceco ncinkwete cilinjelele ulimwi ndilaminwe.
Ndibwizhi bupushi mbububele ulimwi u buhubi ndibwizhi mbububele. Muli shoonse ndakaazhiba masesece a kukuta u kwiilala, kufwuwa u kubula.
Ndakonzha kucita shoonse shintu nkaambo Kilisito nguumpa insana.
Nikuba bobo mwakacita kabotu kunjohwa u mapenzhi angu.
Umwe nuba Filipo mulizhi unubeni ati, mu mazuba mataanzhi akukambauka Makani Mabotu, ciindi indakahwa ku Masedoniya, kakwiina imbungano yakaakunjohwa kumpa ukuntambula, cita bulyo umwe ice.
Indakaakuli ku Tesolonika mwakaakuntumina shakuliyohwa shiindi shinji shinji.
Takuli ati ndaanda shipo shenu bulyo, pele ndazanda ati mulongezhewe ukaambo kabwaabi bwenu.

Ndakashitambula shoonse ubobo shanhulila. Ndikwete shoonse nshinzanda ninzho nkaambo ndakatambula kwa Epafuloditasi shesho shipo nshimwakantumya. Nshipo shabwema bubotu, shili ukoya cipaizho citambulika ciininizha kwa Leza.
Ubobo Leza wangu ulakamupa shoonse nshimwiina kweendelana u buhubi bwakwe bwamubulemu kwiita mwa Kilisito Jeso.
Naalemekwe Leza Taata shikwense u shikwense. Ameni.
Amubaanzhe bana musalazhi boonse bali mu lukamantano u Kilisito Jeso. Bamwaanzha bakwesu boonse mbutuli abo.
Boonse bantu baleza bamwaanzha, kwaambisha babo basebezela muŋanda ya muleli mukando waku Loma.
Luse lwa Mwami Jeso Kilisito nalube amwe noonse.
Ume ndi Paulu wakasalwa u Leza kwaamba mbe mutumwa wa Kilisito Jesu u mukwesu Timoti,
Twamulembela nu bantu ba Leza mu Kolose, bakwesu mu lukamantano u Kilisito, akube luse u luumuno luhwa kwa Leza Tatesu.
Lyoonse nitumukombela tulapa kulumba kwa Leza ushi Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito,
nkaambo twakaluteelela lushomo lwenu mwa Kilisito Jeso umbumufwini bantu boonse ba Leza.
Lushomo lwenu u lufwuno shili zhimine abulanjizhi mbumubambililwe kwizeulu. Ciindi nimwakateelela Makani Mabotu a lushinizho.
Makani Mabotu akeza kwenu ulimwi alaya bweezha micelo u kuya buteelelwa inshi yoonse, ubobo aciya bweezha kuhwa ku buzuba mbumwakateelela u kuzhiba luse lwa Leza.
Mwakaayiya aza makani a luse lwa Leza kwa Epafulasi musebezhi nokwesu walo uli ngu musebezhi mushomeshi ulimwi mufwunwa wa Kilisito utuzhiminina.
Wakatushimwina alufwuno ndumwakayana ku Moza wa Leza.
Ukaambo kaaza makani tulamukombela lyoonse kuhwa nitwakamuteelela mbumupona. Tulapumpa kwa Leza kwaamba amupe luzhibo luzwile lwa luzando lwakwe u busongo u kuteelela kuhwa ku Moza Usalala.
Tulakomba kwaamba mupone bumi mbwaazanda Mwami, bumubotela munzhila shoonse. Mulyeelele kucita milimo yoonse mibotu kwaamba mukomene mu luzhibo lwa Leza.
Amuzume kunsana nshimupewa kuhwa ku bulemu bwa Leza, ulimwi amulibambile kuba ba shicamba cilemu, mutaciti cinuku mu shintu shoonse, pele calutangalo.
Noomulumbe Leza Taata walo wakamupa kwaamba ati muyane ceelelo cakukona lukono lwa bantu ba Leza mu bwami bwa mumuni.
Nkaambo wakatupatulula munsana shamushinzhe ukutuleta mu bwami bwa Mwanakwe nakufwunwa.
Kwiita mwakwe tulayana lufwutuko u kulecelelwa shibi.
Kilisito ncinkozha ca Leza utabonwa. Ngu Mwana wa kuzhala mutaanzhi, mukando ku shilenje shoonse.

Nkaambo kwiita mwakwe, Leza wakalenga shoonse shintu shili anshi u kwizeulu, u shibonwa u shitabonwa, bwami u bulelo, bami u baleli u beendelezhi. Leza wakalenga shoonse shintu kwiita mwakwe, ulimwi ngwaakalengela.
Kilisito kaliko kale kashitana kuba shoonse shintu, mwakwe shoonse shintu shakayana masena ayelele.
Kilisito ngu mutwi wa mubili, wezo mubili ncikombelo, ngu makancilo. Ngu mwanakwe mutaanzhi wakabushiwa ku bafwu kwaamba ayane busena butaanzhi ku shintu shoonse.
Cakamubotela Leza kwaamba bu Leza bwakwe boonse bube mwa Kilisito.

Kwiita u Mwanakwe Leza wakayanzana u shintu shoonse mbushibelele nishiba sha anshi na sha mwizeulu, ciindi naakaleta luumuno kwiita mubulowa bwa Mwanakwe aciciinkano, ubobo wakashiyanzanya kwakwe shoonse shintu shili anshi u kwizeulu.
Kale kale mwakaakusakene kwa Leza ulimwi mwakaakuli ba shinkondonina u Leza ukaambo ka shintu shibiyabi nshimwakaakucita u kutelaika.
Pele inzho ukaambo kalufwu lwa mubili wa Mwanakwe, mwaba balongwaakwe Leza kwaamba amulete kwakwe mu bululami busalala, ulimwi bwiina kampenda.

Mulyeelele kukwatisha cini cini ku lushomo, cakutazungaana mu bulanjizhi bwenu mbumwaka shomezhewa bwa Makani Mabotu ngumwakateelela, azo a kakambaukwa ku shilenje shoonse sha anshi ano. Kaka nkukaambo ume ndi Paulu ncindakabela mutwanga wa Makani Mabotu.
Inzho ndibotelelwe ku makani akumupenjela mu mubili wangu, nkaambo kwiita mu kumupengela koku, ndaazulizha mapenzhi aka Kilisito acisheele kuzhiminina mubili wakwe wa cikombelo.
Leza wakancita butwanga ku cikombelo cakwe, ndakapewa mulimo wa kumusebezela. Ndikwete mulimo wa kwaamba izwi lya Leza lizhibwe buzulile,
ali ngumasesece ngaakaseseka Leza kumazhalane oonse a kale kale. Inzho Leza waazubulula ku bantu bakwe.
Leza wakasala kubazubulwila bantu bakunze, maseseke mabotu a bulemu ku bantu boonse. Maseseke ngakuti Kilisito uli mwako, calo caamba bulanjizhi bwa bulemu.
Ubobo tulakambauka Kilisito ku bantu boonse. Kwiita mu busongo mbutwakapewa tulacenjezha u kuyiisha bantu boonse kwaamba balondoce mu lukamantano u Kilisito.
Ndasebeza cakulipenzha, kwiita mu nsana inkando nshaapa Kilisito nshinkwete ulimwi shisebeza muli ume.
Inzho ndazanda kumushimwina mbwimupenjela umwe u babo baku Laodisiya kubicilizha u babo batenzhi ume.

Ndacita bobo kwaamba batabi bakandu ulimwi bazholwe antoomwi mu lufwuno, kwaamba bakwate luzhibo luletwa u kuteelela kwini kwini. Munzhila yezhi balakaazhiba maseseke aka Leza alo ali ngu Kilisito lwakwe mwini.
Nkaambo mwa Kilisito mumusesekelwe lubono loonse lwabusongo bwa Leza u luzhibo.
Ndamushimwina inzho kwaamba ati kutabi muntu umucenga u kukazhanya kwabubeshi nikukalibonya kubota buti.
Nkaambo nikuba ati tatuli amwe ku mubili, tuli amwe ku moza, ulimwi ndaininwa nimbona kutashinshaika kwenu ukuba antoomwi mu lushomo mwa Kilisito.
Inzho bolya mbumwakamuhumina Kilisito kwaamba Mwami wenu, amupone antoomwi u Kilisito lyoonse.
Namumushome cakushankamana mu lushomo, mbuli mbumwakayiishiwa, amukwatishe kumulumba ciindi coonse.

Ubobo amubone kwaamba kwiina muntu umucita buzhice kwiita munjiisho shabulyo shabubeshi shiina milimo, shesho shihwa mu busongo bwa tunshiya nshiya twa bantu, kuzhiminina myoza ilela ya anshi ano u shiteendelezhanya usha Kilisito.
Nkaambo bu Leza boonse bulizwile mu mubili waka Kilisito.
Ubobo amwe mulipelwe bumi buzwile mu lukamantano u Kilisito. Walo ngu mutwi wa baleli boonse antoomwi u mami.
Ulimwi mu lukamantano u Kilisito mwakapalulwa, kupalulwa kwaku mu moza, ciindi nimwakoosamununa shisushi sha shibi nshimwakazhalwa asho mukupalulwa kwa Kilisito.
Ciindi nimwakazhikwa aze mu lupapatizo, ulimwi mwakabushiwa u Kilisito kwiita mu lushomo lwenu u munsana sha Leza wezo wakamubusha ku bafwu.
Umwe limwina kamuli bafwu ku Moza ukaambo ka shibi, ulimwi mwakaakuli bahwa mashi kamwiina mulawo. Pele ninzho Leza wamuleta ku bumi antoomwi u Kilisito, Leza wakatulekelela shibi shesu shoonse.
Wakashikunkumuna shoonse shibiyabi shaakulembelwe mu mulawo wa Mozesi shaakutupa mulandu ukushibika kumbali kwiita mukushikankamina aciciinkano.
Aciciinkano wakeezunda myoza mibiyabi u baleli u bashibwami, wakabananga shilwisho ukubausha insoni kaanzambwene ciindi naakatondezha kuzunda kwakwe. Wakababika umundando kutondezha ati mbaanje.
Shintu shamushobo wezo nshinhule bulyo sha shintu shizhiza, pele lushinizho lulayanwa mwa Kilisito.

Kutabi muntu naaba womwi umucenga mukumulailila ati bantu balibonzhe u kukomba baanjelo. Nkubali bantu baamba ati, azo makani ngubaamba bakaabona mushilengaano, bamana balisumpula nkaambo balashoma shamizeezo ya bantu ba anshi.
Bantu bali bobo tabasangene u Kilisito walo uli ngu mutwi wa mubili, wakaswaanganya antoomwi ushizo shoonse u mishisa u kuukomenya umbona mbwaazanda Leza ati ukomene.
Pele na kuti umwe mwakafwa u Kilisito ulimwi mwakaangululwa kuhwa ku myoza ilela ya anshi, no nkaamboonzhi mulapona ukoya bantu banshi yezhi? Nkaamboonzhi mulacilila milawo yaamba ati,
“‘Utacikwati ceci,’ ‘Utacisoli celya,’ ‘Ulimwi utamukwati wezu.’ ”
Sheshi shoonse shilabula mulimo shasebezhewa kale, milawo bulyo ya bantu iinjiisho shabo.
Sheshi shoonse shilalibonya ukoya shabusongo shili ukoya shamilawo mizumu yakulibonzha ukupenzha mubili, shamana shiina mulimo mukulesha shisushi shibiyabi sha mubili.
Mizeezo yenu namwiibike ku shintu shili kwizeulu kuleka ku shintu shili anshi.
Nkaambo mwakafwa ubobo bumi bwenu bulizobwele u Kilisito mwa Leza.
Kilisito mbubumi bwenu bwini bwini, ubobo akabulika amwe mulakabulika aze ukwaabana bulemu bwakwe.
Amushiyaye shoonse sha shisushi sha shintu sha anshi shili ukoya bumambe u busofwaazhi uku sukama shitaluleme u bushaacihule mwangu cilikozhene u kukomba ba leza bapange.
Nkaambo sheshi shintu nshishileta bukali bwa Leza kuli babo batamulemeka.
Sheshi nshishintu nshimwakaakucita ciindi nimwakaakupona bumi buli bolya.
Pele inzho amushikushe shoonse shintu sheshi, kulemana ubukali ukusulana ukutamikizhanya, ubushimatushi u twaambo tubiyabi tatweelele kuhwa kumilomo yenu.
Mutaakucengana, nkaambo bumi bu kulukulu mwakabusowa antoomwi u micito yambubo,
pele mwakasama bumi bupiya bwalo bubambwa u luzhibo luzwile, bobo Leza Mulenji, mbwaabukulusha kwaamba tumuzhibishe, tube ukoya mbwaabele.

Inzho mukubambululwa koku kwiina lwaandaano akati kamu Giliki naa mu Juda, mupalulule naa utali mupalule, bayiile u batayiile, bazhice ubatali bazhice, cikando ngu Kilisito uyendelezha shoonse ulimwi uli muli shoonse.
Amweetelelane ulimwi amulekelelane ciindi nimubishizhanya. Amulekelelane umbona Mwami mbwaakamulecelela.
Inzho kuli sheshi shoonse awa amusame lufwuno lwalo lwaanga shintu shooshe antoomwi mu lukamantano lwini lwini.
Ulimwi luumuno lwa Kilisito lulele myonzo yenu mbuli mbumwakoompololwa kwaamba mube shizo sha mubili womwi. Ulimwi amube bashikulumba.
Amuhube izwi lyaka Kilisito mu myonzo yenu, amuyiishanye ukulizumya zumya ca busongo boonse. Ulimwi mwiimbe intembauzho, iinyimbo shakutembaula Leza sha Moza, ukulumba Leza mu myonzo yenu.
Ubobo kufwumbwa nshimucita, nikuba kwaamba u kucita, amushicite shoonse mwizhina lya Mwami Jeso, ukulumba Leza Taata kwiita mwakwe.
Nu balombwana amwe amubafwune benenu, mutabalela calusunsu.
Amwe nu bana namubalemece bakwenu kushiintu shoonse nkaambo wezu ngu mulimo utambulika ku Mwami.
Amwe nu maushabo mutaakubalemeka lutuzhi banenu kwaamba bataakutompocelwa.
Amwe nu bazhice namubalemece ba shimatwanga enu ano anshi mu shintu shoonse, kutali bulyo nibamubwene kwaamba bamutembaule, pele amubalemeke u monzo woonse ca kutiya Mwami.
Kufwumbwa cintu ncimucita, amucicite u monzo womwi mbuli bantu basebezela Mwami lwakwe mwini, utali muntu ulya maila.
Mbumwizhi ati mulakashikona shesho Mwami nshaakabashomezha kuba bulumbu ku bantu bakwe, nkaambo ngu Mwami Kilisito ngu musebezela.
Pele muntu ucita shitaluleme ulakazholelwa bubiyabi bwakwe nkaambo Leza tasalulula.
Amukwatishe kukomba cakutaleka u kulumba, mutaakufwa bukata.
Ulimwi kamutukombela kwaamba Mwami atuyalulile mulyango, tukambauce mazwi akwe u kwaambilizha maseseke aka Kilisito, alo ali ngaampele kuba muntolongo,
kutewa ati mpandulule bweelele.
Lyoonse bulyo bwaambe bwenu abube bwaluse, bulunje mwino, kutewa ati mucizhibe kwiingula muntu woonse.
Ndamutuma kwaamba amuzhibye mbutupona toonse kono ukuti amuzumye zumye.
Baleza antoomwi u Onesimasi mushomi ulimwi mukwesu uzandika walo munamuzeenu. Balakamushimwina shoonse shili kono.
U Joshuwa utewa ati Jusitasi wamwaanzha. Baba mbuba shimilimoma bashomi baci Juda banjohwa umulimo wa Bwami bwa Leza, ulimwi balankalika camba cini cini.
Epafulasi munamuzeenu, musebezhi wa Kilisito Jeso wamwaanzha. Ulamuzhibaluka mu kukomba kwakwe lyoonse, kwaamba ati mushankamane mutabi balengushi mukucita shoonse nshaazanda Leza.
Ndikamboni wakwe uubona ati ulasebezesha ku makani enu ulimwi ukusebezela babo bali ku Laodisiya uba ku Helopasi.
Mushilishi Luka mufwunwa u Dimasi bamwaanzha abo.
Amubaanzhe bakwesu boonse bali ku Laodisiya u Nimfa mumwaanzhe antoomwi imbungano ibunganina muŋanda yakwe.
Mwamana kulubala lolu luŋwalu lukabalwe ukumbungano yaku Laodisiya, mwamana amwe mukalubale luŋwalu ndundakabalembela baku Laodisiya.
Namumushimwine Akiposi kwaamba abone kwaamba mulimo ngwaakatambula ku Mwami woomana.
Ume ndi Paulu ndalemba aza mazwi akwaanzha itashi lyangu. Kamuzhibaluka ati ndimwaange.
Luse lwa Leza alube amwe.
Uswe tulalumba Leza coonse ciindi ukaambo kenu umwe noonse. Tulamuzhibaluka mu kukomba kwesu,
ulimwi tulamutelaika ciindi nitukomba kwa Leza Tatesu ukaambo ka milimo yenu itondezha lushomo u lufwuno lwenu u bushicamba bwenu mukulanjila Mwami Jeso Kilisito.
Nubakwesu, tulizhi ati Leza ulimufwini ulimwi wakamusala kwaamba mube bakwe.

Nkaambo twakamuletela Makani Mabotu, kaatali mazwi bulyo pe, pele kaakwete insana sha Moza Usalala shakusandula myonzo mu lushinizho. Mulizhi mbutwakapona akati kenu ciindi nitwakaakuli amwe, twakaakuzanda kumuyohwa.
Inzho mwakatwiiya uswe u Mwami. Nikuba kuti mwakaakuli mu mapenzhi, makani esu mwakaatambula calutangalo lwa Moza Usalala.
Ubobo, mwakaba citondezho ku bashomi boonse bamu Masedoniya umu Akaya.
Inzho kuhwa kuli umwe, makani a Mwami akaya impuwo cakuti lushomo lwenu mwa Leza lwakazuwa kumasena oonse, kutali bulyo ku Masedoniya uku Akaya. Ubobo uswe kwiina cinji ncitukonzha kwaamba.
Nkaambo bantu boonse balaamba a butambule mbumwakatutambula ciindi nitwakamuswaya, ulimwi u mbumwakashiya baleza bakupanga u kusanducila kwa Leza mwini mwini upona kwaamba mumumanine milimo.
Inzho mulalindila kwiza kwa Mwanakwe kuhwa kwizeulu, wezo ngu Jeso ngwaakabusha kuhwa ku bafwu. Ulimwi ulatuhuna kuhwa kubukali bwa Leza buzhiza.
Umwe nubeni nubakwesu mulizhi kwaamba ati kuswaya nkutwakamuswaya kakutali kwa bulyo.

Twakataanguna kupenzhewa u kusampaulwa ku bantu baku Filipi katutana kwiza kwenu ku Tesalonika. Nikuba kuti kakuli bantu banji banji bakaakutukazha, Leza wesu wakatupa insana kwaamba tumukambaucile Makani Mabotu.
Kukambauka kwesu kakutali kwa mizeezo, mibiyabi ulimwi twiina nitwakazanda kucenga muntu.

Nikuba bobo, tulaamba lyoonse mbuli Mwami Leza mbwaatuzeenzha kucita nkaambo wakatushoma, ubobo wakatupa ceelelo cakukambauka Makani Mabotu. Ubobo tatusoli kuboshezha bantu, tulazanda kuboshezha Leza u lingula myonzo yesu.
Mulizhi kwaamba twiina nitwakeza kwenu cakuliboshezha nikuba kwaamba mazwi a kusoseka bu shaacihule mwangu. Leza mwini ngu kamboni wesu.
Ulimwi twiina nitwakazanda kwaamba tuyane bulemu kuhwa ku bantu, nikuba kuli umwe nibaba bantu bamwi.
Nikuba ati tuli batumwa baka Kilisito twakaakukwete ceelelo cakumulailila ati mutupe shintu nitwakaakucili amwe. Pele twakalibonzha akati kenu, ukoya mukaintu ulela banakwe.
Twakaakumufwini cini cini, ulimwi twakaakulibambile kwaabana amwe, kutali bulyo Makani Mabotu ahwa kwa Leza, pele u maumi esu.
Bakwesu sa tamuzhibaluka mbutwakasebezesha kwaamba tutabi mukuli ku muntu naaba womwi ciindi nitwakambauka Makani Mabotu ahwa kwa Leza kuli umwe.
Umwe muli bakamboni antoomwi u Leza mu bumi bwesu busalala, kululeme bwiina kampenda akati kenu umwe nubashomi.
Nkaambo mulizhi mbutwakamucitila, mbuli mbutwakayohwa umwi uumwi akati kenu ukoya mwana mbwayohwewa kwa ushi.
Twa kamuzumya zumya u kumuumbulizha ulimwi twakaakupa bumboni bwa kupona bumi bubotela Leza wezo umwita kwaamba mwaabane mwabane bwami u bulemu bwakwe.

Ulimwi Leza tulamulumba lyoonse nkaambo ciindi nimwakaatambula mazwi akwe kuhwa kuli uswe, mwiina kwaatambula ukoya mazwi a bantu, pele mwakooshoma Mulumbe ati ulasebeza akati kenu nubashomi, ulimwi mazwaakwe mwini Leza.

Nkaambo shakamuciticila nubakwesu, nshilikozhene u shintu shakacitikila imbungano sha Leza ku Judiya, ku bantu ba shoma Kilisito Jeso. Mwakapenzhewa ku bantu benu mbubona ba Juda mbubakapenzha bashomi baku Judiya.
Babo mbubona bakamuyaya Mwami Jeso u bashinshimi bakale kale, mbubakeza kutupenzha aswe. Baba bantu bakabishizha Leza cini cini ulimwi kwiina muntu ngubateelela.
Balatukasha u kukambaucila bakunze Mulumbe wa lufwutuko, ubobo balalilundicila shibi, pele inzho ku mamanino cisubulo ca Leza ceza kwabo.
Nubakwesu lelya nitwakamushiya kwa ciindi cishoonto bulyo, nikuba kwaamba ati myonzo yesu yiina niyakamushiya, twakaakumutelaika lyoonse, ulimwi twakaakuzandisha kwaamba tubonane kaanzambwene.
Twaakuzanda kupiluka koko. Ume ndi Paulu lwangu ndakasoleka shiindi shinji shinji, pele Shaatani wakaita akati.
No bulanjizhi bwesu u lutangalo lwesu u bulumbu bwa kulyeensheensha kuzunda ciindi Mwami Jeso naakapiluka bulakahwa kwi? Sa tabuhwi kuli umwe?
Cini cini, umwe ndimwe bulemu u lutangalo lwesu.
Ubobo twakatuma Timoti mukwesu walo uli ngushimilimo nokwesu wa Leza, mukukambauka Makani Mabotu aka Kilisito. Twakamutuma kwiza kumuzumya zumya kwaamba mushime mu lushomo lwenu,
ati kutabi naaba womwi uzungaana mu mapenzhi aza. Umwe lwenu mulizhi ati mapenzhi aza nduzando lwa Leza.
Nkaambo nitwakaakuli amwe twakamushimwinina limwi kwaamba tulakapenzhewa. Inzho shacitika mbubona mbumwizhi.
Nciceco ncindakamutumina Timoti kwaamba nzhibe atene lushomo lwenu. Caankacila kuukwata monzo, ndakatelaika ati ulaba naamusukusha Shaatani shilucengo, nkukuti milimo yesu yoonse ilaba ya bulyo.
Ubobo, mu mapenzhi u mabiila oonse ngumwiita mo, lushomo lwenu lwatukalika myonzo.
Kuti lushomo lwenu kaluzhimine mu lukamantano u Mwami, aswe tulaakubotelelwe mukupona kwesu.
Inzho tulakonzha kulumba Leza wesu ku kaambo kenu. Tulamulumba ukaambo kalutangalo ndutukwete ku bushu bwakwe ukaambo kenu.
Muunza u mashiku tulakomba ca lushinizho kwaamba ambweni tulakabonana kaanzambwene u kumuzunjilila shimutakwete mu lushomo lwenu.
Inzho Leza mwini lwakwe u Mwami wesu Jeso asalazhe inzhila yesu kwaamba ati uswe twize nkumubele.
Mwami Leza azunjile kufwunana kwenu, kwaamba mufwune bantu boonse mbubona lufwuno lwesu kuli umwe mbulubele.
Munzhila yezhi ulamuzumya zumya u kumululamika kwaamba musalale mu myonzo yenu ku bushu bwa Leza Tatesu, ciindi naakakashika Jeso Mwami wesu u bantu bakwe boonse.

Inzho ku mamanino nubakwesu, twakamushimwina kale mbuli mbumweelele kupona u kulilemeka kwaamba muboshezhe Leza, mbuli mbumucita. Inzho tulamulombesha cini cini mu Mwami Jeso kwaamba mutolelele kucita bobo ukubaala.
Nkaambo mulyeezhi malailile ngutwakamupa kwiita munsana shihwa ku Mwami Jeso.
Luzando lwa Leza ndwakuti musalale, mushileke shibi sha mamambe.
Umwi uumwi wenu ulyeelele kuzhiba mbwaayelele kweendelezha mubili wakwe, munzhila isalala yabulemu.
Mutafwi inyota ya shisushi sha mubili ukoya bantu bakunze.
Inzho mukaambo kaka kwiina muntu uyelele kubishizha munina mu Mwami. Mbubona mbuli mbutwakamucenjezha kale, Mwami ulakabapa cibebyo boonse bacita shili bobo.
Nkaambo Leza wakatwitila kusalala kutali kucita shisofweele.
Ubobo wezo ukaka makani aza, tanyansha bulyo bantu ulanyansha Leza umupa Moza Usalala.
Inzho kwaamba makani alufwuno akati ka bantu bashomi, tamweelele kulembelwa nkaambo Leza mukamwini wakamuyiisha mbumweelele kufwunana.
Mu lushinizho mulifunene u bashomi boonse bali mu Masedoniya. Pele tulamuzumya zumya nubakwesu kwaamba mutolelele kucita bobo ukubaala.
Amusoleke kukala mu luumuno. Muntu umwi uumwi aicizhe shakwe mwini, ulimwi amwaasebezhe matashi enu. Amucite mbubona mbutwakamulailila
kwaamba bantu bakunze bamupe bulemu, u kwaamba ati mutabi batwanga ba muntu naabani.
Inzho bakwesu tulazanda ati mwaazhibe a babo bakafwa, kwaamba ati mutaakuusa ukoya bantu bayina bulanjizhi.
Nkaambo tulashoma ati Jeso wakafwa ulimwi wakabuka, ubobo tulashoma ati babo bakafwa balashoma mwa Jeso, Leza ulakababusha antoomwi u Jeso.
Inzho kwiingaina u mazwi akwe mwini Mwami Jeso, tulamwaambila ati uswe intucipona, intusheele kuya kushika ciindi Mwami Jeso naakakezhiza, tatukababeeleli babo bakafwa kale.
Nkaambo Mwami mwini lwakwe ulakeza anshi kuhwa mwizeulu. Ulakalailila ca kupozomoka, iizwi ikando lya anjelo, iizwi lya mpeta ya Leza. Babo bakafwa balashoma mwa Kilisito, balakaba bataanzhi kubuka.
Inzho uswe intusheele intucipona ku ciindi ceco tulakasangana abo mu makumbi ukuswanganya Mwami mu mulenga lenga. Ubobo tulaakala u Mwami shikwense u shikwense.
Kamulizumya zumya u mazwi aza.
Tacizandika nubakwesu kwaamba mulembele makani a mazuba u shiindi nishikaacitika sheshi.
Nkaambo mulizhi kabotu kabotu umwe nubeni kwaamba ati buzuba Mwami naakaazhoka bulakaba ukoya mutewu mbweezhiza mashiku
Ciindi bantu nibaamba ati, “Kuli luumuno, atuliibe.” Ndilelyo nakaashika ca kufwambaana kwiza kubazonauna, uleza ukoya mishika ya mukaintu umishi, kwiina naaba womwi ukaayana matiilo.
Pele umwe nubakwesu tamuli mu mushinze kwaamba buzuba bobu bukamuzooshe ukoya mutewu.
Umwe noonse muli bantu ba mu mumuni, bantu ba muunza. Tamuli ba mashiku ulimwi tamuli ba mu mushinze.
Ubobo tatweelele kufwukula ukoya bantu batashomi, tulyeelele kupakamana.
Nkaambo mashiku bantu ni boona, ulimwi mashiku ni bakolwa.
Pele uswe tuli ba muunza tutabi bashitumpenda. Tusame lushomo u lufwuno shibe ukoya shilikwabilizho sha acamba, u bulanjizhi bwa lufwutuko lwesu bube ukoya imfwuse ya cibulo.
Nkaambo Leza wiina kutwita kwaamba atusubule mubukali bwakwe, pele ati tukafwuwe lufwutuko kwiita mu Mwami Jeso Kilisito,
wezo wakatufwila kwaamba tukwate bumi aze, nikuba kwaamba tukayanike tulalanga na tulifwile akeza Jeso.
Ubobo amubulane u kuzakana mbubona mbumucita ninzho.
Inzho twamulomba nubakwesu kwaamba mubape bulemu bubeelele babo basebeza akati kenu, babo bamupa malailile mu Mwami.
Amubalemekeshe ca lufwuno nkaambo ka milimo yabo. Akube luumuno akati kenu.
Twamulomba nubakwesu kwaamba mubacenjezhe bakata, mubazumye zumye batompokelwa, mubayohwe balengushi, mube u myonzo ya kupembelezha bantu boonse.
Mubone kwaamba kwiina naaba womwi uzholela cibi ku cibi nina, pele coonse ciindi musoleke kubafwila inkumbu bantu boonse.
Amutangale lyoonse,
amukombe ku Mwami cakutaleka,
mulumbe mu shiindi shoonse, ceci ncaazanda Leza ati mucite mu lukamantano u Kilisito.
Mutookasha kusebeza Moza Usalala.
Mutaakunyansha bushinshimi bwa mazwi a Leza.
Pele amushilingule shintu shoonse. Mukakatile ku shintu shiluleme.
Ulimwi amulikashe ku shibiyabi shoonse.
Mwini Leza wa luumuno amusalazhe bweelele mu shiyanza shoonse, cakubula katongo mu moza u mu monzo umu mubili ciindi Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito nakeezhiza.
Nkaambo wezo wakamwita ula shomeka ulimwi ula kacicita.
Aswe kamutukombela nubakwesu.
Mubape mooni wa lufwuno boonse bakwesu.
Munsana sha Mwami ndamulumika kwaamba lolu luŋwalu lubalilwe boonse bashomi.
Luse lwa Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito alube amwe.
Leza Tatesu u Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito amufwile luse u kumupa luumuno.
Tulyeelele kumulumba Leza lyoonse ukaambo kenu nubakwesu. Tulyeelele kucita bobo nkaambo lushomo lwenu lulaya bukamena cini cini, ulimwi u lufwuno lwenu lulaya buhula.
Ubobo tulalikankaizha ku mbungano sha Leza ukaambo kenu. Tulamweensheensha kaambo kakuti muli bashicamba kumakatazho u mapenzhi ngumwiita mo ukaambo ka lushomo lwenu.
Shoonse sheshi shilatondezha ati lubeta lwa Leza luliluleme, ubobo mulakeelela kunjila mu bwami bwa Leza mbumupenjela.
Nkaambo Leza ulakacita ciluleme, ulakabasubula babo bamupenzha.
Pele umwe numupenga ninzho, mulakalyookezha antoomwi aswe. Ulakacita bobo Mwami Jeso akashika kuhwa kwizeulu antoomwi u baanjelo bakwe.
Ulakeza u mulilo uhwilima kwiza kusubula babo bamukaka Leza, ubatacilila Makani Mabotu akanana sha Mwami Jeso.
Balakasubulwa u kuzonaunwa shikwense u shikwense, balakatandwa kuhwa ku Mwami u kubulemu bwansana shakwe.
Kubuzuba bobo mbwakakashika ulakatambula bulemu ku bana musalazhi, u kulemekwa ku bashomi boonse, amwe mulakaba abo nkaambo mwakaashoma makani ngutwakamwaambila.

Ceci ncicitupa kwaamba tuukumukombela lyoonse. Kwaamba Leza wesu amupe ceelelo ca kuzuzucizha bwite bwenu. Ulimwi kwiita munsana shakwe mucite shoonse shibotu, kwaamba muumaninzhe mulimo wenu wa lushomo.
Munzhila yezhi, izhina lya Mwami Jeso lilakapewa bulemu kuhwa kuli umwe. Inzho amwe mulakayana bulemu kwakwe kwiita mu luse lwa Leza wesu umu Mwami Jeso Kilisito.

mutazungaana ulimwi mutatiyi mu mizeezo yenu u mazwi amba ati, “Buzuba bwa Mwami” bwashika kale. Cimwi ciindi mulatelaika ati ambweni uswe twakaamba makani aza mukushinshima na mukukambauka, nimuba mu maŋwalu esu.
Kutabi muntu umucenga munzhila ili yoonse. Nkaambo kabutana kushika buzuba bobu, inkondo ya mamanino ilakaba, aze shimamfwunze utezhi mulawo, wezo ukaaya mwilambwe lya mulilo akazubululwe.
Wezu ngushikuzumanika Leza, ulalisumpula ku shintu shoonse shitewa ati shilakombwa, ulalibika muŋanda ya Leza u kulyaamba ati ngu Leza.
Sa tamuzhibaluka ati ndakamwaambila aza makani ciindi nindakaakuli amwe.
Nikuba bobo mulizhi cimukasha kwaamba atazubuluki, nciindi cakwe citana kushika. Cakashika ciindi cakwe ceelele, mubiyabi ulakazubuluka.
Nikuba bobo maseseke a bubiyabi alasebeza uceno ciindi, pele wezu shimamfwunze takonzha kuzubululwa mpaka wezo umukasha kasha akaahwe.
Kuhwaawo naakakazubululwa wezo wiina mulawo. Pele mwami wesu Jeso ulakamuzonauna u moza uhwa ku mulomo wakwe, ulakalibonya mu bulemu bwakwe bumweka.
Mubiyabi ulakeza insana shaka Shaatani, u kucita maleele andeene andeene akucenga.
Ulakasebezha inzhila shoonse shisofweele, akacenge babo bakazonaunwa nkaambo bakakaka kutambula u kucilila sha cini cini shaakukonzha kubatola ku lufwutuko.
Nciceco Leza ncakaabalekela ati shibezhile shabubeshi u kwaamba bashihumine.
Mamanino ngakuti boonse batahumina lushinizho, babo babotelwa kucita shibi, balakabetekwa.

Uswe tulyeelele kulumba Leza ukaambo kenu nubakwesu, bafwunwa ba Mwami. Nkaambo Leza wakamusala kuhwa ku makancilo kwaamba mufwutulwe. Mwakafwutulwa kwiita mu Moza Usalala wezo wakamusalazha nimwakashoma shalushinizho.
Nciceci Leza ncakamwitila kwiita mu Makani Mabotu ngutwakamukambaucila. Wakamwita kwaamba muhube caabilo ca bulemu bwa Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito.
Ubobo nubakwesu amuzhime nci, mukwatilile shesho shalushinizho nshitwakamuyiisha mukukambauka kwesu u Mumaŋwalu esu.
Inzho Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito mwini, u Leza Tatesu, wezo wakatuzanda mu luse lwakwe, ukutupa insana shakutakakilwa ulimwi u bulanjizhi bubotu,
u kumuzumya zumya mu myonzo yenu, ati mu kwaamba u kucita shintu shiluleme.
Inzho ku mamanino bakwesu amutukombele kwaamba mazwi a Mwami afwambaane kuzuwa ulimwi bantu baatambule ca bulemu umbona mbumwakaatambula amwe.
Ulimwi mukombe kwaamba Leza atuhune kuhwa ku bantu babiyabi bataluleme, nkaambo takuli kwaamba boonse balooshoma Mulumbe.
Pele Mwami ulashomeka, ulamupa insana ulimwi ulamukwabilila kuhwa ku mubiyabi.
Tulikwete lushomo mu Mwami lwakuti mulacita, ulimwi mulakashicita shoonse nshitumulailila.
Inzho twalomba kwaamba Mwami endelezhe myonzo yenu kwaamba muluzhibe lufwuno lwa Leza u bushicamba mbwaapa Kilisito.
Inzho bakwesu twamulailila mwizhina lya Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito kwaamba mubatantamuke boonse bashomi bazanda kupona bumi bwa bukata u bwakutacilila malailile ngutwakabapa.
Nkaambo umwe lwenu nubeni mulizhi mulyeelele kutwiiya mbutwakaakucita nitwakaakuli amwe. Katutali bakata pe.
Katutatambuli shintu nshitwatakalipilila. Pele twakakuli bazumu ku sebeza milimo muunza u mashiku kwaamba tutamuminya mukuli.
Twakacita bobo kwaamba tube citondezho kuli umwe ncimweelele kucilila, nikuba kuti twakaakukwete ceelelo cakumulailila ati mutuyohwe.
Nitwakaakuli amwe, twakaakumulailila ati, “Wezo ukaka kusebeza, teelele kulya.”
Twamba bobo nkaambo twakateelela ati akati kenu kuli bamwi bakata, bamulinga nkani baungunika bulyo mumpindu shabantu.
Mwizhina lya Mwami Jeso Kilisito ndamulomba kwaamba ati bantu bali bobo, mubalailile kusebeza milimo kwaamba baliyanine lwabo beni cakulya.
Pele umwe nubakwesu mutakatali kucita shibotu.
Na kuti kuli umwi ukaka kuteelela makani ngutwaamba mu luŋwalu lolu, amumutantamuke wezo muntu, mutasangana aze linji kwaamba ati ause insoni.
Mutamuciti ukoya shinkondo nokwenu, pele nomucenjezhe mbuli mweenzhinokwenu.
Inzho Mwami wa luumuno amupe luumuno lyoonse u munzhila shoonse. Mwami abe amwe noonse.
Ume ndimwini ndi Paulu ndalemba mazwi aza akumwaanzha. Ceci ncitondezho ca mumaŋwalu angu oonse nkaambo mbwinemba bolya.
Inzho luse lwa Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito alube amwe noonse.
Ndime Paulu, mutumwa waka Kilisito Jeso kwiita mu kuzanda kwa Leza Mufwutuli wesu u Jeso Kilisito uli mbubulanjizhi bwesu.
Ndalembela Timoti mwanangusha mu lushomo, Leza Taata u Kilisito Mwami wesu akupe luse u lweenzo u luumuno.
Umbona mbundakakushimwina indakaakuya ku Masedoniya, kushite mu Efesusi kwaamba ubaleshe babo bantu bayiisha injiisho shabubeshi.

Baambile bataakusowa ciindi cabo kubandika twaano twakutamikizhanya u kwaamba mazhalane a tashimpa, sheshi tacisumpula mulimo wa Leza shilaleta bulyo mizeezo ya bubeshi, kubaala injiisho sha Leza shiletwa u lushomo.
Muzeezo wamalailile aza ngwa kubusha busha lufwuno luhwa mu monzo usalala u mizeezo mibobu u lushomo lwini lwini.
Bamwi bantu bakazhimina bakaleka kucilila inzhila shalushomo, bapamine misalo yabulimbushi.
Balazanda kuba ba maayi ba Mulawo wa Leza, pele tabacizhi ncibaamba, ulimwi tabashiteeleli shintu nshibapandulula.
Tulizhi ati mulawo mubotu kuti muntu woosebezha bweelele.

Ceci cilaamba ati tulyeelele kuzhibaluka ati mulawo toopangilwa baluleme, ngwa babo basotoka milawo u bayazhi u babo ba shishibi batezhi Leza umbumi bwabo. Ngwa babo batakombi, bayaya ma ushabo uma nokwabo, bayazhi,
ba shimamambe, ba shikoona u balombwana nokwabo, batewu ba bantu, babeshi u babo bapa bumboni bwa bubeshi naa babo bacita kufwumbwa cintu cikazhanya injiisho shabushomi bwini bwini.
Yezhi injiisho ya Makani Mabotu njindakapewa kuhwa kwa Leza mulemu ulimwi ulyeelele kutembaulwa.
Ndamulumba Kilisito Jeso Mwami wesu wakampa insana ukunsala kwaamba musebezele mulimo nkaambo wakambona kushomeka.
Nikuba ati limwi ndakaakumusampaula u kumupenzha u kutuka bantu ba Leza, ulimwi ndakaakuli shicisapi. Pele Leza wakamfwila luse nkaambo ndakaakuli muntu wiina ncezhi utashomi.
Inzho Mwami wesu wakamfwila luse lunji lunji ukumpa lushomo u lufwuno, shalo shiyanwa mulukamantamo u Kilisito Jeso.
Kaambo keni keni keelele kutambulwa u kushomwa nkukaka; Kilisito Jeso wakeza anshi kwiza kunununa ba shishibi, inzho ume ndime imbabaala kubisha,
pele ceci ncicakapa kwaamba Leza amfwile luse, kwaamba Kilisito Jeso ansebezhe kuba citondezho cikando ca bu shicamba ku ba shishibi bati bakamushome, kwaamba abo bakatambule bumi butamana.
Inzho ku Mwami wa shikwense, utafwi, utabonwa, Leza womwi nana, akube insana u bulemu shikwense u shikwense. Ameni.
Inzho mwanangu Timoti ndakupa malailile aza umbona mbwaakashinshimwa kale kale kukwatilizha uwe, kwaamba naa waacilila, ulakonzha kulwa inkondo imbotu.
Ukwatishe lushomo u mizeezo iluleme. Bamwi bantu bayina nibakacilila mizeezo yabo iluleme ubobo lushomo lwabo lwakaloba.
Ali baba kakuli Himeneyusi u Alekizanda, balo babo mbundakasubula indakabaaba kwa Shaatani, ceci cilabayiisha kuleka kusampaula Leza.
Ca kutaanguna ndazanda kumuzumya zumya kwaamba, mukombele bantu boonse, kukomba kwenu kube kwa kukumbilila bamwi, u kulumba Leza kucitilwe bantu boonse,
mukombele bami u beendelezhi, kwaamba tuukupona kabotu muluumuno u kupona bumi buleta bulemu kwa Leza munzhila iluleme.
Ceci ncibotu ulimwi cilamwiinina Leza mufwutuli wesu.
Leza ulazanda ati woonse muntu akanununwe ulimwi akazhibe lushinizho.
Nkaambo kuli bulyo Leza womwi, ulimwi kuli muzhiminizhi womwi uleta Leza u bantu antoomwi, wezo muntu ngu Kilisito Jeso.
Walo wakalyaaba kwaamba abafwutule boonse bantu bali ano anshi. Ceci cakaba citondezho aciindi ceelele, kwaamba Leza ulazanda kunununa bantu boonse.
Nkaambo ceci ncindakasalilwa kuba mutumwa u muiyiyi wa bantu bakunze, kukambauka Mulumbe wa lushomo u lushinizho. Nshibeyi, ndaamba meni meni!
Inzho ndazanda ati mu masena a kubunganina boonse balombwana bakomba, batambike matashi asalala mwizeulu cakutalemana nikuba kuzumanikizhanya,

abo bakaintu balyeelele kusama kabotu ca bulemu shisani sheelele, kutali kupeswa masusu munzhila yakulikolaika ciitilila, naa kusama inkaya sha goludi, nibuba bulungu budula munshingo u shisani shidula.
Bakaintu baliboshe u milimo mibotu bucita bakaintu batiya Leza.
Bakaintu baiye buliinzile cakulibozha.
Nshihuminya bakaintu kuyiisha naa kweendelezha balombwana, balyeelele kuliinza bulyo.
Nkaambo Adamu nguwakataanguna kulengwa naaya alengwe Eva.
Ulimwi tali Adamu wakacengwa, mukaintu nguwakacengwa ukuusotoka Mulawo waka Leza.
Pele mukaintu ulakafwutulwa kwiita mukuzhala bana kuti watolelela kushoma u lufwuno u busalazhi cakulibonzha.
Ngaaza makani meni meni, na muntu ulazanda kuba Bishopu wa mbungano, wezo ati wasala mulimo wa bulemu.
Musololi wambungano ulyeelele kubula kampenda, ulyeelele ati katwele mukaintu womwi bulyo, ushitikile mu mizeezo ulimwi kali shicamba ulilemeka uutambula kabotu beenzu ulimwi abe mwiiyi mubotu,
teelele kuba cakolwa naa muntu mulwati, pele ulyeelele kuba mubonhu monzo shiluumuno, teelele kuzandisha mali.
Ulyeelele kulela mukwashi wakwe kabotu ulimwi banakwe balyeelele kumuteelela u kumulemeka mu shiyanza shoonse.
Nkaambo na kuti muntu talozha kulela mukwashi wakwe kabotu, no ulakonzha kweendelezha buti imbungano ya Leza?
Teelele kuba mweenzu mu lushomo, nkaambo ulaba naalisumpula amana ulawa bwakawa Shaatani.
Ulyeelele kuba muntu ulemekwa ku bantu batali ba mu mbungano, kwaamba atakasampuki u kuwila mukooze ka Shaatani.
Ba dikoni abo umbona balyeelele kuba bantu bakwete bulemu batali ba shimukanwa ulimwi bashomeka batakolwa mukuku, naa kufwunisha mali.
Balyeele kukwatisha lushomo lwini lwini lwakazubululwa u Leza, u mizeezo iluleme.
Abataangune basunkwe, bayanwa ati bayina kampenda bapewe mulimo wabu dikoni.
Benabo balyeelele kukwata shimo shibotu ulimwi tabeelele kuba bahwizhi, balyeelele kuba bashitikile mizeezo ulimwi bashomeshi mu shintu shoonse.
Dikoni ulyeelele kwaamba katwele bulyo mukaintu womwi, ulimwi ulyeelele kweendelezha kabotu banakwe u mukowa wakwe.
Babo ba dikoni boosebeza kabotu mulimo wabo balakwata shiimo shibotu ulimwi balakonzha kwaamba cakutatiya makani a lushomo lwabo mwa Kilisito Jeso.
Nikuba ati ndakanza kwiza kumuswaya ca kufwambaana, ndamulembela malailile aza kwaamba,
na ndemuka kwiza, malailile ali mu luŋwalu lolu amuyohwe mbumweelele kulilemeka muŋanda ya Leza ili njimbungano ya Leza upona, musemu u kwatilile lushinizho.
Cini cini cakutazuluzha, aza makani maseseke a bukombi bwesu makandosha nkaambo,
Wakalibonya umubili wa buntu,
wakatondezhewa ati uliluleme u Moza,
amana wakabonwa u baanjelo.
Wakakambaukwa mashi oonse,
wakashomwa inshi yoonse mbwiibelele,
amane wakatolwa kwizeulu mu bulemu.
Moza Usalala ulacibika atuba ati ku mazuba azhiza bamwi balakaluleka lushomo lolu, balakacilila myoza ya bubeshi u kucilila injiisho sha myoza mibiyabi.
Sheshi injiisho shilayiishiwa u bashikuupaupa amenso babeshi, babo bakwete mizeezo mifwu ili ukoya yakatentwa inshimbi ipiya.
Balakasha kutwala u kulya shilyo shimwi shesho Leza nshaakalenga kwaamba bashomi babo bezhi meni meni, bakaakulya bamana kulumba Leza.
Shintu shoonse nshaakalenga Leza nshibotu, kwiina ceelele kukakwa pele shoonse shilyeelele kutambulwa u kukomba kwa kulumba Leza,
nkaambo shilasalazhiwa kwa Leza kwiita mwizwi lyakwe u kukomba.
Kuti bashoma wabapa aza malailile, ulakaba mutwanga mubotu waka Kilisito Jeso, wezo wakakomenyewa u mazwi a lushomo, iinjiisho ya lushinizho yezho njiwakacilila.
Amutukake twaano twabubeshi tukozhene u twaano twa bacembele. Amuliyiishe nubeni lwiiyo lwa bumi bwa bu Leza.
Kuzhibilizha mubili kulayohwa ashoonto, pele buna Leza bulayohwa mu shintu shoonse, nkaambo bulashomezha bumi ano mazuba ulimwi ukuciindi cizhiza.
Aza mazwi alyeelele kutambulwa u kushomwa.
Ukaambo kako tulasebezesha cini cini u kulwisha nkaambo bulanjizhi bwesu buli kwa Leza upona mufwutuli wa bantu boonse, kwaambisha babo bashoma.
Balailile u kubayiisha aza makani.
Kutabi muntu u kuubausha ati nkaambo uli mukubushi. Pele ube citondezho kuli bashoma boonse, mu kwaamba, mu kulilemeka, mu lufwuno, mu lushomo umu kusalala monzo.
Kushikila nkapiluke, usungwaale kukubala Malembe, u kukambauka ulimwi u kuyiisha.
Utacuubausha cipo cakahwa ku Moza Usalala nciwakatambula kwiita mu cishinshime lelyo bakando ba mbungano nibakakubika matashi.
Kushicita shintu sheshi shoonse ca monzo womwi, kwaamba boonse babone ati bumi bwako bwa buna Kilisito bulaya bukomena.
Ulibambe lwako umwini injiisho nshuuyiisha. Kubukwete utaleka pe, nkaambo wacita bobo ulalifwutula umwini u babo bakuteelela.
Utaakulemanina mulombwana mukando kwako, pele mwaambile ca bulemu ukoya uso. Bana bakubushi ababe ukoya banyoko,
bakaintu bacembele babe ukoya banoko abo batumwale babe ukoya banyoko umbona cakubula kampenda.
Balemeke ba mukabafwu bapenzhi bayina babayohwa.
Pele kuti mukamufwu kakwete bana naa bazhikuzhi, balyeelele bataangune baiye milimo yabushomi mu mukwashi wabo, kwaamba baliiye kuli bakabazhala, nkaambo kucita bobo ncicimwiinina Leza.
Mukamufwu mupenzhi wiina bamuyohwa ulabika bulanjizhi bwakwe kwa Leza, amana ulatolelela kumulomba Leza nshaazanda mashiku u muunza kwaamba amuyohwe.
Pele mukamufwu upona mu minzo mufwu bulanga.
Bashimwine malailile aza bamuka bafwu kwaamba batakutongaukwa.
Kufwumbwa muntu u tayohwa basazhiina, kwaambisha banina, wezo ati walukazha lushomo nkukuti ulabaala ali wezo uutashomi.
Kwiina mukamufwu uyelele kulembwa amweelwe wabamukabafwu utana kuzulizha myaka ili makumi cisambomwi yakuzhalwa. Ulimwi ulyeelele kuba mukaintu wakaakutwelwe ku mulombwana womwi,

ulyeelele kuba muntu ukwete bumi bubotu ulimwi muntu waka komenya banakwe kabotu, akuli muntu wakaaakutambula beenzu kabotu, muntu wakasebeza milimo yakuyohwa bana Kilisito, wakaakuyohwa bantu mu mapenzhaabo ulimwi muntu ucita shibotu mu shiyanza shoonse.
Utalembi ba mukabafwu bacili bashoonto a mweelwe, nkaambo balaba niba likumbuzha bamana bakuhwa kwa Kilisito u kuya kutwalwa ulimwi.
Bamana balayana mulandu wakusotoka Cipangano cabo citaanzhi u Kilisito.
Ulimwi balaba bakata balaakusowa ciindi cabo kuya bweenda mu milyango ya bantu, pele kubaazha awo balaba bahwizhi bapilinganya maanda a bantu u kwaamba shintu nshibateelele kwaamba.
Ubobo cili kabotu kwaamba baba ba mukabafwu bacili bashoonto batwalwe ulimwi, bazhale bana ukulela mikwashi yabo kwaamba shinkondonokwesu abule ciindi caku twaambila shintu shibiyabi.
Nkaambo bamwi ba mukabafwu bakasanduka kale balacilila Shaatani.
Pele kuti kuli mukaintu mukilisito ukwete ba mukabafwu basazhiina ulyeelele kubalela kabotu. Imbungano itakwati mukuli, iyohwe bulyo ba mukabafwu bapenzhi.
Basololi bacita kabotu milimo yabusololi, balyeelele kupa bulemu bubaala kwaambisha babo basebezesha cini cini babo basebeza u kuyiisha u kukambauka.
Nkaambo Malembe alaamba ati, “Utamwaanga kozongo musune ciindi nimukwela nshimwatebula,” ulimwi ukuti, “Basebezhi balyeelele kuhola cakuhola cabo.”
Utamuteeleli u leta nkaambo kakutamikizha musololi wambungano cita kakwete bakamboni bobile na botatwe.
Babo babisha, balyeelele kulemaninwa kaanzambwene mubuleya kwaamba boonse batiile ngawo.
Umbushu bwa Leza u Kilisito Jeso u baanjelo basalala, ndamulombesha kwaamba mwaacilile aza malailile cakutasalulula, utabi nuhuna umwi ukubishizha umwi.
Utaakubinda kubaampa matashi bantu a mitwi mbuupa milimo ya Leza. Ulimwi utahumina kusofwaazhiwa ku shibi shabamwi, ulibambe cakubula butongo.
Utaakunwa meenzhi bulyo, kunwa utu waini tushoonto tuukuyohwa mwifwu nkaambo ulasata sata.
Shibi shabantu bamwi shilalibonya antangalala shamana shilabasololela kuya kulubeta, pele shibi shabamwi shilalibonya kwaita ciindi.
Umbona bobo u milimo mibotu ilalibonya nikuba ati iina kulibonya kufwambaana, pele teekonzha kusesekwa pe.
Boonse bazhice balyeelele kupa bulemu buzwile bashimatwaanga abo kwaamba bantu batalisampauli izhina lya Leza u nshituyiisha.

Abo bazhice bakwete bashimatwanga babo ba shoma umbona tabeelele kucesha bulemu nkubabele nkaambo mbanyokwabo mu Mwami. Mu lushinizho balyeelele kubasebezela kabotu sha kaambo milimo yabo mbulumbu bwa babo bashomi mbubafwini.
Amuyiishe u kukambauka aza makani.
Kufwumbwa u yiisha injiisho ili bunji iiteendelana u mazwi a lushinizho a Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito injiisho ya bumi bupa bulemu Leza,

ati wezo ulizwile kulisumpula amana wiina nceezhi. Ulikwete cisushi citali ca bumi bubotu cakukazha u kuzwanaganina mazwi, camana ceci cilaleta bulyo munyono, kuzwangana, matushi u manzeezela a bubiyabi,
u kukazhanya kutatanana kuhwa ku bantu bali bongo butasebezi kabotu ulimwi bayina lushinizho. Balo bazunga ati kupaila Leza inzhila ya kuhuba.
Cilishinizhe kwaamba ati kukomba Leza kulatupa kuhuba kuti katulamwa shesho nshitukwete kale.
Nkaambo kwiina ncitwakaletelela ano anshi, ubobo kwiina ncitukonzha kutolelela kuhwa ano anshi.
Inzho kuti katukwete sha kulya u shakusama, ati twazulizha.
Babo bali shisushi shakuhuba balatepaulwa uku kwashiwa mukooze ka shisushi shibiyabi shinji shinji shabulimbushi, shalo shibakwelelezha ku kuzonauka u kufwa.
Nkaambo kufwuna mali ngu makancilo a shibi shoonse. Bamwi bakafwunisha kukwata mali cakuti bakaingaila, bakakuhwa kulushinizho, bamana myonzo yabo yakacoka kumause manji manji.
Pele uwe, umuntu waka Leza, shisosoloke sheshi shoonse. Lwila bulyo busalazhi, buna Leza, lushomo, lufwuno u kukwatisha umbubonhwu.
Mucisobano calubilo lwalushomo lukance ngoona nguuyela kwaamba uliyanine bumi butamana, nkaambo nkukubumi bobu nkuwaketilwa niwakatambula lushomo cakukushizha akati ka bakamboni banji banji.
Umbushu bwa Leza upa bumi ku shintu shoonse shipona, ulimwi u mbushu bwaka Kilisito Jeso walo wakapa bumboni bubotu kwa Pontiyasi Pilato ndakushimwina ati
ubambe malailile ako oonse kushicila mubuzuba naakaazhoka Mwami Jeso Kilisito.
Leza wezo uyelele kutembaulwa, ulelekelwe ulimwi muleli womwi, musolozhi wabasolozhi, mwami wabami ulakacita ati Kilisito akazhoke aciindi ceelele.
Ice wezo nguutafwi, ulapona u mumuni mwiina ukonzha kuswena. Kwiina naaba womwi wakamubona. Ukwakwe akube bulemu iinsana shikwense u shikwense! Ameni.
Balailile babo bafwuwile mu shintu sha bumi bobu kwaamba batalisumpula na kubika lushomo mulubono lwalo lutabwenwe unkuluya, pele ababike lushomo mwa Leza utupa shintu shibosha bumi bwesu.
Balailile ati baakucita kabotu, kwaamba babe bahubi u milimo mibotu, ulimwi babe baabi balibambile kwaabana u bamwi.
Munzhila yezhi balalizobolela lubono lwalo lukaba intalisho inzumu ya bumi buli kumbele. Ee bayane bumi butewa ati bumi bwa lushinizho.
Timoti shibambe kabotu nshiwakapewa kweembela. Itantamuke mibandi italeti bulemu kwa Leza u kukazhanya kwabulimbushi kwalo bamwi nkubalubizha mukuzunga ati nduzhibo.
Nkaambo imbabo baamba ati balilukwete luhibo, ukaambo kabobo beesowa inzhila ya lushomo.
Luse lwa Leza nalube amwe noonse.
Ndime Paulu, mutumwa waka Kilisito Jeso, wakatumwa kukambauka bumi bwakashomezhewa mbutukwete mukukamantana u Kilisito Jeso.
Leza Taata u Kilisito Jeso mwami wesu bakufwile luzhalo u luse ukupa luumuno.
Ndapa kulumba kwa Leza walo ngwinsebezela ca monzo ushitikile usalala, umbona bwakacita ba shaakale bangu. Ndamulumba lyoonse ninkutelaika mu kukomba u mipailo yangu mashiku u muunza.
Ndeezhibaluka misozhi yako ulimwi ndazandisha ati tukabonane aze kwaamba nkaininwe cabulowe.
Ndaluzhibaluka lushomo lwabwini nduukwete, ndashoma ati ulikwete lushomo ndwaakaakukwete nkaakaako Loyisi u banoko Yunisi.
Ubobo ndakuzhibalusha kwaamba ubike maanu kucipo cakakupa Leza indakakwaampa matashi cihwilime ukoya mulilo.
Nkaambo Moza ngwaakatupa Leza tootupi bukandu, pele wezu Moza Leza ulatupa insana, lufwuno u kulikwata.
Utaakufwa insoni kuba kamboni wa Mwami wesu na kufwa insoni ukaambo kangu ndimwaange wakwe Kilisito. Inzho atupenge aze ukaambo ka Makani Mabotu kwiita munsana sha Leza.

Wakatufwutula amane watwita kwaamba tube bakwe, kutali ukaambo ka shintu nshitwakacita, pele nkaambo kamuzeezo wakwe u luse lwakwe. Wakatupa lolu luzhalo kwiita mu lukamantano u Mwami kaatana kushika malenjelo anshi,
pele ninzho twazubululilwa kwiza kwa Mufwutuli wesu Kilisito Jeso. Wakashimana insana sha lufwu ulimwi kwiita mu Makani Mabotu twakazubululilwa bumi butamana.

nciceco ncimpengela bolya. Pele ncikwete lushomo luzwile nkaambo ndimwizhi ngundakashoma, ubobo nshifwi insoni nkaambo ndishinizhe kwaamba uleembela ncindakapewa kushicila mu buzuba bobo nakaazhoka Kilisito.
Akwatishe mazwi a lushinizho ngu ndakakuyiisha kwaamba ube cikozhano nguuyelele kucilila, ulimwi kakatila kuba mu lushomo u lufwuno luli mwa Kilisito Jeso.
Kwiita munsana sha Moza Usalala, walo upona mulyuuswe, shibambe shintu shibotu nshiwakapewa.
Ulizhi kale ati boonse bali mu Ezha bakanshiya, kubicilizha u Figelusi u Hemogenesi.
Mwami abafwile luse ba mukwashi waka Onesifolasi, nkaambo mu shiindi shinji shinji nguumanya bwiimbi. Wiina kufwa insoni ukaambo kakuti ndakaakuli muntolongo,
pele mbwaakashicila bulyo mu Loma, wakankapula kushicila wakanjana.
Mwami akamupe luse mu buzuba bolya! Ulizhi kabotu nshaakancitila mu Efeso.
Uwe mwanangu zuma kwiita mu luse lwesu luli mu lukamantano u Kilisito Jeso.
Bweza injiisho njiwakanteelela ndayiisha umbushu bwaba kamboni banji banji u kwiipa ku bantu bashomeka bakaakonzha kuyiisha bamwi.
Penga aswe ukoya shikalumamba ushomeka waka Kilisito Jeso.
Shikalumamba uli amulimo ulazanda kubotezha shikalumamba umweendelezha ubobo tahwelani mu bumi bwa bantu batali bashikalumamba.
Aze shilubilo takonzha kutambula mushini wakuzunda kuti teecilila milawo yalubilo.
Mulimi wasebeza ca nsana nguuyelele kutambula mwaabanino wakutaanguna.
Kushitelaika nshiŋamba nkaambo Mwami Jeso ulakakucita kwaamba ushiteelele shoonse.
Muzhibaluke Jeso Kilisito wakabushiwa kuhwa ku bafwu, walo waakuli wa luhubo lwaka Devidi mbuli buyiisha Makani Mabotu ngunkambauka.
Ukaambo kakuti ndakambauka Makani Mabotu, ndapenga ulimwi ndaangwa maceetani ukoya mutewu. Pele izwi lya Leza talili mu nceetani,
ubobo ndatolelela mu shintu shoonse ukaambo kabasale baka Leza, kwaamba abo bakayane lufwutuko kwiita mwa Kilisito Jeso u bulemu butamana.
Nkukaka kaambyo ka lushinizho:
Kuti naa twafwa aze,
tulakapona aze.
tulakalela aze.
Kuti twamukaka,
aze ulakatukaka.
Naa tatushomeki,
walo ulashomeka,
nkaambo takonzha kulicenga.
Bazhibalushe aza makani bantu bako, ulimwi ubacenjezhe cakushinizha umbushu bwa Leza kutazwanganina mazwi. Ciina u bubotu mbucileta, cilaleta bulyo luzonauko kuli babo bateelela.
Amusolekeshe kwiza ku bushu bwa Leza, ukoya musebezhi utafwi insoni kumulimo wakwe, wezo uyisha bululeme Mulumbe walushinizho lwa Leza.
Sesuluka u kwaamba shabulyo, umisalo ya bulimbushi, shalo shitantamuna bantu kwa Leza.
Injiisho shili bolya shili ukoya cilonda cilashi calo cilya buzani. Bantu bobile bakayiisha aza makani mbuba Himenyeusi u Filetasi.
Bakeeshiya inzhila ya lushinizho ulimwi balaya busandula lushomo lwababo bashoma bamwi, u kuya buyiisha ati bubuke bwesu bwakaita kale.

Pele intalisho njaakashimpa Leza teekonzha kuzungaanyiwa, nkaambo awo ngoona alilembelwe mazwi aamba ati, “Mwami ulibezhi bakwe,” ulimwi, ukuti, “Babo baamba ati mbana Leza balyeelele kuleka kucita shibiyabi.”
Mumaanda makando mulikwete mitiba iyandeene andeene, imwi nja goludi u siliva, imwi nja shisamu u bulongo, imwi nja mu shiindi sheelele, imwi nja kusebezha kufwumbwa ciindi.
Kuti muntu walisalazha amana waleka shintu shitaluleme, ulaba ukoya cisebezho ca ciindi ceelele nkaambo balilyaabile kusebezhewa u Mwami ku milimo mibotu.
Shisosoloke shisushi sha bukubushi, lwila bulyo bululami, u lushomo u lufwuno u luumuno antoomwi u babo bali myonzo iisweya bazanda luyohwo ku Mwami.
Sesuluka mukukazhanya kwabulimbushi u kubula luzhibo nkaambo ulizhi ati sheshi shilaleta bulyo mazwanga.
Mbuuli muzhice wa Mwami tweelele kuzwangana. Ulyeelele ukwata monzo umbotu ku bantu boonse, ube mwiiyi umbotu shicamba.
Ube mubonhu monzo ciindi nubacindulula bakukazha, nkaambo Leza ulakonzha kubapa ciindi cakuleka kucita shibi kwaamba bazhibe lushinizho.
Lelyo nibakaazhinzhibukwa bakayokoke ukooze ka mubiyabi, walo wakabakwasha ukubacita ati bacilile luzando lwakwe.
Kuzhibaluka ati ku mazuba a mamanino kulakaba shiindi shikatazha.
Bantu balakaba bashikalifwune, balyato, bashikulisumpula, bashikulipa, bashimatushi, ubatalemeka bakwabo, batalumba ulimwi batasalali.
Bantu balakabula lufwuno, bayazhi batalekelela, balwati bazoosha, batabuzanda bubotu,
Balakaba bashilwaanu anu, bantu bayina makani, bashikulisumpula ubazanda kuliboshezha beni kutali Leza.
Balakaba ukoya bakombi pele insana shabukombi balashikazha. Baba bali bolya kubasesuluka bali bobo.
Bamwi balanjilila mu maanda a bakaintu ukuboongelezha babo bapengele ukaambo ka shibi shabo beendelezhewa u shisushi sha andeene andeene,
nikuba ati balayiishiwa lyoonse tabakonzha kubuzhiba lushinizho.
Umbona ba Janesi u Jambulesi mbubakamukazha Mozesi mbubona baba bantu mbubakazha shalushinizho. Mbantu bakwete mizeezo mibiyabi ulimwi lushomo lwabo ndwakuupaupa amenso.
Pele bayina nkubaya, nkaambo boonse bantu balakabubona bulimbushi bwabo umbona mbubakabonwa ba Janesi u Jambulesi.
Inzho uwe ulishizhi kabotu injiisho shangu ubweende bwangu, makanze angu, u lufwuno lwangu u lushomo lwangu u lukakatilo lwangu
u mapenzhi angu u makatazho angu. Mulishizhi shintu shakancitikila ku Antiyoki, ku Ikoniyamu uku Lisitila. Ndakapenga cini cini pele Mwami wakanhuna muli sheshi shoonse.
Lushinizho ndwakuti kufwumbwa uzanda kupona bumi bwa bu Leza mwa Kilisito Jeso ulakapenzhewa,
lyalo lelyo babo ba shishibi uba shimatunta nibakaakuhwa kububi kuya kububiyabisha kuya bucenga u kuya bucengwa lwabo beni.
Pele umwe kamubukwete kuya bushoma lushinizho ndumwakayiishiwa u kushoma cini cini, amana mulibezhi baka muyiisha,
ulimwi mulazhibaluka ati kuhwa kubwana bwenu mwakaakweezhi Maŋwalu Asalala, alo akonzha kumupa busongo butola ku lufwutuko kwiita mu kushoma Kilisito Jeso.
Oonse aza Malembe asalala akazozelwa kwa Leza ulimwi alikwete mulimo wa kuyiisha lushinizho, kulemanina walubizha, u koolola muntu u kuyiisha bululami,
kwaamba muntu usebeza mulimo waka Leza ayelele u kuzulila cini cini kucita milimo yoonse mibotu.
Ku bushu bwa Leza ubwa Kilisito Jeso, uukaabeteka bapona u bafwile, ulimwi ukuti ulakeza ulimwi kulela ukoya Mwami, ndamupa aza malailile,

akuti mukambauke Mulumbe, amulibambile kukambauka mulumbe ciindi bantu nibazanda kuteelela, niciba ciindi ncibatazanda kuteelela. Mubalamike u kubalemanina u kubazumya zumya mbuli mbumuyiisha ca bushicamba.
Cilakashika ciindi bantu nibakakaleka kuteelele injiisho shalushinizho u kucilila bulyo shisushi shabo ulimwi balakaakulanga ba maayi banji banji bakaabashimwina shesho nshibazanda kuteelela.
Balakakaka kuteelela lushinizho u kuteelela bulyo twaano. Balakashifwutamina injiisho shabwini u kucilila twaano twabulyo.
Pele uwe ulyeelele kulikasha munzhila shoonse, humina kupenga, cita mulimo wa bukambaushi bwa Makani Mabotu ulimwi usebeze milimo yako yoonse ukoya mutwanga waka Leza.
Inzho ume lwangu ciindi cashika cakupewa ukoya cipo cakunwa citilwa a cipaililo, cashika ciindi cakubushiya bono bumi.
Ndakalwa inkondo imbotu, ndamaninzha bukulo bwa lubilo lwangu, ndazuzucizha lushomo.

Inzho ndalindila bulyo bulumbu bwakuzunda ubwa kululamikwa kwa Leza, bwalo bobo Mwami Leza mubeteshi usalala mbwaakaampa mu buzuba bobo, ulimwi kutali ume bulyo, u babo boonse bamulindila ca lufwuno kwaamba abulike.
Soleka kufwambaana kwiza kwangu.
Dimasi wakandoboka ukaambo kakufwuna sha anshi wakanshiya waya ku Tesolonika. Aze Kilisensi wakaya ku Galatiya, Taitasi wakaya ku Dalimatiya.
Tulisheele bulyo u Luka. Umuletelele Maako nkaambo ulakonzha kunjohwa u mulimo wezu.
Ndakamutuma Taikikasi ku Efeso.
Wakazhiza ukandetele icanshi ndindakashiya, kwa Kapasi ku Tulowasi antoomwi u mabuka angu. Kwaambisha azo a shikanda.
Mucenjele nkaambo wakookazha ca nsana mulumbe wesu kaanzambwene.
Kulweendo lutaanzhi kwiina ngutwakazhima aze mulubeta ndakalihuna ndimwini boonse bakanshiya ice. Leza atabapi mulandu.
Pele Mwami Leza twakaakuli aze ulimwi wakampa insana cakuti ndakacikonzha kukanana mulumbe buzulile, bantu bakunze boonse bakooteelela, ulimwi ndakahunwa kuhwa kumulandu wa lufwu.
Ulimwi Mwami ulakanununa kuhwa ku bubiyabi boonse u kuya kunshisha kabotu ku bwami bwakwe bwa kwizeulu. Ukwakwe Leza akube bulemu shikwense u shikwense! Ameni.
Elastitasi wakakala ku Kolinto aze Tulofimasi ndakamushiya ku Miletasi nkaambo kali mulwazhi.
Fwaambaana kwiza kono kootana kushika mweto. Bakwaanzha ba Yubulusi, Pudenisi, Linasi u Kulodiya ubamwi Bakilisito boonse bakwaanzha.
Mwami naabe aze. Luse lwa Leza lube amwe noonse koko.
Ndime Paulu musebezhi waka Leza mutumwa waka Jeso Kilisito. Ndakasalilwa kuzumya lushomo lwabasale baka Leza ukubasolelela mu lushinizho lweelele kubatola ku bumi bubotezha Leza.
Ceci cili abulanjizhi bwa bumi butamana bobo mbwaakashomezha kale-kale Leza uutabeyi.
Ubobo muciindi ceelele waka cizubulula ceci cishomezho mu mazwi akwe. Inzho ume ndakambauka aza mazwi mbuli mbundakatumwa u kulaililwa kwa Leza Mufwutuli wesu.
Leza Taata u Kilisito Jeso Mufwutuli wesu bakufwile luse u kukupa luumuno.
Ndakakushiya ku Kiliti kwaamba ubambulule shoonse shitali kabotu u kusala bakando ba shikombelo u minzhi yoonse mbubona mbundakakulailila.
Mukando wambungano abe muntu wiina kampenda, utwele mukaintu womwi bulyo. Banakwe baakuli bashomi, batali balwati na bapapyu.
Mweendelezhi mbwaali mubanzhi wa Leza, ulyeelele kubula kampenda. Teelele kuba shilusunsu na ufwambaana kulemana, teelele kuba cakolwa, na shimanyongwe, naa kuzandisha impindu.
Ulyeelele kuba muntu utacimwa beenzu, uzandisha kucita shibotu, ushicamba, ululeme, usalala, shikulikwata.
Ulyeelele kwaakwatisha cini cini makani a lushinizho mbubona mbuli mbwiibele injiisho, kwaamba acikonzhe kupa malaile a luleme u kwaamba akonzhe kubazunda babo bashikazha.
Nkaambo nkubali bantu banji banji bayina bubule, u baamba mazwi a bulyo alucengo, kwaambisha ba Juda babo basanduka kuba Bakilisito.
Kukambauka kwa baba bantu kulyeelele kuleshewa, nkaambo balanyonganya mikwashi kwiita mu kuyiisha injiisho shakuzanda kuhubila ngawo.
Umwi mushinshimi wabo beni wakaamba ati, “Bakiliti lyoonse mbabeshi, mbabiyabi ukoya banyama, mbakata ulimwi mbalyato.”
Azo makani meni meni. Ubobo ubatapatile ca nsana kwaamba bazume mu lushomo,
kutali bulyo kuteelela twaano u tunshiyanshiya twaba Juda u milawo ya bantu bakaka sha lushinizho.
Ku basalali shoonse shintu shilasalala, pele ku bantu basofweele batashomi, kwiina cintu cisalala niciba comwi pe, nkaambo mizeezo yabo u manjezheezha abo alisofweele.
Balaamba ati balimwizhi Leza bamana balamutama kwiita u milimo yabo. Mbantu basesemya, batateeleli, batalozha kucita milimo mibotu niiba buti.
Pele uwe ulyeelele kuyiisha injiisho ya lushinizho iluleme.
Kubalailila bakando kwaamba babe bantu bashitikile, balikwata ulimwi babe bantu baluleme mu lushomo u mu lufwuno u mulukakatilo.
Abo bacembele mbubona bakwate bumi bubotezha Leza bwa bulemu, bataakutamikizhanya, ulimwi batabi bazhice kuli shikola. Pele balyeelele bulyo kuyiisha shiluleme,
kwaamba ba bayiishe bakaintu bacili bana kufwuna balumyaabo u kufwuna banabo,
balikwate ku shintu shoonse u kusalala, kwaamba ati baakusebeza kabotu umaanda abo, baakusamauka u kuteelela balumyaabo kwaamba ati makani a Leza atasampaulwa.
Abo balombwana bacili bana babulwe mbubona kwaamba babe bantu batelekele.
Litondezhe kuba muntu ucita milimo mibotu, ubobo mu kuyiisha kwako kutondezha bululami u bulemu.
Ulyeelele kwaamba mazwi mabotu ayina butongo kwaamba wezo u kukazha ause insoni, abule u bubiyabi mbwaakonzha kutwaamba.
Ulimwi balaililishe babo bazhice kwaamba baakulibonzha kuli bashimatwangaabo mu shintu shoonse, tabeelele kulondolola
nikuba kwiba pele balyeelele kushomeka mu shintu shoonse, ulimwi bashilemeke injiisho sha Leza Mufwutuli wesu.
Nkaambo Leza wakaluzubulula luse lwakwe kwaamba bantu boonse bafwutulwe.
Mu luse lwakwe ulatuyiisha kuleka kupona bumi butabotezha Leza, kwaamba tukwate bumi bwa bushicamba, bululeme bubotezha Leza ano anshi.
Nkaambo tulalangila buzuba bulonjezhe, lelyo nibukaazubululwa bulemu bwa Leza mukando u Mufwutuli wesu Jeso Kilisito.
Walo wakalyaaba kwaamba atununune ku bubiyabi boonse u kutusalazha kwaamba tube bantu bakwe bazanda kucita milimo mibotu.
Sheshi nshuuyelele ku bayiisha u kubazumya zumya u kubalemanina. Kutabi muntu ukunyansha pe.
Kubazhibalusha bantu bako kwaamba baakulibonzha ku beendelezhi u basololi. Kabateelela u kucita milimo yoonse kabotu kabotu.
Kutabi muntu ngu basampaula pe, ulimwi bataakuzwangana. Balyeelele kulibonzha u kulemeka bantu boonse.
Nkaambo aswe kale kale katuli balimbushi batateeleli bazhiminine. Katuli bazhice bamicito yaandeene andeene. Twakaakukala mu shibi shili ukoya shamunyono. Bantu kabatatufwini aswe twakaakubaswile.
Pele ciindi bubotu u lufwuno lwa Leza Mufwutuli wesu nishakazubululwa,
wakatufwutula. Takatufwutulile ukaambo ka milimo iluleme njitwakacita pe, pele ukaambo ka luse lwakwe kwiita mu Moza Usalala. Watupa buzhalwe bupiya u bumi bupiya kwiita mukutusanzha.
Kwiita mwa Jeso Kilisito Mufwutuli wesu Leza wakatupesha Moza Usalala.
Wakashicita sheshi kwaamba tululamikwe ku bushu bwa Leza mu luse lwakwe ulimwi tukabubone bumi butamana mbutulanjila.
Aza mazwi meni meni.
Ndazanda ati sheshi shintu ushaambe bweelele kwaamba bamushoma Leza balyaabe kucita shibotu shikwete impindu u shakuyohwa bantu boonse.
Pele kushikaka inkazhanyo shabulimbushi u twaambo twakubala mazhalane, u kuzwangana, u kulwila twaambo twa Milawo kaambo sheshi tashiyohwa ulimwi nshabulyo.
Muntu u leta lwaandaano akati kenu umucenjezhe shiindi shobile, naa tateeleli, mufwutamine.
Ulizhi ati muntu uli bobo ulipotene, mbu bashishibi, ubobo balalizula beni.
Ufwambaane kubayohwa ba Zenasi shimulawo u Apolosi mulweendo lwabo, ubone ati kwiina ncibabula.
Bantu besu balyeelele kwiiya kulyaaba ku milimo mibotu, kwaamba bacikonzhe kuyohwa awo a zandika luyohwo kwaamba batabi bantu bayina impindu.
Bakwaanzha boonse mbutuli abo. Ubaanzhe babo batuzanda mu lushomo.
Luse lwa Leza alube amwe noonse.
Ndime Paulu uli muntolongo ukaambo kakusebezela Kilisito Jeso, tuli antoomwi u Timoti mukwesu. Twakulembela mukwesu Filimoni uwe umufwunwa ulimwi musebezhi nokwesu,
u mukwesu Afiya u Akipasi shikalumamba nokwesu mwa Kilisito antoomwi imbungano iswaangana muŋanda yako.
Leza Taata u Jeso Kilisito Mwami wesu bamufwile luse u kumupa luumuno.
Ndamulumba Leza wangu ciindi coonse niinkutelaika mu kukomba kwangu,
nkaambo nditeelele ati ulashoma Mwami Jeso ulimwi ulifwini bantu baleza boonse.
Ndalomba ati ulyaabe mukwaabanya lushomo lwako, kwaamba ukashizhibishe shibotu shoonse nshitukwete mu lukamantano u Kilisito.
Lufwuno lwako mukwesu lwampa lutangalo ulimwi lwanzumya zumya cini cini kaambo weebukulusha myonzo ya bantu baleza.
Nikuba bobo ndikwete insana sha kukulailila nshuuyelele kucita mwa Kilisito.
Pele ukaambo kalufwuno, ndakulomba ume ndi Paulu nikuba kuti ndacembala, ulimwi ucaninzho ndyaanjilwe ukaambo kakusebezela Kilisito Jeso.
Ubobo ndakulomba kuzhiminina Onesimasi wezo wakaba mwanangu mwa Kilisito ciindi indaakuli muntolongo.
Ku ciindi cakaita kaina mulimo kwako, pele ninzho ulakonzha kutuyohwa uswe toonse tobile.
Inzho nguwezo ndamupilusha kwako ukoya ndatumya monzo wangu woonse.
Ndaakuzanda ati a kucishite kono kwaamba anjohwe mulimo mu busena bwako ciindi nincili muntolongo ukaambo ka kukambauka Makani Mabotu.
Nikuba bobo nshizanda kukushinicizha kwaamba unjohwe, pele ndazanda ati ulihuminine umukamwini.
Ambweni ncimwakaandaanina u Onesimasi kwa ciindi cishoonto, kwaamba apiluka mukakale antoomwi shikwense.
Inzho atabi ukoya muzhice bulyo, pele mucite ukoya munyoko nakufwunwa mulukamantano u Kilisito. Ume ndimufwini aze ulyeelele kumufwunisha nkaambo muntu noko ulimwi mushomi noko.
Na ulinzhi ati ume ndi musebezhi noko, umutambule ukoya mbuukonzha kuntambula ame.
Na kuli cibiyabi ncaakakucitila, nicikaba cikwelete, wezo mulandu noobe wangu.
Ume ndimwini ndi Paulu ndalemba luŋwalu lolu iitashi lyangu kwaamba ati ndakakuliya mali. Utaluba ati inzho ndikwete cikwelete kwako, pele cikwelete cako kwangu cilabaala nkaambo mbumi bwako boonse.
Ee mukwesu, ndalomba unjohwe ukaambo ka Mwami. Nkalika monzo ukoya munyoko mwa Kilisito.
Nkaambo ndikwizhi mbuubele, nshizuluzha mukulemba kwangu, ndizhi kwaamba ulakacicita ncindakulomba ukwiitilizha.
Cimwi cintu nciŋamba ncakuti umambile busena bwakoona, kaambo ndashoma ati kwiita mu kukomba kwenu, Leza ulakandeta koko.
U Maako musebezhima, kubicilizha uba Alisityakosi u Dimasi u Luka abo bamwaanzha.
Inzho luse lwa Mwami Jeso Kilisito alube amwe noonse.
Kale kale Leza wakaakukanana u ba shaakale besu munzhila shinji shinji ulimwi shishiyene shiyene kwiita mu bashinshimi,
pele ku mazuba ano aku mamanino ulakanana aswe kwiita mu Mwanakwe wezo ngwaakabika ati abe shimulyazhina, ukaakona shintu shoonse nshaakalenga kwiita mwakwe.
