Walo nci cimbonimboni ncitubonena bulemu bwa Leza, ulimwi ncinkozha cakwe Leza mbwaabele. Ngu shikukwabilila luundu loonse u mazwi akwe ansana. Naakamana kusalazha bantu kuhwa ku shibi shabo, wakaya kukala kwizeulu kwitashi lya cilyo lya Leza mulemu.
Leza wakacita Mwanakwe kwaamba abe mukando ku baanjelo mbubona izhina lyakwe mbulili ikando kubaala baanjelo.
Ngu anjelo nzhi Leza ngwakaambila ati,
“Uli Mwanangu, bwasunu ndakuzhala?”
Ulimwi sa Leza kuli naakaambila anjelo ati,
“Ume ndakuzhala, uwe waba mwanangu?”
“Boonse baanjelo baleza balyeelele kumukomba.”
“Ulacita baanjelo bakwe kwaamba baunge ukoya muuwo,
ubasebezhi bakwe kuhwilima ukoya mulilo.”
“Cuuna ca bwami bwako U Leza, mbwashikwense ushikwense.”
“Mubulelo bwako ulabeteka cabululami.
Uwe ulifwini bululami, tuzanda shitaluleme.
Ubobo Leza wako wakakunanika mafwuta a lutangalo ulimwi waakupa mafwuta a kubotelwa kubaala beenzhinoko boonse.”
“Uwe, Mwami ku makancilo ndiwe uwakalenga inshi.
Wakapanga izeulu u matashi ako.
Shilakamana pele uwe ulaakuliko.
Shilakakulumpana shikazapauke ukoya shisani.
Izeulu iinshi ulaashihunga ukoya cakusama.
Shilakahungana ukoya shisani.
Pele uwe ulaakuli mbubona lyoonse.
U mazuba ako taamana.”
“Kala kwitashi lyangu lya cilyo,
kushicila ciindi ninkaacita ba shinkondonoko kwaamba babe cilyatilo ca matende ako?”
Sa baanjelo teeli myoza yakatumwa kusebezela babo bakaatambula lufwutuko?
Inzho nciceco ncitweelele kupupulalisha ku makani ngutwakateelela, kwaamba tutaasanicizha.
Nkaamba mazwi azo Leza ngakaambila ba shaakale besu kwiita mu baanjelo akalibonya ati kaali a lushinizho, u babo boonse batakaateelela ukwaahumina bakapewa cisubulo cibeelele.

Nkaambo kuti katutabiki maanu ku lufwutuko lukando luli bolya, no tulakonzha buti kucileya cibebyo? Leza mwini nguwakataanguna kwaambilizha lufwutuko, inzho babo bakamuteelela cakaba citondezho kulyuuswe kwaamba tuzhibe ati aza ingawo makani ngakaamba.
Ulimwi ku ciindi ceco ncicona, Leza wakazunjila bumboni bwabo, mukucita shitondezho u shintu shizoosha u maleele, u shipo sha Moza Usalala mu luzando lwakwe.
Nkaambo takuli kunshi lya baanjelo Leza nkwaakabika bulelo bobo mbutwaamba bupiya buzhiza bwa bantu bakwe.
Pele mbubona mbukulembelwe mu maŋwalu ati,
“Anu muntu ncinzhi kwako,
ngwanzhi nguukwabilila muntu bulyo?
Nikuba kwaamba wakamucesha kubaala baanjelo kwa ciindi cishoonto bulyo,
pele inzho wamupa bulemu u bwami
kwaamba asheendelezhe shintu shoonse.”
Inzho Leza mbwakabika shintu shoonse anshi lya muntu, nkukuti kwiina niciba comwi citali mubulelo bobo. Pele nikuba bobo shintu shoonse tashili mubulelo bwakwe.

Pele tulabona Jeso wezo kwa ciindi cishoonto wakaakukwete cimo cili anshi kubaala caba anjelo, kwaamba mu luse lwa Leza afwile bantu boonse. Inzho wapewa mushini umweka wa bulemu bwa Leza nkaambo kepenzhi lyakwe lyakufwa.
Kacili ceelelo kwaamba Leza wakalenga u kukwabilila shintu shoonse, amululamike Jeso, makancilo a lufwutuko kwiita mu mapenzhi kwaamba alete bana banji banji, aabane abo bulemu bwa Leza.
Nkaambo wezo usalazha bantu kuhwa mu shibi shabo, u babo basalazhiwa balahwa kuntu komwi. Nciceco Jeso ncatausa insoni kubeta ati mbamumukwashi wakwe.
Ulaamba ati,
“Ndakaambilizha izhina lyako ku bakwesu,
ndakakutembaula akati ka mbungano.”
“Ndili ano, u bana mbaakampa Leza.”
Inzho bana mbubali bakumubili, u Jeso wakaba muntu ukoya mbubabele. Wakacita bobo kwaamba ati, kwiita mu lufwu lwakwe akamuzonaune Shaatani uukwete insana sha lufwu.
Mukucita bobo wakabalubula boonse babo bakaakuli bazhice mu bumi bwabo nkaambo kakutiya lufwu.
Nkaambo cilalibonya atuba kwaamba ati tabali baanjelo mbaakezhila kuyohwa, pele wakeza kuyohwa banakwe Abulahamu.
Ceci cilapandulula ati, wakakozhana u banina mu shiyanza shoonse, kwaamba ati abe Mupaizhi Mukando shiluse, uu manina milimo Leza cakushomeka, kwaamba shibi shabantu shilecelelwe.
Ubobo ulakonzha kubayohwa babo basukushiwa, kaambo aze mwini lwakwe wakasukushiwa ulimwi wakapenga.
Inzho umwe nubakwesu basalala numwaabana bwite bwa kwizeulu, amutweluke sha Jeso mutumwa ulimwi Mupaizhi Mukando ngutushoma.
Wakashomeka kwa Leza wakamusala, umbona Mozesi mbwaakashomeka muŋanda ya Leza yoonse.
Muntu uzaka iŋanda ulalemekwa kubaala iŋanda. Umbona bobo, Jeso ulalemekwa kubaala Mozesi.
Nkaambo iŋanda yoonse ilikwete wakeezaka, pele Leza ngumuzashi wa shintu shoonse.
Kwiingaina umutwanga mbwaayelele kuba, Mozesi wakaakushomeka ku bantu ba muŋanda ya Leza. Ulimwi wakapa bumboni ku shintu shesho Leza nshaakaakuzanda kwaamba kumbele a mazuba.
Pele Kilisito mbwaali mwana wa muŋanda, uleendelezha ba muŋanda ya Leza boonse cakushomeka. Uswe tuli iŋanda yakwe kuti twatolelela kukwatisha mubulanjizhi mbutulyeensheensha cakutazungaana.
“Na mwateelela izwi lya Leza bwasunu,
mutazumya myonzo, ukoya muciindi cakupapa, mu buzuba bwakusunkwa mulukula.
Momo ba shaakale benu bakansukusha,
nikuba kuti bakabona shesho nshindakabacitila kumyaka iili makumi one.
Ubobo ndakalilemanina leli izhalane u kwaamba ati,
‘Lyoonse mbantu bazhiminine mu myonzo yabo,
ulimwi tabashizhi inzhila shangu.’
Ndakalemana ukupinga ati,
‘Kwiina nibaya kunjila mukulyoocezha kwangu.’ ”
Bakwesu amulanjishe kwaamba kutabi ukwete monzo mubiyabi wakutashoma, kwaamba amuzandule kuhwa kwa Leza mumi.
Pele amubone kwaamba kwiina naaba womwi wenu ucengwa u cibi u kupapila Leza, kamuyohwana mazuba oonse kufwumbwa bwatewa ati “Bwasunu.”
Uswe toonse tulaabana mwa Kilisito kuti twakwatisha mu lushomo ndutwakakukwete ku makancilo kushika ku mamanino.
“Kuti na mwateelela mazwi a Leza bwasunu,
mutazumya myonzo yenu ukoya muciindi cakupapa.”
Ulimwi mbubani mbaakalemanina Leza kwa myaka iili makumi one? Sa tabali babo bantu bakabisha, ubali mitunta yakashaala mulukula?
No nkukuli bani Leza nkwaakapinga ca bukali ati, “Kwiina nibaya kunjila mukulyoocezha kwangu,” sa tabali babo bakanyansha?
Twabona ninzho ati bayina nibakenjila nkaambo kabatashomi.
Inzho cishomezho cakunjila mukulyoocezha nkucicili, ubobo amulabilile kwaamba kutabi naaba womwi wenu uya kukacilwa kunjila mukulyoocezha.
Nkaambo aswe twakakambaucilwa Makani Mabotu mbubona mbubakakambaucilwa abo, pele mulumbe ngubakateelela wakabula impindu nkubabele, nkaambo bayina kubashoma bakooleta.

Inzho uswe tubashomi, tulakanjila mukulyoocezha koko nkwaakaamba Leza ati, “Ndakalemana ukupinga ca bukali ati, ‘Tabakanjili mukulyoocezha kwangu,’ ” nikuba bobo Leza kamanizhizhe kale milimo yakwe yoonse kuhwa ku malengelo anshi.
Kuli Malembe akanana shabuzuba bwa ciloba ati, “Leza wakalyoocezha mu buzuba bwa ciloba kuhwa ku milimo yakwe yoonse.”
Ku makani aza ngoona Malembe amwi alaamba ati “Tabakanjili mukulyoocezha kwangu.”
Mbukuli ati nkubacili bamwi beelele kunjila, ulimwi babo bakataanguna kuteelela Makani Mabotu akulyoocezha bakakacilwa kunjila mukulyoocezha nkaambo bakanyansha,

ulimwi Leza wakabika buzuba bunji butewa ati “Bwasunu.” Nikwakaita myaka minji minji, Leza wakabwaamba buzuba bobu mbubona kale kale kwiita mwa Devidi nakaamba ati, “Na mwateelela izwi lya Leza bwasunu mutabi bacikaka koobwa.”
Kuti Joshuwa naakasololela bantu mukulyoocezha koko, Leza natakaamba shabuzuba bumwi bwa kulyoocezha.
Mbuli mbukubele, kucili buzuba bwa Sabata bwa kulyoocezha bwa bantu ba Leza.
Nkaambo babo benjila mukulyoocezha koku Leza nkwaakashomezha, balalyoocezha kuhwa ku milimo yabo, mbubona Leza mbwakalyoocezha kuhwa ku milimo yakwe.
Ubobo atutatanane cini cini kwaamba tunjile mukulyoocezha koku, kwaamba kutabi naaba womwi ukacilwa kunjila ukaambo kakunyansha nkukona.

Nkaambo izwi lya Leza lilikwete bumi ulimwi lilasebeza, lilalampa kubaala isumo ikwange koonse koonse. Lilayasa kuya kushika kwini kwandaanina bumi u moza, ulimwi shifwuwa u buseza. Ulimwi lilabeteka mizeezo ubutongo boonse buli mu monzo.
Kwiina cintu niciba comwi cisesece kwa Leza, pele shoonse shili atuba, shili bukwazhi kumenso akwe. Ulimwi walo ngutweelele kupandululila shoonse nshitwakacita.
Ubobo atukwatishe ku lushomo ndutwakahumina, nkaambo tulikwete mupaizhi mukandosha wezo wakaya kushika kwizeulu, walo ngu Jeso Mwanaa Leza.
Nkaambo mupaizhi wesu takacilwa kutufwila inkumbu mubulengushi bwesu, pele walo wakatepaulwa mu shiyanza shoonse nshitutepaulwa aswe, nikuba bobo wiina naakacita cibi.
Inzho atukwate lushomo, tuswene afwaafwi ku cuuna ca bwami ca Leza shiluse, koko kuli luse. Tukatambule lulecelelo u luse lwakutuyohwa mu shiindi nitubula.
Ubobo mupaizhi mukando oonse usalwa akati ka bantu, ulabikwa kwaamba abahiminine ku makani a milimo yabupaizhi kwa Leza, mbuli kupa shituuzho ushipaizho sha shibi shabo.
Bantu bayina luzhibo bazhimini ulabeendelezha cakubonzha monzo nkaambo aze mwini lwakwe mulengushi mu shiyanza shinji shinji.
Inzho ukaambo kakuti aze mwini mulengushi, ulyeelele kupa shipaizho sha shibi shakwe, kutaamba bulyo shipaizho sha shibi shabantu bamwi.
Kwiina muntu uulisala mwini ukulibika bulemu bwakuba mupaizhi mukando. Leza nguubeta mbubona mbwaaketa Aloni.
Mbubona bobo aze Kilisito wiina kulipa mwini bulemu bwakuba Mupaizhi Mukando. Pele Leza nguwakamwaambila ati,
“Uli mwanangu, bwasunu ndakuzhala.”
“Ulaakuli mupaizhi shikwense u shikwense,
Bupaizhi bwako bwamushobo waka Melekizedeki.”
Pele nikuba kuti Jeso kali Mwanaa Leza, wakayiya kulibonzha kwiita mu mapenzhi akwe.
Inzho nakalulamikwa, wakaba shikuleta lufwutuko lwa shikwense u shikwense kuli babo balibonzha kwakwe.
Ubobo Leza wakamubika kwaamba abe Mupaizhi Mukando, muciimo cabupaizhi bwa Melekizedeki.
Kuli aza, ndikwete makani manji manji akumushimwina, pele ncizumu kwaamba mupandululile, nkaambo tamufwambi kuteelela.
Nikuba kwaamba ati ciindi cashika ncimweelele kuyiisha bamwi, pele mucizanda kuyiishiwa shiiyo sha Leza nshitwakataanguna kumuyiisha. Mucizanda kunwa mukupa muciindi cakulya shilyo shizumu zumu.
Muntu woonse uponena bulyo a mukupa, mwana mushoonto, wiina lwiiyo mu shintu shabululami, tezhi cibiyabi ucibotu.
Pele shilyo shizumu zumu nshabantu babizu, babo bakaitamo kale mu shintu sheshi, ulimwi balakonzha kwaandaanya shibotu ushibiyabi.
Ubobo katuya kumbele kukanana makani ayelele bantu bashimine. Tatweelele kuzhokaucila ulimwi kushiiyo shuubauba sha Kilisito shakusanduka kuhwa ku shibi ukushiya milimo mibiyabi u kushoma Leza,
u shiiyo shamakani alupapatizo
Ncitweelele bulyo kucita nkuya kumbele akuli nduluzando lwa Leza.
Ubobo tacibi kubazhola bantu bakasowa lushomo lwabo kwaamba basanduke ku shibi shabo, babo bakasola kale cipo ca kwizeulu, u babo bakaakuli mu lukamantano u Moza Usalala,
babo bakasola kale bubotu bwa mazwi a Leza u kuteelela insana shaciindi ciza kumbele
u bamufwutamina Leza, ncizumu kufwutamuka, nkaambo balakankamina Mwanaa Leza a ciciinkano ulimwi u kuliletela bubiyabi bamukamwini.
Ubobo myuunda itambula inhula iwa ku shiindi shoonse ukuzhalila micelo mibotu kuli babo mbuyakaliminwa ilalonjezhewa kwa Leza.
Pele kuti muunda wezo wazhala meya ucibangu ati wabula mulimo, waba afwaafwi ukushinganyiwa, ku mamanino ulazonaunwa u mulilo.
Pele nikuba kuti twaamba bobo tatumuzuluzha umwe nubalongweesu mbutufwini, tulizhi ati muli munzhila imbotu imutola ku lufwutuko.
Nkaambo Leza uliluleme. Takeeluba milimo njimwakacita u lufwuno ndumwakamutondezha ciindi nimwakayohwa bantu bakwe ulimwi mucisebezela bana Kilisito.
Uswe cikando ncituzanda ncakuti umwi uumwi atolelele kucita shibotu kuya kushika ku mamanino kwaamba bulanjizhi bwenu buzuzucizhiwe.
Tatuzanda ati mube bakata, pele mubayiye bantu baya kukona shesho Leza nshaakashomezha kwiita mu lushomo ubushicamba.
Inzho Leza naakamupa cishomezho Abulahamu wakapinga mwizhina lyakwe mwini. Wakacita bobo nkaambo kwiina unji mukando umubaala ngwakaakukonzha kubanda mwipingo lyakwe.
Leza wakaamba ati, “Ndakushomezha ati ndakakulonjezha, ulimwi ndakacita kwaamba muhuzhanye.”
Inzho ukaambo kakuti Abulahamu wakalindila ca bushicamba, wakatambula ceco ncaakashomezhewa.
Bantu balapinga mwizhina lya muntu mukando u babaala, kupinga kuli bobo nkwa cini cini ulimwi kulamanya kuzumanikana koonse.
Inzho Leza wakaambisha cini cini kuli babo beelele kuya kukona shesho nshaakashomezha, kwaamba takacicinca cishomezho cakwe ncakashomezha kwiita mukupinga.

Inzho kuli shintu shobile shitacinciwa, kushomezha ukupinga, ulimwi momo Leza takonzha kucenga. Ubobo Leza kazanda kutuzumya zumya uswe utwakalishisha kwakwe kwaamba tukakatile kubulanjizhi mbutwakapewa.
Bulanjinzhi bobu tulibukwete cakutazungaana bwakaba ukoya ngu musemu wa bumi bwesu. Bulatunjizha kwizeulu kuŋanda isalala kuya kunze lya cishitilizho kunjila mu busena busalalisha,
koko Jeso walo wakatusololela nkwaakenjila mu busena bwesu, waya kuba mupaizhi ukoya mbwaakaakubele Melekizedeki.

Abulahamu wakapa Melekizedeki caabilo cekumi ca shintu shoonse nshaakasaala kunkondo. Izhina lya Melekizedeki lilapandulula ati, “Mwami wabululami.” Pele ulimwi kali Mwami wa Salemu, calo cipandulula ati, “Mwami wa Luumuno.”
Kwiina uzhi shakaushi u baina ushamukowa wakwe. Kali ukoya muntu wiina makancilo u mamanino a bumi bwakwe. Walo kali ukoya Mwanaa Leza mupaizhi wa shikwense.
Inzho amuzhingashile kwaamba ati wezu muntu kali mukando cini cini. Shaakale wesu Abulahamu wakapa cekumi ca shintu shesho nshakasaala kulumamba.
Inzho Mulawo ulaamba ati, bapaizhi bamukowa waka Levi, balyeelele kutambula cekumi kuhwa ku bantu, nikuba kuti abo mbalunungu lwaka Abulahamu.
Inzho wezu Melekizedeki katali wamukowa waba Levi pe. Pele nikuba bobo wakatambula cekumi kuhwa kwa Abulahamu ukumulonjezha wezo wakapewa cishomezho kwa Leza.
Ulimwi kwiina kuzuluzha kuliwo, nkaambo tulizhi ati u lonjezha mukando kubaala wezo u lonjezhewa.
Ku makani a bapaizhi balya bakaakutambula cekumi, mbantu bafwa. Pele nitwaamba sha Melekizedeki kulilembelwe ati cekumi kacitambulwa umumi.
Ubobo tulakonzha kwaamba ati ciindi Abulahamu naakapa Melekizedeki cekumi, Levi uli mukowa upewa cekumi aze wakapa cekumi.
Nikuba kuti Levi katana kuzhalwa, tulakonzha kwaamba ati kali mu mubili waka Abulahamu shaakale wakwe ciindi naakaswaangana u Melekizedeki.

Inzho milawo njibakatambula ba Izilaili kezhimine amakani a bupaizhi bwaba Levi. Kuti kusebeza kwa bapaizhi bamukowa waka Levi nikwakaakuli kulondoshi, nikwatakazandika linji kuleta bupaizhi bwamushobo unji, bukozhene ubwaka Melekizedeki, ubutakozhani ubwaka Aloni.
Nkaambo kuti bupaizhi bwacinca awo mulawo ulyeelele kucinca mbubona.
Sheshi shintu shilaamba sha Mwami wesu walo wakaakuli wamumushobo unji. Ulimwi kakwiina muntu wamushobo wezo wakaakuli mupaizhi.
Kulizhibicilwe kwaamba Mwami wesu kali wa mushobo waci Juda, ulimwi Mozesi wiina nakoobanda mushobo wakwe naakaakwaamba shabapaizhi.
Inzho tulakonzha kuteelelesha makani a kucinca kwabupaizhi kaambo kwashika unji mupaizhi ukozhana u Melekizedeki.
Wezu walo wiina ukaba mupaizhi kucilila ciyanza ca mulawo wamukowa wa bapaizhi. Pele wakaba mupaizhi kwiita munsana sha bumi bwakwe bwa shikwense.
Nkaambo cililembelwe ati,
“Ulaakuli mupaizhi shikwense,
mubupaizhi bwa Melekizedeki.”
Shiyanza sha mulawo mutaanzhi shabikwa kumabali nkaambo shiciina linji insana ulimwi tashiyohwa.
Ubobo mulawo tookonzha kululamika cintu niciba comwi, pele inzho twapewa bulanjizhi bubotu bukonzha kutuleta afwaafwi u Leza.
Ulimwi cakacitwa ukupingwa. Pele kutaanguna bapaizhi kababikwa bulyo kwiina kupinga.
Pele wezu naakaba mupaizhi ukupingwa, kwa wezo wakamwaambila ati,
“Mwami wapinga,
ulimwi tapingululi,
‘Uli mupaizhi shikwense.’”
Inzho kupinga koku kwapa kwaamba Jeso abe caanganino, cacipangano cibaala kubota.
Pele kwaba lwaandaano lwakuti babo bapaizhi kabali banji banji ulimwi kabatakonzha kutotelela mulimo wabo nkaambo kakuti bakaakufwa.
Inzho ukaambo kakuti Jeso nkwaali shikwense, ulimwi mupaizhi lyoonse.
Ubobo ulakonzha kubafwutula ca kumaninina boonse beza kwa Leza kwiita mwakwe, mbwaali mumi wa shikwense, lyoonse ulalyeenzelela umbusena bwabo.

Nkaambo kacili ceelelo kwaamba tukwate mupaizhi mukando uli bolya, ubobo ulasalala wiina butongo nikaba kampenda kali buti, kaandeene u bashishibi ulimwi ulisumpulilwe kubaala shintu shoonse sha kwizeulu.

Walo takozhani u bapaizhi bakando bamwi ubapa shipaizho a buzuba u buzuba, tapi cipaizho ca shibi shakwe ucashibi shabantu bamwi, nkaambo wakapa cipaizho ciindi comwi nakalyaaba mwini kwaamba abe cipaizho citabweelelwa.

Mulawo waka Mozesi, ulabika bantu bataluleme kwaamba babe bapaizhi bakando. Pele izwi lya kupinga ulyakezhiza munshi mulawo wezo, lilabika Mwana wezo ululeme kwaamba abe mupaizhi mukando wa shikwense.
wezo usebeza mu busena Busalalisha, mwitente lyatakazakwa umuntu pele Leza mwini.
Kufwumbwa Mupaizhi Mukando woonse ulabikwa amulimo wakupa shipo u shipaizho sha banyama, ubobo cilyeelele kwaamba ati aze Mupaizhi wesu Mukando akwate cintu cimwi cakupa.
Pele kuti naakaakuli anshi naatakaba mupaizhi pe, nkaambo nkubali kale bapaizhi babo bapa shipaizho shaambwa u mulawo.

Balasebeza mu busena bukozhana ucinhule ca shintu sha mwizeulu. Nkaambo Mosesi ciindi naakaakuzanda kuzaka itente, Leza wakamwaambila ati, “Ubone kwaamba ati itente leli walizaka kwiingaina u malailile ngundakakupa alupili.”

Inzho Jeso wakapewa mulimo wabupaizhi bukando bubaala kubota a milimo ya kale kale, ucipangano cimupa kuba muzhiminizhi akati ka Leza u bantu bakwe ncikando kubaala citaanzhi, nkaambo cilizhimine a shishomezho sha shintu shibotu shibaala.
Ubobo kuti nikwakaakwiina cibiyabi mu cipangano citaanzhi, nikwatakazandika cipangano cabili.
Pele Leza ulayana bubiyabi ku bantu bakwe, ncaambila ati,
“Amubone, cilakashika ciindi,
mbwaamba Mwami,
ninkaacita cipangano cipiya u cishi ca Izilaili,
u cishi ca Juda,
tacili ukoya cipangano
ncindakacita u ba shaakale babo,
ciindi indakabakusha mu Ijipiti iitashi lyangu.
Nkaambo balo bayina nibakashomeka kucipangano cangu.
Ame ndiina kubabika matwi.”
Mbwaamba Mwami.
“Inzho nciceci cipangano ncinja kucita u cishi ca Izilaili mu mazuba ezhiza,
mbwaamba Mwami.
Ndakabika milawo yangu mu mizeezo yabo.
Ndakeelemba mu myonzo yabo,
Ndakaba Leza wabo,
abo balakaba bantu bangu.
Kwiina linji ukaayiisha mweenzhiina.
Kwiina uukaayiisha munina kwaamba ati,
‘Zhiba Leza,’ Nkaambo boonse balakanzhiba,
Kuhwa ku mushoonto kushikila ku mukando.
Nkaamo ndakabafwila luse ukubalecelela shibi shabo.
Ulimwi nshikaatelaici linji mafwunze abo pe.”
Inzho naakacaamba Cipangano ceci ati, “Ncipiya.” Leza wakatondezha ati cikulukulu ciina linji mulimo, ulimwi kufwumbwa cintu cacembala uku kulumpana ati caba afwaafwi kuloba.
Ucipangano citaanzhi kacikwete milawo yabukombi bwancico u busena bwakukombela bwancico bwakazakwa u bantu.
Nkaambo bantu bakazaka itente, busena butaanzhi kabuli busena busalala momo mwakaakuli cibicilo ce lambe, iitebulu ucinkwa cakaakupelwe kwa Leza.
Kuhwaawo kunjila mumpetu yamukati kwiita a cishitilizho cabili busena bwakakutewa ati Busena Busalalisha

Momu mu busena mumwakaakuli cipaililo ca goludi, aakaakutentelwa tununcilizho, ulimwi kamuli ikwati lya Cipangano. Mukati mwikwati kamuli kabiya kangolide mwakaakuli Mana u musako waka Aloni uwakaakusonsele matuhu, ulimwi u matapa a Cipangano.

Ezeulu ekwati kaali shimwi shinkozha sha baanjelo shobile shikwete mababa shitewa ati ba Celubimu, kashitondezha bulemu bwa Leza. Mababa aanshisho kaahumbile abusena awo a kaakulecelelelwa shibi. Pele ninzho tacili ciindi cakumupandululila shoonse sheshi mbushibelele.

pele kumpetu kakunjila bulyo mupaizhi mukando, ulimwi ulacita bobo lyomwi bulyo amwaka. Katanjili bulyo katolelela u bulowa. Bobo bulowa kabupa kwa Leza kuzhiminina shibi shakwe mwini u shibi shabantu nshibakacita mukutazhiba.
Kwiita mu shiyanza sheshi, Moza Usalala ulatondezha kabotu kabotu kwaamba inzhila itola mu busena Busalalisha keetana kuyalulwa ku ciindi itente itaanzhi nilyakaakuciliko.
Ceci ncitondezho citondeka ku ciindi ceno. Cilaamba ati, shipo ushituuzho shabanyama shaakutulwa kwa Leza tashikonzha kululamika mizeezo yamukombi.

Cili bulyo akaambo kakulya u kunwa u shamilawo yakulisanzha iyandeene andeene. Shoonse sheshi nshintu shaku mubili nshakukwatilila bulyo kuya kushika ku ciindi Leza nakaabambulula shintu shoonse kuba shipiya.

Pele Kilisito nakalibonya kuba Mupaizhi Mukando wa shintu shibotu shakezhiza, kwiita mwi tente lyakusebezela ndyabulemu ulimwi lilabaala kululama. (Uliina nilyakapangwa u matashi a bantu, leli talili lyaanshi ano).
Wakanjila ciindi comwi nana umbusena busalalisha, pele wiina naakatola bulowa bwa mpongo nibuba bwa ŋombe, pele kwiita mubulowa bwakwe mwini, ukutuletela kunununwa kwashikwense.
Na kuti kusansailwa kwa bantu batasalali u bulowa bwa mpongo ubwa bacende iitwe lya boombe bapwizhi kulasalazha itombe lya a mubili,

Caakuli bobo, nkukuti bulowa bwa Kilisito, wakaalyaaba mwini ukoya cipaizho ciluleme ciina butongo kwa Leza, kwiita mu Moza wa shikwense, bulacita shibotu shibaala, nkukuti bulowa bwa Jeso bulabaala kusalazha mizeezo yesu kuhwa ku micito mifwu, kwaamba tusebezele Leza mumi.

Ubobo Kilisito wakaba ngushikuzhima akati mu cipangano cipiya, kwaamba ati babo bakoompololwa u Leza bakatambule lukono lwa shikwense ndwakashomezha. Sheshi shakaba bolya ukaambo kalufwu lwaka Kilisito, lunununa bantu kuhwa mu shibi nshibakacita nibakaakuli mu cipangano citaanzhi.
Inzho ku makani ashintu shalukono, tashikonwa katana kufwa mukamwini, shilaakonwa akafwa.
Takukonwa naacilanga mukamwini lubono nikuba ati lukono ndulembe kale, lulakonwa afwa.
Ubobo aco cipangano citaanzhi kacitakonzha kucitwa cakutatila bulowa.

Ca kutaanguna Mozesi wakaambila ba Izilaili mulawo wa Leza woonse. Amane wakabweza bulowa bwa bacende ubwampongo washisanganya antoomwi u meenzhi, wakasansaila ebuka lya Mulawo a bantu boonse. Kucita bobo, wakasebezha inshisa u boza bwa mbelele busubila pyu.
Wakaamba ati, “Bobu mbubulowa bwaanga cipangano ceco Leza ncaakamulailila.”
Munzhila njiyona yezho, Mozesi wakasansaila bulowa etente ulimwi aashintu shoonse shakaakusebezhewa mukupaila.
Kwiingaina u Mulawo wa Mozesi shintu shilasalazhiwa u bulowa. Ubobo kwiina kulecelelwa kwa shibi na kuti bulowa bwiina kutika.
Inzho naa kuti shintu sheshi shikozhana u shintu sha kwizeulu shakaakusalazhiwa munzhila ili bolya, nkukuti shalo shini sha mwizeulu shilazandika cipaizho cimwi cibaala ali shesho.

Kilisito wiina kunjila mu busena busalala bwakukombela bwakazakwa u matashi a bantu, bwalo bwakaakuli bulyo cikozhano cabusena bwa kwizeulu. Pele wakanjila mwizeulu momo inzho mwaabele kwaamba aakutuhiminina kwa Leza.
Mupaizhi Mukando waba Juda ulanjila mu busena busalalisha ciindi comwi amwaka u bulowa bwa banyama. Pele Kilisito wiina naakalipa bu cipaizho shiindi shinji shinji,

nkaambo kuti nicaakuli bobo, Kilisito naakapenga shiindi shinji shinji kuhwa ku malenjelo anshi. Pele inzho wakalibonya ciindi comwi bulyo ku mamanino aciindi kwaamba akushe shibi kwiita mukulyaaba bu cipaizho lwakwe mwini.
Ulimwi umbona muntu woonse mbwaayeelele kufwa ciindi comwi, kwamana bobo ulabetekwa u Leza,
Mbubona bobo aze Kilisito wakaabwa kwaamba abe cipaizho ciindi comwi kukusha shibi shabanji banji. Ulakabonwa ulimwi ciindi cabili. Takezi kukusha shibi, pele ulakeza kufwutula babo bamulindila.

Inzho mulawo ncinhule bulyo ca shintu shibotu shicizhiza. Walo ncinkozha bulyo. Ulimwi nkaambo shipaizho shilapewa amwaka u mwaka, no mbubuti mulawo mbuukonzha kubalondola babo beza kwa Leza kwiita mu shipaizho shesho?
Kuti bantu bakomba Leza nibakasalazhiwa bweelele, nibataakulitibauka linji ku shibi, ulimwi nibatakaakupa shipaizho lyoonse.
Inzho kwiingaina mbuli mbucaakubele, shipaizho kashisebeza kuzhibalusha bantu shibi shabo shaamwaka u mwaka.
Nkaambo bulowa bwa bacende u bwapongo tabukonzha kukusha shibi.
“Tushizanda shipaizho u shipo,
pele wamambila mubili.
Wiina niwakabotelwa mitunta yabanyama yakaakutentwa acipaililo,
ushipaizho shakukusha shibi.
Ngoonaawo ume ndakaamba ati,
‘Ndime ano, ndeza kucita luzando lwako U Leza,
mbubona mbucilembelwe mwibuka lya Mulawo.’ ”

Kutaanguna Kilisito wakaamba ati, “Tuzanda ulimwi tubotelwa shipo nishiba shipaizho shakutenta, nishiba shipaizho shakukusha shibi.” Wakaamba bobo nikuba kuti sheshi shintu shilacitwa kwiingaina u Mulawo mbuuamba.
Ulimwi munshi wakaamba ati, “Ndime ano U Leza, ndeza kucita luzando lwako.” Ubobo Leza wakakusha shipaizho shakale kale kwaamba mu busena bwashipaizho sheshi abike cipaizho ca Kilisito.
Mukucita bobo Kilisito ulatusalazha kwiita mu mubili wakwe mwini ngwaakapa ciindi comwi bulyo.
Pele woonse mupaizhi kazhima ku bushu bwa Leza ciindi coonse kupa shipaizho a buzuba u buzuba, pele sheshi shipaizho kashitalozha kukusha shibi.
Pele walo, wakapa cipaizho comwi cikonzha kukusha shibi lyoonse, amane wakaya kukala kwitashi lya cilyo lya Leza.
Inzho koko nkwaabele ulalindila kwaamba ba shinkondonina cikabe cilyatilo ca matende akwe.
Nkaambo kucipaizho comwi bulyo, wabalulamicila limwi babo basalazhiwa ku shibi.
Aze Moza Usalala, ulatupa bumboni, nkaambo naakamana kwaamba ati,
“Ceci nci cipangano ncinkaacita u bantu babo ku mamanino a mazuba azo,” mbwaamba Mwami. “Ndakabika milawo yangu mu myonzo yabo. Ulimwi ndakeelemba mu matelaishi abo.”
Amane wakaamba ati, “Ndiina ninkaazhibaluka shibi shabo u milimo yabo mibiyabi njibacita.”
Inzho koko kuli kulekelelwa kwa shintu sheshi, kwiina nikupewa linji shipaizho sha shibi.
Ubobo nubakwesu, mbukuli ati tulikwete lwaanguluko lwa kunjila muŋanda ya Leza cakutatiya kwiita mubulowa bwa Jeso,
kwiita munzhila impiya ya bumi wakatuyalulila kwiitila mucishitilizho ceco cizhiminina mu mubili wakwe,
inzho mbutukwete mupaizhi mukando uuyendelezha iŋanda ya Leza,
atuswene afwaafwi u myonzo izwile lushomo lwini lwini, myonzo yesu isansailwe isalale ku butongo bwa mizeezo mibiyabi, ayo mibili isambe mu meenzhi a salalisha.
Atukwatishe lushomo lwa bulanjizhi ndutukwete, cakutazungaana pe, nkaambo wezo wakashomezha ulashomeka.
Ulimwi katutelaika mbutukonzha kubazumya zumya bamwi kwaamba tufwunane u kucita milimo mibotu.
Tutacileka ciyanza ca kuswaangana antoomwe, ukoya mbubacita bantu bamwi balenga. Pele atuyohwane mukulizumya zumya, katucita bobo kwaambisha mbuli mbutwabona ati Buzuba bwaba afwaafwi.
Inzho kuti twakanka kubisha ca lutuzhi nikuba ati meni meni tulyeezhi, kuciina linji cipaizho ncitukonzha kupa kukaambo ka shibi,
pele cisheele nkulindila cabukandu lubeta ubukali bwa mulilo u kaazonauna ba shinkondonina Leza.
Kufwumbwa muntu utacilila Mulawo wa Mozesi, ulayaiwa cakutafwilwa luse, ku bumboni bwa bantu bobile na botatwe.
Anu cilakaba buti cibebyo ku muntu wezo u sampula Mwanaa Leza, ukunyansha bulowa bwa Cihuminano ca Leza cimusalazha shibi shakwe, ukutukana Moza Usalala wa luse?
Nkaambo tulimwizhi wakaamba ati, “Amundekele inzholi njangu ndimwini ndakeezhola, ulimwi Mwami ulakabeteka bantu bakwe.” Ulimwi wakaamba ati, “Leza ulakabeteka bantu bakwe.”
Ncintu citizha cini cini kuwila mu matashi a Leza mumi!
Pele kamutweluka mazuba akamana. Mu mazuba azo Leza naakamumunikila, mwakapenzhewa u shintu shinji shinji. Pele nikuba bobo mwakacilozha kuzhima.
Cimwi ciindi mwakaakupenzhewa u kusampaulwa kaanzambwene. Cimwi ciindi mwakapengela antoomwi u babo baakuli mu mapenzhi.
Mwakabafwila inkumbu babo bakaakwaanjilwe muntolongo, ulimwi mwakaakubaleka ca kubotelwa babo bakaakumunanga lubono, nkaambo mwakaakwizhi ati umwe mulikwete lubono lubotu lubaala, lutamana.
Ubobo mutapakaanya myonzo yenu, nkaambo mulaayana bulumbu bukando.
Inzho mulyeelele kutatanana kucita shizanda Leza kwaamba mukatambule nshaakamushomezha.
Mbubona mbwaamba Malembe ati,
“Kwashaala ciindi cishoonto bulyo,
inzho wezo uzhiza uleza temuki pe.
Pele muntu ngundaamba ati mululami ulakapona u lushomo.
Ulimwi kuti akazhoke munshi
bumi bwangu tabukamubotelwa pe.”
Pele uswe tatuli babo bazhoka munshi kwaamba bazonaunwe, pele tuli bashomi bazobola maumi abo.
Inzho lushomo nkutazuluzha ku shintu nshitulanjila, kukwata bumboni bwini bwini boomonzo mu shintu nshitutabwene.
Inzho ukaambo ka lushomo lwabo, Leza wakabotelwa ba shaakale besu.
Ukaambo ka lushomo, tulahumina ati inshi yakalengwa u mazwi a Leza. Ubobo shintu shoonse sheshi nshitubona shakalengwa kuhwa ku shintu shitabonwa.

Ukaambo ka lushomo, Enoki wakatolwa kwizeulu wiina naakafwa pe, ulimwi wiina naakayanwa nkaambo Leza wakamutola kwizeulu. Malembe alatwaambila ati ku ciindi Enoki naatakaakuna kutolwa kwizeulu, kacita shimubotela Leza.
Kuti kakwiina lushomo, tacibi kumubotezha Leza. Nkaambo kufwumbwa u swena kwa Leza ulyeelele kuhumina ati Leza nkwaali, ulimwi u kwaamba ati ulapa bulumbu kuli babo bamukapula.
Ukaambo ka lushomo, wakakala mu matente ukoya mweenzu mucishi ncaakamushomezha Leza, ba Aizeki u Jakobo bakaakuli bashikukona cishomezho ceci abo mbubakacita.
Nkaambo Abulahamu kalangila munzhi unji uzakilwe umwiimbi muzumu wakatelaikwa ukushiwa u Leza.
Ukaambo ka lushomo, Saala wakacikonzha kuzhala mwana umbucembele bwakwe. Wakamushoma Leza kwaamba ulakacicita ncaakashomezha.
Ubobo ku muntu womwi wakaakulibonya ukoya mufwukale, kwakahwa mazhalane a bantu banji banji mbututakonzha kubala bali ukoya intongwezhi sha mwizeulu u musenga waku lwaatele.
Nkaambo bantu baamba bobo balishinizhe kwaamba nkucili cishi ca kwabo ncibakapula.
Kuti nibakaakutelaika cishi ceco ncibakashiya munshi kabakonzha kupikuka kufwumbwa ciindi.
Tacili bobo, bulanjizhi bwabo mbwacishi cibotu cili kwizeulu. Ubobo Leza tausa insoni kutewa ati ngu Leza wabo nkaambo wabazakila munzhi.
Ukaambo ka lushomo, Abulahamu naakasunkwa kwa Leza wakapa Aizeki, walo wakaakutambulile shishomezho, kazanda kupaizha mwanakwe ice nana.
Nikuba ati Leza wakamwaambila ati, Aizeki nguukaatola mukowa wakwe kumbele.
Abulahamu kakwete lushomo lwakuti Leza ulakonzha kubusha mufwu, ubobo tulakonzha kweelezha ati Aizeki wakaba ukoya muntu wabushiwa ku bafwu.
Ukaambo ka lushomo, Aizeki wakalonjezha Jakobo u Isau u kubashomezha ati balakatambula coolwe kumbele kwa mazuba.
Ukaambo ka lushomo, Jakobo wakalonjezha banakwe Jozefu umwi uumwi katana kufwa, wakalishaaminina a musako wakwe, wakomba kwa Leza.
Ukaambo ka lushomo, Jozefu katana kufwa wakaamba makani a kulonga ati Leza ulakabakusha ba Izilaili mu Ijipiti. Ubobo wakapa malailile aakuti batakashishiyi shifwuwa shakwe.
Ukaambo ka lushomo, ubakwabo Mozesi bakamuseseka kwa myezhi yotatwe. Bakabona kwaamba kali mwana mubotu, ubobo bayina nibakatiya kusotoka malailile ngaakapa mwami.
Ukaambo ka lushomo, Mozesi naakakomena wakakaka kutewa ati mwana mwanakwe Falawo mukaintu.
Wakasala kupengela antoomwi u bantu baleza, kubaala kutangala kuyanwa mu cibi kwa ciindi cishoonto bulyo.
Mozesi kezhi ati bubotu bwamu Ijipiti kabutaingaina u bubotu buyanwa mukupengela Kilisito. Walo kalanga kumbele kubulumbu bwakwe.
Ukaambo ka lushomo, Mozesi wakahwa mu Ijipiti cakutatiya bukali bwa mwami nkaambo wakabona Leza uutabonwa.
Ukaambo ka lushomo, wakalya ipobwe lya kwiitilila, ulimwi ukusansaila bulowa bwa banyama, kukasha ati anjelo atayaya bana bataanzhi baba Izilaili.
Ukaambo ka lushomo, bantu ba Izilaili bakaita mu Lweenje Lusubila balaya bweenda anshi inzumu. Pele bana Ijipiti nibakasoleka kucita bobo boonse akabayaya meenzhi.
Ukaambo ka lushomo, bwaanda bwa munzhi wa Jeliko bwakawa bantu nibakamana kuuzhinguluka shiindi shili ciloba.
Ukaambo ka lushomo, Lahabu muhuule wiina kufwa u bantu batakaakuteelela Leza nkaambo wakasamausha bashikutwela.
Ncinzhi cimwi ncinkonzha kwaamba? Ciindi taciko cakuti ŋambe shoonse shaba Gidiyoni, u Balaki, u Samisoni, u Jefuta, u Devidi, u Samuwele ulimwi u bashinshimi.
Ukaambo ka lushomo, bakazunda malelo, bakacita shiluleme, Leza wakabapa shishomezho, bakayala milomo yaba shuumbwa,
bakazhimya mililo iihwilima, bakanununwa kuhwa kumaceba, bakazuma kuhwa kubulengushi, bakazunda munkondo, bakatanda bashikalumamba ba mashi kuya kulaale.
, bamwi bakaintu bakatambula bafwu bakabushiwa. Bunji bwa bantu baba bakapenzhiwa, pele bakakaka kwaamba balekwe, kwaamba bakabuke ku bumi bubotu.
Bamwi kabasampaulwa u kuumwa u milusu, bamwi kabaangwa inceetani u kutolwa muntolongo.

Abo bamwi kabaumwa mabwe, bamwi kabakosolwa mu shipanzha shobile, bamwi kabayayiwa u maceba. Bamwi kabaina shakusama cita bulyo masalu ambelele a mpongo, bamwi kabali bapushi, bamwi kabapenzhewa, bamwi kabatonkaikwa.
Inshi keeteelele kukwata bantu babotu bali bolya, babo bakaakuungunika mulukula, u mu mapili ulimwi kabakala umena umulwaata.
Nikuba bobo boonse baba bakapa Leza kubotelwa ukaambo kakushomeka kwabo. Pele nikuba bobo bakafwa kabatana kutambula ncibakashomezhewa.
Cakaba bobo nkaambo Leza wakatucitila cintu cibotu katazanda kwaamba ati balulamikwe nkututeko uswe.

Inzho bolya mbutuzhingulucilwe iibunga ikando lya bakamboni, atushisowe shoonse shitulemena u shibi shoonse shitukakatile. Ulimwi atulyaabe ca kumaninina kwaamba tushike ku mamanino a mushinzo uli kumbele lyesu.

Atubike menso esu kwa Jeso wezo uli njintalisho ulimwi nguululamika lushomo lwesu. Wezo wakalyaaba cakubula insoni kumapenzhi a ciciinkano ukaambo kalutangalo lwakaakumulindila. Inzho ulishite kuluya lwa cilyo ku cuuna ca Leza.
Kamutelaike mbwaakalyaaba u kulimbushiwa ku bantu ba shishibi kwaamba mutabi nimulengaana u kuzhoka munshi.
Kwiina naaba womwi wenu wakashika kale antaamo ya kutila bulowa munkondo yenu yakulwisha shibi.
Pele mulaluba mazwi mbwaamba kubana baleza ati,
“Mwanangu, utacinyansha cisubulo ncaakupa Mwami,
ulimwi kuti Mwami wakululamika utalengaani.
Nkaambo Mwami ulalulamika babo mbaafwini, ukulemanina mwanakwe woonse ngwaatambula.”
Amuzume mu mapenzhi ciindi nimululamikwa, nkaambo imbubo bobo Leza mbwaabacita banakwe. Sa kuli muzhali u talemanini banakwe?
Kuti Leza takutapatila ukoya mbwaatapatila banakwe boonse, ati uli wa mwisokwe tuli mwanakwe.
Maushesu anshi ano alatutapatila pele tulaapa bulemu. Sa tacibaali kubota kwaamba twapewa bumi bwini bwini ciindi ushesu waku moza naatululamika?

Ubobo maushesu alatululamika kwa ciindi cishoonto bulyo, ulimwi balacita bobo kwiingaina umbubatelaika ati ncibotu. Pele Leza ulatululamikila bubotu bwesu tubeni nkaambo ulazanda kwaamba twaabane kusalala kwakwe.
Inzho ciindi muntu naalulamikwa, aciindi awo cilalibonya ati ncintu cicisha monzo, pele kwamana cilazhala micelo ya bululami, kuli babo bakaliiya ciiyo ceco.
Inzho amululame kuzhima muzumye manungo,
amululamike tuzhila twa maulu enu kwaamba balema bapone batashokauki linji.
Amusoleke kukala muluumuno u bantu boonse, amusalale, nkaambo mwatasalala tamukamuboni Leza.
Amubone kwaamba kutabi muntu naaba womwi ukacilwa kuyana luse ndwaapa Leza. Amucenjele kwaamba kutabi muzanda uulula uusonsa akati kenu, umuletela mapenzhi ukumusofwaazha noonse.
Amucenjele kwaamba kutabi muntu shimafwunze utezhi Leza akati kenu, utasalali ukoya Isau wezo wakauzha bukando ku mucece wakwe ukaambo ka cakulya ca ciindi comwi bulyo.
Mulizhi ati munshi naakaakuzanda kulonjezhiwa kwa ushi, wakazhoka cinkambaminwe, nkaambo wiina nakayana ciindi cakucinca nikuba kuti kazanda kulonjezhewa ca kulila misozhi.
Tamuna kushika ku busena
kulila kwampeta, mazwi azo ngubakalomba ati atabaambila linji.
Nkaambo kabatalozha kupupulala linji malailile aakuti, “Nkaambo kufwumbwa naaba munyama kuti walukutuzha lupili ulyeelele kuumwa mabwe.”
Busena bobo kabutizha cini cini, u Mozesi lwakwe wakaamba ati, “Ndazhangama bwanjaya bukandu.”
Pele umwe mweza ku lupili lwa Ziyoni ku munzhi wa Leza mumi, Jelusalemu wa kwizeulu, usha baanjelo banji banji batakonzha kubalwa beza kusekelela,
ulimwi ukumbungano yaba bataanzhi bali mazhinaabo akalembwa mwizeulu, ukwa Leza uubeteka bantu boonse, uku myoza ya bantu baluleme mbakalulamika,
ukwa Jeso shimuzhima akati wa cipangano cipiya, uku bulowa bwakasansailwa ubwaamba izwi ibotu kubaala bulowa bwaka Abelo.

Ubobo mutakaki kumupupulala wezo uwaamba, nkaambo na kuti bakakacilwa kuloboka ciindi nibakakaka kumuteelela shikubacenjezha wanshi ano, no mbubuti mbutukaloboka mulubeta na kuti twamukacila wezo uutucenjezha kuhwa kwizeulu?
Ciindi ca kutaanguna Leza nakaamba izwi lyakwe lyakazungaanya bulyo inshi, pele ulashomezha ati, “Inzho limwi, shikazungaanya bulyo inshi alyo izeulu lilakazungaana.”
Mazwi akuti “Inzho limwi,” alapandulula ati, Leza wacibika atuba kwaamba ati shoonse shilenje shilaazungaanyiwa u kukushiwa, kwaamba ati shesho shitakaazungaana shikashaale.
Inzho atulumbe nkaambo twapewa bwami butazungaana. Atutondezhe kulumba kwesu mukuti tulamupaila Leza ca bulemu boonse ukumucitila shintu shibotu.
Nkaambo Leza wesu uli ukoya mulilo u zonauna.
Mutasowana amufwunane ca bunina.
Amubakwate kabotu beenzu, nkaambo mukucita bobo bamwi bantu bakasamausha baanjelo cakutazhiba.
Kamubatweluka bantu ba Mwami bali muntolongo mube ukoya muli abo muntolongo. Amubazhibaluke bali mu mapenzhi, mbumuli mubili omwi.
Kutwalana acibe cintu ca bulemu ku bantu boonse, ulimwi bulo bwabo batwalene butasofwaazhiwa, nkaambo Leza ulakababeteka bahuule u bashimamambe.
Amulitantamune kukuzandisha mali, amulamwe kuli shesho nshimukwete, nkaambo Leza ulaamba ati, “Nshikamushiyi nikuba kumusula.”
Ubobo tulakonzha kwaamba cakutazuluzha ati, “Mwami ngumuyohwi wangu nshicitiyi cibancita bantu.”
Mutaakubaluba basololi benu bakamuyiisha mulumbe wa Leza. Kamuzhibaluka bumi mbubakapona ulimwi lushomo lwenu lukozhane ulwabo.
Jeso Kilisito tacinca, umbona mbwakaakubele zona mbwaabele ubwasunu, ulimwi ulaakuli umbona bobo shikwense.

Mutaakucengwa iinjiisho shishiyene shiyene shitazhibilwe kabotu. Ncibotu kuzumya zumya myonzo yenu u shipo shihwa ku luse lwa Leza, kutali kumilawo yaamba makani a shakulya yalo iina nciibayohwa babo beecilila.
Tulikwete cipaililo cesu awo naaba mupaizhi uusebeza mu busena bwa kupailila teelele kulya.
Nkaambo mitunta yabanyama babo bali bulowa bwaakuletwa kucipaililo u mupaizhi mukando kwaamba cibe cipaizho ca shibi, keetentwa kunze lya munzhi.
Umbona bobo aze Jeso mbwaakayayilwa kunze umanjililo aamunzhi, ukwaaba bulowa bwakwe kwaamba cibe cipaizho ca shibi shabantu.
Inzho aswe atuye kunze lya munzhi tukapenge mbwaakapenga.
Nkaambo munzhi wesu weno waanshi ano tooli wa lyoonse, pele kuli munzhi ngutulanjila uzhiza.
Ubobo kwiita mwa Jeso tutaleka kupa cipaizho cakumutembaula Leza, kulumba kwesu kube ukoya micelo ya bantu ba shoma mwizhina lyakwe.
Mutacileka kucita shibotu ukwaabana nshimukwete, nkaambo shipaizho shili bobo shilamubotela Leza.

Amucilile malailile a basololi benu ulimwi amulifwiinshe nkubabele, nkaambo mbubeembela maumi enu, ulimwi balakapa bupanduluzhi bwa milimo yabo kwa Leza. Amuleke bacite mulimo wezu calutangalo kutali cakutongauka, nkaambo kuti bapenga kwiina bubotu mbumukayana.
Kamutukombela, nkaambo tulizhi ati mizeezo yesu ilasalala, tulazandisha kucita shintu shoonse ca bulemu.
Ndamulomba noonse kwaamba mucite bobo kwaamba ambweni ndazholwa kwenu ca kufwambaana.
Inzho Leza wa luumuno, wakabusha Mwami wesu Jeso ku bafwu, uuli ngu mweembezhi mukando wambelele, kwiita mubulowa bwa cipangano cashikwense,
amupe insana shakucita luzando lwakwe lubotu, kwaamba shisebeze milimo mibotu ibotelezha ku bushu bwakwe kwiita mwa Jeso Kilisito. Ukwakwe kube bulemu shikwense ushikwense. Ameni.
Ndamulomba nubakwesu mupupulale ca monzo womwi kumulumbe wakuzumya zumya, nkaambo ndamulembela mubufwaafwi.
Ndazanda kwaamba muzhibe ati munyokwesu Timoti wakaangululwa, ubobo kuti afwambaane kushika, tulakaakuli aze ndakeza kumubona.
Amubaanzhe boonse basololi ubanamusalazhi. Bakwesu bahwa ku Itali bamwaanzha.
Luse alube amwe noonse.
Nubakwesu kamubotelwa bulyo ciindi nimushikilwa masukusho a mishobo mishobo,
nkaambo mulizhi ati ciindi lushomo lwenu nilusukushiwa bolya, ku mamanino mulakacikonzha kuba ba shilwiici.
Amubone kwaamba kukakatila kwenu kutolelele cakutakacilwa kwaamba mushime ca kumaninina kwaamba tamukabuli cintu.
Kuti umwi wenu wabula busongo, naakombe kwa Leza walo upa busongo ku bantu boonse ca luse cakutakapula bubiyabi.
Mwakomba amushome cakutazuluzha naashoonto. Kufwumbwa u zuluzha uli ukoya inkutisha lya mulwaatele litonkwa u muuwo.
Muntu uli bobo atatelaiki ati ulapewa cintu kuhwa ku Mwami,
nkaambo ulalomba u myonzo yobile, tashitikile munzhila shakwe shoonse.
Mukwesu mupushi aininwe ciindi Leza naamusumpula,
aze muhubi abotelwe Leza amucesha nkaambo aze ulakamana bumana malubaluba a mwisokwe.
Nkaambo izuba lilahwa u kutenta, ubobo lilazumya shishango, malubaluba alaloka, u bweebeshi bwangawo bulamana. Umbona bobo u muhubi ulakonzha kufwa nikuba ati uciya bucita impindu yakwe.
Ulilonjelwe wezo muntu u tatanana umasunko, nkaambo azunda ulakapewa mushini wa bumi wezo Leza ngwakabashomezha babo bamuzanda.
Kuti muntu wasunkwa, ataamba ati Leza ngu wamunsunka, nkaambo Leza takonzha kusunkwa kwaamba abishe, ubobo aze tasunki muntu shibiyabi.
Pele bantu balasunkwa kucita shibi ciindi niboongelezhewa ukucengwa u shisushi shabo beni shibiyabi.
Ubobo shisushi shibiyabi shamita shilazhala cibi, aco cibi cakomena cilazhala lufwu.
Mutacengwa nubakwesu banakufwunwa.
Shoonse shintu shibotu shilondokele nshipo shihwa kwizeulu, shilahwa kwa Taata wakalenga izeulu u mimuni ili mwizeulu. Walo utacinca bucinca shinhule.
Wakasala kutupa bumi bupiya bwaku moza kwiita u mazwi amba shalushinizho kwaamba tukabe micelo yakwe ya busena butaanzhi ku shintu shoonse nshaakalenga.
Nubakwesu kamwaazhibaluka aza. Woonse muntu kafwambaana kuteelela, ulimwi kamuka kwaamba u kumuka kulemana
nkaambo bukali bwa muntu bumi bululeme ku bushu bwa Leza.
Ubobo amubuleke busofwaazhi boonse ulimwi mubukushe bubiyabi buzwile muli umwe. Amwaatambule cakulibonzha mazwi Leza ngaakashanga u myonzo yenu akonzha kumufwutula.
Mutaakulicenga kuteelela bulyo mazwi a Leza, pele kamucita shaambwa mu mazwi azo.
Nkaambo kuti muntu ulateelela bulyo mazwi, amana taciti nshaateelela, ulikozhene umuntu u lilanga mu cimboni mboni,
uufwumbi ndilyona mbwaahwila waluba mbwaabele.

Pele wezo ulanga Mulawo wa Leza mulondoshi ulimwi walwaanguluko, nguwezo ukakatila mumo, tateeleli mazwi bulyo ukwaaluba, pele ulaacilila ukwaacita. Ubobo Leza ulakamulongezha mu shintu shoonse nshaacita.
Kuti muntu ulazunga ati uliluleme mu kukomba Leza amana talikwati mu kwaamba kwakwe, bukombi bwakwe mbwabulyo ulimwi ulalicenga bulyo.
Bukombi bwini bwini bulondokele kwa Leza Taata mbubobu; muntu abambe bamushaala u bamuka bafwu u mapenzhi abo u kulibamba cakubula kampenda kwaamba bubiyabi bwa ano anshi butamusofwaazha.
Nubakwesu, bolya mbumushoma mu Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito wa bulemu, mutaakusalululana.
Atwaambe na kuti kwashika muntu u samine inweenwe ya goludi amuswaangano, amana u mupushi u samine shisani shizapaushi washika aze,
mwamana mwatondezha bulemu kuli wezo u samine kabotu u kwaamba ati, “Kala awa abotu.” Pele kumupushi mwaamba ati, “Uwe zhima alya” naa ati, “Kala anshi awa nguntandabalile.”
Na kuti mwacita bobo ati mwakanka kusalululana u kubeteka kwiita mu mizeezo mibiyabi.
Amuteelele nubakwesu bafwunwa! Sa Leza takabasalile babo bapushi ano anshi kwaamba bakabe bahubi mu lushomo ukuba bashikukona bwami mbwaakashomezha kuli babo bamufwini.
Pele umwe mwamusampaula mupushi. Sa tabali babo bahubi bamupenzha u kumutola munkuta.
Sa tabali bahubi basampaula izhina lilemekwa lya Kilisito lelyo ndimwakaulikwa.
Pele kuti kamusalululana, ati mwabisha u mulawo ulamupa mulandu.
Kufwumbwa ubamba Milawo yoonse amana wasotoka womwi nkukuti wezo ati weesotoka yoonse.
Nkaambo nguwena wakaamba ati, “Utaciti bumambe,” inguwe nguwena nguwakaamba ati, “Utayaya.” Nuutakaciti bumambe wamana ulayaya, ati wasotoka Mulawo.
Amwaambe u kucita shintu mbuli bantu baya kubetekwa u Mulawo upa lwaanguluko.
Nkaambo Leza ulakabeteka cakubula inkumbu kuli wezo utalekelela, babo bakwete luse tabeelele kutiya lubeta lwa Leza.
Nubakwesu no mbulumbuunzhi muntu mbwaayana kuti nkaamba ati, “Ndikwete lushomo amana talusebezha? Sa lolo lushomo lwakwe lulakonzha kumufwutula?”
Atwaambe na kuli mukwesu mukaintu na mulombwana ushoma wabula shakusama na cakulya,
amana umwi wenu waamba ati, “Koya muluumuno, uyane shakulihumba u shilyo,” amana wiina uncaamupa cakulihumba caamubili, cilamuyohwaanzhi ceco?
Umbona bobo alo lushomo lwiina milimo, lulifwile.

Umwi ulakonzha kwaamba ati, “Uwe ulikwete lushomo, ame ndikwete milimo mibotu” Ume ndamwita ati, “Ntondezha na muntu ulakonzha kukwata lushomo bwiina milimo. Ume nkutondezha lushomo lwangu kwiita u milimo yangu.”
Umwe mulahumina ati Leza uli womwi bulyo, mulacita kabotu, ayo myoza mibiyabi ilahumina u kuzhangama cabukandu.
Sa uwe umuntu umulimbushi ulazanda kwaamba ushimwinwe ati lushomo lwiina milimo lulifwile?
Shaakale wesu Abulahamu wakalulamikwa kwiita mu milimo yakwe ya lushomo, ciindi naakaakuzanda kupaizha Aizeki mwanakwe acipaililo.
Inta ninzho mwabona ati lushomo lwakwe u milimo yakwe kashisebezela antoomwi, lushomo lwakwe lwakalumikwa kwiita u milimo yakwe.
Ubobo akazuzucizhiwa Malembe amba ati, “Abulahamu wakamushoma Leza, inzho ukaambo ka lushomo lwakwe, Leza wakamutambula kwaamba mululami.” Ubobo Abulahamu wakatewa ati mulongwaakwe Leza.
Mwabona ninzho kwaamba nku kumilimo yesu nkutululamikilwa kwa Leza, ukutali ku lushomo ice pe.
Ubobo, umbona mubili wiina Moza mufwu, alo lushomo lwiina milimo, ndufwu.
Bakwesu mutabi ba maayi noonse pe, nkaambo mulizhi ati uswe nituyiisha Leza ulakatulangisha twaambo twesu ciindi cakubetekwa kubaala twa bamwi.
Nkaambo toonse tulalubizha munzhila shinji shinji. Kuti muntu talubizha kwiita mu kwaamba kwakwe nkukuti wezo muntu ulilondokele cini cini, ulimwi ulakonzha kulikwata lwakwe mwini.
Tulabika lubulo mukanwa ka Mbizhi kwaamba tulinyone kabotu, ubobo tulalitola kufwumbwa nkutuzanda.
Ulimwi amwaabone mato makando alo aafwumbi naakakomena buti ulimwi nuukaunga buti muuwo inkashi inshoonto ilabunyona u kuya kufwumbwa koko nkwaazanda shikweenzha.
Mbuubele umulaka, ncizo cishoonto pele ulalikankaizha ku shintu shikando. Amutelaikile musanza mbuukonzha kumana kupiya kuhwa ukalilo kashoonto kasonswa!

Ubobo, mulaka uli ukoya mulilo. Mulaka nguubaala kumwaya impuwo imbiyabi akati kashizo shesu shoonse. Ulazonauna bukale boonse bwa muntu. Mulaka ulasonsa mulilo uhwa ku kalambwe kamulilo utamana u kutenta bumi boonse bwa muntu.
Banyama boonse ba anshi ano u bazuni bauluka, iinswi shamumeenzhi shilapingulwa alimwi shakapingulwa u bantu.
Pele kwiina muntu naaba womwi ukonzha kupingula mulaka. Mulaka wiina bucindulule, mubiyabisha uli ukoya incefwa.
Tuloosebezha kutembaula Mwami Tatesu, ulimwi u kushinganya bantu babo Leza mbaakalenga mu cinkozha cakwe.
Mazwi akulumba u kushinganya, alahwa mu mulomo womwi. Ceci nubakwesu taceelele kucitika.
Sa meenzhi alweela alula alakonzha kuhwa mu mwiinzo womwi nguwena?
Bukuzu nubakwesu tabunkonzha kuzhala mafwumu, cisamu ca masaansa tacikonzha kuzhala inkuzu u mwiinzo wameenzhi alula mwino tookonzha kukusha meenzhi mabotu.
Sa kuli musongo ukwete luzhibo akati kenu? Naatondezhe milimo yakwe kwiita mu bumi bubotu, bwakulifwiinsha ulimwi buhwa ku busongo.
Pele na mulikwete myonzo ya munyono u bushikalifwune, mutaakulyeensheensha nikuba kusebezha lucengo kwaamba mulwishe lushinizho.
Nkaambo busongo buli bobo tabuhwi kwizeulu mbwa bantu, mbwa myoza mibiyabi.
Aali munyono u bushikalifwune, ali lupyopyongano u shibi shamishobo yoonse.

Pele busongo buhwa kwizeulu bulasalala, ulimwi mbwa luumuno mbwa kabonhwe mbwa bunina bwiina kampenda mbwa bushicamba mbwa kulifwiinsha mbwa bushiluse, ulimwi mbwa kucita shitu shimwi shoonse shibotu. Tabusalulula, tabulisumpula.
Bashikuleta luumuno u bashanga luumuno, balatebula bululami.
Ncinzhi cileta inkondo u kulwa akati kenu? Sa cimupa kulwa akati kenu takuli kuzandisha shintu shaku mubili?
Kuli shintu nshimuzandisha pele tamushiyani, ubobo mulayaya. Mulalikumbuzha shintu nshimutakonzha kuyana, ubobo mulazwangana ukulwa. Tamushiyani shintu sheshi nkaambo tamulombi kwa Leza.
Nikuba kwaamba mwalomba tamupewa nkaambo makanze enu taaluleme, mulazanda kuzuzucizha bubiyabi buli mu myonzo yenu.
Umwe nubantu batashomeki! Sa tamwinzhi ati kucita mulongo u shintu shaku mubili nkuba shinkondonina Leza? Kufwumbwa muntu u tanga mulongo shintu shaano anshi, ati ngu shinkondonina Leza.
Sa mulatelaika ati ngakucenga Malembe aamba ati, “Moza Usalala, Leza ngwabikile mulyuuswe ulitufwini ulimwi ulatufwila bufwi.”
Pele luse lwa Leza ndukandosha. Mbubona mbwaamba Malembe ati, “Leza ulabakaka bantu bamunyansha, pele ulabafwila luse babo balibonzha.”
Inzho amulibonzhe kwa Leza. Noomukake Shaatani, kwaamba alukancile kulaale.
Amuswene afwaafwi u Leza aze ulaba afwaafwi amwe. Amusalazhe maumi enu umwe nubashishibi. Amululamike myonzo yenu umwe nubashikoopoopa amenso.
Amulyeetezhe, mulile u kutengula. Kuseka kwenu kube kulila, kusapwa kwenu kube kuungumana!
Amulibonzhe ku Mwami kwaamba amusumpule.

Nubakwesu mutaakusampauzhanya. Kuti mwasampauzhanya u kubetekana, nkukuti mulasampaula u kubeteka Mulawo wa Leza. Tamukonzha kuba bantu bacilila mulawo kuti mulawo wa Leza moobeteka, pele mulaba bantu bashikubeteka mulawo wa Leza.
Leza ice nguupa Mulawo ulimwi nguubeteka. Walo ice nguufwutula u kuzonauna. Anu uwe ndiweni, uubeteka mweenzhinoko?
Nikuba bobo tamwizhi mbubukaaca zona. Anu bumi bwenu ncinzhi? Nkaambo umwe muli ukoya ingubi njitubona kwa ciindi cishoonto bulyo yamana yaya.
Mu lushinizho mulyeelele kwaamba ati, “Kuti Mwami Leza akuzanda, twaakucipona, tulaacita ceci ucelya.”
Pele umwe mulalyeema u kulyeensheensha. Koonse kulyeensheensha kuli bobo takululeme.
Inzho kufwumbwa muntu ucizhi ncaayelele kucita amana taciciti ati wacita cibi.
Inzho umwe nubahubi, amulile u koomoka nkaambo ka mapenzhi a kamwizhila.
Buhubi bwenu bwabola, shakusama shenu shaliwa impezu.
Goludi wenu u siliva shakwata sence, inzho nguwena sence wezo ngu kamboni ukaamuzula ulimwi ulakazonauna mibili wenu ukoya mulilo. Mwalundika lubono mu mazuba ano a mamanino.
Mwabona, mwiina kubalipila baba batebula mu myuunda yenu, balila mwabasebezha calucengo. Matongaushi abo bashikutebula wateelela Keemba Mutalabala.
Mwabulya bwa anshi ano mwabusupa. Mwalicila mwaina mulalindila buzuba bwa kuyaiwa.
Mwapa mulandu ukubayaya bantu bayina nkaambo, ulimwi takamukasha.
Nubakwesu, amukalike myonzo yenu, kushicila mpaka Mwami akeze. Amubone mulimi mbwaalindila muunda wakwe ati ukuzhe shishango shibotu. Ulalindila cambakala kuhwa kasemuna mpaka mainza.
Amwe amukwate shamba mbubona. Amulindile ca monzo omwi nkaambo buzuba bwa Mwami buli afwaafwi kushika.
Nubakwesu, mutatongaukani, kwaamba Leza atakamubeteci. Amubone mubeteshi ulizhimine amulyango.
Nubakwesu, amubazhibaluke bashinshimi bakakambauka mwizhina lya Mwami. Ceco acibe cikozhano ca bushicamba nikuba kwaamba ati bakapenzhewa.
Tulabaamba ati balitanjele nkaambo bakakwata myonzo. Mwakateelela bu shicamba bwaka Jobo, ulimwi mulizhi Mwami nshakamucitila ku mamanino, nkaambo Mwami ngu shiluse ulimwi ngu shilweenzo.

Kuli sheshi shoonse, nubakwesu, mutabi nimulumbila nimucita cishomezho. Mutalumbila ati nku kwizeulu na nga anshi niciba cintu cimwi pe. Amwaambe ati “Ee” nimuhumina ulimwi “Pe pe” nimukaka bobo tamukabi mulubeta lwa Leza.
Sa kuli ukwete ipenzhi akati kenu? Naakombe. Sa kuli u botelelwe akati kemu? Naimbe inyimbo shakutembaula Leza.
Sa kuli mulwazhi akati kenu? Ulyeelele kwita basololi ba mbungano kwaamba bamukombele u kumunanika mafwuta mwizhina lya Mwami.
Kukomba kwa lushomo kulamuponya mulwazhi, Mwami ulamubusha, ulimwi u shibi shoonse nshaakacita shilalekelelwa.
Ubobo amushimwizhanye shibi shenu akati kenu, ulimwi mukombelane kwaamba mupone. Kukomba kwa muntu ululeme kulikwete insana inkando.
Elaija kali muntu ulya maila ukoya uswe. Wakakomba ati inhula itawi, cini cini iina niyakawa kwa myaka yotatwe u myezhi cisambomwi.
Amane wakakomba lwabili inhula yakawa, ayo inshi yakeezha micelo.
Nubakwesu, na umwi wenu wawa mu lushomo waleka kucita shiluleme, amana umwi wamuzhola,
amuzhibe ati wazhola shishibi kuhwa ku shibiyabi, ulafwutula bumi bwa muntu wezo kuhwa ku lufwu, ulimwi u shibi shakwe shinji shinji shilakalecelelwa.
Ndime Pita mutumwa waka Jeso Kilisito, ndamulembela nubasale ba Leza nubeenzu numumweele mumasena oonse ku Pontusi uku Galatiya uku Kapadosiya uku Ezha ulimwi uku Bisuniya.

Mu matelaishi akwe Leza ushesu wakamusala u luzhibo lwakwe luzwile kuhwa ku makancilo. Kwiita mu kusalazhiwa u Moza Usalala kwaamba mulemeke u kumuteelele Jeso Kilisito kwaamba musalazhiwe u bulowa bwakwe.
Luse u luumuno luhwa kwa Leza shihuzhiwe muli umwe.
Naatembaulwe Leza, Ushi Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito! Nkaambo ka nkumbu shakwe shinji shinji, wakatupa bumi bupiya kwaamba tube u bulanjizhi bwini bwini kwiita mukubuka kwa Jeso Kilisito ku bafwu.
Ulimwi tulalanjila kuya kutambula lubono luzobwelwe kwizeulu, lusalala lwiina kampenda, lutaliwa senke.
Leza kwiita munsana shakwe, ulamukwabilila mpaka mukatambule lufwutuko lolo ndwaakaazubulula ku mamanino a ciindi.
Inzho amutangale ku shintu sheshi shoonse, nikuba kwaamba ati mulanjila mu masukusho andeene andeene kwa ciindi cishoonto bulyo.

Aza masukusho alatondezha lushomo lwenu kwaamba ati lulabaala a goludi isunkwa u mulilo lulishinizhe. Umbona goludi nikuba kuti ilazonaunwa ilasunkwa u mulilo, u lushomo lwenu mbulukaasunkwa umasukusho. Ceci cilakamuletela kutembaulwa u kulemekwa u kusumpulwa ca bulemu ciindi Jeso Kilisito naakaazhoka.
Nikuba ati Jeso Kilisito tamuna mubwene, mulimufwini, ulimwi mulamushoma. Ubobo amutangale u lutangalo lukando, ulutakonzha kupandululwa mu mazwi.
Mukucita bobo mulakatambula bulumbu bwa lushomo lwenu, bwalo mbubulumbu bwa lufwutuko lwa bumi bwenu.
Bashinshimi bakashinshima sha luse lolu lukaatambulwa, bakakapula u kubuzha buzha usha cipo ca lufwutuko ceco Leza ncaakaamupa.

Moza waka Kilisito kooli mubabele, nguwakaakubashimwina mbwakaapenga, ulimwi usha bulemu mbwakaapewa. Ubobo bakakapula kwaamba bezhibe cini cini na Kilisito ulakaakuli buti, ulimwi sheshi shilakacitika liliye, na shilakacitika buti?

Leza wakazubulula ku bashinshimi babo ati kabatalisebezeli beni, pele ukaambo kenu bakaakwaamba sheshi nshimuteelela ninzho. Bakambaushi ba Makani Mabotu bakamwaambila sheshi kwiita mu Moza Usalala uwakatumwa kuhwa kwizeulu. Sheshi nshishintu shakwaamba u baanjelo shesho abo nshibazanda kuzhibisha.
Ubobo amulibambile mu mizeezo yenu, mubike bulanjizhi bwenu boonse mu luse lolo lukeezhiza kulyuumwe ciindi Jeso Kilisito nakaalibonya.
Amube bana bateelela Leza, ulimwi mutaakucilila shisushi sha shintu shibiyabi nshimwakaakucita kale kale kamutana kumuzhiba Kilisito.
Pele umbona mbwaasalala wezo wakamoompolola, amwe umbona amusalale.
Nkaambo kulilembelwe mu Malembe ati, “Muli elele kusalala, nkaambo ume ndasalala.”
Inzho mbumwita Leza ati Taata, wezo utasalulula, uubeteka kufwumbwa muntu kwiingainya u shintu nshaakacita. Nkukuti amumutiye Leza ciindi coonse ncimuli anshi ano.
Ulimwi mulizhi ati mwakaulwa kuhwa ku shiyanza shabuntu bwa anshi nshimwakakona ku maushenu. Mwiina kunununwa u mali a siliva u goludi atamana pe,
pele mwakanununwa u cipaizho ca bulowa bwa Kilisito bu zandika, walo wakayaiwa ukoya Mwanaa Mbelele iina kampenda naa kabala.
Kilisito kali musale kale kwa Leza katana kulenga inshi. Pele ciindi ceno ca mamanino wapa kwaamba mumubone.
Kwiita mwakwe mulashoma Leza walo wakamubusha ku bafwu u kumupa bulemu bunji bunji. Ubobo lushomo lwenu u kulanjila kwenu kube mwa Leza.
Inzho bolya mbumwaasalazha myonzo yenu mu kuteelela sha lushinizho luzwile ukaambo kalufwuno lwini lwini ku banyokwenu mu lushomo, amufwunane ca kumaninina.
Mwakazhalululwa, kutali ku muntu ufwa, pele muli banakwe Leza, Ushenu utafwi, kwiita mu mazwi a bumi butamana.
Malembe alaamba ati,
“Bantu boonse bali ukoya bwizu,
bweebeshi bwalo buli ukoya maluba luba.
Bwizu bulazuma, u malubaluba alakunkumuka,
pele Mazwi a Mwami taakamana.”
Mazwi aza Makani Mabotu ngumwakakambaucilwa.
Ubobo amuleke bubiyabi boonse u lweeno u kuupaupa amenso u munyono u kuhwiyana koonse.
Amube ukoya bana balubembe, lyoonse balafwa inyota ya kunonka mukupa mubotu waku moza, kwaamba amwe mwanwa mukomene ku lufwutuko,
bolya mbumwasola u kuzhiba bubotu bwa Mwami.
Inzho kamwiza ku Mwami, uutewa ati ibwe lya bumi lyakakakwa u bantu, pele kumenso a Leza ndisale ulimwi ndiyebeshi.
Inzho ukoya mabwe apona, amuzakwe kuba iŋanda ya moza, mube ukoya bapaizhi basalala bakonzha kupa shipaizho sha moza shitambulwa kwa Leza kwiita mwa Jeso Kilisito.
Nkaambo mu Malembe mulilembelwe ati,
“Amubone, ndashimpa ibwe mu Ziyoni.
Ibwe lya mucooko ca ŋanda, isale ulimwi izandishi,
Wezo umushoma takafwi insoni pe.”
“Ibwe ndibakakaka bazashi lyaba
ndiibwe likwete mulimo kubaala oonse.”
“Leli ndiibwe lileba bantu,
mwala ubafwumpula ukubacina.”
Balifwumpula nkaambo bayina kulitambula izwi lya Leza, nkaambo Leza mbwakaakuzanda ati cibe.
Kale kale kamutali bantu baleza, pele ninzho muli bantu bakwe. Kale kale kamutafwilwa luse lwa Leza, pele ninzho Leza ulamufwilwa luse.
Nubafwunwa, mbumuli beenzu bakala mucishi citali cenu, ndamukumbila ati mulikashe kucita shisushi shibiyabi shaku mubili shilwisha bumi bwenu bwaku moza.
Amucenjele u bukale bwenu bubotu akati ka bantu bakunze, kwaamba nikukaba ati bamulenjelela kucita shibiyabi, beebone milimo yenu mibotu u kulemeka Leza mu buzuba bwa kwiza kwakwe.
Ukaambo ka Mwami Leza, amulibombye ku bantu boonse babikwa ati balele, nikuba ku muleli mukando waku Loma,
naaba ku beendelezhi mbaakabika kwaamba baakupa cisubulo babo bacita shitaluleme ulimwi ukulutembaula bacita shiluleme.
Nkaambo luzando lwa Leza ndwakuti umwe mwacita shibotu, baliinze boonse bantu balimbushi bayina ncibezhi.
Amupone ca bantu baangulushi, mutasebezha lwaanguluko lwenu kwaamba cibe cilebyo cakuhumba cibi, pele amucite ukoya basebezhi ba Leza.
Amulemeke bantu boonse. Amufwunane u banyokwenu mu lushomo. Amutiye Leza. Amulemeke muleli mukando waku Loma.
Nu batwanga, amulibombye ku bashimalelo benu u kubalemeka, ukutali bulyo bashiluse u babonhu myonzo pe, pele u bashilukomokomo.
Nkaambo muntu ulafwilwa luse kuti katweluka Leza ciindi naapenzhewa butaluleme.
Mbulumbu nzhi muntu mbwaakonzha kuyana na kuti waumwa ukaambo kakucita citaluleme amana wacitambula bushicamba? Pele kuti ciindi niwacita cibi wapenga cambakala, nkukuti Leza ulamufwila luse.
Bukale bobu imbubo Leza mbwaakamwitila. Nkaambo Kilisito bakamupenzha ukaambo kako, ubobo wakamushiila cikozhanyo kwaamba mucilile.
Walo wiina naakacita cibi nikuba kwaamba cabubeshi pe.
Ciindi bantu nibakaakumusampaula, wiina naakazhola pe. Ciindi naakapenzhewa wiina naakabakonga pe. Pele wakabika shoonse mu matashi a Leza uubeteka cabululami.
Kilisito wakabweza shibi shesu mu mubili wakwe a ciciinkano kwaamba tupone bumi bwiina shibi, bumi bwa bululami. Mwakashilikwa u shilonda shakwe.
Mwakaakuli ukoya imbelele inzhimini, pele ninzho mwapiluka ku mweembezhi uyembela myoza yenu.
nkaambo balabona mbumumutiya u kulilemeka kwenu.
Ubobo bubotu bwenu butabi bulyo bweezeulu, ukoya bwakupesa masusu, u kusama tukolaikwa twa goludi, u shisani shidula.
Pele kubota kwenu akube kwa mukati ka monzo, koku nkukubota kutamana kwa monzo mubonhu ushitikile ulimwi mubotu kwa Leza.
Nkaambo umbona bobo u kale kale bakaintu basalala uba kaakubika bulanjizhi bwabo kwa Leza bakaakulibosha cini cini ulimwi bakaakulibonzha ku balumyaabo.
U Saala mbwakaakubele kamulemeka u kumuteelela Abulahamu, kamutembula ati, “Mwami wangu.” Ubobo umwe muli banakwe Saala kuti mwacita shiluleme cakutatiya naashoonto.
Inzho kumaninzha, ndaamba ati amube u monzo womwi, u kweetezhewa u lufwuno lwa bunina, u monzo mubonhu ulimwi u matelaishi a kulifwiinsha.
Mutazholela cibiyabi ku cibiyabi, na kuzhola itushi kwi tushi. Pele mulonjezhe, nkaambo ceci ncaakamwitila Leza ati amulonjezhe.
Malembe a Leza alaamba ati,
“Wezo ufwini bumi bubotu u kubona mazuba mabotu,
alikashe kwaamba shibiyabi,
mulomo wakwe utaamba shakubeya.
Naasanduke kuhwa ku bubiyabi, acite shibotu.
Akapule luumuno u monzo woonse.
Nkaambo menso a Leza alilangilile bantu balulami,
u matwi akwe aliyalucile ulateelela kukomba kwabo,
pele babo bacita shibiyabi Mwami ulabafwutamina.”
Nguni ukonzha kumucitila cibiyabi kuti mwalisungula kucita shiluleme?
Pele naa mulapenga ukaambo kabululami, mulakalonjezhewa. Mutabatiyi ncibatiya bantu nikuba kukongwa.
Pele mu myonzo yenu amumulemeke Kilisito nkaambo ngu Mwami wenu. Muukulibambile lyoonse kwaamba mubapandululile boonse bamubuzha makani a bulanjizhi mbumukwete ca bulemu,

pele amucite bobo ca bulemu u myonzo misengushi. Amube u mizeezo ina kampenda kwaamba ciindi nimusampaulwa ukaambo kashibotu nshimucita ukaambo kakuti mulacilila Kilisito, mubaushe insoni bacita bobo.
Ncibotu kupenzhewa ukaambo kakucita ciluleme lwaakuli luzando lwa Leza, kubaala kupenzhewa ukaambo kakucita shitaluleme.
Nkaambo Kilisito wakafwila shibi shabantu ciindi comwi bulyo. Wezo ululeme wakatufwila uswe nitutaluleme, kwaamba atulete kwa Leza. Kuyayiwa ku mubili, pele kubushiwa ku moza,
mu moza nguwena wezo wakaya ku kukambaucila myoza myaange muntolongo.
Akati ka myoza yezho, kakuli yababo batakateelela kale kale ciindi Leza naakalindila cambakala mazuba aka Nowa, ciindi naakaakupanga bwato. Mwalo mbashoonto bulyo bali lusele bakafwutuka ku meenzhi.

Meenzhi azo alikozhene u lupapatizo lwalo lumufwutula ninzho. Lupapatizo takuli kusanzha matombe a mubili pe, pele ncishomezho ncaakapa Leza kuhwa ku manjezheezha mabotu u nkaambo ka kubuka kwa Jeso Kilisito.
Jeso wakaya kwizeulu ulimwi uli kucilyo kwa Leza. Koko baanjelo u bashibwami uba shinsana nkubamupupulala u kumulemeka.
Inzho ukoya Kilisito mbwaakapenga ku mubili, amwe muli elele kulibambila kupenga, nkaambo mulizhi ati kufwumbwa upenga tanjili linji mu shibi.
Ubobo ciindi nimucipona anshi ano, mutacilila shisushi shaku mubili, mucilile bulyo nshaazanda Leza.
Nkaambo kale kale mwakaakucita shesho bakunze nshibazanda. Mwakaakweenda mu busofwaazhi, buhuule, bucakolwa, bulyato, kusenga cibaala u kukomba mizhimu u shibumbwa shitonda.
Inzho ceno ciindi bakunze balazhingwa babona ati mwaleka kucitaabo shisofweele, nciceco ncibamusampaulila.
Pele balakalyaambilila milandu yabo beni kwa Leza wezo ukaabeteka bapona u bafwu.
Nkukaambo kako Makani Mabotu ncaakakambaucilwa ukubafwu, kwaamba nikukaba ati bakabetekwa ku mubili mbuli bantu boonse, bamana bakapone mu moza umbona mbuli mbwaapona Leza.
Inzho mamanino a shintu shoonse alyaafwaafwi. Ubobo amusungwaale cakupakamana kwaamba muzume mutakatali kukukomba.
Cintu cikando ncakuti muzandane cakutalengaana. Nkaambo lufwuno nduluhumba shibi shinji shinji.
Umwe amutambulane cakutatongauka.
Uumwi cipo ceco ncaakatambula kwa Leza acisebezhe mukuyohwa beenzhiina. Mube mbuli babanzhi basebezha kabotu shipo sha luse shandeene andeene.

Wezo ukambauka akambauke ukoya ulaamba mazwi ahwa kwa Leza. Wezo usebeza naasebeze munsana shihwa kwa Leza, kwaamba ati mu shintu shoonse Leza apewe bulemu kwiita mwa Jeso Kilisito. Ukwakwe kube bulemu u bulelo shikwense u shikwense. Ameni.
Nubafwunwa ku Mwami, citamubeli cintu ceenzu, ulimwi mutazhingwa kumapenzhi ezhiza kwenu kumusunka ali ukoya mulilo uhwilima.
Pele amutangale nkaambo mulapengela mwa Kilisito kwaamba akapiluka mu bulemu bwakwe, amwe mukatangale cini cini.
Kuti naa mwasampaulwa ukaambo kezhina lya Kilisito, muli balonjezhe, nkaambo kakuti Moza wa bulemu wa Leza, muli awo.
Kutabi u penga ukaambo kabuyazhi u butewu u bufwumpi u kunjila mu twaambo twabeni.
Pele kuti kamupenzhewa ukaambo kakuti muli bana Kilisito mutausa insoni pe, pele mulemeke Leza ukaambo kezhina lya Kilisito.
Inzho ciindi cashika uca kwaamba Leza akanke kubeteka bantu ba ŋanda yakwe. Naa lubeta lolu lwakancila kwesu, no cilakaba buti kuli babo batacilila Makani Mabotu ahwa kwa Leza?
Mazwi a Leza alaamba ati,
“Kuti kacili cizumu ku mululami kwaamba akafwutulwe,
No ku mubiyabi utacilila sha Leza cilakaba buti?”
Ubobo, babo bapenga mu luzando lwa Leza, abalipe mu matashi a Shikabumba wabo ushomeka ukutolelela kucita milimo mibotu.
Inzho ume mundi musololinokwenu u kamboni wamapenzhi aka Kilisito, ulimwi ndalanjila kuya kutambula bulemu bobo bukaazubululwa, ndabazumya zumya bakando ba mbungano.
Amweembele butanga bwa Leza mbumupelwe, cakutashinikizhiwa pe, pele cakulisungula, kweendelana u Leza mbwaazanda. Acibe cintu ncimuzanda kucita, citali cakuyanina impindu.
Mutabi mbuli baleli, nimubasololela babo mbumulanga, pele amutondezhe bukale bubotu ku mbungano.
Ulimwi mweembezhi mukando akazubuluka mulakatambula cipo ca bulemu butamana.
Amwe nubakubushi amulibonzhe kubakando. Ulimwi noonse mulibambile kusebezelana cakulibonzha. Nkaambo Malembe alaamba ati, “Leza ulabakaka balisumpula, pele babonhu myonzo ulabafwila luse.”
Amutole mapenzhi enu oonse kwakwe nkaambo nguumubamba lyoonse.
Amupakamane mutaliiba, nkaambo shinkondonokwenu Shaatani uleendeenda ukoya shuumbwa wabutambo uya bukapula ngwaazanda kuluma.
Naamukake, muzume mu lushomo nkaambo mulizhi ati banyokwenu mu lushomo, boonse ano anshi balaita mu mapenzhi akozhene u ngumukwete.

Ubobo mwamana kupenga kwa kaindi kashoonto, Leza shiluse loonse nguukaamupa bubotu bwa bulemu bwakwe, nguukamuzhola u kumubika antalisho ikwatile u kumuzumya zumya. Inguwe nguwakamwita kwaamba mukanjile mu bulemu bwakwe butamana mu lukamantano u Jeso Kilisito.
Bwami nabube bwakwe shikwense u shikwense. Ameni.
Balamwaanzha ba mbungano yamu Babiloni mbumwakasalwa abo. U mwanangu Maako wamwaanzha.
Amwaanzhanye ca lufwuno.
Leza amupe luumuno noonse numuli mu lukamantano u Kilisito.
Ndime Saimoni Pita, musebezhi u mutumwa wa Jeso Kilisito, ndalembela babo bakatambula lushomo ukoya lolu ndutukwete kwiita umbululami bwa Leza u Mufwutuli wesu Jeso Kilisito.
Leza amufwile luse u kumupa luumuno lunji lunji cibaala kwiita muluzhibo lwa Leza u Jeso Kilisito Mwami wesu.
Kilisito munsana shabu Leza bwakwe, wakatupa shoonse shituyohwa kuba u bumi u bukombi bwini bwini. Wakacita bobo kwiita muluzhibo lwesu lwa Leza uwakatwita kwaamba twaabane bulemu u bubotu bwakwe.
Muli sheshi shoonse wakatupa shishomezho shizandwa kwaamba mukatambule bumi bwa buleza, kwaamba mufwutulwe, mutazonaunwa ukaambo ka shisushi sha bumi bwa shibi.
Kukaambo kaka nkukona amukwatishe kwaamba muzunjile lushomo kububotu, ulimwi kububotu muzunjile luzhibo,
ulimwi kuluzhibo muzunjile kulikwata, ulimwi kukulikwata muzunjile bushicamba, ulimwi kubushicamba muzunjile buleza,
ulimwi kubuleza muzunjile lufwuno lwa bunina, kulufwuno lwa bunina muzunjile lufwuno ku bantu boonse.
Naa sheshi shoonse mulishikwete, ati tamukabi bakata bayina mulimo, shilakamupa kuba u busongo u luzhibo lwa Mwami Jeso Kilisito.
Pele wezo wiina sheshi, ati moofwu takonzha kubona pe. Waluba kwaamba ati musanzhe ulimwi ulasalala kuhwa ku shibi shakwe shakale kale.
Inzho nubakwesu, amuzhime cakushankamana mwa Leza wakamwita u kumusala kwaamba mutawi. Naa mwacita bobo, tamukonzha kuhwa mu lushomo lwenu pe,
pele mulakayalulilwa mulyango wakunjila mu bwami butamana bwa Mwami Jeso Kilisito Mufwutuli wesu.
Ubobo ume nshikonzha kuleka kumuzhibalusha makani aza nikuba ati mulyeezhi kale, ulimwi mulashoma cini cini calushinizho u myonzo yenu yoonse kunjiisho shiluleme nshimwakatambula.
Ndatelaika ati ncintu cibotu kumuzhibalusha sheshi nincipona umubili wa buntu.
Nkaambo ndizhi ati ciindi cilyaafwaafwi cakuhwa mu mubili wangu wa buntu umbona mbwaakaŋambila Mwami wesu Jeso Kilisito.
Ulimwi ndasoleka cini cini kwaamba ati ndakaahwa ume mukaakwaazhibaluka makani aza lyoonse.
Nkaambo nitwakamuzhibya makani ansana sha Jeso Kilisito usha kwiza kwakwe katutacilila tushimpi twakapangwa u busongo bwa bantu pe. Pele twakalibonena u menso esu bukando bwakwe.
Twakaakuliko ciindi Jeso naakatambula bulemu kuhwa kwa Leza Ushi, lelyo izwi nilyakashika kwakwe lyaamba ati, “Wezu ngu Mwanangu nakufwunwa, uumpa kubotelwa lyoonse.”
Uswe mulwesu tubeni twakaliteelela leli izwi lyakahwa kwizeulu ciindi nitwakaakuli aze ku lupili lusalala.

Ubobo twazhiba cakushinizha kwaamba mazwi a bashinshimi meni meni. Ati mwacita kabotu kuti na mwaateelela, nkaambo ali ukoya ilambe limunika mu mushinze mpaka kumancela, ukoya intanda imunika mu myonzo yenu.
Pele cintu cikando ncakuti muzhibe ati kwiina mushinshimi ukonzha kupandulula mazwi ali mu Malembe kwiita munsana shakwe mwini.
Kwiina bushinshimi bwakezhiza kuluzando lwa muntu, pele bantu kabasololelwa u Moza Usalala kwaamba mazwi a Leza.

Pele abo bashinshimi babeshi bakalibonya akati ka bantu, umbona mbukukaaba ba maayi babeshi akati kenu. Balakakanka kufwifwilisha mizeezo itazaci injiisho shakuzonauna, ulimwi balakamukaka Mwami wabo wakabanununa. Inzho balakaliletela beni kuzonaunwa.
Nikuba bobo, banji banji balakacilila busofwaazhi bwabo. Ulimwi ukaambo ka shintu nshibacita bantu banji banji balakakanka kusampaula inzhila ya lushinizho.
Mu kuzanda kuhuba balakasebezha mazwi a kubumba alucengo. Pele cisubulo cabo ncibambe kale, ulimwi ako kuzonaunwa kwabo kulabalindila.
Nkaambo Leza wiina naakabalekelela baanjelo bakabisha, pele wakabawaala kubusena bukala bafwu ku mushinze ushiya mbi, nkubaanjilwe inceetani kulindila lubeta.

Ulimwi Leza wiina naakabalekelela bakale kale, wakafwutula bulyo Nowa wakaakukambauka makani abululami, kubicilizha ubamwi bali ciloba, ciindi naakatuma muyoba wezambangulwe ku bantu batakamutiya Leza.
Leza wakabeteka minzhi ya Sodomu u Gomola. Wakeetenta umulilo mpaka kwakashaala bulyo itwe, wakeecita kwaamba cibe citondezho ku bantu babo batatiyi Leza.
Pele wakafwutula Loti, walo mululami wakakwata isukusho umbweende bwabashimucita shibi mu mamfwunze abo akubula mulawo.
Nkaambo muntu wezo ululeme nakaakukala akati kabo, mazuba oonse wakaakupenga mu monzo wakwe mulondoshi nkaambo ka milimo yabo mibiyabi njakaakubona u kuteelela.
Inzho Mwami Leza ulizhi mbwaafwutula bantu bakwe bamukomba mbaahuna kuhwa kumasunko, ulimwi ulizhi mbwakaabeteka bataluleme kwaamba bakasubulwe mu buzuba bwa lubeta.
Kwaamba ashinizhe, ulakapa cisubulo babo beenda mu shisushi shabo shabuntu kubicilizha u babo basampaula bwami shilengwa shabulemu bwa Leza.
Nibakaba baanjelo ubabaala insana u bukando ku shilenje shoonse, tabaleti mulandu wakusampaula babo balemekwa kumbele lya Leza.

Bantu baba bali ukoya banyama bayina maanu, bakalengwa ati bakukwatwa ukuyaiwa. Balasampaula shintu nshibatezhi. Balalwisha bamwi bantu u kutukana matushi ku shintu nshibatezhi. Balakayayiwa ukoya banyama ba mwisokwe.
Umbona mbubakapenzha bantu bamwi, abo balakapenzhewa. Nkaambo balabotelwa inzhila shabo shalucengo, balasapwa mukulya u kunwa munzhila shisesemya lumwi lubala.
Menso abo lyoonse ngamamambe taaleka kubisha. Baloonjelezha batana kushima mu lushomo. Myonzo yabo ilizhibile kuweza lubono. Mbashinganye kwa Leza.
Beeshiya inzhila iluleme, bamane batola inzhila yaka Balamu mwanakwe Beyo, wakaakuzandisha impindu mukucita shibiyabi.
Imbongolo yakwe yakamukazha ukaambo kakulubizha kwakwe. Imbongolo munyama utaamba, yakaamba izwi lyabuntu, kumulesha busondoshi mbwakaakumukwete mushinshimi wezu.
Baba ba maayi babeshi bali ukoya tulonga twiina meenzhi, ukoya ingubi iya butonkwa ikunku. Leza wakababambila busena bwa mushinze ushiya mbi.
Balakanana mazwi akulyeensheensha, a buntu bwabo bwamamfwunze, baloonjelezha beenzhinokwabo bazanda kufwutuka kuhwa ku shibi sheshi kwaamba balubizhe ulimwi.
Balabashomezha lwaanguluko nikuba ati balo beni mbazhice ba shintu shibiyabi shizonauna bumi. Nkaambo muntu ulaba muzhice waceco ncazanda.

Nkaambo kuti bantu bahunwa kuhwa ku busofwaazhi bwa anshi mukuzhiba Mwami wesu, Mufwutuli wesu Jeso Kilisito, pele kwamana awo bapiluka ulimwi bazundwa ku busofwaazhi, meni meni ngakuti baba bantu balakabiya kubaala mbubakaakubele akutaanguna.
Nicaakuli cibotu kwaamba nibatakeezhiba bulyo inzhila ya bululami, kubaala kwaamba ati bataangune kwiizhiba bamana ku mamanino bakuhwe ku Mulawo Usalala, Leza ngwaakabapa.
Nibacita bobo, balatondezha ati kashimpi kaka kalishinizhe kaamba ati, “Mubwa ulapilucila kucilushu cakwe” ulimwi “Ingulube insanzhe ilabweela ukwaalabana muntimba.”
Nubafwunwa, luŋwalu nundamulembela lolu ndwabili. Muli ngawo oonse ndazanda kumuzhibalusha kwaamba mukwate mizeezo iluleme ku shintu sheshi shoonse.
Nciceco ncicampa kumuzhibalusha mazwi akaamba bashinshimi basalala bakale kale, ulimwi u Mulawo wa Mwami Mufwutuli wesu ngumwakapewa u batumwa benu.
Ucakutaanguna muli elele kuteelelesha kwaamba ku mazuba a mamanino bashikulimbusha balakeza kumulimbusha, balakazubuluka kwiza bucilila shisushi shibiyabi shamu myonzo yabo.
Balakaamba ati, “Sa tali wezo wakashomezha ati ulakazhoka? No ulakazhoka liliye? Ba shaakale besu bakafwa kale kale, pele shintu shoonse shicili umbona mbushakaakubele kuhwa ku malenjelo.”
Balilubya lubya lutuzhi kwaamba ku makancilo Leza wakalenga inshi izeulu. Wa kaandaanya inshi u meenzhi, inzho inshi yakazhingulukwa u meenzhi.
Ulimwi inshi yacelya ciindi yakazonaunwa izambangulwe.
Pele Leza u mazwi ngoona aza wakalenga izeulu inshi nshitubona usunu ulakashitenta u mulilo. Ulishibambile mpaka buzuba mbwakakabeteka u kuzonauna bantu basampaula Leza.
Taali ati Mwami Leza wamuka kucita shesho nshaakashomezha, ubutelaika bamwi, ngu shicamba, nkaambo ulazanda ati kutakabi naaba womwi wabo uzonauka, pele ulazanda ati boonse basanduke.
Ubobo, mukuba ati shoonse sheshi shilakazonaunwa munzhila yezhi, no mulakaba bantu bali buti? Mulyeelele kululama mubukale bwenu umu kukomba Leza,

mukulindila kwenu kwa buzuba bwa Leza, u kubusebezela ca nsana kwaamba bushike ca kufwambaana. Mu buzuba bobo sha kwizeulu shilakatentwa u kuzonaunwa, asho shintu sha mwizeulu shilakeenzununwa iibangabanga lya Mulilo.
Pele uswe tulalindila ceco Leza ncaakashomezha, izeulu ipiya, iinshi impiya, momo bantu baluleme muba kaakala.
Ubobo, nubafwunwa ku Mwami, mukulanjila shintu sheshi, amusalale u kupakamana kwaamba mukayanwe mu luumuno ubwiina kampenda.
Amuzhibe kwaamba Leza ulafwila luse nkaambo ulazanda kwaamba ati amufwutule. Aze umbona mukwesu Paulu nakufwunwa, wakamulembela sheshi shoonse u busongo mbwaakamupa Leza.

Wakaamba makani aza mu maŋwalu akwe oonse. Mu maŋwalu azo muli shimwi shintu shilakatazha kuteelela. Bantu ba shicinguni batashiticile mu myonzo balashipilinganya umbupanduluzhi umbuli mbubacita Malembe amwi a Leza. Nibacita bobo balalizonauna beni.
Pele umwe nubafwunwa ku Mwami, bolya mbumushizhi kale sheshi, amucenjele kwaamba lweeno lwa bantu babiyabi lutamusowa ukuwa, kwaamba muzhimininwe ngumushimpile lushomo lwenu.
Pele kamuya bukomena mu luse u muluzhibo lwa Mwami Mufwutuli wesu Jeso Kilisito.
Ukwakwe akube bulemu ubwasunu u mazuba oonse. Ameni.
Uupa bumi naakashika, twakamubona, ulimwi tulapa bumboni bwakwe u kumukambaucila makani a bumi butamana bwakaakuli u Taata bumane bwazubululwa kuli uswe.
Ceco ncitwakabona u kukateelela incico ceco ncitumukambaucila amwe kwaamba mutusangane mu lukamantano ndutukwete u Taata u Jeso Kilisito Mwanakwe.
Twamulembela kwaamba lutangalo lwesu luzulile.
Makani ngu twakateelela kwakwe u kumukananina ngaaza: Leza mumuni, ulimwi mwakwe mwiina mushinze nuuceya.
Kuti twaamba ati tulikwete luswaangano u Leza, twamana tuleendela mu mushinze, ati tuli babeshi, ulimwi tatuponeni mu lushinizho.
Pele kuti katuponena mu mumuni, umbona mbwaali mumuni, nkukuti tulikwete lukamantano kuli umwi uumwi. U bulowa bwaka Jeso Mwanakwe, bulatusalazha ku shibi shoonse.
Kuti twaamba ati twiina cibi, tulalicenga tubeni, ulimwi lushinizho talwimo mulyuuswe.
Pele kuti twalyaamba shibi shesu kwa Leza, walo ulashomeka ulimwi uliluleme, ulatulecelela shibi shesu u kutusalazha ku shintu shoonse shitaluleme.
Kuti twaamba ati twiina shibi, ati twamwaamba bubeshi Leza, ulimwi twiina lushinizho, iizwi lyakwe talimo mulyuuswe.
Banangu ndamulembela aza makani kwaamba mutabisha. Pele kuti umwi wabisha, tulikwete utuzhiminina kwa Taata, wezo ngu Jeso Kilisito, mululami.
Jeso nci cipaizho cimana shibi shesu, ulimwi kutali shesu bulyo pele u shabantu boonse ba anshi ano.
Kuti katucilila Milawo yaka Leza, ati tulatondezha kwaamba tulimwizhi.
Kuti muntu kaamba ati ndimwizhi Leza, amana tacilila Milawo yaka Leza, ati mubeshi u lushinizho talwimo mwakwe.
Pele kufwumbwa muntu ucilila izwi lya Leza, cilatondezha ati ulikwete lufwuno lwa Leza calushinizho. Inzho bobo mbutuzhiba ati tulaponena mwakwe.
Muntu waamba ati uli mu lukamantano u Leza, ulyeelele kupona mbwaakapona Jeso.
Nikuba bobo, ndamulembela mulawo mupiya, nkaambo lushinizho lwa mulawo wezu lulabonwa mwa Kilisto u muli umwe. Nkaambo mushinze ulaya bwaahwa, mumuni wa cini cini wakanka kale kumunika.
Kufwumbwa muntu waamba ati uli mu mumuni, kwamana uliswile munina, ati ucili mu mushinze.
Wezo ufwini munina ati uli mu mumuni, ubobo kwiina linji cikonzha kupa muntu kulifwumpula.
Pele muntu uswile munina ati uli mu mushinze, ulimwi uleendela mu mushinze, takwizhi nkwaaya nkaambo mushinze wamoofwaazha.
Ndamulembela banangu nkaambo shibi shenu shalecelelwa ukaambo kezhina lya Kilisito.
Ndamulembela numatata, nkaambo mulimwizhi wezo wakaakuliko ku makancilo. Ndamulembela amwe nubakubushi nskaambo mwakamuzunda mubiyabi. Ndamulembela amwe nubana bashoonto nkaambo mulimwizhi ushenu.

Ndakamulembela nu bana nkaambo mulimwizhi Taata. Ndamulembela nu matata nkaambo mulimwizhi wakaakuliko lyoonse kuhwa ku makancilo. Ndamulembela nu bakubushi nkaambo mulikwete insana, iizwi lya Leza lilapona muli umwe, ulimwi mwakamuzunda mubiyabi.
Muteefwuni inshi nishiba shintu sha anshi. Naa muntu weefwuna inshi, ati lufwuno lwa Taata talwimo mwakwe.
Nkaambo shoonse shintu shili anshi ano, shisukeme mubili u shisukeme menso u shesho shipa bantu kulisumpula, tashili shaka Taata, shoonse nsha anshi.
Inshi u shesho shoonse shilimo nshibafwinishi bantu shilamana, pele wezo ucita luzando lwa Leza ulaakupona lyoonse.
Nubanangu, mamanino aswena afwaafwi! Mwakateelela ati shinkondonina Jeso ulashika, uninzho ba shinkondonina Jeso banji banji bashika kale, ubobo twazhiba ati mamanino aswena afwaafwi.

Baba bantu kabatali kuluya lwesu ku makancilo, nkaambo kuti nibakaakuli bakuluya lwesu, nibatakatushiya. Pele bakatushiya, kwaamba cilibonye ati akati kabo kakwiina naaba womwi wakaakuli kuluya lwesu.
Pele umwe mwakananikwa Moza Usalala, ubobo umwe noonse mulyeezhi meni meni.
Shilembi ati nkaambo tamulwizhi lushinizho, pele ndalemba nkaambo mulilwizhi, ulimwi mulizhi ati mububeshi mwiina lushinizho.
No nguni mubeshi? Nguwezo waamba ati, “Jeso tali Kilisito mufwutuli wakasalwa u Leza.” Muntu uli bobo ngu shinkondonina Kilisito, ulamwaaba Ushi u Mwana.
Nkaambo kufwumbwa muntu ukaka Mwana ati Ushi wamukaka. Pele wezo uhumina Mwana, ati Ushi wamuhumina.
Amubambe shesho nshimwakateelela ku makancilo, kwaamba ati shikalilile muli umwe. Nkaambo kuti nshimwakateelela shakalilila muli umwe, nkukuti amwe mulakalilila mu Mwana u mwa Taata.
Inzho nciceci Jeso ncaakatushomezha, nkutupa bumi butamana.
Ndamulembela aza makani nkaambo kababo bazanda kumucenga.

Pele kunanikwa nkumwatambula kwa Kilisito, kukalilile kuli umwe. Kufwumbwa kuti Moza mwaakulyaawo, tamuukucizanda linji mwiiyi. Nkaambo Moza wakwe ulamuyiisha shoonse, ulimwi shesho nshakamuyiisha nshini shini, tashili shakucenga. Nkaambo mbubona mbwaakamuyiisha, amukalilile mwa Kilisito.
Inzho nubanangu, amukalilile mwa Kilisito kwaamba akabulika, tukabe bashicamba, tutakafwi insoni mu buzuba mbwaakaapiluka.
Mwaakwizhi ati Kilisito uliluleme, nkukuti muli elele kuzhiba ati kufwumbwa ucita ciluleme, mwanakwe Leza.
Nubakwesu, uninzho tuli banakwe Leza pele tacina kulibonya mbutukaaba. Pele tulizhi ati Jeso akashika tulakaba ukoya mbwaabele nkaambo tulakoombona mbwaabele.
Inzho woonse ukwete bulanjizhi mwa Kilisito, asalale ukoya mbubona mbwaasalala Kilisito.
Woonse ucita cibi ulikwete mulandu wakutacilila mulawo wa Leza nkaambo cibi nkusotoka mulawo.
Mulizhi ati Kilisito wakeza kubweza shibi, ulimwi mwakwe mwiina shibi.
Kwiina muntu uli mu lukamantano u Kilisito u tolelela kucita shibi, ulimwi woonse ucita shibi ati tanoombwene ulimwi tamwizhi Kilisito.
Kutabi muntu umucenga banangu pe! Kufwumbwa ucita ciluleme uliluleme mbubona mbwaaluleme Kilisito.
Wezo ucita shibi ngwa mubiyabi, nkaambo mubiyabi ulibishizhe mbwaakabela. Mwanaa Leza wakeza kuzonauna milimo ya Shaatani yoonse.
Kwiina muntu muzhale kwa Leza u tolelela kucita shibi, nkaambo bube bwa Leza buli mwakwe, ulimwi takonzha kubisha nkaambo Leza ngu Ushi.
Mbubolya mbutukonzha kubona bana baleza u bana ba mubiyabi. Kufwumbwa bataciti ciluleme, u wezo uswile munina, tali waka Leza.

Tatweelele kuba ukoya Kaini wakaakuli wa mubiyabi, walo wakamuyaya munina Abelo. Nkaamboonzhi Kaini wakayaya munina? Nkaambo micito yakwe keeli ya Shaatani, pele milimo yaka Abelo munina keeli mibotu.
Ubobo mutazhingwa bakwesu naa bamusula bantu baanshi ano.
Tulizhi ati twaayita mu lufwu kuya ku bumi nkaambo tulibafwini bakwesu. Kufwumbwa wiina lufwuno ati wezo ucili munsana sha lufwu.
