Kufwumbwa uswile munina muyazhi, ulimwi mulizhi ati kufwumbwa muyazhi wiina bumi butamana.
Mbubolya mbutuluzhiba lufwuno. Kilisito wakaaba bumi bwakwe u kutufwila, ubobo aswe atwaabile bakwesu maumi esu!
Kuti umwi kafwuwile shintu shaano anshi, amana wazumya monzo kumunina mupenzhi, mbubuti lufwuno lwa Leza mbulukonzha kuba mwakwe?
Banangu, lufwuno lwesu lutabi lwakwaamba bulyo ku mulomo, lulyeelele kuba lwini lwini lulibonya mu milimo.
Inzho mbubolya mbutukazhiba ati tulikwete lushinizho u kuzhima ku bushu bwa Leza.
Nikuba kuti myonzo yesu yatushimwina ati twabisha, nkaambo tulizhi ati Leza mukando kubaala myonzo yesu, ulimwi ulishizhi shintu shoonse.
Inzho bakwesu kuti myonzo yesu teetubeteci, tutabi bakandu ku bushu bwa Leza.
Tulatambula kwakwe kufwumbwa ncitwakumbila, nkaambo tulacilila Milawo yakwe u kucita cimubotela.
Malailile aka Leza ngakuti, tulyeelele kushoma mu mwanakwe Jeso Kilisito u kufwunana mbubona mbwaakatulailila Kilisito.
Babo bacilila malailile bali mu lukamantano u Leza aze Leza uli abo mu lukamantano. Inzho tulizhi ati Leza uli mulyuuswe nkaambo ka Moza wa Leza ngwaakatupa.
Nubakwesu, mutabashomi boonse baamba ati tulikwete Moza wa Leza, pele namubasunke kwaamba muzhibe naa Moza ngwaka Leza cini cini. Nkaambo bashinshimi babeshi bahula ano anshi yoonse.
Inzho mbubolya mbumukaakuzhiba kwaamba na ulikwete Moza wa Leza. Kufwumbwa ushoma ati Jeso Kilisito wakeza kuba muntu kumubili, wezo ulikwete Moza wa Leza.
Pele kufwumbwa u kazha ati Jeso wiina ukeza mu buntu, ati wiina Moza wa Leza. Moza ngwaakwete ngwashinkondonina Kilisito, inguwe wezo ngumwakateelela ati ulakeza, ubobo wakashika kale ano anshi.
Pele umwe banangu muli baka Leza, mwakabazunda bashinshimi babeshi nkaambo Moza wa Leza uli mwenu ulikwete insana kubaala wezo uli muli babo ba anshi ano.
Babo bashinshimi babeshi balaamba shamakani anshi ano, ubobo bantu ba anshi balabateelela nkaambo mba anshi.
Uswe tuli baka Leza. Kufwumbwa u mwizhi Leza ulatuteelela, pele wezo utali waka Leza tatuteeleli. Mbubolya inzho mbutukonzha kuzhiba ati Moza ngwa lushinizho na ngwa bubeshi.
Nubakwesu, atufwunane nkaambo lufwuno lulahwa kwa Leza. Kufwumbwa u fwuna mweenzhiina ati mwanakwe Leza ulimwi ulimwizhi Leza.
Kufwumbwa wiina lufwuno ati tamwizhi Leza, nkaambo Leza ndufwuno.
Lufwuno lwa Leza lwakazubululwa akati kesu kwiita mukutuma Mwanakwe womwi nana ano anshi kwaamba tuyane bumi kwiita mwakwe.
Mbubolya mbulubele lufwuno, takuli kwaamba ati twakamufwuna Leza, pele nkuti wakatufwuna cakuti wakatuma mwanakwe kwaamba cibe cipaizho cakumanya shibi shesu.
Nubakwesu, na bobo mbwaakatufwuna Leza, nkukuti aswe atufwunane.
Kwiina wakamuboombona kale Leza, pele kuti twaakufwunene, nkukuti Leza uli mulyuuswe, ulimwi lufwuno lwakwe lulalulamikwa mulyuuswe.
Ubobo tulizhi kwaamba tuli mu lukamantano u Leza aze uli mulyuuswe nkaambo wakatupa Moza wakwe.
Ulimwi twakamubona u kupa bumboni ati Ushi wakamutuma Mwanakwe kwaamba abe Mufwutuli wa luundu.
Kuti twapa bumboni bwakuti Jeso Mwanakwe Leza, ati tuli mu lukamantano u Leza, aze Leza uli mu lukamantano aswe.
Inzho tulizhi u kushoma ati Leza ulitufwini.
Leza ndufwuno, kufwumbwa upona mu lufwuno ulapona mu lukamantano u Leza, aze Leza ulapona mwakwe.
Mbubolya mbulululamikwa lufwuno mulyuuswe, kwaamba tutakatiyi mu buzuba bwa lubeta, nkaambo bumi bwesu ano anshi buli ukoya bwaka Kilisito.

Mu lufwuno mwiina kutiya, nkaambo lufwuno lwini lwini lulatanda bukandu bwa mishobo yoonse. Ubobo lufwuno talululamikwa ku muntu mukandu nkaambo ulatiya cisubulo, ulimwi wezo utiya ati lufwuno lwakwe talululeme.
Tulikwete lufwuno kaambo Leza wakataanguna kutufwuna.
Kuti twaamba ati tulimufwini Leza twamana tulibaswile bantunokwesu, ati tuli babeshi. No tulakonzha buti kumufwuna Leza ngututanabwene, na kuti tatubafwini bantu babo mbutubona u menso esu?
Mulawo ngwaakatupa Kilisito ngwakuti, kufwumbwa u mufwini Leza uli elele kufwuna bantu nina.
Kufwumbwa ushoma ati Jeso ngu Munanike waka Leza ulatewa ati mwanakwe Leza, u wezo ufwini Ushi ati ulimufwini u Mwanakwe.
Mbubolya mbutuzhiba ati tulibafwini bana ba Leza, nkufwuna Leza u kucilila malailile akwe.
Nkaambo lufwuno lwesu kwa Leza lulaamba ati nkucilila malailile akwe, u malailile akwe taali mazumu pe.
Woonse mwanakwe Leza ulakonzha kwiizunda inshi. Tuleezunda inshi kwiita mu lushomo lwesu.
No nguni uzunda inshi? Nguwezo bulyo muntu ushoma ati Jeso Mwanakwe Leza.
Jeso Kilisito nguwakezhiza u meenzhi u bulowa, Jeso Kilisito wiina kwiza u meenzhi aloolona, pele wakeza u meenzhi u bulowa. Moza Usalala nguupa bumboni. Nkaambo Moza Usalala ndushinizho.
Nkaambo kuli bakamboni botatwe,
Moza, u meenzhi u bulowa, baba botatwe balapa bumboni buli bomwi.
Kuti twatambula bumboni bwa buntu, bumboni bwa Leza mbukandosha. Nkaambo wakapa bobu bumboni kwaamba sha Mwanakwe.
Inzho babo ba shoma mu Mwanakwe Leza bali u bumboni bobu mu myonzo yabo. Pele babo batamushomi Leza bakamubanda bubeshi nkaambo bayina kushoma shesho nshaakaamba Leza ku makani a Mwanakwe.
Bumboni mbwakuti, Leza wakatupa bumi butamana, bobu bumi bulayanwa mu Mwanakwe.
Kufwumbwa ukwete Mwana ulikwete bumi, wezo wiina Mwanaa Leza wiina bumi.
Ndamulembela aza kwaamba muzhibe ati mulikwete bumi butamana umwe numushoma mwizhina lya Mwanakwe Leza.
Tatuli bakandu ku bushu bwa Leza, nkaambo kufwumbwa ncitwalomba mu luzando lwakwe, ulatuteelela.
Ulimwi twaakwizhi ati ulatuteelela kufwumbwa ncitwalomba, ubobo tulizhi ati twacitambula kale ceco ncitwamulomba.

Kuti wamubona munyoko ulacita cibi citamutoli ku lufwu, uli elele kukomba kwa Leza kwaamba amupe bumi wezo muntu. Aza ngababo bacita shibi shitatoli ku lufwu. Pele nkucili cibi citola ku lufwu, ubobo nshaamba ati mucikombele kwa Leza aco.
Koonse kubisha ncibi, pele kuli cibi citatoli ku lufwu.
Tulizhi ati babo bazhale kwa Leza, tabatoleleli kubisha, nkaambo Mwanaa Leza ulabakwabilila, ubobo mubiyabi takonzha kubacisa.
Tulizhi ati tuli banakwe Leza, ulimwi tulizhi ati inshi yoonse ileendelezhewa u Shaatani.

Tulizhi ati Mwanakwe Leza wakeza kutuzhibya mbutweelele kumuzhiba Leza mwini mwini. Nkaambo kalukamantano u Leza mwini mwini ulimwi tulikwete lukamantano u mwanakwe Kilisito wezu ngu Leza mwini mwini upa bumi butamana.
Banangu, amubatantamuke ba leza bapange!
Ume ndimukando wambungano, ndalembela mukaintu wakasalwa kwa Leza u banakwe. Ndikufwini u monzo wangu oonse u babo bezhi lushinizho balikufwini.
Tulikufwini nkaambo lushinizho luli mulyuuswe ulimwi lulaakuli aswe shikwense u shikwense.
Luse inkumbu u luumuno shihwa kwa Leza Tatesu, ukwa Jeso Kilisito Mwanakwe, shibe aswe mu lushinizho umu lufwuno.
Ndakatangala cini cini kuyana ati banako bamwi balacilila shalushinizho mbubona mbwaakatulailila Leza Tatesu.
Inzho ndakukumbila u mukaintu nakufwunwa kwaamba uwe u babo mbaakasala Leza, tutolelele kufwunana. Ndiina kukulembela mulawo mupiya pe, pele nguwena ngutwakaakukwete ku makancilo.
Inzho lolu ndu lufwuno nduŋamba, kwaamba ati tucilile Milawo ya Leza. Wezu ngu mulawo ngumwakateelela kale ku makancilo ati, amufwunane.
Ndaamba bobo nkaambo babeshi banji banji baliile inshi yoonse, babo batahumina ati Jeso Kilisito wakaba muntu kumubili. Bantu bali bobo mbabeshi, ulimwi mbubashinkondonina Kilisito.
Amucenjele kwaamba mutazhimininwa cintu ncimukwete, kwaamba mukatambule bulumbu bwenu buzulile.
Kufwumbwa muntu uteetambuli injiisho ya Kilisito, uzunjila shinji, tali u Leza pe. Pele wezo ubamba injiisho ulikwete Ushi u Mwana.
Kuti umwi muntu weza kwenu u tayiisha injiisho yezhi, mutamutambuli muŋanda yenu, nikuba kumwaanzha.
Nkaambo kufwumbwa wezo ukamwaanzha, ati wahumina kwaabana micito yakwe mibiyabi.
Nikuba ati ndikwete shinji-shinji shakumushimwina, pele nshishilembi mu luŋwalu, nkaambo ndakanza kumuswaya kwaamba tukakanane kaanzambwene, kwaamba tukatangale ca kumaninina.
Bana ba munyoko musale kwa Leza, bakwaanzha.
Nubakwesu, ndakomba kwaamba shoonse shintu shimweendele kabotu, ukuti muukupona mbuli mbumwizhi kale ati mulapona bumi bwenu mu Moza.
Ndakaininwa cini cini, ciindi bamwi bashomi nibakanswaya u kunshimwina mbumushomeka mu lushinizho, ulimwi mbuli mbumucilila mulushinizho lyoonse.
Ndiina lutangalo lubaala ali ceci, cakuteelela ati banangu balapona mukucilila lushinizho.
Unakufwunwa, ulacita cakushomeka ciindi nuuyohwa bashominoko, kwaambisha beenzu.
Baba bantu bapa bumboni ku mbungano ya kono ku makani alufwuno lwako. Ulacita kabotu kubayohwa mulweendo lwabo munzhila ibotela Leza.
Nkaambo bakakanka kweenda lweendo lwa kusebezela Kilisito cakutatambula luyoho luhwa kuli bantu bakunze.
Ubobo, tuli elele kubayohwa bantu bali bobo, kwaamba tube basebezhi nokwabo mu mulimo wa kuyiisha lushinizho.
Ndakalemba luŋwalu ku mbungano, pele Diyotulefesi walo uzanda kuba mukando wabo, tanteeleli.

Ubobo ndakezhiza ndakashizubulula shoonse nshaakacita, sha kutusampaula. Wiina kweela awo pele ulakaka ukubatambula banyokwesu. Ulimwi ulabakasha u babo bazanda kucita bobo, amana ulabatanda mu mbungano.
Nubakwesu, mutacilila bacita cibiyabi pele amucilile babo bacita cibotu. Kufwumbwa ucita cibotu ngwaka Leza. Aze ucita shibi tana mubwene Leza.
Woonse muntu ulakanana bubotu bwaka Demetiliyasi, u lushinizho alo lulahumina bobo. Aswe tulazunjila bumboni bwesu, amwe mulizhi ati ncitwaamba ncalushinizho.
Ndikwete makani manji manji aakumushimwina, pele inzho nshizanda kwaalemba mu luŋwalu lolu.
Nkaambo ndazanda kwiza kumubona ca kufwambaana, kwaamba tukabandike kaanzambwene.
Luumuno alube amwe. Boonse beenzhinokwenu bali kono, bamwaanzha. Mubaanzhe boonse beenzhinokwesu bali koko mbubabelele.
Luse, u luumuno ulimwi u lufwuno luhwa kwa Leza alube amwe.

Nubafwunwa, ndazandisha kumulembela luŋwalu kwaamba ati mupandululile sha lufwutuko lwesu toonse. Pele ndakabona ati cintu cikando kacili cakumulembela u kumukumbila kwaamba mulwile lushomo lolo Leza ndwaakapa ba bantu bakwe ciindi comwi.

Nkaambo bantu bamwi batazanda sha Leza, bakanjila cakuzubaila akati kenu. Baba bantu balaamba ati luse lwa Leza lulatuhuminya kucita shintu shamafwunze. Ulimwi balakamukaka Jeso Kilisito Mwami wesu, shimatwanga esu. Mashinshime a kale kale akaamba ati, balakasubulwa.
Inzho ndazanda kumuzhibalusha, nikuba ati mulishizhi shoonse sheshi ati Mwami wakafwutula bantu kuhwa mucishi ca Ijipiti ciindi comwi bulyo ukuzonauna babo bayina nibakashoma.

Inzho baanjelo balya bayina nibakabamba masena abo, pele bakashiya masena abeelele. Leza wakabaanga inceetani shashikwense u shikwense, wakabawaala mu mushinze ushiya mbi, mpaka kushika kwa buzuba bukando bwa lubeta.

Bantu bamu Sodomu u Gomola u minzhi njicibambene ayo, balo bakaakuli bashimamambe ulimwi ubakaasololelwa u shisushi shitali shabuntu, bakaba citondezho ciindi Leza naakabapa cisubulo mu mulilo utamana.
Umbona bobo, baba bashimaloto balasofwaazha mibili yabo, balakaka kweendezhewa u Leza u kutuka shilenje shilemekwa shaka Leza.
Pele ciindi anjelo mukando Maiko, naakaakukazhanya u Shaatani, ku makani a mubili waka Mozesi, wiina kumubeteka cakumusampaula, pele wakaamba bulyo ati, “Mwami Leza akupe cisubulo!”
Pele bantu baba balasampaula kufwumbwa ncibatateeleli, ubobo sheshi shintu ncibatateeleli shilabaletela kuzonaunwa ukoya banyama bayina maanu.
Mapenzhi kuli babo! Nkaambo baleenda munzhila ya Kaini wakayaya munina. Umbona mbwaakacita Balamu, wakacenga bantu ukaambo ka mali. Balazonaunwa ukaambo kakupapila Leza ukoya mbwaakacita Kola.

Bakabisha mapobwe enu aalufwuno. Balalya akati kenu tabafwi insoni, balalisanina beni. Bali ukoya makumbi aaya bupepaulwa iikunku, amana taaleti inhula; Bali ukoya masamu aateezha micelo nicishika ciindi cayo, masamu akazhulwa, mazumu ntaa;
bali ukoya mankutisha amu lwatele mbwaacita iyohu, abo mbubatondezha busofwaazhi bwabo. Bali ukoya intongwezhi shuumpaila, Leza nshabambilile busena bwa mushinze utamana ushiya mbii.
Ulakabeteka boonse u kuya kubapa cisubulo bamunyansha Mwami Leza nkaambo ka milimo yabo iitaluleme njibacita cakutatiya Leza. Ulakabapa cisubulo nkaambo kamazwi oonse akusampaula ngubamusampula.”
Baba bantu balasholauka u kutongauka, balacilila shisushi shabo shibiyabi, balaamba calweeno u kulyeensheensha mukwamba kwabo ulimwi balabosha bosha bantu kwaamba babanange shintu calucengo.
Pele umwe, nubafwunwa, amuzhibaluke mazwi akaambwa u batumwa ba Mwami Jeso Kilisito.
Bakamwaambila ati, “Ku ciindi ca mamanino, kulakaba bantu basampaula, shisushi shabo nshibiyabi.”
Bantu babo mba anshi, bayina Moza wa Leza, mbubaleta lwaandaano akati kenu.
Pele umwe nubafwunwa, amulizake mu lushomo lwenu lusalala. Amusololelwe u Moza Usalala mu kukomba kwenu.
Amukale mu lufwuno lwa Leza ciindi nimulindila bumi buteeli bobo Mwami Jeso Kilisito mbwaakaamupa mu luse lwakwe.
Ulimwi amutondezhe luse kuli babo bamwi bacizuluzha.
Bamwi mubanunune cakubakwempa mu mulilo. Ukuli bamwi mutondezhe luse luhwelene ubukandu, pele mushisule shakusama shabo shisofweele, micito yabo yamafwunze a mubili.
Inzho kuli wezo ukonzha kumubamba kwaamba mutawi, ulimwi ukonzha kumushisha ukwa Leza, bwiina kampenda, u kutangalila mu bulemu bwakwe ubwiina shibi,
walo wezo ngu mufwutuli wesu, Jeso Kilisito Mwami wesu. Akube bulemu, u bukando, iinsana, u bwami, kuhwa ku makancilo, ubwasunu u mazuba oonse shikwense u shikwense. Ameni.

Mwibuka leli mumulembelwe shintu Leza, nshaakazubululila Jeso Kilisito. Leza wakamupa cizubuluzho ceci kwaamba atondezhe basebezhi bakwe shintu sheelele kwiza kucitika ca kufwambaana. Kilisito wakazhibya Johani, musebezhi wakwe shintu sheshi ciindi naakamutumina anjelo.
Aze Johani wakapandulula shintu shoonse shesho nshaakabona. Aza ngu makani ngaakapandulula ulimwi wapa bumboni ku mazwi a Leza ku shintu shoonse, Jeso Kilisito nshakaamba.
Ulilonjelwe wezo u bala ibuka leli, ulimwi mbalelece babo bapupulala makani a bushinshimi bobu ukubamba shintu shilembelwe mwibuka leli! Nkaambo ciindi cili afwaafwi.
Jeso Kilisito amulonjezhe u kumupa luumuno, wezu ngu kamboni ushomeka wakataanguna kubushiwa ku bafwu, inguwe mweendelezhi wa bami boonse baanshi yoonse.
Ulitufwini kwiitila mumbulowa bwakwe wakatwaangulula kuhwa ku shibi shesu.
Walo wakatucita kwaamba tube u bwami kwaamba tusebezele Leza Taata mbuli bapaizhi. Akube bulemu iinsana shikwense u shikwense. Ameni.

Ndime Johani munyokwenu mu lushomo, ulimwi mwa Jeso tuli antoomwi u mapenzhi u mubwami, umukukakatila ca bushicamba. Ndyaanjilwe mu cilwa ca Patimosi ukaambo kamazwi a Leza ngundakakambauka u kupa bumboni bwaamba sha Jeso.
Mu buzuba bwa Mwami, Moza Usalala wakanshicila, ngoonaawo ndakateelela kumanumaangu, izwi ikando ukoya kulila kwa mpeta.

Lyaamba ati, “Shesho nshuubona shilembe mwibuka, wamana ulitume ibuka lelyo ku shikombelo sheshi shili ciloba, ku Efeso, ku Similina, ku Pegamumu, ku Tiyatila, ku Sadisi, ku Filadelufiya ulimwi uku Lodisiya.”
Inzho indakacebuka kwaamba mbone wezo wakaakuŋambila, ndakabona shikalilo shamalambe shalubulo lwa goludi shili ciloba.
Inzho akati kanshisho, kakuli umwi uli mbuli Mwanaa Muntu, kasamine icanshi ilamfwu ulimwi acamba kaanjile lutambo lwa goludi.
Masusu akwe kaatuba buu, ukoya kakobo. Menso akwe kaalibonya ukoya mulilo uhwilima.
Shifwumba shakwe kashibekabeka ukoya lubulo lwa mukuba lushobole mu mahuba. Izwi lyakwe kaliteelelwa ukoya meenzhi ahuuma.
Mwitashi lyakwe lya cilyo kakwete intongwezhi shili ciloba, mukanwa mwakwe mwakahwa iceba lilampa koonse koonse. Bushu bwakwe kabumweka ukoya izuba.
Inzho indakamubona, ndakafwukama kuwila munshi lya maulu akwe, ukoya muntu mufwu. Pele wakabika itashi lyakwe alyuume waamba ati, “Utatiyi! Ndime Makancilo u Mamanino.
Ndime wezo upona! Ndakaakufwile pele inzho ndimumi shikwense u shikwense. Ndikwete insana shakuzunda lufwu acikalilo cabafwu.
Ubobo lemba shintu shesho nshiwabona u shiliwo u shesho shikaacitika.

Inzho ngaaza masesece a ntongwezhi sheshi shili ciloba, shili mwitashi lyangu lya cilyo, ulimwi ushikalilo shili ciloba sha malambe a goludi. Intongwezhi shili ciloba mbu baanjelo ba shikombelo shili ciloba, ulimwi shikalilo shamalambe shili ciloba nshikombelo shili ciloba.”
“Ukwa anjelo wa cikombelo caku Efeso lemba ati:
“Ngaaza makani ngaamba wezo ukwete intongwezhi shili ciloba mwitashi lyakwe lya cilyo, ukweenda akati kashikalilo shamalambe a goludi shili ciloba.

Ulaamba ati, ndiizhi milimo yako, ukusebeza kwako ulimwi ndizhi mbuli mbuukakatila. Kwamana ndizhi mbuutakonzha kubalanga bulyo ba shishibi. Babo balyaamba ati mbatumwa, wasola kubasunka ukubayana ati mbabeshi.
Ndizhi kwaamba ati ulakakatila, ukupenga ukaambo kangu, nikuba bobo wiina nuufwa bulenga.
Pele ulikwete kaambo kwangu, kakuti, tunfwini mbuli mbuwakaakunfwini ku makancilo.

“Inzho zhibaluka mbuwakaakubele kutana kuwa! Ulyeelele kusanduka u kucita milimo yezho njiwakaakucita akutaanguna. Kuti naa tubeba, ndeza kwaamba nkushe cikalilo ce lambe lyako mu busena bwaco, cita ubebe.
Pele cibotu cili mwako nciceci, uliiswile milimo ya Nikolaitanisi, njinswile ame.
“Wezo uzanda ndakamuhuminya kulya micelo yacisamu ca bumi cili mukati kabusena busalala bwa Leza.
“Ndyeezhi mapenzhi ako mbwaabele, ubupushi bwako, nikuba bobo uli muhubi. Ulimwi ndizhi mbubakulengelela babo balyaamba kuti mba Juda nikuba bobo mbacikombelo ca Shaatani.

Utaatiyi mapenzhi akaakushicila. Cenjela! Shilucengo ulakawaala bamwi benu muntolongo kwaamba amusukushe. Ulimwi kwa mazuba ali ikumi mulakaakuli mu mapenzhi makando. Shomeka mpaka kushicila ku lufwu, ndakakupa mushini wa bumi.
Pele wezo ukwete matwi, naateelele Moza ncaamba ku shikombelo! Wezo uzunda, lufwu lwabili talukamukwati pe.
“Ulimwi kwa anjelo waku cikombelo ca Pegamumu lemba bolya:
“Ngaaza makani aamba wezo ukwete iceba lilampa koonse koonse.

Ndikwizhi nkuukala, ulakala koko Shaatani nkwaayendelezha. Pele ulashomeka kwangu, ulimwi wiina nuukaatama lushomo lolo nduukwete mwangu, nikuba ciindi celya Antipasi kamboni wangu ushomeka nakayayiwa koko kukala Shaatani.

Pele ndikwete matongaushi amwi kwako. Nkubali bamwi benu bacilila kuyiisha kwa Balaamu, wezo wakayiisha Balaki kwaamba afwumpuzhe bantu ba Izilaili ciindi naakaboonjelezha kwaamba balye shilyo shakapaizhiwa ku mizhimu u kucita bumambe.
Ubobo aze ulikwete bantu babo bacilila kuyiisha kwa Nikolayitanisi.
Inzho beba, na kuti utaciti bobo, ndakeza koko nkuubele ca kufwambaana kwaamba nkabalwishe babo iiceba lihwa mu mulomo wangu.
“Wezo uzunda ndakamupa Mana maseseke kwaamba alye, ulimwi ndakamupa ibwe lituba, ebwe lelyo alilembelwe izhina ipiya uliina uzhi, cita bulyo wezo ulitambula.
“Kwa anjelo waku Tiyatila lemba ati:
“Ngaaza makani ngaamba Mwanaa Leza wezo ukwete menso aahwilima ukoya mulilo, shifwumba shakwe shilabeka ukoya lubulo lwa mukuba lushobole.
Ulaamba ati, ndiizhi milimo yako yoonse mbwiibele. Ndilwizhi lufwuno lwako, kusebeza kwako, ukukakatila kwako. Ndizhi kwaamba milimo yako ilabaala ali yakutaanguna.

Pele nikuba bobo ndakutongaucila, nkaambo wakahuminya Jezebelo mukaintu ulyaamba ati mushinshimi wa Leza, ulimwi ulayiisha ukushinikizha batwanga bangu kucita bumambe ukulya shilyo shipaizhiwa ku mizhimu.
Ndakamupa ciindi cakubeba, pele ulakaka kusanduka, ukuleka bumambe bwakwe.
Inzho ndakamufwusila abulo bwakwe kwaamba asate, ulimwi u babo mbucakaakucita abo bumambe ndakabanjizha mu mapenzhi makando, cita kuti basanduke ukulilecelela ku shibi nshibakacita ku mukaintu wezo.
Ulimwi ndakabayaya banakwe. Ndilelyo shikombelo shoonse nishikaazhiba kwaamba ume ndizhi shili mu myonzo umu matelaishi a bantu. Ubobo umwi uumwi wenu ndakamupa milimo yakwe.
“Pele umwe nubamwi numuli mu Tiyatila, numwacilila injiisho imbiyabi sheshi, nimwatakaiya nshibaamba bamwi ati, ‘Masesece a Shaatani,’ ndaamba ati nshimuzunjilila limwi isukusho ilemu pe.
Pele amukwatishe ceco ncimukwete kale, mpaka kushicila nkazhoce.
Kuli babo bazunda ukubamba milimo yangu mpaka ku mamanino, umwi uumwi, ndakamupa insana sha kweendelezha mishobo yoonse ya bantu.
Ubobo ulakalela u musako walubulo. Ulakazonauna mishobo ya bantu ukoya mubumbi mbwashanauna intesho. Ndakamupa insana shakweendelezha umbona mbuli mundakapewa kwa Taata.
Wezo uzunda, ame ndakamupa intanda.
“Wezo ukwete matwi, naateelele shesho Moza nshaambila shikombelo!”
“Ukwa anjelo waku cikombelo ca Sadisi lemba ati:
“Ngaaza makani ngaamba wezo uukwete myoza ya Leza iili ciloba iintongwezhi shili ciloba. Ulaamba ati, ndiizhi milimo yako iimpuwo yakuti uli mumi, pele nikuba bobo uli mufwu!
Ubobo buka, ucizumye ceco ncuukwete nicitana kumaninina kufwa. Kaambo ndeebona milimo yako kwaamba teeluleme ku bushu bwa Leza wangu.
Kuzhibaluka ceco nciwatambula u kuteelela, ubobo shilece shibi shako ukwatishe meni meni nguwakashimwinwa. Kuti utabuki, tukacizhibi ciindi niinkeza kukupa cisubulo. Nkaambo ndakeza ukoya mutewu.
Pele mucikombelo ca Sadisi nkubali bamwi bashoonto babo bayina nibakabisha shikobelo shabo. Ndakeenda abo, balakasama shisani shituba nkaambo cilibeelele kucita bobo.
Mbubona bobo kufwumbwa uzanda, ulakasamikwa shisani shituba, ulimwi izhina lyakwe nshikalikusha mwibuka lya bumi. Ndakaambilizha izhina lyakwe kwa Taata u baanjelo bakwe.
“Wezo ukwete matwi, naateelele shesho Moza nshaamba ku shikombelo!
“Ngaaza makani aamba wezo Usalala, ushinizhe, wezo uukwete maci aka Devidi. Nguyala nguwena nguuyalula, ayala kwiina ukonzha kuyalula, ulimwi ayalula kwiina ukonzha kuyala.

Ndiizhi milimo yako mbwiibele. Ndakuyalulila mulyongo, uuyina muntu naaba womwi uukonzha kuuyalula pe. Ndizhi ati insana shako inshoonto, pele nikuba bobo wakabamba mazwi angu, wiina niwakalitama izhina lyangu.
Inzho bona, nkubali bantu bacikombelo ca Shaatani, babo babeshi balyaamba ati mba Juda anu tabali. Ndakabacita kwaamba bakazhize bakalibonzhe ku maulu ako. Lelyo nibakaazhiba ati ndikufwini.
Ukaambo kakuti wakakakatila kubamba mulawo wangu, ame ndakakubamba muciindi camasukusho a kazhila bantu ba anshi yoonse, kusunka babo bakala anshi.
Ndeza ca kufwambaana, kwatisha ceco ncuukwete kwaamba kutabi muntu ukunanga mushini wako.

Wezo uzunda ndakamucita kwaamba akabe musemu waŋanda ya Leza wangu, ulimwi takamuhwi momo pe. Ulimwi ndakamulemba izhina lya Leza wangu, ulyamunzhi wa Leza wangu, litewa ati Jelusalemu mupiya, walo wezo ukaahwa kwizeulu kwa Leza wangu. Ulimwi ndakamulemba izhina lyangu ipiya.
Wezo ukwete matwi nateelele shesho Moza nshaambila shikombelo!
“Ngaaza mazwi akwe wezo utewa ati Ameni, kamboni wa lushomo, wa cini cini, makancilo ashintu Leza nshaakalenga.
Ndiizhi milimo yako mbwiibele, tutontoli ulimwi tupiyi. Nicabota kuti niwaakutontola na kupiya.
Ubobo nkaambo ulakasaala bulyo, tutontoli ulimwi tupiyi, ndakulapula kuhwa mukanwa.
Inta kayi ulaamba ati, ‘Uli muhubi, ndikwete lubono lunji lunji, kwiina cintu cintakwete.’ Pele twizhi ati ulipengele, uleetezha, uli mupushi, uli moofwu, ulimwi uli cintanda.

Inzho ndakulailila ati ule goludi kwangu wakasalazhiwa u mulilo, kwaamba ube muhubi mwini mwini. Ulimwi ule shisani shituba kwaamba usame uhumbe cintanda cako, ulayazha insoni. Uule u musamu wamenso kwaamba ukonzhe kubona kabotu.
Babo mbunzanda ndabalemanina u kubapa cibebyo. Ubobo pakamana cini cini kwaamba ubebe.
Bona ndizhimine amulyango ndakonkomona, kuti na muntu waliteelela izwi lyangu u kunjalulila, ndanjila muŋanda yakwe, wezo ame tulalila antoomwi.
Wezo uzunda ndakamuhuminya kukala ame acuuna cangu, umbona mbuli mbundaazunda ame u kukala u Taata acuuna cakwe ca bwami.
“Wezo ukwete matwi, naateelele shesho nshaamba Moza ku shikombelo!”

Nicakamana ceci indakalanga ndakabona mulyango uyalucile kwizeulu. Ngoonaawo ndakateelela izwi nindaateelela akutaanguna lyakaakwaamba kwangu ukoya impeta, lyaamba ati, “Kweza kono, kwaamba nkutondezhe cikaacitika munshi lyaceci.”
Ciindi ceco ncicona, Moza wakankwata. Kwizeulu ndakabona cuuna ca bwami, kakuli muntu umwi wakaakushite acuuna ceco.
Wezo muntu wakaakushite acuuna bushu bwakwe bwakaakuli ukoya ibwe libekabeka lidula lisubila pyu. Cuuna ceco kacizhingulucilwe ipongolo lyakaakuli ukoya ibwe litewa ati emalodi.

Cuuna ca bwami cikando kacizhingulucilwe ushimwi shuuna sha bwami shili makumi obile ushuuna shone. Inzho mu shuuna sheshi ndakabona bakando bali makumi obile ubakando bone, bakaakusamine shisani shituba ulimwi kumitwi kabasamine mishini ya goludi.
Kushuuna shesho kwakaakuhwa indabo, ukuhuuma, umizuzumo yaku huluma kwabukali buzaka mizenge yamililo iili ciloba, yezhi njimyoza ya Leza iili ciloba.

Ulimwi kumbele lya cuuna ca bwami ncicona ceci kakuli cakaakuli ukoya ibwe lya makaaza libalangala, akati kati kuzhinguluka cuuna ca bwami kumasena oonse, kakuli shilenje shone shikwete menso kumbele u kunshi.
Cilinge citaanzhi cipona kacili ukoya shuumbwa, cabili kacili ukoya mucende, catatu kacikwete bushu ukoya muntu, ucane kacili ukoya muzuni shikube uyabuuluka.
Cimwi ucimwi ca shilenge sheshi kacikwete mababa ali cisambomwi, oonse kaakwete menso, mukati aansengwe. Mashikati u mashiku shakaakwiimba ucakutalyoocezha ati,
“Usalala, Usalala, Usalala,
Mwami Leza shinsana shoonse,
Wakaakuliko, Nguuliko, ulimwi ulakabako.”
Inzho shilenge sheshi shone, nishakaakupa bulemu, u kulemeka ukulumba wezo ushite acuuna cikando ca bwami utewa ati mumi shikwense u shikwense.

Nibacita bobo bakando babo bali makumi obile u bakando bone, bakaakufwukama kumbele lyakwe u kumukomba, wezu mumi shikwense u shikwense. Ubobo bakabika mishini yabo kumbele lya cuuna ceci u kwaamba ati,
“Mwami Leza wesu!
Ulyeelelwe kupewa bulemu iinsana,
nkaambo ndiwe wakalenga shintu shoonse.
Mu luzando lwako shilapona ulimwi wakashilenga.”
Ngoonaawo ndakabona anjelo shinsana wakapozomoka ati, “Nguni uyelele kumatula shikanto kwaamba ahunune ibuka leli?”
Pele kakwiina naaba womwi kwizeulu, na anshi nikuba kunshi yanshi yezhi wakaakukonzha kuhununa ibuka leli.
Ndakalila cini cini, nkaambo kakwiina naaba womwi wakaakweelele kuhununa ibuka lelyo nikuba kulilangalanga mukati.

Inzho umwi wabakando wakaŋambila ati, “Utalila! Bona! Shuumbwa uhwa kumushobo waba Juda, wa luhubo lwaka Devidi wakazunda, ubobo walo ulakonzha kuhununa ibuka ukushimataula shikansho shesho shili ciloba.”
Mwanaa Mbelele wakazhimuka watambula ibuka lyakaakuli mwitashi lya cilyo lya wezo wakaakushite acuuna ca bwami.

Inzho naakamana kubweza ibuka lelyo, shilenge shone u bakando bali makumi obile u bakando bone bakafwukama kumbele lya Mwanaa Mbelele wezu. Umwi uumwi wabo kakwete kalumbu u mitiba ya goludi izwile tununcilizho. Kwalo nkukwakaakuli kukomba kwa bana musalazhi.
Bakaakwiimba lwiimbo lupiya ati,
“Ndiwe nuuyelele kubweza ibuka
ukumatula shikaanto.
Nkaambo ndiwe uwakayayiwa, ulimwi kubulowa bwako wakabanuna Leza bantu kuhwa ku mishobo yoonse uku milaka yoonse uku mashi woonse,
ubobo balakalela anshi ano.”
bakaakwiimba, ucakupozomoka ati,
“Mwanaa Mbelele wezo wakaakuyailwe, ulyeelelwe
kutambula bwami, lubono, busongo, insana,
kulemekwa, bulemu, ukutembaulwa!”
Ulimwi ndakateelela shilenge shoonse kwizeulu, anshi, iinshi yaanshi, mu lwaatele u shintu shoonse shili mumo shakaakwiimba ati,
“Kuli wezo ushite a cuuna ca bwami u Mwanaa Mbelele,
atembaulwe, alemekwe, ulimwi apewe bulemu iinsana,
shikwense u shikwense!”
Shilenge shone shakaingula ati, “Ameni!” Ngoonaawo bakando bakando bakafwukama bakomba.
Inzho ndakabona Mwanaa Mbelele wamatula cikanto comwi akati kashesho shili ciloba, ngoona comwi ca shilenge shelya cakapozomoka mbuli kulindima kwa nhula ati, “Kweza!”
Ndakalanga, ndakabona imbizhi ituba, ngoonaawo wezo wakaakulizile ambizhi kakwete buta, inzho wakapewa mushini wa bwami. Wakaya ukoya shikuzunda kwaamba akazunde bamwi.
Mwanaa Mbelele naakamana kumatula cikanto cabili ndakateelela cilenge cabili cakaamba ati, “Kweza!”
Ngoonaawo kwakahwa imbizhi iimwi isubila. Wezo wakaakulizile ambizhi wakapewa insana shakubusha lumamba anshi ano, kwaamba bantu bayaane mulwabo beni. Wakapewa iceba ikando.

Ngoonaawo ndakateelela izwi lyakahwa akati ka shilenge shone, lyaamba ati, “Katundu komwi kamakunka awaini kalaulwa ili lyomwi lya siliva, awo makokooko otatwe a maila alaulwa umbona, nikuba ati, mutazonauni mafwuta u waini.”
Ngoona naakamatula cikanto cane, ndakateelela izwi lyacilenge cane lyaamba ati, “Kweza!”

Ngoona ndakalanga, ndakabona imbizhi intubushi. Wezo wakaakwiilizile katewa ati, “Lufwu.” Ucikalilo cabafwu kacimucilile munshi. Babo bakapewa insana shakuyaya cisela cane caanshi yoonse mbwiibelele, kwiita kuleta inkondo, iinzala, u malwazhi, ulimwi u banyama babutambo.
Inzho Mwana Mbelele naakamatula cikanto ca sanu, ndakabona kunshi kwa cipaizho myoza yababo bakayayiwa ukaambo ka kukambauka mazwi a Leza ulimwi ukaambo kabumboni bobo mbubakaakupa.
Bakapozomoka iizwi ikando ati, “Mwami shinsana shoonse, Usalala, Ushinizhe, sa ndililiye nuukaabeteka u kupa inzholi bantu bali anshi?”
Ngoona umwi uumwi wabo wakapewa icanshi lituba u kwaambilwa ati balindile ukulyoocezha ciindi cishoonto bulyo mpaka kushicila basebezhinina, u bakwesu mu lushomo abo bakabayaye umbona mbubakayaiwa.
Intongwezhi shakawa anshi ukoya inkuzu shitana kubizwa mbushuumbuluka kwaakuli ikunku.
Izeulu lyakawa anshi ukoya isasa liya buhungwa, awo mapili ushilwa shikando shilyaakati ka lwaatele, shoonse shakakushiwa ngushakaakubele.
Ngoonaawo bami baanshi, u beendelezhi, ubakando babashikalumamba boonse, ubahubi, uba shinsana, u bantu bulyo, u bazhice na bazhale, bakazuba mu myaako yamabwe, umulwaata.
Bakaambila mapili u mabwe ati, “Amutulimbe mutuseseke kuhwa ku bushu bwa wezo ushite acuuna ca bwami ukutuhuna kuhwa kubukali bwa Mwanaa Mbelele!
Nkaambo buzuba bwabukali bwakwe bwashika, no nguni ukonzha kuzhima?”
Ulimwi ndakabona anjelo uunji wakahwa kwiwe wakaakukwete cikanto ca Leza mumi, wakapozomocela baanjelo bone babo Leza mbaakapa insana shakuzonauna inshi u lwaatele.
Anjelo wezu wakaamba ati, “Mutazonauni inshi niluba lwaatele naaba masamu, mpaka tubabike shikanto ankumu shabasebezhi baleza wesu.”
Ndakateelela mweelwe wa bantu babo bakabikwa shikanto ankumu shabo kabali shuulu shili mwaanda u makumi one ushitwesha shone. Bakahwa ku mishobo ya Izilaili iili ikumi u mishobo yobile.

Kumushobo waka Juda, bakakantwa cikanto kabali ikumi lya shuulu ushuulu shobile. Kumushobo waka Lubeni, kabali ikumi lya shuulu ushuulu shobile. Kumushobo waka Gadi, kabali ikumi lya shuulu ushuulu shobile.
Kumushobo waka Asha, kabali ikumi lya shuulu ushuulu shobile. Kumushobo waka Nafutali, kabali ikumi lya shuulu ushuulu shobile. Kumushobo waka Manase, kabali ikumi lya shuulu ushuulu shobile.
Kumushobo waka Simiyoni, kabali ikumi lya shuulu ushuulu shobile. Kumushobo waka Levi, kabali ikumi lya shuulu ushuulu shobile. Kumushobo waka Izaka, kabali ikumi lya shuulu ushuulu shobile.

Kumushobo waka Zebuluni, kabali ikumi lya shuulu ushuulu shobile. Kumushobo waka Jozefu kabali ikumi lya shuulu ushuulu shobile. Kumushobo waka Benjamini, kabali ikumi lya shuulu ushuulu shobile bakabikwa shikanto.

Kuhwaawo ndakalanga ndakabona bantu banji banji, nkaambo kwiina wakaakukonzha kubabala. Bakahwa ku mishobo yoonse, mu mashi oonse, kumilaka yoonse u kumyaambo yoonse. Bakazhima kumbele lya cuuna ca bwami ukumbele lya Mwanaa Mbelele, kabasamine macanshi atuba ulimwi kabakwete malala.
Bakapozomoka baamba ati, “Lufwutuko luhwa kwa Leza wesu ushite acuuna ca bulemu ulimwi uku Mwanaa Mbelele!”
Ngoonaawo baanjelo boonse bakaakuzhingulucile cuuna ca bwami bakazhimuka. Abo bakando, ushilenge shone shakazhimuka umbona. Bakawa anshi ukufwukama kumbele lya cuuna, bakomba Leza
baamba ati, “Ameni!” Kulonjezha u bulemu u busongo u kupa kulumba, iinsana shoonse shibe kwa Leza wesu shikwense u shikwense! Ameni.
Inzho umwi wabakando wakambuzha ati, “No baba bantu basamine macanshi atuba mbubani, ulimwi bahwa kwi?”
Ngoonaawo wakaŋambila ati, “Baba mbubalya bakahwa mu mapenzhi makando. Bakasanzha macanshi abo mu bulowa bwa Mwanaa Mbelele ukwaatubya.
Nkukaambo kako ncibazhimina kumbele lya cuuna ca Leza, u kukomba muunza u mashiku mucikombelo cakwe. Wezo ushite acuuna ca bwami ulakakalaabo ukubakwabilila.
Tabakafwi linji inzala, ulimwi tabakafwi linji iinyota, tabakabalwa lumwi izuba talikabatenta linji.
Nkaambo Mwanaa Mbelele ulyaakati kacuuna ca bwami, ulaka beembela uku basololela ku tusensa twa miinzo ya meenzhi apa bumi, ulakaba kunkumuna misozhi yabo yoonse.”
Ciindi Mwanaa Mbelele naakamatulula cikanto caciloba, kwizeulu kwakaliinza wii, kwa cisela ce woola lyomwi.
Ulimwi ndakabona baanjelo bali ciloba babo bazhima kumbele lya Leza, bakapewa impeta shili ciloba.
Inzho bushi bwatununcilizho twakatentwa bwakafwuka busuumene kuya mwizeulu u kukomba kwa bantu basalala baleza kuhwa mwitashi lyaka anjelo wakaakuzhimine kumbele lya Leza.
Ngoonaawo anjelo wezo wakabweza cibicilo ca tununcilizho, wakacizuzha makala ahwa a cipaizho u kwaawaala anshi. Ndilyona lelyo kwakaba indabo shanhula ukulindima u kuzungaana kwanshi.
Ngoonaawo baanjelo bali ciloba bakaakukwete impeta bakalibambila kwaamba bashifwibe.

Anjelo wakutaanguna wakafwiba impeta yakwe, ndilyona kwakaba cihulamabwe u mulilo uuhwelene u bulowa, sheshi shakawila anshi. Ngoonaawo cipanzha catatu canshi cakapiya ulimwi aco cipanzha catatu camasamu cakapiya, umweenhwu woonse wakapiya.

Kumane bobo anjelo wabili wakafwiba impeta yakwe. Ngoonaawo cintu cimwi cikando cakaakuli ukoya ipili ikando lizaka mulilo lyakawaalwa mu lwaatele. Aco cipanzha catatu ca lwaatele cakasanduka bwakaba bulowa.
Ulimwi cipanzha catatu ca shilenge shamu lwaatele shakafwa, aco cipanzha camato akazonaunwa.
Intongwezhi yezho ilatewa ati “Cisamu cilula.” Cipanzha catatu cameenzhi akalula, ubobo bantu banji banji bakafwa nkaambo kakunwa meenzhi aalula.

Ngoonaawo ndakalanga, ndakabona shikube kaya buuluka mwizeulu u kulila ati, “Malweza! Malweza! Malweza! Ku bantu ba anshi, nkaambo balakapenga shakalila impeta nshibalibambile kufwiba baanjelo botatwe basheele!”
Anjelo wasanu wakafwiba impeta, ngoonaawo ndakabona intongwezhi yezho yakawa anshi yakapewa cii wa mwilambwe liteeli.

Wakayalula mwilambwe liteeli, ngoonaawo kwakaundunda bushi kuhwa mwilindi. Bushi bobu kabuli ukoya bwekumbi lya mulilo mukando uuhwilima. Inzho izuba u muuwo shakashiya mbi, ukaambo kabushi bwakaakuhwa mwilindi liteeli.
Inzho kuhwa umbushi bobu kwakahwa cikwikwi kwiza anshi. Calo cakapewa insana shiingaine ushatupilili.
Cakashimwinwa ati citazonauni bwizu naa shisamu nicikaba cishango cili buti, pele bulyo ati cipenzhe bulyo bantu babo batakantilwe cikanto ca Leza ankumu shabo.
Ciina nicakapewa insana shakuyaya pe, pele cakahumizhiwa bulyo kubapenzha kwa myezhi yosanwe. Kacicisa ukoya muntu walumwa kapilili.
Pele ku ciindi ca myezhi yosanwe yezho bantu balakalukapula lufwu, pele tabakaluyani. Balakazanda kufwa, pele lufwu lulakabatiya.
Kacikwete masusu malamfwu ukoya a bakaintu. Kacikwete meno ukoya shuumbwa.
Acamba kashikwete maamba ali ukoya intobo shalubulo. Kusaba kwa mababa a cikwikwi kakuteelelwa ukoya shikoci shiya bukwelwa iimbizhi shiya kunkondo.
Cikwikwi ceco kacikwete micila iluma ukoya kapilili. Mu micila mumwakaakuli insana shakupenzha bantu kwa myezhi yosanwe.
Mwami waakucilanga ngu anjelo welambwe liteeli, izhina lyakwe muci Hibulu ulatewa ati, Abadoni, muci Giliki ngu Apolyoni, nkukwaamba ati, “Shikuzonauna.”
Ipenzhi lya kutaanguna lyamana, kwashaala obile.
Izwi leli lyakaambila anjelo wacisambomwi wakaakukwete impeta ati, “Angulula baanjelo bone baanjilwe kumulonga mukando wa Yufuletisi!”
Ndilelyo wakaangulula baanjelo bone bakaakulibambile kwaamba cashika ciindi, buzuba, mwezhi, ulimwi u mwaka bayaye cipanzha catatu ca bantu.
Ubobo ndakakateelela ati, mweelwe wa bashikalumamba kabali myaanda yobile yashuulu shili shuulu.

Mucilenge ceci ndakabona imbizhi u babo bakaakushilizile. Kabakwete intobo shisubila pyu ukoya mulilo, ulimwi kashili ukoya cilambo ca cikambwe, ukoya mabwe a salufa. Mitwi ya mbizhi keeli ukoya mitwi yaba shuumbwa, ulimwi mu milomo mwakaakuhwa mulilo wa mabwe a salufa.
Cipanzha catatu ca bantu baba cakayaiwa u mapenzhi aza otatwe, mulilo, bushi, ulimwi u mabwe a salufa akaakuhwa mu milomo ya mbizhi.
Insana shambizhi sheshi shili mu milomo u micila yasho. Micila yasho ili ukoya bazoka, balikwete mitwi, ubobo balasebezha mitwi kuluma bantu.
Ulimwi bayina nibakaleka buyazhi bwabo u bulozhi bwabo u bumambe bwabo u butewu bwabo.

Inzho ndakabona umwi anjelo mukando ulaseluka kuhwa kwizeulu. Kazhingulucilwe ikumbi, a mutwi wakwe kaali ipongolo. Bushu bwakwe kabumweka ukoya izuba, maulu akwe kaali ukoya shishiko sha masamu shizaka mulilo.
Wakaakukwete kabuka kayalule mwitashi. Inzho kuulu kwakwe kwa cilyo kwakalyata mu lwaatele, kwacimonsho kwakalyata a muuma.
Ngoonaawo wakoompolola ca kupozomoka ukoya kuhuluma kwa shuumbwa. Inzho naakapozomoka, kwakateelelwa mizunzumo ili ciloba.
Inzho mizunzumo niyakaita, ndakaakuzanda kulemba, pele ndakateelela izwi lyakahwa kwizeulu lyaamba ati, “Utazubululi shesho myoza iili ciloba nciyaamba. Utashilembi pe!”
ukulumbila mwizhina lya Leza upona shikwense u shikwense, wezo wakalenga izeulu, iinshi u meenzhi u shesho shoonse shiyanwa muli nshisho. Anjelo wezo wakaamba ati, “Ciindi camana!
Pele ku mazuba azo anjelo wa ciloba nakaafwiba impeta yakwe, Leza ulakazuzucizha masesece akwe ngaakaamba kwiita mubatwanga bakwe bashinshimi.”
Inzho izwi ndilyona nindakateelela lyakahwa kwizeulu lyakaŋambila ulimwi ati, “Koya ukabweze kabuka kayalule kali mwitashi lya anjelo uuzhimine mu lwaatele a muuma.”
Ubobo ndakaswena afwaafwi kwa anjelo wezo, ndakamwaambila ati ampe kabuka kashoonto. Walo wakaamba ati, “Bweza, ukalye, kalaakulweela ukoya buci mukanwa mwako, pele mwifwu, kalaakulula luu!”
Inzho ndakakabweza kabuka kako kakaakuli mwitashi lya anjelo. Nindaakalya, kakaakulweela mukanwa ukoya buci, inzho indaamana ukamina, mwifwu mwakalula luu.
Ngoonaawo anjelo wakaŋambila ati, “Ulimwi ulyeelele ushinshimine bantu boonse u mashi oonse u mishobo yoonse ulimwi ubami boonse.”
Pele uteeleka lubanza, ulushiye nkaambo lwapewa kubatu bakunze. Babo balakalyatauka munzhi usalala kwa makumi one a myezhi umyezhi yobile.
Kwamana ndakatuma bakamboni bangu bobile, balakaakusamine masaka kwaamba bakaambilizhe makani kwa mazuba ali cuulu u myaanda yobile u makumi cisambomwi.”
Kuti kwaba muntu uzanda kubacisa, mulahwa mulilo mu milomo yabo uzonauna bashinkondonokwabo. Kufwumbwa uzanda kubacisa, ulakazonaunwa munzhila njiyona yezhi.

Bakamboni baba balikwete insana shakuyala izeulu kwaamba inhula itawi kwa mazuba maambilizhe mu makani a Leza. Ulimwi balikwete insana shakusandula meenzhi kuba bulowa. Balakonzha kuleta miika iyandeene inshi yoonse kufwumbwa ciindi ncibazanda.
Mitunta yabo ilakaalabana mu mikwakwa ya munzhi mukando, koko Mwami wabo nkwaakakankamininwa. Izhina lyabutongo lya munzhi wezu ngu Sodomu naa Ijipiti.
Inzho bantu bahwa mushishi shoonse, bamishobo yoonse, umyaambo yoonse, balakabona mitunta yabo kwa mazuba otatwe ucisela, Pele tabakabahuminya kwaamba bazhikwe pe.
Bantu ba anshi balakabotelwa ukaambo kalufwu lwabashinshimi babo bobile. Balakasekelela ukupana shipo, nkaambo kabashinshimi bobile babo mbubakapa kwaamba bantu bapenge cibiyabi.
Inzho naakaita mazuba otatwe ucisela, moza upa bumi uhwa kwa Leza wakabenjila. Bakabuka bazhima, ubobo babo bakababona bakazoowesha.
Ubobo bashinshimi bobile balya bakateelela izwi ikando lyakahwa kwizeulu, libaambila ati, “Kamwiza kono,” Inzho bashinkondonokwabo kabalanjilile, bakaya kwizeulu mwikumbi.

Inzho ncicona ceco ciindi, inshi yakazungaanisha, ngoonaawo cipanzha cekumi camaanda amu munzhi wezo akawa. Bantu bali shuulu ciloba bakafwa mukuzungaana kwanshi. Bantu bakashaala bakatiya cini cini, ngoona bakalemeka Leza wa kwizeulu.
Ipenzhi lyabili lyamana, pele ipenzhi lyatatu lilyaafwaafwi kwiza!
Ngoonaawo bakando bali makumi obile ubatwesha bone, bashite a shuuna kumbele lya Leza, bakafwukama, bakomba Leza
ati,
“Twakulumba Mwami Leza Shinsana shoonse, Uuliko U wakaakuliko.
Twakulumba nkaambo inzho watondezha insana shako inkando ulimwi wakanka kweendelezha.
nkaambo bukali bwako bwashika,
u ciindi cakubeteka bafwu,
ukupa bulumbu batwanga bako
uba shinshimi u bana musalazhi, u babo balemeka izhina lyako, bana u bakando,
u kuzonauna babo bazonauna inshi.”

Ndilelyo kwakaboneka cintu cikando cizoosha kwizeulu. Kakuli mukaintu wakaakusamine izuba. Kunshi lya shifwumba shakwe kakuli mwezhi, a mutwi wakwe kaali mushini wantongwezhi shili ikumi iintongwezhi shobile.
Mukaintu wezu kali afwaafwi kutumbuka, pele naakakanka kusunga wakalila ukaambo kakucisa.
Itoshi lyakoobola cipanzha catatu ca ntongwezhi kuhwa kwizeulu ukushiwaala anshi. Inzho itoshi lelyo lyakazhima afwaafwi u mukaintu wakaakuzanda kutumbuka, kwaamba atumbuka bulyo mwana limulye.
Mukaintu wakatumbuka mwana mweembezhi, wezo uukaalela mashi oonse u musako walubulo, pele mwana wezo wakasompolwa u kutolwa kwizeulu kwa Leza koko kuli cuuna cakwe.
Mukaintu wakalukancila mulukula kwaakuli busena mbwaakamubambila Leza, koko nkwaakaabambwa kabotu kwa mazuba ali cuulu umyaanda yobile u makumi cisambomwi.
Pele itoshi lyakazundwa. Itoshi u baanjelo balyo bakatandwa kwizeulu.
Itoshi u baanjelo balyo bakasowelwa anshi. Wezo ngu Muzoka wakale kale utewa ati, Mubeshi, Shaatani, ucenga bantu boonse baanshi. Wakasowelwa anshi antoonwi u baanjelo bakwe boonse.
Bakwesu bakamuzunda kwiitila mubulowa bwa Mwanaa Mbelele ulimwi umu mazwi a bumboni nkaambo bayina nibakabufwuna bumi bwabo mpaka ku lufwu. Babo bakaakulibambile kwaaba bumi bwabo.
Amusekelele umwe nubakwizeulu u babo mbumukala abo! Pele mulakapenga umwe numuli anshi umulwaatele! Kaambo shilucengo wamuselucila ca bukali, kaambo ulizhi kwaamba ati ciindi cakwe ncishoonto.”
Inzho itoshi nilyakabona kwaamba ati lyaasowelwa anshi, lyakamwaalama mukaintu wakatumbuka mwana mweembezhi.
Pele mukaintu wakapewa mababa obile ali ukoya a shikube kwaamba akonzhe kuuluka ashiye itoshi leli kuya mulukula, koko nkwaakaabambwa kabotu kwa myaka yotatwe ucisela kwaamba ati itoshi litamuboni.
Ulimwi kuhwa ku mulomo we toshi kwakahwa meenzhi manji manji ali ukoya lweenje kwaamba injezhi imutolelezhe mukaintu wezu.
Pele inshi yakamuyohwa mukaintu wezu, yakaanduka, imane yakaamina meenzhi azo akapoomonwa iitoshi.
Ngoonaawo leli itoshi lyakalemanisha, kulemanina mukaintu, lyakaya kulwisha banakwe mukaintu wezu bakashaala balabamba milawo ya Leza, babo bakwete lushomo ukukanana sha Jeso mu lushinizho.
Lyakazhima ankomwe ya lwaatele.

Munyama wezo ngundakabona kali ukoya shiluwe. Shituta shakwe kashili ukoya munyama utewa ati Beya, awo mulomo wakwe kooli ukoya wa shuumbwa. Ngoona itoshi lyakapa munyama wezu insana shandilyo, cuuna, u bwami bwalyo.
Umwi mutwi yamunyama wezu wakaakulibonya ati kookwete ilonda litaponi, pele ilonda lelyo lyakapona. Bantu boonse ubakaakucilila munyama wezu, bakazhingwa cini cini.
Inzho bantu bakakomba itoshi, nkaambo kakuti lyakapa munyama insana. Bamane bakamukomba munyama, baamba ati, “No nguni uli ukoya munyama wezu? Nguni ukonzha kulwa aze?”
Inzho wakayalula mulomo wakwe wakakanka kusampaula izhina lya Leza, iiŋanda yakwe u babo boonse bakala kwizeulu.
Munyama wezu bakamuhuminya kulwa u bana musalazhi ukubazunda. Ulimwi wakapewa insana shakulela mishobo, bantu u milaka, ulimwi u mashi oonse.
Bantu boonse bakala anshi balakamukomba, u babo bali mazhina atalembelwe kuhwa ku malenjelo anshi mwibuka lya Mwanaa Mbelele wakayayiwa.
“Wezo uli matwi naateelele!
Wezo weelele kutolwa mubuzhice, ulakatolwa u wezo uuyelele kufwa iiceba, ulyeelele kuyayiwa iiceba. Ceci cilaamba ati bantu ba Leza bakakatile ku lushomo.”
Ngoonaawo ndakabona munyama umwi, wakazhuka anshi. Kakwete meya obile a kozhene imbelele, wakaamba ukoya itoshi.
Bulelo boonse bwa munyama mutaanzhi, bwakapewa kumunyama wabili. Wezo wakashinicizha inshi u bantu boonse bakala anshi yezhi kwaamba bakombe munyama mutaanzhi, wakaakukwete ilonda litaponi.
Munyama wabili wakacita maleele azoosha, mulilo wakawa kuhwa kwizeulu kwiza anshi, bantu boonse bakoobona.

Wezu munyama wabili wakacenga bantu boonse bakala anshi ukaambo kamalele ngaakacitila munyama mutaanzhi. Munyama wezu wakabaambila ati babumbe cibumbwa kulemeka munyama welya watakafwa nakayaswa iiceba.
Munyama wabili bakamuhuminya kupa bumi kucibumbwa camunyama mutaanzhi, kwaamba cikonzhe kukanana u kuyaya boonse babo batacikombi.
Munyama wezu wakabashinicizha bantu boonse, ubalemekwa, bantu bulyo, bahubi, bapushi, bazhale u bazhice, bakante shikanto kumatashi abo a cilyo na ankumu shabo.
Kwiina muntu wakaakukonzha kuula na kuuzha cita bulyo wezo ukantilwe cikanto. Cikanto cakwe ndizhina lya munyama mutaanzhi, na bulembe bwezhina lyakwe.

Ceci cilazanda busongo. Kufwumbwa musongo ulakonzha kuzhiba bupanduluzhi bwa bulembe bwa munyama, nkaambo mweelwe wa bulembe ulazhiminina izhina lya muntu. Cikanto cakwe ceci myaanda ili cisambomwi u makumi cisambomwi u cisambomwi.
Ngoonaawo ndakateelela izwi kuhwa kwizeulu kalihuuma ukoya meenzhi akunka, na ukoya kulindima kwanhula na ukoya kulila kwampeta shinji shinji.

Bantu babo bakaimba lwiimbo lupiya kumbele lya cuuna ca bwami, kumbele lya shilenge shone, u lyabakando. Kakwiina wakaakukonzha kwiiya lwiimbo lolo pe, cita bulyo babo bali mwaanda u makumi one a shuulu u shuulu shone banunune kuhwa anshi.

Baba mbantu batakalisofwaazha u bakaintu, balasalala. Bakacilila Mwanaa Mbelele kufwumbwa nkwaaya. Baba bakanununwa akati ka bantu kwaamba babe mbubataanzhi kutambikwa bumucelo mutantaanzhi kwa Leza uku Mwanaa Mbelele.
Ulimwi baba kwiina bubeshi bwakayanwa mu milomo yabo, ubobo bayina butongo pe.

Ngoonaawo ndakabona anjelo umwi ulaya buuluka mwizeulu. Kakwete mulumbe wa Makani Mabotu atamana kwaamba ambilizhe kuli babo bakala anshi, mushishi shoonse, ku mishobo yoonse, kumilaka yoonse, uku bantu boonse.
Wakapozomoka waamba ati, “Noomutiye Leza u kumupa bulemu, nkaambo ciindi ncaayelele kubeteka bantu cashika! Amumukombe wezo wakalenga izeulu, inshi, lwaatele umiinzo yatulonga twameenzhi!”
Anjelo watatu wakacilila baanjelo nina bobile, ulaya bupozomoka ati, “Kufwumbwa muntu uukomba shibumbwa u munyama, ulimwi wakantwa cikanto camunyama ankumu na etashi lyakwe,

wezo ulakanwa waini wabukali bwa Leza, ulakakununwa utahwelelwe kuhwa munkapu yabukali bwa Leza. Boonse bakaacita ceci balakapenzhewa u mulilo wa mabwe a salufa kumbele lya baanjelo basalala, ukumbele lya Mwanaa Mbelele.

Ubobo kupiya kwamapenzhi aza nkwa shikwense u shikwense. Kwiina kulyoocezha muunza u mashiku kuli babo bakomba munyama u ucinkozha cakwe, kubicilizha u babo boonse bakwete cikanto cezhina lya munyama.”
Ceci cilapa kwaamba ba shoma Leza babe bashicamba. Ulimwi balyeelele kucilila milawo yakwe u kushoma mwa Jeso.
Inzho ndakateelela izwi lihwa kwizeulu lyaamba ati, “Lemba bolya: Bali u coolwe bafwu kuhwa bwasunu, babo bakaafwila mu Mwami!”
“Ee!” Mbuamba Moza, “Balakalyoocezha kuhwa ku milimo yabo, milimo yabo mibotu njibakacita ilakabacilila.”
Ngoonaawo anjelo umwi wakahwa muŋanda ya Leza, wakapozomoka waambila anjelo wakaakushite ekumbi, “Bweza iceko lyako utebule, nkaambo ciindi ca kutebula cashika, inshi yoonse yeelela kutebulwa.”
Inzho wezo wakaakushite ekumbi wakasebezha iceko lyakwe kutebula inshi yoonse.
Inzho ndakabona anjelo umwi wakahwa muŋanda ya Leza ya kwizeulu, aze kakwete iceko lilampa.

Ulimwi anjelo unji wakahwa kucipaililo, wezu ngu mweendelezhi mukando wamulilo. Wakapozomoka iizwi ikando kwaambila anjelo wakaakukwete iceko lilampa ati, “Bweza iceko lyako, kwaamba ucese, utebule masaansa mu muunda wa anshi.”
Ndilelyo anjelo wakahuulusha iceko lyakwe anshi, wakatebula masaansa oonse, amane wakaawaala mucilindi cakukandilila masaansa a bukali bwa Leza.

Inzho masaansa aza akakandilwa mucilindi cakukandilila cili kunze lya munzhi, mucikandililo ceci kwakahwa bulowa bobo bwakakunka ukoya kalonga, kalampa myaanda yotatwe yama kilomita ulimwi kakali kalafwu kuya anshi ma mita obile.
Inzho indakalanga kwizeulu ndakabona ucimwi citondezho cikando cizoosha. Kakuli baanjelo bali ciloba umiika ili ciloba ya mamanino, yezhi miika njamamanino kutondezha bukali bwa Leza.

Ndakabona cili ukoya lwaatele lubekabeka cakaakusangene u mulilo. Ulimwi ndakabona babo bakazunda munyama, ucibumbwa cakwe u mweelwe wezhina lyakwe. Kabazhimine kunkomwe ya lwaatele lwakaakubekebeka, ulimwi mu matashi kabakwete tulumbu ntwaakabapa Leza.
Bakaakwiimba lwiimbo lwaka Mozesi muzhice wa Leza, ulimwi lwiimbo lwa Mwanaa Mbelele lwaamba ati,
“Mwami Leza Shinsana shoonse,
milimo yako mikando ulimwi ilazoosha.
Inzhila shako shililuleme ulimwi shilishinizhe.
Ndiwe Mwami wamishobo yoonse.
Nkaambo uwe ice Usalala. Mishobo yoonse ilakakoboloka kwaamba ikukombe,
nkaambo bubeteshi bwako buliluleme, bantu boonse balibubwene.”
Muŋanda ya Leza mwakahwa baanjelo bali ciloba bakaakukwete miika ili ciloba, kabasamine shisani shibotu shitezhima, awo ashamba shabo kabalyaanjile intambo sha goludi.
Ngoonaawo cimwi ca shilenge shone cakapa baanjelo baba bali ciloba ingaaba sha goludi shili ciloba shakaakuzwile bukali bwa Leza, Upona shikwense u shikwense.

Iŋanda ya Leza yakazula bushi buhwa kubulemu bwa Leza ulimwi ukunsana shakwe. Pele kwiina naaba womwi wakacikonzha kunjila muŋanda ya Leza, mpaka miika yezhi ili ciloba yakaletwa u baanjelo bali ciloba ikamaninine.
Inzho ndakateelela izwi lyakapozomoka lyakahwa muŋanda ya Leza ya kwizeulu lyakaambila baanjelo bali ciloba ati, “Kamuya mukatile ingaba sha waini shili ciloba shabukali bwa Leza anshi.”
Aze anjelo wabili wakatila shaakuli mu lwaaba lwakwe mu meenzhi amu lwaatele, ngoonaawo meenzhi akasanduka akaba bulowa bukozhene ubwa muntu mufwu, u shilenje shoonse shamu lwaatele shakafwa.
Inzho ndakateelela anjelo uzhiminina meenzhi ulaamba ati, “Ulimululami Mwami Usalala, Uwe Uuliko, Uwakaakuliko, nkaambo wabeteka shintu sheshi!
Baba bantu bakatila bulowa bwa bana musalazhi ubwa bashinshimi, inzho wabapa bulowa kwaamba banwe. Nkaambo cilibeele!”
Ulimwi ndakateelela izwi lyakahwa kucipaililo lyaamba ati, “Mwami Leza Shinsana shoonse, imbeta shako shilishinizhe ulimwi shililuleme!”
Aze anjelo wane wakatila shaakuli mu lwaaba lwakwe ezuba, ngoonaawo izuba lyakakwatisha insana shakutenta ukupiya, lya katenta bantu.
Ubobo bantu bakapiya ibangabanga lye zuba ulimwi bakashinganya izhina lya Leza, ukwete insana a miika yezhi. Pele bayina nibakabeba u kumupa bulemu Mwami Leza.
Ulimwi bakamushinganya Leza wamwizeulu ukaambo kashicisa u shilonda shabo, pele bayina nikabeba kuhwa mu shiyanza shabo shibiyabi.
Inzho ndakabona myoza yotatwe mibiyabi yakaakuli ukoya bakabombwe yakaakuhwa mu mulomo we toshi umu mulomo wa munyama u mumulomo wamu shinshimi mubeshi
Yezhi njimyoza mibiyabi icita shitondezho shamaleele. Myoza yotatwe yezhi ilaya kubami ba anshi boonse kubabunjika antoomwi kwaamba bakalwe inkondo mu buzuba bukando bwa Leza Shinsana Shoonse.
Anjelo wa ciloba wakatila shaakuli mu lwaaba lwakwe mu muuwo. Ngoona kwakahwa izwi ikando muŋanda ya Leza, kuhwa acuuna ca bwami lyaamba ati, “Kwamana”
Ndilyona kwakalaba indabo, kulindima, umihuhumo, ulimwi ukuzungana kwanshi. Takunabele kuzungana kwanshi kuli bolya kuhwa kumalengelo anshi!

Munzhi mukando wakaandana mu shipanzha shotatwe, ulimwi minzhi mikando ya mashi aamwi oonse yakazonauka. Ubobo Leza wiina ukooluba munzhi mukando wa Babiloni wakoopa kunwa inkapu ya waini wabukali bwakwe.

Bantu bakawilwa cihulamabwe, ca mabwe makando ibwe lyoomwi kalilema ukoya kasaka ka mapopwe kazula makokooko otatwe, kacihwa mwizeulu kuwila bantu. Inzho bantu bakamushinganya Leza ukaambo kepenzhi ikando lya cihulamabwe cakaakutizha.
Bami baanshi ano bakakomba aze shibumbwa, ulimwi bantu ba anshi bakolwa waini wamafwunze aakwe.”

Amane anjelo wakambweza mu Moza wantola mulukula. Inzho ndakabona mukaintu ulishite a munyama usubila pyu! Wezu munyama kakwete mazhina akusampaula Leza, ulimwi kakwete mitwi ili ciloba umeya ali ikumi.

Wezu mukaintu kasamine shisani shacilambo ca shicisu ulimwi u cisubila pyu! Ulimwi kasamine tuntu twalubulo lwa goludi u tubwe tweebeshi tubotu tubekabeka. Mwitashi lyakwe kakwete inkapu ya goludi iizwile shisesemya shibiyabi shamamambe akwe.
Ankumu kalembelwe izhina lyacaampi ati, “Babiloni mukando, ngunokwabo bashimamambe ushiyanza shisesemya shoonse shaanshi ano.”
Inzho ndakabona ati wezu mukaintu kakolelwe bulowa bwa banamusalazhi babo bakayaiwa ukaambo kabukamboni bwa Jeso.
Indakamubona ndakazoowa cini cini.
Inzho anjelo wakambuzha ati. “No wazoowaanzhi? Ndakamwaambila masesece apandulula mukaintu wezu u munyama ngwaalizile ukwete mitwi ili ciloba umeya ali ikumi.

Welya munyama nguwabona, kali mumi ku ciindi cimwi pele ninzho mufwu. Uli afwaafwi kuhwa mwilambwe liteeli kuya kukuzonaunwa. Bantu bacipona ano anshi, kwaambisha babo bali mazhinaabo atalembelwe mwibuka lya bumi kuhwa ku malenjelo anshi, balakazoowa bakamubona munyama wezu. Ciindi cimwi kali mumi ninzho mufwu, pele nikuba bobo ulakazhoka ulimwi.
“Awa kulazandika mizeezo ya busongo. Mitwi ili ciloba, mapili ali ciloba awo mukaintu ngaashite. Ulimwi kuli bami bali ciloba.
Bosanwe bakafwa. Wezu umwi ucilela, pele wezu umwi ulakeza kabotu. Akashika ulakalela ciindi cishoonto bulyo.
Munyama wezo wakaakuli mumi ku ciindi cimwi, pele ninzho tali mumi, ngu mwami walusele, ulimwi ulyaantoomwi u babo bali ciloba pele nikuba bobo aze ulaya kukuzonaunwa.
Baba boonse bali ikumi balikwete mizeezo ikozhene, ubobo balapa munyama insana u bwami bwabo.
Balakamulwisha Mwanaa Mbelele. Inzho Mwanaa Mbelele antoomwi u bantu bakwe mbaaketa, basale bashomeka, balakazunda, nkaambo ngu Mwami wa bami u Mweendelezhi wa beendelezhi.”
Wezo anjelo wakaŋambila ulimwi ati, “Meenzhi alya nguwabona, awo ngaakushite mukaintu shimamambe, mbantu ba mashi bamishobo u milaka yaandeene andeene.
Alya meya ali ikumi nguwakabona antoomwi u munyama balakamusula mukaintu shimamambe. Balakabweza shoonse nshaakwete ukumushiya cintanda. Ulimwi balakalya mubili wakwe ukumutenta mu mulilo.
Nkaambo Leza wakabapa muzeezo womwi mu myonzo yabo kwaamba bacite mbwaazanda, ubobo balakapa bulelo bwabo kumunyama kwaamba shesho nshaakaamba Leza shikazuzucizhiwe.
“Welya mukaintu ngumwakabona ngu munzhi mukando ulela bami boonse ba anshi ano.”
Nishakamana sheshi, ndakabona anjelo umwi uleza anshi kuhwa mwizeulu. Kakwete insana sha bwami, inshi yakaba mu mumuni ukaambo kakubeka beka kwakwe.
Wakapozomoka iizwi ikando ati, “Wawa, wawa Babiloni munzhi mukando! Waba munzhi wa myoza mibiyabi, wanjilwa myoza mibiyabi, bwaba busena bwa bazuni basofweele, balumina luciso.
Nkaambo bantu ba mashi oonse bakanwa waini wabukali bwa mamambe akwe, abo bami ba mashi bacitaaze mamambe uba shimakwebo baano anshi bahuba ukaambo kansana shabweleenze bwakwe.”
“Nomusosoloce mukaintu wezu umwe nubantu bangu!
Tamweelele kubishaaze, tamweelele kupewaaze cisubulo!
shilashika kwizeulu.
Leza wazhibaluka kutalulama shakwe.
mumupilushizhe shiindi shobile kwashesho nshaakacita, iinkapu yamapenzhi njaakapa bamwi, mumupe shobile.
Kaambo mu monzo wakwe ulaamba ati ndalela ukoya mwami mukaintu.
‘Nshili mukamufwu, ulimwi nshikaboni ipenzhi nililampa.’
Inzho, ukaambo ka ceci, mapenzhi akwe alakeza buzuba bomwi,
mapenzhi, u kulila, iinzala, ulimwi ulakatentwa
mu mulilo, nkaambo Mwami Leza shikumubeteka ulikwete insana.”
Balakazhima ansansa ukaambo kabukandu bwa mapenzhi a cisubulo cakwe. Balakaamba ati, “Maawe akaka! Maawe! Uwe u munzhi mukando mulemu Babiloni! Lubeta lwako lwakosolwa mwiwoola lyomwi bulyo!”

Kwiina ucuula linji goludi u siliva u mabwe meebeshi u malungu u malembo ashisani shacilambo ca shicisu u masani atuba u masani ashiya a subila pyu u shisamu shibeze shamishobo mishobo, iinkaya u shibeze shimwi shipangwa kumeno a bazohu, ushimwi shipangwa kumapulanga a muulo mukando u shibumbwa sha looto u lubulo ulimwi u mabwe meebeshi

u tununcilizho twamafwuta anunka kalonze u tulungwa mu shakulya u tununcilizho twa kulifwucilizha u waini u mafwuta u bufwu bwakupanzha cinkwa, iiŋombe, iimbelele, iimbizhi u shikoci u bazhice ulimwi u bantu bapona.
Shoonse shintu sheebeshi nshiwakaakuzanda kufwuwa shakushiya, bulemu bwako u bweebeshi bwako bwamana tabukayanwa linji.
Balakaamba ati, “Maawe akaka, maawe! Uwe u munzhi mukando! Wakaakusama shisani shibotusha shacilambo ca shicisu, u kusubila pyu. Ulimwi kusacila inkaya u goludi u mabwe meebeshi, iimpande!
Pele mwiwoola lyomwi bulyo wazonaucilwa lubono loonse lolu!”
Bashikushika mato, ubashilweendo boonse, u babo boonse basebezha mato mu makwebo aabo, bakazhima ansansa,
nibakabona bushi bulahwa mu munzhi wezo niwakaakupiya, bakalila cini cini ati, “Sa kuli munzhi mukando ukozhana ukoya wezu?”

Ngoonaawo bantu baba bakalilamba mulambo kumitwi yabo kutondezha kuusa, bakalila ukutengula ati, “Mawe, mawe welya munzhi mukando, momo boonse bakaakucita makwebo mu mato mu lwaatele bakahuba nkaambo kalubono lwawo! Kaambo mwiwoola lyomwi munzhi walota.”

Kulila kwa tulumbu, iimpeta u kwiimba kwabaimbi u kulizha mitolilo, shiina nishikaateelelwa linji mu munzhi wezu! Kwiina naaba shikubeza na mufwuzhi ukaayanwa mwako. Ulimwi kwiina izhiyo likaateelelwa mu munzhi wezu.

Takukabi linji mumuni welambe ukaabonwa mwako, naaba izwi lya shibwinga u nabwinga tabakateelelwa linji mwako pe. Ba shimakwebo bako kabakwete impuwo iinsana inshi yoonse mbwiibelele. Ulimwi mubulozhi bwako, wakacenga bantu ba mishobo yoonse!”
Nishakamana sheshi, ndakateelela izwi ikando lili ukoya lya mundindi wa bantu kwizeulu, balapozomoka ati, “Aleluya! Lufwutuko u bulemu, iinsana nshaka Leza wesu!

Nkaambo lubeta lwakwe ndwalushinizho ulimwi luliluleme. Nkaambo wamupa mulandu wezu mukaintu muhuule, wezo wakacenga inshi mubuhuule bwakwe. Ulimwi Leza wamupa inzholi wezu mukaintu wakatila bulowa bwa batwanga ba leza.”
Ulimwi bakaamba ati, “Aleluya! Bushi bwakwe bulaakuundunda shikwense u shikwense!”
Beendelezhi bakando bali makumi obile ubatwesha bone, kubicilizha u shilenje shone, bakawa anshi bakomba Leza ushite acuuna cakwe ca bwami. Baamba ati, “Ameni! Aleluya!”

Ulimwi ndakateelela kuhuuma kwezwi ikando ukoya kwa mundindi wa bantu naa kwa meenzhi manji manji, ulimwi ukoya kulindima kwanhula, kwakaamba ati, “Aleluya! Nkaambo Mwami Leza wesu shinsana shoonse ngulela boonse.
Atusekelele ukutangala, tumulemeke! Nkaambo ciindi ca bwinga bwa Mwanaa Mbelele cashika, u nabwinga walibamba kale.
Wahuminyiwa kale kusacila shisani shibotu, shisalala ulimwi shibeka beka.” Nkaambo isani ibotu ndilyeelele milimo mibotu ya bana musalazhi.

Inzho ndakafwukama ku maulu akwe kwaamba mukombe, pele walo wakaŋambila ati, “Utaciti bolya pe! Ame ndimutwanga noko, ulimwi ndime munyoko upa bumboni bwa Jeso. Komba Leza! Nkaambo bukamboni bwa Jeso mbwamoza wa bushinshimi.”
Menso akwe ali ukoya mulilo uhwilima. Ku mutwi kasamine mishini minji minji. Kalembelwe izhina lyakaakwiina uzhi, cita bulyo mwini.
Icanshi ndyakaakusamine lyakahwa mubulowa. Izhina lyakwe katewa ati, “Izwi lya Leza.”
Bashikalumamba ba kwizeulu kabasamine shisani shibonhu bonhu shituba buu, shisalala, kabamucilile balilizile ambizhi shituba.
Ku mulomo wakwe kwakahwa iceba lilampa lya kuumya mashi oonse. Ulakalela mashi u musako walubulo. Ulimwi ulakalyatauka ilindi lyakukandila masaansa mu buzuba bwabukali bwa Leza shinsana shoonse.
E canshi lyakwe e belo lyakwe kaali izhina lilembelwe ati, “Mwami wa bami, Mweendelezhi wa beendelezhi.”

Kamwiza mulye mibili yabami, u mibili yaba shikalumamba, umibili ya bankondo bakando ubashoonto, u mibili ya mbizhi u babo bashiliza, umibili ya bantu boonse, bazhice ubatali bazhice, balemekwa u babo bantu bulyo.”
Ngoonaawo ndakabona munyama ubami ba anshi ano bali u bashikalumamba balibungene kwaamba balwe u wezo wakaakulizile a mbizhi u bashikalumamba bakwe.

Welya munyama bakamukwata antoomwi u mushinshimi mubeshi wakaakucita maleele mu menso akwe. Ukaambo kamaleele ngaakaakucita, wakacenga bantu babo bakaakukwete shikanto shamunyama u babo bakaakukomba cibumbwa camunyama. Munyama antoomwi umushinshimi mubeshi bakasowewa bulanga mwizhiba lya mulilo ulyakaakuzaka u mabwe a salufa.
Bamwi babo bakashaala bakayaiwa iceba lelyo lyakahwa ku mulomo wakawezo wakaakulizile a mbizhi u bazuni boonse bakekuta mibili yabo.
Ngoonaawo ndakabona anjelo uleza buseluka kuhwa kwizeulu. Mwitashi kakwete maci a mwilambwe liteeli ulimwi kakwete inceetani inkando.
Anjelo wakalizunda itoshi, muzoka wakale kale, ushilucengo, na Shaatani u kumwaanga mwaka ili cuulu.
Amane anjelo wakamuwaala Shaatani mwilambwe liteeli, wakamuyalila ukumuciila kwaamba atakacengi linji bantu kushicila myaka iili cuulu ikamane. Kuhwaawo, ula kaangululwa kwa ciindi cishoonto.
Bafwu banji banji, bayina nibakabuka kushicila myaka iili cuulu niyakamana. Koku nkukubuka kutaanzhi kwa bafwu.
Ulilonjelwe ulimwi ulasalala wezo uyanwa mububuce butaanzhi. Lufwu lwabili lwiina insana nkubabele, pele balakaba bapaizhi baleza uba Kilisito, ulimwi balakeendelezha iinsana kwa myaka ili cuulu.
Inzho myaka ili cuulu yakamana, Shaatani ulakaangululwa kuhwa muntolongo,

ulakakanka kuya bucenga mashi oonse mushooko shone sha anshi. Aza mashi alatewa ati, Gogi u Magogu. Shaatani ulakababunganya antoomwi kwaamba balwe lumamba, ulimwi balakaakuli banji banji ukoya musenga a mulando wa lwaatele.
Bakeenda kuya mu masena woonse anshi ukuzhinguluka busena bwa bana musalazhi u munzhi wezo Leza ngwaafwini. Pele mulilo wakaawaalwa kuhwa kwizeulu, wabazonauna boonse.
Inzho Shaatani uwa kabacenga wakawaalwa mwizhiba lya mulilo wa mabwe a salufa, momo munyama umushinshimi mubeshi mubabele. Ubobo balakapenga muunza u mashiku shikwense u shikwense.

Inzho ndakabona bafwu, balemu ubatali balemu, balizhimine kumbele lya cuuna ceco, inzho mabuka akayalulwa. Ulimwi ibuka lyakayalulwa, leli kalili ibuka lya bumi. Bafwu bakapewa cisubulo kwiingaina unshibakacita shilembelwe mu mabuka.
Alo lwaatele lwakazubulula bafwu bakaakuli mo. Lufwu u busena bukala bafwu shakabusha bafwu bakaakuli momo, boonse bakabetekwa kwiingaina u nshibakacita.
Ngoonaawo lufwu u busena bwa bafwu shakawaalwa mwizhiba lya mulilo. Lolu ndulufwu lwabili.
Woonse watakaakulembelwe izhina lyakwe mwibuka lya bumi, wakawaalwa mwizhiba lya mulilo.
Ulimwi ndakabona munzhi usalala, Jelusalemu mupiya, wakaselucila anshi kuhwa kwizeulu kwa Leza. Wakaakubambilwe ukoya nabwinga usamine shibotu kulanjila mulumyaakwe.

Ngoonaawo ndakateelela izwi ikando lyakahwa ku cuuna ca bwami lyaamba ati, “Inzho bukalo bwa Leza bwaba akati ka bantu! Leza ulakakalaabo, abo balakaba bantu bakwe. Mwami Leza ulakakalaabo, ulimwi ulakaba ngu Leza wabo.
Ubobo ulakabashuula misozhi yabo. Takukabi linji lufwu, kuusa, kulila u kusata. Shintu sha kutaanguna shoonse shilakamana.”

Inzho wezo wakaakushite acuuna ca bwami wakaamba ati, “Amubone ndacita shintu shoonse kwaamba shibe shipiya!” Ulimwi wakaŋambila ati, “Lemba ceci, nkaambo aza makani nga lushinizho ulimwi alyeelele kushomwa.”
Ulimwi wakaŋambila ati, “Inzho kwamana! Ndime Alufa u Omega, Makancilo u Mamanino. Kufwumbwa wezo ufwile inyota, ndakamuhuminya kunwa meenzhi ahwa kumwiinzo wameenzhi apa bumi.
Wezo uzunda, ulakapewa bulumbu bobu, ndakaba Leza wakwe, aze ulakaba mwanangu.

Pele bakandu u bayina lushomo u bazanda kucita shamafwunze u bayazhi uba shimamambe u balozhi u babo bakomba shipanje naa shibumbwa u babeshi, busena bwabo baba boonse ndizhiba lya mulilo uzaka wa mabwe a salufa. Lolu ndulufwu lwabili.”
Inzho umwi wabaanjelo bali ciloba bakaakukwete ingaba shakaakuzwile mapenzhi ali ciloba a mamanino, wakeza kwangu, waamba ati, “Kweza nkutondezhe nabwinga wa Mwanaa Mbelele.”
Ulimwi munsana sha Moza Usalala anjelo welya wakantola ku lupili lukando lulamfwu, wakantondezha munzhi mukando usalala wa Jelusalemu, uleza anshi kuhwa kwa Leza.
Munzhi wezu kookwete bulemu bwa Leza, koomweka ukoya ibwe iyebeshi lya jasipa libalangala ukoya ingilazi.

Kozacililwe bwaanda bulamfwu bwakaakukwete milyango ili ikumi u milyango yobile, ulimwi kakuli u baanjelo bali ikumi u baanjelo bobile mumilyango yezho. Amulyango umulyango, kaalembelwe mazhina a mishobo ili ikumi u mishobo yobile yaba Izilaili.
Kwiwe kakuli milyango yotatwe, ukumbala ako yotatwe, ukucibizhi ako yotatwe, ulimwi u kumbo kakuli yotatwe.
Mwiimbi wabwaanda bwa munzhi koozacilwe amabwe ali ikumi u mabwe obile, azo akaakulembelwe mazhina a batumwa ba Mwanaa Mbelele.
Anjelo wezo wakaakuŋambila kakwete musako wakweelesha wa goludi kwaamba eeleke munzhi antoomwi u milyango u bwaanda.

Munzhi kookwete shooko shone shiingaine umbwamba umbulamfwu. Ngoonaawo anjelo wakeeleka munzhi kusebezha musako, wakayana ati ulalampa makilomita ali shuulu shobile umyaanda yone, abo bwaanda buzhingulucile munzhi kabwiingaine umbwamba umbulamfwu.
Inzho anjelo wakeeleka bwaanda bwa munzhi, wakayana ati nintaamo shili makumi cisambomwi kweeleka kwa buntu, pele koku kakuli kweeleka kwa anjelo.
Bwaanda kabuzacilwe ebwe lya jasipa iyebeshi, pele munzhi wini kooli wa goludi imbotu injebeshi ibalangala ukoya ingilazi.

Mwiimbi wabwaanda wakaboshewa boshewa u mabwe meebeshi a mishobo mishobo. Ibwe lya kutaanguna lya mwiimbi wezu kalili lya jasipa, ulyabili kalili ibwe safile, lyatatu kalili ibwe lya agate, ulyane kalili ibwe lya emalodi,

lyasanu kalili ibwe lya onikisi, lya cisambomwi kalili ibwe lya kaneliani, lya ciloba kalili ibwe lya kwaazi, lya lusele kalili ibwe lya belilu, lyefwuka kalili ibwe lya topazi, lyekumi kalili ibwe lya calusedoni, lyekumi ulitwesha lyomwi kalili ibwe lya takuose, lyekumi aatwesha obile kalili ibwe lya amesisiti.
A milyango ili ikumi u milyango yobile kaali impande yomwi, amulyango u mulyango kaali ingale yomwi, inzhila ya munzhi mukando keeli ya goludi, waloolona kebalangala ukoya ingilazi.
Ndiina indakabona iŋanda ya Leza mu munzhi momo pe, nkaambo Mwami Leza shinsana shoonse u Mwanaa Mbelele njiiŋanda ya Leza.
Mu munzhi wezu tamuzandika izuba nuuba mwezhi, nkaambo bulemu bwa Leza mbubumunika, aze Mwanaa Mbelele ndiilambe lyawo.
Bantu ba mishobo yoonse balakeenda mu mumuni wawo, abo bami baanshi balakaleta bulemu bwabo mulinguwo.
Milyango yawo teekayalwa mazuba oonse nkaambo koko kulaakwiina mashiku pe.
Ulimwi balakaleta bulemu bwa mashi oonse.

Pele kwiina cisofweele cikaanjila mu munzhi momo niciba comwi, nibaba bantu bacita shisesemya naa babeshi. Bantu bakeenjila mu munzhi wezo, mbubabo bulyo balembelwe mwibuka lya bumi lya Mwanaa Mbelele.

Kookuncila munzhila yaakati kamunzhi. Kunja shoonse sha mulonga kakuli isamu lya bumi, lyaakuzhala micelo shiindi shili ikumi u shiindi shobile, kalizhala micelo amwezhi umwezhi, mu mwaka womwi. Matuhu esamu kaali akushilisha bantu bamishobo yoonse.
Kwiina cintu niciba comwi cishinganye ucikaayanwa mu munzhi wezu.
Cuuna ca Mwami Leza ulimwi uca Mwanaa Mbelele nshishiyanwa mu munzhi wezu, ulimwi batwanga bakwe balakamukomba.
Balakabubona bushu bwakwe, izhina lyakwe lilakalembwa ankumu shabo.
Kwiina nikukaaba mashiku. Tabakoozanda linji mumuni we lambe uwe zuba. Nkaambo Mwami Leza ulakaba ngu mumuni wabo. Ulimwi balakalela shikwense u shikwense.

Inzho anjelo wakenta ati, “Mazwi aza alishinizhe ulimwi alyeelele kushomwa. Mwami Leza upa Moza ku bashinshimi, watuma anjelo wakwe kwaamba atondezhe batwanga bakwe shintu sheelele kucitika ninzho-ninzho.”
“Amubone! Ndeza ca kufwambaana! Ulilonjelwe wezo uteelela mazwi aza a bushinshimi ali mwibuka leli!”
Ndime Johani, wakateelela ukushibona sheshi shintu. Ulimwi indakashibona, ndakafwukama anshi ku maulu a anjelo wezo wakantondezha ndakakomba.
Pele walo wakaŋambila ati, “Utaciti bolya! Ume ndimutwanganoko ulimwi ndime munyoko antoomwi u bashinshimi, ulimwi u babo basunga mazwi a mwibuka leli. Komba Leza!”
Ngoona wakaŋambila ati, “Utaaseseka mazwi aabushinshimi ali mwibuka leli nkaambo ciindi cili afwaafwi.
Wezo ucita shibi, naaitilizhe kucita, aze wezo ucita mafwunze atolelele mu mafwunze akwe, wezo ululeme atolelele kucita shiluleme, aze wezo usalala atolelele kusalala.”
Ndime Alufa u Omega, Ndi mutaanzhi ulimwi Ndi mushaalizhi, ndime Makancilo u Mamanino.”
Ansengwe ali babwa u balozhi u bashimamambe u bayazhi u bakomba shibumbwa ulimwi u babo boonse bafwini kwaamba twa bubeshi.
Ulimwi kufwumbwa muntu ukusha ku mazwi a bushinshimi alembelwe mwibuka leli, Leza ulakakusha caabilo cakwe ca kwisamu lya bumi, ulimwi u mumunzhi u salala, shilembelwe mwibuka leli.
Wezo upa bumboni ku makani aza, ulaamba ati, “Ee, cini cini mbwaabele, ndeza ca kufwambaana!”
Ameni. Kweza, Mwami Jeso!
Luse lwa Mwami Jeso lube amwe noonse. Ameni.
